yad vā granthir eva granthaḥ, nirgatāhaṅkāra-granthayaḥ | yad uktaṁ—bhidyate hṛdaya-granthiḥ [bhā.pu. 1.2.21] iti | yad vā, vidhi-niṣedha-granthātītāḥ | yad uktaṁ—cared avidhi-gocaraḥ [bhā.pu. 11.18.28] iti | tathābhūtā api ahaitukīṁ phalābhisandhi-rahitāṁ bhaktiṁ kurvanti | bhaktyā jñānaṁ jñānātīto’pi bhaktir ity ūruḥ | śreṣṭha eva kramo yasmāt tasmin | 

nanūnmuktiḥ muktānāṁ kiṁ bhaktyā nirgranthānāṁ kiṁ bhakti-granthena śrī-bhāgavatana nirabhimānānāṁ kiṁ punaḥ sevya-sevaka-lakṣaṇenābhimānena vidhi-niṣedhātītānām, kiṁ punaḥ śrī-bhāgavatoktena bhakter vidhinety ādi sarvākṣepa-parihārārtham āha—itthaṁ-bhūta-guṇa iti | itthaṁ-bhūta ātmārāmāṇām apy ākarṣaṇa-śīlo guṇo yasya saḥ | tena mūlata eva bhakti-prādhānyābhyāsena vā mad-guṇānubhava eṣām astv iti sanakādiṣu bhagavat-kṛpayaiva śrī-kṛṣṇa-guṇānubhavo mat-sutasyāstv iti śrī-śuke vyāsasyeva bhagavato bhaktānāṁ vā kṛpayā yair ātmārāmais tad-guṇānubhava-yogyatā labdhā ta evāhaitukīṁ bhaktiṁ kurvanti, anye ātmārāmāḥ sāyujyārthaṁ bhaktiṁ kurvantīty ahaitukī-padavyāvṛttir anusandheyā | yad uktaṁ—


        brahma-bhūtaḥ prasannātmā na śocati na kāṅkṣati |


        samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu mad-bhaktiṁ labhate parām || 


        bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ |


        tato māṁ tattvato jñātvā viśate tad-anantaram || [gītā 18.54,56] iti ||10|| 

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **pariharati—**ātmā-rāmāḥ** samādhi-dṛṣṭāṣṭa-guṇakasvātmāna eva **nirgranthās** tadānandāsvādena tyakta-śāstrā api palālam iva dhānyārthī tyajed grantham aśeṣataḥ iti [brahma-bindu. 18] śravaṇāt, atimano-jñānanta-bhagavad-guṇa-vijña-mahattama-prasaṅge sati harau bhaktiṁ tat-tad-guṇa-pravartitāṁ kurvanti, **ahaitukīṁ** tad anya-phalecchā-śūnyāṁ, sarva-kṣepanir āsāyāha—ittham iti | īdṛśaṁ tad-guṇa-mādhuryaṁ yena svātmānandaṁ vismarantīti | harau kīdṛśi? śāstrāt svātma-jñānaṁ, tatas tad ānandānubhavaḥ, tataḥ śāstratyāgaḥ, tato hariguṇa-śravaṇāt tatra bhaktis tato guṇa-nirūpaka-saṁhitādhyayanam ity eva murur mahān kramo yasmāt-tasmin ||10||

 **...**

|| 1.7.11 ||

**harer guṇākṣipta-matir bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ |**

**adhyagān mahad ākhyānaṁ nityaṁ viṣṇu-jana-priyaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nanu bhaktiṁ kurvantu nāma, etac chāstrābhyāse śukasya kiṁ kāraṇam ity ata āha—harer iti | adhyagād adhītavān | viṣṇu-janāḥ priyā yasyeti | vyākhyānādi-prasaṅgena tat-saṅgati-kāma iti bhāvaḥ | etena tasya putro mahā-yogītyādinā śukasya vyākhyāne pravṛttiḥ katham iti yat pṛṣṭhaṁ tasyottaram uktam ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tam evārthaṁ śrī-śukasyāpy anubhavena saṁvādayati—harer guṇeti | śrī-vyāsadevād yat-kiñcic-chrutena guṇena pūrvam ākṣiptā matir yasya saḥ | paścād adhyagāt mahad-vistīrṇam api | tataś ca tat-saṅkathā-sauhārdena nityaṁ viṣṇu-janāḥ priyā yasya tathābhūto vā, teṣāṁ priyo vā svayam abhavad ity arthaḥ |

ayaṁ bhāvaḥ—brahma-vaivartānusāreṇa pūrvaṁ tāvad ayaṁ garbham ārabhya śrī-kṛṣṇasya svairitayā māyā-nivārakatvaṁ jñātavān | tatra sva-niyojanayā śrī-vyeda-vyāsenānītasya tasyāntar darśanāt tan-nivāraṇe sati kṛtārthaṁ-manyatayā svayam ekāntam eva gatavān | tatra śrī-vyāsadevas tu taṁ vaśīkartuṁ tad-ananya-sādhanaṁ śrī-bhāgavatam eva jñātvā, tad-guṇātiśaya-prakāśamayāṁs tadīya-padya-viśeṣān kathañcic chrāvayitvā tena tam ākṣipta-matiṁ kṛtvā, tad eva pūrṇaṁ tam adhyāpayāmāseti śrī-bhāgavata-mahimātiśayaḥ proktaḥ ||11|| [tattva-sandarbha 49]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nārada-kṛpayā vyāsasyaiva vyāsa-kṛpayā śukasyāpi tad-guṇa-mādhuryānubhavo viśeṣata evābhūd ity āha—harer iti | harer guṇena ākṣiptā ākṣepa-viṣayī-kṛtā matir brahmānubhavo yena saḥ dhiṣme matiṁ yata īḍrśe bhagavad-guṇa-mādhurye saty api etāvān kālo brahmānubhavena mayā vṛthaiva yāpita iti | tataś ca tat-kathā-sauhārdena viṣṇu-janā eva na tu kevalā ātmārāmāḥ priyā yasya saḥ ṣaṣṭhī-samāso vā | atra vyāsa eva bhagavad-guṇābhivyañjakān śrī-bhāgavatīyān kāṁścana ślokān loka-dvārā viviktāraṇye sadā samādhistham api śukaṁ śrāvayāmāsa | tatas tac-chaktyaiva bhagna-samādhis tan-mādhuryākṛṣṭa-cittas tādṛśaṁ samādhim apy ākṣipya sarvajñatayā tān ślokān śrī-bhāgavatīyān jñātvā tat-prakāśakaṁ ca sva-pitaraṁ jñātvā tad-antikam āgatya śrī-bhāgavatam adhyaiṣṭeti brahma-vaivartānusāreṇa kathā jñeyā | tad evaṁ vyāsa-śukau pitā-putrau brahmānubhavi-cūḍāmaṇī api vijitya bhaktir eka-cchatrām iva sarva-jagatīṁ cakre | tad api ye tāṁ tathā na manyante kupatha-gāminaś caurā yamenaiva daṇḍyā iti ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanv araṇye samādhi-niṣṭhaḥ śukaḥ kathaṁ pitaram upeyāya, tatrāha—harer iti | vyāsa-preṣita-śiṣyodgītaiḥ kaiścit saṁhitā-padyair avagatā ye **harer **guṇās tair **ākṣiptā** sva-samādher ākṛṣṭā **matis** tad-ānanda-magnā buddhir yasya saḥ | **mahad** apy **ākhyānaṁ** tad-guṇa-prakāśakatvād **adhyagād** adhītavān pitaraṁ sevamānaḥ san | tatas tat-kathā-rasāsvādāya **viṣṇujanāḥ priyā** yasya teṣāṁ vā svayaṁ priyo'bhūt | etena tasya putro mahā-yogī [bhā.pu. 1.4.4] ity-ādinā tādṛśasya śukasya vyākhyāne pravṛttiḥ katham iti praśnasyottaram abhūt ||11||

 **...**

|| 1.7.12 ||

**parīkṣito’tha rājarṣer janma-karma-vilāpanam |**

**saṁsthāṁ ca pāṇḍu-putrāṇāṁ vakṣye kṛṣṇa-kathodayam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **yad anyat pṛṣṭhaṁ parīkṣitaḥ prāyopaveśena śravaṇaṁ katham iti’_tasya janma mahāścaryam_' ity-ādinā tasyottaraṁ vaktum āha—parīkṣita iti | vilāpanaṁ muktiṁ mṛtyuṁ vā | saṁsthāṁ mahā-prasthānam | śrī-kṛṣṇa-kathānām udayo yayā bhavati tathā ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **kṛṣṇa-kathānām udayo yatra tad yathā bhavatīti mukhyatayā tena pṛṣṭānāṁ kṛṣṇa-kathānām ārambho’pi sūcitaḥ ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **etena tasya putro mahā-yogīty ādinā śukasya vyākhyāne pravṛttiḥ katham iti yat pṛṣṭaṁ tasyottaram uktaṁ yad anyat pṛṣṭaṁ parīkṣitaḥ prāyopaveśena śravaṇaṁ katham iti tasya janma mahāścaryam ity-ādinā tasyottaram āha—parīkṣita iti | vilāpanaṁ mṛtyum | yad vā, leper ṇyantāl luṭā śrī-bhāgavata-kathā-vācanam ity arthaḥ | saṁsthāṁ mahā-prasthānaṁ kṛṣṇa-kathānām udayo yatra tad yathā syād iti śrī-bhāgavatasya tatraiva tātparyāt ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **atha parīkṣitaḥ prāyopaveśa-śravaṇaṁ katham iti tasya janma mahāścaryām [bhā.pu. 1.4.9] ity-ādinā yad anyac ca pṛṣṭaṁ talasyāttaram āha—parīkṣito'theti | vilāpanaṁ maraṇaṁ, saṁsthāṁ mahā-prasthānaṁ, kṛṣṇa-kathāmudayo yatra tad-yathā syādevam iti tatraiva saṁhitāyās tātparyāt ||12||

 **...**

|| 1.7.13 || 

**yadā mṛdhe kaurava-sṛñjayānāṁ**

**vīreṣv atho vīra-gatiṁ gateṣu |**

**vṛkodarāviddha-gadābhimarśa-**

**bhagnoru-daṇḍe dhṛtarāṣṭra-putre ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tatra parīkṣito janma nirūpayiṣyann ādau tāvad garbhasya evāśvatthāmno brahmāstrāt kṛṣṇena rakṣita iti vaktuṁ kathāṁ prastauti—yadetyādinā | yadā drauṇir aśvatthāmā kṛṣṇā-sutānāṁ draupadī-putrāṇāṁ śirāṁsy upaharat tadā tan-matārudat tāṁ ca sāntvayān kirīṭa-mālyārjuna āheti tṛtīyenānvayaḥ | kim iti bālānāṁ śirāṁsy ānītavān ity apekṣāyām āha | mṛdhe yddhe | yadyapi pāṇḍavā api kauravā eva tathāpi sṛñjaya-vaṁśajo dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ pāṇḍavānāṁ senā-patir sṛñjayānām ity uktam | vīra-gatiṁ svargam | atho anantaram | vṛkodareṇāviddhāyāḥ kṣiptāyā gadāyā abhimarśenābhighātena bhagnāv ūrudaṇḍau yasya tathā-bhūte dhṛtarāṣṭra-putre duryodhane sati ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tatra garbhastha eva parīkṣit śrī-kṛṣṇa-darśanaṁ prāpeti vaktuṁ kathāṁ prastauti | yadā drauṇir aśvatthāmā kṛṣṇā-sutānāṁ draupadī-putrāṇāṁ śirāṁsy upāharat, tadā tan-mātā arudad iti tṛtīyeṇānvayaḥ | kauravāḥ duryodhanādyāḥ sṛñjaya-vaṁśyodbhavasya dhṛṣṭadyumnasya pāṇḍava-senāpatitvāt sṛñjaya-padena pāṇḍavā lakṣyante | vīra-gatiṁ bhīṣmokta-yuktyā mokṣaṁ svargaṁ ca | vṛkodareṇa āviddhāyāḥ kṣiptāyāḥ gadāyāḥ abhimarṣeṇa ghātena ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **garbha eva parīkṣit kṛṣṇam apaśyad iti vaktuṁ kathāṁ prastoti—yadā drauṇiḥ, kṛṣṇā-sūtānāṁ draupadī-putrāṇāṁ pañcānāṁ śirāṁsyupāharat, tadā teṣāṁ mātā sārudad iti tṛtīyena sambandhaḥ | kauravā duryodhanādayaḥ sṛñjayā pāṇḍavās teṣāṁ vīreṣu mṛdhe yuddhe vīragatiṁ svargaṁ mokṣaṁ vā gateṣu, 

nanu pāṇḍavānāṁ sṛñjayatvaṁ kathaṁ? satyaṁ, dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ sṛñjayo'styeṣāṁ senāpatitvenetyarśa ādyac | vṛkodareṇa bhīmenāviddhāyāḥ kṣiptāyā gadāyā abhimarśena pātena bhartur duryodhanasyety evaṁ priyaṁ syād iti paśyan drauṇir vastutas tasyāpriyam eva tat | ādau śakru-vadha-śravaṇena harṣodayāt, anantarasparśena tad avadhāvagamāc-chiśu-vadhāc ca kuruvaṁśa-vilopād viṣādodayāc ca sa mṛta iti tasyāpriyam ato jugupsitam iti ||13||

 **...**

|| 1.7.14 || 

**bhartuḥ priyaṁ drauṇir iti sma paśyan**

**kṛṣṇā-sutānāṁ svapatāṁ śirāṁsi |**

**upāharad vipriyam eva tasya**

**jugupsitaṁ karma vigarhayanti ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **svātmana eva vipriyaṁ na bhartuḥ | prayojanābhāvāt vipriyam iva ca tasya priyam iti hi prasvāpoktam ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **bhartur duryodhanasya | smeti vitarke | ity evaṁ priyaṁ syād iti paśyan | tasya tad vipriyam eveti vākyāntaram | vipriyatve hetuḥ—jugupsitam iti ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **bhartur duryodhanasya evaṁ priyaṁ syād iti paśyan, vastutas tu tasya duryodhanasya vipriyam eva tat prathamaṁ śatru-vadha-śravaṇena harṣodayāt paścāt sparśena bhīmādīnāṁ sva-śatrūṇām avadha-jñānāt bāla-vadhāc ca kuru-vaṁśa-lopa-śravaṇāc ca viṣādotpatter harṣa-viṣādābhyāṁ ca tan-mṛtyu-prāpter iti bhāvaḥ | ata evāha—jugupsitam iti ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **bhartur duryodhanasyety evaṁ priyaṁ syād iti paśyan drauṇir vastutas tasyāpriyam eva tat | ādau śatru-vadha-śravaṇena harṣodayāt anantara-sparśena tad-avadhāvagamāc chiśuvadhāc ca kuru-vaṁśa-vilopād viṣādodayāc ca sa mṛta iti tasyāpriyam | ato jugupasitam iti ||14||

 **...**

|| 1.7.15 || 

**mātā śiśūnāṁ nidhanaṁ sutānāṁ**

**niśamya ghoraṁ paritapyamānā |**

**tadārudad bāṣpa-kalākulākṣī**

**tāṁ sāntvayann āha kirīṭamālī ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **svapno’yam | 


    pārthānuyātam ātmānaṁ drauṇiḥ svapne dadarśa ha |


    bandhanaṁ cātmanas tatra draupadyā caiva mokṣaṇam || iti skānde |

tasmān naiṣīkāvarodhaḥ ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **ghoraṁ duḥsahaṁ yathā bhavati | bāṣpasya kalābhir bindubhir ākule akṣiṇī yasyāḥ | kirīṭasyaikatve’pi tad-agrāṇāṁ bahutvāt kirīṭa-mālīty uktam ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kirīṭāgrāṇāṁ bahutvāt kirīṭasthā mālā vā yasyāsti sa kirīṭa-mālī arjunaḥ ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **ghoraṁ duḥsahaṁ, kirīṭaṁ mālā ca yasyāsti so'rjunaḥ ||15||

**...**

|| 1.7.16 || 

**tadā śucas te pramṛjāmi bhadre**

**yad brahma-bandhoḥ śira ātatāyinaḥ |**

**gāṇḍīva-muktair viśikhair upāhare**

**tvākramya yat snāsyasi dagdha-putrā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **śucaḥ śokāśrūṇi | pramṛjāmi parimārjayāmi | yad yadā brahma-bandhor brāhmaṇādhamasyātatāyina iti 


    agni-do gara-daś caiva śastra-pāṇir dhanāpahaḥ | 


    kṣetra-dāra-haraś caiva ṣaḍ ete hy ātatāyinaḥ || 

iti smaraṇād atrātatāyī śastra-pāṇis tena ca putra-hantṛtvaṁ lakṣyate | gāṇḍīvād dhanuṣo muktair viśikhair bāṇair upāhare tvat-samīpam ānayāmi | yac chira ākramyāsanaṁ vidhāya | dugdha-putrā satī ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **śucaḥ śokān yat yadā brahma-bandhor brāhmaṇādhamasyātatāyinaḥ śastra-pāṇeḥ | agnido garadaś caiva śastra-pāṇir dhanāpahaḥ | kṣetra-dārāpahārī ca ṣaḍ ete ātatāyina iti smaraṇāt ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **śucaḥ śokān pramṛjāmy apanayāmi, yad-yadā brahma-bandhor viprādhamasya ātatāyinaḥ śastrapāṇeḥ śira upāhare tvat sannidhinim ānayāmi | agnido garadaścaiva-śastra-pāṇir dhanāpahaḥ | kṣetra-dāraharaścaiva ṣaḍete ātatāyainaḥ iti smṛteḥ | dagdha-putrā satī tvaṁ yacchira ākramya snāsyasi ||16||

**...**

|| 1.7.17 || 

**iti priyāṁ valgu-vicitra-jalpaiḥ**

**sa sāntvayitvācyuta-mitra-sūtaḥ |**

**anvādravad daṁśita ugra-dhanvā**

**kapi-dhvajo guru-putraṁ rathena ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : valgavo** ramyā vicitrā **jalpā** bhāṣaṇāni, taiḥ | **so**’rjunaḥ | **acyuta** eva **mitraṁ sūtaś** ca yasya | **daṁśito** baddha-kavacaḥ | **ugraṁ dhanuś** cāpaṁ yasya | **kapir** hanumān **dhvaje** yasya saḥ | **guroḥ putraṁ** **rathenānvādravad** anvadhāvat ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : acyuta** eva **mitraṁ sūtaś** ca yasya, sa **daṁśito** baddha-kavacaḥ ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : so**'rjunaḥ, **acyuto mitraṁ** sakhā **sūtaḥ** sārathiś ca yasya saḥ | **daṁśito** baddha-kavacaḥ **kapir** hanumān **dhvaje** yasya |** anvādravat** anvadhāvat ||17||

 **...**

|| 1.7.18 || 

**tam āpatantaṁ sa vilakṣya dūrāt**

**kumāra-hodvigna-manā rathena |**

**parādravat prāṇa-parīpsur urvyāṁ**

**yāvad-gamaṁ rudra-bhayād yathā kaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **āpatantam ādhāvantam | sa drauṇiḥ | kumāra-hā bāla-ghātī | udvigna-manāḥ kampita-hṛdayaḥ | prāṇa-parīpsuḥ prāṇān labdhum icchur na tu kīrtim | yāvad gamaṁ yāvad gantuṁ śakyaṁ tāvad urvyāṁ parādravad apalāyata | ko brahmā mṛgo bhūtvā sutāṁ yabdhum udyataḥ san rudrasya bhayād yathā palāyate sma | arka iti pāṭhe vāmana-purāna-kathā sūcitā | tathā hi—vidyunmālī nāma kaścid rākṣaso maheśvaras tasmai rudreṇa sauvarṇaṁ vimānaṁ dattam, tato’sāv arkasya pṛṣṭhato bhrāmyan vimāna-dīptyā rātriṁ vilopitavān, tato’rkeṇa nija-tejobhir drāvayitvā tad vimānaṁ pātitam, tac chrutvā kupite rudre bhayād arkaḥ parādravat, tato rudrasya krūra-dṛṣṭyā dandahyamānaḥ patan vārāṇasyāṁ patito lolārka-nāmnā vikhyāta iti ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **ko brahmā mṛgo bhūtvā sūtāṁ jābhitum udyataḥ san rudrasya bhayāt yathā palāyate sma | arka iti pāṭhe vāmana-purāṇa-kathā jñeyā | tathā hi—vidyunmālī rākṣasaḥ śaivaḥ śiva-dattena saurvarṇena vimānena arkasya pṛṣṭhato bhrāmyan vimāna-dīptyā rātriṁ vilopitavān, tataḥ kupito’rko nija-tejobhir drāvayitvā tad vimānaṁ pātayan tadaivāyātasya rudrasya bhayāt tataḥ palāyamānaḥ patan vārāṇasyāṁ lolārko babhūveti ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **āpatantam ādhāvantaṁ sa drauṇir vilakṣya dṛṣṭvā udvignamanaḥ kampitahṛt, prāṇa-parīpsuḥ prāṇan eva na tu kīrtim āptum icchuḥ, yāvadgamaṁ yāvadgantuṁ śakyaṁ tāvadurvyāṁ parādravad apalāyata, yathārka iti—śaivena śivadatta-svarṇa-vimānena vidyunmālinā rākṣasena sva-paścād-bhramatā rātriṁ vilopitāṁ vīkṣya kruddho'rkas tad-vimānaṁ svatejobhir dravībhāvaṁ prāpya nyapātayat | tataḥ kruddhācchivād-bhīto vidravan sa kāśyāṁ patan lolārkanāmā khyāto'bhūd iti vāmana-purāṇe prasiddham ||18||

 **...**

|| 1.7.19 || 

**yadāśaraṇam ātmānam aikṣata śrānta-vājinam |**

**astraṁ brahma-śiro mene ātma-trāṇaṁ dvijātmajaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **aśaraṇaṁ rakṣa-rahitam | nanu palāyanam eva rakṣakam asti, na, tasyāpi kuṇṭhitatvād ity āha | śrāntā vājino yasya tam | brahma-śiro’straṁ brahmāstram | dvijātmaja ity adīrgha-darśitām āha ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **aśaraṇaṁ rakṣaka-rahitam ātma-trāṇam ātma-rakṣopāyam, dvijātmaja ity adīrgha-darśitvaṁ sūcitam ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yad ātmānam aśaraṇaṁ rakṣaka-śūnyam aikṣata, nanu palāyanaṁ rakṣakamastu? tatrāha—śrānteti | tadā brahma-śiro'straṁ brahmāstram ātmatrāṇaṁ mene | dvijātmaja ity adīrghadarśīty arthaḥ ||19||

 **...**

|| 1.7.20 || 

**athopaspṛśya salilaṁ sandadhe tat samāhitaḥ |**

**ajānann api saṁhāraṁ prāṇa-kṛcchra upasthite ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tad brahmāstram | samāhitaḥ kṛta-dhyānaḥ | upasaṁhāram ajānato’pi saṁdhane hetuḥ—prāṇa-kṛcchra iti ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **samāhitaḥ kṛtadhyānaḥ ||20-21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **salilam upaspṛśya ācamya samāhitaḥ kṛta-dhyānaḥ ||20||

 **...**

|| 1.7.21 || 

**tataḥ prāduṣkṛtaṁ tejaḥ pracaṇḍaṁ sarvato diśam |**

**prāṇāpadam abhiprekṣya viṣṇuṁ jiṣṇur uvāca ha ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tato’strāt sarvato diśaṁ prāduṣkṛtaṁ tejo’ bhiprekṣya tataḥ prāṇāpadaṁ cābhiprekṣya ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **sarvato-diśam iti saravata ity asya yoge dvitīyā, diśam iti jātyaikatvam, diśāṁ sarvatrety arthaḥ | sārva-vibhaktikas tasiḥ, sarvāṁ diśam ity arthaḥ ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **jiṣṇur arjunaḥ ||21||

 **...**

|| 1.7.22 || 

**arjuna uvāca—**

**kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahā-bāho bhaktānām abhayaṅkara |**

**tvam eko dahyamānānām apavargo’si saṁsṛteḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **prastutaṁ vijñāpayituṁ prathamaṁ stauti —kṛṣṇeti caturbhiḥ | saṁsṛter hetor dahyamānānāṁ tasyām apavargo’pavarjayitā | nāśaka ity arthaḥ ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **apavargo mokṣa-rūpo’si tenāsmākaṁ saṁsṛter mokṣam api dāsyasi, kim utāsmād agnes trāṇa-mātram iti bhāvaḥ ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **saṁsṛter hetor dehyamānānāṁ prāṇinām apavargo'si | tathā cāsmād astrāgnes trāṇaṁ tava kiyad iti bhāvaḥ ||22||

 **...**

|| 1.7.23 || 

**tvam ādyaḥ puruṣaḥ sākṣād īśvaraḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ |**

**māyāṁ vyudasya cic-chaktyā kaivalye sthita ātmani ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **yatas tvam īśvaraḥ sākṣāt | kutaḥ ? yataḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ puruṣaḥ | tat kutaḥ ? yata ādyaḥ kāraṇam | kāraṇatve’py avikāritām āha | māyāṁ vyudasyābhibhūya kaivalya-rūpe ātmany eva sthita iti ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **māyā-hetukāyāḥ saṁsṛter nāśakatvena māyāto vilakṣaṇāṁ śaktiṁ darśayati—tvam iti | tvaṁ sākṣāt puruṣo bhagavān | tathā ya īśvaro’ntaryāmy-ākhyaḥ puruṣaḥ, so’pi tvam eva | tad evam ubhayasminn api prakāśe prakṛteḥ paras tad-asaṅgī |

nanu kathaṁ kevalānubhavānandasyāpi tad-anubhavitvaṁ, yato bhagavattvam api lakṣyate ? kathaṁ ceśvaratvāt prakṛty-adhiṣṭhātṛtve’pi tad-asaṅgitvam ? tatrāha—**māyāṁ vyudasya** iti | avyabhicāriṇyā svarūpa-śaktyā tām ābhāsa-śaktiṁ dūre vidhāya tathaiva svarūpa-śaktyā kaivalye—-


    parāvarāṇāṁ parama āste kaivalya-sañjñitaḥ |


    kevalānubhavānanda-sandoho nirupādhikaḥ || [bhā.pu. 11.9.18]

ity ekādaśokta-rītyā kaivalyākhye kevalānubhavānande ātmani sva-svarūpe sthitaḥ anubhūta-svarūpa-sukha ity arthaḥ | tad uktaṁ ṣaṣṭhe devair api—svayam upalabdha-nija-sukhānubhavo bhavān [bhā.pu. 6.9.33] iti | sandoha-śabdena caikādaśe vaicitrī darśitā, sā ca śakti-vaicitryād eva bhavatīti | ata evam asty eva svarūpa-śaktiḥ | 

**prakṛtir** nāmātra māyāyās traiguṇyam | evam eva śakti-traya-vivṛtiḥ svāmibhir eva darśitā | tathā hi śrī-devahūti-vākye—


    paraṁ pradhānaṁ puruṣaṁ mahāntaṁ


    kālaṁ kaviṁ tri-vṛtaṁ loka-pālam |


    ātmānubhūtyānugata-prapañcaṁ


    svacchanda-śaktiṁ kapilaṁ prapadye || [bhā.pu. 3.24.33] ity atra |

paraṁ parameśvaram | tatra hetuḥ—svacchandāḥ śaktayo yasya | tā evāha—pradhānaṁ prakṛti-rūpam, puruṣaṁ tad-adhiṣṭhātāram, mahāntaṁ mahat-tattva-svarūpam, kālaṁ teṣāṁ kṣobhakam, trivṛtam ahaṅkāra-bhūtam, lokātmakaṁ tat-pālātmakaṁ ca | tad evaṁ māyayā pradhānādi-rūpatām uktvā cic-chaktyā niṣprapañcatām āha—ātmānubhūtyā cic-chaktyānugataḥ svasmin līnaḥ prapañco yasya tam | kaviṁ sarvajñaṁ pradhānādy-āvirbhāva-sākṣiṇam ity arthaḥ iti[^65] | 

tatra puruṣasyāpi māyāntaḥ-pātitvaṁ tad-adhiṣṭhātṛtayopacaryata eva | vastutas tasya tu tasyāḥ paratvam | tathā śrī-kapila-deva-vākye—


    anādir ātmā puruṣo nirguṇaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ |


    pratyag-dhāmā svayaṁ-jyotir viśvaṁ yena samanvitam || [bhā.pu. 3.26.3] iti |

tri-śakti-nirūpaṇe viśeṣa-jijñāsā cet śrī-bhagavat-sandarbho dṛśyaḥ | 

athavā tvam ādya ity-ādi mūla-padyam evam avatāryam—śrī-vaikuṇṭhe māyaṁ niṣedhann api sākṣāt tām evāha—tvam ādya iti | kaivalye mokṣākhye śrī-vaikuṇṭha-lakṣaṇe ātmani svāṁśa eva sthitaḥ | kiṁ kṛtvā ? tatrāti-virājamānayā cic-chaktyā māyāṁ dūre sthitām api tiraskṛtyaiva | mataṁ caitammāyādikaṁ niṣedhatā śrī-śukadevena |


    pravartate yatra rajas tamas tayoḥ 


    sattvaṁ ca miśraṁ na ca kāla-vikramaḥ |


    na yatra māyā kim utāpare harer 


    anuvratā yatra surāsurārcitāḥ || [bhā.pu. 2.9.10] iti |

moksaṁ paraṁ padaṁ liṅgam amṛtaṁ viṣṇu-mandiram | iti pādmottara-khaṇḍe vaikuṇṭha-paryāya-śabdāḥ ||23|| [bhagavat-sandarbhaḥ 19] 

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu tvan-mātuleyo’haṁ tvat-sama eva maivaṁ vādīr ity āha tvam iti | nanu tvaṁ prakṛteḥ para iti kiṁ prakṛti-śabdenāvidyāṁ māyāṁ vā śrūṣe tatrāha— tvam iti | cic-chaktyā svarūpa-bhūtayā śaktyā subhagayā paṭṭa-mahiṣy eva māyāṁ vidyāvidyeti vṛtti-dvayavatīṁ durbhagām iva sva-śaktitvāt prāptāṁ vyudasya dūrīkṛtya tayā śaktyā sahita eva tvam ātmani sva-cinmaya-svarūpe sthitaḥ | 

nanu cic-chaktyety asyāḥ kāraṇatvena matto bhinnatayā sthitatvaṁ kathaṁ mamātmani sthitatvam ity ata āha—kaivalya iti | kevalasya bhāvaḥ kaivalyam | asmin iti tayā sahitatve’pi tava kaivalyam eva tasyāḥ svarūpa-śaktitvāt tasmiṁś ca sati tvam ātmani sthito vastuta eveti bhāvaḥ | ataḥ svarūpa-bhūtā cic-chaktiḥ sā tvattaḥ sadā abhinnaiva tvad-dehendriya-parikarādi-rūpeṇa tiṣṭhati parāsya śaktir bahudhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñāna-bala-kriyāca [śvet.u. 6.8] iti śruteḥ | māyā chāyaiva tvat-svarūpatvāt jñānājñāna-guṇa-maya-jagad-rūpeṇa vartata iti tvatto bheda eva tasyā māyāyās tvac-chaktitvāt kvacid abhedo’pīti bhinnābhinna-rūpā sā śaktir ity arthaḥ | māyaiva śaktir ekā nānyeti mataṁ parāstam eva ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu katham apavargado'haṁ? tatrāha—tvam iti | ādyo'nādiḥ sākṣād īśvaraḥ svata-ḥsiddha-ṣaḍaiśvaryaḥ svayaṁ bhagavānity arthaḥ | prakṛter māyāyāḥ parastayāspṛṣṭaḥ | nanu kathantasyāḥ paro'haṁ? tatrāha—cicchaktyā parāsya śaktiḥ [śve.u. 6.8] iti śrutayā māyāṁ vyudasya nirasyeti | kaivalye iti svārthe ṣyañ | viśuddhe ātmani svasvarūpe sthita iti tasyāḥ parastvam, ato'pavargada ity arthaḥ ||23||

 **...**

|| 1.7.24 || 

**sa eva jīva-lokasya māyā-mohita-cetasaḥ |**

**vidhatse svena vīryeṇa śreyo dharmādi-lakṣaṇam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tri-varga-dātāpi tvam evety āha—sa iti | yas tvaṁ māyām abhibhūya sthitaḥ sa eva māyām abhibhūtasya janasya dharmādi-phalam upāsitaḥ sanvidhatse | vīryeṇa prabhāveṇa ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **sa eva kaivalye sthita eva ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **trivargado'pi tvam ity āha—sa eva māyāṁ vyudasya viśuddhe svātmani sthita eva māyā-bhibhūtasya jīva-lokasyāśritaḥ san sva-vīryeṇa nija-prabhāvena dharmādi vidhatse ||24||

 **...**

|| 1.7.25 || 

**tathāyaṁ cāvatāras te bhuvo bhāra-jihīrṣayā |**

**svānāṁ cānanya-bhāvānām anudhyānāya cāsakṛt ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tathā cānenāvatāreṇa tava sādhu-pakṣa-pāto lakṣyata ity āha—tatheti | kiṁ bhū-bhara-haraṇaṁ mad-icchā-mātreṇa na bhavati ? tatrāha—svānāṁ jñātīnam anudhyānāya ca | tathānanya-bhāvānām ekānta-bhaktānāṁ ca ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **yathānye puruṣādayo’vatārās tathāyam avatāraḥ sākṣād-bhagavataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇākhyasya tavaiva prākaṭyam, parama-bhaktāyā bhuvo bhāra-jihīrṣayā jāto’py anyeṣāṁ svānāṁ bhaktānām asakṛc ca muhur anudhyānāya nija-bhajana-saukhyāya bhavati ||25|| [bhagavat-sandarbha 49]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tathā tenaiva prakāreṇa tava vyudasta-māyaḥ sva-cin-maya-svarūpeṇa ayam avatāraḥ prāpañcika-loke prākaṭyam ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tathā tenaiva prakāreṇa vyudastamāyena kevalena svarūpeṇa tavāyam avatāraḥ | svānāṁ jñātīnāṁ pārṣadānāmananya-bhāvānaṁ keṣāñcit sādhakānāñ cānudhyānāya, bhū-bhārāpahāras tu saṅkalpenaiva syād iti bhāvaḥ ||25||

 **...**

|| 1.7.26 || 

**kim idaṁ svit kuto veti deva-deva na vedmy aham |**

**sarvato mukham āyāti tejaḥ parama-dāruṇam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **evaṁ stutvā prastutaṁ vijñāpayati—kim iti | kim ātmakam idaṁ kuto vā āyātīti | svid vitarke ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **evaṁ stutvā prastutaṁ vijñāpayati kim idam iti ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **evaṁ stutvā prastutaṁ nivedayati—kim idam iti | svidvitarke, kutovāyāti ||26||

 **...**

**|| 1.7.27 || **

**śrī-bhagavān uvāca—**

**vetthedaṁ droṇa-putrasya brāhmam astraṁ pradarśitam |**

**naivāsau veda saṁhāraṁ prāṇa-bādha upasthite ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : droṇa-putrasya brāhmam astram** | tena ca **prāṇa-bādhe** prāpte **pradarśitaṁ** kevalam, na tat-prayoge kuśala ity arthaḥ, yato’**sāv** upa**saṁhāraṁ na veda** | etac ca tvaṁ tu **vettha** jānāsi ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : pradarśitam** iti | dṛṣṭvaiva kiṁ na paricinoṣi ? kiṁ māṁ pṛcchasi ? iti bhāvaḥ | **saṁhāram** asyopasaṁhāraṁ **na veda** | tarhi katham etat prayuktavān ? ity ata āha—**prāṇa-bādha** iti ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) **: **upasaṁhāraṁ** cen **na veda**, tat kathaṁ prayuktavān? tatrāha—**prāṇa-** iti ||27||

 **...**

|| 1.7.28 || 

**na hy asyānyatamaṁ kiñcid astraṁ pratyavakarśanam |**

**jahy astra-teja unnaddham astra-jño hy astra-tejasā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **pratyavakarśanaṁ kṛśatva-karam, nivartakam ity arthaḥ | atas tad astra-teja unnaddham utkaṭaṁ brahmāstra-tejasaiva jahi ghātaya | tvat-prayuktaṁ cāstraṁ tad upasaṁhṛtya svayam upaśāmyet | yatas tvam astra-jño’si ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tarhi vāruṇāstrādinā vahnim upaśamānīti cet tatrāha—na hy asyeti | pratyavakarśanaṁ nivartakam | tasmāt tvam astra-tejasā sva-prayukta-brahmāstra-tejasaiva brahmāstra-tejo jahi yato astrajño’si ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tarhi vāruṇāstreṇa vahnim etam upaśamayeyaṁ? tatrāha—na hīti | anyatamam āgneyādi, praty avakaryaṇaṁ nivartakaṁ, tasmād astra-tejasā brahmāstreṇaivennaddhaṁ vṛddhaṁ brahmāstratejo jahi nāśaya | tvad astraṁ tad upasaṁhṛtya svayaṁ śāmyet, hi yatas tvam astrajño'si ||28||

 **...**

|| 1.7.29 || 

**sūta uvāca—**

**śrutvā bhagavatā proktaṁ phālgunaḥ para-vīra-hā |**

**spṛṣṭvāpas taṁ parikramya brāhmaṁ brāhmāstraṁ sandadhe ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **pare śatravas ta eva vīrās tān hantīti tathā-vidhaḥ phālguno’rjuno’paḥ spṛṣṭvācamya taṁ śrī-kṛṣṇaṁ parikramya pradakṣiṇī-kṛtya | brāmāya brahmāstraṁ nivartayitum ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **taṁ śrī-kṛṣṇaṁ brāhmāya brahmāstraṁ nivartayitum ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **apaḥ spṛṣṭvācamya, taṁ kṛṣṇam ||29||

 **...**

|| 1.7.30 || 

**saṁhatyānyonyam ubhayos tejasī śara-saṁvṛte |**

**āvṛtya rodasī khaṁ ca vavṛdhāte’rka-vahnivat ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tataś cobhayor brahmāstrayor tejasī śaraiḥ saṁveṣite parasparaṁ militvā vavṛdhāte avardhetām | kiṁ kṛtvā | rodasī dyāvāpṛthivyau kham antarīkṣaṁ cāvṛtya | yathā pralaye saṅkarṣaṇa-mukhāgnir uparisthito’rkaś ca saṁhatya vardhete tadvat ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **ubhayor brahmāstrayor tejasī śaraiḥ saṁvṛte saṁveṣite parasparaṁ militvā vavṛdhāte rodasī dyāvāpṛthivyau yathā pralaye saṅkarṣaṇa-mukhāgnir uparisthito’rkaś ca tāv iva ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **ubhayor brahmāstrayos tejasī anyonyaṁ saṁhatya militvā vavṛdhāte kīdṛśe? śaraiḥ saṁvṛte veṣṭite | kiṁ kṛtvety āha—rodasī dyāvābhūmī khañ cākāśam āvṛtya pūrayitvā, yathā pralaye pātālād utthitaḥ saṅkarṣaṇa-mukhāgni-rupari sthito'rkaś ca mithaḥ saṁhatya vardhate tadvat ||30||

 **...**

|| 1.7.31 || 

**dṛṣṭvāstra-tejas tu tayos trīl lokān pradahan mahat |**

**dahyamānāḥ prajāḥ sarvāḥ sāṁvartakam amaṁsata ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tayor drauṇi-phālgunayoḥ | tena dahyamānāḥ sāṁvartakaṁ pralayāgnim amaṇsata menire ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **dṛṣṭveti | pradahad-dagdhum ārabhamāṇam | dahyamānā dagdhum ārabhyamāṇāḥ | vartamāna-sāmīpye vartamānavad vā [pā. 3.3.131] iti pāṇini-smṛteḥ ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tayor drauṇy-arjunayoḥ | sāṁvartakaṁ pralayāgnim ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **ubhayor drauṇi-phālgunayoḥ sāṁvartakaṁ pralayāgniṁ saṁvartaḥ pralayaḥ kalpaḥ ity amaraḥ ||31||

 **...**

|| 1.7.32 || 

**prajopadravam ālakṣya loka-vyatikaraṁ ca tam |**

**mataṁ ca vāsudevasya sañjahārārjuno dvayam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **lokānāṁ vyatikaraṁ vyatyayaṁ nāśam ity arthaḥ | vāsudevasya mataṁ cālakṣya brahmāstra-dvayam upasaṁhṛtavān ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **mataṁ ceti | prathamaṁ śrī-bhagavatāstra-pratighātana-mātraṁ samādiṣṭam, na tu saṁharaṇam | tac ca nūnaṁ parāstraṁ na saṁhartuṁ śakyam iti sva-śastreṇaikyaṁ vidhāya saṁharaṇābhiprāyeṇa | tat tu tad-ājñā-mātreṇa kṛtvāpi paścāt pratyuta tābhyāṁ vṛddhābhyām upadrave sati sthagitāyamānam arjunaṁ prati saṁhāro’numata iti bhāvaḥ ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **lokānāṁ bhūr ādīnāṁ vyatikaraṁ nāśam ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **lokānāṁ vyatikaraṁ nāśam ||32||

 **...**

|| 1.7.33 || 

**tata āsādya tarasā dāruṇaṁ gautamī-sutam |**

**babandhāmarṣa-tāmrākṣaḥ paśuṁ raśanayā yathā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **gautama-vamśa-jā gautamī kṛpī tasyāḥ sutam | amarṣeṇa kopena tāmre akṣiṇī yasya saḥ | niṣkṛpatve dṛṣṭāntaḥ—paśuṁ yatheti | tasya bandhanaṁ dharma ity atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ—yathā yājñikaḥ paśum iti | raśanayā rajjvā ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **gautama-vamśa-jā gautamī kṛpī tasyāḥ sutam ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **gotama-vaṁśodbhavā gautamī kṛpī tasyāḥ sutam aśvatthāmānaṁ, tad-bandhanasya dharmatve dṛṣṭāntaḥ—yājñiko yathā yajñiyaṁ paśuṁ rasanayā vadhnāti tadvat ||33||

 **...**

|| 1.7.34 || 

**śibirāya ninīṣantaṁ rajjvā baddhvā ripuṁ balāt |**

**prāhārjunaṁ prakupito bhagavān ambujekṣaṇaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **śoka-roṣādi-yuktasyāpy arjunasya dharma-niṣṭhākhyāpanāya śrī-kṛṣṇa-vākyam | tad āha ṣaḍbhiḥ | śibirāya rāja-niveśāya netum icchantam | prakupita iveti ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **śoka-roṣādi-yuktasyāpy arjunasya loke dharma-niṣṭhā-khyāpanāya prakarṣeṇāha pañca-ślokīm aruṇekṣaṇa ity anuktvā ambujekṣaṇa ity ukte bahir eva prakupita iti gamyate ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **śoka-roṣādi-yuktasyāpy arjunasya dharmiṣṭhatā-khyātaye bhagavad-vacanaṁ tad āha—śivirāyety ādibhiḥ | śivirāya rājaniveśāya prakupitaḥ prakāśita-kopa-mudraḥ | aroṣaṇo hy asau devaḥ iti nārāyaṇīyāt [śānti.parva. 336.19] etad-vyañjayanti—ambujekṣaṇa iti ||34||

 **...**

|| 1.7.35 || 

**mainaṁ pārthārhasi trātuṁ brahma-bandhum imaṁ jahi |**

**yo’sāv anāgasaḥ suptān avadhīn niśi bālakān ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **yathā jīvasya janmādi māyā evam īśvarasyāpi janmādi māyety āha—evam iti | akartuḥ karmāṇi | ajanasya janmāni | hṛt-pater antaryāmiṇaḥ ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **brahma-bandhuṁ viprādhamam | anāgaso'naparādhāt ||35||

 **...**

|| 1.7.36 || 

**mattaṁ pramattam unmattaṁ suptaṁ bālaṁ striyaṁ jaḍam |**

**prapannaṁ virathaṁ bhītaṁ na ripuṁ hanti dharma-vit ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **ripor api suptasya bālasya ca vadho na dharma ity anyārthair darśayati—mattam iti | mattaṁ madyādinā | pramattam anavahitam | unmattaṁ graha-vātādinā | jaḍam anudyamam | prapannaṁ śaraṇāgatam | virathaṁ bhagna-ratham ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **mattaṁ madyādinā | pramattam anavahitam | unmattaṁ graha-vātādinā ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **matta-māsavena, pramattam anavadhānam, unmattaṁ graha-vātādinā vikṣiptaṁ, jaḍam udyama-śūnyaṁ, prapannaṁ śaraṇāgataṁ, virathaṁ bhagnaratham ||36||

 **...**

|| 1.7.37 || 

**sva-prāṇān yaḥ para-prāṇaiḥ prapuṣṇāty aghṛṇaḥ khalaḥ |**

**tad-vadhas tasya hi śreyo yad-doṣād yāty adhaḥ pumān ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tad-vadho daṇḍa-rūpas tasyaiva śreyaḥ puruṣārthaḥ | yad yato daṇḍa-prāyaścitta-rahitād doṣāt sa pumān adho yātīti | tathā ca smaranti—


    rājabhir dhṛta-daṇḍas tu kṛtvā pāpāni mānavāḥ | 


    vidhūta-kalmaṣā yānti svargaṁ sukṛtino yathā || iti ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : tad**-vadho daṇḍa-rūpas tasyaiva śreyaḥ | tathā ca smaranti—


    rājabhir dhṛta-daṇḍas tu kṛtvā pāpāni mānavāḥ | 


    vidhūta-kalmaṣā yānti svargaṁ sukṛtino yathā || iti |

anyathā yad yato doṣāt ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **aghṛṇo nirdayaḥ tasya vadhastasya śreyaḥ prāyaś citta-rūpatvāt | rājabhir dhṛta daṇḍās tu kṛtvā pāpāni mānavāḥ! vidhūta-kalmaṣā yānti svargaṁ sukṛtino yathā iti smaraṇāt | yato'kṛta-prāyaścitāndoṣāt pumānadho yāti ||37||

 **...**

|| 1.7.38 || 

**pratiśrutaṁ ca bhavatā pāñcālyai śṛṇvato mama |**

**āhariṣye śiras tasya yas te mānini putra-hā ||**

**tad asau vadhyatāṁ pāpa ātatāyy ātma-bandhu-hā |**

**bhartuś ca vipriyaṁ vīra kṛtavān kula-pāṁsanaḥ ||**

na katame_na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **pratiśrutaṁ pratijñātam ||38||

bhartur duryodhanasya ||39||

 **...**

|| 1.7.40 || 

**sūta uvāca—**

**evaṁ parīkṣatā dharmaṁ pārthaḥ kṛṣṇena coditaḥ |**

**naicchad dhantuṁ guru-sutaṁ yadyapy ātma-hanaṁ mahān ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **yady api coditas tathāpi hantuṁ naicchat | ātma-hanaṁ putra-hantāram api | yato mahān ||40 ||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **dharmaṁ parīkṣamāṇena yadyapi coditaḥ tathāpi hantuṁ naicchat | ātma-hanaṁ putra-hantāram api | yato mahān kṛṣṇasya svabhāvābhijñaḥ | tasya cāyaṁ svabhāvaḥ svayaṁ sarvajño’pi dharmādi-niṣṭhā-khyāpanāya tadvato bhaktān parīkṣata iti tatra mainaṁ pārthārhasi trātuṁ [bhā.pu. 1.7.35] ity-ādinā vīra-raudra-rasaṁ pradarśya dharmavantam arjunaṁ yathā parīkṣate sma tathā bhartuḥ śuśrūṣaṇaṁ strīṇāṁ paro dharma [bhā.pu. 10.29.24] ity-ādinā bhavatīnāṁ viyogo me nahi sarvātmanā kvacit [bhā.pu. 10.47.29] ity-ādinā, ahaṁ hi sarva-bhūtānām ādir anto’ntaraṁ bahir [bhā.pu. 10.82.45] ity-ādinā ca karma-jñāna-yogau pradarśya premavatīr gopīḥ | 

varaṁ ca yat kañcana mānavendra vṛṇīṣva [bhā.pu. 4.20.16] ity-ādinā varaṁ vṛṇīṣva bhadraṁ te kāma-puro’smy aham ity-ādinā ca bhaugeśvarādīn pradarśya bhaktimataḥ pṛthu-grahalādādīn dīyamānaṁ na gṛhṇantīty ādinā anyān api bhaktān poarikṣāṁ cakāraiveti tadīya-siddha-bhaktā api tathā parīkṣante | tathā hi śuka evaṁ ṣaṣṭha-skandhe pāpa-nistārārthaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ prāyaścitta-mātram uktvā parīkṣitaḥ siddhāntābhijñatāṁ navame śrī-kṛṣṇa-līlāṁ saṅkṣepeṇoktvā līlautsukyaṁ dvādaśe brahma-jñānam upakṣipya bhakti-niṣṭhāṁ parīkṣāṁ cakre iti | na tatra tatra spaṣṭe’rthe tātparyam ||40||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **ātmahanaṁ putra-hastāram api, yato mahān viprasya deha-daṇḍa-niṣedhādayaṁ māṁ parīkṣata eveti bhagavan-matābhijña ity arthaḥ ||40||

 **...**

|| 1.7.41 || 

**athopetya sva-śibiraṁ govinda-priya-sārathiḥ |**

**nyavedayat taṁ priyāyai śocantyā ātma-jān hatān ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **govindaḥ priyaḥ sārathir yasya saḥ | ātmajān śocantyai ||41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nyavedayat ayaṁ te putra-hantā ānīta ity uktavān ||41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nyavedayadānīto 'yaṁ tvat-putra-hantety uktavān ||41||

 **...**

|| 1.7.42 || 

**tathāhṛtaṁ paśuvat pāśa-baddham**

**avāṅ-mukhaṁ karma-jugupsitena |**

**nirīkṣya kṛṣṇāpakṛtaṁ guroḥ sutaṁ**

**vāma-svabhāvā kṛpayā nanāma ca ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tathā paribhāvenāhṛtam ānītam | karmaṇo jugupsitena doṣeṇāvāṅ-mukham adho-vadanam | apakṛtam apakāriṇam | kṛpayā nirīkṣya | vāmaḥ śobhanaḥ svabhāvo yasyaḥ sā ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tathāhṛtam iti yugmakam | apakṛtam iti kvib-antam ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tathā tena prakāreṇa āhṛtam ānītam | karma-jugupsitena karmaṇo jugupsayā apakṛtam iti kvib-antam apakāriṇam | kṛpayā nirīkṣya | vāmaḥ śobhanaḥ | nanāma ca ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **apakṛtam apakāriṇam api kṛpayā nirīkṣya vāma-svabhāvā manojña-līlā kṛṣṇā draupadī nanāma ca ||42||

 **...**

|| 1.7.43 || 

**uvāca cāsahanty asya bandhanānayanaṁ satī |**

**mucyatāṁ mucyatām eṣa brāhmaṇo nitarāṁ guruḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nanāma covāca ceti ca-kārābhyāṁ sambhramaḥ sūcitaḥ | bandhanenānayanam asahamānā ||43||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **uvāca ceti ca-kārābhyāṁ sambhramaḥ sūcitaḥ | satī tad-bandhanāsahatvād iyaṁ bhagavatā dhārmikatve parikṣitād arjunād api sādhutvavatīty arthaḥ ||43||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanāma covāca ceti cābhyāṁ sambhramaḥ sūcyate | satī tad-bandhanāsahanād arjunād api śobhanety arthaḥ ||43||

 **...**

|| 1.7.44-45 || 

**sa-rahasyo dhanur vedaḥ sa-visargopasaṁyamaḥ |**

**astra-grāmaś ca bhavatā śikṣito yad-anugrahāt ||**

**sa eṣa bhagavān droṇaḥ prajā-rūpeṇa vartate |**

**tasyātmano’rdhaṁ patny āste nānvagād vīrasūḥ kṛpī ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **sa-rahasyo gopya-mantra-sahitaḥ | visargo’stra-prayogaḥ upasaṁyama upasaṁhāraḥ tābhyāṁ sahito’stra-samūhaś ca ||44||

kīṁ ca tasya droṇasyātmā dehas tasyārdhaṁ kṛpy āste | arhadtve hetuḥ—patnī | ardho vā eṣa ātmano yat-patnī iti śruteḥ | jāyāpaty agnim ādadhīyatā iti śruter ubhayor ekākāratvāvagamāc ca | nanu bhartari mṛte sā kathaṁ jīvati tatrāḥa—nānvagād bhartāram | yato vīra-sūḥ putravatī ||45||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **sa-rahasyam iti yugmakam ||44-45||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **sa-rahasyo gopya-mantra-sahitaḥ | visargopasaṁhārābhyāṁ sahita iti yadi brahmāstrasya visargopasamñamāv etat pituḥ sakāśān nājñāsyas tadā katham imaṁ vadhvā tvam āneṣyaity akṛtajñatā dhvanitā ||44||

prajā-rūpeṇa ātmā vai jāyate putraḥ iti nyāyena ātmano dehasyārdhaṁ kṛpī patnī ardho vā eṣa ātmano yat-patnī iti śruteḥ | ata eva bhartāraṁ nānvagāt yato vīra-sūḥ ||45||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **sarahasyo gopya-mantra-sahitaḥ | visargeṇopasaṁyamenopasaṁhāreṇa ca sahitaḥ ||44|| \
 \
prajā-rūpeṇeti—ātmā vai jāyate putraḥ ity ukteḥ | ātmanano dehasyārddhaṁ patnī kṛpī āste vartate | arddho vā eṣa ātmano yat-patnī iti śruteḥ | bhartāraṁ nānvagāt, yato vīrasūḥ ||45||

 **...**

|| 1.7.46 || 

**tad dharmajña mahā-bhāga bhavadbhir gauravaṁ kulam |**

**vṛjinaṁ nārhati prāptuṁ pūjyaṁ vandyam abhīkṣṇaśaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tat tasmāt gauravaṁ guroḥ kulaṁ bhavadbhiḥ kartṛbhir vṛjinaṁ duḥkhaṁ prāptuṁ nārhati | kiṁ tu pūjyaṁ vandyaṁ ca ||46||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **gauravaṁ guroḥ sambandhi kulaṁ kartṛ | bhavadbhiḥ karaṇair vṛjinaṁ duḥkhaṁ prāptuṁ nārhati | yataḥ pūjyam iti ||46||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **gauravaṁ guroḥ sambandhi kulaṁ kartṛ, bhavadbhir hetubhiḥ vṛjinaṁ duḥkhaṁ prāptuṁ nārhati, yataḥ pūjyam iti | yasmāt kṛtsno dhanur vedaḥ prāptas tūdbhatasya tat-putrasya paribhavāttarākṛtajñatā bhāvinīti bhāvaḥ ||46||

 **...**

|| 1.7.47 || 

**mā rodīd asya jananī gautamī pati-devatā |**

**yathāhaṁ mṛta-vatsārtā rodimy aśru-mukhī muhuḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **mṛtavatsā mṛta-putrā ||47||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **mā rodīd mā roditu ||47||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **mārodīnn aroditu ||47||

 **...**

|| 1.7.48 || 

**yaiḥ kopitaṁ brahma-kulaṁ rājanyair ajitātmabhiḥ |**

**tat kulaṁ pradahaty āśu sānubandhaṁ śucārpitam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **vipakṣe doṣam āha—yair iti | teṣāṁ rājanyānāṁ kulaṁ karma | kathaṁ-bhūtam ? sānubandhaṁ sa-parivāram | śucā śokenārpitaṁ vyāptaṁ ca | brahma-kulaṁ kartṛ | pradahati ||48||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **yair iti | śucā śokenārpitaṁ ḥ svasmin prāpitaṁ vyāptam ity arthaḥ | yad vā, śucā śuk tasyām arpitaṁ nimajjitam | tayā vyāptam ity arthaḥ ||48||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **sānubandhaṁ sa-parivāraṁ śucārpitaṁ śucety asya ṭāb-antatvāt śucāyām arpitaṁ śoka-vyāptaṁ tat-kulaṁ karma pradahati | brahma-kulam eva kartṛ ||48||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **brahhma-kulaṁ kartṛ, tat-kulaṁ kopayaitṛ rājanya-kulaṁ karmabhūtaṁ pradahati nāśayati | śucāyāṁ śoke'rpitaṁ śoka-vyāptaṁ sānubandhaṁ sa-parivāram ||48||

 **...**

|| 1.7.49 || 

**sūta uvāca—**

**dharmyaṁ nyāyyaṁ sa-karuṇaṁ nirvyalīkaṁ samaṁ mahat |**

**rājā dharma-suto rājñyāḥ pratyanandad vaco dvijāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **dharmyam ity-ādayo vacasaḥ ṣaḍ-guṇāḥ pūrva-śloka-ṣaṭke draṣṭavyāḥ | tatra dharmyaṁ dharmād anapetaṁ mucyatāṁ mucyatām iti | nyāyyaṁ nyāyād anapetaṁ sa-rahasya ity-ādi | sa-karuṇaṁ tasyātmamo’rdham iti | nirvyalīkaṁ tat dharmajñeti | samaṁ mā rodasīti | duḥkha-sāmyokteḥ | mahat yaiḥ kopitam iti niṣṭuroktyā hitopadeśāt | evaṁ-bhūtaṁ rājñyā vaco he dvijāḥ, rājā pratyanandad anumoditavān ||49||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **dharmyam ity-ādi-vacasaḥ ṣaḍ-guṇāḥ pūrva-śloka-ṣaṭkair draṣṭavyāḥ | tatra dharmyaṁ dharmād anapetaṁ mucyatāṁ mucyatām iti | nyāyyaṁ nyāyād anapetaṁ sa-rahasya ity-ādi | sa-karuṇaṁ tasyātmano’rdham iti | nirvyalīkaṁ tad-dharmajñeti | samaṁ mā rodīd iti duḥkha-sāmyokteḥ | mahat yaiḥ kopitam iti niṣṭhuroktyā hitopadeśāt ||49||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **dharmyam ity ādayo vacasaḥ ṣaḍ-guṇāḥ pūrvokteṣu ṣaṭsu padyeṣu bodhyāḥ | dharmyaṁ mucyatām ity ādau, nyāyaṁ sarahasyam ity ādau, sakaruṇaṁ tasyātmano'rdham ity ādau, nirvyalīkaṁ tad-dharmajñety-ādau, samaṁ mārodīdity-ādau duḥkha-taulya-vacanāt, mahat yair ity-ādau niṣṭhuroktyā hita-śaṁsanāt ||49||

 **...**

|| 1.7.50 || 

**nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca yuyudhāno dhanañjayaḥ |**

**bhagavān devakī-putro ye cānye yāś ca yoṣitaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nakulādayaś ca pratyanandan | yuyudhānaḥ sātyakiḥ ||50||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nakulādayo'pi tad-vacaḥ pratyanandan, yuyudhānaḥ sātyakiḥ ||50||

 **...**

|| 1.7.51 || 

**tatrāhāmarṣito bhīmas tasya śreyān vadhaḥ smṛtaḥ |**

**na bhartur nātmanaś cārthe yo’han suptān śiśūn vṛthā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tasya tathā-vidhasya drauṇer vadha eva śreṣṭhaḥ | anyathāsya naraka-pāta-prasaṅgāt | tad āha—na bhartur | ahan jaghāna ||51||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tasya drauṇeḥ ||51||

 **...**

|| 1.7.52 || 

**niśamya bhīma-gaditaṁ draupadyāś ca catur bhujaḥ |**

**ālokya vadanaṁ sakhyur idam āha hasann iva ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **caturbhujokter ayaṁ bhāvaḥ—bhīmo taṁ hantuṁ pravṛtte draupadyāṁ ca sahasā tan-nivāraṇe pravṛttāyām ubhayoḥ saṁvaraṇāyāviṣkṛta-caturbhuja iti | sandihānasya sakhyur arjunasya ||52||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **caturbhuja iti taiḥ | yad vā, mayaivobhayam āmnātam iti svādeśa-mānanāya darśitaiśvaryam iti bhāvaḥ | ṭīkāyāṁ tava ca pratijñāyām ity atra ca-śabdād bhīmādīnām icchā ceti jñeyam ||52||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **caturbhuja iti bhīme taṁ hantuṁ pravṛtte draupadyāṁ ca tan-nivāraṇe pravṛttāyām ubhayor vāraṇārthaṁ bhuja-catuṣṭayaṁ prakaṭayāmāseti bhāvaḥ | hasann iveti sakhe tvad-buddher adya sūkṣmatvaṁ parīkṣiṣye ity etad vyañjakaṁ smita-mātram āviṣkurvan na tu hāsyam ity arthaḥ ||52||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **caturbhuja iti hantuṁ pravṛttaṁ bhīmaṁ tan-nivāraṇa-pravṛttāṁ kṛṣṇāṁ ca nivartamituṁ tadā caturo bhujān dadhāv iti bhāvaḥ | hasann iveti he sakhe! tvad-buddher asya saukṣmyat parīkṣyaṁ mayeti smitaṁ prakaṭayann ity arthaḥ ||52||

 **...**

|| 1.7.53 || 

**śrī-bhagavān uvāca—**

**brahma-bandhur na hantavya ātatāyī vadhārhaṇaḥ |**

**mayaivobhayam āmnātaṁ paripāhy anuśāsanam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **vadhārhaṇo vadhārhaḥ | mayaiva śāstra-kṛtā brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ | tathā —


    ātatāyinam āyāntam api vedānta-pāragam | 


    jighāṁsīyān na tena brahma-hā bhavet || iti ca vadatā | 

tad ubhayam apy anuśāsanaṁ paripālaya ||53||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **brāhmaṇo na hantavya iti | ātatāyinam āyāntam api vedānta-pāragaḥ jighāṁsantaṁ jighāṁsīyān na doṣo manur[^66] abravīd iti ubhayam evāmnātam āmnāya-kṛtā mayaivānujñātaṁ śāsanaṁ paripālaya | tena brāhmaṇatvaṁ vartata eva ity aśvatthāmā na hantavya iti mama matam, yat tu brahma-bandhum imaṁ jahīti pūrvam uktaṁ tat tava dharma-parīkṣārtham eva tatrāpi brahma-bandhum imaṁ mā jahi trātum arhasi | tathā virathaṁ bhītaṁ ripuṁ dharma-vin na hantīti tathā tad-vadhas tasya hi śreya iti na tu vadha-kartur iti tathā tad asau vadhyatāṁ bandhana-viṣayībhūtaḥ kriyatām iti tatra vāstavo’rtho’pi mayārpita iti ||53||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ, ātatāyinamāyāntam api vedānta-pāragam | jighāṁ santaṁ jighāṁsīyān na doṣo manur abravīt iti śruti-smṛti-vapuṣā mayaivobhayamāmnātam uktaṁ, tad anuśāsanam ajñāṁ pāhi pālaya ||53||

 **...**

|| 1.7.54 || 

**kuru pratiśrutaṁ satyaṁ yat tat sāntvayatā priyām |**

**priyaṁ ca bhīmasenasya pāñcālyā mahyam eva ca ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tava ca pratijñāṁ pūrayety āha—kurv iti | priyāṁ sāntvayatā tvayā yat pratiśrutaṁ hananaṁ tac ca satyaṁ kuru priyaṁ ca kuru | mahyaṁ mama | tatra vadhe bhīmasya priyaṁ bhavati | avadhe draupadyāḥ | dvaye śrī-kṛṣṇasya ||54||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tvayā yat pratiśrutaṁ pratijñātam āhariṣye śiras tasyeti tad asya śiraś-chedaṁ vadhaṁ kuru | tam eva bhīmasenasya priyaṁ kuru | pāñcālyāḥ priyam avadhaṁ ca mahyaṁ mama ca tadādīnāṁ mat-priyatvād ubhayam api priyaṁ kuru ||54||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **āhariṣye śirastasyeti tava pratiśrutaṁ, bhīmasya priyaṁ tad-vadhaṁ pāñcālyāḥ priyaṁ tad avadhaṁ, mama bhīmādi-priyatvādubhayaṁ tat sarvaṁ kuru ||54||

 **...**

|| 1.7.55 || 

**sūta uvāca—**

**arjunaḥ sahasājñāya harer hārdam athāsinā |**

**maṇiṁ jahāra mūrdhanyaṁ dvijasya saha-mūrdhajam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **hārdam abhiprāyam ājñāya jñātvā | na hy aśakyam ubhayaṁ vidadhyād ato’syāyam abhiprāya iti jñātvety arthaḥ | asinā khaḍgena | mūrdhamyaṁ mūrdhani jātam | saha mūrdha-jaṁ sa-keśam ||55||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **arjunaḥ sahasājñāyety asyāyaṁ bhāvaḥ—śrī-kṛṣṇena brahma-bandhum imaṁ jahi [bhā.pu. 1.7.35] ity eṣā śrutiḥ, brahma-bandhur na hantavyaḥ [bhā.pu. 1.7.53] ity anena spaṣṭīkṛtā | brahma-bandhur apīti hi tasyās tātparyam | brahma-bandhutvaṁ cāsyātatāyitvenaiva vivakṣitam | vadhārhaṇatvaṁ tv ātatāyi-mātreṇa vihitam | tatrāyāntaṁ jighāṁsantam iti viśeṣaṇaṁ tat-parīkṣaṇārthaṁ gopitam | tatra hi tatra tarodyatasyaiva hananam āyāti, viśeṣaṇ-vaiyarthyāt | ata eva pratijñātatvena tulyatve’pi drauṇer udyatasya vadhi’numato baddhasya tu nāsya | ātatāyitvaṁ nyāye yuddhe’pi matam—ātatāyino me [bhā.pu. 1.9.38] iti śrī-bhīṣma-vacanāt | yat tu paripāhy anuśāsanam ity uktam | tac ca brahma-bandhum imaṁ jahīti pūrvoktānusāreṇaiva | tad evam asyānuśāsana-trayasya draupadī-bhīmayor mitho viruddha-vākya-dvayasya sva-pratijñāyāś ca yugapat samādhāyakaṁ maṇi-haraṇādikam eva kariṣyāmīti ||55||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **hārdam abhiprāyam ājñāya jñātveti āhariṣye śiras tasyeti mayā pratijñāto’sya śiraś-cheda eva | kuru pratiśrutaṁ satyam iti vadatā bhagavatāpy abhipretaṁ punaś ca pāñcālyāḥ priyaṁ kurv iti vadatā śiraso na chedaś ca vihitaḥ | na hy aśakyam ubhayaṁ vidadhyāt | ata eva mayā kartavyam iti niścityety arthaḥ | mūrdhanyaṁ mūrdhiṇa-bhavaṁ mūrdhajāḥ keśās taiḥ sahitaṁ ciccheda | tena śiraḥ-stham api vastu-lakṣaṇayā śiraḥ-śabdenocyate iti śiraś-cheda eva | abhidhayā tu na śiraś-cheda ity aśvatthāmno vadho’vadhaś ca kṛta ity arthaḥ ||56||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **sahasājñāyeti—drauṇer brāhmaṇatvād idānīm aśastrapāṇitvenātatāyitva-virahāc ca tad-vadho na harer abhimataḥ | nainaṁ pārthety ādau brahma-bandhuṁ na jahi kintu trātum arhasīti tad-vadhas tasya hi śreyo na tu vadha-kartur iti tad asau vadhyatāṁ vandhana-viṣayaḥ kriyatām iti śliṣṭam ukteś ca mayāpi śira āharaṇaṁ, na tu tac-chedanaṁ pratiśrutam | etat sarvam evaṁ kṛte sidhyed iti vicāryety artha | mūrdhajaiḥ keśaiḥ sahitaṁ mūrdhanyaṁ mūrdhni bhavaṁ maṇiṁ jahāra, tena śirasa ekadeśo'pi śira eveti vadhāvadhau jātāvity arthaḥ ||55||

 **...**

|| 1.7.56 || 

**vimucya raśanā-baddhaṁ bāla-hatyā-hata-prabham |**

**tejasā maṇinā hīnaṁ śibirān nirayāpayat ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : maṇinā** ca **hīnam** | **nirayāpayan** niḥsāritavān ||56||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : nirayāpayan** nirgamayāñcakāra ||56||

 **...**

|| 1.7.57 || 

**vapanaṁ draviṇādānaṁ sthānān niryāpaṇaṁ tathā |**

**eṣa hi brahma-bandhūnāṁ vadho nānyo’sti daihikaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **anena śrī-kṛṣṇoktaṁ sarvaṁ saṁpāditam ity āha—**vapanam** iti ||57||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tena śāstroktaṁ dharmam eva kṛtavān ity āha—**vapanaṁ** śiro-maṇḍanam ||57||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : vapanaṁ** muṇḍanaṁ, **draviṇa-dānaṁ** vitta-luṇṭhanaṁ, **sthānān** grāmān **niryāpaṇaṁ** niḥsāraṇaṁ cety eṣa brāhmaṇādhamānāṁ vadho, na tu daihikaḥ ||57||

 **...**

|| 1.7.58 || 

**putra-śokāturāḥ sarve pāṇḍavāḥ saha kṛṣṇayā |**

**svānāṁ mṛtānāṁ yat kṛtyaṁ cakrur nirharaṇādikam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : nirharaṇaṁ** dāhārthaṁ nayanam ||58||

iti śrīmad-bhāgavate mahā-purāṇe prathama-skandhe

bhāvārthākhya-dīpikāyāṁ ṭīkāyāṁ saptamo’dhyāyaḥ ||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : nirharaṇaṁ** dāhārthaṁ nayanam ||58||

iti sārārtha-darśinyāṁ harṣiṇyāṁ bhakta-cetasām |

prathame saptamo’dhyāyaḥ saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām ||*||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : svānāṁ** jñātīnāṁ **nirharaṇaṁ** dāhārthaṁ nayanaṁ tad[ādikaṁ yat kṛtyaṁ tac cakruḥ ||58||

iti śrī-vaiṣṇavānandinyāṁ  prathama-skandha-ṭippanyāṁ saptamo'dhyāyaḥ ||7||

 **...**

iti śrīmad-bhāgavate mahā-purāṇe brahma-sūtra-bhāṣye pāramahaṁsyaṁ saṁhitāyāṁ vaiyāsikyāṁ prathama-skandhe drauṇi-daṇḍo nāma

saptamo’dhyāyaḥ |

||7||



**...**

(1.8)


## aṣṭamo’dhyāyaḥ


### uttarā-garbhe drauṇy-astrataḥ parīkṣito rakṣaṇam, kuntī-kṛtā śrī-kṛṣṇa-stutiḥ, yudhiṣṭhirānutāpaś ca |

|| 1.8.1 ||

**sūta uvāca—**

**atha te samparetānāṁ svānām udakam icchatām |**

**dātuṁ sakṛṣṇā gaṅgāyāṁ puraskṛtya yayuḥ striyaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :**


    aṣṭame kupita-drauṇer astrād rakṣā parīkṣitaḥ |


    śrī-kṛṣṇena stutiḥ kuntyā rājñaḥ śokaś ca kīrtyate ||

te pāṇḍavāḥ saṁparetānāṁ mṛtānāṁ gaṅgāyām udakaṁ dātuṁ sa-kṛṣṇā śrī-kṛṣṇena sahitāḥ | striyaḥ strīḥ puras-kṛtyāgrataḥ kṛtvā | tasmin kārye strī-puraḥsaratva-vidhānāt ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :**


    punar brahmāstrato’rakṣat tān garbhe ca parīkṣitam |


    kṛṣṇas tataś ca pṛthayā rājñaḥ śokas tathāṣṭame ||

striyaḥ puraskṛtyeti | tasmin kārye strī-puraḥsaratva-vidhānāt ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :**


    arakṣat pāṇḍavān drauṇer astrād-garbhe parīkṣitam | \
kuntyā stutaś ca govindo rājñaḥ śokas tathāṣṭame || \


athety anantaraṁ te yudhiṣṭhirādayaḥ sarve sakṛṣṇāḥ kṛṣṇa-sahitāḥ | udakaṁ dātuṁ striyaḥ puraskṛteti tasmin karmaṇi strī-puraḥsaratva-vidhānāt ||1||

 **...**

|| 1.8.2 ||

**ninīyodakaṁ sarve vilapya ca bhṛśaṁ punaḥ |**

**āplutā hari-pādābja-rajaḥ-pūta-sarij-jale ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **ninīya dattvā | hari-pādābja-rajobhiḥ pūtā yā sarid gaṅgā tasyā jale | punar grahaṇād ādāv api snātā iti gamyate ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **ninīya dattvā ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **ninīya dattvā, punar grahaṇādādau snātveti gamyam ||2||

 **...**

|| 1.8.3-4 ||

**tatrāsīnaṁ kuru-patiṁ dhṛtarāṣṭraṁ sahānujam |**

**gāndhārīṁ putra-śokārtāṁ pṛthāṁ kṛṣṇāṁ ca mādhavaḥ ||**

**sāntvayām āsa munibhir hata-bandhū‘ śucārpitān |**

**bhūteṣu kālasya gatiṁ darśayan na pratikriyām ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kuru-patiṁ yuddhiṣṭhiram | sahānujaṁ bhīmādibhiḥ sahitaṁ (putra-śokārtam iti tisṛṇāṁ viśeṣaṇam)[^67] ||3|| munibhiḥ sahitaḥ ||4||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **munibhir dvāra-bhūtaiḥ ||4||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kurupatiṁ yudhiṣṭhiraṁ sahānujaṁ bhīmādi-sahitaṁ munibhiḥ sahitaḥ ||3-4||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kurupatiṁ yudhiṣṭhiraṁ sahānujaṁ bhīmādi-sahitam ||3||  \
 \
munibhiḥ sahitaḥ ||4||

 **...**

|| 1.8.5-6 ||

**sādhayitvājāta-śatroḥ svaṁ rājyaṁ kitavair hṛtam |**

**ghātayitvāsato rājñaḥ kaca-sparśa-kṣatāyuṣaḥ ||**

**yājayitvāśvamedhais taṁ tribhir uttama-kalpakaiḥ |**

**tad-yaśaḥ pāvanaṁ dikṣu śata-manyor ivātanot ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kitavair dhūrtair yodhanādibhiḥ | draupadyāḥ kaca-grahaṇādinā kṣataṁ naṣṭam āyur yeṣāṁ tān ||5||yājayitvety-ādi-bhāvi-kathā-saṅkṣepaḥ | śata-manyoḥ śata-krator iva ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **draupadyāḥ kaca-grahaṇādinā kṣatam āyur yeṣāṁ tān ||5||yājayitvety-ādi-bhāvi-kathā-saṅkṣepaḥ ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **draupadyāḥ kaca-sparśādinā duḥśāsana-kṛtena hatāny āyūṁṣi yeṣāṁ tān ||5|| \
 \
yājayitvety-ādi bhāvi-kathā-saṅkṣepaḥ, śatamanyor indrasy eva | manyurdainye kratau krudhi ity amaraḥ ||6||

 **...**

|| 1.8.7-8 ||

**āmantrya pāṇḍu-putrāṁś ca śaineyoddhava-saṁyutaḥ |**

**dvaipāyanādibhir vipraiḥ pūjitaiḥ pratipūjitaḥ ||**

**gantuṁ kṛtamatir brahman dvārakāṁ ratham āsthitaḥ |**

**upalebhe’bhidhāvantīm uttarāṁ bhaya-vihvalām ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **śaineyaḥ śiner naptā sātyakis tena coddhavena ca saṁyutaḥ ||7|| ratham āsthitaḥ sann uttarāṁ parīkṣin-mātaram | bhayena vihvalāṁ vyākulām | abhimukhaṁ dhāvantīm upalebhe dadarśa ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **atha saṅkṣepeṇoktvā punaḥ prastutam āha—āmantryety ādinā | tatrāmantryeti yugmakam ||7-8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **śaineyaḥ śiner naptā sātyakiḥ ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **saineyaḥ sinernaptā sātyakiḥ ||7||  \
 \
dvārakāṁ gantum ||8||

 **...**

**|| 1.8.9 ||**

**uttarovāca—**

**pāhi pāhi mahā-yogin deva-deva jagat-pate |**

**nānyaṁ tvad abhayaṁ paśye yatra mṛtyuḥ parasparam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **uttarā śrī-kṛṣṇaṁ prārthayate—**pāhi pāhi** iti dvābhyām | anyas tu prārthanā-yogyo nāstīty āha | **tvat** tvatto’**nyam** **abhayaṁ** bhaya-rahitaṁ **na paśyāmi** | **yatra** loke **parasparam** anyonyaṁ **mṛtyur** bhavati ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** **pāhi** iti | atha svajana-vadha-śaṅkā-vibhāvaṁ bhayam āha | uttarety-ādi | he **deva** kṛṣṇa ! **yatra** yasmin | atra **pāhi pāhi** ity anena sva-putra-vadha-darśanam uttarayā vyaktīkṛtam ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : tvatto’nyam** **abhayaṁ na paśyāmi | parasparam **ekasya **mṛtyur** anyas tasya mṛtyur aparas tasyāpy anya ity evam ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : tvad anyam abhayaṁ na paśyāmi** | **parasparam** iti—ekasya **mṛtyur** anyas tasyāpara ity evam ity arthaḥ ||9||

 **...**

**|| 1.8.10 ||**

**abhidravati mām īśa śaras taptāyaso vibho |**

**kāmaṁ dahatu māṁ nātha mā me garbho nipātyatām ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tatra prastutaṁ bhayam āvedayati | abhidravaty ābhimukham āyāti | taptam āyasaṁ lohamayaṁ śalyaṁ yasya saḥ | atikarpaṇyenāha—kāmam iti | kāmaṁ yatheccham ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **abhidravatīty ādau yān prati prayuktaḥ śaras ta eva taṁ paśyantīti jñeyam ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanv abhimanyunā tena patyā vināpi jīvitaṁ prārthayase na lajjase tatrāha— kāmam iti ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **prastutaṁ sva-bhayam āha—**abhīti** | taptam āyasaṁ lohamayaṁ śalyaṁ yasya saḥ | nanu pati-hīnāyāste kiṁ jīvanena? tatrāha—**kāmam** iti ||10||

 **...**

|| 1.8.11 ||

**sūta uvāca—**

**upadhārya vacas tasyā bhagavān bhakta-vatsalaḥ |**

**apāṇḍavam idaṁ kartuṁ drauṇer astram abudhyata ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **parābhāvenātikupitasya drauṇer apāṇḍavaṁ pāṇḍava-śūnyam idaṁ viśvaṁ kartuṁ pravṛttaṁ brahmāstram abudhyata ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **upadhārya sāvadhānaṁ śrutvā | tatra hetuḥ—bhakta-vatsala iti ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **idaṁ viśvam apāṇḍavaṁ kartuṁ pravṛṭtasya drauṇaḥ ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **parābhavād atikruddhasyedaṁ jagad apāṇḍavaṁ kartum udyatasya drauṇeḥ ||11||

 **...**

|| 1.8.12 ||

**tarhy evātha muni-śreṣṭha pāṇḍavāḥ paṁ ca sāyakān |**

**ātmano’bhimukhān dīptān ālakṣyāstrāṇy upādaduḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **ata eva bahu-mukhaṁ tad āgatam ity āha—tarhy eveti | tarhy eva tadānīm eva ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **pāṇḍavā iti | yo yo hi pāṇḍu-vaṁśajaḥ sa eva paśyati nānya iti jñeyam ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **ata eva bahu-mukhaṁ tad āgatam ity āha—tarhīti | pāṇḍavā eva tad apaśyannānye iti bodhyam ||12||

 **...**

|| 1.8.13 ||

**vyasanaṁ vīkṣya tat teṣām  ananya-viṣayātmanām |**

**sudarśanena svāstreṇa svānāṁ rakṣāṁ vyadhād vibhuḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **brahmāstrasyāstrāntarair anivartyatvāt tad-duṣpariharaṁ vyasanaṁ vīkṣya | ananya-viṣaya ātmā yeṣām  | svaika-niṣṭhānām ity arthaḥ ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **taj jhaṭity aśakya-samādhānam, vyasanaṁ vipadam ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **brahmāstrāsyāstrāntarair anirvāryatvāt tathā ekena brahmāstreṇa pūrvavad arjuna-prayuktenāpi pratijanābhimukham āgatasya pṛthak pṛthak brahmāstrasya durnivāratvāt tat-prayogādi-kāla-vilambāsahatvāc ca vyasanaṁ duṣparihāraṁ vīkṣya vicārya nyasta-śastro’pi sudarśanenety ādi tena sva-pratijñā-bhaṅgenāpi bhakta-vātsalya-nāmānam asādhāraṇaṁ sva-dharmaṁ rarakṣeti bhāvaḥ ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **arjuna-prayuktenaikena brahmāstreṇa pañcāpi pratyāgatasya tad astrasya durvāratvāt-tat-prayogādi-vilambāsahanāc ca tyakta-śastro'pi sudarśanena tan-nirāsthadity āha—vyasanam iti | ananyaviṣaya ātmā mano yeṣāṁ svaikāntinām ity arthaḥ ||13||

 **...**

|| 1.8.14 ||

**antaḥsthaḥ sarva-bhūtānām ātmā yogeśvaro hariḥ |**

**sva-māyayāvṛṇod garbhaṁ vairāṭyāḥ kuru-tantave ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **vairaṭyā uttarāyā antaḥ-sthaḥ san garbham āvṛtavān | tatra hetuḥ—yata ātmāntaryāmī | yogeśvara iti bahiḥ-sthasyāpi praveśa-ghaṭanārtham uktam | kurūṇāṁ tantave santānāya | pāṇḍavānām api kuru-vaṁśa-jatvād evam uktam ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **sarva-bhūtānām ātma paramātmety antaḥsthaḥ | tarhi kathaṁ vahiṣṭhaḥ ? tatrāha—yogeśvara iti | sveṣu pāṇḍaveṣu yā māyā kṛpā, tayā | tām eva darśayati—kuru-tantava iti | taiḥ ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **antaḥstha iti vairāṭyā api antaryāmi-rūpeṇa sthito’pi yogeśvaro yogabalena harir iti kṛṣṇa-rūpeṇa praviśya garbham āvṛṇot | āvṛtya sthito rarakṣety arthaḥ | sva-māyayā yoga-māyayeti vairāṭyā tu tathā-bhūtatvenāvijñāta ity arthaḥ | kurūṇāṁ tantave santānāya | pāṇḍavā api kuru-vaṁśajā evety evam uktam ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **antaryāmi-rūpeṇa vairātyāś cāntaḥ-sthito harir iti kṛṣṇa-rūpeṇa tasyā garbham āvṛṇod āvṛtyā rarakṣa | svamāyayā svakīye parīkṣiti kṛpayā hetunā | karūṇāṁ tantave santānāya, pāṇḍavānāṁ kuruvaṁśa-bhavatvādiyam uktiḥ ||14||

 **...**

|| 1.8.15 ||

**yadyapy astraṁ brahma-śiras tv amoghaṁ cāpratikriyam |**

**vaiṣṇavaṁ teja āsādya samaśāmyad bhṛgūdvaha ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **amogham apratikriyaṁ ca | samaśāmyat saṁśāntam āsīt ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **vaiṣṇavaṁ tejaḥ sudarśanam ||15||

 **...**

|| 1.8.16 ||

**mā maṁsthā hy etad āścaryaṁ sarvāścaryamaye ñcyute |**

**ya idaṁ māyayā devyā sṛjaty avati hanty ajaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **etad brahmāstra-śamanam āścaryaṁ mā māṁsthā na manyasva | idaṁ jagat ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **etad-brahmāstra-saṁśamanam | acyute kūṭasthe sarvāścaryamaye'cintyānanta śakti-nilaye māyayā icchayā devyā dīptayā idaṁ jagat ||16||

 **...**

|| 1.8.17 ||

**brahma-tejo-vinirmuktair ātmajaiḥ saha kṛṣṇayā |**

**prayāṇābhimukhaṁ kṛṣṇam idam āha pṛthā satī ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kṛṣṇayā saha ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kṛṣṇayā draupadyā saha satī vaiṣṇavī ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **satī vaiṣṇavī pṛthā kṛṣṇayā ca saha kṛṣṇam idam āha ||17||

 **...**

|| 1.8.18 ||

**kunty uvāca—**

**namasye puruṣaṁ tvādyam īśvaraṁ prakṛteḥ param |**

**alakṣyaṁ sarva-bhūtānām antar bahir avasthitam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tvā tvāṁ namasye namas-karomi | nanu kaniṣṭhaṁ māṁ kathaṁ namas-karoṣi tatrāha | ādyaṁ puruṣam | kutaḥ ? prakṛteḥ paraḥ | tat kutaḥ ? īśvaraṁ prakṛter api niyantāram | ata eva sarva-bhūtānām antar bahiś ca pūrṇatvenāvasthitam | tathāpy alakṣyam ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **namasya iti sārdhakam ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **jñāta-tātkālika-śrī-kṛṣṇa-sarva-kṛtyā kuntī hṛdy uditasya tan-mahaiśvaryasya vegaṁ soḍhum apārayantīti stauti namasyeti | kiṁ bhrāteyaṁ māṁ namasyasi tatrāha—puruṣam | nanu puruṣa evāsmi ko’tra sandehas tatrāha—ādyam | nanu dehānām evāgamāpāyitvaṁ puruṣo jīvas tv ādya eva sarvas tatrāha—īśvaram | nanu svarge indra-candrādyā bhūmau rājāno’pi īśvarā ucyante, tatrāha—prakṛteḥ param | kim aham antaryāmī puruṣaḥ | na, alakṣyam | antaryāmī buddhyādi-prakāśa-lakṣya eva | kiṁ brahma ? na, antar bahiś ca avasthitam | yasmād antar uttarā-garbha-stho bālakaṁ ca rakṣitavān asi bahiś cāsmāṁś ca rakṣan samīpe tiṣṭhasīti ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **dṛṣṭa-tātkālika-bhagavat-prabhāvā pṛthā hṛdi prajātaṁ tadaiśvarya-vegaṁ soḍhum akṣamā stauti—namasya iti | nanu bhrātreyaṁ māṁ kiṁ namasyasi? tatrāha—ādyaṁ puruṣam iti | 

nanu jīvo'pi īdṛśaḥ? tatrāha—īśvaram iti | nanv īdṛśo virañciḥ? tatrāha—prakṛteḥ paraṁ | nanv īdṛśaṁ māṁ ko'pi na vadati? tatrāha—tvad anugraha-śūnyānāṁ sarva-bhūtānām alakṣyam | anugṛhītānāṁ tu lakṣyam ity āha—vairāṭyantaraṁ praviśya rakṣita-tad garbhaṁ bahiś ca rakṣita-pāṇḍavam ity arthaḥ ||18||

 **...**

|| 1.8.19 ||

**māyā-javanikācchannam ajñādhokṣajam avyayam |**

**na lakṣyase mūḍha-dṛśā naṭo nāṭyadharo yathā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tatra hetuḥ—**māyā** eva javanikā tiraskāriṇī tayā ācchannaṁ praticchannam | ato’ ham ajñā bhakti-yogānabhijñā kevalaṁ namasyāmi | adhaḥ akṣa-jam indriya-jaṁ jñānaṁ yasmāt tam | avyayam aparicchannam | tat-prapañcaḥ mūḍha-dṛśā dehābhimāninā puṁsā na tvaṁ lakṣyase ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **alakṣyatve hetuḥ—māyety-ādi pada-dvayam | tatra prathamam anadhikāriṇaḥ prati prākaṭyāvasare’pi | dvitīyam anyadā svarūpata evendriya-jñānātītatvāt | sarvatra sthitatve’py avyayaṁ tena saha na vyetyīti | māyety etat prapañcayati—na lakṣyasa iti sārdhakam ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yasmād antar uttarā-garbha-stho bālakaṁ ca rakṣitavān asi bahiś cāsmāṁś ca rakṣan samīpe ca tiṣṭhasīti kiṁ tvaṁ paricchinno’si vyāpako veti tvām ahaṁ jñātuṁ na śaknomīty āha—māyaiva javanikā tiraskariṇī tayā ācchannam | 

nanu, kiṁ māyā mām āvṛṇoti ? tatrāha—ajñā meghācchannaṁ sūryam ahaṁ na paśyāmītivan māyayā mad-dṛṣṭyācchādanāt tvām apy ācchannaṁ paśyāmīty arthaḥ | yato’dhokṣajam adhaḥ sthitam akṣajaṁ jñānaṁ yasyeti aindriyakaṁ jñānaṁ yasyādhaḥ sthitam | evaṁ na spraṣṭuṁ prabhavatīty aham aindriyaka-jñānavatī ajñaiva, na ca mādṛśa-nikṛṣṭa-jananājñeyatve tava kāpi kṣatir ity āha—avyayam iti | 

nanu, māṁsākṣāt paśyasi stauṣi prakṛteḥ paratvena jānāsi tad apy ajñāsīty ātmānaṁ kim iti nindasi ? ity ata āha—na lakṣyase iti | nāṭyadharaḥ gīyamāna-gīta-padārthābhinaya-rasānurūpa-nṛtya-tālādi-viśiṣṭo naṭo mūḍha-dṛśā saṅgīta-śāstrānabhijñena naṭo’yaṁ naṭatīty evaṁ dṛṣṭo’pi yathā na lakṣyate na jñāta-tattvo bhavati tathaiva tvaṁ mayā dṛṣṭo’pi na lakṣyase | iti tathety asya pūrveṇaivānvayaḥ | pāṇḍavān sva-bhāktān pālayann api sarvāntaryāmy api muhur apy aśvatthāmādi pāṇḍava-vadhārtham astraṁ grāhayasi svayaṁ nyasta-śastro’py astraṁ gṛhṇāsi śiṣṭa-pālana-pravṛtto’pi bhīṣmādīn saṁhārayasi daupadī-subhadrayor atisnihyann api tat-putrān ghātayasīty evam ādikā tava līlā kiṁ-tattvety ahaṁ na jānāmīti bhāvaḥ ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tvam eko bahur vā madhyamo vibhur veti boddhum asamarthājñāham ity āha—māyayā tādṛśatva-jñānābhāvavatyā mad-buddhyā javanikayā channaṁ megheneva raviṁ, māyā syācchāmbarī-buddhyoḥ iti trikāṇḍaś-eṣaḥ | adhaḥ-sthitam akṣajam aindriyakaṁ jñānaṁ yasya tam, atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ—nāṭyadharo gīyamāna-taruṇī-mukha-netrādy abhinayakṛt naṭau yathā mūḍha-dṛśā tad abhinaya-śāstrān abhijñena na lakṣyate, tadvattvaṁ mayā  \
tad anabhijñayeti ||19||

 **...**

|| 1.8.20 ||

**tathā paramahaṁsānāṁ munīnām amalātmanām |**

**bhakti-yoga-vidhānārthaṁ kathaṁ paśyema hi striyaḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **bhakti-yoga-vidhāna-viṣayam ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kiṁ ca, parama-haṁsānām ātmānātma-viveke | hi striyaḥ ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tatheti, tathā ca satīty arthaḥ | amalātmanāṁ munīnāṁ madhye ye paramahaṁsā ātmārāmās teṣāṁ sa-prema-sampādana-prayojanakaṁ tvām ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **strī-jāter mama kā vārtā ? sarvajñā munayaḥ paramaṁsā api yal-līlā-mādhuryeṇākṛṣṭāḥ bhajanty eva tad-bhajana-tattvam apy avidvāṁso līlā-lāsyaṁ kiṁ jñāsyanti ? ity āha—parameti | amalātmanāṁ guṇa-maya-mālinyān niṣkrāntānāṁ jīvan-muktānām ity arthaḥ | teṣām  api bhakti-yoga-vidhānam arthaḥ prayojanaṁ yasya tam | yad uktaṁ—ātmārāmāś ca [bhā.pu. 1.7.10] ity ādau kurvanty ahaitukīṁ bhaktim iti ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **atha bhakti-svabhāvodgataṁ dainyaṁ dyotayanty āha—tatheti | amalātmanāṁ karmānuṣṭhānādi-malān-nirgatānāṁ bhakti-yogasya yad-vidhānaṁ jananaṁ so'harthe yasya taṁ, śrī-śukādīnāṁ tvāṁ dhyāyatāṁ vinā tvad-vīkṣāmatyākulānāṁ vīkṣāpradānena tad-bhakty ānanda-sampattayo'havatīrṇam ity arthaḥ | striyo vayaṁ pāramahaṁsyādi-dharmaśūnyāḥ ||20||

 **...**

|| 1.8.21 ||

**kṛṣṇāya vāsudevāya devakī-nandanāya ca |**

**nanda-gopa-kumārāya govindāya namo namaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **jñāna-bhakti-yoga-śakyatvam uktvā punaḥ kevalaṁ namaskaroti—kṛṣṇāyeti dvābhyām ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tad evambhūto’pi tvam aho ! asmākam itthaṁ sukhadas tāpahārī ca saṁvṛtto’sīti tat tat smṛtvā namaskaroti—kṛṣṇāyeti ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **ataḥ sarvāvatāreṣu madhye tvam evātiśreṣṭha ityāha kṛṣṇāyeti | tatrāpi yāṁs tvaṁ svīkaroṣi teṣv api premavatsu dhanyeṣu madhye mad-bhrātā atidhanyo yas te pitety āha—vāsudevāyeti | tato’pi adhika-premavatī devakī dhanyā yā te mātety āha—devakīṁ nandayasi tadīya-garbhe sthityā tāṁ sarvato’pi samṛddhimatīṁ karoṣīty arthaḥ | tato’py adhika-premavān nando dhanya ity āha—nanda-gopasya kumārāya kaumāra-līlā-mādhuryaṁ sa evāsvādayāmāseti bhāvaḥ | tato’pi premavatī dhanyā yaśodety agrima-śloke vakṣyate | kaumāra-līlāto’pi vraja-sthasya tava kaiśora-līlā-mādhuryam adhikam ity āha—govindāyeti | kaiśorārambhe evābhiṣekānantaraṁ govinda-nāma-khyāteḥ, tadaiva gāḥ sarveṣāṁ sarvendriyāṇi vindase ākṛṣya prāpnoṣīty arthaḥ | asādhāraṇyena tad-āsvādaka-janās tu rahasyatvena svīya-rasāsvādanānaucityena ca noṭṭaṅkitāḥ ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **asmat-to'pi vasudevādayo'tidhanyā ity āha—kṛṣṇāyeti | vāsudevāya vasudevasya mad-bhrātaḥ putrāya | devakīṁ garbha-sthity ānandayasīti tat-sambandhad eva vayaṁ ca dhanyā iti bhāvaḥ | tābhyām api nandāyo'tidhanyā ity āha—nandanāmā gopo vraja-bhūpatiḥ, ayājayad-gosavena gopa-rājan [bhā.pu. 3.2.32] ity-ādi-vakṣyamāṇāt, tasya kumārāyātmajāya | govindāya gavendratayendreṇābhiṣiktāya | pāyān na indro gavām [bhā.pu. 10.26.25] iti vakṣyati | gavendratvaṁ khalu mahaiśvaryam—


    gobhyo yajñaḥ pravartante gobhyo devāḥ samutthitāḥ | 


    gobhir vedāḥ samudgīrṇāḥ saṣaḍaṅga-padakramāḥ || iti gosūktāt | 

yathā ca kaumārādi-līlā-sudhānāṁ nandādibhir evānubhavāt-teṣām  atidhanyatvam ||21||

 **...**

|| 1.8.22 ||

**namaḥ paṅkaja-nābhāya namaḥ paṅkaja-māline |**

**namaḥ paṅkaja-netrāya namas te paṅkajāṅghraye ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **paṅkajaṁ nabhau yasya | panṅkajānāṁ mālāsti yasya | paṅkajavat prasann enetre yasya | paṅkajāṅkitāv aṅghrī yasya tasmai ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tad evam eva sukhadatva-tāpahāritva-rūpaṁ nija-svabhāvaṁ prakaṭayann iva paṅkajābhair nijāṅgair virājasa ity āha—nama iti | paṅkajākāraṁ bhagaval-lakṣaṇaṁ nābhau yasya | paṅkaje iva aṅghrī yasya ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **ahaṁ tu teṣāṁ madhye na gaṇanīyā, tad api man-netra-sukhado’sīty āha—namaḥ paṅkajeti | tava nābhi-mālā netrādiṣu patitā me dṛṣṭiḥ sukha-śītalā bhavatīti bhāvaḥ ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yadyapi nāhaṁ tat-sadṛśī, tathāpi taṁ tvāṁ paśyantī kṛtārthāsm īty āha—nama iti ||22||

 **...**

**|| 1.8.23 ||**

**yathā hṛṣīkeśa khalena devakī**

**kaṁsena ruddhāticiraṁ śucārpitā |**

**vimocitāhaṁ ca sahātmajā vibho**

**tvayaiva nāthena muhur vipad-gaṇāt ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tat-kṛtopakārān anusmarati—**yathā** iti dvābhyām | ayam arthaḥ—mātṛto’pi mayy adhikā tava prītiḥ | tathā hi, he **hṛṣīkeśa**, **yathā** **devakī** **kaṁsena** **ruddhā tvayā vimocitā**, **ahaṁ** ca tathaiva kiṁ vimocitā ? iti kākvā mahān viśeṣa uktaḥ | taṁ darśayati—sā **aticiraṁ ruddhā** satī tasmād eva sakṛd vimocitā tathā **śucārpitā** ca satī | na ca tasyāḥ putrā rakṣitāḥ | asti cānyo nāthas tasyāḥ | ahaṁ tu **vipad-gaṇāt,** tathāpi muhuḥ śīghraṁ ca **sātmajā** ca tvayaiva ca nātheneti ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** **yathā** iti | **yathā** yathāvac ca-kāreṇa eva upamārthasya labdhatvāt | **muhur vipad-gaṇādi**-vyatirekaḥ ||23|| [mu.pha. 15.9]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **sva-tāpahāritvam eva darśayati—yatheti | tvayaiveti baladevasyāpy anyatra pakṣapāta-darśanena sva-putrādi-sāhāyyam api tvad-anugraheṇeti bhāvaḥ ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————
