**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kiṁ ca, aham atidīnā tvayā māteva pālitety āha—yatheti | he hṛṣīkeśeti mad-antaḥ-karaṇaṁ tvam eva jānāsīti bhāvaḥ | ahaṁ ca tathā mocitā, kintu sahātmajeti mayi viśeṣeṇa tava dayā | tatra hetuḥ śucārpitā śucāyāṁ śoke eva mat-karmaṇā aham arpitā iti tasyāḥ sakāśād apy aham atiduḥkhinīty arthaḥ | kiṁ ca, tvayaiva nātheneti tasyās tu nātho vasudevo vidyate ity apatyāntarotpatti-sambhāvanāyā vidyamānatvāt tvaṁ cāpatya-cūḍāmaṇir abhūr eva kim anyair apālitair nikṛṣṭaiḥ ṣaḍ-garbhair iti bhāvaḥ | kiṁ cāhaṁ muhuḥ punaḥ punar api yo vipadāṁ gaṇas tasmān mocitā | sā tu sakṛd eva kaṁsa-hetuko yo vipad-gandha eva tasmād eva mocitā, tatrāpi mad-garbhe parameśvaro janiṣyate iti mano’nulāpa-sukhābhimānavatyāḥ kuto vipad-gandho’pi tad-anantaraṁ vipat kāpi tasyā nābhūd eveti aham eva sarvato’py atidīneti mayi tava dīna-bandhutvād eva dayā na tv ahaṁ devakīvat tvayi premavatī bhāgyavatī veti bhāvaḥ ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kiṁ ca mātṛto'pi mayi tavādhikaṁ kāruṇyam ity āha—yatheti sphuṭarthaṁ | devakī patimatī tvad-rūpa-putrāśā-śālinī kaṁsa-kṛta-sakṛd-vipattikā | ahantu vidhavā tokaputrā śatrutā-sakṛd-vipattikā ceti māṁ pālayatas tava dīna-bandhu tātividiteti bhāvaḥ ||23||

 **...**

|| 1.8.24 ||

**viṣān mahāgneḥ puruṣāda-darśanād**

**asat-sabhāyā vana-vāsa-kṛcchrataḥ |**

**mṛdhe mṛdhe’neka-mahārathāstrato**

**drauṇy-astrataś cāsma hare’bhirakṣitāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **vipad-gaṇam eva darśayati | viṣād bhīmasya viṣa-modaka-dānāt | mahāgner jatu-gṛha-dāhāt | puruṣādā hiḍimbādayo rākṣasās teṣāṁ darśanāt | asat-sabhāyā dyūta-sthānāt | abhito rakṣitā āsma abhāvama ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **asat-sabhāyā draupadī-vastra-vardhanādinā ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **vipad-gaṇam eva darśayati | viṣād bhīmasya viṣamodaka-dānāt | mahāgner jatu-gṛha-dāhāt | puruṣādā hiḍimbādayo rākṣasāḥ | asat-sabhāyā dyūta-sthānāt ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **vipadgaṇam āha—viṣādviṣamamādakāt, mahāgner dīptāl-lākṣā-gṛhāt | puruṣādānāṁ hiḍambādīnāṁ rakṣasāṁ darśanāt, asat-sabhāyā dyūta-saṁsadaḥ ||24||

 **...**

|| 1.8.25 ||

**vipadaḥ santu tāḥ śaśvat tatra tatra jagad-guro |**

**bhavato darśanaṁ yat syād apunar bhava-darśanam ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **apunar bhavaṁ darśayati ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** yat yāsu vipatsu | kīdṛśaṁ darśanam ? nāsti punar api bhava-darśanaṁyasmāt ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**sanātana gosvāmī (dig-darṣinī) : yat** yāsu āpatsu **na punar bhavasya** saṁsāra-duḥkhasya **darśanaṁ** yasmāt tat | yad vā, **apunarbhavaṁ** mokṣaṁ **darśayati** tucchatayā jñāpayatīti tathā **tat** | mahato'pi saraso mahā-samudra iva mokṣa-sukhasyāpi bhagavad-darśanānandas tucchatāṁ darśayatīti nyāyāt || (bṛ.bhā. 1.5.86)

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **vipada iti | darśanam avalokanam | yat yāsu | apunarbhavam anyatra kutrāpīdṛśa-mādhuryābhāvāt punar na jātaṁ darśanaṁ sāmya-pratītir yasya tat, apūrvam ity arthaḥ ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kiṁ ca, tā vipada eva me sampada evety āha—vipada iti | he jagatāṁ guro hita-kāritvena sakṛpottha-vipad-añjana-pradānena sampat-prasāda-ghūrṇā-dhvaṁsin ! yad yāsu vipatsu bhavato darśanaṁ kīdṛśaṁ nāsti, punar api bhavasya saṁsāra-duḥkhasya darśanaṁ yat ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **ahaṁ tu tā vipada eva sampado manye ity āha—vipada iti | tatra deśe kāle ca yady āsu vipatsu bhavatas tava darśanam abhūt | kīdṛśi? nāsti punar api bhavasya saṁsārasya darśanaṁ yasmāt tat | anujñālaṅkāraḥ, duḥkhasya prārthanānujñā tatraiva sukha-darśanāt iti tal-lakṣaṇāt ||25||

 **...**

|| 1.8.26 ||

**janmaiśvarya-śruta-śrībhir edhamāna-madaḥ pumān |**

**naivārhaty abhidhātuṁ vai tvām akiñcana-gocaram ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **saṁpadas tu śreyaḥ-paripanthinya iti āha—janma sat-kule | janmādibhir edhamāno mado yasya saḥ | abhidhātuṁ śrī-kṛṣṇa-govindeti vaktum api | akiṁcanānāṁ gocaraṁ viṣaya-bhūtam ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **mad-vidha-sampadas tu tat-sambandha-mātra-paripanthitanya ity āha—janmeti ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **loke sampada eva vipada ity āha—janmeti | abhidhātuṁ kṛṣṇa-govindety abhidhānam api vaktum ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **abhidhātuṁ kṛṣṇa govindeti vaktum | akiñcanānām āsura-sampada-vihīnāṁ gocaraṁ gamyam ||26||

 **...**

|| 1.8.27 ||

**namo’kiñcana-vittāya nivṛtta-guṇa-vṛttaye |**

**ātmārāmāya śāntāya kaivalya-pataye namaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **prastuta-manoratha-pūraṇāya punaḥ praṇamati | akiñcanā bhaktā eva vittaṁ sarvasvaṁ yasya tasmai | tataḥ kim ? nivṛttā guṇa-vṛttayo dharmārtha-kāma-viṣayā yasmāt tasmai | tat kutaḥ ? ātmārāmāya | tat kutaḥ ? śāntāya rāgādi-rahitāya | kiṁ ca, kaivalya-pataye kaivalyaṁ dātuṁ samarthāya ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **nanv akiñcana-vittatvena kiyan māhātmyaṁ jātam ? tatrāha—nivṛtteti | guṇa-vṛtti-rahitasya tava yad-bhakta-vittatvam, tat parama-mahad eveti bhāvaḥ | tad dhi bhaktānāṁ nirguṇatvaṁ sarva-guṇa-mayād utkṛṣṭatvaṁ ca vyanakti—ātmārāmāyety anena | tato’py ādhikyam | ātmārāmasyāpi tad-vittatvāt | evaṁ śāntāyety ādi ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **akiñcanā na vidyate kiñcin-mātraṁ prākṛtaṁ vastu, api tu tval-lakṣaṇaṁ pūrṇa-cid-ānanda-svarūpaṁ vastv asti yeṣāṁ, te ekānta-bhaktā eva vittāni dhanānīty ati-premāspadāni sarvataḥ saṅgopanīyāś ca yasya tasmai teṣāṁ vittāyeti vā | nanv akiñcanā daridrā ucyante ? satyam | bhagavad-bhaktānāṁ māyā-guṇa-vṛtty-utthāḥ sampado na bhavantīty āha—nivṛttā guṇa-vṛttayo viṣaya-bhogā yasmāt tasmai | akiñcana-bhakteṣv evāsaktim uktvā, anyeṣu tv audāsīnyam āha—ātmārāmāyeti | bhaktānām aparādhe saty api na tvaṁ kupyasīty āha—śāntāya sva-bhakte svanugrahāya | mumukṣu-bhakteṣūpakārakatvam āha—kaivalyeti ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **akiñcana-preṣṭhatvena punaḥ praṇamati—kṛṣṇādanyat kiñcana vittaṁ yeṣāṁ nāsti, te'kiñcanās teṣāṁ vittāya, te vā vittaṁ yasya tasmai, kuta evaṁ? tatrāha—nivṛtta guṇa-vṛttayo yasmāt-tasmai | akiñcaneṣvāsaktim abhidhāya tebhyo'nyatraudāsīnyam āha—ātmā-rāmāyeti | śāntāya sāparādhe'pi bhakte kopaśūnyāya | kaivalasya mokṣasya patye svāmine tat-pradāyety arthaḥ ||27||

 **...**

|| 1.8.28 ||

**manye tvāṁ kālam īśānam anādi-nidhanaṁ vibhum |**

**samaṁ carantaṁ sarvatra bhūtānāṁ yan mithaḥ kaliḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nanu devakī-putraṁ māṁ katham evaṁ stauṣi tatrāha | manye tvāṁ kālaṁ natu devakī-putram | tatra hetavaḥ—īśānaṁ niyantāram | anādi-nidhanam ādy-anta-śūnyam | vibhuṁ prabhum | samaṁ yathā bhavati tathā sarvatra carantam | nanu pārtha-sārartheḥ kathaṁ mama sāmyaṁ tatrāha | yad yatas tvatto nimitta-bhūtād bhūtānām eva mithaḥ kaliḥ kalaho bhavati natu svatas tvayi vaiṣamyam ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **sa tu tava susvabhāvas tarkāgocara evety āha—manya iti caturbhiḥ | kālam antaryāminam | īśānaṁ bahiś ca sarva-niyantāram | yad yatra yeṣu bhāveṣu bhūtānāṁ mithaḥ kalir bhavati | teṣu samaṁ carantam | atra prathame samatvam, dvitīye samatve’pi bhakta-tad-dveṣiṇor anugraha-nigraha-rūpācaritatvam | tṛtīye tad-artha-tal-līlāvatāre parama āveśaḥ | caturthe tu tatrāpi parama iti ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **bhaktāparādhiṣu saṁhārakatvam āha—kālam iti | na tv āsakty audāsīnyopakāraktvāpakārakatvair api tvayi vaiṣamyam ity āha—samam iti | yad yatra mithaḥ kaliḥ kalaha īśvaro duḥkhadaḥ sukhadaḥ samo viṣamo nirghṛṇaḥ saghṛṇa ity-ādi ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kālaṁ śiṣṭa-vidveṣi-saṁhārakam | īśānaṁ tat-saṁhāre samartham | anādi-nidhanaṁ vibhuṁ tād-rūpeṇa sarva-deśa-kālasthitam | sarvatra śiṣṭeṣu duṣṭeṣu ca samaṁ yathā syāt-tathā carantaṁ vartamānam ity arthaḥ | yady asmiṁs tvayi bhūtānāṁ mithaḥ kaliḥ—baddho mukto veśvaraḥ, ādye'sāmarthamantye pravṛtty abhāva iti vyarthas tat svīkāraḥ | atha samo viṣamo veśvaraḥ nādyaḥ, anugraha-nigrahayor darśanāt, nāntyaḥ, sāmya-vākyād itevyaṁ kalahaḥ ||28||

 **...**

|| 1.8.29 ||

**na veda kaścid bhagavaṁś cikīrṣitaṁ**

**tavehamānasya nṛṇāṁ viḍambanam |**

**na yasya kaścid dayito’sti karhicid**

**dveṣyaś ca yasmin viṣamā matir nṛṇām ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nanu nigrahānugraha-rūpaṁ mayi prasiddhaṁ vaiṣamyam ata āha—na vedeti | **nṛṇāṁ viḍambanam** anukaraṇam **īhamānasya** kurvataḥ | **yasmiṁs** tvayi **viṣamā matir** anugraha-nigraha-rūpā bhavati ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu tatra kalahe tattva-niścāyakaḥ ko bhavet ? tatra na ko’pīty āha—na vedeti dvābhyām | **nṛṇāṁ** śāstra-vivādināṁ teṣāṁ **viḍambanaṁ** jñāna-vaiphalyam **īhamānasya** icchataḥ | yad vā, rāma-kṛṣṇādy-avatāre svīyena naratvena **nṛṇāṁ** nara-mātrāṇām eva **viḍambanam** **īhamānasya** tādṛśa-saundarya-sādguṇe caritrādy-adarśanād anyena vā viḍambitā evaṁ bhavantīti bhāvaḥ | **nṛṇāṁ** nara-mātrāṇāṁ **viṣamā matir** iti yathā sūryasya sūrya-kānta-śilāyāṁ sva-tulya-dharmatva-pradānenāsaktau andheṣu audāsīnye cakravākeṣūpakāritve ghūka-taskarāndhakārādiṣv apakāritve lakṣyamāṇe’pi na tasya vaiṣamyam, kintu tatra tatra vastu-sādguṇya-vaiguṇyād eva kāraṇam iti bodhyam ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu teṣu kalaheṣu madhye kaścinmāṁ vetti? nety āha—he bhagavaṁs tava cikīrṣitaṁ kaścid api na veda | kīdṛśasya? atimānuṣa-daivatena nṛ-caritena nṛṇāṁ viḍambanaṁ tiraskāramīhamānasya kurvāṇasya yasya tava kaścic-chiṣṭo dayitaḥ kaścid aśiṣṭaś ca dveṣyo nāsti, tad anugraha-nigrahayos tat-tat-karma-nimittakatvāt | āha caivaṁ sūtrakāraḥ vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāt, tathā hi darśayati [ve.sū. 2.1.34], tathāpi nṛṇāṁ matir yasmin viṣamā, ataḥ kaścin na vedeti ||29||

 **...**

|| 1.8.30 ||

**janma karma ca viśvātmann ajasyākartur ātmanaḥ |**

**tiryaṅ-nṛṣiṣu yādaḥsu tad atyanta-viḍambanam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **te ajasya janma | akartuḥ karma | tiryakṣu varāhādi-rūpeṇa | nṛṣu rāmādi-rūpeṇa ṛṣiṣu vāmanādi-rūpeṇa | yādaḥsu matsyādi-rūpeṇa ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kiṁ ca, tad api tava sāmya-vaiṣamya-kartṛtvākartṛtva-janmavattvājatvādiṣu siddhāntān nirvidya | līlaivāsvādanīyety āha—janmeti dvābhyām | ajasya janma akartuḥ karma tatrāpi tiryag-ādiṣu tac ca tac ca tava sarvotkṛṣṭasyeśvarasyātyanta-viḍambanam | tat-taj-jātīyārthenātmano nyūnatvāṅgīkārāt | tathā hi vārāhe janmani ghrāṇena pṛthvyāḥ padavīṁ vijighrann ity-ādinā sarvajñatve’pīśvaratve’pi vāstava-śūkara evābhūr yam avalokya jahāsa cāho vana-gocaro mṛta ity eva na tattva-jñās tvāṁ karmādhīnaṁ jīvam eva manyanta iti bhāvaḥ | atrājatvākartṛtvayor eva satyatve janma-karma-lakṣaṇayor līlayor mithyātvam | tathātve ca tasyā śukadevādy-ātmārāma-gaṇa-cittākarṣaṇasyāsaṅgatiḥ | janma karma ca me divyam evaṁ yo vetti tattvataḥ [bhā.pu. 4.9] iti bhagavad-ukteś ca janma-karmaṇoḥ satyatve ajatvākartṛtvayor asaṅgatir iti | tasmād acintyānanta-śaktimato bhagavataḥ ko veda tattvam iti ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu lokānusāryera mac-caritraṁ, kuto loka-viḍambanaṁ? tatrāha—he viśvātman! ātmanas tavājasyāpūrva-dehendriya-yogena janma-śūnyasya janma raver iva prākaṭya-mātram | akartuḥ pradhāna-sambandhena kartṛtva-śūnyasya svataḥ kartuḥ karma pūrṇaiśvaryaṁ caritaṁ, kva? ity āha—tiryakṣu varāhādi-vapuṣā, nṛṣu raghunāthādi-vapuṣā, ṛṣiṣu vyāsādi-vapuṣā, yādaḥsu mīnādi-vapuṣā | tat-tu atyanta-viḍambanaṁ taj-jātānām atitiraskaraṇam | dharāghrāṇādi-tac-ceṣṭānāṁ prakāśe'py antarujjṛmbhitair mahaiśvaryas tāsaṁ vaiphalyāt ||30||

 **...**

|| 1.8.31 ||

**gopy ādade tvayi kṛtāgasi dāma tāvad**

**yā te daśāśru-kalilāñjana-sambhramākṣam |**

**vaktraṁ ninīya bhaya-bhāvanayā sthitasya**

**sā māṁ vimohayati bhīr api yad bibheti ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nara-viḍambanam atyāścaryam ity āha—gopīti | **gopī** yaśodā **tvayi kṛtāgasi** dadhi-bhāṇḍa-sphoṭanaṁ kṛtavati yāvad **dāma** rajjum **ādade** jagrāha, **tāvat** tat-kṣaṇam eva **yā te daśā**vasthā, **sā māṁ vimohayati** | kiṁ-bhūtasya | **aśrubhiḥ kalilaṁ** vyāmiśram **añjanaṁ **yayos te ca te **saṁbhrameṇa** vyākule **akṣiṇī** yasmiṁs tad **vaktraṁninīya** adhaḥ kṛtvā tāḍayiṣyatīti **bhayasya bhāvanayā sthitasya** | **yad** yatas tvatto **bhīr api** svayaṁ **bibheti,** tasya te daśā ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **gopīti | atra **bhīr apiyad bibheti** ity uktyā tasyā aiśvarya-jñānaṁ vyaktam | tato yadi sā bhīḥ satyā na bhavati, tadā tasyā moho’pi na sambhaved iti gamyate | sphuṭam eva cāntar bhayam uktam **bhaya-bhāvanayā sthitasya** iti ||31|| [prīti-sandarbha 145]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tasmāt tava līlām evāsvādayāmīty āha | **gopī** yaśodā **tvayi kṛtāgasi** dadhi-manthanī-sphoṭanaṁ kṛtavati sati yāvad **dāma** rajjum ādade jagrāha, **tāvat** tat-kṣaṇam eva **te** tava **yādaśā** avasthā **sā māṁ vimohayati** | 

kim-bhūtasya ? **aśrubhiḥ kalilaṁ** vyāmiśram añjanaṁ **saṁbhramaḥ** āvegaś **cākṣṇor** yatra tad-**vaktraṁ ninīya** adhaḥ kṛtvā tāḍayiṣyatīti **bhayasya bhāvanayā sthitasya** tad yatas tvattaḥ **bhīr** api **svayaṁ bibheti**, tasya te daśā tena pūrvoktān nanda-gopād apy atipremavatī yaśodā dhanyā, yayā tavaitādṛśo vaśīkāra iti sūcitam | 

atra **bhīr api yad bibheti** ity uktyaiva kuntyā atraiśvarya-jñānaṁ vyaktī-bhūtam | **bhaya-bhāvanayā sthitasya** ity antar bhayasya ca tayā satyatvam evābhimatam | anukaraṇa-mātratve jñāte tasya moho na sambhaved iti jñeyam | ata eva, tavehamānasya nṛṇāṁ viḍambanam  [bhā.pu. 1.8.29] ity-ādau viḍambanam anukaraṇam iti vyākhyāntaraṁ [śrīdharasya] parāhatam ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **idaṁ tu tvac-caritraṁ mayā durbodham ity āha—gopīti! nanda-rājasya rājñī yaśodā sāgasi vibhagna-dadhyādi-bhājanatayā sāparādhe tvayi bandhanāya yāvad-dāmādade jagrāha tāvat-tat-kṣaṇam eva yā te daśāvasthābhūt sā māṁ jñāta-tad aiśvaryām api vimohayati | kīdṛśasya? vaktraṁ ninīyādhaḥkṛtvā sāgasaṁ māmadya tāḍayiṣyatīti bhaya-bhāvanayā sthitasya gṛhītatvāt palāyane'śaktasyety arthaḥ | vaktraṁ kīdṛk? aśrubhiḥ kalilaṁ vyāptam, añjanaṁ sambhramaś ca tābhyāṁ yukte akṣiṇī yatra tat | 

nanu sāgaso me mātur bhayaṁ yuktam eveti cet, tatrāha—bhīr apīti | tathā cābhayaṁ bhayaṁ ca tava vāstavam eva man-mohe hetur iti ||31||

 **...**

|| 1.8.32 ||

**kecid āhur ajaṁ jātaṁ puṇya-ślokasya kīrtaye |**

**yadoḥ priyasyānvavāye malayasyeva candanam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **ata eva jagan-mohanatayā durjñeyatvāt tava janmādi bahudhā varṇayantīty āha—kecid it caturbhiḥ | puṇya-ślokasya yudhiṣṭhirasya kīrtaye | yador eva kīrtaya iti vā | malayasya kīrtaye vaṁśe candanaṁ yathā ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **kecid iti catuṣkam ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **evaṁ ca tvaṁ na cet prādurabhaviṣyas tadā jagan-mohinī iyaṁ līlā kena vāsvādayiṣyateti prādurbhāva-kāraṇam eva mata-bhedena bahu-prakāram āha—kecid iti | puṇya-ślokasya yudhiṣṭhirasya puṇya-śloko nalo rājā puṇya-śloko yudhiṣṭhiraḥ iti puṇya-ślokatvena tadānīṁ tasyaiva prasiddheḥ, yador anvavāye vaṁśe yador eva kīrtaye vaṁśe vā candanaṁ yathā ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **atha kim evaṁ vicāreṇa, tac-caritam evāsvādyam ity āha—kecid iti | puṇya-ślokasya yudhiṣṭhirasya yadoś ca kīrtaye, anvavāye vaṁśe, malayasya kīrtaye candanam iva ||32||

 **...**

|| 1.8.33 ||

**apare vasudevasya devakyāṁ yācito’bhyagāt |**

**ajas tvam asya kṣemāya vadhāya ca sura-dviṣām ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tathā vasudevasya bhāryāyāṁ devakyām aja eva tvam abhyagāt | putratvam iti śeṣaḥ | prathama-puruṣas tv ārṣaḥ | arbhatvam iti pāṭhaḥ sugamaḥ | tābhyām eva pūrvaṁ sutapaḥ-pṛśni-rūpābhyāṁ yācitaḥ san | asya jagataḥ kṣemāya ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **aja eva tvam abhyagāt putratvam iti śeṣaḥ | prathama-puruṣas tv ārṣaḥ | arbhatvam iti pāṭhaḥ sugamaḥ | tābhyām eva pūrvaṁ sutapaḥ-pṛśni-rūpābhyāṁ yācitaḥ san | asya jagataḥ kṣemāya ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yācitas tābhyām eva sutapaḥ-pṛṣṇibhyām abhyagāt putratām iti śeṣaḥ | ārṣaḥ prathama-puruṣaḥ | arbhatvam iti pāṭhaḥ sugamaḥ ||33||

 **...**

|| 1.8.34 ||

**bhārāvatāraṇāyānye bhuvo nāva ivodadhau |**

**sīdantyā bhūri-bhāreṇa jāto hy ātma-bhuvārthitaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **ātma-bhuveti brahma-prārthanasya prādhānya-vivakṣayā ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **ātma-bhuveti brahma-prārthanasya prādhānya-vivakṣayeti sarvaṁ matāntaram ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **brahmaṇā prārthito bhuvo bhārāvataraṇāya jātaḥ, kīdṛśyā bhuvaḥ? udadhau samudre nāva iva bhūri-bhāveṇa sīdantyā iti matāntarāṇi ||34||

 **...**

|| 1.8.35 ||

**bhave’smin kliśyamānānām avidyā-kāma-karmabhiḥ |**

**śravaṇa-smaraṇārhāṇi kariṣyann iti kecana ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **matāntaram | paramānanda-svarūpājñānam avidyā tato dehādy-abhimānāt kāmas tataḥ karmāṇi taiḥ kliśyamānānāṁ tan-nivṛttaye śravaṇādy-arhāṇi karmāṇi kariṣyan ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **sva-matam āha—avidyā ajñānaṁ tataḥ kāmaḥ tataḥ karmāṇi taiḥ kliśyamānānāṁ sāṁsārikāṇām api prema-bhakti-siddhy-artham eva karmāṇi kariṣyan kleśa-nivṛttis tvānuṣaṅgikī | uttara-śloke padāmbuja-darśanasyaiva śravaṇādi-phalatvokteḥ | tad-darśanaṁ tu prema-labhyam eva ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **svamatam āha—bhave iti | avidyā-tasmiṁs tad-dhetuḥ, tataḥ kāmo bhogecchā, tataḥ karmāṇi tairasmin bhave kliśyamānānāṁ prāṇinām ānuṣaṅgika-kleśakṣayāṇi śravaṇa-dhyānādi-śuddha-bhakti-nimittāni karmāṇi caritāni kariṣyan jāta iti kecanāhuḥ ||35||

 **...**

**|| 1.8.36 ||**

**śṛṇvanti gāyanti gṛṇanty abhīkṣṇaśaḥ**

**smaranti nandanti tavehitaṁ janāḥ |**

**ta eva paśyanty acireṇa tāvakaṁ**

**bhava-pravāhoparamaṁ padāmbujam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **asya pakṣasya siddhāntatām abhipretya śravaṇādi-phalam āha—śṛṇvantīti | **nandanty** anyaiḥ kīrtyamānam abhinandanti | ye **janāḥ** | **īhitaṁ** caritam | **tāvakaṁ** tvadīyaṁ **padāmbujaṁ** | **ta eva**, paśyanty eva, **acireṇa** eveti ca sarvatrāvadhāraṇam | kīdṛśam ? **bhava-pravāhasya** janma-paramparāyā **uparamo** yasmiṁs tat ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** **śṛṇvanti** iti | evaṁ bhaktasya mukhyatvād brahma-sāyujyam uktvā tasyaiva bhagavat-sāmīpyādi-mukti-lipsoḥ stāḥ pradarśayitu-kāmas tv āha—kuntīti | **abhīkṣṇaśaḥ** punaḥ punaḥ | **nandanti** praśaṁsanti | **īhitaṁ** karmata eva ye śravaṇādi-ratāḥ, nānye | **bhavaḥ** saṁsāraḥ | sa eva **pravāhaḥ** | jala-pravāhavat patitaṁ na muñcanti | uccāvaceṣu sthāneṣu pātayatīti pravāhaḥ | tasya **uparamaṁ** vināśo yatra **padāmbuje** tat tathā | etena sāmīpya-rūpā muktir uktā ||36||  [mu.pha. 19.28]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **asya pakṣasya siddhāntatvam abhipretyāha—śṛṇvantīti | **te** eva, na tv anye | **paśyanty** eva, na tu na paśyanti | **acireṇaiva**, na tu cireṇa | **tāvakam** eva, na tvad-aṁśasya kasyacit | **bhava-pravāhoparamam** eva, na tu saṁsārānivartakam | **padāmbujam** eva, na tu tava nirviśeṣaṁ svarūpam iti | artha-saundarya-lābhāya ṣaḍ-avadhāraṇāni draṣṭavyāni ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **ayaṁ pakṣaḥ siddhānta iti bhāvenāha—**śṛnvantīti** | **īhitaṁ** caritam, anyaiḥ kīrtitena tena **nandanti,** samṛddhiṁ labhante | ta eva nānye, **paśyanty evācireṇaiva tāvakam** eva, na tu tvad-aṁśasya kasyacit | **bhava-pravāhoparamam** eva **padāmbujam** eva, na tu vaikuṇṭha-mātram ity arthaḥ | saundaryāvadhāraṇāni bahūni yojyāni ||36||

**...**

**|| 1.8.37 ||**

**apy adya nas tvaṁ sva-kṛtehita prabho**

**jihāsasi svit suhṛdo’nujīvinaḥ |**

**yeṣāṁ na cānyad bhavataḥ padāmbujāt**

**parāyaṇaṁ rājasu yojitāṁhasām ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **idānīṁ tavāsmat-parityāgo’nucita ity āśayenāha—apīti caturbhiḥ | he prabho, suhṛdo’tisnigdhān anujīvinaś ca no’dyāpi svit kiṁsvit tvaṁ jihāsasi | yeṣām  asmākam anyat parāyaṇaṁ naivasti | tat kutaḥ ? rājasu yojitam aṁho duḥkhaṁ yais teṣām  | svānāṁ kṛtam īhitam apekṣitaṁ yena tasya sambodhanam | visargānta-pāthe tvaṁ-pada-viśeṣaṇam ||37|| 

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** **api** iti | kṛṣṇa-prayāṇaṁ niṣedhayati | **api** aho **jihāsasi** svān hātum icchasi | kiṁ ca, vayaṁ hi **suhṛdo**’**nujīvanaś** ca | **tvaṁ sva-kṛtehitaḥ** svasmin ātmīye kṛtam īhitam abhilaṣitaṁ yena, sa tathā | svajanasya kāmān pūrayasīty arthaḥ | **rājasu** kṣatriyeṣu **suyojitaṁ** suṣṭhu yogaṁ nītam | **aṁhaḥ** pāpaṁ karma yais te tathā ||37|| [mu.pha. 15.11]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **asmākaṁ sukha-duḥkhe tvad-darśanādarśane eva nānye | tatra sukha-samayo gataḥ samprati duḥkha-samayo’yam āyātīty āha—apy adyeti | adya no’smān api svit tvaṁ jihāsasi, yato’dya tvaṁ dvārakāṁ yātum icchasīti bhāvaḥ | nanu bahu-dina-matrāvasam, samprati dvārakāṁ yāmy eva | tatra mamāvaśyaṁ kiñcit kṛtyam asti | anujñāṁ dehīt yata āha—sva-kṛtehitaḥ svenaiva kṛtaṁ niṣpāditam īhitaṁ cikīrṣitaṁ yasya saḥ tvaṁ kṛta-kartavyo’sīti bhāvaḥ | nirvisarga-pāṭhe sambodhanāntaram, rājasu yojitam aṁhas tat-pitrādi-vadhena vairaṁ yais teṣām  | anujīvino mat-putrān adhunāpi rakṣann atraiva tiṣṭheti bhāvaḥ ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **dvārakāṁ jigamiṣum ālakṣyāha—apy adyeti | he prabho! tvam adya no'smān jihāsasi tyaktvā gantum icchasi | svid iti praśne | nanu tatra kṛtyam asti? tatrāha—svenaiva kṛtam īhitaṁ vāñchitaṁ yasya saḥ, kṛta-kartavyo'sīty arthaḥ | tvad-vikṣāṁ vināsmākaṁ mahad eva duḥkhaṁ bhāvītyāha—yeṣaṁ na ceti | tvayi gate'nyac ca duḥkha-kāraṇaṁ bhāvīty āha—rājasv iti | aṁhas tat-pitrādi-vadha-hetukaṁ vairam iti sarvathātra sthayam ity etad artham etat | tasmān naḥ suhṛdo rakṣann ihaiva nivaseti viyogārtiḥ sūcitā ||37||

 **...**

|| 1.8.38 ||

**ke vayaṁ nāma-rūpābhyāṁ yadubhiḥ saha pāṇḍavāḥ |**

**bhavato’darśanaṁ yarhi hṛṣīkāṇām iveśituḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **yarhi bhavato darśanaṁ tadā yadūnām asmākaṁ nāma-rūpe ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nanu tava bandhavo yadavaḥ putrāś ca pāṇḍavāḥ śūrāḥ samarthāś ca tat kiṁ kārpaṇyaṁ bhāṣase’ta āha—ke vayam iti | yarhi bhavato’drśanaṁ yadā tvam asmān na paśyasi tadā nāma-rūpābhyāṁ nāmnā vikhyātyā rūpeṇa samṛddhayā ca yadubhiḥ pāṇḍavā nāma ke vayaṁ na ke’pi | atitucchā ity arthaḥ | hṛṣīkāṇām indriyāṇām īśitur jīvasyādarśane yathā na kiṁcin nāma ca rūpaṁ ca tadvat ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **pāṇḍavāḥ pāṇḍu-sambandhinaḥ ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu bhīmārjunādayas te putrā mahā-baliṣṭhā eva | rājā tu sākṣād dharma eva | yādavāś ca bāndhavā iti na te kāpi cintā ity ata āha—ke vayam iti | nāmnā khyātyā rūpeṇa sāmarthyena ca | īśitur jīvasyādarśane hṛṣīkāṇāṁ yathā na kiñcin nāma rūpaṁ ca tadvat ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu tava śatravo nihatāḥ, yādavā bāndhavāḥ santi, putrāścātiśūrā dharma-pradhānā dīpyante, tathāpy evaṁ kiṁ bhāṣase? tatrāha—ke vayam iti | bhavato yarhya darśanaṁ yadā tvam asmān na paśyasi tadā nāma-rūpābhyāṁ khyāti-samṛddhibhyāṁ vayaṁ ke? na ke'pīty arthaḥ | asmākaṁ te viphale syātāṁ, yathā hṛṣīkāṇam īśitūrjīvasyādarśane te viphale tadvat | tvad-viyogo'smākaṁ mṛtikalpa iti bhāvaḥ ||38||

 **...**

|| 1.8.39 ||

**neyaṁ śobhiṣyate tatra yathedānīṁ gadādhara |**

**tvat-padair aṅkitā bhāti sva-lakṣaṇa-vilakṣitaiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kiṁ ca, yathedānīm iyam asmat-pālyā bhūmiḥ svaira-sādhāraṇair vajrāṅkuśādibhir lakṣaṇair vilakṣitaiś cihnitais tvat-padair aṅkitā satī bhāti | tatra tadā tvayi nirgate sati na śobhiṣyate ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yadi tvam ito yāsyasi tatra tadā iyaṁ bhūmiḥ sva-lakṣaṇair dhvaja-vajrādibhir vilakṣitair vailakṣaṇyaṁ prāptaiḥ ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kiñca—yadā tvam itaḥ prayāsyasi, tad eyam asmat-pālyā bhūmir na śobhiṣyate yathedānīṁ tvat-padair aṅkitā bhāti śobhate | kīdṛśair ity āha—sveti | svāny asādhāraṇāni yāni dhvaja-vajrāṅkuśādīni lakṣaṇāni cihnāni tair vilakṣitaiś cihnitaiḥ tathā ca tvat-pada-cihna-śūnyāmimāṁ bhūmiṁ paśyatām asmākaṁ duḥkhaṁ mahad-bhāvīti ||39||

 **...**

|| 1.8.40 ||

**ime jana-padāḥ svṛddhāḥ supakvauṣadhi-vīrudhaḥ |**

**vanādri-nady-udanvanto hy edhante tava vīkṣitaiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **api ca ime jana-padā deśāḥ svṛddhāḥ susamṛddhāḥ santaḥ ||40||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ),viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **jana-padādayo'pi tvad-vīkṣaṇādṛte'samṛddhāḥ santaḥ asmān duḥkha-yiṣyanti ||40||

 **...**

|| 1.8.41 ||

**atha viśveśa viśvātman viśva-mūrte svakeṣu me |**

**sneha-pāśam imaṁ chindhi dṛḍhaṁ pāṇḍuṣu vṛṣṇiṣu ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **gamane pāṇḍavānām akuśalam agamane ca yādavānām ity ubhayato vyākula-cittā satī teṣu sneha-nivṛttiṁ prārthayate—atheti | viśveśety-ādi-sambodhanāni sneha-pāśa-cchede sāmarthya-khyāpanāya | dṛḍhaṁ santam ||41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **atheti tair avatāritam | evam apy ubhayeṣāṁ tādṛśa-tad-ekālambanatā-darśanena teṣv adhika-bhagavat-prīty-ādhāratvaṁ svasyādhika-sneha-hetur iti teṣu sneha-ccheda-vyājenobhayeṣām  api tvad-aviccheda eva kriyatām iti ca vyajyate | tataś cottaratra sūta-vākye tāṁ bāḍham ity upāmantryety atra śrī-bhagavad-abhyupagamo’pi sarvatraiva saṅgacchate ||41|| [prīti-sandarbhaḥ 112]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **gamane pāṇḍavānām akuśalam agamane ca yādavānām ity ubhayato vyākula-cittā satī teṣu sneha-nivṛttiṁ prārthayate—atheti | yas tvaṁ sarveṣām eva viśveṣām īśo bhavasi | ātmā cetayitā | tad-rūpo’pi sva-svānuvartināṁ vṛṣṇi-pāṇḍūnāṁ kalyāṇāya kappa-sindhus tvam eva sāvadhānaḥ sadaivāsi | ahaṁ kiṁ tat-kuśala-cintayā vṛthaiva mriye iti bhāvaḥ ||41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kiñ ca—itas tvayi gate pāṇḍavānām agate yadūnāṁ ca paritāpo mahān bhavati, tasmad etān eka-nivāsān kuru, nocet-teṣu teṣu ca dṛḍhaṁ mat-snehapāśaṁ chindhīty āha—atheti | sambodhanāni tat-karaṇa-sāmarthyābhiprāyāṇi ||41||

 **...**

|| 1.8.42 ||

**tvayi me’nanya-viṣayā matir madhu-pate’sakṛt |**

**ratim udvahatād addhā gaṅgevaugham udanvati ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tataḥ kim ? ata āha—tvayīti | **ananya-viṣayā** satī me **matiḥ ratim udvahatāt**, anavacchinnāṁ prītiṁ karotv ity arthaḥ | **oghaṁ** pūram | yathā gaṅgā pratibandhaṁ na gaṇayati, evaṁ matir api vighnān mā gaṇayatv iti bhāvaḥ ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **sambandha-vaśād **anya-viṣayā** **tvayi yā matiḥ** saiva **asakṛd** anavacchedena **ratim udvahatāt** | jātayā ratyā pratibandhaṁ nirākarotv ity arthaḥ | tad etad dṛṣṭāntena spaṣṭayati—**gaṅgevaugham** iti | sā yathā mahā-pravāha-dvārā tathaivety arthaḥ | ubhayor api pratibandhe saty adhikocchalana-kṛti-sāmyāt ||41|| [prīti-sandarbhaḥ 113]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tarhi kiṁ brahma-jñāne spṛhāvatī bhavasi ? vṛṣṇiṣu sneha-cchede mayy api sneha-cchedāt tatra nety āha—tvayīti | **tvayi matiḥ ratiṁ** prītim **ut**karṣeṇa **vahatāt** anavacchinnatayā dadhātu | kiṁ tv **ananya-viṣayā** tvad-bhaktās tvad-abhinnā eva teṣu prītiṁ vinā tvayy api prītir na siddhyet, tvaṁ prasīdasīty api nety ahaṁ jānāmy eva | atas tvattas tvad-bhaktebhyaś cānyatra mamatva-śūnyā | tad api pāṇḍaveṣu yādaveṣu tvad-bhakteṣv api yat snehasya chedaṁ prārthaye tat tvad-avatārāt pūrvata eva deha-sambandhena yo vyavahāra-mayaḥ snehaḥ pravṛttas tasyaiva, na tu tvat-priyatva-nibandhanasya | ata eva bandhakatvena sa mayā pāśa-rūpakeṇa prayukta iti bhāvaḥ | ata eva **gaṅgā yathā udanvaty** akhila-nada-nadīnām āśraye **oghaṁ **pūraṁ **vahati**, tathā **matir **api sarva-bhaktāśrayaṇīye **tvayi ratim** | yathā ca gaṅgā pratibandhaṁ na gaṇayati evaṁ matir api vighnān na gaṇayatv iti bhāvaḥ ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu teṣu ca sneha-pāśa-cchedaṁ yācamānā mayapi tac-chedaṁ yācase? tatrāha—tvayīti | tvad-viyogārtāhaṁ tathākathayaṁ, kintv idaṁ yāce tvayi tat-parikariṇi **matir me ratiṁ** premāṇam **udvahatāt**, tathaivottara-padyārthāt | tathā ca tvad-darśana-viyogo mā bhūd iti ||42||

 **...**

|| 1.8.43 ||

**śrī-kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa-sakha vṛṣṇy-ṛṣabhāvani-dhrug-**

**rājanya-vaṁśa-dahanānapavarga-vīrya |**

**govinda go-dvija-surārti-harāvatāra**

**yogeśvarākhila-guro bhagavan namas te ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **evam abhyarthya punaḥ praṇamati | he śrī-kṛṣṇa, te namaḥ, upakārān anusmarantī bahudhā saṁbodhayati | kṛṣṇa-sakhārjunasya sakhe | vṛṣṇīnām ṛṣabha śreṣṭha | avanyai bhūmyai druhyanti ye rājanyās teṣāṁ vaṁśasya dahana | evam apy anapavarga-vīryākṣīṇa-prabhāva | govinda prāpta-kāma-dhenv-aiśvarya | go-dvija-surāṇām ārti-hāro’vatāro yasyeti ||43||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : govindeti** | nitya-prāpta-parama-golokādhipatyety arthaḥ | yad vā, atha viśveśa [bhā.pu. 1.8.41] ity-ādi-padya-trayasyaivaṁ yojanā, tat-priya-varge sva-sambandha-hetukāṁ prītiṁ niṣidhya śrī-bhagavaty eva tām abhyarthya punas tat-priya-varge tad-ādhāratvenaiva prītim aṅgīkaroti—**atheti** tribhiḥ | tatra niṣedhaḥ prathamena, abhyarthanā dvitīyena, aṅgīkāras tṛtīyena | atra śrī-kṛṣṇa-sakhety-ādi-sambodhanais tat-prīty-ādhāratvenārjunādiṣv api prītir aṅgīkṛtā ||43_|| _[prīti-sandarbhaḥ 114]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **stavānte sarva-sukhadatvena smarantī praṇamati | kṛṣṇasya arjunasya sakhā | **avanyai druhyanti** ye **rājanyāḥ,** teṣāṁ **vaṁśā** eva vaṁśās teṣāṁ **dahana ! anapavarga-vīrya** ! he akṣīṇa-parākrama | he **govinda** ! prāpta-kāma-dhenv-aiśvarya ||43||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **evam akhaṇḍāṁ ratiṁ prārthya sarvānanda-karatvena smarantī praṇamati—he **srī-kṛṣṇa** ! he **kṛṣṇa-sakha** ! phālguna-mitra ! **avani-druhāṁ rājānyānāṁ vaṁśā** eva vaṁśās teṣāṁ **dahana** ! **anapavarga-vīrya** ! akṣīṇa-parākrama! **govinda** ! he labdhānanta-kāma-dhenv-aiśvarya nanda-prasūno ! **bhagavan** te **tubhyaṁ namaḥ** ||43||

 **...**

|| 1.8.44 ||

**sūta uvāca—**

**pṛthayetthaṁ kala-padaiḥ pariṇūtākhilodayaḥ |**

**mandaṁ jahāsa vaikuṇṭho mohayann iva māyayā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : kalāni** madhurāṇi **padāni** yeṣu tair vākyaiḥ **pariṇūtaḥ** stuto’**khila udayo** mahimā yasya saḥ | ṇu stutāv ity asmāt | pariṇuteti vaktavye dīrgha-śabda-chando'nurodhena | **mandam** īṣat | tasya **hāsa** eva **māyā** | vakṣyati hi—hāso janonmāda-karī ca māyā [bhā.pu. 2.1.31] iti ||44||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : pariṇūta-** iti "taudādikaṇū śistavan" ity asya rūpatvena dīrghatvam | **māyayeva mohayann** iti mohana-mātrāṁśe dṛṣṭāntaḥ hāso janonmāda-karī ca māyā [bhā.pu. 2.1.31] iti tu virāḍ-gatam eva | yadi vākyālaṅkāra **iva**-śabdaḥ, tadā māyā-śabdo’pi kṛpā-vācaka eveti | māyā dambhe kṛpāyāṁ ca iti koṣa-kārāḥ ||44||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **pariṇūteti | "taudādikaṇūśi stavana" ity ayaṁ dīrghānta eva | **māyayeva** **mohayan**, na tu māyayā, kintu premṇaivety arthaḥ ||44||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : kalāni** madhurāni **padāni** yeṣu tair vākyaiḥ, **pariṇuteti** "nū stavane" dīrghāntas taudādikaḥ | māyayā kṛpayā mohayann iveti tan-mohasya svābhāvikatvādiva-śabdaḥ | yad vā, māyayeva mohayanna tu māyayā kintu premṇaivety arthaḥ ||44||

 **...**

|| 1.8.45 ||

**tāṁ bāḍham ity upāmantrya praviśya gajasāhvayam |**

**striyaś ca sva-puraṁ yāsyan premṇā rājñā nivāritaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tvayi me’nya-viṣayā matiḥ [bhā.pu. 1.8.42] iti yat prārthitaṁ, tad bāḍham ity aṅgī-kṛtya ratha-sthānād **gaja-sāhvayam** āgatya, paścāt tāṁ cānyāś ca subhadrā-pramukhāḥ striyaḥ **upamāntrya** anujñāpya **sva-puraṁ** **yāsyan** **rājñā** yudhiṣṭhireṇa **premṇā** atraiva kiñcit kālaṁ nivaseti saṁprārthya **nivāritaḥ** ||45||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tvayi me’nya-viṣayā matiḥ [bhā.pu. 1.8.42] iti yat prārthitaṁ, tad bāḍham ity aṅgīkṛtya ratha-sthānāt **gajasāhvayaṁ** pratyāgatya paścāt **tāṁ** ca anyāś ca subhadrā-pramukhāḥ striyaḥ **upāmantrya** anujñāpya **sva-puraṁ** **yāsyan** rājñā yudhiṣṭhireṇa **premṇā** atraiva kañcit kālaṁ nivaseti samprārthya **nivāritaḥ** | tena ca **rājñā** premṇaḥ sarvato’pi vaśīkaraṇatvātiśayo vyañjitaḥ ||45||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **me matis tvayi ratim udvahatād [bhā.pu. 1.8.42] iti yad abhyarthitaṁ, tad bāḍham iti svīkṛtya ratha-sthānād **gajasāhvayaṁ** **praviśya** nyavasat | paścāt **striyaḥ** pṛthā-draupadī-subhadrānyā **upāmantrya** āpṛcchya **sva-puraṁ** **yāsyan** **rājñā** **premṇā** **nivāritaḥ** | ihaiva kañcit kālaṁ nivaseti saṁprārthya sthāpita ity atibalīyāṁs tat-premeti dhvanyate ||45||

 **...**

|| 1.8.46 ||

**vyāsādyair īśvarehājñaiḥ kṛṣṇenādbhuta-karmaṇā |**

**prabodhito’pītihāsair nābudhyata śucārpitaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **atha bhīṣma-niryāṇotsavaṁ vaktum upoddhāta-kathāṁ prastauti | **vyāsādyaiḥ** **prabodhito’pi** śucā vyāptaḥ sann ābudhyata vivekaṁ na prāpa | kutaḥ īśvarehāyā ajñaiḥ | sva-bhakta-bhīṣma-niryāṇa-mahotsavāya rājñā saha kuru-kṣetraṁ gantavyaṁ tatra tan-mukhenaivāyaṁ prabodhanīya ity īśvarābhiprāyaḥ kārya-dvaya-vidhāyakas tam ajānadbhir ity arthaḥ | śrī-kṛṣṇenāpi prabodhito nānbudhyat | atra hetuḥ—adbhuta-karmeṇeti | yathā kuru-pāṇḍava-saṁdhānārthaṁ gato’pi yathocitam eva vadann api vigraham eva dṛḍhī-kṛtavān evam atrāpi prabodhayann abodham eva dṛḍhī-cakārety arthaḥ ||46||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **vyāsādyair iti | nābuddhyata pratyuta śucā vyāpta evāsīd ity arthaḥ | īśvarasya tādṛg-icchayaiva teṣāṁ yuktiḥ pratihata-śaktikā kṛteti svāmy-abhiprāyaḥ | vastutas tv evaṁ vyākhyeyam, yadyapi vyāsādyāḥ rājāyaṁ svopadeśaṁ na maṁsyata iti jānanty eva tathāpy adbhūta-karma-mayyā īśvarehāyā vijñair api sad-dhiḥ sambodhita iti ||46||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yarhy aham idānīm ihaiva sthito’bhūvaṁ tarhy asana-mṛtyu-kālaṁ mad-darśanaṁ vinā martum anicchantaṁ bhīṣmaṁ sva-bhaktam ātmānaṁ sa-parikaram eva sandarśya sukhayāmi | loke tad-utkarṣaṁ khyāpayituṁ tan-mukhenaiva rājānaṁ ca prabodhayāmīti bhagavad-abhiprāyaṁ vyañjayann āha—īśvarasya kṛṣṇasya īhāyā uktala-kṣaṇasya abhiprāyasya ajñair vijñair vā | adbhuta-karmaṇeti idam asyādbhutaṁ karma—yat svayam evāsya hṛdi praviśya avivekam utthāpitavān | bahiś ca sva-kartṛkeṇa vyāsādi-kartṛkeṇāpi prabodhanābodham eva dṛḍhīcakāra | tena ca bhīṣma-mukhoditena tattvena taṁ prabodhya vyāsādibhyo’pi matto’pi mad-ekānta-bhakto bhīṣmo’tiśayena dharma-jñāna-tattvajña iti loke vikhyāpayāmāsa | kiṁ ca, yudhiṣṭhirasya tu tato’pi premādhikyād ādhikyaṁ yat tad-anurodhenaiva dvārakām agacchaṁs tatra sthitaḥ, tata eva tan-nikaṭaṁ gatbā tathā cakre iti vivecanīyam ||46||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **atha bhīṣma-niryāṇotsavaṁ vakṣyann upodghātaṁ prastauti—vyāsādyaiḥ kṛṣṇena ca prabodhito'pi rājā nābudhyata vivekaṁ na gataḥ | īśvarehājñaiḥ īśvarasya bhakta-mahima-vardhane'ti-samarthasya kṛṣṇasyehāṁ niryāṇa-velāyāṁ bhīṣmagre sapārṣadena mayā stheyaṁ, tad-vākair eva rājā prabodhya iti ceṣṭāṁ jānadbhir api tad-iṅgitenopadiśadbhir ity arthaḥ | ajānadbhir iti pakṣe tv atad-guṇa-saṁvijñāno bahubrīhiḥ, vyāsasyeśvaratvena sārvajñyāt | adbhutaṁ taiḥ svena copadiṣṭasya bodho nābhūt, kitvabodho'bhyavardhatety āścaryaṁ karma yasyety arthaḥ ||46||

 **...**

|| 1.8.47 ||

**āha rājā dharma-sutaś cintayan suhṛdāṁ vadham |**

**prākṛtenātmanā viprāḥ sneha-moha-vaśaṁ gataḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **abodham eva prapañcayati—āheti ṣaḍbhiḥ | prākṛtenāviveka-vyāptenātmanā cittena | he viprāḥ ||47||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **abodham eva prapañcayati | prākṛtenaṭmanā cittena vastutas tu tasyātmā hy aprākṛta eveti | tad api prākṛtatvāropo bhagavad-icchayaivokta-prayojanāyeti jñeyam ||47||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **abodhaṁ prapañcayati—āheti | prākṛtena prakṛti-kāryāvivekavatā bhagavad icchodgata-tan-miśritenety arthaḥ | ātmanā cittena ||47||

 **...**

|| 1.8.48 ||

**aho me paśyatājñānaṁ hṛdi rūḍhaṁ durātmanaḥ |**

**pārakyasyaiva dehasya bahvyo me’kṣauhiṇīr hatāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **pārakyasya śva-śṛgālādy-āhārasya dehasyārthe | me mayā | akṣauhiṇīr akṣauhiṇyaḥ | akṣauhiṇī-pramāṇaṁ tu vyāsenoktam—


    akṣauhiṇī prasaṅkhyātā rathānāṁ dvija-sattamāḥ | 


    saṅkhyā-gaṇana-tattva-jñaiḥ sahasrāny eka-viṁśatiḥ || 


    śatāny upari caivāṣṭau tathā bhūyaś ca saptatiḥ | 


    gajānāṁ ca prasaṅkhyānam etad eva prakīrtitam || 


    jñeyaṁ śata-sahasraṁ tu sahasrāni navaiva tu | 


    nārāṇām api pañcāśacchatāni trīṇi caiva hi || 


    pañca-ṣaṣṭhi-sahasrāṇi tathāśvānāṁ śatāni ca | 


    daśottarāṇi ṣaṭ prāhuḥ saṅkhyā-tattva-vido janāḥ |


    etām akṣauhiṇīṁ prāhur yathāvad iha saṅkhyayā || iti ||48||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **pārakyasya śva-śṛgālādy-āhārasya dehasyārthe akṣauhiṇīr akṣauhiṇyo hatāḥ | akṣauhiṇī-pramāṇaṁ vyāsenoktam—


    akṣauhiṇī prasaṅkhyātā rathānāṁ dvija-sattamāḥ | 


    saṅkhyā-gaṇana-tattva-jñaiḥ sahasrāny eka-viṁśatiḥ || 


    śatāny upari caivāṣṭau tathā bhūyaś ca saptatiḥ | 


    gajānāṁ ca prasaṅkhyānam etad eva prakīrtitam || 


    jñeyaṁ śata-sahasraṁ tu sahasrāni navaiva tu | 


    nārāṇām api pañcāśacchatāni trīṇi caiva hi || 


    pañca-ṣaṣṭhi-sahasrāṇi tathāśvānāṁ śatāni ca | 


    daśottarāṇi ṣaṭ prāhuḥ saṅkhyā-tattva-vido janāḥ |


    etām akṣauhiṇīṁ prāhur yathāvad iha saṅkhyayā || iti ||48||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **pārakyasya śva-śṛgālādy āhārasya | akṣauhiṇīr iti prathamārthe dvitīyā | tat-parimāṇaṁ ca śrī-vyāsenoktam—


        akṣauhiṇī prasaṅkhyātā rathānāṁ dvija-sattamāḥ | 


        saṅkhyā-gaṇana-tattvajñaiḥ sahasrāṇy ekaviṁśatiḥ || 


        śatāny upari caivāṣṭau tathā bhūyaś ca saptatiḥ | 


        gajānāṁ ca prasaṅkhyānam etad eva prakīrtitam | 


        jñeyaṁ śatasahasrantu sahasrāṇi navaiva tu | 


        narāṇām api pañcāśacchatāni trīṇi caiva hi || 


        pañca-ṣaṣṭi sahasrāṇi tathāśvānāṁ śatāni ca | 


        daśottarāṇi ṣaṭ prāhuḥ saṅkhyātattvavido janāḥ || 


        etām akṣauhiṇīṁ prāhur yathāvad iha saṅkhyayā | ity etat ||48||

 **...**

|| 1.8.49 ||

**bāla-dvija-suhṛn-mitra- pitṛ-bhrātṛ-guru-druhaḥ |**

**na me syān nirayān mokṣo hy api varṣāyutāyutaiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **suhṛdaḥ saṁbandhinaḥ | mitrāṇi sakhāyaḥ | pitaraḥ pitṛvyāḥ ||49||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : suhṛdaḥ** sambandhinaḥ | **pitaraḥ** pitṛvyāḥ ||49||

 **...**

|| 1.8.50 ||

**naino rājñaḥ prajā-bhartur dharma-yuddhe vadho dviṣām |**

**iti me na tu bodhāya kalpate śāsanaṁ vacaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **smṛty-ādy-anuśāsanād dharma-yuddhe na doṣa iti cet tatrāha—naino rājña iti | dviṣāṁ vadha enaḥ pāpaṁ na bhavatīti yac chāsanaṁ śikṣā-rūpaṁ vacaḥ | kuto na kalpyate | yatas tad vacaḥ prajā-bhartur eva | ayaṁ bhāvaḥ—sva-prajānām anyato vādhe prasakte tad vadho’nujñātaḥ duryodhanena tu prajāyāṁ pālyamānāyāṁ mayā kevalaṁ rājya-lobhena hatatvāt pāpam evedam iti ||50||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **naina iti | rājñā dharma-yuddhe dviṣāṁ vadhaḥ enaḥ pāpaṁ na bhavatīti yat śāsanaṁ vacaḥ tat tu na me bodhāya kalpate | yataḥ tad-vacaḥ prajāḥ pālayantam eva rājānaṁ prati na tu lubdhaṁ pratīti vākyārthaḥ | bhāvārthas tu ṭīkāvad eva ||50||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **dviṣāṁ vadhaḥ, enaḥ pāpaṁ na bhavatīti yat śāsanaṁ śikṣā-rūpaṁ vacaḥ kuto na kalpate yatas tad-vacaḥ prajā-bhartur eva | ayaṁ bhāvaḥ, sva-prajānām anyato vadhe prasakte tad-vadho’nujñātaḥ, duryodhanena tu prajāyāṁ pālyamānāyāṁ mayā kevalaṁ rājya-lobhena hatatvāt pāpam evedaṁ mama jātam iti ||50||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yuddhe dviṣāṁ vadho rājña enaḥ pāpaṁ na bhavatīti śāsanaṁ śikṣā-rūpaṁ yad-dharma-śāstrīyaṁ vacas tan me bodhāya na kalpate, yatas tad-vacaḥ prajā-bhartur eva | ayam āśayaḥ—prajā-pīḍakān dviṣaḥ prajā-pālanāya dharma-yuddhe nighnato rājñaḥ pāpaṁ na syāt, ahantu tat-pālakān eva duryodhanādīn rājyalobhena hatavāniti kathaṁ pāpaṁ me nābhūd iti ||50||

 **...**

|| 1.8.51 ||

**strīṇāṁ mad-dhata-bandhūnāṁ droho yo’sāv ihotthitaḥ |**

**karmabhir gṛhamedhīyair nāhaṁ kalpo vyapohitum ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kiṁ ca, yuddhe puṁsāṁvadho bhavatu nāma dharmaḥ. strīṇāṁ tu mayā hatā bandhavo yāsāṁ tāsāṁ yo’sau droho’nuddiṣṭo’py utthitas taṁ vyapohitum apākartuṁ kalpaḥ samartho nāham | gṛha-medhīyair gṛhāśrama-vihitaiḥ ||51||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **mayā hatā bandhavo yāsāṁ tāsām | kalpaḥ samarthaḥ ||51||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu dviṣāṁ puṁsāṁ yuddhe vadho bhavatu dharmaḥ, mad-dhata-bandhūnāṁ strīṇāṁ yo'nuddiṣṭo'pi drohaḥ samutthitaḥ, taṁ vyapohituṁ nirākartuṁ gṛhamedhīyair gṛhāśramoddeśena vihitair agnihotrādibhir nāhaṁ kalpaḥ samartho'smi | tasmāt pāpiṣṭho'ham ||51||

 **...**

|| 1.8.52 ||

**yathā paṅkena paṅkāmbhaḥ surayā vā surākṛtam |**

**bhūta-hatyāṁ tathaivaikāṁ na yajñair mārṣṭum arhati ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nanu sarvaṁ pāpmānaṁ tarati, tarati brahma-hatyāṁ yo’śvamedhena yajate, ya u cainam evaṁ veda iti śruteḥ pāpam aśvamedhena naśyed evety āśaṅkyāviveka-vijṛmbhitaṁ hetu-vādam āśritya nirākaroti—yatheti | yathā ghana-paṅkena paṅkāmbho na mṛjyate, yathā vā surā-leśa-kṛtam apavitryaṁ bahvyā surayā na mṛjyate tasyaiva bhūta-hatyām ekāṁ pramādato jātāṁ buddhir pūrva-hiṁsā-prāyair yajñair mārṣṭuṁ śodhayituṁ nārhatīti ||52||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu ca sarvaṁ pāpmānaṁ tarati tarati tarati brahmahatyāṁ yo’śvamedhena yajate iti śruteḥ pāpam aśvamedhena naśyed iti cet tatrāha, yathā ghana-paṅkena paṅkāmbho na mṛjyate, yathā vā surāleśa-kṛtam apāvitryaṁ bahvyā surayā na mṛjyate | yajñaiḥ buddhi-pūrvaka-hiṁsā-prāyair bahubhir yajñaiḥ ||52||

iti sārārtha-darśinyāṁ harṣiṇyāṁ bhakta-cetasām |

prathame’ṣṭamo’dhyāyaḥ saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām ||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu sarvaṁ pāpnānaṁ tarati brahma-hatyāṁ yo'śvamedhena yajeta, ya u vainam evaṁ veda iti śravaṇāt aśvamedhena nikhila-pāpanāśāttava paritāpo nocita iti ced, aśvamedhasyāpi bahu-hiṁsā-miśratvena pāpa-hetutvāt na tena tan-nāśa ity āha—yatheti | paṅkena yathā paṅkānto na mṛjyate, surālavakṛtam apāvitryaṁ yathā surayā bahvyā na mṛjyate, tathā dhī-pūrvaka-hiṁsā-pracurair anekair yajñair ekāṁ bhūta-hatyāṁ pramādād api jātāṁ mārṣṭuṁ jano nārhati | hetu-vāda-vijṛmbhito'yam avivekaḥ ||52||

iti śrī-vaiṣṇavānandinyāṁ prathama-skandha-ṭippanyāṁ aṣṭamo'dhyāyaḥ ||8||

 **...**

iti śrīmad-bhāgavate mahā-purāṇe prathama-skandhe

kuntī-stuti-yudhiṣṭhirānutāpo nāma

aṣṭamo’dhyāyaḥ

||8||



**...**

 

(1.9)


## navamo’dhyāyaḥ


### yudhiṣṭhirādīnāṁ bhīṣma-samīpe gamanam, tatra vividhān dharmān upadiśya śrī-kṛṣṇa-stavana-pūrvakaṁ bhīṣmasya mahā-prasthānaṁ ca |

|| 1.9.1 ||

**sūta uvāca—**

**iti bhītaḥ prajā-drohāt sarva-dharma-vivitsayā |**

**tato vinaśanaṁ**[^68]** prāgād yatra deva-vrato’patat ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :**

yudhiṣṭhirāya bhīṣmeṇa sarva-dharma-nirūpaṇam |

kṛṣṇa-stutiś ca muktiś ca navame tasya varṇyate ||

yad-arthaṁ tasyāvivekaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇena saṁvardhitas tad darśayati—itīti | sarveṣāṁ dharmānāṁ vivitsayā veditum icchayā | **vinaśanaṁ** kuru-kṣetram | **deva-vrato** bhīṣmaḥ ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **śrī-bhīṣma-mahima-darśanārthaṁ bhagavad-icchayaiva tat-tat-prabhāva-varaṇam api jātam ity āha—**iti bhīta** iti caturbhiḥ ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** 

navame svaprabhuṁ bhīṣmo dadarśātha tad-ājñayā |

dharmān uktvā bahu stutvā tam eva prāpa bhaktitaḥ ||

yadyapi tavāviveko nāpayāti, tadā sarva-dharma-tattvajñaṁ bhīṣmam api pṛccheti yuktir yadā sarva-sammatā’bhūt, tadā rājā tatraiva yayāv ity āha—**iti** iti | **vivitsayā** vicārecchayā | **vinaśanaṁ** kurukṣetram | **devavrato** bhīṣmaḥ ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :**

dadarśa kṛṣṇaṁ provāca dharmān tuṣṭāva taṁ vibhum | \
bhīṣmas tam eva prāpeti navame parikīrtitam || \


vyāsādibhir mayā copadiṣṭasyāpi tava ced aviveko nāpayāti, tadā sarva-dharma-svarūpa-vidaṁ tvad-atihitaṁ bhīṣmam api pṛccheti prokto rājā tadā tad-antikaṁ jagāmety āha—**itīti** | **vinaśanaṁ** kurukṣetram ||1-2||

**...**

|| 1.9.2 ||

**tadā te**[^69]** bhrātaraḥ sarve sad-aśvaiḥ svarṇa-bhūṣitaiḥ |**

**anvagacchan rathair viprā vyāsa-dhaumyādayas tathā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : santaḥ** śreṣṭhā **aśvā** yeṣu, tai rathaiḥ ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī), baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

**...**

|| 1.9.3 ||

**bhagavān api viprarṣe rathena sa-dhanañjayaḥ |**

**sa tair vyarocata nṛpaḥ kuvera iva guhyakaiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **+++

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : bhagavān apy** anvagacchat ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : bhagavān apy agacchat**, **sa nṛpo** yudhiṣṭhiraḥ **tair** bhrātṛbhiḥ ||3-4||

**...**

|| 1.9.4 ||

**dṛṣṭvā nipatitaṁ bhūmau divaś cyutam ivāmaram |**

**praṇemuḥ pāṇḍavā bhīṣmaṁ sānugāḥ saha cakriṇā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : sānugāḥ** parivāra-sahitāḥ ||4||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī), baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

**...**

|| 1.9.5 ||

**tatra brahmarṣayaḥ sarve devarṣayaś ca sattama**[^70]** |**

**rājarṣayaś ca tatrāsan draṣṭuṁ bharata-puṅgavam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : tatra** tadā **tatrāsan,** tat-kṣaṇam evāgatā ity arthaḥ | **bharata-puṅgavaṁ** bhīṣmam ||5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : bharata-puṅgavaṁ** bhīṣmam ||5||

**...**

|| 1.9.6-8 ||

**parvato nārado dhaumyo bhagavān bādarāyaṇaḥ |**

**bṛhadaśvo bharadvājaḥ sa-śiṣyo reṇukā-sutaḥ ||**

**vasiṣṭha indrapramadas trito gṛtsamado’sitaḥ |**

**kakṣīvān gautamo’triś ca kauśiko’tha sudarśanaḥ ||**

**anye ca munayo brahman brahmarātādayo’malāḥ |**

**śiṣyair upetā ājagmuḥ kaśyapāṅgirasādayaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī), baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : reṇukā-sutaḥ** paraśurāmaḥ ||6|| **brahma-rātaḥ** śukaḥ | **āṅgiraso** bṛhaspatiḥ ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

**...**

|| 1.9.9 ||

**tān sametān mahā-bhāgān upalabhya vasūttamaḥ |**

**pūjayāmāsa dharmajño deśa-kāla-vibhāgavit ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : vasūttamo** bhīṣmaḥ | **deśa-kāla-vibhāga-vid** ity utthātum aśakyatvāc chayāna eva manasā vācā ca **pūjayāmāsa** ity abhiprāyaḥ ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : vasūttamo** bhīṣmaḥ ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : vasūttamo** bhīṣmaḥ, tadānīm ucitāṁ pūjāṁ vyadhāt ||9||

**...**

|| 1.9.10 ||

**kṛṣṇaṁ ca tat-prabhāva-jña āsīnaṁ jagad-īśvaram |**

**hṛdi-sthaṁ pūjayāmāsa māyayopātta-vigraham ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : hṛdi-sthaṁ** santaṁ purataś cāsīnaṁ **pūjayāmāsa** ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : kṛṣṇam** iti | sadā sveṣāṁ **hṛdi-sthaṁ** hṛdayastham api **māyayā** kṛpayā **upa** netra-samīpe’pi **ātta** ānīto **vigraho** yena, tam ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : māyayā** eva **upātto** gṛhīto **vigraho** yudhiṣṭhireṇa sārdhaṁ prabodhāprabodha-hetuko vivādo yena tam | yad vā, **māyayā** kṛpayā **upa** netra-samīpe **ānīto** nija-deho yena, tam ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : tat-prabhāvajñaḥ** kṛṣṇa-pāramaiśvarya-vit, **māyayā** kṛpayā **upa** netra-samīpe **ātta** ānīto **vigrahaḥ** sva-mūrtir yena, tam | yad vā, **māyayā** eva triguṇayā **upātto** gṛhīto **vigraho** yudhiṣṭhireṇa sārdhaṁ bodhābodha-nimittako vivādo yena, tam | vigrahaḥ samare kāye vistāra-pravibhāgayoḥ iti viśvaḥ | yat tu māyika-mūrtikatvam āhuḥ, tad asat | tam ekaṁ govindaṁ sac-cid ānanda-vigraham [go.tā.u. 1.37] iti śruti-vyākopāt | tvayy eva nitya-sukha-bodha-tanāv anante [bhā.pu. 10.14.22] iti smṛteś ca ||10||

**...**

|| 1.9.11 ||

**pāṇḍu-putrān upāsīnān praśraya-prema-saṅgatān |**

**abhyācaṣṭānurāgāsrair andhībhūtena cakṣuṣā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : upāsīnān** samīpe upaviṣṭān | **praśrayo** vinayaḥ, **prema** snehaḥ, tābhyāṁ **saṅgatān** upasannān | pāṭhāntare[^71] tābhyām avanatān | **abhyācaṣṭa** abhyabhāṣata | **anurāgāḥ,** taiḥ snehāśrubhir **andhī-bhūtena** **cakṣuṣā** upalakṣitaḥ ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **yayā bhīṣmādīnāṁ svāparādha-manana-śaṅkayā munīnāṁ svasyāpi śikṣaṇena yudhiṣṭhiro na śāmyati sma, tām eva śaṅkāṁ tasmiṁs tasya snigdhatā-darśanayā tad-dvārā droṇādīnām api tathā-bhāva-vyañjanayā dūrīkartuṁ tat-sannidhāv ānītavān so’yaṁ śrī-bhagavān iti pūrvābhiprāyam eva vyaktīkartum āha—**pāṇḍu-putrān** iti ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : abhyācaṣṭa** abhyabhāṣata ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : abhyacaṣṭa** praikṣata ||11|| 

**...**

|| 1.9.12 ||

**aho kaṣṭam aho’nyāyyaṁ yad yūyaṁ dharma-nandanāḥ |**

**jīvituṁ nārhatha kliṣṭaṁ vipra-dharmācyutāśrayāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **abhibhāṣaṇam āha—**aho** ity ekādaśabhiḥ | he **dharma-nandanāḥ** ! **kliṣṭaṁ** yathā bhavati, evaṁ **jīvituṁ nārhatha** **yūyam** iti **yad** etad **aho kaṣṭaṁ** jugupsitam | **aho anyāyyaṁ **caitat | **yato** **yūyaṁ** **viprā** **dharmo’cyutaś cāśrayo** yeṣāṁ te ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : aho kaṣṭam** iti taiḥ | tatra iti **yad** iti tad etad yad bhavad-vicāritam ity arthaḥ | tato viprādīnāṁ hiṁsā-bhrāntyā mā kleśaṁ manyasveti bhāvaḥ | **vipra-dharmeti** ṣaṣṭhī-tat-puruṣo vā | yad vā, **dharma-nandanā** api yad yūyaṁ jīvituṁ yogyā na bhavāmeti manyadhve, tad aho kaṣṭam anyāyyaṁ ca | tatrāpi **vipra-dharmācyutānām āśrayā** api yūyaṁ yat tathā manyadhve, tataś ca kliṣṭam iti pūrvavad evānyāyyaṁ kaṣṭaṁ cety arthaḥ | yūyam iti śrī-yudhiṣṭhiraṁ praty eva gauravataḥ sambodhanam ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **aho kaṣṭam aho’nyāyyam iti rājany atideśa evānyāya-kaṣṭe khalu na sambhavatas tat kim atrārthe sarva-viśva-sthiti-kartari viṣṇāv evānyāyaḥ samabhūd iti bhāvaḥ | **kliṣṭaṁ** yathā syāt, tathā **yūyaṁ jīvituṁ nārhatha**, anye tathā jīvanti cet jīvantv iti bhāvaḥ ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tān vilokayaṁs teṣāṁ kaṣṭa-hetuṁ tāvad durvibhāvyam āha—**aho kaṣṭam** iti | he **dharma-nandanāḥ kliṣṭaṁ** yathā syād, evaṁ **yūyaṁ jīvituṁ nārhatha**, yato **viprādy-āśrayāḥ **||12||

**...**

|| 1.9.13 ||

**saṁsthite’tirathe pāṇḍau pṛthā bāla-prajā vadhūḥ |**

**yuṣmat-kṛte bahūn kleśān prāptā tokavatī muhuḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kiṁ ca, **saṁsthite** mṛte | **bālāḥ prajāḥ** putrā yasyāḥ sā | **vadhūś** ceti dainyaṁ pradarśitam | **tokāny** apatyāni, **tadvatī** | apatyaiḥ saha **kleśān prāptā** ity arthaḥ ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu kiṁ kliṣṭaṁ ? tatrāha—**saṁsthite** mṛte | **bāla-prajā** iti bāla-prajātva-daśāyām ekākiny eva **kleśān prāptā** | **yuṣmākaṁ** prauḍha-vayastve sati tu **tokavatī** putrair yuṣmābhiḥ sahitāpi kaṣṭān prāptety arthaḥ ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kaṣṭam āha—**saṁsthite** mṛte sati | **bāla-prajā vadhūr** iti dainyaṁ pradarśitaṁ, tādṛśī **bahūn kleśān prāptā**, **tokavatī** ca prauḍhaiḥ yuṣmābhiḥ putraiḥ sahitāpi tān muhuḥ prāpteti ||13||

**...**

|| 1.9.14 ||

**sarvaṁ kāla-kṛtaṁ manye bhavatāṁ ca yad apriyam |**

**sa-pālo**[^72]** yad-vaśe loko vāyor iva ghanāvaliḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kāla-kṛtatvena śokaṁ vārayati—**sarvam** iti dvābhyām | **bhavatām** api | **yad-vaśo** yasya vaśa-vartī ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu tarhi katham asmākaṁ kleśaḥ ? tatra tat-kāraṇaṁ prācīnārvācīnaṁ kim api pāpam apaśyan vaktum asamartha eva lokokti-rītyaivāha—**sarvam** iti | nanu, kālo hi prārabdha-sukha-duḥkha-bhogayor evādhikaraṇam eveti sahakāritvād upacāreṇaiva **kāla-kṛtaṁ manye** iti brūṣe | prārabdha-pāpa-kṛtam iti spaṣṭaṁ kathaṁ na vadasi ? ity ata āha—**bhavatāṁ** **ca** iti | yudhiṣṭhiro hi sākṣād-dharmāvatāra iti prasiddha eva | dharmasyāpi prārabdhaṁ pāpam astīti cen mantavyaṁ, tarhi kathaṁ dharmasya dharmatvam ? ato’tiprabalo’tidurnivāro dustarkaḥ kāla eva kāraṇam ity āha—**sa-pāla** iti ||14||

**sarvaṁ kāla-kṛtaṁ manye bhavatāṁ ca yad apriyam |**

**sa-pālo**[^73]** yad-vaśe loko vāyor iva ghanāvaliḥ ||**

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu sarvajño'pi tvam anirṇītaṁ kim iti brūṣe, tatra kiñcit kāraṇaṁ brūhīti cet, lokoktim āśrītya tāvad āha—sarvam iti | bhavatāṁ ca kṛṣṇaikāntinām api yad apriyaṁ pratikūlyaṁ kālasya prabhāvam āha—seti ||14||

**...**

|| 1.9.15 ||

**yatra dharma-suto rājā gadā-pāṇir vṛkodaraḥ |**

**kṛṣṇo’strī gāṇḍivaṁ cāpaṁ suhṛt kṛṣṇas tato vipat ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **aho durghaṭa-ghaṭanā-paṭuḥ kāla ity āha—yatreti | kṛṣṇo’rjunaḥ astrī dhanvī | tatas tatrāpi vipat | puṇya-śarīra-balāstra-naipuṇya-śastra-deva-saṁpattāv apīty arthaḥ ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **yady asmākaṁ vipattiṁ kala-kṛtām amatvā sva-kṛtām eva tu matvā duḥkhaṁ labhase, tarhi kathaṁ bhavatāṁ sā jātā ? ity abhipretyāha—**yatra** iti ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** nanu, 


    na karhicin mat-parāḥ śānta-rūpe 


    naṅkṣyanti no me’nimiṣo leḍhi hetiḥ | 


    yeṣām  ahaṁ priya ātma sutaś ca 


    sakhā guruḥ suhṛdo daivam iṣṭam || [bhā.pu. 3.25.37] 

iti kapila-devokteḥ kṛṣṇe dāsya-sakhya-vātsalyavataḥ pāṇḍavān kathaṁ kālo’tikrameta ? ity ato’tivismayānvitaḥ kāraṇaṁ vinaiva karmotpatti-rūpaṁ vibhāvanālaṅkāraṁ[^74] bhāvayann āha—**yatra** iti | **kṛṣṇo**’rjunaḥ **astrī** dhanvī | **tatas** tatrāpi **vipat** puṇya-bala-śarīra-bala-naipuṇya-bala-śastra-bala-suhṛd-bala-sampattāv apīty arthaḥ ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **durghaṭa-ghaṭakatvaṁ kālasyāha—**yatra** yuṣmat-pakṣe, **kṛṣṇo**'rjunaḥ, **astrī** dhanvī, **tatas** tatrāpi sampat-kāraṇeṣu satsv api saṁpannābhūd iti viśeṣoktir alaṅkāraḥ | viśeṣoktiḥ kāraṇeṣu satsu kāryā vaco matā iti tal-lakṣaṇāt ||15||

**...**

|| 1.9.16 ||

**na hy asya karhicid rājan pumān veda vidhitsitam |**

**yad-vijijñāsayā yuktā muhyanti kavayo’pi hi ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **


    asaṅgaś cāvyayo’bhedyo’nigrāhyo’śoṣya eva ca |


    viddho’sṛg-añcito baddha iti viṣṇuḥ pradarśyate ||


    asurān mohayan devaḥ krīḍayaiva sureṣv api |


    mānuṣān madhyayā dṛṣṭyā na mukteṣu kathañcana || iti skānde ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nanu kṛṣṇaṁ kathaṁ kālo’tikramet ? ity apekṣāyām āha—**na hy asya** śrī-kṛṣṇasyety aṅgulyā nirdiśati | **vidhitsitaṁ** kartum iṣṭaṁ yat | **yasya vidhitsitaṁ tasya jijñāsayā** ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **na hīti | atra teṣām  ārti-dvāreṇa svasminn āveśārthaṁ tat-khaṇḍana-janita-harṣa-dvāreṇa ca svasmin prema-vardhanārthaṁ tathā **vidhitsitam** iti gūḍho’bhiprāyaḥ ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tarhy atra kiṁ nirdhārayāmi ? sāmānyatas tāvad ayaṁ siddhāntaḥ sarva-vādi-sammato yat kṛṣṇasya cikīrṣitam anyathā-kartuṁ na ko’pi samarthaḥ | tac cikīrṣitaṁ kim iti adyāpi ko’pi na vetti ? ity āha—**na hy asya **iti | **karhicid** api kāle “ko’pi **pumān** brahma-bhavādiḥ ko’pi na veda, ahaṁ ko varākaḥ ?” iti bhāvaḥ | 

nanu ko’pi mā jānātu, jijñāsā tu avaśyam eva jāyate | tatrāsmāsu duḥkha-dānam eva kiṁ cikīrṣitam ? sukha-dānam eva vā ? ubhaya-dānam eva vā ? tatrādyaṁ na, bhakta-vātsalya-guṇasya lopānaucityāt | dvitīyam api na, adṛṣṭatvād eva | tṛtīyam api na, tat-sauhārda-lopāpatteḥ | tarhi jijñāsām api naiva kartum uciteti vinirṇayann āha—**yad-vijijñāsayā** iti | **yuktā** vivekino’pi **kavayaḥ** sarva-śāstra-jñā api **moham **eva** prāpnuvanti **siddhāntālābhād iti bhāvaḥ | atra bhīṣmasya mahā-vijñasyoktau **kavaya** iti **muhyanti** iti padābhyāṁ yudhiṣṭhirādayo’pi bhagavad-bhaktāḥ prārabdhaṁ bhuñjate iti mataṁ parāstam ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **atha sva-matam āha—**na hy asya** iti | **asya** kṛṣṇasya **vidhitsitaṁ** cikīrṣitaṁ **karhicid** api kāle **pumān** brahmādir api **na veda**, kim idaṁ vidhitsatīti na jānāti | nanu na vettu ko'pi, jijñāsā tu jāyate? tatrāha—yad iti | **yuktā** yoginaḥ **kavayo** vidvāṁso'pi | etad uktaṁ bhavati—na khalu bhavatāṁ kaṣṭaṁ prārabdha-racitaṁ śakyaṁ vaktuṁ kṛṣṇaikāntiṣu tad-vallabhatvāt, tasya pāpāṁśa-miśratvena tadvati yudhiṣṭhire dharmatva-virodhāt | na ca kāla-racitaṁ tat, kṛṣṇa-nātheṣu bhavatsu tad-vallabhatvāt, jñaḥ kāla-kālo guṇī sarva-vid yaḥ [śve.u. 6.2] iti mantra-varṇāt kāla-kṛtam ity atra kāla-śakti-matā kṛṣṇenety arthāt | sva-kāla-śaktyā [bhā.pu. 10.1.22] iti vakṣyamāṇāt, tasmāt kṛṣṇādhīnaṁ bhavatāṁ kaṣṭaṁ, tvad avagamī na vetti bhavad-uttha-śubhāśubhayor guṇa-viguṇānvayaṁs tarhi deha-bhṛtāṁ ca giraḥ [bhā.pu. 10.87.40] iti śruti-stotre bhavad-utthety upādānāt | **na ca tad-vijijñāsāpi yuktā**, tayā **kavīnām** api **mohāt**, tathā hi—tasya bhavatsu duḥkha-dānaṁ sukha-dānam ubhaya-dānaṁ vā vidhitsitam? nādyaḥ, bhakta-vatsalya-hānāt, na madhyaḥ, adarśanāt, nāntyaḥ, sauhārda-vilopāt ||16||

**...**

|| 1.9.17 ||

**tasmād idaṁ daiva-tantraṁ vyavasya bharatarṣabha |**

**tasyānuvihito’nāthā nātha pāhi prajāḥ prabho ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : idaṁ** sukha-duḥkhādi **daiva-tantram** īśvarādhīnaṁ **vyavasya** niścitya **tasya** īśvarasya **anuvihito**’nuvartī san | kartari ktaḥ | he **nātha** ! kula-paramparā-gata-svāmin, **prabho** samartha, **anāthāḥ** prajāḥ **pāhi** ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : tasmād** asya ajñānusārāt ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : idaṁ** sukha-duḥkhādikaṁ **daiva-tantram** īśvarādhīnam eva **vyavasya** niścitya, kintu tad-vidhitsitasya durjñeyatokteḥ sva-bhaktāya tat-pradānādikaṁ durjñeya-prayojanakam ity api niścitya, **tasya** kṛṣṇasya **anuvihito**’nugataḥ hi gatau **anāthāḥ** prajāḥ **pāhi** ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tasmād vicārād virantavyaṁ, yatheṣṭaṁ sa karotu, suvṛttiḥ prapattis tu kāryety āha—tasmād iti | **daiva-tantram** īśādhīnaṁ **vyavasya** niścitya tasya daivasya **anuvihito**'nuvartī san **prajāḥ pāhi** | **anāthā** hata-nāthāḥ he **nātha** ! svāmin ! he **prabho** ! tat-pālane samartha ! dharma-rāja ! ||17||

**...**

|| 1.9.18 ||

**eṣa vai bhagavān sākṣād ādyo nārāyaṇaḥ pumān |**

**mohayan māyayā lokaṁ gūḍhaś carati vṛṣṇiṣu ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **anuvidheyaḥ parameśvarasya śrī-kṛṣṇa evety āha | **eṣa** eva **bhagavān** sarveśvaraḥ | yata **ādyaḥ** **pumān** | tac ca kutaḥ ? yato **nārāyaṇaḥ sakṣāt** ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **na ca nara-līlā-dṛṣṭyā sādhāraṇa-dṛṣṭir atra kartavyety āha—**eṣa** iti | **sākṣād** eva svayaṁ **bhagavān** | yaḥ sva-lavādyaḥ **pumān** mahat-sraṣṭā so’py ayam eva yaś ca **ādyo** **nārāyaṇaḥ** parama-vyomādhipatiḥ, so’pīti ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanv īśvarādhīnam iti tad-vidhitsitaṁ tu na vedety-ādi kathaṁ brūṣe ? īśvaraḥ samprati tava sākṣād-varty eva ity ata imaṁ kṛṣṇam eva pṛṣṭvā kathaṁ sarvaṁ tattvaṁ na vetsi ? ity ata āha—**eṣa** iti | **māyayā mohayann** iti pṛṣṭo hi bhīṣmād api kim aham atitattvajña ity-ādi vācā vañcayan na vakṣyati | kathañcid vadann api mohayiṣyaty eva ity asāv anuvartanīya eva, na tu jijñāsanīya iti bhāvaḥ ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu kṛṣṇaikāntino'smād anyad anuvidheyaṁ, daivaṁ kim ity upadiśasi? tatrāha—**eṣa** iti | **ādyo nārāyaṇaḥ** pañcaviṁśati-tattvāśrayaḥ, tatrāpi **sākṣād bhagavān** svayaṁ-rūpas tasyāpy aṁśīty arthaḥ | nanv evam anye naivāhur iti cet, tatrāha—**mohayann** iti | tad-eka-niṣṭhās tv āhur eveti bhāvaḥ ||18||

**...**

|| 1.9.19 ||

**asyānubhāvaṁ bhagavān veda guhyatamaṁ śivaḥ |**

**devarṣir nāradaḥ sākṣād bhagavān kapilo nṛpa ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tad upapādayati—asyeti | **anubhāvaṁ** prabhāvam ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kiṁ ca, **asyānubhāvaṁ** bhāva-bodhakaṁ ceṣṭā-viśeṣaṁ **śivo veda**, na tu vidhitsitaṁ svarūpaṁ prabhāvaṁ vety arthaḥ | tathā hi rasa-śāstrajñaḥ prathamam anubhāvaṁ stambha-sveda-romāñcādikaṁ veda | tena ca sthāyi-bhāvaṁ ca anubhāvasya vaiśiṣṭya-tāratamyābhyāṁ sthāyi-bhāvasyāpi vaiśiṣṭya-tāratamyaṁ ca | tathaiva yaśodādi-gopīṣu asya dāma-bandhanādi-rūpam arjuna-yudhiṣṭhirograsenādi-sārathya-dāsyādi-rūpaṁ ca pāravaśyam anubhāvaṁ veda | tena ca asya sarveśvarasya sarva-niyantuḥ mahā-svatantrasyāpi vaśīkārakaḥ ko’pi padārtha-viśeṣaḥ, tatra tatra vartamāno’syāpi cittam abhīkṣṇaṁ vidrutī-kurvann adhyāste ity anumimīte ca | sa ca nana-viśeṣavān sva-viṣayāśrayayoś ceto-vidrāvakaḥ paraspara-vaśīkārakaś ca premābhidhāna eva parama-puruṣārtha-cūḍāmaṇiḥ bhakti-snehānurāgādi-śabdair ucyamāno bhavati | 

kiṁ ca, tat-taj-janakeneṣṭena pratisamaya-dṛṣṭena asya vaśīkārādhikyam eva dṛṣṭvā tena ca premādhikyam anumāya siddha-sādhaka-bhakteṣu etat-kartṛkam eva kaṣṭa-pradānaṁ bhakti-vṛddhy-artham eveti siddhāntaṁ niścinoti ca śiva eva nārada eva kapila-deva eveti | ata eva draupady-ādiṣu kaṣṭādhikyāt premādhikyaṁ ca dṛṣṭam | tathā, 


    yasyāham anugṛhṇāmi hariṣye tad-dhanaṁ śanaiḥ | 


    tato’dhanaṁ tyajanty asya svajanā duḥkha-duḥkhitam || [bhā.pu. 10.88.8]

ity-ādi śrī-mukha-vākyena ca bhakta-kaṣṭasya hitaiṣiṇā bhagavataiva dīyamānatvāt na karmārabdhatvam | kiṁ caitad api na sārvatrikaṁ kvacit kvacid akaṣṭenāpi sva-bhakta-bhaktiṁ vardhayatīti vidhitsitaṁ tu na ko’pi vedety uktam | anubhāvaṁ tu śiva-nāradādir eva veda | anye punar mandā dāma-bandhanādikam apy anukaraṇatvena vyācakṣāṇā anubhāvam api na vidur iti ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tān darśayati—asyeti | guhyatamam anubhāvaṁ prabhāvaṁ mahaiśvarya-lakṣaṇaṁ vidhitsitaṁ tu na ko'pīti bhāvaḥ | kvacid-bhaktasya sarvasvam apahṛtya svasmiṁs tat-premāṇaṁ kvacid akaṣṭena bhaktaṁ tat-premāṇaṁ ca vardhayatas tasya prasiddhaḥ | sākṣād-vedeti sambandhaḥ | kapilo bhagavān kārdamiḥ ||19||

**...**

|| 1.9.20 ||

**yaṁ manyase mātuleyaṁ priyaṁ mitraṁ suhṛttamam |**

**akaroḥ sacivaṁ dūtaṁ sauhṛdād atha sārathim ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tvam ajñānād **yam** evaṁ **manyase** | **mātuleyaṁ** devakyāḥ sutam | **priyaṁ** prīti-viṣayam | **mitraṁ** prīti-kartāram | **suhṛttamam** upakārānapekṣyopakārakaṁ ca | **sauhṛdād** viśvāsāt | **akaroḥ** kṛtavān asi | **sacivaṁ** mantriṇam ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **asyānubhāva-jñāna-sad-bhāvavatām api bhavatāṁ sambandha-viśeṣa-maya-sarvācchādaka-mādhurya-jñānātmaka-prema-viśeṣeṇa vaśīkāritvaṁ tu tair api durlabham ity āha—yam iti trayeṇa | **sauhṛdāt** tādṛśa-premṇa eva hetoḥ, **yaṁ mātuleyaṁ manyase** | **atha sārathiṁ** sārathim apīty arthaḥ | sa eva sākṣād bhagavān ity-ādi-pūrveṇānvayaḥ | ṭīkāyāṁ mātuleyāḥ ity-ādikaṁ strībhyo ḍhak-siddhārtham itthaṁ vyākhyātam | mātulasyāpatyaṁ mātulāyanir ity eva syāt, vṛddhād apatye phis | evaṁ sambhavāt ||20|| [prīti-sandarbha 95]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **anubhāvam eva darśayati—yam iti | sarveśvarasyāpi yuṣmat-sacivatva-dautyādikaṁ prema-vaśyatvānubhāva ity arthaḥ | atra yam ity asya asyānubhāvam ity anena pūrveṇaivānvayaḥ ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yat kvacit svaikāntiṣu kaṣṭa-pradānaṁ, tat-tu tad-viṣayaka-aniṣṭhaṁ sauhṛdam anubhāvayitum eveti bhāvenāha—yam iti | sarvasya śaraṇaṁ suhṛt [śve.u. 17] iti mantra-varṇāt | tad vinā sarveśvaraṁ taṁ tathā kaḥ śaknuyān mantum iti bhaktānandārtham eva tat-pradānam iti bhāvaḥ ||20||

**...**

|| 1.9.21 ||

**sarvātmanaḥ sama-dṛśo hy advayasyānahaṅkṛteḥ |**

**tat-kṛtaṁ mati-vaiṣamyaṁ niravadyasya na kvacit ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nanv īśvaraś cet kathaṁ nīce sārarthyādau pravṛttas tatrāha—sarveti | asya tat-kṛtaṁ nīcocca-marka-kṛtaṁ mama yogyam ayogyam iti mater vaiṣamyaṁ kvacid api nāsti | kutaḥ ? niravadyasya rāgādi-śūnyasya | tat kutaḥ ? anahaṅkṛteḥ | tac ca kutaḥ ? advayasya | tad api kutaḥ? sama-dṛśaḥ | tatrāpi hetuḥ—sarvasyātmanaḥ | yatheṣṭaṁ vā hetu-hetumad-bhāvaḥ ||21|| 

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **nanu bhavatu prīti-viśeṣeṇāsmākaṁ tasmiṁs tathā matis tasya sarveṣāṁ paramātmanas tasmād eva samadṛśaḥ paramātmatvād eva sarveṣāṁ tac-chakti-vaibhava-rūpāṇām ātmanāṁ tato’nanyatvād advayasya tasmād eva mātuleyo’ham ity ādy-abhimāna-śūnyasya, tathā nirdoṣasya ca katham aham asya mātuleyaḥ | na tv amuṣetvādi-rūpaṁ mātuleyatvādi-kṛtaṁ mati-vaiṣamyaṁ syād ity-ādi-pūrva-pakṣoṭṭaṅkana-pūrvakaṁ siddhāntayati sarvātmana iti | ṭīkāyāṁ sama-dṛśaḥ ity atra samaḥ sarvatrāvyabhicārī ca saḥ | dṛk jñāna-rūpaś ceti bahuvrīhau hetutvaṁ na ghaṭate ||21|| [prīti-sandarbha 95]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu parameśvarasya bhakti-vaśīkṛtatve dautya-sārathyādir apakarṣa eva, tasmiṁś ca sati kathaṁ premā parameśvarasya sukha-prada ity ata āha—sarvātmana iti | niravadyasya nirdoṣa-premavato’sya kṛṣṇasya tat-kṛtaṁ dautyādi-kṛtaṁ mati-vaiṣamyaṁ na | atra hetuḥ sārvakālikaṁ svataḥ siddhaṁ mahaiśvaryam evety āha—sarvātmana iti | arjunasyāpy ātmā sa eveti svayam eva sārathī rathī ceti | ata eva sama-dṛśaḥ samaṁ tulyam ātmānam eva sarvatra paśyataḥ | sarvātmatvād evādvayasya | dvitīyābhāvād eva anahaṅkṛter garva-śūnyasya | kiṁ ca, mahaiśvarya-hīno’py anyaḥ premī premata eva hetor ātmano nīca-karmottham apakarṣaṁ kleśaṁ ca duḥkhatvena na manyate | asya tu mahaiśvaryāder ānanda-mātrasya kutaḥ premato duḥkham ? tasmād yuṣmākam evotkarṣo yata etādṛśo’pi parameśvaro bhavatāṁ dūtyādikaṁ karotīty āho vaśīkārakatvaṁ premṇa iti bhāvaḥ ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **na ca bhakta-sauhārda-hetukena dūty-ādinā tasyāpakarṣa ity āha—sarvātmano nikhila-niyantuḥ samadṛśo nikhilaṁ manniyamyam iti sarvatra tulya-dṛṣṭeḥ | advayasyeti prāgvat | īdṛśānyābhāvād evānahaṅkṛter agarvasya kṛṣṇasya tat-kṛtaṁ dūtyādi-hetuka mati-vaiṣamyaṁ mamedaṁ yogyam ayogyaṁ veti dhī-dvaidhaṁ nāsti | tathā ca bhakta-vātsalya-lakṣaṇo mahotkarṣa eveti bhāvaḥ ||21||

**...**

|| 1.9.22 ||

**tathāpy ekānta-bhakteṣu paśya bhūpānukampitam |**

**yan me’sūṁs tyajataḥ sākṣāt kṛṣṇo darśanam āgataḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tathāpi samatve’pi | he bhūpa, anukampitam anukampām ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **yadyapi tādṛśasya tan na sambhavati, tathāpi he bhūpa ! ekānta-bhakteṣu yuṣmāsv anukampāṁ paśya | yeṣāṁ bhakti-viśeṣeṇa para-vaśaḥ sann asāv api tathā tathātmānaṁ bāḍham evābhimanyata ity arthaḥ | yaḥ khalu śarīrasyāpi sambandha-hetuḥ so’bhimāna eva hi sambandha-hetur mukhyaḥ, na śarīram | evaṁ sati, svāvirbhāvādinā śarīra-sambandhe’pi tasya mātuleyatvādikaṁ sutarām eva sidhyatīti tātparyam | tatra hetur—yan me’sūn iti | yad yasmāt yuṣmat-sambandhād eva hetoḥ | tad evaṁ paramopādeyatva-jñānād eva tat-sambandhātmaka eva śrī-bhagavānutkrāntāv api muhur eva nijālambanī-kṛtaḥ vijaya-sakhe ratir astu me’navadyā [bhā.pu. 1.9.33] iti, pārtha-sakhe ratir mamāstu [bhā.pu. 1.9.35] iti, vijaya-ratha-kuṭumbaḥ [bhā.pu. 1.9.39] ity ārabhya bhagavati ratir astu me mumūrṣoḥ iti ca ||22|| [prīti-sandarbha 95]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **athāpīti | yadyapi yuṣmat-tulyo na bhavituṁ śaknomīti bhāvaḥ | anukampitam asya mayy anukampāṁ paśya, yayā’yam ānanda-maya-sākṣād-brahma-svarūpo’py etādṛśaṁ bībhatsitaṁ mat-samīpa-sthānaṁ prasthāpita ity ayam apy eko’nubhāvo’nubhūyatām iti bhāvaḥ | yuṣmākaṁ tv ayam evānukampya iti bhāvaḥ ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **bhakta-bandhutāṁ darśayati—yadyapy ayam īdṛśaḥ paramānandamayo'tiśucis tathāpy ekānta-bhakteṣu anukampitaṁ sauhārdoj-jṛmbhitāṁ kṛpāṁ paśya, yad-yenānukampitena vībhatsite'smin sthāne patitasya śastra-vikṣata-sarvāṅgasyāsūṁstyajato me kāle niryāṇa-samaye darśanaṁ dṛg-gocaratāṁ svayam āgata iti kim asya tad-vaktuṁ śaknuyām iti bhāvaḥ ||22||

**...**

|| 1.9.23-24 ||

**bhaktyāveśya mano yasmin vācā yan-nāma kīrtayan |**

**tyajan kalevaraṁ yogī mucyate kāma-karmabhiḥ**[^75]** ||**

**sa deva-devo bhagavān pratīkṣatāṁ**

**kalevaraṁ yāvad idaṁ hinomy aham |**

**prasanna-hāsāruṇa-locanollasan-**

**mukhāmbujo dhyāna-pathaś catur bhujaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **idānīṁ sva-deha-tyāga-paryantaṁ śrī-kṛṣṇāvasthānaṁ prārthayate—bhaktyeti dvābhyām ||23||

yāvad iti vilambaṁ dyotayati | ahaṁ hinomi tyajāmīti svātantryam | idam ity anātmatvena jñātam | prasanna-hāsenāruṇa-locanābhyāṁ collasad ruciraṁ mukhāmbujaṁ yasya | dhyānasya panthā viṣayaḥ | yo’nyaiś cintyate levalaṁ so’grataḥ sthitaḥ san māṁ pratīkṣitām ity arthaḥ ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **bhaktyeti yugmakam | yogī samahitāntaḥ-karaṇaḥ san yasmin bhaktyā mana āveśya vā, vācā nama-mātraṁ kīrtayan vā kalevaraṁ tyajan mucyate ||23||

prasanna-hāsety ādinā tad-darśana-bahu-kālatārtham eva śarīra-tyage vilambaḥ kṛta iti labhyate | tataś ca śarīrāntara-prāptau satyāṁ kadā vā darśanaṁ syād ity utkaṇṭhā-iṣṭatvād iti gamyate | yāvan na me nara-daśā daśamī kuto’pi [kṛ.ka. 1.38][^76] ity-ādikaṁ hi śrī-līlā-śukasyāpi prārthanaṁ śrūyate ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **pratīkṣatāṁ kṣaṇam atraiva tiṣṭhatu, yāvad ahaṁ kiñcid vilambya cakṣurbhyām eva saundaryāmṛtaṁ piban svasya mano’nulāpaṁ prakāśayan staumīti bhāvaḥ | mama upāsyatvād dhyānasya panthā viṣayībhūto yaḥ sarva-kālam eva bhavet, sa prasanna-hāsetyādi-rūpo’sminn anta-kāle sākṣān-nayana-gocara eva tiṣṭhatv iti bhāvaḥ | catur bhuja iti bhīṣmasyopāsya-mantra-dhyānasya tathātvam avagamayati ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yogopasṛṣṭa-bhakti-matāṁ tu sa naivam ity āha—bhaktyāveśyeti ||23|| \
 \
ahaṁ khalu tad eka-prapannaḥ, sa me sarvaṁ kartety āha—sa iti | yo'nyeṣāṁ dhyānapatho dhyānenaiva hṛdi bhāvyaḥ, sa me puraḥ-sthitaḥ san māṁ pratīkṣatām | kiyat-kālam iti cet-tatrāha—yāvad idaṁ kalevaraṁ hinomi tyajāmīti tat-tyāge svātantryam | cakṣurbhyāṁ tanmādhurya-sudhāṁ pivan svamanogataṁ ca stutyā prakāśarāmi, tāvad ity arthaḥ | caturbhujam iti bhīṣmasyopāsya-rūpam uktam ||24||

**...**

|| 1.9.25 ||

**sūta uvāca—**

**yudhiṣṭhiras tad ākarṇya śayānaṁ śara-pañjare ||**

**apṛcchad vividhān dharmān ṛṣīṇāṁ cānuśṛṇvatām**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tat sānukampaṁ vākyam ākarṇya ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tat nija-cira-sthiti-prakāśakaṁ śrī-bhīṣmasya vacanam ākarṇya ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yudhiṣṭhiras tad ākarṇyeti tarhi māṁ kaḥ prabodhayiṣyatīti vyagro’pṛcchat—śayānaṁ śareti | yadyapi tad-daśāyāṁ praśnānaucityaṁ tad api gaty-antarābhāvād iti bhāvaḥ ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tatra yudhiṣṭhiro rājā tat sānukampaṁ tad-vākyamākarṇya śara-pañjare śayānaṁ bhagavad-dattena vareṇa nivṛtta-śastravyathaṁ karāmalaka-nyāyena paridṛṣṭa-parāvaratattvaṁ bhīṣmaṁ dharmān apṛcchat ||25||

**...**

|| 1.9.26 ||

**puruṣa-sva-bhāva-vihitān yathā-varṇaṁ yathāśramam |**

**vairāgya-rāgopādhibhyām āmnātobhaya-lakṣaṇān ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **puruṣa-svabhāvena vihitān nara-rajātisādhāraṇān varṇayām āseti tṛtīyenānvayaḥ | yathā-varṇaṁ varṇa-dharmān | yathāśramam āśrama-dharmāṁś ca | vairāgya-rāgābhyām upādhibhyāṁ krameṇāmnātam ubhayaṁ nivṛtti-prakṛtti-rūpaṁ lakṣaṇaṁ yeṣāṁ tān ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **puruṣa-svabhāvena vihitān prathamaṁ nara-jāti-sādhāraṇān dharmān varṇayāmāseti tṛtīyenānvayaḥ | tato yathā-varṇaṁ varṇa-yogya-dharmān yogyatāyām avyayībhāvaḥ | tato yathāśramaṁ tato vairāgya-rāgābhyam upādhibhyāṁ krameṇāmnātam ubhayaṁ nivṛtti-pravṛtti-rūpaṁ lakṣaṇaṁ yeṣāṁ tān | ayam arthaḥ—na hi brahmacaryādaya āśrama-dharmāḥ sarvair eva dvijaiḥ sarve krameṇaivānuṣṭheyā iti niyamaḥ | kintu vairāgyaṁ cet sadaiva bhikṣavo bhaveyus tadā rāgaś ced gṛhasthā eva sadeti ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **puruṣāṇāṁ svabhāvena vihitān narajāti-sādhāraṇān dharmān varṇayāsāseti tṛtīyena sambandhaḥ | tato yathāvarṇaṁ yathāśramam iti yogyatāyām avyayībhāvaḥ, varṇa-yogyānāśrama-yogyāṁś ca dharmān ity arthaḥ | tato vairāgya-rāgābhyām upādhibhyāṁ krameṇāmnāta-muktam ubhayaṁ pravṛtti-nivṛtti-rūpaṁ lakṣaṇaṁ yeṣāṁ tān | ayam arthaḥ—na khalu brahma-caryādayaś catvāra āśramāḥ sarvair dvijaiḥ sarve kramād evānuṣṭheyāḥ iti niyamaḥ, kintu vairāgye tīkṣne sati brahma-caryād eva pārivrājyaṁ, viṣaya-rāge tu sati gārhasthye stheyaṁ, rāgamāndye tu kramād iti | yathāha śrutiḥ—brahmacaryaṁ samāpya gṛhībhaved-gṛhībhūtvā vanībhaved-vanībhūtvā pravrajed yadivetarathā brahmacaryād eva pravrajed gṛhād vā vanād vā, yad ahar eva virajet-tad ahar eva pravrajed iti [yājñavalkyopa. 1] tathā ca śrutyanusāreṇa tān varṇayāmāseti ||26||

**...**

|| 1.9.27 ||

**dāna-dharmān rāja-dharmān mokṣa-dharmān vibhāgaśaḥ |**

**strī-dharmān bhagavad-dharmān samāsa-vyāsa-yogataḥ ||**
