**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **punas tatraiva viśeṣam āha—dāneti | mokṣa-dharmān śama-damādīn | bhagavad-dharmān hari-toṣaṇān dvādaśy-ādi-niyama-rūpān | samāsa-vyāsau saṅkṣepa-vistārau tāv eva yogāv upāyau tatas tābhyām ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tataś ca tatraiva viśeṣato dāna-dharmān ity-ādi sarvānte ca bhagavad-dharmān bhakty-aṅgāniti mokṣa-dharmebhyo’py asya pārthakyaṁ śrauṣṭhyaṁ ca vyañjitam | samāsaḥ saṅkṣepo vyāso vistaraś ca tad-dvayor yogena yuktatayā ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **mokṣa-dharmān śama-damādīn śravaṇa-mananādīṁś ca bhagavad-dharmān pañcarātroktān haritoṣakān bhakt-irūpān | samāsaḥ saṅkṣepaḥ, vyāso vistaraḥ, tayor yogataḥ sambandhāt ||27||

**...**

|| 1.9.28 ||

**dharmārtha-kāma-mokṣāṁś ca sahopāyān yathā mune |**

**nānākhyānetihāseṣu varṇayām āsa tattvavit**[^77]** ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **dharmādiṁś ca yathādhikāraṁ pratiniyatopāya-sahitam | yathā yathāvat nānākhyāneṣu ye itihāsās teṣu yathā santi tathā varṇayām āseti ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **evaṁ coktāḥ sarve dharmāś caturṣu vargeṣu eva paryavasyantīty ukta-poṣa-nyāyena tān evāha—dharmeti | upāyā dharmādi-sādhanāni | yathā yathāvad eva | nānākhyānādiṣu ye ye itihāsās teṣu pradarśya pramāṇīkṛtānity arthaḥ ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **dharmādīn yathādhikāraṁ, sahopāyān sādhanān yathā yathāvat nānākhyāneṣu ye itihāsās teṣu ||28||

**...**

|| 1.9.29 ||

**dharmaṁ**[^78]** pravadatas tasya sa kālaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ**[^79]** |**

**yo yoginaś chanda-mṛtyor vāñchitas tūttarāyaṇaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **chandenecchayā mṛtyur yasya ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **yo yogina iti | teṣā tathaiva vyavasāya-mātraṁ śrī-bhīṣmasya tu śrī-bhagavad-darśana-dīrghatvāya vyāja-maya eva sa iti jñeyam | vakṣyate ca śrī-svāmibhir api dvitīye, sthiraṁ sukhaṁ cāsanaṁ [bhā.pu. 2.2.15] ity ādau, deśe ca kāle ca mano na sajjayed ity atra deśe puṇya-kṣetre kāle ca uttarāyaṇādau mano na sajjayet na saṅgaṁ prāpayet | na deśa-kālau yoginaḥ siddhi-hetū kintu yoga eveti iti ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **dharmaṁ pravadata ity-ādi | chandena icchayaiva mṛtyur yasya tasya ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **chandenecchayā mṛtyur yasya yogino yaḥ kālo vāñchitaḥ ||29||

**...**

**|| 1.9.30 ||**

**tadopasaṁhṛtya giraḥ sahasraṇīr**

**vimukta-saṅgaṁ mana ādi-pūruṣe |**

**kṛṣṇe lasat-pīta-paṭe catur bhuje**

**puraḥ sthite’mīlita-dṛg vyadhārayat ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : sahasraṇīr** yuddhe samīpa-sthān sahasraṁ rathino nayati pālayatīti **sahasraṇīr** bhīṣmaḥ | "sahasriṇīḥ" iti pāṭhe sahasrārthavatīr giriḥ | **lasantau pītau paṭau** yasya tasmin | **amīlita-dṛg** eva **mano** **vyadhārayat** ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** evaṁ jīvanmuktaṁ lakṣayitvā stutvā cedānīm avasitādhikārasya tasya śarīra-pātam āha—**tadā** iti | **tadā** tasyāṁ daśāyāṁ **sahasraṇīḥ** sahasreṇa vyāpārāṇāṁ labdha-balāḥ giraḥ **upasaṁhṛtya** etena  sarvendriyoparatir upalakṣitā | ata eva **vimukta-saṅgaṁ** **mīlitā dṛg **buddhīndriya-vṛttiḥ yasmin manasi nidhāya **manaḥ** kṛṣṇe **vyadhārayad** ity arthaḥ | anena pratyāhāra-pūrvā dhāraṇoktā ||30|| [mu.pha. 19.44]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yuddhe samīpa-sthān sahasraṁ rathino nayati paripālayatīti sahasraṇīr bhīṣmaḥ | sahasriṇīr iti pāṭhe sahasrārthavatīr giraḥ upasaṁhṛtya anyataḥ pratyāhṛtya amīlita-dṛg eva cakṣuṣī spaṣṭam unmīlyaiva vyadhārayat ā-nakha-śikhaṁ praveśayāmāsa ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **sahasrāṇi rathino nayati pālayatīti sahasraṇīr bhīṣmaḥ, "sahasriṇīr" iti pāṭhe sahasrārthavatīrgira upasaṁhṛtyānyataḥ pratyāhṛtya amīlitadṛgeva mano vyadhārayat | yogināṁ manasāpyagamyaṁ cakṣurbhyāṁ vīkṣamāṇaḥ sann ānakha-śikhaṁ tat-praveśayāmāsa ity arthaḥ ||30||

**...**

**|| 1.9.31 ||**

**viśuddhayā dhāraṇayā hatāśubhas**

**tad-īkṣayaivāśu gatāyudha-śramaḥ |**

**nivṛtta-sarvendriya-vṛtti-vibhramas**

**tuṣṭāva janyaṁ visṛjan janārdanam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **anayaiva **viśuddhayā** **dhāraṇayā** **hatam aśubhaṁ** yasya saḥ | **tasya** śrī-kṛṣṇasyā**pekṣayā** kṛpā-dṛṣṭyaiva **gata āyudha-śramo** yasya saḥ | ata eva **nivṛttaḥ** **sarvendriya-vṛttīnāṁ** **vibhramo** vividhaṁ bhramaṇaṁ yasmāt saḥ | **janyaṁ** dehaṁ **visṛjan** **janārdanam** **astaut** ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** **viśuddhā** niṣkāmāḥ aśubhaṁ pūrvam aghaṁ **tasya** śrī-kṛṣṇasya **īkṣayā** sākṣātkāreṇa **gatāni** **āyudha**-vyathāni yasya, sa tathā | āyudhavat vyathayanti ity āyudha-vyathāni uttara-pāpāni | tathā coktaṁ—tad-adhigama uttara-pūrvāghayor aśleṣa-vināśau tad-vyapadeśāt [ve.sū. 4.1.13] | śrutiś ca—yatheṣīkā-tūlam agnau protaṁ pradūyetaivaṁ hāsya sarve pāpmānaḥ pradūyante [chā.u. 5.24.3] iti | **vibhramo** vividhaṁ bhramaṇam | tatra tatrāsantoṣāt | tasya **nirvṛtir** apūrva-kṛṣṇākhyaṁ viṣaya-labhyāt **janyaṁ** śarīraṁ **visṛjan** tyajan | **janārdanaṁ** kaivalya-dātāraṁ puruṣam ity ucita-pada-prayogaḥ ||31|| [mu.pha. 19.45]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : tad-īkṣayā** eveti tat-karmakekṣayā tad-āgamana-samayād eva labdhayeti prathama-vṛttam uktam ||31|| [prīti-sandarbha 203]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : viśuddhayā** ity-ādi | **tad-īkṣayā** śrī-kṛṣṇa-kartṛkeṇa kṛpāvalokena **vibhramo** vividha-bhramaṇam asthairyam ity arthaḥ | **janyaṁ** sthūla-dehaṁ māyika-prapañcaṁ vā ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : tasya** kṛṣṇasya **īkṣayā** kṛpāvalokena **vibhramo **'sthairyaṁ, **janyaṁ** dehaṁ prapañcaṁ vā ||31||

**...**

**|| 1.9.32 ||**

**śrī-bhīṣma uvāca—**

**iti matir upakalpitā vitṛṣṇā**

**bhagavati sātvata-puṅgave vibhūmni |**

**sva-sukham upagate kvacid vihartuṁ**

**prakṛtim upeyuṣi yad bhava-pravāhaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **parama-phala-rūpāṁ śrī-kṛṣṇe ratiṁ prārthayituṁ prathamaṁ sva-kṛtam arpayati | **iti** nānā-dharmādy-upāyair **matir **mano-dhāraṇa-lakṣaṇā **upakalpitā** samarpitā | kva ? **sātvatānāṁ puṅgave** śreṣṭhe **bhagavati** | **vitṛṣṇā** niṣkāmā | avitṛṣṇeti vā chedaḥ, avitṛptety arthaḥ | **vigato bhūmā** yasmāt tasmin, yam apekṣyānyatra mahattvaṁ nāstīty arthaḥ | tad eva paramaiśvaryam āha | **sva-sukhaṁ** sva-svarūpa-bhūtaṁ paramānandam **upagate** prāptavaty eva | **kvacit** kadācid **vihartuṁ** krīdituṁ prakṛtiṁ yoga-māyām **upeyuṣi** svīkṛtavati, na tu svarūpa-tirodhānena jīvavat pāratantryam ity arthaḥ | vihartum iti yad uktaṁ tat prapañcayati—**yad** yataḥ prakṛter **bhava-pravāhaḥ** sṛṣṭi-paramparā bhavati ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : sātvata-puṅgave** iti dhāraṇā-viṣayasya tasya viśeṣaṇaṁ na tūpalakṣaṇam iti jñeyam | **vibhūmni** viśeṣeṇa bhūmātiśayo yasmin tatra bhūma-vākyavad bhūma-śabdenātra paramātiśayy eva cocyate | vi-śabdas tu tad vyakty artha eva | **kvacid** ity-ādinā puruṣāvatāra-kartṛtvam uktam ||32|| [kṛṣṇa-sandarbha 37]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : iti matir** ity-ādi | iti mamāyuḥ-samāptau **matir bhagavati upakalpitā** mat-prabhau mad-anta-kāle kṛpā-paravaśatayaiva mat-samīpam āgate kiñcid upāyanaṁ datum ucitaṁ | tatra samprati mam āhantāspada-mamatāspadayor madhye samīcīnaṁ kim apy anyan nāstīti hetor eṣā matir evopāyanatvena kalpitā | 

nanu upāyana-dāyino loke kiñcij jighṛkṣavo dṛśyante ? tatrāha—**vitṛṣṇā** niṣkāmā | **bhagavati** ṣaḍ-aiśvarya-pūrṇe | kiṁ nārāyaṇatvena prasiddhe ? na, **sātvata-puṅgave** yadu-kulottaṁsatvena prasiddhe | 

nanu nārāyaṇasyaiva bhagavattvena mahatī prasiddhiś ca sārvakālikī tatrāha—**vibhūmni** iti | vigato bhūmā yasmāt, tasmin yam apekṣyānyatra mahattvaṁ nāstīti nārāyaṇāsyāpy avatāriṇīty arthaḥ | tad api **svair** yādava-pāṇḍavair eva saha **sukhaṁ** paramānandam | **upa** ādhikyena prāpta iti svarūpa-lakṣaṇam uktam | taṭastha-lakṣaṇam āha—**prakṛtiṁ** māyām īkṣaṇena mahat-tattvādy-utpādakatayā **upeyuṣi** | **yataḥ** prakṛter **bhava-pravāhaḥ** sṛṣṭi-paramparā tena puruṣādayo’py asyaivāvatārā iti bhāvaḥ ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **iti mad-āyuḥ-samāptau **sātvata-puṅgave** yādavendre **bhagavati** kṛpā-pāravaśyena mad-antikam āgate śrī-kṛṣṇe mayā tad-eka-niṣṭhā mati-rupakalpitā upāyanatvenārpitā | kīdṛśīty āha—vitṛṣṇā tad anya-phalecchāśūnyā | kīdṛśe ity āha—vibhūmni vibhau nitye ity arthaḥ | svairyādavaiḥ pāṇḍavaiś ca saha sukhaṁ līlā-nandam upagate | kvacit kvacācit svāṁśena prakṛtim upeyuṣi tat-prekṣake, yataḥ prakṛter bhavapravāhaḥ sṛṣṭi-paramparā vartate ||32||

**...**

**|| 1.9.33 ||**

**tri-bhuvana-kamanaṁ tamāla-varṇaṁ**

**ravi-kara-gaura-varāmbaraṁ dadhāne |**

**vapur alaka-kulāvṛtānanābjaṁ**

**vijaya-sakhe ratir astu me’navadyā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **idānīṁ śrī-kṛṣṇa-mūrtiṁ varṇayan ratiṁ prārthayate—**tri-bhuvana-kamanaṁ** tri-lokyām ekam eva kamanīyaṁ yat, tad **vapur dadhāne ratir me’stu** | kathaṁ-bhūtaṁ vapuḥ ? **tamālavan** nīlo **varṇo** yasya tat | prātaḥ-kālīnā **raveḥ karā** iva svato **gaure** pīte **vare** nirmale ca **ambare** yasmiṁs tat | **alaka-kulair** upary **āvṛtam ānanābjaṁ** yasmiṁs tat | **vijaya-sakhe** pārtha-sārathau **anavadyā** ahaitukī phalābhisandhi-rahitā **ratir astu** ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu iti matir upakalpitety uktā yā, sā kim-ākārā matiḥ ? tatrāha—**tribhuvana-** iti | **vijayasya** arjunasya **sakhyau** **mamānavadyā** phalābhisandhāna-rahitā **ratiḥ** prema **astu** | kīdṛśe ? **tribhuvanasya** ūrdhvādho-madhya-loka-stha-jana-samudāyasya **kamanam** abhilāṣo yatra tad **vapur dadhāne** | **raveḥ karair gaura-vare** atigaurī-kṛte **ambare** yatra | tad arjuna-rathopari-sthitasya kṛṣṇasya pītāmbara-dvayaṁ sūrya-kiraṇa-samparkād aticākacikyavattvena tadānīm atipītaṁ mayā dṛṣṭaṁ, tena pārtha-sārathitvenopalabdha-mahā-saundarye kṛṣṇe ratiḥ prārthanā-mayī matir mayā tasminn evopakalpiteti bhāvaḥ | atra cāgrimeṣv api ślokeṣu sākṣād-vartiny api bhagavati prārthanāyāṁ yuṣmat-pada-prayogābhāvaḥ āsvādita-care ca sāṅgrāmika-vīra-rasāveśa-maye tan-mādhurye eva cittasyāsaktiṁ bodhayati ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **bhagavad-rūpāsaktas tatra ratiṁ prārthayate—**vijaya-sakhe** arjuna-mitre **ratir astu** | kīdṛśe? **tamāla-nīlaṁ vapur dadhāne** prakaṭayati, 


    anādeyam aheyaṁ ca rūpaṁ bhagavato hareḥ | 


    āvirbhāva-tirobhāvāvasyokte graha-mocane || iti smṛteḥ |

vapuḥ kīdṛk? **tribhuvanasya kamanaṁ** spṛhā yatra tat | **ravi-karaiḥ** **gaura-vare** atipīte **ambare** yatra tat | ratiḥ kīdṛśī ? **anavadyā** tad-vapur-anya-phala-vāñchā-śūnyā ||33||

**...**

**|| 1.9.34 ||**

**yudhi turaga-rajo-vidhūmra-viṣvak-**

**kaca-lulita-śrama-vāry-alaṅkṛtāsye |**

**mama niśita-śarair vibhidyamāna-**

**tvaci vilasat-kavace’stu kṛṣṇa ātmā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **vijaya-sakhitvam evānuvarṇayan ratiṁ prārthayate | **yudhi** yuddhe turagāṇāṁ khura-rajas **turaga-rajaḥ,** tena **vidhūmrā** dhūsarāḥ, te ca te **viṣvañca** itas tataś calantaḥ **kacāḥ** kuntalāḥ, tair **lulitaṁ** vikīrṇaṁ **śrama-vāri** sveda-bindu-rūpaṁ, tena bhakta-vātsalya-dyotakena **alaṅkṛtam āsyaṁ** yasya, tasmin śrī-kṛṣṇe **mama ātmā** mano’stu **ramatām** ity arthaḥ | punaḥ kiṁ-bhūte ? madīyair **niśitais** tīkṣṇaiḥ **śarair vibhidyamānā** **tvag** yasya, tasmin | śarair eva **vilasat** truṭyat **kavacaṁ** yasya, tasmin ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **atha prāktanaṁ svāparādhaṁ tasmin dainyena vijñāpayann api ratim eva prārthayate—**yudhi** iti | **mama niśita**- ity-ādikaṁ tu māyika-līlā-varṇanam eva | evaṁ vadanti rājarṣe ṛṣayaḥ kecanānvitāḥ [bhā.pu. 10.11.30] ity-ādi-nyāyena vāstavatva-virodhāt | tathā hi skānde, 


    asaṅgaś cāvyayo’bhedyo’nigrāhyo’śoṣya eva ca | 


    viddho’sṛg-ācito baddha iti viṣṇuḥ pradṛśyate ||


    asurān mohayan devaḥ krīḍaty eṣa sureṣv api | 


    mānuṣān madhyayā dṛṣṭyā na mukteṣu kathañcana || iti | 

śrī-bhīṣmasya yuddha-samaye daityāviṣṭatvaṭ tathā bhānaṁ yuktam eva | kintv adhunā duḥsvapna-duḥkhasyeva tasya nivedanaṁ kṛtam iti jñeyam | kiṁ ca, **turaga**- ity-ādi **mama niśita**- ity-antair viśeṣaṇais tathāpy arjuna-sāhāyyāparityāgāt tasya bhakta-vātsalyaṁ darśitam | svasyāparādhitve’pi sāmprataṁ tad-anugṛhītatvaṁ jñāpitam ||34|| [bhagavat-sandarbha 60]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **alaka-kulair āvṛtam ānanābjaṁ yad uktaṁ, tan mādhuryam eva tyaktum asamarthaḥ punar api viśiṣyāsvādayati—**yudhi** iti | **turaga-raja** iti “sundare kim asundaram ?” iti nyāyena | **viṣvañca** itas tataś calantaḥ kacā iti āvega-sūcakam | **śrama-vāri** iti bhakta-vātsalya-dyotakam | **niśitais** tīkṣṇair **vibhidyamāna**-**tvaci** iti kandarpa-rasāviṣṭasya puṁsaḥ pragalbha-kāntā-dantāghātaiḥ sukham evetivad yuddha-rasāviṣṭasya mahā-vīrasya kṛṣṇasya mad-bala-sūcaka-śarāghātaiḥ sukham eveti | nātra mama yuddha-rasonmattasyāpi prema-śūnyatvaṁ mantavyam | na hi sva-prāṇa-koṭyādhike preyasi surata-samarauddhatya-kṛta-nirbhara-nakhara-daśanāghātā vanitā prema-śūnyā kathyata iti bhāvaḥ | atra tu **vibhidyamāna-tvaci** na tu vibhinna-tvaci yato **vilasad**-virājamānaṁ **kavacaṁ** yasya tasminn iti īṣad-bheda-mātram uktam | **ātmā** manaḥ ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **alaka-kulāvṛtānanābja-mādhurya-nimagna-manāḥ stauti—**yudhi** iti | **turaga-rajobhir dhūmrā** dhūsara **viṣvañca** āvega-vaśād itas tataś calanto ye **kacāḥ** alakāḥ, tair **lulitaṁ** vikīrṇaṁ **śrama-vāriṇā** bindu-rūpeṇa bhakta-vātsalya-sūcakena **alaṅkṛtaṁ** ca **āsyaṁ** yasya, tasmin **kṛṣṇe mamātmā** mano'**stu** | 

nanu prema-viṣaye mayi kathaṁ tava bāṇa-prayoga iti cet? tvat-sukhāyeti bhāvena viśinaṣṭi—**mama niśitais** tīkṣnaiḥ **śarair vibhidyamānā** na tu vibhinna **tvag** yasya, tasminn iti sac-cid ānandatvād abhedye tvayi na śara-kṛtā vikṛtiḥ, api tu mahā-vīre yuddhoddīpanaiva kṛteti na me prema-śūnyatvam | na khalu preyasi taruṇyāḥ pāṇijādi-kṣatāni vaimanasyāya, api tu prasādāyaiveti bhāvaḥ ||34||

**...**

**|| 1.9.35 ||**

**sapadi sakhi-vaco niśamya madhye**

**nija-parayor balayo rathaṁ niveśya |**

**sthitavati para-sainikāyur akṣṇā**

**hṛtavati pārtha-sakhe ratir mamāstu ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kiṁ ca | sapadīti | 


    senayor ubhayor madhye rathaṁ sthāpaya me’cyuta | 


    yāvad etān nirīkṣye’haṁ yoddhukāmān avasthitān || [gītā.1.21-22]

ity **sakhyur** arjunasya **vaco** **niśamya** **sapadi** tat-kṣaṇam eva **sva-parayor balayoḥ** sainyayor madhye **rathaṁ niveśya** **sthite** **pārtha-sakhe** **mama ratir astu** | tatra sthitvā kṛtaṁ sakhyaṁ darśayati | **parasya** duryodhanasya **sainikānām āyur akṣṇā** kāla-dṛṣṭyā **hṛtavati** | asau bhīṣmo’sau droṇo’sau karṇa ity-ādi-tat-pradarśana-vyājena dṛṣṭyaiva sarveṣām āyur ākṛṣyārjunasya jayaṁ kṛtavati ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **sapadīti | tatra **akṣṇā** **āyur haraṇena** prārabdha-haratvam api darśitam ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kiṁ ca, sapadīti | 


    senayor ubhayor madhye rathaṁ sthāpaya me’cyuta | 


    yāvad etān nirīkṣye’haṁ yoddhukāmān avasthitān || [gītā.1.21-22]

iti **sakhyur** arjunasya **vacaḥ** | **parasya** duryodhanasya **sainikānām āyur akṣṇā** ”asau bhīṣmaḥ, asau droṇaḥ, asau karṇaḥ” iti tat-tat-pradarśana-vyājena dṛṣṭyā eva **hṛtavati,** tena ca prārabdha-haratvam api darśitam | yam iha nirīkṣya gatā gatāḥ sarūpaṁ [bhā.pu. 1.9.40] iti teṣāṁ mokṣokteḥ ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :** 


    senayor ubhayor madhye rathaṁ sthāpaya me'cyuta! | 


    yāvad etān-nirīkṣe'haṁ yoddhu-kāmān avasthitān || [gītā 1.21] iti 

**sakhyur** arjunasya **vaco** **niśamya** **nija parayor balayor** madhye **rathaṁ niveśya sthitavati** **pārtha-sakhe** kṛṣṇe **mama matir astu** | tatra sthitvā kṛtaṁ sakhyam āha—**para-sainikānāṁ** duryodhana-vīrāṇām **āyur** **akṣṇā** kāla-śakti-saṅkrāntena tat-tat-pradarśana-vyājena **hṛtavati** ||35||

**...**

**|| 1.9.36 ||**

**vyavahita-pṛtanā-mukhaṁ nirīkṣya**

**sva-jana-vadhād vimukhasya doṣa-buddhyā |**

**kumatim aharad ātma-vidyayā yaś**

**caraṇa-ratiḥ paramasya tasya me’stu ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **na kevalam arjunasya sapatnāyur haraṇenaiva jayam āhavat, kiṁtv avidyā-haraṇenāpīty āha | **vyavahitā** dūre sthitā yā **pṛtanā,** tasyā **mukham** iva mukham agre sthitān bhīṣmādīn **nirīksya** ity arthaḥ | **sva-jana-vadhād vimukhasya** nivṛttasya | tad uktaṁ gītāsu 


    evam uktvārjunaḥ saṅkhye rathopastha upāviśat | 


    visṛjya sa-śaraṁ cāpaṁ śoka-saṁvigna-mānasaḥ || [gītā. 1.46] iti |

**kumatim** ahaṁ hantety-ādi-kubuddhim ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tataś ca **vyavahitā** dūre sthitā yā **pṛtanā** senā, tasyā **mukham** iva mukham agre sthitān bhīṣmādīn **nirīkṣya** ity arthaḥ, **svajana-vadhād vimukhasya** iti yad uktaṁ 


    evam uktvārjunaḥ saṅkhye rathopastha upāviśat | 


    visṛjya sa-śaraṁ cāpaṁ śoka-saṁvigna-mānasaḥ || [gītā. 1.46] iti |

iti **kumatiṁ** sāmpratikīṁ yudhiṣṭhirasyeva tadānīntanīm arjunasyāpi svayaṁ bhagavataivotthāpitāṁ | tasya nitya-pārṣadatvān narāvatāratvāc ca **kumater** asambhavāt jagad-uddhāraka-sva-tattva-jñāpaka-śrī-gītā-śāstram āvirbhāvayitum iti jñeyam | **ātma-vidyayā** sva-niṣṭha-jñānena ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **viśvoddhāra-hetu-śrī-gītopaniṣat-prakāśake'ti-kṛpālau kṛṣṇe ratiṁ prārthayati—**vyavahitāyā** dūra-sthitāyāḥ **pṛtanāyāḥ** senāyā **mukhaṁ** puraḥ-sthitān bhīṣmādīn **nirīkṣya** doṣa-buddhyā **svajana-vadhāt** yuddhāt sva-dharmād api **nivṛttasya** saśaraṁ cāpaṁ visṛjya śocato'rjunasya **ātma-vidyayā** yaḥ **kumatim aharat,** tasya **caraṇa-ratir** ity anvayaḥ | yathā yudhiṣṭhire kumatim ādhāya idānīṁ mad-upakṛtiḥ kṛtā, tathārjune tām ādhāya viśvopakṛtir iti kṛpālutā mahatīti ||36||

**...**

**|| 1.9.37 ||**

**sva-nigamam apahāya mat-pratijñām **

**ṛtam adhikartum avapluto rathasthaḥ |**

**dhṛta-ratha-caraṇo’bhyayāc caladgur**

**harir iva hantum ibhaṁ gatottarīyaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **mama tu mahāntam anugrahaṁ kṛtavān ity āha dvābhyām | **sva-nigamam** "aśastra evāhaṁ sāhāyya-mātraṁ karisyāmi" ity evaṁ-bhūtāṁ sva-pratijñāṁ hitvā, śrī-kṛṣṇaṁ śastraṁ grāhayiṣyāmīty evaṁ-rūpāṁ **mat-pratijñām ṛtaṁ** satyaṁ yathā bhavati, tathā **adhi** adhikāṁ **kartuṁ** yo **ratha-sthaḥ** san **avaplutaḥ** sahasaivāvatīrṇaḥ san yo’**bhyayād** abhimukham adhāvat | **ibhaṁ hantuṁ hariḥ** simhaḥ **iva** | kiṁ-bhūtaḥ ? **dhṛto ratha-caraṇaś** cakraṁ yena saḥ | tadā saṁrambheṇa mānuṣya-nāṭya-vismṛter udara-stha-sarva-bhūta-bhuvana-bhāreṇa pratipadaṁ **caladguś** calantī gauḥ pṛthvī yasmāt saḥ | tenaiva saṁrambheṇa pathi **gataṁ** patitam **uttarīyaṁ** vastraṁ yasya, sa mukundo me gatir bhavatv ity uttareṇānvayaḥ ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : sva-nigama** iti yugmakam | **ṛtam **iti ṛta-rūpām ity arthaḥ | ṛtaṁ ca sunṛtā vāṇi [bhā.pu. 11.19.38] iti bhagavad-uktāv ajahal-liṅgatva-śravaṇāt | **caladgutvaṁ** saṁrambheṇa kiñcid bhārāviṣkārāt ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **svasmād api sva-bhaktam utkarṣayatīti yat śrutaṁ, tan mayā svasminn eva sākṣād dṛṣṭam ity āha dvābhyām | **sva-nigamam** "aśastra evāhaṁ sāhāyya-mātraṁ kariṣyāmi" iti sva-pratijñāṁ hitvā śrī-kṛṣṇaṁ śastraṁ grāhayiṣyāmīty evaṁ-rūpāṁ mat-pratijñām **ṛtaṁ** satyaṁ yathā bhavati, tathā **adhi** adhikāṁ **kartuṁ** **ratha-sthaḥ** sann eva **avapluta** ity atilāghavenāvaplutim, atas tasya rathād viśleṣaḥ kenāpi na lakṣita iti bhāvaḥ | alakṣita-prakāśenaikena ratha-rakṣārthaṁ sthita eveti vā | ṛtam iti sā līlā eva svābhāviky eva, na tu mad-anurodhenaiva kṛteti bhāvaḥ | **dhṛto ratha-caraṇaś** cakraṁ yena saḥ | **abhyayāt** abhimukham adhavat | 

dhāvanenātisaṁrambheṇāviṣkṛta-nija-mahā-balatvāc **calantī gauḥ** pṛthvī yasmāt saḥ | **gataṁ** patitam **uttarīyaṁ** yasya saḥ | atisaṁrambheṇottarīyaṁ gātrāt patitam asti nāsti vety api nānusandadhāna ity arthaḥ | 

atra kṛṣṇena sva-bhakta-vātsalya-guṇasya dustyajatvāt arjunasya yuddhāsāmarthye sati sva-pratijñām api tyaktvā svayam evārjunasya rakṣārthaṁ śastreṇa yotsyate eva tac cārjunasyāsāmarthya-prāpaṇam anyair duḥśakam ity ataḥ kṣaṇam arjunaṁ parābhūyāsya yuddhaṁ bhakta-vātsalya-dyotakaṁ drakṣyāmīti bhīṣmasya sva-manoratha-siddhy-arthaiva pratijñeti | ataḥ sva-pratijñā-bhaṅgenārjune sva-premāṇaṁ taṁ darśayitvā bhīṣmaṁ pramodya tasyotkarṣaṁ ca loke vikhyāpayāmāseti tattvam ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **bhakta-vātsalyaṁ tavāty adbhutaṁ yat svotkarṣam upekṣya bhaktam utkarṣayasīty āha dvābhyām | **sva-nigamam** apahāya "śastra-śūnyaḥ pārtha-sāhāyaṁ vidhāsyāmi" iti sva-pratijñāṁ tyaktvā **ṛtaṁ** satyaṁ yathā bhavet, tathā kṛṣṇena śastraṁ grāhayiṣyāmīti mat-pratijñām **adhikāṁ kartuṁ** **rathastho'vaplutaḥ** atilāghavād anyālakṣitāvaplutika ity arthaḥ | ratha-rakṣārthaṁ tatra sthita eva rūpāntareṇa tasmād avapluto vā **dhṛta-ratha-caraṇo** gṛhīta-cakraḥ san māṁ hantum **abhyayād** abhimukham adhāvat, **ibhaṁ hantuṁ hariḥ **siṁha iveti duḥsaha-tejas tvaṁ sūcyate | atisaṁrambhāveśād dhāvanāc **calantī** kampamānā **gaur** bhūmir yasmāt saḥ, tasmād eva gataṁ bhuvi **nipatitam uttarīyaṁ** yasya saḥ | tyakta-pratijño'yaṁ prabhuḥ pralaya-velāṁ vināpi māṁ saṁhariṣyatīti bhītyā sakampāṁ bhūmiṁ prasādāmbarārpaṇenāśvāsayann ivotprekṣita ity arthaḥ ||37||

**...**

**|| 1.9.38 ||**

**śita-viśikha-hato viśīrṇa-daṁśaḥ**

**kṣataja-paripluta ātatāyino me |**

**prasabham abhisasāra mad-vadhārthaṁ**

**sa bhavatu me bhagavān gatir mukundaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **evaṁ yadābhyayāt tadā smayamānasyātatāyino dhanvino me **śitais** tīkṣṇair **viśikhair** **hato**’to **viśīrṇa-daṁśo** vidhvasta-kavacaḥ **kṣatajena** rudhireṇa **paripluto** vyāptaḥ san **prasabhaṁ** balād vārayantam arjunam apy atikramya mad-vadhārtham **abhisasāra** abhimukhaṁ jagāma | evaṁ yo loka-pratītyārjuna-pakṣa-pātīva lakṣito vastutas tu mamaivānugrahaṁ kṛtavān yan mad-bhaktenoktaṁ vaco mā mṛṣā’stv iti **sa bhagavān me gatir bhavatv** ity arthaḥ ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kiṁ ca, yadaiva rathād bhūmāv avaplutaḥ, tadaiva **kṣatajaiḥ** rudhiraiḥ **pariplutaḥ** sāṅgrāmika-rudhira-nadyā bindu-vyāptaḥ | nanu kavacasya vidyamānatvāt kathaṁ tathātvam ? tatrāha—mama **śitair viśikhair hatas** tasya saṁrambha-sukha-vardhanārthaṁ, tad api mayā hanyate smaiveti bhāvaḥ | yato **viśīrṇa**-kavacaḥ plavanāt prāg evābhavad ity arthaḥ | **prasabhaṁ** balāt vārayantam arjunam apy atikramya mad-vadhārtham “adya sva-hastenaiva bhīṣmaṁ vadhiṣyāmi” ity abhiprāyeṇety arthaḥ | **abhisasāra** ity atrābhi-śabdenābhisarantaṁ nāyakam ālokitavatyā nāyikāyā iva tadānīṁ mama sukham apāram evābhūd iti dyotyate | na anyeṣāṁ **mukundo** mukti-prado’pi **mama tu gatis** tathā-bhūtatvenaiva prāpyo **bhavatv** iti | he kṛṣṇa ! tvām aham etad eva prārthaye iti bhāvaḥ ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yadābhyayāt, tadā sa-smitasya **atatāyinaḥ** śastra-pāṇer me **śitair viśikhair** bāṇair **hataḥ** tāḍitaḥ, tata eva **viśīrṇa-daṁśo** bhinna-kavacaḥ | **kṣatajaiḥ** saṅgrāmika-rudhira-sarid-bindubhiḥ **paripluto** vyāptāṅgaḥ | **prasabhaṁ** haṭhān nivārayantam arjunam atikramya mad-vadhārthaṁ yo'**bhisasāra**, **sa me gatir** ity anvayaḥ | iha kecid āhuḥ—bhīṣmadīnāṁ tad āsuvāveśāt tathā pratītir iti rājan parasya [bhā.pu. 11.31.21] iti padya-ṭippanyāṁ vyākhyāsyate, adhunā tad-āveśa-kṣayāt kṣamāpaṇaṁ kṛtam iti ||38||

**...**

**|| 1.9.39 ||**

**vijaya-ratha-kuṭumba ātta-totre**

**dhṛta-haya-raśmini tac-chriyekṣaṇīye |**

**bhagavati ratir astu me mumūrṣor**

**yam iha nirīkṣya hatā gatāḥ sa-rūpam**[^80]** || \
**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tad evam anyāyair api bhṛtya-rakṣā-vyagre kṛṣṇe ratim āśāste | **vijayo**’rjunas tasya **ratha** eva **kuṭumbam** akṛtya-śatair api rakṣaṇīyo yaya tasmin | **āttaṁ totraṁ** pratodo yena tasmin | **dhṛtāś** ca te **hayānāṁ raśmayaḥ** pragrahās te santi yasya tasmin | vrīhy-ādibhyaś ca ity anakārāntād pi raśmi-śabdādiniḥ | **tac-chriyā** tayā sārathya-śriyā **īkṣaṇīye** śobhamāne | **mumūrṣor** martum icchoḥ | nanv anyāya-vartini kim iti ratiḥ prārthyate ? ata āha—**bhagavaty** acintyaiśvarye | tad āha—**iha** yuddhe **hatāḥ** sarve **yaṁ nirīkṣya sa-rūpaṁ** tat-samānaṁ rūpaṁ **gatāḥ** prāptā iti divya-dṛṣṭyā paśyann āha ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **vijayeti yugmakam | maryādātikrame’py adoṣāya sāmarthyam āha—bhagavatīti | yathārudro’bdhijaṁ viṣaṁ [bhā.pu. 10.33.30] iti nyāyāt | tad-atikrame ca svābhāvikaṁ kāruṇyam eva kāraṇam iti darśayati—**yam iha **iti | ato’sminn eva **ratir mamāstu** ||39|| [prīti-sandarbha 81]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tad evam anyāyair api bhakta-rakṣā-vyagre kṛṣṇe ratim āśāste | **vijayasya** arjunasya **ratha** eva **kuṭumbo**’kṛtyair api rakṣaṇīyo yasya tasmin | **totraṁ** pratodaḥ | raśmayaḥ pragrahāḥ, **dhṛtā haya-raśmayo** yasya santīti vrīhy-āditvāt iniḥ | **īkṣaṇīyā** iti vāma-haste aśva-dhāraṇa-rajjuḥ, dakṣiṇa-haste pratodaḥ, mukhāravinde huṁ hum iti tan-nodana-śabda iti śobhayā yan mādhuryam īkṣaṇīyaṁ, tan mayaiva tadā sva-cakṣurbhyām īkṣitaṁ, na tv arjunenāpi iti bhāvaḥ | tasmin **bhagavati mama ratir astu mumūrṣor** iti | ata evāhaṁ samprati martum icchāmi, yan mṛtvā tad eva mādhuryaṁ muhur drakṣyāmi, sañjīvaṁs tu tat kathaṁ draṣṭuṁ prāpsyāmi ? prakaṭa-prakāśe tasyā līlāyā bhagavatā samāptī-kṛtatvād iti bhāvaḥ | atra mriyamāṇasyety anuktvā san-pratyayena icchādhīna-mṛtyor bhīṣmasya bhagavataḥ sakāśād api tal-līlāyām atilobho vyajyate | tena ca sā yuddha-līlāpi nityety anyasyā līlāyā nityatve kaimutyam ānītam | 

nanu satyaṁ tasyām eva me sārathya-līlāyāṁ tvam atyāsakto yat prati-ślokam eva tām āsvadayaṁs tām evodgiraṁs tal-līlā-viśiṣṭe eva mayi ratiṁ prārthayase, kintu samprati mṛtvaiva tal-līlā-prāptau tava kiṁ pramāṇam ? ity atra “maraṇe yā matiḥ sā gatiḥ” iti prasiddhāt pramāṇād api tava darśanam eva paraṁ pramāṇam ity āha—yam iheti | **yaṁ nirīkṣya hatā** yuddhe anyenāpi hatāḥ santaḥ asura-svabhāvā api tādṛśa-jñāninām api **sarūpaṁ** sāyujya-muktiṁ prāptāḥ | “ahaṁ tu bhaktaḥ, tatrāpi maraṇa-kāle tādṛśa-matimāṁs taṁ tvāṁ sākṣād dṛṣṭvā mṛtvā kathaṁ na tāṁ līlāṁ prāpsyāmi ?” iti bhāvaḥ | atra nara-sārathyam anadhikāribhyo’pi sāyujya-dāyitvam iti yugapad evānaiśvarya-mahaiśvarya-svīkāra-lakṣaṇaṁ mahā-mādhuryaṁ sarva-bhagavat-svarūpāsādhāraṇam eva tadānīm uditam iti jñeyam ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **punar api sārathya-veśe kṛṣṇe ratiṁ prārthayate—**vijayasya rathaḥ kuṭumbam** anyāyair api rakṣaṇīyaṁ yasya tasmin | **ātta-totre** gṛhīta-pratode, dhṛtā hayānāṁ raśmayaḥ pragrahāḥ santy asyeti brīhy-āditvād iniḥ, tac-chriyā varṇitayā sārathya-veśa-śobhayekṣaṇīye darśanīye **bhagavati me ratir astu**, **mumūrṣor** iti “ante yā matiḥ sā gatiḥ” iti prasiddheḥ, sa tādṛśo mama prastād ity arthaḥ? kaimutyā-pādakam atra pramāṇam āha—**yam** iti | yaṁ tādṛśaṁ kṛṣṇaṁ **nirīkṣya** tasmin yuddhe yenaiva bhīmārjunādy-antar vartinā **hatāḥ** sarve **svarūpaṁ** gatāḥ, prādurbhāvita-guṇāṣṭakaṁ sva-svarūpam āvirbhūta-sārvajñādy ananta-guṇakaṁ bhagavat-svarūpaṁ ca prāpur ity arthaḥ ||39||

**...**

|| 1.9.40 ||

**lalita-gati-vilāsa-valgu-hāsa-**

**praṇaya-nirīkṣaṇa-kalpitoru-mānāḥ |**

**kṛtam anukṛtavatya unmadāndhāḥ**

**prakṛtim agan kila yasya gopa-vadhvaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kṣatra-dharmeṇa yudhyamānās tat-sarūpaṁ prāpyur ity etan na citram | yato madāndhā api prāpyur ity āha | **lalita-gatiś** ca **vilāsaś** ca **valgu-hāsādiś** ca mañju-gaty-ādibhir ātmīyais tadīyair vā **kalpita urur mānaḥ** pūjā yāsāṁ tāḥ | ata **ut**kaṭena **madenāndhā** vivaśāḥ | ata eva tad-eka-cittatvena tasya **kṛtaṁ** karma govardhanoddhāraṇādikam **anukṛtavatyo** **gopa-vadhvo** **yasya** **prakṛtiṁ** svarūpam **agan** agaman | ma-kāra-lopas tv ārṣaḥ | **kila** prasiddham | “tasmin me ratir astu” [39] iti pūrveṇaivānvayaḥ ||40||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tat-svabhāva-mahimnaḥ sārūpya-prāpaṇatvaṁ nāma kiyān utkarṣaḥ ? yata etāvato’pi premno janakatvaṁ dṛśyata ity āha—**laliteti** | atra **kṛtānukaraṇaṁ** nāma līlākhyo nāyikānubhāvaḥ | tad uktaṁ kriyānukaraṇaṁ līlā [u.nī. 10.28] iti | **prakṛtiṁ** svabhāvam, tādṛśa-premāveśo jātaḥ | yena tat-svabhāva-nija-svabhāvayor aikyam eva tāsu jātam ity arthaḥ | yathā śrīmad-ujjvala-nīlamaṇau mahā-bhāvodāharaṇam—


    rādhāyā bhavataś ca citta-jatunī svedair vilāpya kramāt 


    yuñjann adri-nikuñja-kuñjara-pate nirdhūta-bheda-bhramam |


    citrāya svayam anvarañjayad iha brahmāṇḍa-harmyodare 


    bhūyobhir nava-rāga-hiṅgula-bharaiḥ śṛṅgāra-kāruḥ kṛtī || [u.nī. 15.155] iti |

||40|| [prīti-sandarbha 81]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu yat sārathya-sambadhinyai līlāyai sarva-tattvajño’pi tvaṁ spṛhayasi, so’rjuna eva tarhi mama sarveṣu premavat-parikara-vṛndeṣv eko mukhya iti nirdhāryate ? maivam | tato’rjunād apy atimukhyatamāḥ sarvato’pi premotkarṣavanto ye tava priya-janā vartante, na teṣāṁ padavīṁ prārthayitum api ko’pi sāhasaṁ dhatte | bhavatu, tad api tad-uddeśenāpy asminn anta-kāle kṛtārthībhavāmīty āha—laliteti | 

**lalita-gatiś** ca rāsa-nṛtyādi-vaidagdhī, kāyikī **vilāsaś** ca dhīra-lālity-ādi-vaidagdhī, mānasī **valgu-hāsaś** ca parihāsa-vaidagdhī, vācikī **praṇaya-nirīkṣaṇaṁ** ca prema-maya-sarva-bhāva-vyañjaka-kaṭākṣa-vaidagdhī cākṣuṣī ca tair **upakalpito** dattaḥ **urur māna** ādaraḥ pūjā vā yābhyas tāḥ | tena svasmiṁs tāḥ prasādayituṁ svīyān asādhāraṇān sarvān eva sādguṇya-bhāvāṁs tāsu viniyuktavān | atas tāsāṁ nirupādhikasya premātiśayasya phalaṁ yat sva-sādguṇya-sarvasvārpaṇa-pūrvaka-tvat-kartṛkānurañjana-prāptiḥ sā hy ayantraṇaivobhayataḥ sukha-maya-mahā-vaśīkāra-vyañjikā | arjunasya tu premṇaḥ phalaṁ vaśīkāra-vyañjikā sārathya-dūty-ādi-mātra-prāptir yā, sā tūbhayato yantraṇā-mayīti na tat-sama-kakṣatāṁ prāptum arhaty arjuna iti bhāvaḥ | atraiva tṛtīyānta-padārthe bahuvrīhau, tābhir api svīya-sādguṇya-sarvasvārpaṇena so’nurañjita iti parasparānurañjana-sukha-mayaṁ sakhyaṁ vyañjitam | 

tata evāsādhāraṇa-saubhāgya-pradānam āha—**kṛtaṁ** rāse nṛtyaṁ gītaṁ vā vādanāni ca yathā, tathaiva tā apy **anukṛtavatyaḥ** tat-sāhityenaiva rāse tāsāṁ tathā nṛtyādy-ukteḥ | 

na ca tāsāṁ tat-tac-chikṣaṇābhyāsaḥ ko’py āsīd ity āha—**unmadena** mahā-premotthena **andhāḥ** vyavahāra-mātram adṛṣṭavatyaḥ | ataḥ **kila** ity āścarye, **yasyaprakṛtiṁ** svabhāvam eva **agacchan** bhagavato nṛtya-gītādi-vaidagdhy-ādayaḥ svābhāvikāḥ asādhāraṇā anantā eva ye guṇāḥ, tān sarvān api tena dattān prāpur ity arthaḥ | arjunāya tu svam asādhāraṇaṁ tad-apekṣitaṁ baliṣṭhatvam api bhagavatā na dattam iti | 

yad vā, **kṛtaṁ** govardhana-dhāraṇādikam | **unmada** unmāda iti virahaś ca darśitaḥ | evaṁ cātimandās tāvat sāyujyaṁ prāpuḥ | atyutkṛṣṭāḥ premṇaḥ parāṁ kāṣṭhām | ahaṁ tu tayor madhya-vartī svābhīpsitāṁ tava sārathya-līlāṁ kathaṁ na prāpsyāmi ? iti bhāvaḥ ||40||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **sārathya-veśe ratiḥ prārthitā, atha tad-dattena sārvajñyena sphuritāṁ nanda-rāja-putrasya tasyātipriyāṁ śṛṅgāra-līlāṁ śrāvayati—lalita-gatiś ca rāsa-nṛtya-rūpā, vilāsaś ca dhīra-lālitya-dhīrātvādi guṇa-hetuko vihāra-viśeṣaḥ! valgur manojñas tad-vihāropoyāgī hāsaś ca praṇaya-nirīkṣaṇaṁ ca premārdraḥ kaṭākṣo hārdavyañjī | taiḥ kalpito racita urumāno mahā-satkāro yāsāṁ yābhir veti mitho'nurañjanoktā | kṛtaṁ bhagavatā yad-rāse nṛtyādi tad anukṛtavatyaḥ | tena sārdhame tāsāṁ nṛtyādy abhidhānāt | unmadāndhāḥ prema-mattā gopavadhvaḥ yasya prakṛti-magan prāpuḥ, malopa ārṣaḥ | svabhāvaḥ prakṛtiḥ śīlam iti dhanañjayaḥ | kṛtaṁ govardhanoddharaṇādi veti virahaś ca vyañjitaḥ ||40||

**...**

|| 1.9.41 ||

**muni-gaṇa-nṛpa-varya-saṅkule’ntaḥ-**

**sadasi yudhiṣṭhira-rājasūya eṣām |**

**arhaṇam upapeda īkṣaṇīyo**

**mama dṛśi-gocara eṣa āvir ātmā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **jagat-pūjyatām anusmarann āha | muni-gaṇair nṛpair yaiś ca saṅkule vyāpte’ntaḥ-sadasi sabhā-madhye yudhiṣṭhirasya rāja-sūye eṣāṁ muni-gaṇādīnām īkṣaṇīyaḥ aho rūpam aho mahimety evam āścaryeṇa vilokanīyaḥ sann arhaṇam upapade prāpa | eṣa jatām ātmā mama dṛśi-gocaro dṛṣṭi-viṣayaḥ sann āviḥ prakaṭo vartate | aho me bhāgyam iti bhāvaḥ ||41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tad evaṁ sarva-śubha-svabhāvatvam uktvā sarva-pūjyatva-sarva-manoharatva-sarva-durlabha-darśanatvāny āha—muni-gaṇeti | ātmā paramātmā _||_41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kiṁ ca, samprati pratyakṣīkṛtaṁ mad-bhāgyam eva tat-prāpter āvaśyakatvaṁ kathayatīty āha munīti | antaḥ-sadasi sabhā-madhye yudhiṣṭhirasya rājasūye eṣāṁ muni-gaṇādīnām īkṣaṇīyaḥ aho rūpam aho mahimety evam āścaryeṇa vilokanīyaḥ san upapede prāpa yaḥ sa eṣa mamātmā mat-prāṇa-nāthaḥ samprati mama dṛśi gocara eva mat-prārthitaṁ dadāna evāste iti ||41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **sarvābhyacyatvaṁ smaraṁs tad eva svaprāpyaṁ rūpaṁ prārthayate—ambhaḥ-sadasi sabhāmadhye yudhiṣṭhirasya rājasūye yajñe munigaṇādīnām aho lāvaṇyam aho mahimā ity evam īkṣaṇīyaḥ sann arhaṇam agra-pūjām upapede, sa eṣa ātmā viśvāntaryāmī vibhu-vijñānānandaḥ kṛṣṇo mama dṛg-gocaraḥ san āvirāste, madīyaṁ bhāgyaṁ mahad iti bhāvaḥ ||41||

**...**

|| 1.9.42 ||

**tam imam aham ajaṁ śarīra-bhājāṁ**

**hṛdi hṛdi dhiṣṭhitam ātma-kalpitānām |**

**pratidṛśam iva naikadhārkam ekaṁ**

**samadhi-gato’smi vidhūta-bheda-mohaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **so’haṁ kṛtārtho’smīty āha—tam imam ajaṁ samyag adhigataḥ prāpto’smi | samyaktvam āha—vidhūta-bheda-mohaḥ | tad-arthaṁ bhedasyaupādhikatvam āha—ātma-kalpitānāṁ svayaṁ nirmitānāṁ śarīra-bhājāṁ prāṇināṁ hṛdi hṛdi prati-hṛdayaṁ dhiṣṭhitam adhiṣṭhitam | adhiṣṭhāya sthitam iti yāvat | a-kāra-lopas tv ārṣaḥ | naikadhā anekadhā | adhiṣṭhāna-bhedād anekadhā bhātam ity arthaḥ | atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ—sarva-prāṇināṁ dṛśaṁ dṛśaṁ pratyekam evārkam anekadhā pratītam iveti ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **paramātmatva-sthāpanāya tatra vibhūmatvaṁ darśayan svam atyupakalpanam evopasaṁharati—tam iti | tam imam agrata evopaviṣṭaṁ śrī-kṛṣṇaṁ vyaṣṭy-antaryāmi-rūpeṇa nijāṁśena śarīra-bhājāṁ hṛdi hṛdi dhiṣṭhitam | 


    kecit sva-dehāntar hṛdayāvakāśe


    prādeśa-mātraṁ puruṣaṁ vasantam || [bhā.pu. 2.2.8] 

ity-ukta-diśā tat-tad-rūpeṇa bhinna-mūrtimatsu[^81] vasantam apy ekam abhinna-mūrtim eva samadhi-gato’smi | ayaṁ paramānanda-vigraha eva vyāpakaḥ svāntar bhūtena nijākāra-viśeṣeṇāntar yāmitayā tatra tatra sphuratīti vijñātavān asmi, yato’haṁ vidhūta-bheda-mohaḥ | asyaiva kṛpayā durīkṛto bheda-mohaḥ | bhagavad-vigrahasya vyāpakatvāsambhāvanā-janita-tan-nānātva-jñāna[^82]-lakṣaṇo moho yasya tathā-bhūto’ham | 

teṣu vyāpakatve hetuḥ—ātma-kalpitānām, ātmany eva paramāśraye prāduṣkṛtānām | tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ—pratidiśaṁ[^83] iti | prāṇināṁ nānā-deśa-sthitānām avalokanam avalokanaṁ prati, yathaika evārko[^84] vṛkṣa-kuḍyādy-upari-gatatvena tatrāpi kutracid avyavadhānaḥ sampūrṇatvena sa-vyavadhānas tv asampūrṇatvenānekadhā dṛśyate, tathety arthaḥ | dṛṣṭānto’yam ekasyaiva tatra tatrodaya ity etan-mātrāṁśe | vastutas tu śrī-bhagavad-vigraho’cintya-śaktyā tathā bhāsate, sūryas tu dūrastha-vistīrṇātmatā-svabhāveneti viśeṣaḥ |

athavā taṁ pūrva-varṇita-svarūpam imam agrata evopaviṣṭaṁ śarīra-bhājāṁ hṛdi hṛdi santam api samadhigato’smi | yadyapy antaryāmi-rūpam etasmād rūpād anyākāraṁ, tathāpy etad-rūpam evādhunā tatra tatra tathā[^85] paśyāmi | sarvato mahā-prabhāvasya tasya rūpasyāgrato’nyasya rūpasya sphuraṇāśakter iti bhāvaḥ | atra dṛṣṭānto deśa-bhede’py abheda-bodhanāya jñeyaḥ, na tu pūrṇāpūrṇatva-vivakṣāyai | 

amīlita-dṛg vyadhārayat [bhā.pu. 1.9.30] iti, kṛṣṇa evaṁ bhagavati mano-vāk-kāya-vṛttibhiḥ [bhā.pu. 1.9.43] ity upakramopasaṁhārādibhir atra śrī-vigraha eva prastūyate | tato nedaṁ padyaṁ brahma-paraṁ vyākhyeyam iti[^86] ||42|| [bhagavat-sandarbha 31]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu kathaṁ tarhi me ratir astv ity eka-vāram api yuṣmat-prayogeṇa na brūṣe kintu pratiślokam eva | vijaya-sakhe vijaya-ratha-kuṭumbe me ratir astu | caraṇa-ratiḥ paramasya tasya me’stu sa bhavatu me bhagavān gatir iti tac-chabda-prayogeṇeveti tatrāha—tam iti | 

taṁ pārtha-sārathiṁ pragraha-pratodālaṅkṛta-dhāma-dakṣiṇa-karaṁ mama hṛdi sphurantam eva imam adhigato’smi, na tv imam eva tam | tasyaiva hṛdi ayaṁ praveṣṭuṁ na śaknotīti bhāvaḥ | taṁ kīdṛśam ? ajaṁ na jāyate ity ajaḥ, taṁ na kevalaṁ tadānīṁ yuddha-kāle eva tādṛśa-svarūpo mac-cakṣuṣor agre sa jāto’pi tu yuddhāt pūrvam api svābhāvikena mama rathena mama hṛdi tathā bhāta āsīd eveti bhāvaḥ | tenātra na mama doṣaḥ, kintu hṛdi-sthaḥ parameśvaro yaṁ yaṁ yathā sphorayati bhadram abhadraṁ vā, sa tathaivāsās te ity āha—śarīra-bhājāṁ jīvānāṁ hṛdi hṛdi dhiṣṭhitam, a-kāra-lopaś chāndasaḥ | ātmanāṁ svayam eva kalpitānāṁ yathāgneḥ kṣudrā visphuliṅgā vyuccaranti [bṛ.ā. u. 2.1.20] iti śruteḥ | 

na cāhaṁ hṛdi-sthaṁ tat-pada-vācyaṁ pārtha-sārathim anyaṁ tathā purastham idaṁ pada-vācyaṁ caturbhujam anyaṁ jānāmīty āha—pratīti | ākāśa-stham ekam arkam api janānāṁ pratidṛśam avalokanaṁ prati naikadhā anekadhā, “ayaṁ man-mūrdhopari arkaḥ” iti pratimūrdhopari-stham arkaṁ tat-tad-dṛṣṭi-bhedād anekadhā bhātam iveti | vidhūto durīkṛto bheda-rūpo moho yena saḥ | 

ayam arthaḥ—mama hṛdi tathā yudhiṣṭhirādīnāṁ vasudevādīnām uddhavādīnāṁ nandādīnāṁ gopikānāṁ ca hṛdi bhāva-bhedena prema-tāratamyena ca pṛthak-pṛthak-līlatayaiva yadyapi sphurati, tad apy eka eva kṛṣṇa iti jānāmi | tathā teṣāṁ tat-tat-premṇāṁ tat-tad-bhāvānāṁ cotkarṣa-tāratamyaṁ sarvam ahaṁ jānāmy eva | tad api me pārtha-sārathāv eva svābhāvikyāsaktiḥ | tāṁ tyaktuṁ naiva śaknomi | pura-sthite’smiṁś caturbhuja-rūpe dhāraṇāpi kṛtā, sāpy akiñcitkarīvābhūd iti ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu pārtha-sārathim eva mām arthayase, yoginas tu prādeśa-mātraṁ tattvaṁ cintayanti, kecit sva-dehāntar hṛdayāvakāśe prādeśa-mātraṁ puruṣaṁ vasantam [bhā.pu. 2.2.8] iti-smaraṇāt | taṁ kim anayo rūpayor bhedo'sti? tatrāha—tam iti | taṁ pārtha-sārathim evemaṁ hṛd-gataṁ prādeśa-mātraṁ samadhi-gato jānann asmi | sa eva svāṁśena tanmātra ity arthaḥ | kīdṛśo'ham ity āha—vidhūto bheda-rūpo moho yasya saḥ | eko'pi san bahudhā yo'vabhāti [go.tā.u. pūrva. 32] iti śruteḥ | tam imaṁ ca kīdṛśam ity āha—ajaṁ nūtana-deha-lābha-śūnyaṁ nitya-mūrtim ity arthaḥ | ātmanā svenaiva kalpitānāṁ nirmitānāṁ śarīra-bhājāṁ jīvānāṁ hṛdi hṛdi dhiṣṭhitaṁ niyāmakatayā sthitam | alopa ārṣaḥ | śarīra-bhāktvena jīvānāṁ nirmāṇam ihoktaṁ, yathāgneḥ kṣudrā visphuliṅgā vyuccaranti [bṛ.ā.u. 2.1.20] iti, sarva-bhūtāntarātmā [brahma-vidyopa. 105] iti ca śruteḥ | kathaṁ? pratidṛśaṁ pratinetram anekadhā dṛśyamānam ekam arkam iva | na ca mokṣe jīveśayor bhedo niṣiddhaḥ, nirañjanaḥ paramaṁ sāmyam upaiti [mu.u. 3.1.3] iti tatra tasya śrutatvāt ||42||

**...**

|| 1.9.43 ||

**sūta uvāca—**

**kṛṣṇa evaṁ bhagavati mano-vāg-dṛṣṭi-vṛttibhiḥ |**

**ātmany ātmānam āveśya so’ntaḥ-śvāsa upāramat ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** mano-vāg-dṛṣṭīnāṁ vṛttibhiḥ | paramātmani śrī-kṛṣṇe | antar eva vilīnaḥ śvāso yasya saḥ ||43||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : evam ātmani** hṛdi sthite **kṛṣṇe,** pārtha-sārathāv ity arthaḥ | **ātmānaṁ** svam **āveśya** āveśa-yuktaṁ kṛtvā | **antar** eva līnaḥ **śvāso** yasya saḥ | bahir vṛtter **upararāma** ||43||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **ātmani vibhu-vijñānānande kṛṣṇe bhagavaty evaṁ pārtha-sārathitvena vijñāte mana-ādi-vṛttibhir ātmānaṁ svamāveśya nirataṁ kṛtvā pūrakeṇāntaḥ-śvāsaḥ sann upāramat nivṛttim agāt | bhīṣmasya paramārtyaikāntitvāt-tat-prāṇāder ihaiva vigamaḥ, sa tu viśuddhaḥ puraḥsthaṁ kṛṣṇaṁ prāpety ārta-bhāga-yājñavalkya-praśnottarā-dveditavyam, etac ca spaṣṭau hy ekeṣām [ve.sū. 4.2.13] iti sūtra-bhāṣye nirṇītaṁ draṣṭavyam | evam aspandāsuryathā taruḥ [bhā.pu. 12.6.9] ity atra parīkṣito'pi tādṛśasya vyākhyeyam ||43||

**...**

|| 1.9.44 ||

**sampadyamānam ājñāya bhīṣmaṁ brahmaṇi niṣkale |**

**sarve babhūvus te tūṣṇīṁ vayāṁsīva dinātyaye ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : niṣkale** nirupādhau parātmani | **saṁpadyamānaṁ** militam **ājñāyā** ālakṣya | **vayāṁsi** pakṣiṇa iva ||44||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **sampadyamānam iti | **niṣkala**-**brahma**-śabdena māyātīto narākṛti-para-brahma-bhūtaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa evocyate | tasmin sampadyamānatā tat-saṅgatir eva | tathoktaṁ saptame—


        adhokṣajālambham ihāśubhātmanaḥ


        śarīriṇaḥ saṁsṛti-cakra-śātanam |


        tad brahma-nirvāṇa-sukhaṁ vidur budhās


        tato bhajadhvaṁ hṛdaye hṛd-īśvaram || [bhā.pu. 7.7.37] iti |

atra bhīṣmasya vasutvāt— yāvad-adhikāram avasthitir ādhikārikāṇāṁ [ve.sū. 3.3.33] ity adhikaraṇa-virodhaḥ syād iti cen, na | līlayā svāṁśena tatrāpy avasthiti-sambhavāt | tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu kāmācāro bhavati [chā.u. 7.25.2] iti mukti-viśeṣa-pratipādaka-śruteś ca | evam eva mahābhāratāvirodho’pi syāt ||44||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **evaṁ bhīṣmaḥ svābhilaṣitaṁ pārtha-sārathiṁ prāpa, lokās tu tad-avidvāṁso **bhīṣmo brahmaṇi** līno **babhūva** iti jānanti smety āha—sampadyeti | ajñāne dṛṣṭāntaḥ—**vayāṁsi** pakṣiṇaḥ **dinasyātyaye** avasāne sati dinaṁ na dṛṣṭam iti dinasya svarūpa-dhvaṁsam eva jñātvā yathā **tuṣṇīṁ bhavanti** na śabdāyanta ity arthaḥ | na tu vastuto dinaṁ naśyati, tat-kṣaṇe’pi varṣāntare tasya sthiter avagamāt yāma-catuṣṭayānantaraṁ tatrāpi punar āgamāt | evaṁ bhīṣmasyāpy atyaye bhīṣmo mukta ity ajñā vidanti | vijñās tu tadaiva prakaṭa-prakāśe ratha-caraṇa-pāṇinā kṛṣṇena bhūmau dhāvatā saha bhīṣmo yudhyata eveti punar āgāmi-kṛṣṇāvatāre tena saha bhīṣma āvirbhaviṣyaty eveti jānanti | 

yad vā, niṣkaṁ padakaṁ lāti tasmin brahmaṇi śrī-kṛṣṇa ity arthaḥ | brahma-sāyujya-prāptis tu na vyākhyeyā | nitya-pārṣada-bhīṣmeṇa phalābhisandhi-rahitāyā rater vāñchitatvāt mokṣasyākāmitatvāt bhagavatāpi balād akāmita-phala-dānānaucityāt ||44||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tadā śruta-bhīṣmābhy arthanāḥ sarve muni-prabhṛtayo niṣkale padakābharaṇadhāriṇe kṛṣṇe brahmaṇi bhīṣmaṁ saṁpadya-mānaṁ milantam ājñāya tūṣṇīṁ babhūvuḥ—


    niṣkamantrī sāṣṭa-hemaśate dīnāra-karṣayoḥ | 


    vakṣgolaṅkaraṇe hema-pātre hema-pale'pi ca || iti medinī | 

vayāṁsi pakṣiṇaḥ ||44||

**...**

|| 1.9.45 ||

**tatra dundubhayo nedur deva-mānava-vāditāḥ |**

**śaśaṁsuḥ sādhavo rājñāṁ khāt petuḥ puṣpa-vṛṣṭayaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** devair mānavaiś ca vāditāḥ | rājñāṁ madhye ye sādhavo’nusūyavaḥ ||45||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tatreti **rājñāṁ** sabhāyām iti śeṣaḥ | **sādhavo** muny-ādayaḥ ||45||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** rājñāṁ madhye sādhavo’nasūyavaḥ ||45||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **rājñāṁ madhye ye sādhavo'nasūyavaste tasya yaśaḥ śaśaṁsur ūcuḥ ||45||

**...**

|| 1.9.46 ||

**tasya nirharaṇādīni samparetasya bhārgava |**

**yudhiṣṭhiraḥ kārayitvā muhūrtaṁ duḥkhito’bhavat ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : nirharaṇādīni** dāha-saṁskārādīni | **samyak** paretasya, muktasyāpīty arthaḥ ||46||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : nirharaṇādīni** saṁskārān | **samparetasya** iti nitya-pārṣade bhīṣme vasoḥ praveśāt tasyaiva deha-tyāgo bhagavatā darśitaḥ | yāvad adhikāram avasthitir ādhikārikāṇāṁ [ve.sū. 3.3.33] iti nyāyena tasyaivāṁśena vasutve ca sthitir bhagaval-loke prāptiś ca | ataḥ samyak paraṁ parameśvaram itasya prāptasyeti vyākhyeyam | tasya sarveṣu lokeṣu kāma-caṛo bhavati [chā.u. 7.25.2] iti mukti-viśeṣa-pratipādaka-śruteḥ | nitya-pārṣada-bhūtasya bhīṣmasya tv aprakaṭa-līlāyāṁ pārthasārathi-prāptir uktaiva | ata eva tatra so’ntaḥ śvāsaḥ prāṇo yasya tathā-bhūtaḥ sann upāramat prakaṭa-prakāśād uparato’bhūd iti | tatrārthaḥ sammataḥ dehaṁ tatyāja prāṇāṁs tatyājety-ādy anukter iti | **mūhūrtaṁ duḥkhita** iti loka-vyavahāra-rakṣārtham ||46||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tasya bhīṣma-dehasya nirharaṇādīni karmāṇi kārayaitvā, kīdṛśasya? sampare tasya tyakta-prāṇasya, yudhiṣṭhiro lokarītim āśritya duḥkhito'bhavat, idam iha bodhyam—bhīṣmaḥ kṛṣṇaṁ prāpa, samyak paraṁ kṛṣṇam itasyety arthāt | tat-praviṣṭau vasustu svargam agād adhikārānte tasya mokṣo bhāvī, yāvad adhikāram avasthitir ādhikārikāṇām [ve.sū. 3.3.33] iti nyāyād iti ||46||

**...**

|| 1.9.47 ||

**tuṣṭuvur munayo hṛṣṭāḥ kṛṣṇaṁ tad-guhya-nāmabhiḥ |**

**tatas te kṛṣṇa-hṛdayāḥ svāśramān prayayuḥ punaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : tasya guhya-nāmabhir** vedoktaiḥ | kṛṣṇa eva hṛdayaṁ yeṣāṁ te **kṛṣṇa-hṛdayāḥ** ||47||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : guhya-nāmabhir** dustarkya-mahima-vyañjaka-nāmabhiḥ kṛṣṇa-govindety-ādibhiḥ ||47||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : tad-guhya-nāmabhiḥ,** he bhakta-vatsala kṛṣṇa premādhīna namas tvac-cāturyāyaiveti ||47||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tasya guhyanām abhir bhakta-bandhu-bhaktādhīnety-ādibhiḥ ||47||

**...**

|| 1.9.48 ||

**tato yudhiṣṭhiro gatvā saha-kṛṣṇo gajāhvayam |**

**pitaraṁ sāntvayām āsa gāndhārīṁ ca tapasvinīm ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : pitaraṁ** dhṛtarāṣṭram | **tapasvinīṁ** santāpavatīm ||48||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** pitaraṁ dhṛtarāṣṭram ||48||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **pitaraṁ dhṛtarāṣṭraṁ, tapasvinīṁ putra-śokākulām ||48||

**...**

|| 1.9.49 ||

**pitrā cānumato rājā vāsudevānumoditaḥ |**

**cakāra rājyaṁ dharmeṇa pitṛ-paitāmahaṁ vibhuḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : rājā** yudhiṣṭhiraḥ | **anumato**’nujñātaḥ ||49||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **pitrā dhṛtarāṣtreṇā ||49||

iti sārārtha-darśinyāṁ harṣiṇyāṁ bhakta-cetasām |

navamo’tra prathame saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām ||*||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **pitrā dhṛtarāṣṭreṇa ||49||

 \
iti śrī-vaiṣṇavānandinyāṁ prathama-skandha-ṭippanyāṁ navamo'dhyāyaḥ ||9||

**...**

iti śrīmad-bhāgavate mahā-purāṇe brahma-sūtra-bhāṣye

pāramahaṁsyaṁ saṁhitāyāṁ vaiyāsikyāṁ prathama-skandhe

yudhiṣṭhira-rājya-pralambho nāma

navamo’dhyāyaḥ

||9||

**...**

 

(1.10)


## atha daśamo’dhyāyaḥ


### bhagavataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇasya dvārakā-gamanam |

**|| 1.10.1 ||**

**śaunaka uvāca—**

**hatvā sva-riktha-spṛdha ātatāyino**

**yudhiṣṭhiro dharma-bhṛtāṁ variṣṭhaḥ |**

**sahānujaiḥ pratyavaruddha-bhojanaḥ**

**kathaṁ pravṛttaḥ kim akāraṣīt tataḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :**

daśame kṛta-kāryasya hastināpuro hareḥ |

strībhiḥ saṁstūyamānasya varṇyate dvārakāgamaḥ ||

rājyaṁ ca-kārety uktaṁ, tataḥ pṛcchati—**hatveti** | **svasya rikthe** dhane **spardhante** sma ye te tathā | yad vā, sva-rikthāya spṛt saṅgrāmo yeṣām  eva dhanādi-haraṇād **ātatāyinaḥ,** tān **hatvā** | **pratyavaruddha-bhojano** bandhu-vadha-duḥkhena saṅkucita-bhogo, rājya-lābhena prāpta-bhogo vā | **kathaṁ** rājye **pravṛttaḥ** ? pravṛtto vā **tataḥ kim akārṣīt**? ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :**

nāsya niṣkaṇṭake rājye pāṇḍavaṁ sva-purīṁ hareḥ |

gacchataḥ kuru-nārībhiḥ stutir daśama ucyate ||

vāsudevānumodenaiva rājya-pravṛtti-prajā-pālanādikaṁ sāmānyato jñātvāpi viśeṣaṁ jijñāsuḥ pṛcchati—hatveti | **svasya rikthe** dhane **spardhante** sma ye, tān | śatrubhir avaruddhaṁ yadāsīti, tat tebhyaḥ sakāśāt **pratyavaruddhaṁ** punaś ca sva-vaśīkṛtaṁ **bhojanaṁ** bhogo yena saḥ ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :**

rājye yudhiṣṭhiraṁ nyasya govinde hata-kaṇṭake | \
gacchan dvārāvatīṁ strībhiḥ saṁstuto daśame muhuḥ || \


kṛṣṇa-tad-bhaktayoḥ kathāsva vitṛptaḥ punaḥ pṛcchati—**hatveti** | **svasya rikthe** dhane ye spardhante sma, tān dhanāpahāritvād ātatāyino duryodhanādīn **hatvā** | śatrubhir yad avaruddhaṁ tat tebhyaḥ sakāśāt **praty avaruddhaṁ** punar vaśīkṛtaṁ **bhojanaṁ** bhogo yena saḥ ||1||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.2 ||**

**sūta uvāca—**

**vaṁśaṁ kuror vaṁśa-davāgni-nirhṛtaṁ**

**saṁrohayitvā bhava-bhāvano hariḥ |**

**niveśayitvā nija-rājya īśvaro**

**yudhiṣṭhiraṁ prīta-manā babhūva ha ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **rājya-pravṛttau śrī-kṛṣṇasya prītiṁ paryālocya pravṛtta ity āśayenottaram āha | **vaṁśaṁ kuroḥ samrohiyatvā** parīkṣid-rakṣaṇena saṁrohya aṅkuritaṁ kṛtvā | kathaṁ-bhūtam ?**vaṁśa-davāgni-nirhṛtaṁ** vaṁśa eva davo vanaṁ, tasmād udbhūto yaḥ krodha-rūpo’**gniḥ,** tena **nirhṛtaṁ** dagdham | nija-rājye niveśya ca ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : vaṁśam** ity asya ṭīkāyāṁ rājya-pravṛtter uttaram āhety anvayaḥ ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **śrī-kṛṣṇasya prītiṁ paryālocyaiva pravṛtta ity āśayenottaram āha—**kuror vaṁśaṁ vaṁśa-davāgninā **iva **nirhṛtaṁ** nirdagdhaṁ **saṁrohayitvā** parīkṣid-rakṣaṇena saṁrohya, davo vanaṁ vaṁśānāṁ vanam, yathā sva-saṅgharṣotthenāgninā dahyate, tathaiva kuror vaṁśam api paraspara-krodhottha-yuddhena hatam ity arthaḥ | **bhavaṁ** mahā-devam api **bhāvayati** sva-līlāṁ dhyāpayatīti saḥ ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **bhagavat-prītiṁ vilokya rājye pravṛtta iti bhāvenottaram āha—**kuru-vaṁśaṁ vaṁśa-davāgnin eva nirhṛtaṁ** nirdagdhaṁ **saṁrohayitva** parīkṣid-rakṣaṇena sphuritaṁ kṛtvā ity arthaḥ | veṇūnāṁ vanaṁ yathā mithaḥ saṅgharṣotthenāgninā dagdhaṁ bhaved evaṁ kurūṇāṁ vṛndam api krodhotthena yuddhena hatam ity arthaḥ | bhavaṁ śivam api bhāvayati sva-līlām iti **bhava-bhāvanaḥ** | harati sva-bhaktānāṁ duḥkham iti **hariḥ** ||2||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.3 || **

**niśamya bhīṣmoktam athācyutoktaṁ**

**pravṛtta-vijñāna-vidhūta-vibhramaḥ |**

**śaśāsa gām indra ivājitāśrayaḥ**

**paridhy-upāntām anujānuvartitaḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **


    amātyā mantriṇo dūtāḥ śreṇayaś ca purohitāḥ |


    purañjana-padaṁ ceti sapta-praṇidhayaḥ smṛtāḥ || iti brāhme ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **pravṛttau hetum uktvā kim akārṣīt ? ity asyottaram āha | **pravṛttaṁ** yad **vijñānaṁ** parmeśvarādhīnaṁ jagan na svatantram ity evaṁ-bhūtaṁ tena **vidhūto vibhramo**’haṅkārtety evaṁ-bhūto moho yasya saḥ | **anujair anuvartitaḥ** sevataḥ san | **ajitaḥ** śrī-kṛṣṇa ev**āśrayo** yasya saḥ | **paridhiḥ** samudras tat-paryantāṁ **gāṁ** pṛthivīṁ pālayām āsa ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : niśamya **iti | **pravṛttaṁ** yad **vijñānaṁ** parameśvarādhīnaṁ jagan na svatantram ity evaṁ-bhūtaṁ tena **vidhūto vibhramo**’haṁ kartety evaṁ-bhūto moho yasya saḥ | **gāṁ **pṛthvīṁ svargaṁ ca | **ajitaḥ** śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ upendraś ca **paridhayaḥ** samudrād ūrdhvagaṁ diṅ-maṇḍalaṁ ca **anujānām anuvartitā** anuvṛttir yasmin | pakṣe, anujenopendreṇānuvṛttiṁ prāpitāḥ ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kim akārṣīt ? ity asyottaram āha—**niśamya** iti | **pravṛttaṁ** yad-**vijñānaṁ** pareśādhīno loko na svatantra ity evaṁ-bhūtena **vidhūto vibhramaḥ** svatantra-kartṛtvābhimāno yasya saḥ | **gāṁ** pṛthivīṁ svargaṁ ca | **ajitāśrayaḥ** kṛṣṇa-sahāyaś ca **paridhayo**'rṇavā urdhvaga-diśaś ca | **anujānāṁ** bhīmādīnām **anuvartitā** yasmin saḥ | pakṣe, anujenopendraṇānuvṛttiṁ prāpitaḥ ||3||

**...**

**|| 1.10.4 || **

**kāmaṁ vavarṣa parjanyaḥ sarva-kāma-dughā mahī |**

**siṣicuḥ sma vrajān gāvaḥ payasodhasvatīr mudā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tasya rājyam anuvarṇayati—**kāmam** iti tribhiḥ | **mahī** **sarva-kāma-dogdhrī** babhūva | **vrajān** goṣṭhāni | **ūdhasvatīr** ūdhasvatyaḥ ūdhaḥ kṣīrāśayaḥ, tadvatyaḥ sthūlodhasa ity arthaḥ | **siṣicur** abhyaṣiñcan ||4||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._ **

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** **ūdhasvatīḥ** sthūlāḥ pīnavatyaḥ ||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **rājye sukha-samṛddhim āha—**kāmam** iti | **ūdhasvatīḥ** sthūla-pīnavatyaḥ ||4||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.5 || **

**nadyaḥ samudrā girayaḥ sa-vanaspati-vīrudhaḥ |**

**phalanty oṣadhayaḥ sarvāḥ kāmam anvṛtu tasya vai ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : anvṛtu** ṛtāv ṛtau ||5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : anvṛtu** sarveṣu ṛtuṣu | **tasya** yudhiṣṭhirasya ||5||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.6 || **

**nādhayo vyādhayaḥ kleśā daiva-bhūtātma-hetavaḥ |**

**ajāta-śatrāv abhavan jantūnāṁ rājñi karhicit ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : ādhayo** mano-vyathāḥ | **vyādhayo** rogāḥ | **kleśāḥ** śītoṣṇādi-kṛtāḥ | **daivaṁ bhūtāni cātmā hetur** yeṣām  ādhidaivikādīnāṁ te **jantūnāṁ** **nābhavan** ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : ādhayo** mānasa-pīḍāḥ, **vyādhayo** jvarādayo rogāḥ | **kleśāḥ** kāma-krodha-lobha-mohādayaḥ | **daivādayo hetavo** yeṣāṁ te | **daiva**-hetur anāvṛṣṭy-ādiḥ, **bhūta**-hetur unmādādiḥ, **ātma**-hetuḥ kuṣṭhādiḥ ||6||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.7 || **

**uṣitvā hāstinapure māsān katipayān hariḥ |**

**suhṛdāṁ ca viśokāya svasuś ca priya-kāmyayā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **idānīṁ dvārakā-gamanaṁ nirūpayitum āha—**uṣitvā** iti | **svasuḥ** subhadrāyāḥ ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : svasuḥ** subhadrāyāḥ ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **atha dvārvatī-prayāṇaṁ varṇayitum āha—**uṣitvā** iti | **svasur** bhaginyāḥ subhadrāyāḥ ||7||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.8 || **

**āmantrya cābhyanujñātaḥ pariṣvajyābhivādya tam |**

**āruroha rathaṁ kaiścit pariṣvakto'bhivāditaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** **taṁ** yudhiṣṭhiram ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : taṁ** yudhiṣṭhiram **āmantrya** pṛthayā abhivādya praṇamya tena **pariṣvajya** **abhyanujñāto** datta-sammatikaḥ kṛṣṇo **ratham āruroha** ||8||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.9 || **

**subhadrā draupadī kuntī virāṭa-tanayā tathā |**

**gāndhārī dhṛtarāṣṭraś ca yuyutsur gautamo yamau ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : yuyutsur** dhṛtarāṣṭrād vaiśyāyāṁ jātaḥ | **gautamaḥ** kṛpaḥ | **yamau** nakula-sahadevau ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : yuyutsur** dhṛtarāṣṭrād vaiśyāyāṁ jātaḥ | **gautamaḥ** kṛpaḥ ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : yuyutsur** dhṛtarāṣṭrād vaiśyāyāṁ patnyāṁ jātaḥ pāṇḍavānuyāyī mahāvīraḥ, **gautamaḥ** kṛpācāryaḥ ||9||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.10 || **

**vṛkodaraś ca dhaumyaś ca striyo matsya-sutādayaḥ |**

**na sehire vimuhyanto virahaṁ śārṅga-dhanvanaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : matsya-sutā** uttarā | tasyāḥ punar grahaṇaṁ garbha-rakṣaka-kṛṣṇa-virahe mohādhikyāt | yad vā, matsya-sutā satyavatī ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : matsya-sutā** uttarā | tasyāḥ punar grahaṇaṁ garbha-rakṣaṇa-kṛte mohādhikyāt | yad vā, matsya-sutā satyavatī ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : matsya-sutā** satyavatī ||10||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.11-12 || **

**sat-saṅgān mukta-duḥsaṅgo hātuṁ notsahate budhaḥ |**

**kīrtyamānaṁ yaśo yasya sakṛd ākarṇya rocanam ||**

**tasmin nyasta-dhiyaḥ pārthāḥ saheran virahaṁ katham |**

**darśana-sparśa-saṁlāpa- śayanāsana-bhojanaiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **teṣāṁ kṛṣṇa-virahāsahanaṁ kaimutya-nyāyenāha—**sat-saṅgād** iti dvābhyām | **satāṁ saṅgād** hetor **muktaḥ** putrādi-viṣayo **duḥsaṅgo** yena saḥ | sadbhiḥ kīrtyamānaṁ **ruci-karaṁ** yasya **yaśaḥ** **sakṛd** apy **ākarṇya** sat-saṅgaṁ tyaktuṁ na śaknoti | **darśanādibhis** **tasmin** śrī-kṛṣṇe **nyastā** adhyastā **dhīr** yeṣāṁ te ||11-12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

**prīti-sandarbhaḥ 88 :** sneha-sthāyi-bhāvam āha—**satsaṅgād** ity-ādi-caturbhiḥ | **viceluḥ** (13) arhaṇādy-ānayanārtham itas tataś calanti sma | **abhadraṁ** (14) yātrā-samaye duḥśakunaṁ prābhūd iti **nyarundhan** (14) ācchāditavatyaḥ ||11-14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : yasya yaśo'pi hātuṁ budho notsahate**, tasya virahaṁ **pārthāḥ** **kathaṁ saheran **? ity anvayaḥ | **rocanaṁ** rocakam | budhaḥ kīdṛśaḥ? **sat-saṅgān** **mukto duḥsaṅgo** yena saḥ, tena sat-saṅgaṁ vinā duḥsaṅgo mada-matsarādi-hetur nāpayāti, tad-apagamena vinā bhagavad-yaśo rocakaṁ dustyajaṁ ca na bhavatīti siddhānte dhvanitaḥ | pārthāḥ kīdṛśāḥ ? **darśanādibhis** **tasmin** kṛṣṇe eva **nyasta-dhiyaḥ** ||11-12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : yasya yaśo**'pi **budho** **hātuṁ** **na sahate**, **tasya virahaṁ pārthāḥ kathaṁ saheran** ? iti sambandhaḥ | **rocanaṁ** rocakaṁ | budhaḥ kīdṛśaḥ? ity āha–**sad** iti | **sat-saṅgaṁ** vinā mada-matsarādi-hetur **duḥsaṅgo** nāpagacchati | tad-apagamaṁ vinā tad yaśo rocakaṁ dustyajaṁ ca na syād iti bhāvaḥ || pārthāḥ kīdṛśāḥ? **darśanādibhis tasmin nyasta-dhiyaḥ** ||11-12||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.13 || **

**sarve te'nimiṣair akṣais tam anu druta-cetasaḥ |**

**vīkṣantaḥ sneha-sambaddhā vicelus tatra tatra ha ||**

** **

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **ata eva **animiṣair** netrais **tatra tatra** arhaṇānayanādy-arthaṁ calanti sma | yataḥ snehena **samyag baddhāḥ** | ata eva **tam anu** **drutāni** gatāni **cetaṁsi** yeṣāṁ, te ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **ata eva **animiṣair akṣais** **tam** eva **vīkṣamāṇāḥ** | **anu** vīkṣaṇānantaraṁ **vi**klinna-**cetasaḥ** tataḥ **snehena** **sam**yag **baddhāḥ** | ata eva **tatra tatra viceluḥ,** yatra yatra sa calati smety arthaḥ ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **ata eva **animiṣair akṣais tam** eva **vīkṣamāṇāḥ** | **anu** vīkṣaṇānantaraṁ **tatra tatra** **viceluḥ,** yatra yatra sa cacāla ||13||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.14 || **

**nyarundhann udgalad bāṣpam autkaṇṭhyād devakī-sute |**

**niryāty agārān no'bhadram iti syād bāndhava-striyaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : agārān niryāti** nirgacchati sati | **autkaṇṭhyād** āsakty-atiśayād dhetor **udgalat** sravad **bāṣpam** aśru **nyarundhan** netreṣv eva stambhitavatyaḥ | tatra hetuḥ—**abhadraṁ no** **syād** amaṅgalaṁ mā bhūd ity etad-artham ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : niryāti** ity aśru-śoṣakeṇa bhayenety arthaḥ ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : agārān niryāti** nirgacchati sati **autkaṇṭhyād** dhetor **udgalantaṁ** sravantaṁ **bāṣpam** aśru **nyarundhan** stambhitavatyaḥ | tatra hetuḥ—**abhadraṁ no** **syād** amaṅgalaṁ mā bhūd ity etad-artham | atra udgalad iti śatṛ-pratyayena ud-upasargeṇa ca yatnato niruddhāny apy aśrūṇi sasrur eva kevalam aṅga-nivāraṇārthaṁ paṭāñcalena gopayāñcakrur iti labhyate ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : agārān niryāti** sati **autkaṇṭhyād udgalantaṁ** **bāṣpaṁ nyarundhan** stambhayāñcakruḥ | **abhadraṁ** mā bhūd ity etad-artham | atra bāṣpa-sravo'bhūd eva, taṁ cāvaguṇṭhanenāvavrur ity arthaḥ ||14||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.15 || **

**mṛdaṅga-śaṅkha-bheryaś ca vīṇā-paṇava-gomukhāḥ |**

**dhundhury-ānaka-ghaṇṭādyā nedur dundubhayas tathā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : mṛdaṅgādayo** daśa vādya-bhedāḥ ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : mṛdaṅgādayo** vādya-bhedāḥ ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : mṛdaṅgādayo** vāditra-bhedāḥ ||15||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.16 || **

**prāsāda-śikharārūḍhāḥ kuru-nāryo didṛkṣayā |**

**vavṛṣuḥ kusumaiḥ kṛṣṇaṁ prema-vrīḍā-smitekṣaṇāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : prema-vrīḍā-smita**-pūrvakam **īkṣaṇaṁ** yāsāṁ tāḥ ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : prema**-yuktābhyāṁ **vrīḍā-smitābhyām īkṣaṇaṁ** yāsāṁ krameṇa śṛṅgāra-maya-śānta-maya-strīṇām, tāḥ | viyogārambhe pūrvāsāṁ smitāsambhavāt vicchidya vyākhyātam ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : kusumaiḥ** kusumāni **prema-vrīḍā-smitāni īkṣaṇeṣu** vyañjitāni yāsāṁ tāḥ ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : kusumaiḥ** kusumāni **premādī-vīkṣaṇeṣu** vyañjitāni yāsāṁ tāḥ ||16||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.17 || **

**sitātapatraṁ jagrāha muktādāma-vibhūṣitam |**

**ratna-daṇḍaṁ guḍākeśaḥ priyaḥ priyatamasya ha ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā)**, **viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : guḍākā** nidrā tasyā **īśo** jita-nidro’rjunaḥ ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : guḍākāyā** nidrāyā **īśo** jita-nidro'rjunaḥ | **priyatamasya** kṛṣṇasya sakhyur **ātapatraṁ** **jagrāha** ||17||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.18 ||**

**uddhavaḥ sātyakiś caiva vyajane paramādbhute |**

**vikīryamāṇaḥ kusumai reje madhu-patiḥ pathi ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : vyajane** cāmare jagṛhatuḥ | **madhu-patiḥ** śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : madhupatir** mādhavaḥ ||18||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.19 || **

**aśrūyantāśiṣaḥ satyās tatra tatra dvijeritāḥ |**

**nānurūpānurūpāś ca nirguṇasya guṇātmanaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : satyāḥ** śrī-kṛṣṇo tāsām avyabhicārāt, kiṁ tu **nānurūpāś cānurūpāś** ca | **nirguṇasya** paramānandasya "sukhī bhava" ity-ādayo nānurūpāḥ, **guṇātmano** mānuṣya-nāṭyāvatāre’nurūpāś cety arthaḥ | sandhir ārṣaḥ ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **yadyapy eṣāṁ guṇānāṁ sarveṣām api bhagavati nityatvam eva, tathāpi tat-tal-līlā-siddhy-arthaṁ teṣāṁ kvacit kasyacit prakāśaḥ kasyacid aprakāśaś ca bhavati | ata evāha—**aśrūyanta** iti | **nirguṇasya** madhya-pada-lopena nirgatā guṇebhyo guṇā yasya tasya, prākṛta-guṇātīta-nitya-guṇasya **nānurūpāḥ** nitya-tat-paripūrṇatvena lābhāntarāyogāt | **guṇātmanaḥ** tad-āśīrvādāṅgīkāra-dvārā tat-tad-guṇa-viśeṣa-pravartaka-nivartakasya **anurūpāś ca** | tad-aṅgīkāre hetuḥ—**satyā** iti | tad evaṁ prakāśanāprakāśana-hetor eva śrī-bhagavataś candra-para-parārdhojjvalatādike saty api tal-līlā-mādhurya-vistārakas tamisrādi-vyavahāraḥ sidhyati ||19|| [prīti-sandarbha 149]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : satyāḥ** kṛṣṇe tāsām avyabhicārāt, kintu tā **nānurūpā anurūpāś** **ca** | sandhir ārṣaḥ | aiśvarya-dṛṣṭyā **nirguṇasya** paramānandasya "sukhī bhava" ity-ādayo nānurūpāḥ, mādhurya-dṛṣṭyā **guṇātmano** brahmaṇyatva-prema-vaśyatvādy-aprākṛta-guṇa-mayasya tasya **anurūpaś** ca, "yuṣmākam āśīrbhir eva mama sadā sukham" iti tat-prativacanasya mithyātvānarhatvāt | tasya dāsya-sakhya-vātsalyādi-rasa-viṣayāśrayatve sati tad-bhakta-jana-saṁyoga-virahādy-alaukika-sukha-duḥkhādimayatvāc ca ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : tatra tatra** pathi pathi, **satyā** yathārthāḥ, **āśīr**-viṣayāṇāṁ, dharmāṇāṁ tasmin sadaiva sattvāt | kintu **nānurūpā** **anurūpāś ca** āsan | sandhir ārṣaḥ | **nirguṇasya** māyā-guṇair aspṛṣṭasya cid-ānanda-mūrteḥ kūṭasthasya **nānurūpāḥ**, māyopādheḥ sukha-duḥkha-bhājo nṛpāder jīvasya tāḥ "sarvadaiva sukhī bhava" ity-ādayo'prāpta-prārthanā-rūpās tā **anurūpāḥ** syuḥ | **guṇātmano** brahmaṇyatva-vṛddha-sevakatva-prema-vaśyatvādi-svānubandhi-guṇa-khaner anurūpās tad-āśiṣām atiprīty-āṅgīkārāt ||19||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.20 || **

**anyonyam āsīt sañjalpa uttama-śloka-cetasām |**

**kauravendra-pura-strīṇāṁ sarva-śruti-mano-haraḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : sarvāsāṁ śrutīnāṁ manoharaḥ** | upaniṣado’pi mūrtimatyaḥ satyas taṁ **sañjalpam** abhyanandann ity arthaḥ ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : sarveṣām** eva **śruti-manasī harati** iti saḥ | śleṣeṇa sarvāsāṁ śrutīnām api manoharaḥ | upaniṣado’pi mūrtimatyaḥ satyaḥ taṁ **sañjalpam** abhyanandann ity arthaḥ ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : sarvāsāṁ śrutīnāṁ manoharaḥ**, upaniṣad-devyo'pi yaṁ **sañjalpam** abhyanandann ity arthaḥ | yad vā, sarveṣāṁ śrutiṁ manaś ca haratīti saḥ ||20||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.21 || **

**sa vai kilāyaṁ puruṣaḥ purātano**

**ya eka āsīd aviśeṣa ātmani |**

**agre guṇebhyo jagad-ātmanīśvare**

**nimīlitātman niśi supta-śaktiṣu ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **sattvādi-śaktiṣu |


        śrī-bhū-durgeti yābhinnā jīva-māyā mahātmanaḥ |


        ātma-māyā tad-icchā sā guṇa-māyā jaḍātmikā || iti mahā-saṁhitāyām ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tatra tejaḥ-saundaryādy-atiśayena vismitābhyaḥ sakhībhyo’nyāḥ striyaḥ kathayanti | nātra vismayaḥ kāryaḥ, sākṣād īśvaratvād asyeti | **sa vā** iti caturbhiḥ | **vai** smaraṇe | **kila** iti prasiddhyā pramāṇa-dyotakam | **ya eka** evādvitīyaḥ **puruṣa āsīt,** **sa** eva **ayaṁ** śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ | kutrāsīt ? pūrva-viśeṣe ātmani niṣprapañce nija-svarūpe | kadā ? **agre guṇebhyo** guṇa-kṣobhāt pūrvam | tathā **niśi** pralaye ca | tasya lakṣaṇam—**jagatām ātmani** jīve | nimīlitātmani **nimīlitātmann** iti lupta-saptamy-antaṁ padam, jātāv eka-vacanam | **īśvare** līna-rūpeṣu jīveṣu satsv ity arthaḥ | nanu jīvānāṁ brahmatvāt kathaṁ layaḥ ? tatrāha—**suptāsu śaktiṣu** satīṣu, jīvopādhi-bhūta-sattvādi-śakti-laya eva jīva-laya ity arthaḥ ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** **śṛṅgāra-raso dvividhaḥ, sambhogo vipralambhaś ca | tatra sambhoga-śṛṅgāre kauravendra-pura-striyaḥ—**

atha rati-sthāyinam ujjvala-veṣātmakam uktam yuva-prakṛtikaṁ strī-puṁsa-hetukaṁ mālya-ṛtu-śaila-pura-harmya-nadī-candropavana-dīrghikā-jala-krīḍādi-śrūyamānānubhūyamāna-vibhāvaṁ jugupsālasyauṣṭa-varja-sañcāriṇaṁ guṇaṁ dīrghāpāṅga-smitādy-anubhāvaṁ śṛṅgāraṁ sa-prabhedam āha—**śṛṅgāra**- iti | 

strī-puṁsayoḥ sambandhatayā bhogaḥ **sambhogaḥ** | sa ca sambandhaś caturdhā | paraspara-darśana-sparśana-saṁjalpa-samprayoga-bhedāt | bhedāntarāṇāṁ tatraivāntar-bhāvaḥ | tathā hi—kusumāvacayo darśane | cumbanāliṅgana-keśa-grahādayo hi sparśane | candrodaya-varṇanādayas tu saṁjalpe | saṁsaktatayāpānaṁ saṁsparśane | evam akṣa-jala-krīḍādīnāṁ samprayogasya tu sparśa-rūpatve’pi prādhānyāt pārthakyam | 

viprakarṣeṇa lambhaḥ prāptir vipralambhaḥ | sa ca viprakarṣaś caturdheti vakṣyate | tatrāpi sambhoga-pūrvako vipralambha iti samprayogasya prāg uktiḥ | sa ca sukhamaya-dhṛti-smṛti-mati-harṣādi sañcārī | romāñca-sveda-kampāśru-mekhalā-skhalana-śvasita-sādhvasa-keśa-bandhana-vastra-saṁyamana-vastrābharaṇa-mālyādi-samyaṅ-niveśana-vicitrekṣaṇa-guṇa-varṇana-cāṭu-prabhṛti-vācika-kāyika-vyāpārānubhāvāḥ | vibhāvās tu prāg-uktāḥ | tatra nāyaka-prayuktād api sambhogād anurāga-prācūryeṇa nāyikā-prayukta eva prakṛṣyata iti taṁ darśayan darśana-sambhogam avatārayati—**tatra**[^87] iti | kauravendra-puraṁ hastināpuram ||

**sa vai** ity-ādi | vai-śabdaḥ smaraṇe | **kila**-śabdas tat-prekṣāyām | utprekṣā ca durnirūpyatvāt ya eko’dvitīyaḥ puruṣaḥ, so’yaṁ kṛṣṇaḥ **purātanaḥ** | ādyaḥ kadā ? **ekaḥ** | **ātmany** **aviśeṣe** bheda-hetūpādhi-rahite svarūpe tad api kadā agre **guṇebhyaḥ** guṇa-svīkārāt pūrvaṁ tathā **niśi** guṇasyāgād anantaram | kadā guṇa-tyāgaḥ ?—**jagad** ity-ādi | prapañcākāreṇa darśitam **ātmānaṁ** yadā na darśayati | tathā **supta-śaktiṣu** cic-chakty-ādayaḥ śaktayo yadā suptā bhavanti | ātmann ity atra supāṁ suluk pūrva-savarṇeti saptamy āluk ||21|| [mu.pha. 11.7]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : aviveśa** niṣprapañce | **ātmani** sva-svarūpe vaikuṇṭhe _||_21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **atra prathamaṁ śānti-ratimatyaḥ sa-vismayaṁ parasparam āhuḥ | **yaḥ purātanaḥ puruṣaḥ aviśeṣo** niṣprapañcaḥ | yad vā, na vidyate viśeṣaḥ vaiśiṣṭyam utkarṣo yasmāt tathābhūtaḥ **eka** eva **āsīt** | vyāsādi-mukhād asmābhiḥ śruto’bhūd ity arthaḥ | **sa vai** niścitam ayam eveti tarjanībhir darśayāmāsuḥ | kadā ? guṇebhyo’gre guṇa-kṣobhāt pūrvaṁ, tathā **niśi** pralaye mahā-pralaye ca **ātmani** prakṛty-antaryāmini **īśvare**’dhikaraṇe **jagad-ātmani** sarva-jagaj-jīve **nimīlitātmani** līna-svarūpe sati jātyā eka-vacanam | sarva-jīveṣv īśvare līneṣu satsv ity arthaḥ | 

nanu prākṛtika-pralaye jīvānām avidyālayābhāvāt layo’prasiddhas tatrāha—**suptāsu śaktiṣu** satīṣu jīvopādhīnāṁ laya eva jīva-layopacāraḥ | 

yad vā, **sa** eva **purātanaḥ pūruṣo’yaṁ** **yo** **guṇebhyo**’gre **niśi** pralaye ca ātmani sva-svarūpe **aviśeṣa **eva** āsīt**, yathā adhunā saparikaratvena vividhādbhuta-līlas tathaiva tadāpīty arthaḥ | ekaḥ ayam eva na anyo brahmādir apīty arthaḥ | anyat samānam ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : vai** niścaye, **kila** prasiddhau, **sa** eva **puruṣo'yaṁ** devakī-putraḥ, **yo guṇebhyo** mahad-ādibhyo'**gre** prāk **niśi** mahā-pralaye ca **jagad-ātmani** prapañcastha-jīve **īśvare** prakṛty-antaryāmiṇy etat-svāṁśe **nimīlitātmani** vilīne sati ya ekaḥ svatantraḥ sann ātmani nija-svarūpe **āsīd** iti śrutam asmābhir dvaipāyanādibhya iti śeṣaḥ | 

nanu tadā kīdṛśa āsīt? tatrāha–**aviśeṣa** iti nāsti viśeṣo yasmād iti sarvotkṛṣṭaḥ san | yad vā, idānīm iva tadāpi sa-parikara-līla ity arthaḥ | **jagad-ātmani** iti jātyaika-vacanam, jagaj-jīveṣv ity arthaḥ | nanu jīvānāṁ nityatva-śravaṇāt tal-layaḥ kathaṁ? tatrāha—**suptāḥ śaktayo** dehādy-upādhayo yeṣām  iti dehādi-layo jīvalaya upacaritaḥ, te kila prakṛtau suptāḥ santīti ||21||

**...**

**|| 1.10.22 || **

**sa eva bhūyo nija-vīrya-coditāṁ**

**sva-jīva-māyāṁ prakṛtiṁ sisṛkṣatīm |**

**anāma-rūpātmani rūpa-nāmanī**

**vidhitsamāno'nusasāra śāstra-kṛt ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **

aprasiddhes tad-guṇānām anāmāsau prakīrtitaḥ |

aprākṛtatvād rūpasyāpy arūpo’sāv udīryataḥ || iti vāsudevādhyātme ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tad evaṁ sṛṣṭer ādau pralayānantaraṁ ca niṣprapañcāv avasthānam uktvā sṛṣṭi-pralayayor madhye sa-prapañcāvasthānam āhuḥ | **sa eva** apracyuta-svarūpa-sthitir eva **prakṛtim** **anusasāra **adhiṣṭhitavān | **bhūyaḥ** punaḥ, sṛṣṭi-pravāhasyānāditatvāt | kīdṛśīm ? **nija-vīrya-coditāṁ **sva-kāla-śakti-preritām | **svā**ṁśa-bhūtānāṁ **jīvānāṁ māyāṁ** mohinīm | ata eva **sisṛkṣatīṁ** sraṣṭum icchantīm | kim-artham anusasāra ? **anāma-rūpe ātmani** jīve **rūpa-nāmanī vidhātum icchan**, upādhi-sṛṣṭyā jīvānāṁ bhogāyety arthaḥ | karmāṇi ca vidhātuṁ vedān kṛtavān ity āhuḥ—**śāstra-kṛd** iti ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** **sa vai** ity-ādi | vai-śabdaḥ smaraṇe | **kila**-śabdas tat-prekṣāyām | utprekṣā ca durnirūpyatvāt ya eko’dvitīyaḥ puruṣaḥ, so’yaṁ kṛṣṇaḥ **purātanaḥ** | ādyaḥ kadā ? **ekaḥ** | **ātmany** **aviśeṣe** bheda-hetūpādhi-rahite svarūpe tad api kadā agre **guṇebhyaḥ** guṇa-svīkārāt pūrvaṁ tathā **niśi** guṇasyāgād anantaram | kadā guṇa-tyāgaḥ ?—**jagad** ity-ādi | prapañcākāreṇa darśitam **ātmānaṁ** yadā na darśayati | tathā **supta-śaktiṣu** cic-chakty-ādayaḥ śaktayo yadā suptā bhavanti | ātmann ity atra supāṁ suluk pūrva-savarṇeti saptamy āluk ||22|| [mu.pha. 11.8]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **evaṁ sṛṣṭeḥ pūrvaṁ pralayānantaraṁ cāpracyuta-rūpa-guṇa-līlātvenaivāvasthānam uktvā tan-madhye’pi tathaiva nityāvasthitiṁ vaktuṁ sṛṣṭy-ārambhe svāṁśāntareṇa līlāntaram apy āhuḥ—sa eveti | **śāstra-kṛt** śāstra-niṣkrama-prathama-kṣaṇa eva vedādi-śāstrāvirbhāva-kārī mahā-viṣṇuḥ san prakṛtiṁ **anusasāra** | 

nanu prakṛty-anugatatvaṁ nāma prakṛty-adhīnatvaṁ tac ca doṣa eva ? maivaṁ | **nija-vīryeṇa** nija-balena preritāṁ sva-vaśīkṛtya kasmiṁścana kṛtye niyuktāṁ **sva**-śakti-rūpāṇāṁ **jīvānāṁ māyāṁ** mohinīṁ vaśayitrīm | kim-artham anusasāra ? **anāma-rūpe ātmani** jīve **rūpa-nāmanī **deva-tiryaṅ-manuṣyādi-lakṣaṇe **vidhitsamānaḥ** vidhātum icchan sthūla-sūkṣmopādhi-sṛṣṭyā jīvānāṁ tad-adhyāsenety arthaḥ | karma-jñāna-yoga-bhakti-sādhana-siddhy-arthaṁ tu prakṛty-anugamanāt pūrvam eva veda-śāstrāṇi kṛtavān eveti **śāstra-kṛt** ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **devakī-putrasya jagat-kartṛtvam āhuḥ—**sa eva** iti | yaḥ sṛṣṭeḥ pūrvam ātmany aviśeṣa āsīt, **sa eva** kṛṣṇo **bhūyaḥ** punaḥ saṅkarṣaṇena svāṁśena **prakṛtim anusasāra** | kādṛśīṁ? **nija-vīryeṇa** sa aikṣata lokān nu sṛjā iti sva-kaṭākṣeṇa **coditāṁ** preritāṁ **sva**-śakti-bhūtānāṁ **jīvānāṁ māyāṁ** mohayitrīm iti svātantryeṇaiva tad-anusṛtir ity arthaḥ | **sisṛkṣatīṁ** tad-vīkṣaṇāpta-sāmarthyān-mahad-ādi-tattva-sraṣṭrūm ity arthaḥ | kim-artham **anusasāra** ? **anāma-rūpe** nāma-rūpa-śūnye **ātmani** jīve **rūpa-nāmanī** deva-mānavādi-lakṣaṇe **vidhitsamānaś **cikīrṣan | bhoga-vyākulasya jīvasya tad-yogena bhoga-siddhy-artham iti bhāvaḥ | kīdṛśaḥ sann anusasāra ? tatrāha—**śāstra-kṛd** iti | prakṛti-vīkṣaṇāt pūrvam eva karma-yoga-bhakti-tattva-bodhakaṁ vedaṁ yaḥ sva-niśvasita-rūpaṁ prakaṭitavān ity arthaḥ ||22||

**...**

**|| 1.10.23 ||**

**sa vā ayaṁ yat-padam atra sūrayo**

**jitendriyā nirjita-mātariśvanaḥ |**

**paśyanti bhakty-utkalitāmalātmanā**

**nanv eṣa sattvaṁ parimārṣṭum arhati ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **asya darśanam atidurlabham asmābhir labdham ity āhuḥ—**sa vai ayam** | **yasya padaṁ** svarūpam aṅghriṁ vā | **nirjito mātariśvā** prāṇo yaiḥ, hrasvatvam ārṣam | te **sūraya** eva **paśyanti** | kena ? bhaktyā **utkalita** utkaṇṭhito’**malo** ya **ātmā** buddhiḥ, tena | dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā iti śruteḥ | buddhi-vaimalyasyāpy ayam eva hetur ity āhuḥ | 

**nanu** he sakhi, **eṣa** eva **sattvaṁ** buddhiṁ **parimārṣṭuṁ** samyak śodhayitum **arhati,** na tu yogādāya ity arthaḥ | yad vā, aho **eṣasattvaṁ** jñānaṁ **parimārṣṭuṁ** nāśayituṁ dūra-gamanenāpratyakṣī-bhavituṁ nārhati, kintv anena sahaiva gantavyam ity arthaḥ ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā : **nirākāram uktvā sākāraṁ nirūpayati—**sa eva** iti | **sa eva** nirākāra eva | **prakṛtim** **anusasāra,** adhiṣṭhitatvāt | **bhūyaḥ** sṛṣṭi-pravāhāsyānāditvāt | **nija-vīrya-coditāṁ** kāla-preritām | ata eva **sva-jīva-māyāṁ sisṛkṣatīṁ** svasminn īśvare jīva-māyām asatyaṁ jīva-sattvaṁ sraṣṭum icchantīm | arūpasya **rūpāṇi**, anāmno **nāmāni**, sañcityānusasāra | tāni cānye jānantv iti | **śāstrakṛt** śāstraṁ vedaḥ ||23|| [mu.pha. 11.9]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu sṛṣṭy-ārambhe puruṣādayo’vatārā lakṣyante, na tv eṣa īdṛśa-prakāraḥ, kintu vaivasvata-manvantarīyāṣṭāviṁśati-caturtha-yuga-stha-dvāpare sampraty evaiṣa upalabhyate ? satyam, asau bhakti-gamyo nitya-svarūpo nitya-līlo’smin dvāpara evāvatīrṇo’py asya bhaktimadbhiḥ sadaivāyam upalabhyate ity āha—**sa vā** iti |
