**nirjito mātariśvā** prāṇo yaiḥ, hrasvatvam ārṣam | yad vā, nirjitāt mātariśvanaḥ prāṇād dhetor **nirjitendriyāḥ** sarvendriyāṇāṁ prāṇādhīna-vṛttitvāt, prāṇa-jayād eva nirjitendriyā ity arthaḥ | tathā-bhūtā api **bhaktyā utkaṇṭhito’malo** ya ātmā buddhiḥ, tenaiva **yasyapadaṁ** svarūpaṁ caraṇāravindaṁ vā **paśyanti** | dṛśyate tv agryayā buddhyā itiśruteḥ | buddhi-vaimalyasyāpy ayam eva hetur ity āhuḥ | 

**nanv** iti | nanu niścitam **eṣa** eva **sattvaṁ** buddhiṁ **parimārṣṭuṁ** samyak śodhayitum **arhati**, na tu yogādayaḥ, tena sūritvaṁ jitendriyatvaṁ jita-prāṇatvaṁ ca teṣāṁ bhaktyaiva, na tu prāṇāyāmādibhir iti bhāvaḥ | **atra sūrayo** bhakty-utkaṇṭhatve saty eva **paśyanti** iti vartamāna-nirdeśena sārvakālika-dṛṣṭi-gocaratvāt tasya sārvadika-līlatvam | ataḥ parārdhānte so’budhyata gopa-veśo me pūruṣaḥ purastād āvirbabhūva [go.tā.u. 1.26] iti gopāla-tāpanī-śrutau brahma-vākyam | tathā brahma-saṁhitāyāṁ sṛṣṭy-ārambhe’pi gopa-veśaḥ kṛṣṇa eva dṛṣṭaḥ stutaś ca ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **na cāyaṁ dvāparānte evādhunāvatīrṇaḥ, puredṛśo nāsīd iti mantavyaḥ, parārdhānte viriñcāya sraṣṭṛtvaṁ dattavān iti śravaṇād iti bhāvenāhuḥ—yo viriñcasyāpi puropadeṣṭā, **sa eva** ayam adhunāvatīrṇaḥ | **sūrayaḥ** sanakādayo'**tra** jagati **nirjitān** **mātariśvanaḥ** prāṇād dhetor **jitendriyāḥ** santo **bhakty-utkalitena** bhakty-utkanṭhitena **amalenātmanā** buddhyā **yaṁ padaṁ paśyanti** yac caraṇaṁ vīkṣante, śraddhā-bhakti-dhyāna-yogād avaiti [?] ity-ādi-śravaṇāt | buddhi-vaimalyam apy etat kṛpā-hetukam eva, na tu kevalena yogenety āha—nanu niścaye | sattvaṁ cittaṁ, yad uktaṁ svayam eva—yukta āsīta mat-paraḥ [gītā 2.61] ity-ādi ||23||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.24 || **

**sa vā ayaṁ sakhy anugīta-sat-katho**

**vedeṣu guhyeṣu ca guhya-vādibhiḥ |**

**ya eka īśo jagad-ātma-līlayā**

**sṛjaty avaty atti na tatra sajjate ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **puṇya-ślokatām āhuḥ | he **sakhi**, yo **vedeṣu** rahasy āgameṣu ca rahasya-nirūpakair **anugīta-sat-kathaḥ**, anugītāḥ satya-kathā yasya sa evāyam | gāna-prakāram āhuḥ—**ya eka īśa** ity-ādi ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā : **nirākāram uktvā sākāraṁ nirūpayati—**sa eva** iti | **sa eva** nirākāra eva | **prakṛtim** **anusasāra,** adhiṣṭhitatvāt | **bhūyaḥ** sṛṣṭi-pravāhāsyānāditvāt | **nija-vīrya-coditāṁ** kāla-preritām | ata eva **sva-jīva-māyāṁ sisṛkṣatīṁ** svasminn īśvare jīva-māyām asatyaṁ jīva-sattvaṁ sraṣṭum icchantīm | arūpasya **rūpāṇi**, anāmno **nāmāni**, sañcityānusasāra | tāni cānye jānantv iti | **śāstrakṛt** śāstraṁ vedaḥ ||24|| [mu.pha. 11.10]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kiṁ ca, asya līlā-kathātirahasyā rahasya-lokair eva vedety āha—**sa vā** iti | ayam arjunasya sakhā narākṛtiḥ vedeṣu guhyeṣu śāstreṣu ca **guhya-vādibhir** atirahasyasya rūpakair asyaiva kair api lokair **angītāḥ satyaḥ kathā** yasya saḥ | **yaḥ** khalu **eka eva īśaḥ** īśvaraḥ san, na tu sākṣād etad-rūpa ity arthaḥ ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanv evam enaṁ sarve na vadanti? tatrāhuḥ—iti | he **sakhi**! **sa evāyaṁ guhyeṣu vedeṣu** gopāla-tāpany-ādiṣu **guhya-vādibhir** etad-rahasya-vaktṛbhir durvāsaḥ-prabhṛtibhir **anu** nirantaraṁ **gītā** **sat-kathā** yasya saḥ | anugāna-prakāram āha—**ya** iti | **ekaḥ** sahāya-śūnyaḥ | 


        oṁ namo viśva-rūpāya viśva-sthity-anta-hetave | 


        viśveśvarāya viśvāya govindāya namo namaḥ [go.tā.u. 1.35] ity-ādibhiḥ ||24||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.25 || **

**yadā hy adharmeṇa tamo-dhiyo nṛpā**

**jīvanti tatraiṣa hi sattvataḥ kila |**

**dhatte bhagaṁ satyam ṛtaṁ dayāṁ yaśo**

**bhavāya rūpāṇi dadhad yuge yuge ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **evaṁ-bhūtasya nānāvatāre kāraṇam āhuḥ—**yadā hi** iti | **tamo**-vyāptā **dhīr** yeṣāṁ te **nṛpā** **yadādharmeṇa jīvanti** kevalaṁ prāṇān puṣṇanti, **tatra** tadā **eṣa** eva **bhavāya** sthityai **sattvato** viśuddha-sattvena **rūpāṇi dadhad** bhagādīni **dhatte** prakaṭayati | **yuge yuge** tat tad avasate | **bhagam** aiśvaryam | **satyaṁ** satya-pratijñatvam | **rṭaṁ** yathārthopadeśakatvam | **dayāṁ** bhakta-kṛpām | **yaśo**’dbhuta-karmatvam ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā : **avatāra-rūpaṁ nirūpayati—**yadā** iti | **sattvataḥ** kṛṣṇaḥ | **rūpāṇi** **dadhat** jagad-ādīni **dhatte** | **bhagaṁ** bhajanīyatvam | **satyaṁ** satya-pratijñātvam **ṛtaṁ** satyopadeśakatvam | **dayāṁ** bhaktānukampām | **yaśo**’dbhuta-karmatvam | **bhavāya** sthityai ||25|| [mu.pha. 11.11]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **sākṣād asyāvatārasya kāla-deśa-pātreṣu jijñāsyeṣu prathamaṁ kālam āhuḥ—**yadā** iti | **nṛpāḥ** kaṁsādayaḥ **sattvataḥ** sattvenottamatvena viśiṣṭaṁ **bhagādikaṁ** **dhatte** ity anvayaḥ | **bhagaṁ** ṣaḍ-aiśvaryam | **ṛtaṁ** sunṛta-vākyam | **rūpāṇi** vraja-mathurā-dvārakocitāni saundaryāṇi | **bhavāya** bhūtyai | **yuge yuge** kalpe kalpe vaivasvatāṣṭāviṁśa-caturyugīye dvāpare dvāpare vā ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kṛṣṇasya nānāvatāra-prākaṭye hetum āha—**yadā** **tamo-dhiyaḥ** āsura-prakṛtayo **nṛpā** **adharmeṇa jīvanti** deha-yātrāṁ kurvanti, **tadā eṣa** kṛṣṇaḥ **sattvataḥ** sattva-guṇaṁ jagati pravardhya **yuge yuge** tat-tat-samaye viśvasya **bhavāya** vivṛddhaye varāhādīni **rūpāṇi** **dadhat** prakaṭayan **bhagādīni dhatte** prakāśayati | **bhagam** aiśvarya-ṣaṭkaṁ | **satyaṁ** yathārtha-bhāṣaṇam | **ṛtaṁ** gataṁ sañcaraṇam ||25||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.26 || **

**aho alaṁ ślāghyatamaṁ yadoḥ kulam**

**aho alaṁ puṇyatamaṁ madhor vanam |**

**yad eṣa puṁsām ṛṣabhaḥ śriyaḥ patiḥ**

**sva-janmanā caṅkramaṇena cāñcati ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **viśeṣataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇāvatāra-saubhāgyaṁ varṇayati—**aho** iti pañcabhiḥ | **yad **yasmād **eṣa** puruṣottamaḥ **śriyaḥ patiḥ** **sva-janmanā** **yadoḥ kulam añcati** pūjayati sat karoti | ata **ślāghyatamaṁ** tat | **caṅkramaṇena** ca **madhor vanaṁ** mathurāṁ sat karoti | atas tat **puṇyatamam** iti | tam apy apratyayārthasyāpy atyantātiśaye’**lam** iti | tatrāpy āścarye **aho** ity uktam ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā : **kṛṣṇa-saṅgama-spṛhāṁ nirūpayanti—**aho** ity-ādi | **aho** āścaryam | **alam** atyartham | **madhor vanaṁ** mathurā, yat **kulaṁ** **vanaṁ** ca **sva-janma-caṅkramanaṇābhyām añcati** gacchati | pūjayati mānayati ca | **puṁsām ṛṣabhaḥ śriyaḥ** priya ity ābhyāṁ strīṇāṁ spṛhaṇīyaṁ cira-lalitaṁ coktam ||26|| [mu.pha. 11.12]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **aho iti | **puṁsām ṛṣabhaḥ** sarvāvatārāvatāriṇāṁ madhye śreṣṭhaḥ ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **pātra-deśāv āhuḥ—**aho** iti | **yadoḥ kulaṁ śḷāghyatamam** ity anenaiva dvayor utkarṣe siddhe **puṇyatamam** iti pṛthag-uktiḥ | deśasya puṇyadatvenaivotkarṣasya prasiddheḥ, tatra tam apy apratyayārthasyāpy atyantātiśaye **alam** iti | tatrāpy atiśayāścarye’**ho** iti | **yat sva-janmanā caṅkramaṇena** gamanena ca-kārād anyair api vividhādbhuta-karmābhir **añcati** pūjayati satkarotīti yāvat | atra “alaṁ ca” ity anuktvā añcatīti vartamāna-nirdeśena janmādi-līlānāṁ nityatvaṁ bodhayāmāsuḥ | upakramataḥ eva ya eka āsīd iti bhūta-nirdeśena tāsāṁ tathābhiprāyasyāvagamāt | 

nanu kathaṁ janma-karmaṇor nityatvaṁ ? te hi kriye kriyātvaṁ ca prati nijāṁśam apy ārambha-parisamāptibhyām eva siddhyati iti te vinā svarūpa-hāny-āpattiḥ | naiṣa doṣaḥ | śrī-bhagavati sadaivākārānantyāt prakāśānantyāj janma-karma-lakṣaṇa-līlānantyāt ananta-prapañcānanta-vaikuṇṭha-gata-tat-tal-līlā-sthāna-tat-tal-līlā-parikarāṇāṁ vyakti-prakāśayor ānantyāc ca, yata eva satyor api tat-tad-ākāra-prakāśa-gatayos tad-ārambha-parisamāptyor ekatraikatra te janma-karmaṇor aṁśā yāvat parisamāpyante na samāpyante vā tāvad evānyatrānyatrāpy ārabdhā bhavantīty evaṁ śrī-bhagavati vicchedābhāvān nitye eva tatra te janma-karmaṇī vartete | tatra te kvacit kiñcid vilakṣaṇatvenārabhyete, kvacid aikarūpyeṇa ceti jñeyaṁ | viśeṣaṇa-bhedād viśeṣaṇaikyāc ca | eka evākāra-prakāśa-bhedena pṛthak-kriyāspadaṁ bhavatīti—citraṁ bataitad ekena vapuṣā [bhā.pu. 10.69.3] ity ādau pratipādayiṣyate | tataḥ kriyā-bhedāt tat-tat-kriyātmakeṣu prakāśa-bhedeṣv abhimāna-bhedaś ca gamyate | tathā saty ekatraikatra līlā-krama-janita-rasodbodhaś ca jāyate |

nanu kathaṁ te eva janma-karmaṇī vartete ity uktaṁ pṛthag-ārabdhatvād anye eva te āstām ? ucyate—kāla-bhedenoditānām api samāna-rūpāṇāṁ kriyāṇām ekatvam | yathā śaṅkara-śārīrake | dvirgo-śabdo’yam uccarito na tu dvau go-śabdāv iti pratīti-nirṇītaṁ śabdaikatvam | tathaiva dviḥ pākaḥ kṛto’nena, na tu dvau pākāv iti | tato janma-karmaṇor api nityatā yuktyaiva ata eva āgamādau api bhūta-pūrva-līlopāsana-vidhānaṁ yuktam | tathā coktaṁ mādhva-bhāṣye paramātma-sambandhitvena | nityatvāt trivikramatvādiṣv apy upasaṁhāryatvaṁ yujyata iti | anumataṁ caitat śrutyā | yad bhūtaṁ bhavac ca bhaviṣyac cety anayaiva upasaṁhāryatvam upāsanāyām upādeyatvam ity arthaḥ | tatra tasya janmanaḥ prākṛtād asmād vilakṣaṇatvaṁ prākṛta-janmānukaraṇenāvirbhāva-mātratvam, kvacit tad-anukaraṇeneti bhagavat-sandarbhaḥ | kecit tu tad-bhakta-dhāmādīnām ivānanta-prapañca-nitya-dhāmasu janma-karmaṇor api prakāśa-bāhulyān nitya-sattva-siddher ity āhuḥ ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yadā svayam evāvirbhavet-tadāsmin loke parānanda-samṛddhir ity āhuḥ—aho iti | **madhor vanaṁ** māthura-maṇḍalam, atra **ślāghyatamam** ity anenaivobhayor mahotkarṣe siddhe puṇyatamam iti pṛthag uktiḥ, tad-deśasya puṇyatamatayotkarṣakhyāte | aho-alaṁ-padābhyām anavadhiḥ ślāghyatā bodhyate | tatra hetur **yad **iti | eṣo'nanta-guṇo'tilāvaṇya-sindhur devakī-putraḥ | **sva-janmanā caṅkramaṇena** pāda-sañcāraṇena, cādbhūtair vihāraiś ca tad ubhayam **añcati** pūjayan vibhāti | kīdṛśaḥ? śriyo rukmiṇyā vārṣabhanavyāś ca patiḥ kāntaḥ | vasudevādayo nandādayaś ca yadu-vaṁśodbhavāḥ, sā ca sā ca śrī-stana-maṇḍalastheti gopāla-tāpanyāṁ prasiddham | atrāñcatīti vartamāna-prayogād idānīm apy eṣa tatra tatrāstīti sūcayanti | eko devo nitya-līlānurakto bhakta-vyāpī bhakta-hṛdy antarātmā [rādhopa. 4.3] iti vadatā dvaipāyanenaivam upadiṣṭam iti bhāvaḥ ||26||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.27 || **

**aho bata svar-yaśasas tiraskarī**

**kuśasthalī puṇya-yaśaskarī bhuvaḥ |**

**paśyanti nityaṁ yad anugraheṣitaṁ**[^88]

**smitāvalokaṁ sva-patiṁ**[^89]** sma yat-prajāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **dvārakāṁ ślāghante | **aho bata** ity āścaryam | kiṁ tat ? **kuśa-sthalī** dvārakā | **svara** utkṛṣṭa iti yad **yaśas** tasya **tiras-karī** paribhava-kartrī | **bhuvaś** ca **puṇya-yaśaḥ-kartrī** bhavati | **yad** yato yatratyāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ **svānugraheṇeṣitaṁ** preṣitam | **smita**-pūrvako’**valoko** yasya tam | yad vā, anugrahārtham iṣitam iṣṭam | "anugrahoṣītam" iti pāṭhe svānugrahārtham ūṣitaṁ kṛta-nivāsam | eka-padya-pāṭhe tv anugraheṇoṣitaṁ yat **smitaṁ**, tat-pūrvako’**valoko** yasya tam | **svasya** ātmanaḥ **patiṁ** śrī-kṛṣṇaṁ, na tu pitrādivad deha-mātra-patiṁ **nityaṁ paśyanti sma** | naitat svarge’stīty arthaḥ ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā : aho** iti | **aho bata** aho āścaryam | **kuśasthalī** dvārakā | yac-chabdābhyāṁ saiva **smita**-yukta **avaloko** yasya tam | **sva-patiṁ** kṛṣṇam | sa eva hi **svasya** ātmanaḥ **patiḥ** | anya-dehasya | yadu-kulādīni dhanyāni, na tv atrānyasya kasyacit kulam etat paraṁ vā | yad īdṛśena nāyaka-ratnālaṅkṛtam iti bhāvātiśayaḥ ||27|| [mu.pha. 11.13]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : sva-patiṁ paśyanti** _|_ atra ca **smitāvalokaṁ** paśyantīty arthaḥ ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **madhu-vanaṁ stutvā dvārakāṁ smarantya āhuḥ | **aho** **kuśa-sthalī** dvārakā **svar yaśasa** iti loka-rītyaivoktiḥ, na tu siddhānta-rītyā svaṁ-śabdena vaikuṇṭhābhidhānaṁ vā | **yad** yataḥ yat prajāḥ yatratyāḥ prajāḥ **sva-patiṁ** kṛṣṇam **anugraheṇaiva īṣitaṁ** proṣitaṁ sarva-sukha-dānārtham antaḥ-purād dhastināpurādi-sthalād vā prasthāpitam ity arthaḥ | yad vā, anugraha eva īṣita iṣṭo yatra tam anugraha-mātra-prāpty-artham ity arthaḥ | "anugrahoṣitam" iti pāṭhe svānugrahārtham uṣitaṁ kṛta-nivāsaḥ | naitat svarge’stīty arthaḥ ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **evaṁ madhuvanaṁ saṁstūya dvārakāṁ stuvanti—**aho** sakhyaḥ, **bata** iti āścarye, **kuśasthalī** dvārakā | **svar-yaśasaḥ** svargādi-satyānta-kīrtes **tiraskarī** nyak-kartrī tal-loka-patibhiḥ sva-sva-kārya-siddhaye tasyāḥ samāśrayaṇāt, **bhuvaḥ** **puṇya-yaśaskarī**, bhū-sthitāyāṁ tasyāṁ pāvitryaṅkarāneka-bhagavac-caritrāṇāṁ prākaṭyāt svargādi-lokānūnayantī bhuvam utkarṣayantītyavicintyaḥ tasyāḥ prabhāvaḥ | 

atha tad-vāsinaḥ stauti—**yad** yato yatratyāḥ **prajāḥ** **sva-patiṁ** **nityaṁ** **smitāvalokaṁ paśyanti** | **anugraha** eva **īṣita** iṣṭo yasya taṁ | yat-prajānāṁ sarveśvaro hariḥ sadaivātiprasanna ity arthaḥ | na caivaṁbhāvaḥ svargādāv astīti ||27||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.28 || **

**nūnaṁ vrata-snāna-hutādineśvaraḥ**

**samarcito hy asya gṛhīta-pāṇibhiḥ |**

**pibanti yāḥ sakhy adharāmṛtaṁ muhur**

**vraja-striyaḥ sammumuhur yad-āśayāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **he sakhi ! **asya gṛhīta-pāṇibhiḥ** patnībhir **īśvaro**’yam eva **nūnaṁ** janmāntareṣu **samarcitaḥ** | **yasminn adharāmṛte āśayaś** cittaṁ yāsāṁ, tāḥ **saṁmohaṁ prāptā** iti manoharatvam uktam ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā : **sparśa-sambhogam āha—**nūnam** ity-ādi | **nūnaṁ**-śabdo vitarke, kṛṣṇasya **gṛhīta-pāṇibhiḥ **patnībhiḥ īśvaro’**rcitaḥ** | pūrva-janmasu ayam iti vācyam īśvarokti-loka-dṛṣṭyā | **yasya adharāmṛtasya āśayā** abhilāṣeṇa **vraja-striyaḥ saṁmumuhuḥ** | vraja-strīṇāṁ pura-strītvāt | sva-dharma-tyāgāt saṁmohākhya-navama-smara-daśotpatteś ca puruṣotkarṣaḥ ||28|| [mu.pha. 11.14]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **[tathā aho alaṁ ślāghyatamaṁ yadoḥ kulam [bhā.pu. 1.10.26] ity-ādi-padya-trayātmake prathama-skandha-sambandhini pura-strī-vākye’pi, teṣu prathama-dvayaṁ sarvasya mathurā-vraja-dvārakā-vāsino janasya bhāgya-mahimā-pratipādakam | tṛtīyaṁ khalu—][^90] **nūnaṁ** ity etat | atra paṭṭa-mahiṣīṇāṁ bhāgya-ślāghāyām api śrī-vraja-devīnām eva hi paramotkṛṣṭatvam āsvādābhijñataratvaṁ cāyātam | yasyāmṛtasya mādhurya-smaraṇe devā api muhyanti, tan manuṣyeṇāpy anenāsvādyata itivat | tasmāt tāsām eva sarvottama-bhāvanā ||28||

**nūnam** iti | atra paṭṭa-mahiṣīṇāṁ bhāgya-ślāghāyām api śrī-vraja-devīnām eva hi paramotkṛṣṭatvam āsvādābhijñataratvam āyātam | yasyāmṛtasya mādhurya-smaraṇe devā api muhyanti, tan manuṣyeṇāpy anenāsvādyata itivat | tasmāt tāsām eva sarvottama-bhāvanā | atra viśeṣa-jijñāsāyāṁ śrī-prīti-sandarbho [92] dṛśyaḥ |

kiṁ ca, sa vai kilāyaṁ [bhā.pu. 1.10.21] ity ādau, pibanti yāḥ sakhy adharāmṛtam [1.10.28] ity ante jñāna-vivekādi-prakāśena hi śānta-rasa evopakrāntaḥ, upasaṁhāraś ca śṛṅgāraḥ | tena cāsya vatsaleneva milana-saṅkoca eveti parasparam ayogya-saṅgatyābhāsyate | atra samādhīyate cānyaiḥ | sa vai kila ity-ādikam anyāsāṁ vākyam | **nūnam** ity-ādikaṁ tv anyāsām | evaṁ-vidhā vadantīnāṁ [bhā.pu. 1.10.31] ity-ādi-śrī-sūta-vākyaṁ ca sarvānandana-param eveti ||28|| [prīti-sandarbha 174]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tatrojjvala-rasautsukyavatya āhuḥ | **nūnam** **asya gṛhīta-pāṇibhiḥ** patnībhir **yā adharāmṛtaṁ muhur** muhuḥ **pibanti,** vayaṁ tv akṛta-tādṛśa-vratāḥ sampraty eva saundaryāmṛtam eva kiñcid eva pibāma iti bhāvaḥ | kiṁ cāsmattaḥ koṭi-guṇato’py adhikā api vraja-sundarībhyaḥ sakāśād ati nyūnā ity āhuḥ—**yad-āśayāḥ** yasminn adharāmṛte āśayāś cittaṁ yāsāṁ, tathābhūtā eva satyaḥ **saṁmumuhuḥ** “rātrau pīta-carasyādharāmṛtasya prātaḥ-smaraṇe’pi ānanda-mūrcchāṁ prāpuḥ | na jāne pāna-kāle tāḥ kīdṛśīṁ daśāṁ prāpuḥ” iti tāsāṁ premādhikyād ānandādhikyaṁ dyotitam ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **draupady-ādi-prasaṅgino yuvatayo vadanti—nūnam iti | he **sakhi**! **asya** kṛṣṇasya **gṛhīta-pāṇibhiḥ** patnībhir “īśvaro'yam eva janmāntareṣu samarcitaḥ, **hi** yato'**syādharāmṛtaṁ muhuḥ pibanti**, **yad-āśayā** yac-cittāḥ satyo **vraja-striyaḥ saṁmumuhuḥ** | rātrau nipītasya tasya prātaḥ smaraṇe'py ānanda-mūrcchāṁ prāpur ity adhika-prematvaṁ tāsām | asmākaṁ tu saundaryāmṛta-pānenaiva saphalatvam iti bhāvaḥ ||28||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.29-30 || **

**yā vīrya-śulkena hṛtāḥ svayaṁvare**

**pramathya caidya-pramukhān hi śuṣmiṇaḥ |**

**pradyumna-sāmbāmba-sutādayo'parā**

**yāś cāhṛtā bhauma-vadhe sahasraśaḥ ||**

**etāḥ paraṁ strītvam apāsta-peśalaṁ**

**nirasta-śaucaṁ bata sādhu kurvate |**

**yāsāṁ gṛhāt puṣkara-locanaḥ patir**

**na jātv apaity āhṛtibhir hṛdi spṛśan ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **etat prapañcayati—**yā** iti dvābhyām | **vīryaṁ** prabhāva eva **śulkaṁ** mūlyaṁ, tena | **śuṣmiṇo** baliṣṭān | **pradyumnaś** ca **sāmbaś** ca **ambaś** ca **sutā** yāsāṁ rukmiṇī-jāmbavatī-nāgnajitīnāṁ tā ādir yāsāṁ satyabhāmādīnāṁ, **tāḥ** | **yāś ca** aparāḥ | asya ślokasya uttara-ślokenānvayaḥ ||29||

**etāḥ** **strītvam** eva **paraṁ** kevalaṁ **sādhu** śobhanaṁ **kurvate** | kiṁ-bhūtam ? **apāstaṁ** gataṁ **peśalaṁ** bhadraṁ svātantryaṁ yasmāt tat | **nirastaṁ śaucaṁ** śucitvaṁ yasmāt, tathā-bhūtam api | **jātu** kadācid api **nāpaiti** na nirgacchati | **āhṛtibhir** vyāhāraiḥ | yad vā, pārijātādi-priya-vastv-āharaṇaiḥ | **hṛdi spṛśann** ānandayan ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā : yā** iti | **viśuṣmiṇo** baliṣṭhān **pradyumna**-sūtā rukmiṇī | **sāmba**-sūtā jāmbavatī | **jāmba**-sūtā nāgnajitī | **bhaumo** narakāsuraḥ | **sahasraśaḥ** sahasraṁ sahasraṁ yāvat ṣoḍaśa ||29|| 

**etā** iti | **etāḥ paraṁ** kevalaṁ **strītvaṁ** **sādhu kurvate** | **peśalaṁ** priyaṁvadatvam | **śaucaṁ** śucitvam | **āhṛtibhiḥ** pārijātādi-priya-vastūnām āharaṇaiḥ, **hṛdi spṛśan** utkaṇṭhāṁ janayan | na ca pura-strīṇāṁ sakāmatve’pi bhagavato nirapekṣatvena parasparānubhāvāt rasābhāsānuvādād rasābhāso’yam iti vācyam | 

evaṁ-vidhā vadantīnāṁ sa-giraḥ pura-yoṣitām |

nirīkṣaṇenābhinandan sa-smitena yayau hariḥ || [bhā.pu. 1.10.31]

ity uttaratra bhagavato’pi svabhāvatvānuvādāt ||30|| [mu.pha. 11.15-16]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : yā** iti yugmakam | tatra **etā** iti | **etā** eva, nānyā ity arthaḥ | **strītvaṁ** strī-jātiḥ | sā ca śrī-rukmiṇy-ādy-avara-taj-jāti-bhedatvenaivātra gṛhītā | **apāsta-peśala**tvādikaṁ hi taj-jāty-antarāśrayaṁ, na tu rukmiṇy-ādy-āśrayam | tābhis tāsām api sādhutva-karaṇāt | tataś cānyāṁ tat-tad-doṣa-yuktāṁ strī-jātim api yā nija-kīrty-ādinā śuddhāṁ kurvantīty arthaḥ | tāsāṁ tat-tad-doṣa-rahita-sarva-guṇālaṅkṛtatve tad-avarāsāṁ sādhutva-vidhāne ca hetum āha—**yāsām** iti | svayaṁ tathā-vidho’py **āhṛtibhiḥ** preyasī-janocita-guṇa-samāhārair yā eva **hṛdi spṛśan** manasy āsajjan yāsāṁ **gṛhād** api na jātv **apaiti** iti | tasmād atrāpi bībhatsa-saṅgatiḥ pūrvavad vyākhyeyā ||29-30|| [prīti-sandarbha 199] 

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrī-jīvaḥ (locana-rocanī 15.60): etā** ity-ādi | vakrīṇāṁ kuru-puru-strīṇāṁ yadyapi sambhogāsambhavaḥ, tathāpi ruci-mātrāṁśenodāharaṇam | **etāḥ** paṭṭa-mahiṣyaḥ **strītvaṁ** strī-jāti-mātraṁ **sādhu kurvate,** jāty-ekatvena pavitrīkaroti | **apāsta-peśalam** iti anya-sevā-paratvān nirasta-dākṣyam ity arthaḥ | tathā tvak-śmaśru-roma-nakha-keśa-pinaddha [bhā.pu. 10.60.45] iti nyāya-saṅgān nirasta-śaucaṁ ca | **āhṛtibhiḥ** prema-maya-nānā-samāhāraiḥ ||60|| (57)

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **uktam evārthaṁ prapañcayati dvābhyām | **vīryaṁ** prabhāva eva **śulkaṁ** mūlyaṁ, tena | **śuṣmiṇaḥ** baliṣṭhān | **pradyumnaḥ sāmbaḥ āmbaś** ca **sūtā** yāsāṁ tā rukmiṇī-jāmbavatī-nāgnajityaḥ tā eva **ādayo** yāsāṁ satyabhāmādīnāṁ tāḥ ||29||

**apāstaṁ peśalaṁ** bhadraṁ svātantryaṁ yasmān **nirastaṁ śaucaṁ** śucitvaṁ yasmāt tathābhūtam api **jātu **kadācid api **nāpaiti** na nirgacchati | **āhṛtibhiḥ** pārijātādi-priya-vasv-āharaṇaiḥ **hṛdi spṛśan** ānandayan ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī : **[ujjvala 15.60]** **kuru-puru-striyaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇam ālokya tat-patnī-ślāghayā taṁ kāmayante | **etāḥ** paṭṭa-mahiṣyaḥ **apāsta-peśalaṁ** nirasta-svātantryaṁ kāma-vikārādhikyān nirasta-śaucaṁ **sādhu** śobhanam | aho strī-jātir eva dhanyā yatra rukmiṇy-ādaya udbhūtā iti satāṁ ślāghayety arthaḥ | **āhṛtibhiḥ** pārijātādi-vividha-vastrāharaṇaiḥ | nanv āsāṁ kuru-pura-nāry-ādīnām anya-bhuktatvāt śrī-kṛṣṇa-sambhogo nāsty eva kutaḥ pūrva-rāgo varṇyate ? satyam | svāpno mānasaś ca sambhogo vartate dehāntare sākṣāc ca sambhogo bhaviṣyatīti | ataḥ pūrva-rāgo’yaṁ nānupapanno jñeyaḥ ||60|| (57)

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **uktārthaṁ dvābhyāṁ sphuṭayanti—**vīryaṁ** prabhāva eva **śulkaṁ** mūlyaṁ, tena yā bhagavatā **hṛtā** ānītāḥ, **śuṣmiṇo**'tibaliṣṭhān **caidya-pramukhān pramathya** | **pradyumnaś** ca **sāmbaś** ca **āmbaś** ca **sutā** yāsāṁ, rukmiṇī-jāmbavatī-nāgnajitīnāṁ tā **ādayo** yāsāṁ satyabhāmādīnāṁ, tāḥ | **yāś** **cāparāḥ** **sahasraśo** bhauma-vadhe **āhṛtāḥ**, asyottara-padyena sambandhaḥ ||29|| \


**etāḥ** pūrvoditā hari-patnyaḥ param anyat prākṛtaṁ **strītvaṁ** [strī-svarūpaṁ] **sādhu** śobhitaṁ **kurvate** | tat kīdṛk? **apāstaṁ peśalaṁ** dakṣatvaṁ svātantryaṁ yasmāt tat | peśalo rucire dakṣe iti medinī | **nirastaṁ śaucam** pāvitryaṁ yasmāt tat | śobhana-karaṇe hetur yāsām iti—asmaj-jātyā ca pareśo'tiśucir vaśīkṛto'stīti bhāvaḥ | **āhṛtibhiḥ** pārijātādi-priya-vastv-āharanair **hṛdi spṛśan **pramodayan | na ca strītva-mātram aśocaṁ, gaṅgādīnāṁ strīṇam evātipāvanatvāt | 

idam atra bodhyaṁ—parākhya-svarūpa-śakti-viśiṣṭaṁ para-tattvaṁ bhagavān lakṣmīś ca | narākṛtyā strī-vapuṣā ca nara-lokeṣv āvirbhavan nareṣu ca dhanyatām ādadhāti | na ca para-tattva-niṣṭhaṁ naratvaṁ strītvaṁ ca tat-samaṁ, viśuddha-kūṭasthatvena śravaṇāt ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viṣṇudāsaḥ : **[ujjvala 15.60]** etā** iti | bhārata-yuddhānantaraṁ śrī-kṛṣṇe hastināpurato dvārakāṁ prati gacchati sati kuru-pura-striyas tam atṛpta-locanair nirīkṣamāṇā harṣa-vegataḥ parasparaṁ tat-patnīnām saubhāgyādi-ślāghayā svābhilāṣaṁ prakaṭayanti | **etā** rukmiṇy-ādayaḥ **paraṁ** kevalaṁ **strītvaṁ** strī-jāti-mātratvaṁ **sādhu** śobhanaṁ **kurvate** | kiṁ-bhūtaṁ ? **apāstam** apagataṁ **peśalaṁ** svātantryaṁ yasmāt yasmin vā tat | tathā **nirastaṁ śaucaṁ** śucitvaṁ yasmāt tathā-bhūtam api | **bata** iti vismaye santoṣe vā | strītva-sādhu-karaṇe liṅgam āhuḥ—**yāsām** iti | **puṣkara-locanaḥ **kamala-nayanaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ **jātu** kadācid api yāsāṁ **gṛhāt nāpaiti** nāpagacchati | kiṁ kurvan ? **āhṛtibhih** parama-sumadhura-vacanaiḥ | kiṁ vā, pārijātādi-parama-sudurlabhopahārādibhiḥ **hṛdi spṛśan** pramodayan | anena tāsu śrī-kṛṣṇasya vaśībhāvatvaṁ dyotitam | tena ca tāsāṁ tasmin nirupadhi-premātireko dhvanitaḥ ||60||

**...**

**|| 1.10.31 || **

**evaṁ-vidhā gadantīnāṁ sa giraḥ pura-yoṣitām |**

**nirīkṣaṇenābhinandan sasmitena yayau hariḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : evaṁ-vidhā** vicitrā **giraḥ** **sa-smitena** **nirīkṣaṇenābhinandan sa harir yayau** ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : nirīkṣaṇena** śānti-rati-matīḥ **sasmitena** ujjvala-bhāvavatīr **abhinandan** ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : nirīkṣaṇena** svarūpābhijñānāṁ **sasmitena** līlābhijñānāṁ **pura-yoṣitāṁ giro'bhinandan** ||31||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.32 || **

**ajātaśatruḥ pṛtanāṁ gopīthāya madhudviṣaḥ |**

**parebhyaḥ śaṅkitaḥ snehāt prāyuṅkta caturaṅgiṇīm ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : sneha**-mātrāt ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : madhu-dviṣo**’pi **gopīthāya** rakṣaṇāya **snehāt parebhyaḥ** śatrubhyaḥ **śaṅkitaḥ** san **prāyuṅkta** | hasty-aśva-ratha-pādātaṁ senāṅgaṁ syāc caturvidham ity evaṁ **caturaṅgiṇīm** | **pṛtanāṁ** senām ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **atra rājñaḥ prema-mahimānam āha—**ajāta-śatrur** api **parebhyaḥ śaṅkitaḥ **| **madhu-dviṣo**’pi **gopīthāya** | atra hetuḥ—**snehād** iti | **evam** aiśvarya-jñānasya durbalatvaṁ bodhitam | evaṁ śrī-baladevādiṣu tathā-darśanāt ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : gopīthāya** rakṣaṇāya ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : ajātaśatrur madhudviṣo** **gopīthāya** rakṣaṇāya **caturaṅgiṇīṁ** gajāśva-ratha-pati-matīṁ **pṛtanāṁ** senāṁ **snehān** **nyayuṅkta**, snehasyāyaṁ svabhāvaḥ yo bhayābhāve'pi bhayaṁ sambhāvayati ||32||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.33 || **

**atha dūrāgatān śauriḥ kauravān virahāturān |**

**sannivartya dṛḍhaṁ snigdhān prāyāt sva-nagarīṁ priyaiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **pāṇḍavo kuru-vaṁśajatvāt pāṇdavā api **kauravā** eva tān **priyair** uddhavādibhiḥ saha ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : kauravān** pāṇḍavān ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : kauravān** yudhiṣṭhirādīn **priyair** uddhavādibhiḥ ||33||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.34-35 || **

**kuru-jāṅgala-pāñcālān śūrasenān sa-yāmunān |**

**brahmāvartaṁ kurukṣetraṁ matsyān sārasvatān atha ||**

**maru-dhanvam atikramya sauvīrābhīrayoḥ parān |**

**ānartān bhārgavopāgāc chrānta-vāho manāg vibhuḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : kuru**-kṣetraṁ kuru-deśāntara-gatam eva | kramo’tra na vivakṣitaḥ ||34|| **marur** nirudako deśaḥ | **dhanvo**’lpodakaḥ | **ānartākhyo** dvārakā-deśaḥ | sa **vibhur upāgāt** prāptaḥ | he **bhārgava** | **manāg** īṣat **śrāntā vāhā** yasya saḥ ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : kuru-jāṅgaleti** yugmakam | atra panthānam atikramya gamanaṁ tat-tan-nija-jana-milanārtham | śūrasenāgamanaṁ śrī-vṛndāvana-didṛkṣayaiva ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : kuru-jāṅgalety** ādau kramo na vivakṣitaḥ | **marur** nirudako deśaḥ **dhanvaḥ** alpodakaḥ | **ānartān** dvārakā-pradeśān | he **bhārgava** ! **manāk** īṣat **śrāntā vāhā** yasya saḥ ||34-35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kuru-jāṅgalety-ādau kramo na vivakṣitaḥ ||34|| **maruṁ** nirjalaṁ **dhanvam** alpa-jalaṁ ca **deśam** | **ānartān** kuśasthalī-prāntān deśān | he **bhārgava** śaunaka ! **manāg** īṣad eva **śrāntā vāhā** aśvā yasya saḥ ||35||

 **...**

**|| 1.10.36 || **

**tatra tatra ha tatratyair hariḥ pratyudyatārhaṇaḥ |**

**sāyaṁ bheje diśaṁ paścād gaviṣṭho gāṁ gatas tadā ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : gaviṣṭhaḥ** ādityaḥ | asau vāva gaviṣṭho’psu devy apsv astam eti iti mādhyandināyana-śrutiḥ ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : tatra tatra** deśe **tatratyair** janaiḥ | **pratyudyatāni** niveditāny **arhaṇāny** upāyanāni yasmai saḥ | **sāyam** aparāhne **paścād** **diśaṁ** paścimāṁ diśaṁ **bheje** prāptaḥ | **tadā** ca **gaviṣṭhaḥ** svarga-sthaḥ sūryo **gām** udakaṁ **gataḥ** praviṣṭo’staṁ gata ity arthaḥ | adbhyo vā eṣa prātar udety apaḥ sāyaṁ praviśati iti śruteḥ | 

yad vā, **tadā** **sāyaṅ**kāle jāte rathād avatīrya **gaviṣṭho** bhūmau sthitas tato **gāṁ** jalāśayaṁ **gataḥ** **paścād diśaṁ** sandhyāṁ **bheje** upāsitavān ity arthaḥ ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : sāyam** iti | **paścāt** tad-anantaram | **sāyaṁ** yasmin dine calitas tasyaiva divasasyānte | **diśaṁ** dvārakā-gantavya-kāṣṭhāṁ **bheja** ity arthaḥ | evaṁ rathasya śaighryaṁ darśitam | ata eva bhārgava [bhā.pu. 1.10.35] ity āścaryeṇa sambodhanam | **manāk** **śrānta-vāhaḥ** iti coktam | 

**tatra tatra** **hi** **tatratyair** **hariḥ** **pratyudyatārhaṇa** ity atrāśaṅkate—nanu śūrasena-yāmunāntargata-vṛndāvana-sthānāṁ śrīman-nandādīnāṁ milanādikaṁ viśiṣya kathaṁ na varṇitam ? tatrāha—sa eva **gaviṣṭho** gopāla-līlaḥ san | tadā dantavakra-vadhānantaraṁ **gāḥ** gokulam eva gataḥ | tad aprakaṭa-prakāśe taiḥ sārdham aprakaṭaṁ sthita evety arthaḥ | prakaṭena sva-prakāśena prakaṭa-prakāśa-viśeṣa-darśana-kautukārtham eva **tadā** **tatra** gamanam iti bhāvaḥ | tad idaṁ śrī-kṛṣṇa-sandarbhe vivṛtam asti ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu hastināpurāt dvārakā-mārgeṇaiva te deśāḥ sambhavantīty ata āha—**tatratyais** tat-tad-deśa-bhavair bhaktais **tatra tatra** dvārakā-mārge āgatya **pratyudyatāni** niveditāni **arhaṇāni** upāyanāni sva-sva-deśa-nayanārthaṁ yasmai saḥ | tena tat-tad-bhakta-manoratha-pūraṇārthaṁ tat-tad-deśaṁ gatvāgatvaiva tatra tatraikāni dināni sthitvā punar vartmānusasāreti bhāvaḥ | **sāyam** aparāhṇe **paścād diśaṁ** dvārakā-pradeśaṁ **bheje** prāptaḥ | **tadā gaviṣṭhaḥ** sūryo’pi **gāṁ gataḥ** paścima-samudra-jalaṁ praviṣṭaḥ ||36||

iti sārārtha-darśinyāṁ harṣiṇyāṁ bhakta-cetasām |

prathame daśamo'dhyāyaḥ saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām ||*||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu gajasāhvayāt kuśa-sthalīṁ gacchato hareḥ pathi naite deśāḥ sambhavanti? tatrāha—**tatratyais** tat-tad-deśa-bhavair bhaktais **tatra tatra** tasyāḥ pathi samāgatya **pratyudyatāni** niveditāni **arhaṇāni** upāyanāni sva-sva-deśa-nayanārthaṁ yasmai saḥ | tena tat-tad-bhaktābhilāṣa-saṁpādanāya tat-tad-deśaṁ gatvā tatra tatraika-dvān vāsarān sthitvā punaḥ panthānam ājagāmeti gamyate | **sāyam **aparāhne **paścād-diśaṁ** kuśasthalī-pradeśaṁ **bheje** prāpa, tadā **gaviṣṭho** dyustho ravir api **gāṁ gataḥ** paścimārṇavāntaḥ prāviśat | svarge jale cātra go-śabdaḥ ||36|| 

iti śrī-vaiṣṇavānandinyāṁ  prathama-skandha-ṭippanyāṁ daśamo'dhyāyaḥ ||10||

**...**

iti śrīmad-bhāgavate mahā-purāṇe brahma-sūtra-bhāṣye 

pāramahaṁsyaṁ saṁhitāyāṁ vaiyāsikyāṁ prathama-skandhe

śrī-kṛṣṇa-dvārakā-gamanaṁ nāma

daśamo’dhyāyaḥ |

||10||

**...**

 

(1.11)


## ekādaśo’dhyāyaḥ


### dvārakā-vāsibhiḥ kṛtaṁ bhagavato'bhinandanaṁ, pura-praveśa-varṇanaṁ ca |

**|| 1.11.1 ||**

**sūta uvāca—**

**ānartān sa upavrajya svṛddhāñjana-padān svakān |**

**dadhmau dara-varaṁ teṣāṁ viṣādaṁ śamayann iva ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :**

ānartaiḥ stūyamānasya purīṁ nirviśya bandhubhiḥ |

ekādaśe ratiḥ samyag yādavendrasya varṇyate ||*||

utsavair uccalat pauram udañcad dhvaja-toraṇam |

ullasad-ratna-dīpāli sva-puraṁ prabhur āviśat ||**||

**svṛddhān** samṛddhān | **dara-varaṁ** pāñcajanyaṁ śaṅkham | **dadhmau** vāditavān ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** 

ekādaśe stutaḥ kṛṣṇa ānartaiḥ sva-puraṁ gataḥ |

bandhubhir militaḥ kāntā adhinod iti varṇyate ||

**dara-varaṁ** pāñcajanyaṁ śaṅkham | **iva** iti sākṣād-darśanaṁ vinā samyag-viṣādasya śānty-anutpatteḥ ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :**

ānartaiḥ saṁstutaḥ prāpto dvārvatīṁ bāndhavair yutaḥ | \
harir ekādaśe patnīr atimān parikīrtyate || \


**daravaraṁ** pāñcajanyam ||1||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.2 || **

**sa uccakāśe dhavalodaro daro'py **

**urukramasyādhara-śoṇa-śoṇimā ||**

**dādhmāyamānaḥ kara-kañja-sampuṭe |**

**yathābja-ṣaṇḍe kala-haṁsa utsvanaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : sa** iti | **daraḥ** śaṅkho **dadhmāyamāno** bhagavatā āpuryamāṇa **uccakāśe**’tiśayena śuśubhe ity anvayaḥ | kathaṁ-bhūto daraḥ ? **dhavalam udaraṁ** yasya saḥ | tathāpy **urukramasya** kṛṣṇasya **adharasya** yaḥ **śoṇa**-guṇaḥ, tena **śoṇimā** yasya saḥ | **kara-kañje** kara-kamale tayoḥ **saṁpuṭe** madhye vartamānaḥ | katham uccakāśe ? **abja-ṣaṇḍe** rakta-kamala-samūhe **kala-haṁso** rāja-haṁsa **utsvana** ucca-śabdo yathā, tadvat ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : sa** **uccakāśa** iti padyaṁ citsukhena vyākhyātam asti ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : sa daraḥ** śaṅkhaḥ **uccakāśe** śobhate sma | **adharasya śoṇena** guṇena **śoṇimā** yasya saḥ | **dādhmāyamānaḥ** atiśayena vādyamānaḥ | **abja-ṣaṇḍe** kamala-samūhe iti caturbhiḥ karair dhṛtatvāt ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : sa daraḥ** śaṅkhaḥ, **uccakāśe** śuśubhe, **adharasya śoṇena** guṇena **śoṇimā** yasya saḥ | **dadhmāyamānaḥ** prapūryamāṇaḥ, **abja-ṣaṇḍe** padma-vṛnde, caturbhiḥ **karair** dhṛtatvāt | tad-guṇo'trālaṅkāraḥ, dareṇādhara-karatalāruṇya-grahaṇāt, tad-guṇaḥ sva-guṇa-tyāgād anyadīya-guṇa-grahaḥ iti tal-lakṣaṇāt ||2||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.3 || **

**tam upaśrutya ninadaṁ jagad-bhaya-bhayāvaham**[^91]** |**

**pratyudyayuḥ prajāḥ sarvā bhartṛ-darśana-lālasāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : jagato** yad **bhayaṁ** tasya **bhayāvaham** | **pratyudyayuḥ** pratyujjagmuḥ | **bhartur darśane** **lālasa**utsukyaṁ yāsāṁ tāḥ ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : jagato** yad **bhayaṁ** tasya bhayam āvahati tam ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : jagato** yad bhayaṁ tasya bhayam āvahatīti ||3||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.4-5 || **

**tatropanīta-balayo raver dīpam ivādṛtāḥ |**

**ātmārāmaṁ pūrṇa-kāmaṁ nija-lābhena nityadā ||**

**prīty-utphulla-mukhāḥ procur harṣa-gadgadayā girā |**

**pitaraṁ sarva-suhṛdam avitāram ivārbhakāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : tatra** tasmin śrī-kṛṣṇo **upanītāḥ** samarpitā **balaya** upāyanāni yābhis tāḥ | nirapekṣe’pi tasminn ādareṇa samarpaṇe dṛṣṭāntaḥ—**raver dīpam iva **iti | **pitaram arbhakā iva** taṁ **sarva-suhṛdam avitāraṁ procur** ity uttareṇānvayaḥ | suhṛttvenaivitāraṁ, na tu kāmena | atra hetuḥ—**ātmārāmam** | tatrāpi hetuḥ—paramānanda-nija-svarūpa-lābhenaiva **pūrṇa-kāmam** ||4-5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : tatra** śrī-dvārakāyāṁ **raver** upahāra-rūpaṁ **dīpam** **ādṛtavanto** janā ivety arthaḥ ||4|| evaṁ stuty-ādikam api tat-prīṇanatām arhatīty āha—**prītyā **iti | **pitaram arbhakā iva** iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ | tasya prītāv asādhāraṇa-guṇa-viśeṣam apy āha—**sarva-suhṛdam** iti | sarva-suhṛttve liṅgam—**avitāram** iti | tathāpi tādṛśasya rājñaḥ[^92] sva-sambandhābhimāni-prītimat-putrādiṣu prīti-viśeṣodayo yathā dṛśyate, tathā teṣu taṁ prītimantam ity arthaḥ | evaṁ kalpataru-dṛṣṭānte’pi bhagavato bhakti-viṣayikā kṛpā yathārtham evopapadyate | ye khalu sahaja-tat-prītim evātmani prārthayamānā bhajante, tebhyas tad-dāna-yāthārthyasyāvaśyakatvāt | tasmād asty evānanda-svarūpasyāpi bhaktāv ānandollāsa iti ||5|| [bhakti-sandarbha 143]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : upanītāḥ** samarpitā **balaya** upāyanāni yābhis tathā-bhūtāḥ satyaḥ | nirapekṣe’pi tasminn ādareṇa samarpaṇe dṛṣṭāntaḥ—**raver dīpam iva** ravau dīpam upanīya ravi-pūjikā ivety arthaḥ | **pitaram arbhakā iva** tam avitāraṁ rakṣitāram ūcuḥ | upāyanānapekṣatvam āha—ātmārāmam iti ||4-5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : tatra** bhartari kṛṣṇe **upanītāḥ** samarpitā **balaya** upāyanāni yābhis tādṛśyaḥ satyaḥ, nirapekṣepi tasminn ādareṇārpaṇe dṛṣṭāntaḥ—**raver dīpam** **iva** iti dīpam upanīya ravi-pūjakā iva | **ātmārāmaṁ** vibhu-vijñānānanda-svarūpānubhavinaṁ nija-lābhena parākhya-śakti-prāptyā **pūrṇa-kāmam** ||4|| **arbhakāḥ pitaram** iva prajās tam **avitāraṁ** pālakam **ūcuḥ** ||5||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.6 || **

**natāḥ sma te nātha sadāṅghri-paṅkajaṁ**

**viriñca-vairiñcya-surendra-vanditam |**

**parāyaṇaṁ kṣemam ihecchatāṁ paraṁ**

**na yatra kālaḥ prabhavet paraḥ prabhuḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kim ucur iti tad āha—**natāḥ sma** iti | **viriñco** brahmā | **vairiñcyāḥ** sanakādayaḥ | **iha** saṁsāre **paraṁ** **kṣemam** **icchatāṁ** **parāyaṇaṁ** paramaṁ śaraṇam | kutaḥ ? pareṣāṁ brahmādīnāṁ **prabhur** api **kālo yatra prabhur na** **bhavet** ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : vairiñcyāḥ** sanakādayaḥ | **paraṁ parāyaṇaṁ** paramāśrayam | yatra aṅghri-paṅkaje pareṣāṁ brahmādīnāṁ **prabhur api kālo na prabhavet** ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : vairiñcyāḥ** sanakādayaḥ, **paraṁ parāyaṇaṁ** paramāśrayaḥ, **yatrāṅghri-paṅkaje **pareṣāṁ brahmādīnāṁ **prabhur api kālo na prabhavet** ||6||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.7 || **

**bhavāya nas tvaṁ bhava viśva-bhāvana**

**tvam eva mātātha suhṛt-patiḥ pitā |**

**tvaṁ sad-gurur naḥ paramaṁ ca daivataṁ**

**yasyānuvṛttyā kṛtino babhūvima ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **ato **bhavāya** udbhavāya **no**’smākaṁ **tvaṁ bhava** | he **viśva-bhāvana** ! **kṛtinaḥ** kṛtārthā **babhūvima** jātā vayam ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : bhavāya** santata-nija-darśana-samṛddhaye ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : bhavāya** kṣemāya | bhavaḥ kṣeme ca saṁsāre iti medinī ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : no**'smākaṁ **bhavāya** kalyāṇāya **tvaṁ bhava** | bhavaḥ kṣeme ca saṁsāre iti medinī | **yasya** tava **anuvṛttyā** vayaṁ **kṛtinaḥ** kṛtārthā **babhūvima** jātāḥ ||7||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.8 || **

**aho sanāthā bhavatā sma yad vayaṁ**

**traiviṣṭapānām api dūra-darśanam |**

**prema-smita-snigdha-nirīkṣaṇānanaṁ**

**paśyema rūpaṁ tava sarva-saubhagam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kṛtārthatvam evāhuḥ | **aho** **bhavatā vayaṁ sa-nāthāḥ smaḥ** | **yad** yasmāt **tava rūpaṁ paśyema** | **traiviṣṭapānām** **api dūre darśanaṁ** yasya tat | devānām api durlabha-darśanam ity arthaḥ | **premṇā** yat **smitaṁ** tad-yuktaṁ **snigdhaṁ nirīkṣaṇaṁ** yasmiṁs tad **ānanaṁ** yasmiṁs tad rūpam | **sarveṣu** cāṅgeṣu **saubhagaṁ** yasmiṁs tat ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī), baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : traiviṣṭapānāṁ** devānām ||8||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.9 || **

**yarhy ambujākṣāpasasāra bho bhavān**

**kurūn madhūn vātha suhṛd-didṛkṣayā |**

**tatrābda-koṭi-pratimaḥ kṣaṇo bhaved**

**raviṁ vinākṣṇor iva nas tavācyuta ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : kurūṇāṁ madhūnāṁ** ca naḥ ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **arbhakā iva sa-karuṇam āhuḥ | **yarhi** yadā | bho **ambujākṣa** ! no **bhavān** iti pāṭhe na ity anādare ṣaṣṭhī | asmān anādṛtya **apasasāra** apahāya jagāma | **kurūn** hastināpuram | **madhūn** mathurāṁ vā | **tatra** tadā | **raviṁ vinā** āndhyād **akṣṇor** yathaiko’pi kṣaṇo’**bda-koṭi-pratimo bhavet** | evaṁ **tava** **naḥ** tvadīyānām asmākam apīty arthaḥ ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : yarhi **iti | yadā yadety arthaḥ | **tatra** tadā tadā **kṣaṇo**’pi **abda-koṭi-pratimo **bhavati | tathā **raviṁ vinākṣṇor** yādrśy āndhyāvasthā, tādrśy api bhavatīty arthaḥ | "no bhavān" iti pāṭhe **no**’smākaṁ svāmī yo bhavān, sa tvam ity arthaḥ | 

atra **madhūn** mathurāṁ **vā** iti vyākhyāya tadānīṁ tan-maṇḍale **suhṛdo** vrajasthā eva prakaṭā iti tair apy abhimatam | tatra yoga-prabhāvena nītvā sarva-janaṁ hariḥ [bhā.pu. 10.50.58] ity atra sarva-śabdāt |


    balabhadraḥ kuru-śreṣṭha bhagavān ratham āsthitaḥ |


    suhṛd-didṛkṣur utkaṇṭhaḥ prayayau nanda-gokulam || [bhā.pu. 10.65.1] 

ity atra prasiddhatvāc ca ||9|| [kṛṣṇa-sandarbha 174]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **bho **ambujākṣa** ! "no bhavān" iti pāṭhe no’smān anādṛtya | **kurūn** hastināpuram | **madhūn** mathurā-maṇḍalaṁ nanda-vrajam ity arthaḥ, na tu mathurā-purīṁ tadānīṁ tasyāṁ suhṛdām abhāvāt | tatra yoga-prabhāveṇa nītvā sarva-janaṁ hariḥ [bhā.pu. 10.50.57] ity atra sarva-śabdāt | tena āyāsya iti dautyakair iti jñātīn vo draṣṭum eṣyāma [bhā.pu. 10.45.23] ity-ādi yad bhagavatā uktaṁ vrajaṁ pratyāgamanaṁ tat pādmādi-purāṇeṣu spaṣṭaṁ sad api tad api śrī-bhāgavate tv asminn atraiva jñāpitam | tadā **nas tava** tvadīyānām asmākam ||9-10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : yarhi** yadā bho **ambujākṣa**! asmān vihāya **bhavān** **kurūn** gajasāhvayaṁ **madhūn** māthura-manḍalaṁ vā **sasāra** **suhṛdāṁ** pāṇḍavānāṁ nandādīnāṁ ca **didṛkṣayā**, **tadā naḥ** **kṣaṇo'bda-koṭi-tulyo bhavet**, **raviṁ vinā** yathā **akṣnor** āndhyam | atra **madhūn** iti nanda-vraja eva gṛhītaḥ | mathurāyāṁ suhṛdām abhāvāt tatra yoga-prabhāvena nītvā sarva-janaṁ hariḥ [bhā.pu. 10.50.57] iti māthurāṇāṁ sarveṣāṁ dvārvatyāṁ nayanāt | āyāsya iti dautyakaiḥ [bhā.pu. 10.39.35], jñātīn vo draṣṭum eṣyāmaḥ [bhā.pu. 10.45.23] ity-ādi sva-pratijñā-puraṇāya tasyaivār gantavyatvād evaṁ pādmottara-khaṇḍe'bhidhānāt baladevenāpi tasminn evāgatatvāc ca ||9||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.10 ||**[^93]

**kathaṁ vayaṁ nātha ciroṣite tvayi**

**prasanna-dṛṣṭyākhila**[^94]**-tāpa-śoṣaṇam |**

**jīvema te sundara-hāsa-śobhitam**

**apaśyamānā vadanaṁ manoharam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : katham** iti | he nāṭha ! **prapannānāṁ tṛṣṇā**-rūpo’**khilo** yas **tāpaḥ,** tasya **śoṣaṇaṁ** nāśakam, tvāṁ prapannānāṁ tṛṣṇāsambhavāt ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī), baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

 **...**

**|| 1.11.11 ||**

**iti codīritā vācaḥ prajānāṁ bhakta-vatsalaḥ |**

**śṛṇvāno’nugrahaṁ dṛṣṭyā vitanvan prāviśat puram ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : iti** **ca** evaṁ-vidhā anyāś coccāritā **vācaḥ** **śṛṇvan** **dṛṣṭyā** sābhinandanāvalokena anugrahaṁ kurvan **purīṁ** dvārakāṁ **prāviśat** ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : dṛṣṭyā** tān prati dṛṣṭi-kṣepeṇa ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : dṛṣṭyā** tān prati kṛpāvalokena ||11||

 **...**

|| 1.11.12 || 

**madhu-bhoja-daśārhārha-kukurāndhaka-vṛṣṇibhiḥ |**

**ātma-tulya-balair guptāṁ nāgair bhogavatīm iva ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tāṁ dvārakāṁ stauti pañcabhiḥ | sva-**tulya-balair** madhu-bhojādibhir guptāṁ rakṣitām ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tāṁ dvārakāṁ varṇayati pañcabhiḥ ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **purīṁ varṇayati madhu-bhojeti pañcabhiḥ | ātma-tulyeti—teṣāṁ nitya-pārṣadatvam uktam | 


    ete hi yādavāḥ sarve mad-gaṇā eva bhāmini! [pa.pu. 6.89.21]


    sarvadā mat-priyā devi mat-tulya-guṇa-śālinaḥ || iti pādmāt ||12||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.13 || **

**sarvartu-sarva-vibhava-puṇya-vṛkṣa-latāśramaiḥ |**

**udyānopavanārāmair vṛta-padmākara-śriyam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : sarveṣv ṛtuṣu sarve vibhavāḥ** puṣpādi-sampado yeṣāṁ, te **puṇya-vṛkṣā latāśramā** latā-maṇḍapāś ca yeṣu, tair **udyānādibhir** **vṛtā** ye **padmākarāḥ** sarāṁsi, taiḥ **śrīḥ** śobhā yasyāṁ tām | **udyānaṁ** phala-pradhānam | **upavanaṁ** puṣpa-pradhānam | **ārāmaḥ** krīḍārthaṁ vanam ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : sarveṣu ṛtuṣu sarva-vibhavāḥ** puṣpādi-sampado yeṣāṁ te **puṇya**-rūpā **vṛkṣāś** ca **latāś** ca **āśramāś** ca, taiḥ | **udyānaṁ** phala-pradhānam **upavanaṁ** puṣpa-pradhānam **ārāmaḥ** krīḍārthaṁ vanaṁ, tair **vṛtā** | ye **padmākarāḥ** sarāṁsi, taiḥ **śrīḥ** śobhā yasyāṁ, tām ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : sarveṣu ṛtuṣu** **vibhavāḥ** puṣpa-phalādi-sampado yeṣāṁ te, **puṇya**-rūpā **vṛkṣāś** ca **latāś** ca **āśramāś** ca yeṣu, tair **udyānādibhir** **vṛtā** ye **padmākarāḥ** sarāṁsi, taiḥ **śrīḥ** śobhā yasyāṁ tām | phala-pradhānam **udyānaṁ**, puṣpa-pradhānam **upavanam,** krīḍārthaṁ vanam **ārāmaḥ** ||13||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.14 || **

**gopura-dvāra-mārgeṣu kṛta-kautuka-toraṇām |**

**citra-dhvaja-patākāgrair antaḥ pratihatātapām ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **gopuraṁ pura-dvāram | dvāraṁ gṛha-dvāram | kṛtāni kautukenotsavena toraṇāni yasyāṁ tām | garuḍādi-cihnāṅkitā dhvajāḥ | jaya-prada-yantrāṅkitāḥ patākāḥ | citrāṇāṁ dhvaja-patākānām agrair antaḥ pratihata ātapo yasyāṁ tām ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **gopuraṁ pura-dvāram | dvāraṁ gṛha-dvāram | antar madhye madhye pratihata ātapaḥ sūrya-jvālā yasyām ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **gopurāṇi pura-dvārāṇi, dvārāṇi mandirāṇāṁ, kṛtāni racitāni kautukenotsavena toraṇāni muktādi-manojñā vandana-mālā yasyāṁ tām | citrāṇāṁ dhvaja-patākānām agrair antaḥ pratihataḥ sūrṣātapo yasyāṁ tām | vainateyādi-cihna-viśiṣṭā dhvajāḥ, vijaya-patrāñcitāḥ patākāḥ ||14||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.15 || **

**sammārjita-mahā-mārga- rathyāpaṇaka-catvarām |**

**siktāṁ gandha-jalair uptāṁ phala-puṣpākṣatāṅkuraiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **saṁmārjitāni niḥsārita-rajaskāni mahā-mārgādīni yasyāṁ tām | mahā-mārgā rāja-mārgāḥ | rathyā iti amārgāḥ | āpaṇakāḥ paṇya-vīthayaḥ | catvarāṇy aṅgāni | phalādibhir uptām avakīrṇām ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **mahā-mārgā rāja-mārgāḥ | rathyā itara-mārgāḥ | āpaṇakāḥ paṇya-vīthayaḥ | catvarāṇi aṅgaṇāni | uptām avakīrṇām ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **mahā-mārgā rāja-pathāḥ, rathyā itara-mārgāḥ, āpaṇakāḥ paṇyavīthayaḥ, catvarāṇy aṅganāni etāni saṁmārjitāni yasyāṁ tāṁ phalādibhir uptām avakīrṇām ||15||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.16-17 || **

**dvāri dvāri gṛhāṇāṁ ca dadhy-akṣata-phalekṣubhiḥ |**

**alaṅkṛtāṁ pūrṇa-kumbhair balibhir dhūpa-dīpakaiḥ ||**

**niśamya preṣṭham āyāntaṁ vasudevo mahā-manāḥ |**

**akrūraś cograsenaś ca rāmaś cādbhuta-vikramaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : preṣṭham** antarātmānam **āyāntaṁ niśamya** śrutvā **vasudevādayaḥ pratyujjagmur** iti caturthenānvayaḥ ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : preṣṭham āyaṇtaṁ niśamya **iti vandi-paryantam anuvartanīyam | ataḥ preṣṭha-padaṁ kvacid yogārthena, kvacana rūḍhyā ca saṅgamanīyam ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : balibhir** upahāraiḥ ||16|| **preṣṭham** ātmane'py atipriyaṁ, **vasudevādayaḥ** **pratyujjagmur** iti caturthenānvayaḥ ||17||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.18 || **

**pradyumnaś cārudeṣṇaś ca **[^95]**sāmbo jāmbavatī-sutaḥ |**

**praharṣa-vegocchaśita**[^96]**- śayanāsana-bhojanāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : praharṣa-vegena ucchaśitāny** ullaṅghitāni **śayanādīni** yais te | śaśa pluta-gatau ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : praharṣa-vegena ucchaśitāni** ullaṅghitāni **śayanādīni** yaiḥ | śaśa pluta-gatau ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : praharṣa-vegena ucchaśitāni** ullaṅghitāni **śayanādīni** yaiḥ | śaśa pluta-gatau dhātuḥ ||18||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.19 || **

**vāraṇendraṁ puraskṛtya brāhmaṇaiḥ sa-sumaṅgalaiḥ |**

**śaṅkha-tūrya-ninādena brahma-ghoṣeṇa cādṛtāḥ ||**

**pratyujjagmū rathair hṛṣṭāḥ praṇayāgata-sādhvasāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : vāraṇendraṁ** maṅgalārthaṁ **purataḥ kṛtvā** | **sa-sumaṅgalaiḥ** sumaṅgalaṁ puṣpādi tad-yukta-pāṇibhiḥ | **brahma-ghoṣo** mantra-pāṭhaḥ | **praṇayena** snehena **āgataṁ sādhvasaṁ** saṁbhramo yeṣāṁ te ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : sādhvasaṁ** sambhramaḥ ||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : vāraṇendraṁ** gaja-rājaṁ, **sa-sumaṅgalair** maṅgala-vastu-hastair ity arthaḥ | **brahma-ghoṣeṇa** veda-dhvaninā, **sādhvāsaṁ** sambhramaḥ ||19||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.20 || **

**vāra-mukhyāś ca śataśo yānais tad-darśanotsukāḥ |**

**lasat-kuṇḍala-nirbhāta-kapola-vadana-śriyaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : vāra-mukhyā** naṭādayaś ca pratyujjagmuḥ | **lasat-kuṇḍalair nirbhātāni** yāni **kapolāni,** tair **vadaneṣu śrīḥ** śobhā yāsāṁ, tāḥ | **vāra-mukhyā **nartakyaḥ, veśyā iti yāvat ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

	

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : vāra-mukhyā** naṭādayaś ca pratyuj-jagmuḥ ||20||

 **...**

|| 1.11.21 || 

**naṭa-nartaka-gandharvāḥ sūta-māgadha-vandinaḥ |**

**gāyanti cottamaśloka-caritāny adbhutāni ca ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : adbhutāni** ceti **ca**-kārasya **vandinaś** cety anvayaḥ | **naṭā** nava-rasābhinaya-caturāḥ | tālādy-anusāreṇa nṛtyanto **nartakāḥ** | **gandharvā** gāyakāḥ | 


    sūtāḥ paurāṇikāḥ proktā māgadhā vaṁśa-śaṁsakāḥ | 


    vandinas tv amala-prajñāḥ prastāva-sadṛśoktayaḥ ||

te sarve **gāyantica** ity anvayaḥ | **uttama-ślokasya adbhutāni caritrāṇi** bhakta-vātsalyādīni ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **naṭā rasābhinaya-nipuṇāḥ, nartakāḥ saṅgītoktavidhinā nṛtyantaḥ, gandharvā gāyakāḥ, sutādīnāṁ lakṣaṇāni—


        sutāḥ paurāṇikāḥ proktā māgadhā vaṁśa-śaṁsakāḥ | 


        vandinas tv amala-prajñāḥ prastāva-sadṛśoktayaḥ iti ||21||

 **...**

|| 1.11.22 || 

**bhagavāṁs tatra bandhūnāṁ paurāṇām anuvartinām |**

**yathā-vidhy upasaṅgamya sarveṣāṁ mānam ādadhe ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **yathāvidhi yaiḥ saha yathocitaṁ tais tathā samāgamaṁ kṛtvā | sarveṣāṁ mānam ādadhe kṛtavān ity arthaḥ ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yathāvidhi yathocitam ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yathāvidhi yathocitam | upasaṅgamya pratyudgatān prāpya, mānaṁ satkāram ||22||

 **...**

|| 1.11.23 || 

**prahvābhivādanāśleṣa-kara-sparśa-smitekṣaṇaiḥ |**

**āśvāsya cāśvapākebhyo varaiś cābhimatair vibhuḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tadāha —prahveti | prahvaṁ prahvatvaṁ śirasā natiḥ | abhivādanaṁ vācā natiḥ | āśvāsyābhayaṁ dattvā | śva-pākān abhivyāpya varair abhīṣṭa-dānaiś ca mānaṁ kṛtavān ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tad evāha—prahvatvaṁ śirasā natiḥ pitrādiṣu gargādiṣu ca | abhivādanaṁ vācā natiḥ yadu-vaṁśyeṣu sthavireṣu | āśv-apākebhyaḥ śvapāka-paryantān api janān āśvāsya abhayaṁ dattvā | varair abhīṣṭa-dānaiś ca ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **prahvatvaṁ śirasā natiḥ vasudevādiṣu gargādiṣu ca, abhivādanaṁ vācā natiḥ yaduvaṁśyeṣu vṛddheṣu, āśleṣa-karasparśau sameṣu | itareṣu smitekṣaṇāni, āśvapākebhyaḥ śva-pāka-paryantaṁ tān api janānāśvāsyābhayaṁ dattvā, varair abhīṣṭa-pradānaiś ca ||23||

 **...**

|| 1.11.24 || 

**svayaṁ ca gurubhir vipraiḥ sadāraiḥ sthavirair api |**

**āśīrbhir yujyamāno’nyair vandibhiś cāviśat puram ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **anyaiś ca bandibhiś ca ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **gurubhiḥ pitāmahādibhiḥ ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **svayaṁ ca gurvādibhir āśīrbhi-yujyamāno vandibhiḥ saha sva-puram aviśat ||24||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.25 || **

**rāja-mārgaṁ gate kṛṣṇe dvārakāyāḥ kula-striyaḥ |**

**harmyāṇy āruruhur viprās**[^97]** tad-īkṣaṇa-mahotsavāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **he **vipra** śaunaka ! **tasyekṣaṇena mahān utsavo** yāsāṁ tāḥ ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **he **viprāḥ**! ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **he **viprāḥ** ! ||25||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.26 || **

**nityaṁ nirīkṣamāṇānāṁ yad api dvārakaukasām |**

**na vitṛpyanti hi dṛśaḥ śriyo dhāmāṅgam acyutam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **yady asmān **nityaṁ** sadācyutaṁ **nirīkṣamāṇānām** api dṛśo naiva tṛpyanty ata āruruhuḥ | kathaṁ-bhūtam ? **śriyaḥ** śobhāyā **dhāma** sthāna-maṅgalaṁ yasya tam ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : yad **yasmān **nityaṁ** **nirīkṣamāṇānām** **api dṛśo** **naiva tṛpyanti,** ata **āruruhuḥ** [25] | **acyutaṁ** kīdṛśaṁ ? **śriyaḥ** śobhāyā **dhāma** sthānam **aṅgaṁ** yasya tam ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : yato'cyutaṁ nityaṁ nirīkṣamāṇānām api dṛśo naiva tṛpyanti**, ato harmyāṇy āruruhuḥ [25] | **acyutaṁ** kīdṛśaṁ? **śriyaḥ** śobhāyā **dhāmāny** **aṅgāni** yasya tam ||26||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.27 || **

**śriyo nivāso yasyoraḥ pāna-pātraṁ mukhaṁ dṛśām |**

**bāhavo loka-pālānāṁ sāraṅgāṇāṁ padāmbujam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **etad evābhinayenāha | **śriyo** lakṣmyāḥ **yasya uro** vakṣo **nivāsaḥ** | yasya **mukhaṁ** sarva-prāṇināṁ **dṛśāṁ** saundaryāmṛta-**pānāya pātram** | yasya **bāhavo** **loka-pālānāṁ nivāsaḥ** | sāraṁ śrī-kṛṣṇaṁ gāyantīti **sāraṅgā** bhaktāḥ, teṣāṁ yasya **padāmbujaṁ** nivāsaḥ, taṁ nirīkṣamāṇānāṁ dṛśa iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : śriyaḥ** preyasyāḥ | yāḥ sarveṣām eva tat-priya-vargāṇāṁ **dṛśaś** cakṣūṁṣi, tāsām | **loka-pālānāṁ** pālyānām | **sāraṅgāṇāṁ** sarveṣām eva bhaktānām | **nivāsa** āśrayaḥ | yathā-svaṁ bhāvoddīpanatvāt ||27|| [prīti-sandarbha 156]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yasya **mukhaṁ pāna-pātraṁ** saundaryāmṛta-pūrṇaṁ **dṛśāṁ** **nivāsaḥ** | indrādīnāṁ **loka-pālānāṁ** yasya **bāhavo** **nivāsaḥ**, tad-balam āśrityaiva asurebhyo nirbhayās te sukhaṁ vasantīti bhāvaḥ | **sāraṁ** tad-yaśo gāyantīti **sāraṅgā** bhaktāḥ, teṣāṁ, śleṣeṇa bhramarāṇāṁ **padāmbujaṁ nivāsaḥ** | taṁ nirīkṣamāṇānāṁ dṛśaḥ [26] iti pūrveṇānvayaḥ ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : yasya** **uraḥ śriyo nivāsaḥ**, yasya **mukhaṁ pāna-pātraṁ** lāvanya-sudhā-pūrṇaṁ **dṛśāṁ** nivāsaḥ, yasya **bāhavo loka-pālānām** indrādīnāṁ nivāsaḥ, tān āśrityaiva te nirbhayā nivasanti | yasya **padāmbujaṁ saraṅgāṇāṁ** tad-yaśo-gāyakānāṁ bhaktānāṁ nivāsaḥ | taṁ nirīkṣamāṇānāṁ dṛśaḥ [26] iti pūrveṇānuṣaṅgaḥ ||27||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.28 || **

**sitātapatra-vyajanair upaskṛtaḥ**

**prasūna-varṣair abhivarṣitaḥ pathi |**

**piśaṅga-vāsā vana-mālayā babhau**

**ghano yathārkoḍupa-cāpa-vaidyutaiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **sitair ātapatra-vyajanair upaskṛto maṇḍitaḥ | arkaś coḍupo nakṣatra-sahitaś candraś ca cāpam indra-dhanuś ca vaidyutaṁ vidyut tejaś ca taiḥ | arkaś-chatrasyopamānam | nakṣatrāṇi puṣpa-vṛṣṭeḥ | candraḥ paribhrama-kṛta-maṇḍalākārayoś cāmara-vyajanayoḥ | cāpaṁ vana-mālāyāḥ vidyut tejaḥ piśaṅga-vāsasoḥ | abhūtopameyam | yadi ghanasyopari sūrya-bimbam ubhayataś candrau sarvato nakṣatrāṇi madhye ca militaṁ cāpa-dvayaṁ sthiraṁ vidyut-tejaś ca śrīadi bhavet tarhi sa ghano yathā bhāti tathā harir babhāv ity arthaḥ ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **vaidyutaṁ vidyut-tejaḥ | ghanaḥ kṛṣṇasyopamānam | arkaś chatrasya uḍupau paribhrama-kṛta-maṇḍalākārayoś cāmara-vyajanayoḥ | uḍavaḥ puṣpa-vṛṣṭeḥ | cāpau vana-mālāyāḥ vidyut-tejaḥ piśaṅga-vāsasoḥ | adbhutopameyaṁ yadi ghanasyopari sūrya-bimbam ubhayataś candrau sarvato nakṣatrāṇi madhye ca militaṁ cāpa-dvayaṁ sthiraṁ vidyut-tejo bhavet tarhi sa ghano yathā bhāti tathā harir babhāv iti bhāvaḥ ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **sitair ātapatrādibhir upaskṛto'lankṛtaḥ, puṣpair vikīrṇaś ca kṛṣṇo vabhau | arkaś ca uḍupaḥ sanakṣatraś candraś ca cāpaṁ śatrudhanuś ca vaidyutaṁ vidyut-tejaś ca | uparyarka-vimbena ubhayataś candra-vimbābhyāṁ sarvato nakṣatrair madhye militābhyāṁ śatru-cāpābhyāṁ sthireṇa vidyut-tejasā ca viśiṣṭo yathā ghanas tathā kṛṣṇaḥ śuśubha ity abhūtopameyam, asambhāvyamānopamāna-samudbhāvanāt, vimbānuvimbopamā cety eke, kṛṣṇādi-dṛṣṭāntavad ghanādeḥ pratipādanāt ||28||

 **...**

|| 1.11.29 || 

**praviṣṭas tu gṛhaṁ pitroḥ pariṣvaktaḥ sva-mātṛbhiḥ |**

**vavande śirasā sapta devakī-pramukhā mudā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **devakī-pramukhāḥ sapta vavanda iti mātṛ-saundaryād ādara-viśeṣa-jñāpanārtham uktam | aṣṭādaśāpi vasudeva-bhāryā mātṛ-tulyatvān namaskṛtā eva ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **sapta vavanda iti mātṛ-sodaryād ādara-viśeṣa-jñāpanārtham uktam | aṣṭādaśāpi pitur vasudevasya bhāryā mātṛ-tulyatvān namaskṛtā eva ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **saptety upalakṣaṇam, aṣṭādaśāpi vasudevapatnīḥ śirasā vavande, devakī-tulyatvād ity arthaḥ | saptānām uktir devakī-saundaryeṇa tāsvādarādhikyāt ||29||

 **...**

|| 1.11.30 || 

**tāḥ putram aṅkam āropya sneha-snuta-payodharāḥ |**

**harṣa-vihvalitātmānaḥ siṣicur netrajair jalaiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **netrajair jalair harṣāśrubhiḥ ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **sva-bhuvanaṁ sva-puraṁ, sarve kāmā bhogā yatra tat | anuttamaṁ sarvotkṛṣṭaṁ, sahasrāṇi ceti—ca śabdād aṣṭottara-śatottarāṇīti jñeyam ||30||

 **...**

|| 1.11.31 || 

**athāviśat sva-bhavanaṁ sarva-kāmam anuttamam |**

**prāsādā yatra patnīnāṁ sahasrāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **sva-gṛha-praveśam āha—atheti | **sahasrāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa** iti **ca**-kārād aṣṭottara-śatādhikānīti jñeyam ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : sva-bhavanaṁ** sva-puram | **sahasrāṇi ca ṣoḍaśa** iti **ca**-kārād aṣṭottara-śatādhikānīti jñeyam ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : _na vyākhyātam._**

 **...**

**|| 1.11.32 || **

**patnyaḥ patiṁ proṣya gṛhān upāgataṁ**

**vilokya sañjāta-mano-mahotsavāḥ |**

**uttasthur ārāt sahasāsanāśayāt**

**sākaṁ vratair vrīḍita-locanānanāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : proṣya** deśāntare uṣitvā | **ārād** dūrād eva **vilokya** **sañjāto manasi mahotsavo** yāsāṁ tāḥ | **āsanād** dehena **uttasthuḥ** | **āśayo**’ntaḥkaraṇaṁ, tasmād apy ātmanottasathuḥ | śrī-kṛṣṇenātmanaḥ saṁśleṣe’ntaḥkaraṇa-vyavadhānam api tā nāsahantety arthaḥ | **vrīḍitāni locanāny** **ānanāni** ca yāsāṁ tāḥ | apāṅgair eva vīkṣaṇād vrīḍita-locanāḥ, avanata-mukhatvād vrīḍitānanāḥ | **sākaṁ vratair** iti hāsya-krīḍā-varjanādi-niyamā āpi tābhya uttasthur iti vā | vratāni ca yājñavalkyenoktāni—


    krīḍāṁ śarīra-saṁskāraṁ samājotsava-darśanam |


    hāsyaṁ para-gṛhe yānaṁ tyajet proṣita-bhartṛkā || iti ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **patnya iti | **vilokya** eva **āsanāt** tad-āveśenaika-ceṣṭatāvasthānāt | āśayāt tat-samādhi-lakṣaṇāc ca **uttasthus** tau tatyajur ity arthaḥ | ata eva **vrīḍita-** iti ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yāvatyo mahiṣyas tāvadbhir eva prakāśair yugapad eva pṛthak tat-tan-mandira-praviṣṭaṁ kṛṣṇam ālokamānānāṁ mām eva prathamam ayaṁ prāpta ity abhimanyamānānāṁ tāsāṁ tātkālikīṁ ceṣṭām āha—**sañjāto manaso mahotsavaḥ** parirambha-spṛhā yāsāṁ tāḥ | ata eva **āsanāt** antaḥ-karaṇāc ca **uttasthuḥ** | tataś ca **vrīḍita-locanānanāḥ** apāṅgair eva vīkṣaṇāt vrīḍita-locanāḥ avanata-mukhatvāt vrīḍitānanāḥ | 

ayam arthaḥ—āsanaṁ parityajya prathamaṁ dehenaiva parirabdhum utthitāḥ, madhye lajjayā kṛtaṁ vighnam ālakṣya, lajjotpatti-sthānam antaḥ-karaṇaṁ ca tyaktvā kevalam ātmanaiva parirebhire iti kevalam utprekṣaiva | kāntam ālokya sahasaiva sparśautsukya-pūrṇa-premānanda-mūrcchitās tā babhūvur iti tattvam | mūrcchāyāṁ satyām eva suṣupti-pralayayor ivāntaḥ-karaṇa-vyavadhānābhāva-siddheḥ | **sākaṁ vratair** iti vratāni yājñavalkyenoktāni—


    krīḍāṁ śarīra-saṁskāraṁ samājotsava-darśanam | 


    hāsyaṁ para-gṛhe yānaṁ tyajet proṣita-bhartṛkā || iti | 

vrataiḥ sahitā eva uttasthur iti teṣāṁ vratānāṁ patiṁ darśayitum anucitānām api sahasā tyaktum aśakyatvāt taiḥ sākam evottasthuḥ | tataś ca tena dṛṣṭāḥ, tāsām asaṁskṛta-śārīra-paricchadatā sneha-vardhanāyaivābhūd iti ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **sarveṣu mandireṣu yugapat prāviśad iti bhāvenāha—**patnya** iti | tadā **sañjāto** **mano-mahotsavaḥ** parirambha-vāñchā yāsāṁ tāḥ | **ārād** dūrād eva sahasā tvarayā **āsanād** **āśayād** antaḥ-karanāc ca **uttasthuḥ**, tato'pāṅgair eva vīkṣaṇād **vrīḍita-locanāḥ,** avanata-mukhatvād **vrīḍitānanāś** ca | ādāv āsanaṁ vihāya tato lajjāyāṁ satyāṁ tat-sthānāṁ cittaṁ ca vihāyety arthaḥ | **vrataiḥ sākam** iti taiḥ sahitā eva uttasthuḥ, tāni coktāni yājñavalkyena—


    krīḍāṁ śarīra-saṁskāraṁ samājotsava-darśanam |


    hāsyaṁ para-gṛhe yānaṁ tyajet proṣita-bhartṛkā || iti | 

yadyapy āgate patyau teṣāṁ [vratānāṁ] darśanam anucitaṁ, tathāpi sahasā tyaktum aśakyatvāt tat-sahitānām utthānam | tataś ca tad-darśanena tāsu sneha-vṛddhir eva tasyābhūd iti bodhyam ||32||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.33 || **

**tam ātmajair dṛṣṭibhir antar ātmanā**

**duranta-bhāvāḥ parirebhire patim |**

**niruddham apy āsravad ambu netrayor**

**vilajjatīnāṁ bhṛgu-varya vaiklavāt ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **āyāntaṁ **taṁ** patiṁ darśanāt pūrvam **ātmanā** buddhyā **antar** hṛdaye **parirebhire,** tato **dṛṣṭibhiḥ,** tataḥ samīpam āgatam **ātmajaiḥ**[^98] putrair gṛhīta-kaṇṭham āliṅgayantya iva svayam āliṅgitavatya ity arthaḥ | atra hetuḥ—**duranta-bhāvā** gambhīrābhiprāyāḥ | tadā ca tāsāṁ **netrayor niruddham** apy **ambu** bāṣpaṁ **vaiklavād** vaivaśyād **āsravad** īṣat susrāva | ata eva dhairya-hānyā **vilajjatīnām** | he **bhṛgu-varya** ! citraṁ śṛṇv iti ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : tam** iti taiḥ | tatra svayam āliṅgitavatā iveti yojyam | **duranta-bhāvā** udbhaṭa-bhāvā, ata eva **niruddham** **apy āsravat** | atra **ātmaja**-dvārāliṅganena kānta-bhāva ābhāsyate, tad-dvārā tat-sambhogāyogyatvāt | samādhānaṁ ca prīti-sāmānya-paripoṣāyaiva tathācaritam, na tu kānta-bhāva-poṣāya | tat-paripoṣas tu dṛṣṭy-ādi-dvāraiva | tasmān na doṣa iti ||33|| [prīti-sandarbha 187][^99]

**jīva-gosvāmī (locana-rocanī 2.4.126) : tam ātmajair** ity-ādau vilajjā **hetuḥ** | **duranta-bhāvo**’tra sambhogākhyo raso **gopyaḥ |** **gopanas** tv **aśru-nirodhena** pratyāyito dhṛty-ābhāsaḥ | tathāpy aśru-sravo gopana **ātmaja-**dvārā parirambhaṇena sambhoga-rasāvarakaḥ paty-ucita-maitrī-mātrātmakaḥ | tatra pāṭha-vyutkrameṇārtha-kramaś cāyaṁ—prathamaṁ **dṛṣṭibhiḥ**, tato’**ntar-ātmanā**, tata **ātmajaiḥ parirebhire** iti ||33|| 

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **lajjayā kṛta-vighnānām api tāsāṁ tat-parirambhe prakāram āha—**tam** iti | **ātmajair** manobhavais tad-darśanoddīpitaiḥ kāmair hetubhir ity arthaḥ | makaradhvaja ātma-bhūr ity amaraḥ | **dṛṣṭibhiḥ parirebhire** iti prathamaṁ cakṣuṣaḥ sambhoga uktaḥ | tato dṛṣṭibhir eva netra-randhrair eva **antaḥ** praveśya **ātmanā** antar dehenāpi yato **duranta-bhāvā** durjñeyābhiprāyāḥ | ata eva vakṣyate cāyam eva prakāro bhāvavatīnām | 


    taṁ kācin netra-randhreṇa hṛdi kṛtvā nimīlya ca | 


    pulakāṅgy upaguhyāste yogīvānanda-samplutā || [bhā.pu. 10.32.8] iti |

tad api sūkṣma-dhiyā preyasā svābhiprāya-jñātam ālakṣya **vilajjamānānāṁ** tāsāṁ **netrayor ambu niruddham** **api vaiklavāt** vaivaśyāt **ā** īṣat **asravat** susrāva | he **bhṛgu-varya** ! ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tyaktāśayatvān mūrchitās tato labdhāśayāḥ patiṁ parirebhire ity āha—tam iti | **ātmajair** manobhavaiḥ **patir** darśanoddīpitaiḥ kāmair hetubhir ity arthaḥ | makaradhvaja ātma-bhūr ity** **amaraḥ** | **tato **dṛṣṭibhis** tato’**ntarātmanā** manasā ceti cākṣuṣo mānasaś ca sambhogaḥ | **duranta-bhāvā** durbodhābhiprāyāḥ, tam abhiprāyaṁ patyā lakṣitaṁ vijñāya **lajjamānānāṁ** tāsāṁ **netrayor ambu niruddham api** **vaiklavād** vaivaśyād **āsravat** īṣat susrāva, he **bhrgu-varya** ! ||33||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.34 || **

**yadyapy asau pārśva-gato raho-gatas**

**tathāpi tasyāṅghri-yugaṁ navaṁ navam |**

**pade pade kā virameta tat-padāc**

**calāpi yac chrīr na jahāti karhicit ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : pārśva-gataḥ** samīpa-sthaḥ, tatrāpi **raho-gata** ekānte pravartate sma | **pade pade **pratikṣaṇaṁ navaṁ navam eva | atra kaimutya-nyāyaḥ | **kā virameta **? iti | **calā** cañcala-svabhāvāpi ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **cira-virahānantaram etādṛśānurāgodaya-yogyatāyāṁ tāsām evāvasthāntaraṁ kaimutyena dṛṣṭāntayati—**yadi** iti | **asau** śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ | tāsāṁ śrī-paṭṭa-mahiṣīṇām | **navaṁ navam** iti[^100], tac ca tāsāṁ svābhāvikānurāgavatīnāṁ nāścaryam | yataḥ **kā** vā anyāpi **tat-padād virameta**, tat-padāsvādena tṛptā bhavet ? tatra kaimutyenodāharaṇaṁ **calāpi** iti | jagati cañcala-svabhāvatvena dṛṣṭyāpi[^101] |_|_34|| [prīti-sandarbhaḥ 90]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : pade pade** kṣaṇe kṣaṇe tāsāṁ **nava-navam** eva bhavati | tatra kaimutyaṁ **kā virameta **iti | **calā** cañcala-svabhāvā **śrīḥ** sampatti-rūpeti nitya-nūtanatvaṁ tasyoktam ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu bahu-kṛtvo'nubhūte nedṛśī tṛṣṇeti cet nitya-nūtanatvāt sety āha—**yadyapi** iti | **pade pade** kṣaṇe kṣaṇe, **tasyāṅghri-yugaṁ** tāsāṁ **navaṁ navaṁ** bhavati | atra kaimutyaṁ—**kā virameta** iti | **śrīḥ** sampad-rupā ||34||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.35 || **

**evaṁ nṛpāṇāṁ kṣiti-bhāra-janmanām**

**akṣauhiṇībhiḥ parivṛtta-tejasām |**

**vidhāya vairaṁ śvasano yathānalaṁ**

**mitho vadhenoparato nirāyudhaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **uktaṁ śrī-kṛṣṇa-caritaṁ saṅkṣipyāha—evam iti dvābhyām | **kṣiter bhārāyajanma** yeṣām  | **akṣauhiṇībhiḥ** kṛtvā **parivṛtaṁ** sarvataḥ prasṛtaṁ **tejaḥ** prabhāvo yeṣām  | **śvasano** vāyur veṇūnām anyonya-saṅgharṣeṇ**ānalaṁ vidhāyamitho** dāhena **yatho**paśāmyati, tadvat ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **atha tathāgatasya tasya tādṛśa-gārhasthya-līlā-sukhotkarṣa-darśanārthaṁ niścintatā-pūrvakaṁ tābhī ramaṇam evāha—evam iti dvābhyām ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tābhiḥ saha ramaṇaṁ niṣpratyūhaṁ vaktuṁ tasya kāryāntara-vyagratvābhāvam āha—evam iti | **akṣauhiṇībhiḥ** saha parivṛttaṁ vistīrṇaṁ tejo yeṣāṁ **śvasano** vāyur veṇūnām anyonya-saṅgharṣeṇa **analaṁvidhāyamitho** dāhena yathopaśāmyati tadvat ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tābhiḥ sārddhvaṁ nirvighnatayā ramaṇaṁ vaktuṁ tasya kāryāntarābhāvam āha—evam iti akṣauhiṇībhiḥ karaṇaiḥ parivṛtaṁ sarvatra prasṛtaṁ tejo yeṣāṁ teṣāṁ nṛpānāṁ vairaṁ vidhāya mitho vadhena prahāreṇa tān hatvā nirāyudhaḥ sann uparataḥ | śvasano vāyur yathā veṇūnāṁ paraspara-saṅgharṣeṇānalamutpādya tena tān sandahya upaśāmyati tadvat ||35||

 **...**

|| 1.11.36 || 

**sa eṣa nara-loke’sminn avatīrṇaḥ sva-māyayā |**

**reme strī-ratna-kūṭastho bhagavān prākṛto yathā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : strī-ratna-kūṭa-stha** uttama-strī-kadamba-sthaḥ ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **ya evam uparataḥ, sa eva rema iti yojyam | **sveṣu** nija-janeṣu yā **māyā** kṛpā tat-sukha-cikīrṣā-maya-premā, tayā **loke’vatīrṇa** iti tasyā eva sarvāvatāra-prayojana-nimittatvāt **strī-ratna-kūṭastho**’pi tādṛśa-ramaṇa-vaśa[^102]-kāri-prema-viśeṣa-rūpayā tayaiva **reme**, na tu prasiddha-kāmenety arthaḥ | atra ratna-padena tāsām api tad-yogyatvaṁ bodhayitvā tādṛśa-prema-viśeṣa-mayatvaṁ bodhitam | evaṁ bhāva-vailakṣaṇye’pi kriyayā sāmyam ity āha—**prākṛto yathā** iti | atra śrī-bhagavato’py aprākṛtatvaṁ darśayitvā tadvat kāma-viṣayatvaṁ nirākṛtam ||36|| [prīti-sandarbha 135]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : sva-māyayā** yoga-māyayaiva **strī-ratna**-samūhe prakāśa-bāhulyena pratyekam eva **tiṣṭhati** iti saḥ | **prākṛto yathā** ity anena tasya tathā ramaṇa-kāraṇasya kāmasya ramaṇasya cāprākṛtatvān nirguṇatvam uktam ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : sva-māyayā** svātma-bhūtayā parākhya-śaktyā **strī-ratnānāṁ kūṭe** samūhe yugapad **avasthito reme** | **prākṛto yathā** ity anena tad-rater aprākṛtatvaṁ, tasya tad-āsaktatvam | ratnety anena tāsāṁ ca parāvatāra-ramātvaṁ sūcitam ||36||

 **...**

|| 1.11.37 || 

**uddāma-bhāva-piśunāmala-valgu-hāsa-**

**vrīḍāvaloka-nihato madano’pi yāsām |**

**sammuhya cāpam ajahāt pramadottamās tā**

**yasyendriyaṁ vimathituṁ kuhakair na śekuḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nanu evaṁ strī-saṅgādibhiḥ saṁsāra-pratīteḥ kathaṁ bhagavān avatīrṇaḥ ity ucyate ? tatrāha—uddāmeti dvābhyām | yāsām **uddāmo** gambhīro yo **bhāvo**’bhiprāyaḥ, tasya **piśunaḥ** sūcako’**malo valguḥ **sundaro **hāso** **vrīḍāvalokaś** ca, tābhyāṁ **nihataḥ** **amadanaḥ** śrī-mahādevo’pi **saṁmuhya** lajjayā **cāpaṁ** pinākam **ajahāt** | evaṁ-prabhāvā yāh striya ity etāvad vivakṣitam | 

yad vā, bhagavato mohinī-rūpeṇa maheśo’pi mohitaḥ, evam etāś ca tādṛg-vilāsā eveti tathoktam | tāḥ **kuhakaiḥ** kapaṭair vibhramair **yasyendriyaṁ** mano **vimathituṁ** kṣobhayituṁ **na śekur** na śaktāḥ | 

athavā, **nihatas** tāḍito **madano’pi** jagad-vijayī **samṁuhya** tat-tat-kartavyatā-mūḍhaḥ saṁś **cāpaṁ** dhanur lajjayā **ajahāj** jahau | tāś ca pramadottamāḥ kāma-vijayinyo’pīty ādi pūrvavat ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **punar api tad eva sthāpayati[^103]—uddāmeti | **madanaś** ca prākṛtaḥ kāmaḥ | **udbhaṭa-bhāva**-sūcaka-nirmala-manoharābhyāṁ **hāsa-vrīḍāvalokanābhyāṁ** **nihatas** tan-mahima-darśanena svayam evoktārthīkṛta-svāstrādi-balo’bhūt | ata eva **saṁmuhya cāpam ajahāt** | 


    bhrū-pallavaṁ dhanur apāṅga-taraṅgitāni 


    bāṇā guṇāḥ śravaṇa-pālir iti smareṇa | 


    tasyām anaṅga-jaya-jaṅgama-devatāyām


        astrāṇi nirjita-jaganti kim arpitāṇi || [gīta-govinda 3.13][^104] ity-ādivat | 

tatra nijāstra-prayogaṁ na kuruta evety arthaḥ | tathābhūtā api **pramadottamāḥ** pramadena prakṛṣṭa-premānanda-viśeṣeṇa paramotkṛṣṭās tāḥ sva-vṛnda eva yāḥ svato’py utkṛṣṭa-premavatyas tāsāṁ sāmyecchayā **kuhakais** tādṛśa-premābhāvena kapaṭāṁśa-prayuktaiḥ sadbhiḥ kaṭākṣādibhir **yasyendriyaṁ vimathituṁ** tadvad viśeṣeṇa **mathituṁ** **na śekuḥ**, kintu sva-premānurūpam eva śekur iti | tasmāt prema-mātrotthāyi-vikāratvāt[^105] tasya kāmuka-vailakṣaṇyam iti bhāvaḥ ||37|| [prīti-sandarbha 136]	

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanv indriyair viṣayān bhuñjānasya tasya katham aprākṛtatvam ? tatrāha—yāsām **uddāmaḥ** gambhīro yo **bhāvaḥ** premā, tasya **piśunaḥ** sūcako’**malo valguḥ** sundaro **hāso** **vrīḍā**-sahito’**valokaś** ca, tābhyāṁ kṛṣṇa-viṣayakābhyāṁ svarūpa-bhūta-kandarpa-pīḍotthābhyāṁ **nihataḥ** | aho etā mac-charāghātaṁ vinaiva sa-spṛhaṁ kāntam ālokayanta iti vicārayann eva tad-atimādhuryāvalokottha-vismaya-vivaśī-kṛtaḥ san **madanaḥ** prākṛta-kandarpas tan-mohanārtham āgato’pi svayaṁ **saṁmuhya cāpam ajahāt** | tāsāṁ bhrū-cāpākṛṣṭānāṁ vrīḍāvaloka-śarāṇām agre kiṁ me cāpena sa-śareṇeti taṁ tatyāja | 

**tāḥ** **pramadottamā** api **yasyendriyaṁ mathituṁ** sva-vaśīkartuṁ **kuhakaiḥ** kapaṭa-prayuktair **valgu-hāsādibhir na śekuḥ**, kintu prema-prayuktaiḥ śekur iti tāsāṁ samañjasa-ratimattvāt prema-mayā kāma-mayā api kaṭākṣādayaḥ sambhavanti | tatrādyāḥ bhāva-piśuna-śabdenocyate, dvitīyāḥ kuhaka-śabdena | tatrādyair vaśīkṛtendriyatve’pi bhagavato’prākṛtatva-lakṣaṇaṁ nairguṇyam eva tasya prema-vaśyatvāt, premṇaś ca cic-chakti-vilāsa-viśeṣatvāt tan-mayānāṁ kaṭākṣādīnāṁ ca tad-utthitasya kāmasya ca tvat-kāraṇakasya ramaṇasya ca cin-mayatvād viṣaya-bhoga-śabdena vaktum aśakyatvān māyikānām eva śabda-sparśādīnāṁ viṣaya-śabdenābhidhānād iti | dvitīyaiḥ prema-rahitair vaśīkārāsambhavāt yasyendriyaṁ vimathituṁ kuhakair na śekur ity uktaṁ sarvathaiva tad-indriya-vimathanābhāve vyākhyāte, reme strī-ratna-kūṭa-stho bhagavān prākṛto yathā [bhā.pu. 1.11.36] ity anena vyañjitā ramaṇāsaktiś ca nopapadyate | 

kiṁ ca, atra kādācitkais tadīya-kāma-maya-kaṭākṣādibhir vaśīkārābhāve’pi teṣāṁ prākṛtatvaṁ na vācyam | paṭṭa-mahiṣīṇāṁ sarvāsāṁ cic-chaktitvāt tadīyeṣu kaṭākṣādiṣu prākṛtatva-praveśāśakteḥ | na ca svarūpa-bhūtatve’pi cic-chakti-sāmānyasyaiva vaśo bhagavān, kintu cic-chakti-viśeṣasya premṇa eveti siddhāntād iti sarvam anavadyam ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **idam eva sphuṭīr kartum āha—uddāmeti | **udbhaṭa-bhāva**-sūcakābhyāṁ nirmala-manoharābhyāṁ yāsāṁ **hāsa-vrīḍāvalokābhyāṁ nihatas** tan-mahima-vīkṣaṇena svayam eva vyarthīkṛtāstra-balo madano'bhūt, ata eva **saṁmuhya cāpam ajahāt**, tathā-bhūtā api **pramadottamāḥ** pramadena preyasī-jātīyena premṇotkṛṣṭās **tāḥ kuhakaiḥ** svotkṛṣṭa-tat-preyasī-tulyecchayā tādṛśa-prema-bhāvena kapaṭāṁśa-prayuktaiḥ sadbhiḥ kaṭākṣādibhir **yasya** kṛṣṇasya **indriyaṁ vimathituṁ** tad-vad-viśeṣeṇa mathituṁ **na śekuḥ**, sva-premānurūpaṁ tu śekur eva, yāsāṁ gṛhāt prākṛto yathā [bhā.pu. 1.11.35] iti tad-ramaṇāveśokteḥ ||37||

 **...**

|| 1.11.38 || 

**tam ayaṁ manyate loko hy asaṅgam api saṅginam |**

**ātmaupamyena manujaṁ vyāpṛṇvānaṁ yato’budhaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : taṁ** śrī-kṛṣṇam **ayaṁ** prākṛto **loka** **ātmaupamyena** sva-sādṛśyena **saṅginaṁ** **manujaṁ manyate** | atra hetuḥ—**vyāpṛṇvānaṁ** vyāpriyamāṇam | **yato**’yam **abudho**’tattva-jñaḥ ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tasmād etat tattvam avijñāyaiva—tam ayam iti | **ayaṁ** sādhāraṇo **loko**’**saktam** api prākṛta-guṇeṣv **anāsaktam** api | yata **ātmaupamyena manujaṁ vyāpṛṇvānaṁ** kāmādi-vyāpāra-yuktaṁ ca **manyate** | yathātmanaḥ prākṛta-manuṣyatvādi, tathaiva **manyata** ity arthaḥ | ata eva **abudhaḥ** evāsau **loka** iti _|_||37|| [prīti-sandarbha 137]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **evaṁ vastuto viṣaya-saṅga-rahitam api tam anabhijño bahir-darśī loko viṣaya-saṅginam eva manyata ity āha—**tam ayam** iti | **ātmaupamyena** sva-sādṛśyena | tatra hetuḥ— **vyāpṛṇvāṇaṁ** vyāpriyamāṇaṁ satyabhāmāyām āsakter eva pārijātārtha-bahu-vyāpāra-darśanād ity arthaḥ | ato’**budhaḥ** sad-asad-vivecana-śūnyaḥ nīlamaṇiṁ kācam iva premāṇam eva viṣayāsaktiṁ niścinotīty arthaḥ ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : taṁ** viśuddha-prema-saṅginaṁ kuhakāṁśāsaṅgaṁ kṛṣṇamayaṁ tat-svarūpa-guṇānabhijñaḥ sādhāraṇo **lokaḥ** **saṅginaṁ** viṣayiṇaṁ **manyate**, **ātmaupamyena** sva-taulyena **manujaṁ** ca | tatra hetuḥ—**vyāpṛṇvānaṁ** bhāmārtha-pārijātārtha-bahu-vyāpāra-śālitvād ity arthaḥ | ato'**budhaḥ** vastu-svarupānabhijñaḥ viśuddhasya premṇo viṣayāveśatvena grahaṇāt mahendra-maṇer iva kācatveneti bhāvaḥ ||38||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.39 || **

**etad īśanam īśasya prakṛti-stho’pi tad-guṇaiḥ |**

**na yujyate sadātma-sthair yathā buddhis tad-āśrayā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kutaḥ ? ity apekṣāyām aiśvarya-lakṣaṇam āha—etad iti | **īśasya īśanam** aiśvaryaṁ nāma **etad **eva | kiṁ tat ? **prakṛti-stho**’pi tasyā **guṇaiḥ** sukha-duḥkhādibhiḥ **sadā** **na yujyata** iti yat | yathā **ātma-sthair** ānandādibhir **ātmāśrayā** api **buddhir** na yujyate, tadvat | vaidharmye dṛṣṭānto vā—**ātma-sthaiḥ** sattā-prakāśādibhir **yathā buddhir yujyata** ity evaṁ vā | asad ātmā dehaḥ, tatra-sthair guṇaiḥ, **tad-āśrayā abuddhiḥ**, tad-upādhir jīvo yathā yujyate | evaṁ prakṛti-stho’pi tad-guṇair na yujyata iti yad etad īśanam īśasyeti ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————
