**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **prākṛta-guṇeṣv asaktatve hetuḥ—**etad** iti | avatārādau prakṛti-guṇa-maye prapañce tiṣṭhann api **sadā** eva **tad-guṇair na yujyata** iti yad, **etad īśasya īśanam** aiśvaryam | tatra vyatireke dṛṣṭāntaḥ—yatheti | **tad-āśrayā** prakṛtyāśrayā **buddhir** jīva-jñānaṁ yathā **yujyate**, tathā **na** iti | anvaye vā **tad-āśrayā** śrī-bhagavad-āśrayā parama-bhāgavatānāṁ buddhir yathā prakṛti-sthā kathañcit tatra patitāpi na yujyate, tadvat | evam evoktaṁ śrīmad-uddhavena tṛtīye—


    bhagavān api viśvātmā loka-veda-pathānugaḥ |


    kāmān siṣeve dvārvatyām asaktaḥ sāṅkhyam āsthitaḥ || [bhā.pu. 3.3.19] iti 

||39|| [prīti-sandarbha 138]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu bhavatu nāma tāsāṁ cic-chaktitvāt tad-ramaṇāder nirguṇatvam | tad api prākṛta-prapañca-madhye prākṛte eva yadu-vaṁśe avatīrṇasya prākṛtānām eva jarāsandhādīnām asurāṇāṁ rūpa-śabdādīn viṣayān sva-cakṣuḥ-śrotrādīndriyair ādadānasya guṇa-saṅgaḥ khalu durvāra eva ity ata āha—etad iti | **īśasya īśanam** aiśvaryaṁ nāmaitad iti yat **prakṛtau sthito’pi** tasyā **guṇaiḥ na yujyate** | guṇaiḥ kīdṛśaiḥ ? **ātmasthaiḥ** | 

ayam arthaḥ—svayaṁ guṇeṣu tiṣṭhati, guṇā api tasmiṁs tiṣṭhanti | tad api tasya guṇair asamparka iti vastuto bhagavata eva sarva-prapañcasyādhiṣṭhānatve cādhiṣṭhātṛtve cāpi nirguṇatvam evoktam | sākṣī cetā kevalo nirguṇaś ca [śve.u. 6.11] iti, sattvādayo na santīśe yatra ca prākṛtā guṇāḥ [vi.pu. 1.9.44], harir hi nirguṇaḥ sākṣāt puruṣaḥ prakṛteḥ paraḥ [bhā.pu. 10.88.5] ity-ādi-śruti-smṛtibhiḥ | **yathā tad-āśrayaḥ** sa evāśrayo viṣayo yasyāḥ, sā tat-smaraṇavatī parama-bhāgavatānāṁ **buddhiḥ** **prakṛti-sthāpi** santuṣṭi-stuti-nindādiṣu tṛpti-kṣut-pipāsā-pīḍādiṣu jāgara-svapna-suṣuptiṣu sattvādi-guṇeṣu sthitāpi teṣv audāsīnyāt **na tair yujyate** iti | tathaiva prākṛtān viṣayān ādadānasyāpi tasya teṣv āsakti-śūnyatvāt na tair yogaḥ ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu kuhakāṁśāsaṅgitvaṁ na sambhavet, prākṛte'smin loke sthitasya tat-saṅgāpatter iti cet, tatrāha—**etad** iti | **prakṛti**-vikāre jagaty antaryāmitvena **sthito'pi** **tad-guṇair na yujyate** iti yataḥ, ata eva **īśasyeśanam** aiśvaryam | kīdṛśaiḥ ? ity āha—**asad-ātma-sthair** vimukha-jīvādhikāribhir ity arthaḥ | tatra dṛṣṭāntaṁ kaimūtyāpādakam āha—**tad-āśrayā** bhagavad-viṣayā yathā bhāgavatānāṁ **buddhir** iti ||39||

 **...**

**|| 1.11.40 || **

**taṁ menire’balā mūḍhāḥ straiṇaṁ cānuvrataṁ rahaḥ |**

**apramāṇa-vido bhartur īśvaraṁ matayo yathā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tat-patnyo’pi tasya tattvaṁ na jānantīty āha—**taṁ** **straiṇam** ātma-vaśyaṁ **raha** ekānto’**nuvratam **anusṛtaṁ ca** menire** | **bhartur** **apramāṇa-vidaḥ **pramāṇam iyattāṁ mahimānam ajānantya ity arthaḥ | **īśvaraṁ** kṣetrajñaṁ **matayo**’haṁ-vṛttayo yathā svādhīnaṁ sva-dharma-yoginaṁ **manyante,** tadvat | yad vā, yathā yathā tāsāṁ **matayaḥ** kalpanāḥ, tathā tathā **tam īśvaraṁ** straiṇādi-rūpaṁ **menira** ity arthaḥ ||40||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **nanu tādṛśam aiśvaryaṁ tasya tāḥ kiṁ jānanti ? yadi jānanti, tadā raho-līlāyāṁ truṭyaty eva tādṛśa-premety āśaṅkyāha—tam iti | **īśvaram** api **taṁ** **raha** ekānta-līlāyāṁ **mauḍhyāt** tādṛśa-prema-mohād **bhartur** **apramāṇa-vidas** tādṛśaiśvarya-jñāna-rahitāḥ **straiṇam** ātma-vaśyam **anuvratam** anusṛtaṁ ca **menire** | tac ca nāyuktam ity āha—**yathā** tāsāṁ **matayaḥ** prema-vāsanāḥ, tathaiva sa iti | ye yathā māṁ [gītā 4.11] ity-ādeḥ, svecchāmayasya [bhā.pu. 10.14.2] ity-ādeś ca prāmāṇyād iti bhāvaḥ ||40|| [prīti-sandarbha 139]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu tarhi yāsu tasya sadaivāsaktiḥ, tāḥ paṭṭa-mahiṣya evābhijñāḥ, tasya tattvaṁ sāmastyena jānanti ? maivam | rasa-puṣṭi-siddhy-arthaṁ tāsāṁ svarūpa-bhūtānām api yoga-māyayā bhagavataiva sva-sampūrṇa-jñānāvaraṇāt tā api taṁ na jānantīty āha—**tam** iti | **taṁ** sva-bhartāraṁ **raho’nuvrataṁ** sva-prema-vaśyam api **straiṇaṁ** strī-mātra-bhāva-vaśyaṁ **menire** | yato **mūḍhā** bhagavataivādi-rasa-puṣṭy-arthaṁ mūḍhīkṛtāḥ | ataḥ samudre viharanto’pi yathā samudrasyeyattāṁ na jānanti, tathā bhartuḥ pramāṇaṁ na vidanti | **matayaḥ** śāstra-kṛtāṁ buddhi-vṛttayaḥ īśvara-nirūpaṇe pravṛttāḥ jagad-upādānatvam īśvaratvaṁ jagan-niyantṛtvaṁ tathā jagan-nimittatvam īśvaratvam iti mata-vaividhyaṭ kiñcit kiñcij jānantyo’pi vastuto mūḍhā eveti | yāś ca samparyacaran premṇā [bhā.pu. 10.90.27][^106] ity-ādy-uktes tāsāṁ premavattvād bhagavataś ca prema-vaśyatvāt tāsāṁ prākṛtatvaṁ na vyākhyeyam ||40||

iti sārārtha-darśinyāṁ harṣiṇyāṁ bhakta-cetasām |

ekādaśo’pi prathame saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām ||*||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tam ayaṁ manyate lokaḥ [37] iti sādhāraṇānāṁ puṁsāṁ tatra yathā bhāvas tathā sādhāraṇīnāṁ strīṇām āha—taṁ menire iti | **mūḍhās** tat-svarūpa-jñāna-hīnāḥ **abalās** **taṁ straiṇaṁ** strī-vaśyam ato **raho** vijane'**nuvratam** anugataṁ **menire** | **bhartur** jagat-svāminas tasya **apramāṇa-vidaḥ** tad-aiśvaryeyattāṁ na jānantīti | yathā samudre sthitā mīnās tasyeyattāṁ, yathā vaiśeṣikādīnāṁ matayo'parimita-guṇam īśvaraṁ parimita-guṇaṁ manyante, tadvat ||40||

iti śrī-vaiṣṇavānandinyāṁ  prathama-skandha-ṭippanyām ekādaśamo'dhyāyaḥ ||11||

**...**

iti śrīmad-bhāgavate mahā-purāṇe brahma-sūtra-bhāṣye pāramahaṁsyaṁ saṁhitāyāṁ vaiyāsikyāṁ prathama-skandhe

śrī-kṛṣṇa-dvārakā-gamanaṁ nāma

ekādaśo’dhyāyaḥ |

||1.11||



**...**

 

(1.12)


## dvādaśo’dhyāyaḥ


### parīkṣito janmotsavaḥ | 

|| 1.12.1 ||

**śaunaka uvāca—**

**aśvatthāmnopasṛṣṭena brahma-śīrṣṇoru-tejasā |**

**uttarāyā hato garbha īśenājīvitaḥ punaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :**

puroktaṁ yat-prasaṅgāya drauṇi-daṇḍādi vistarāt |

dvādaśe tu tad evātha parīkṣij-janma varṇyate ||


    parīkṣito’tha rājarṣer janma-karma-vilāyanam | 


    saṁsthāṁ ca pāṇḍu-putrāṇāṁ vakṣye kṛṣṇa-kathodayam || [1.7.12 ]

iti pratijñāya pāṇḍāvānāṁ rājya-sthitir upodghāta-rūpā sa-prasaṅgaṁ saptamādhyāyam ārabhya nirūpitā | idānīm aupodghātikam uktānuvāda-pūrvakaṁ pṛcchati—aśvatthāmneti | **upasṛṣṭena** visṛṣṭena | tasya janmādi brūhīty uttareṇānvayaḥ ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :**

kṛtvā janmotsavaṁ rājā pautrasya śrī-parīkṣitaḥ |

dvādaśe bhāvi tad-vṛttaṁ viprair uktam upāśṛṇot ||

naiva śruta-caro bhakto rājā vā tāvad īdṛśaḥ |

kṛṣṇaṁ dadarśa yo garbhe yaś ca kālam adaṇḍayat ||

parīkṣito janma vakṣye [1.7.12 ] iti pratijñāya drauṇy-astra-kṣepa-garbha-rakṣā-kuntī-stava-bhīṣma-niryāṇa-bhagavad-yātrā-dvārakā-praveśa-paṭṭamahiṣī-ramaṇādi-kathā-mādhuryeṣu tat-prasaṅgotthiteṣu majjantaṁ sūtaṁ tad eva parīkṣij-janma śuśrūṣuḥ śaunakaḥ punar viśeṣataḥ pṛcchati—aśvatthāmneti | upasṛṣṭena nikṣiptena ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :**

dvādaśe nṛpatir janmotsavaṁ kṛtvā parīkṣitaḥ | \
bhāvi tac-caritaṁ viprair uktaṁ śrutvā jaharṣa ha || \


parīkṣito janma vakṣye [bhā.pu. 1.7.12] iti pratijñāya tat-prasaṅgokhiteṣu drauṇyas travikṣepa-garbha-saṁrakṣaṇa-kuntī-stotra-bhīṣma-niryāṇotsava-bhagavadyātrā-dvārvatī-praveśa-paṭṭamahiṣī-ramaṇeṣu nimagna-cittaṁ sūtaṁ tad eva parīkṣij-janma viśeṣataḥ śrotuṁ śaunakaḥ pṛcchati—upasṛṣṭena kṣiptena ||1||

 **...**

|| 1.12.2 ||

**tasya janma mahā-buddheḥ karmāṇi ca mahātmanaḥ |**

**nidhanaṁ ca yathaivāsīt sa pretya gatavān yathā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : sa** parīkṣit | **pretya** dehaṁ tyaktvā ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : pretya** dehaṁ vihāya ||2||

 **...**

	

|| 1.12.3 ||

**tad idaṁ śrotum icchāmo gadituṁ yadi manyase |**

**brūhi naḥ śraddadhānānāṁ yasya jñānam adāc chukaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **prārthaye na tv ājñāpayāmīty āha | "**gadituṁ yadi manyase,** tarhi **brūhi"** iti | **yasya jñānam adāc chuka** iti śravaṇecchāyāṁ kāraṇam ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : yadi manyase** iti kṛpayā kathayety arthaḥ ||3||

 **...**

|| 1.12.4 ||

**sūta uvāca—**

**apīpalad dharma-rājaḥ pitṛvad rañjayan prajāḥ |**

**niḥspṛhaḥ sarva-kāmebhyaḥ kṛṣṇa-pādānusevayā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nispṛhasyāpi rājñaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇānugrahāt tādṛk pautraḥ samajanīti vaktuṁ tasya śrī-kṛṣṇe bhakty-udrekam āha—apīpalad iti tribhiḥ | pitṛvad **apīpalat** pālayām āsa ||4||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tādṛśa-pautra-prāptau rājñaḥ kṛṣṇānurāga eva kāraṇam ity abhyūhayaṁs tam evāha tribhiḥ | **apīpalat** pālayāmāsa ||4||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **apīpalat pālayāmāsa ||4-5||

 **...**

|| 1.12.5-6 ||

**sampadaḥ kratavo lokā mahiṣī bhrātaro mahī |**

**jambūdvīpādhipatyaṁ ca yaśaś ca tri-divaṁ gatam ||**

**kiṁ te kāmāḥ sura-spārhā mukunda-manaso dvijāḥ |**

**adhijahrur mudaṁ rājñaḥ kṣudhitasya yathetare ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kratavas tad-upārjitā lokāś ca ||5|| **sura-spārhāḥ **surāṇāṁ spṛhaṇīyās te **sampad**-ādayaḥ **kāmā** viṣayā **rājñaḥ kiṁ mudaṁ** prītim **adhijahruḥ** kṛtavantaḥ ? na kṛtavanta ity arthaḥ | atra hetuḥ—**mukunde** eva **mano** yasyeti | **kṣudhitasya** annaika-manaso **yathetare** srak-candanādayo na kurvanti, tadvat ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **sampad-ādayas tathā **surāṇāṁ** spṛhaiva **spārhaḥ** svārthe’ṇ, sa yeṣu te sūra- spārhāḥ **kāmāḥ** bhogāḥ **rājñaḥ kiṁ mudam adhijahrur** naiva kṛtavanta ity arthaḥ | tatra hetur **mukunda-manasa** iti | **itare** srak-candanādayaḥ ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : surāṇāṁ spārhaḥ** spṛhā teṣu te | spṛhaiva svārthe'ṇi spārhaḥ, kāmā md amubhogāḥ, kiṁ rājño adhijahruḥ janayāmāsur nety arthaḥ, yato **mukunda-manasaḥ** |** itare** srak-candanādayaḥ | mukunda-sevopayoginī tasya rājya-sampat, bhuktavatas tṛpty-upayoginīva srag iti bhāvaḥ ||6||

 **...**

|| 1.12.7 ||

**mātur garbha-gato vīraḥ sa tadā bhṛgu-nandana |**

**dadarśa puruṣaṁ kañcid dahyamāno’stra-tejasā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **prastutam āha—mātur iti ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **prastutam āha—**mātur garbha-gato’pi vīra** iti svābhāvika-vīratvenaivāstra-tejasas tasmād abibhyad ity arthaḥ | **dadarś**eti tan-mano-nayanābhyāṁ bhagavad-rūpe eva sva-viṣaya-grahaṇārambhaḥ prathamataḥ kṛta iti bhāvaḥ ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **prastutam āha—mātur iti | vīra iti svābhāvikena vīratvena tad-astrād abibhyad iti bhāvaḥ | dadarśa puruṣaṁ kañcid iti garbhastha eva vāmadevavat kṛṣṇa-nikhāta-mano-netro'bhūd iti bhāvaḥ ||7||

 **...**

|| 1.12.8 ||

**aṅguṣṭha-mātram amalaṁ sphurat-puraṭa-maulinam |**

**apīvya-darśanaṁ śyāmaṁ taḍid-vāsasam acyutam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : puraṭaṁ** suvarṇam | **sphuran puraṭa-maulir** yasyāsti tam | vrīhy-ādibhyaś ceti ini-pratyayaḥ | **apīcyam** atisundaraṁ dṛśyata iti **darśaṇaṁ** rūpaṁ yasyatam | **taḍidvad vāsasī **yasyeti **śyāmam** iti ca padābhyāṁ vidyud-yukta-meghopamā sūcitā | **acyutam** avikāram ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : aṅguṣṭha-mātram** iti | ātmanaḥ sarvato dikṣu garbhe tāvan-mātrasyaivāvakāśasya sthitatvāt tat-pramāṇam eva bhagavaty upacaritam | vastutas tu tāvaty api deśe’cintya-śaktyā yathāvat pramāṇam eva bhagavantaṁ dadarśa, na tv anyathā | garbhe dṛṣṭam anudhyāyan parīkṣeta nareṣv iha [1.12.30] ity upariṣṭād ukter nara-loke tat-parīkṣaṇānyathānupapatteḥ | ata eva **apīvyam** anyūnātiriktatvād atisundaraṁ dṛśyata iti **darśanaṁ** rūpaṁ yasya tvam | **puraṭa-maulinam** iti vrīhy-āditvād iniḥ | **śyaṁaṁ taḍid-vāsasam** iti padābhyāṁ vidyud-bhūṣita-megho brahmāstra-dāvānala-dahyamāna-parīkṣit-kalabha-trāṇāya sahasaivottarā-kukṣi-nabhasi prādurabhūd iti dyotitam ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **aṅguṣṭha-mātram iti—garbhaṁ paritastāvan-mātrasyaivāvakāśāt-tat-parimāṇam upacaritaṁ, vastutas tasyāvicintya-śaktyā yudhiṣṭhirādi-dṛṣṭasyaiva tatra prakāśaḥ, anyathā parīkṣeta nareṣviha [bhā.pu. 1.12.30] iti vakṣyamāṇa-parīkṣaṇānupapatteḥ | na hi nara-loke'ṅguṣṭha-mātraḥ kaścid asti | puraṭamaulinam iti brīhy-āditvādiniḥ, apīcyamati-manojñaṁ darśanaṁ rūpaṁ yasya, api-pūrvādañceḥ kvinnantād-bhavārthe yac-chāndasaḥ | bhave chandasīti sūtrāt, chandas tvam asya śāstrasya veda-bhāgatvād eva | dṛśyate iti darśanaṁ karmaṇi lyuṭ | śyāmaṁ vidyud-vāsasam iti vidyut-sundaro megha iva brahmāstra-dāvāgni-pīḍyamāna-parīkṣit-kalabhatrāṇāyottarodara-nabhasyāvirabhūd iti vyajate ||8||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.9 ||**

**śrīmad-dīrgha-catur bāhuṁ tapta-kāñcana-kuṇḍalam |**

**kṣatajākṣaṁ gadā-pāṇim ātmanaḥ sarvato diśam |**

**paribhramantam ulkābhāṁ bhrāmayantaṁ gadāṁ muhuḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : taptaṁ** dāhottīrṇaṁ yat **kañcanaṁ,** tan-maye **kuṇḍale** yasya | **kṣatajākṣaṁ** saṁrambhād atyārakta-netram | "aho mad-bhaktasyāpi garbhe’stra-pīḍā !" iti krodhād iti bhāvaḥ ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : kṣatajākṣaṁ** brahmāstraṁ prati krodhād atyārakta-netram ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kṣata-jākṣam iti brahmāstraṁ prati kopodayādaty aruṇa-netram ity arthaḥ | nīhāraṁ himaṁ gopatir āditya ivāstratejo vidhamantaṁ vināśayantaṁ paryaikṣateti para-ślokasthenānvayaḥ | ko'yaṁ vīrāsanastho niyukto'pi māṁ rakṣatīti vitarkitavānity arthaḥ ||9-10||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.10 ||**

**astra-tejaḥ sva-gadayā nīhāram iva gopatiḥ |**

**vidhamantaṁ sannikarṣe paryaikṣata ka ity asau ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : astra-tejovidhamantaṁ** vināśayantam | **nīhāraṁ** himaṁ **gopatiḥ** sūrya iva | [evaṁ-vidhaṁ garbha-gato bālaḥ] **sannikarṣe** samīpe dadarśa | dṛṣṭvā cāsau **ka iti paryaikṣata** vitarkitavān ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : "**nīhāraṁ vidhayan sūrya ivāsau kaḥ ?" iti paryaikṣata ity anvayaḥ, vibhakti-vipariṇāmāt ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : nīhāraṁ** himaṁ **gopatiḥ** sūrya **iva** sūryo yathā vidhamati, tathā **astra-tejovidhamantaṁ** vināśayantaṁ **paryaikṣata—"ko’sau** vīrāsanena mām ayukto’pi rakṣati ?" iti vitarkitavān ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : _na vyākhyātam._**

 **...**

**|| 1.12.11 ||**

**vidhūya tad ameyātmā bhagavān dharma-gub vibhuḥ |**

**miṣato daśa-māsasya**[^107]** tatraivāntardadhe hariḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : ameyātmā** kathaṁ **tad vidhūtavān** ity avitarkya-rūpaḥ | dharmaṁ gopāyatīti **dharma-gup** | yad vā, dharmaṁ gopāyantīti dharma-gupo rājānas tat-prabhuḥ, teṣām  api pālakatvāt | **daśamāsa**-paricchedyasya tasya **miṣataḥ** paśyato yatra dṛṣṭas **tatraivāntarhito,** na tv anyatra gataḥ | yato **vibhuḥ** sarva-gataḥ ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **dharmaṁ bhakta-vātsalya-rūpaṁ sva-dharmaṁ gopāyati **dharma-gupdaśamāsyasya** daśamāsa-paricchedyasya tasya **miṣataḥ** paśyataḥ | yatra dṛṣṭaḥ **tatraivāntardadhe,** na tv anyatra gataḥ, yato **vibhuḥ** | harir iti tasya mano’pahṛtya tasminn avadadhāne saty antardadhe | caurasya lakṣaṇam idam eva yad dhanavaty avadadhāne’ntardhatte iti kūṭa-yāmikavat tan-mano hartum eva tatra praviṣṭa āsīd ity utprekṣā ca dyotitā ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : dharma-gup** sva-bhakta-vātsalya-dharma-pālakaḥ, **daśa māsāḥ** paricchedakā yasya, tasya **miṣataḥ** paśyataḥ, **tatraivāntardadhe** na tv anyatra, yato **vibhuḥ**, **haris **tac-cittāpahartā ||11||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.12 ||**

**tataḥ sarva-guṇodarke sānukūla-grahodaye |**

**jajñe vaṁśa-dharaḥ pāṇḍor bhūyaḥ pāṇḍur ivaujasā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **udarkam uttara-phalam | sarva-guṇānām uttarottarādhikya-sūcake lagne | tatra hetuḥ—**anukūlair** anyair **grahaiḥsahitānāṁ** śubha-grahāṇām **udayo** yasmin ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : sarva-guṇā** eva **udarkaḥ** uttara-kāla-bhavaṁ phalaṁ yatra tasmin | **anukūlair grahaiḥ saha** vartamāne **udaye** lagne ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :** sarva-guṇānām udarke uttara-kāla-bhavaṁ phalaṁ yatra tasmin | anukulair grahaiḥ sahite udaye lagne ||12||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.13 ||**

**tasya prīta-manā rājā viprair dhaumya-kṛpādibhiḥ |**

**jātakaṁ kārayām āsa vācayitvā ca maṅgalam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : jātakaṁ** jāta-karma | **maṅgalaṁ** puṇyāham ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :** jātakaṁ jāta-karma ||13||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.14 ||**

**hiraṇyaṁ gāṁ mahīṁ grāmān hasty-aśvān nṛpatir varān |**

**prādāt svannaṁ ca viprebhyaḥ prajā-tīrthe sa tīrthavit ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : varān** śreṣṭhān | **svannaṁ** śobhanam annaṁ ca | **tīrthavid** dāna-kāla-jñaḥ |


    yāvan na cchidyate nālaṁ tāvan nāpnoti sūtakam | \
chinne nāle tataḥ paścāt sūtakaṁ tu vidhīyate ||

iti vacanāt tataḥ pūrvaṁ **prādāt,** āmānnaṁ vā | **prajā-tīrthe** putrotpatti-puṇya-kāle,putre jāte vyatīpāte dattaṁ bhavati cākṣayam iti smṛteḥ | 


    devāś ca pitaraś caiva putre jāte dvi-janmanām | 


        āyanti hi nṛpa-śreṣṭha puṇyāham iti cābruvann|| iti ca ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : prajā-tīrthe** putrotpatti-puṇya-kāle, putre jāte vyatīpāte dattaṁ bhavati cākṣayam iti smṛteḥ ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : prajā-tīrthe** putra-janma-puṇya-kāle, putre jāte vyatīpāte datte bhavati cākṣayam iti smaraṇāt | tīrthavit—


        yāvan na chidyate nālaṁ tāvan-nāpnoti sūtakam | 


        chinne nāle tataḥ paścāt sūtakaṁ tu vidhīyate ||

iti-smṛty-ukta-dāna-kālajña ity arthaḥ ||14||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.15-17 ||**

**tam ūcur brāhmaṇās tuṣṭā rājānaṁ praśrayānvitam |**

**eṣa hy asmin prajā-tantau purūṇāṁ pauravarṣabha ||**

**daivenāpratighātena śukle saṁsthām upeyuṣi |**

**rāto vo’nugrahārthāya viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā ||**

**tasmān nāmnā viṣṇu-rāta iti loke bhaviṣyati |**

**na sandeho mahā-bhāga mahā-bhāgavato mahān ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** he pauravarṣabha ! kurūṇāṁ kuru-vaṁśyānāṁ śukle śuddhe’sminprajā-tantau | daivena kathaṁbhūtena ? apratighātena durvāreṇa | saṁsthāṁ nāśam upeyuṣi gate sati vā yuṣmākam anugrahārthāya yasmāt prabhavana-śīlena śrī-viṣṇunā rāto dattaḥ, tasmāl loke viṣṇu-rāta iti nāmnā bhaviṣyati mahābhāgavataś ca | gunaiś ca mahān bhaviṣyati nātra sandeha iti taṁ rājānaṁ brāhmaṇā ūcur iti trayāṇām anvayaḥ ||15-17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : purūṇāṁ** puru-vaṁśyānāṁ **prajā-tantausaṁsthāṁ** nāśam **upeyuṣi** prāpte sati | **śukle** śuddhe **rāto** dattaḥ | bālasya tādṛśa-yogyatāyām aśraddadhānaṁ rājānaṁ praty āha—**na sandeha** iti ||15-17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : purūṇāṁ** puru-vaṁśyānāṁ **prajā-tantau** kule daivena **saṁsthāṁ** vināśam **upeyuṣi** sati vo'nugrahārthāya **viṣṇunaiṣa rāto** datta ity uttareṇa sambandhaḥ ||15||

**śukle** viśuddhe ||16|| \
 \
viṣṇunā dattatvān-**nāmnā viṣṇurāto bhaviṣyati** | atra **sandehas **te mābhūd ity ūcuḥ ||17||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.18 ||**

**śrī-rājovāca—**

**apy eṣa vaṁśyān rājarṣīn puṇya-ślokān mahātmanaḥ |**

**anuvartitā svid yaśasā sādhu-vādena sattamāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **mahā-bhāgavato bhaviṣyatīty ukte hṛṣṭaḥ pṛcchati | **api svit** kiṁ svit | **sādhu-vādena yaśasā** satkīrtyā ca **anuvartitā** bhaviṣyatīti pūrvasyaivātaḥ param apy anuṣaṅgaḥ ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : apy eṣa vaṁśyān** ity atra “hṛṣṭa” iti ṭīkāyāṁ harṣeṇaiva punaḥ praśno’yam, na tv apūrtyeti bhāvaḥ | vastutas tu tathātve’pi rāja-śreṣṭhatā-jñānārthaṁ punaḥ praśnaḥ ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **mahā-bhāgavato bhaviṣyatīty ukte rājaiva sāntaś camatkāraṁ sa-gāmbhīryaṁ pṛcchati | **api svit** praśne | **anu** lakṣyīkṛtya **vartitā** | teṣāṁ sadṛśo bhaviṣyati na vety arthaḥ ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **mahā-bhāgavato bhaviṣyatīti niśamyātihṛṣṭaḥ pṛcchati—**api** sambhāvanāyāṁ, tān **anu** lakṣīkṛtya **vartitā**, tādṛśo bhaviṣyati na vā ? ity arthaḥ | **svit** praśne ||18||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.19 ||**

**brāhmaṇā ūcuḥ—**

**pārtha prajāvitā sākṣād ikṣvākur iva mānavaḥ |**

**brahmaṇyaḥ satya-sandhaś ca rāmo dāśarathir yathā ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **rāmo dāśarathir yathā adhika-dṛṣṭāntaḥ | 


        ūrṇanābhyādhiko viṣṇor viṣṇur viṣṇos tathaiva ca |


        viṣṇur jīvasya dṛṣṭānto ūna-sāmyādhika-kramāt || iti brāhme ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **he pārtha, **prajānām avitā** rakṣakaḥ | **mānavo** manoḥ putraḥ | **brāhmaṇyebhyo** hitaḥ | **satya**-pratijñaś ca śrī-**rāmo yathā** ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **teṣāṁ sadṛśo yaśaseti kiṁ pṛcchyate ? yair eva ekaikair guṇaiḥ, te sarve yaśasvinaḥ āsan, te sarve eva guṇā asmin bālake’dhunaiva santi, yathāvasaram āvirbhaviṣyanti | tasmād etat-tulyās te na babhūvur iti pratīyatām ity āśayenāhuḥ—pārtheti | **prajānām avitā** rakṣakaḥ | **satya-sandhaḥ** satya-pratijñaḥ ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : pārtha**! he yudhiṣṭhira! **prajānāmavitā** pālakaḥ, **sākṣād** iti senāṁ vinaivety arthaḥ | **mānavo** manu-putraḥ | **satya-sandhaḥ** satya-pratijñaḥ ||19||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.20 ||**

**eṣa dātā śaraṇyaś ca yathā hy auśīnaraḥ śibiḥ |**

**yaśo vitanitā svānāṁ dauṣyantir iva yajvanām ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : uśīnara**-deśādhipatiḥ **śibiḥ** | yena sva-māṁsaṁ śyenāya dattvā śaraṇāgataḥ kapoto rakṣitaḥ | **svānāṁ** jñātīnāṁ **yajvanāṁ** ca **yaśo-vistārako dauṣyantir** bharata iva ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : uśīnara**-deśādhipatiḥ **śibiḥ,** yena sva-māṁsaṁ śyenāya dattvā śaraṇāgataḥ kapoto rakṣitaḥ | **duṣyanta**-putro bharataḥ ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **uśīnara-deśādhipatiḥ **auśīnaraḥ śibiḥ** yaḥ sva-māṁsaṁ śyenāya dattvā śaraṇāgataṁ kapotaṁ rakṣitavān | **svānāṁ** jñātīnāṁ **yajvanāṁ** viprāṇāṁ ca **yaśo vitanitā** | **dauṣyantir **bharataḥ ||20||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.21 ||**

**dhanvinām agraṇīr eṣa tulyaś cārjunayor dvayoḥ |**

**hutāśa iva durdharṣaḥ samudra iva dustaraḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** arjunayoḥ pārtha-kārtavīryayoḥ ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :** dvayor arjunayoḥ pārtha-kārtavīryayoḥ ||21||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.22 ||**

**mṛgendra iva vikrānto niṣevyo himavān iva |**

**titikṣur vasudhevāsau sahiṣṇuḥ pitarāv iva ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** himavān iva satāṁ niṣevyo’nanya-gatikatvena | vasudheva titikṣuḥ kṣantā | prītyā mātā-pitarāv iva sahiṣṇuḥ ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **sarvaṁsahāpi **vasudhā** pareṣāṁ vāk-śara-jvālāṁ nānubhavati | ayaṁ tu tām anubhavann api na pratikariṣyatīti | atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ **pitarāv** iveti ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : mṛgendraḥ** siṁhaḥ | **himavān **iva munīnāṁ **niṣevyaḥ** | mātā ca pitā ca **pitarau** tāviva **sahiṣṇuḥ**, tau yathā putrāparādhaṁ sahete, tadvadyaḥ prajāparādham ity arthaḥ ||22||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.23 ||**

**pitāmaha-samaḥ sāmye prasāde giriśopamaḥ |**

**āśrayaḥ sarva-bhūtānāṁ yathā devo ramāśrayaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : pitāmaho** brahmā tena **samaḥ** | sāmye samatve | **ramāśrayo **hariḥ ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : pitāmaho** yudhiṣṭhiraḥ | **sāmye** sarvatra dveṣābhave | ramāśrayo nārāyaṇaḥ ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : pitāmaho** brahmā yudhiṣṭhiro vā | **sāmye** sarvatra dveṣābhāve | **ramāśrayo** nārāyaṇaḥ ||23||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.24 ||**

**sarva-sad-guṇa-māhātmye eṣa kṛṣṇam anuvrataḥ |**

**rantideva ivodāro yayātir iva dhārmikaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** sarvaiḥ sad-guṇair māhātmyaṁ yat tasmin | śrī-kṛṣṇa-tulyaḥ ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tathāpi sādhāraṇa-jana-camatkārārthaṁ pūrvavad anyad api kiñcid brūma ity āhuḥ—rantīti | kiṁ vā, bahubhir yathā svajñāna-muktatvāt pāṭha-kramo nātra vivakṣitaḥ | **audāryam** atra dātṛtvam, tena kāruṇyaṁ lakṣyate ||24|_|_

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **ekasyaivopameyasyāsya sarvair guṇair ekam evopamānīkurvann āha—**sarvaiḥ sadguṇair** yan **māhātmyaṁ,** tasmin **eṣa kṛṣṇam anuvrataḥ** śrī-kṛṣṇa-tulyaḥ ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : sarvaiḥ sad-guṇair **yan-**māhātmyaṁ** mahimā, tasminn **eṣa kṛṣṇam anuvrataḥ, **tan-mahimāṁśena govinda-sama ity arthaḥ ||24||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.25-26 ||**

**dhṛtyā bali-samaḥ kṛṣṇe prahrāda iva sad-grahaḥ |**

**āhartaiṣo’śvamedhānāṁ vṛddhānāṁ paryupāsakaḥ ||**

**rājarṣīṇāṁ janayitā śāstā cotpatha-gāminām |**

**nigrahītā kaler eṣa bhuvo dharmasya kāraṇāt ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : dhṛtyā** dhairyeṇa | **sad-grahaḥ** san bhadro rago’bhiniveśo yasya saḥ | **āhartā** kartā ||25|| **rājarṣīṇāṁ** janamejayādīnām ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : sad-grahaḥ** san utkṛṣṭa eva graho yasya saḥ | guṇān uktvā karmāṇy āha—āharteti ||25-26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : san** samīcīno **graho **'bhiniveśo yasya saḥ | ikṣvākv-ādayaḥ prakṛṣṭaikaika-guṇāḥ, parīkṣit tu prakṛṣṭa-sarva-guṇaka iti prakaraṇārtho bodhyaḥ | guṇān uktvā karmāṇy āhuḥ—**āharteti** ||25|| **bhūvo dharmasya** ca kleśārpaṇāt **kāraṇād eṣa** **kaler nigrahītā** bhāvī ||26||

**...**

**|| 1.12.27 ||**

**takṣakād ātmano mṛtyuṁ dvija-putropasarjitāt |**

**prapatsyata upaśrutya mukta-saṅgaḥ padaṁ hareḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** **dvija-putreṇa** preritāt **takṣakād** **ātmano** **mṛtyum** upaśrutya viraktaḥ san **hareḥ padaṁ** **prapatsyate** bhajiṣyati ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : hareḥ** śrī-kṛṣṇasya **padaṁ** caraṇāravindaṁ—jñānena vaiyāsaki-śabditena bheje khagendra-dhvaja-pāda-mūlaṁ [bhā.pu. 1.18.16] ity-ukteḥ |_|_27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** **upasarjitāt** preritāt ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : dvija-putreṇa upasarjitāt** preritāt **takṣakād** **ātmano mṛtyum** **upaśrutya** **mukta**-rājyādi-**saṅgaḥ** san **hareḥ padaṁ prapatsyate** ||27||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.28 ||**

**jijñāsitātma-yāthārthyo muner vyāsa-sutād asau |**

**hitvedaṁ nṛpa gaṅgāyāṁ yāsyaty addhākutobhayam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tataś ca jijñāsitam ātmano yāthātmyaṁ yena saḥ | **idaṁ** śarīraṁ **gaṅgāyāṁ hitvākutobhayaṁ** padaṁ **yāsyati** | **addhā** niścayena ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tad eva khalv **akutobhayam**—


        martyo mṛtyu-vyāla-bhītaḥ palāyan


        lokān sarvān nirbhayaṁ nādhyagacchat |


        tvat-pādābjaṁ prāpya yadṛcchayādya


        susthaḥ śete mṛtyur asmād apaiti || [bhā.pu. 10.3.27] ity-ādeḥ |

tato **jijñāsita** ity atra **ātmā** harir eva ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : jijñāsitaṁ** vicāritam **ātmano yāthārthyaṁ** vāstavaṁ tattvaṁ yena saḥ | **idaṁ** śarīram ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : jijñāsitam** **ātmano** hareḥ svasya ca **yāthātmyaṁ** yena saḥ | **idaṁ** śarīram, **akutobhayaṁ** kṛṣṇam ||28||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.29 ||**

**iti rājña upādiśya viprā jātaka-kovidāḥ |**

**labdhāpacitayaḥ**[^108]** sarve pratijagmuḥ svakān gṛhān ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** **labdhā** **apacitiḥ** pūjā yais te ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** **labdhā apacitiḥ** pūjā yaiḥ ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : labdhā upacitiḥ** pūjā yais te ||29||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.30 ||**

**sa eṣa loke vikhyātaḥ parīkṣid iti yat prabhuḥ |**

**pūrvaṁ**[^109]** dṛṣṭam anudhyāyan parīkṣeta nareṣv iha ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **parīkṣid iti nāma nirvakti—sa eṣa iti | **yad** yasmāt **prabhuḥ** samarthaḥ san garbhe **dṛṣṭaṁ** puruṣam **anudhyāyanniha** dṛśyamāneṣu **nareṣu** madhye sarvam api naraṁ parīkṣitā “ayam asau bhaven no vā ?” iti vicārayet, ataḥ **parīkṣid iti vikhyātaḥ** | “pūrva-dṛṣṭam” iti vā pāṭhaḥ | tadā mātṛ-garbhe pūrvaṁ dṛṣṭam ity arthaḥ ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **sa eṣa iti | śrī-kṛṣṇa-darśanāt **pūrvam** atibālyāvasthāyām eva jñeyam ||30|

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **parīkṣid iti nāma nirvakti—sa eṣā iti | **iha** dṛśyamāneṣu **nareṣu** madhye garbhe **dṛṣṭaṁ** puruṣam anusmaran “ayaṁ sa bhaven na vā” iti vicārayet, ataḥ **parīkṣid iti vikhyātaḥ** | “pūrvaṁ dṛṣṭam” iti ca pāṭhaḥ ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : parīkṣid iti** nāma sūto nirvakti—**sa** iti | **iha** dṛśyamāneṣu **nareṣu** madhye garbhe **dṛṣṭaṁ** puruṣam anusmaran | ayaṁ sa bhaven naveti **parīkṣeta** vicārayed ataḥ parīkṣid iti **loke** **vikhyātaḥ** ||30||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.31 ||**

**sa rāja-putro vavṛdhe āśu śukla ivoḍupaḥ |**

**āpūryamāṇaḥ pitṛbhiḥ kāṣṭhābhir iva so’nvaham ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **pūrayanti diśaḥ somaṁ devā gāvaḥ sarasvatī iti gāruḍe ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : śukle** śukla-pakṣe **sa** prasiddha **uḍupo’nvahaṁ** yathā **kāṣṭhābhiḥ** pañcadaśa-kalābhir āpūryamāṇo vardhate, evaṁ **pitṛbhir** yudhiṣṭhirādibhir kāmaiś cātuḥṣaṣṭi-kalābhiś **cāpuryamāṇo vavṛdhe** ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **[?] bāla eveti padyaṁ citsukha-sammatam ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : śukle** śukla-pakṣe **uḍupaś** candra **iva vavṛdhe** | **āpūryamāṇa** iti **kalābhiḥ** lālanaiś ceti jñeyam | **kāṣṭhābhir** digbhir **ivapitṛbhir** yudhiṣṭhirādibhir āvṛta iti śeṣaḥ ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : śukle** pakṣe **yathoḍupaḥ** **kāṣṭhābhiḥ** kalābhir āpūryamāṇo vardhate, tathā **pitṛbhiḥ** yudhiṣṭhirādyair lālanābhir **anvaham** **āpūryamāṇo** **vavṛdhe** ||31||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.32 ||**

**yakṣyamāṇo’śvamedhena jñāti-droha-jihāsayā |**

**rājā labdha-dhano dadhyau nānyatra kara-daṇḍayoḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **pūrvam apakṛṣyoktān aśvamedhān svāvasare sa-prakāraṁ kathayati | **jñāti-drohasyahānecchayā yakṣyamāṇaḥ kara-daṇḍayor anyatra** tābhyāṁ vinā **labdha-dhano**[^110]**dadhyau** cintayām āsa | kara-daṇḍa-jasya parijana-bharaṇa-mātropakṣīṇatvāt ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : yakṣyamāṇa** iti | tat-paritoṣārthaṁ śrī-bhīṣmopadeśenaiveti jñeyam | anyathā bhīṣme’py anāsthā syāt ||32|| 

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : kara-daṇḍayor anyatra** tābhyāṁ vinā **dhanālābhāt** dhana-prācuryasya apekṣaṇīyatvāt **dadhyau** cintayāmāsa ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **saṅkṣepād uktān aśvamedhān vistareṇāha—**yakṣyamāṇa** iti | **rājā** yudhiṣṭhiraḥ **karadaṇḍayor** **anyatra** **alabdha-dhano**'śvamedhārthaka-bahu-dhanāpekṣayā **dadhyau** | **kara-daṇḍa-labdhānāṁ dhanānāṁ** poṣya-varga-bharaṇenopakṣīṇatvāt adhika-dhanārtha-cintābhūd ity arthaḥ ||32||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.33 ||**

**tad abhipretam ālakṣya bhrātaro’cyuta-coditāḥ |**

**dhanaṁ prahīṇam ājahrur udīcyāṁ diśi bhūriśaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : prahīṇaṁ** marut, tasya yajñe brāhmaṇais tyaktaṁ suvarṇa-pātrādikam ānītavantaḥ ||33||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : prahīṇaṁ** marut, tasya yajñe tyakta-svarṇa-pātrādikam ānītavantaḥ ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : tad abhipretaṁ** rājño'bhiprāyam **ālakṣya** **bhrātaro** bhīmādayaḥ **prahīṇaṁ** marut-tasya rājño yajñe tyaktaṁ bahu **dhanam** **ājahrur** āninyuḥ, asvāmikasya dhanasya rājakīyatvāt ||33||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.34 ||**

**tena sambhṛta-sambhāro dharma-putro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ |**

**vāji-medhais tribhir bhīto yajñaiḥ samayajad**[^111]** dharim ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : saṁbhṛta-saṁbhāraḥ** saṁpādita-yajñopakaraṇaḥ | **bhīto** jñāti-drohāt ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : saṁbhṛtaḥ** saṁpāditaḥ **sambhāro**'śvamedhopakaraṇaṁ yena saḥ | **bhīto** jñāti-drohāt ||34-35||

 **...**

**|| 1.12.35-36 ||**

**āhūto bhagavān rājñā yājayitvā dvijair nṛpam |**

**uvāsa katicin māsān suhṛdāṁ priya-kāmyayā ||**

**tato rājñābhyanujñātaḥ kṛṣṇayā saha-bandhubhiḥ |**

**yayau dvāravatīṁ brahman sārjuno yadubhir vṛtaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **atra **āhūto bhagavān rājñā** iti kvācitkaṁ padya-dvayaṁ sambandhokti-kāreṇa vyākhyātam asti ||35-36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : _na vyākhyātam._**

iti sārārtha-darśinyāṁ harṣiṇyāṁ bhakta-cetasām |

prathame dvādaśo’dhyāyaḥ saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām ||*||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : kṛṣṇayā bandhubhiḥ sahitena rājñā** ca ||36||

iti śrī-vaiṣṇavānandinyāṁ  prathama-skandha-ṭippanyāṁ dvādaśo'dhyāyaḥ ||12||

**...**

iti śrīmad-bhāgavate mahā-purāṇe brahma-sūtra-bhāṣye

pāramahaṁsyaṁ saṁhitāyāṁ vaiyāsikyāṁ

daśama-skandhe parīkṣij-janma nāma

dvādaśo’dhyāyaḥ |

||1.12||



**...**

 

(1.13)


## atha trayodaśo’dhyāyaḥ


### viduropadeśena gāndhāryā saha dhṛtarāṣṭrasya vanāya prasthānam |

**|| 1.13.1 ||**

**sūta uvāca—**

**viduras tīrtha-yātrāyāṁ maitreyād ātmano gatim |**

**jñātvāgād dhāstināpuraṁ tayāvāpta-vivitsitaḥ**[^112]** ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :**

nigamo dhṛtarāṣṭrasya viduroktyā trayodaśe | \
uktaḥ pautrābhiṣekeṇa vaktuṁ rājño mahāpatham ||

idānīṁ parīkṣitaḥ kali-nigrahādi-karmāṇi kathayiṣyan vidurāgamanena dhṛtarāṣṭra-prasthānaṁ tato’rjunāgamanaṁ, tataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇāntardhānaṁ niśamya pāṇḍava-prasthānaṁ ca nirūpayati tribhir adhyāyaiḥ | **gatiṁ** harim | **tayā** **ātma-gatyā** **avāptaṁ vivitsitaṁ** jñātum iṣṭaṁ sarvaṁ yena ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) :** **vidura** iti | so’yaṁ tṛtīya-skandhānusāreṇa yuddhāt pūrvaṁ duryodhanād vicchidya gata āsīd iti jñeyam  | **ātmano gatir** hari-bhaktiḥ, **tayā avāpta-vivitsita** iti taj-jñānenaiva sarvan jñātavān ity arthaḥ, sarvāśrayatvāt tasyāḥ ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** 

parīkṣito janma vaktuṁ drauṇy-astrādi-kathā yathā |

abhiṣekaṁ tathā vaktuṁ vidurāgamanādy abhūt ||

vidurasyopadeśena dhṛtarāṣṭrasya nirgamaḥ |

rājño viṣādaḥ śāntiś ca nāradoktyā trayodaśe ||

parīkṣito janma uktvā, kali-nigrahādi-karmāṇi kathayiṣyan, prathamaṁ rājyābhiṣekaṁ vaktuṁ vidurasyāgamanaṁ, tato vairāgyopadeśena dhṛtarāṣṭra-niṣkramaḥ, tato’rjunāgamanaṁ, tataḥ pāṇḍava-prasthānaṁ ca nirūpayati tribhir adhyāyaiḥ | **gatiṁ** kṛṣṇam | **tayā ātma-gatyā avāptam** ātmano **vivitsitaṁ** prāptum iṣṭaṁ yena saḥ | vidal lābhe ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :**

vane vidura-vākyena dhṛtarāṣṭrasya nirgamaḥ | \
rājño viṣāda-śāntiś ca nāradoktyā trayodaśe || \


ukta-janmanaḥ parīkṣitaḥ kali-nigrahādīni karmāṇi vakṣyann ādau rājyābhiṣekaṁ vaktuṁ vidurasyāgamanaṁ tena vairāgyopadeśaṁ tena dhṛtarāṣṭrasya gṛhān nirgamaṁ tato'rjunasyāgamanaṁ tataḥ pāṇḍavānāṁ prasthānaṁ ca varṇayati—**vidura** ity-ādibhis tribhir adhyāyaiḥ | **maitreyāt** śrī-kṛṣṇād iṣṭād **ātmanaḥ** svasya **gatiṁ** kṛṣṇaṁ | **tayā** gatyā **avāptam** ātmano **vivitsitam āptum** iṣṭaṁ yena saḥ | vida lābhe dhātuḥ ||1||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.2 ||**

**yāvataḥ kṛtavān praśnān kṣattā kauṣāravāgrataḥ |**

**jātaika-bhaktir govinde tebhyaś copararāma ha ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tad evāha | **yāvataḥ** karma-yoga-vratādi-viṣayān **praśnān** prathamaṁ **kṛtavān** | **kauṣāravasya** maitreyasya purataḥ | paścāt tri-catuḥ-praśnārtha-jñāna-mātreṇa **govinde jātaika-bhaktiḥ** kṛtārthaḥ saṁs tebhyaḥ praśnebhyaḥ **upararāma** | tataḥ paraṁ na vijijñāsitavān ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : tebhyaḥ** praśnebhya **upararāma,** tad uttaraṁ śrotuṁ naicchat, bhaktau jātāyām anyasya jijñāsyasya vaiyarthyād iti bhāvaḥ ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : kauśāravo** maitreyaḥ, **tebhyaḥ** praśnebhyo muninā parihṛtebhya **upararāma** tad-uttarāṇi śrotuṁ naicchat, tatra hetuḥ—**jātaika-** iti | bhaktau jātāyām anya-jijñāsāyā vaiphalyād iti bhāvaḥ ||2||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.3-5 ||**

**taṁ bandhum āgataṁ dṛṣṭvā dharma-putraḥ sahānujaḥ |**

**dhṛtarāṣṭro yuyutsuś ca sūtaḥ śāradvataḥ pṛthā ||**

**gāndhārī draupadī brahman subhadrā cottarā kṛpī |**

**anyāś ca jāmayaḥ pāṇḍor jñātayaḥ sasutāḥ striyaḥ ||**

**pratyujjagmuḥ praharṣeṇa prāṇaṁ tanva ivāgatam |**

**abhisaṅgamya vidhivat pariṣvaṅgābhivādanaiḥ || **

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **tat-prāṇe prasanna udatiṣṭhad iti śrutiḥ ||5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : sūtaḥ** sañjayaḥ | **śāradvataḥ** kṛpaḥ | **pṛthā** kuntī ||3|| **kṛpī** droṇa-bhāryā | **jāmayo** jñāti-bhāryāḥ | **anyāś** ca striyaḥ ||4|| **prāṇaṁ tanva iveti** kutaścin mūrcchādi-doṣataḥ prāṇe’vasanne sati, tanvaḥ karāṅghry-ādayoḥ niśceṣṭā bhavanti, punas tasminn āvirbhūte yathottiṣṭhanti, tadvat ||5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : sūtaḥ** sañjayaḥ, **śāradvataḥ** kṛpaḥ, **kṛpī** droṇa-bhāryā | **jāmayo** jñāti-bhāryāḥ | **jāmi**-śabdaś ca vargādir antasthādiś ca koṣeṣu dṛṣṭaḥ | **prāṇaṁ** mūrcchādi-doṣeṇa gata-prāyaṁ punar **āgataṁ** saṁlakṣya **tanvaḥ** kara-caraṇādikāḥ | yathā **pratyudgacchanti** dhṛta-sva-sva-ceṣṭā bhavanti ||3-5|| 

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : taṁ** viduraṁ, **sūtaḥ** sañjayaḥ, **śāradvataḥ** kṛpaḥ, **jāmayo** jñāti-bhāryāḥ ||3-4|| mūrcchādi-doṣeṇa gata-prāyaṁ **prāṇam āgataṁ** saṁlakṣya ||5-7||

**...**

**|| 1.13.6 ||**

**mumucuḥ prema-bāṣpaughaṁ virahautkaṇṭhya-kātarāḥ |**

**rājā tam arhayāṁ cakre kṛtāsana-parigraham ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** **viraheṇa** yad **autkaṇṭhyaṁ** tena **kātarā **vivaśāḥ ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

 **...**

**|| 1.13.7 ||**

**taṁ bhuktavantaṁ viśrāntam āsīnaṁ sukham āsane |**

**praśrayāvanato rājā prāha teṣāṁ ca śṛṇvatām ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : taṁ** viduram ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

 **...**

**|| 1.13.8 ||**

**yudhiṣṭhira uvāca—**

**api smaratha no yuṣmat-pakṣa-cchāyā-samedhitān |**

**vipad-gaṇād viṣāgny-āder mocitā yat sa-mātṛkāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **pakṣiṇo hy apatyāni yathātisnehena pakṣa-cchāyayā vardhayanti, tadvad **yuṣmat-pakṣa-pāta-cchāyayā samedhitān** vardhitān **no’smān kiṁ smaratha** ? samedhitatvam evam āha | **vipad-gaṇād** yasmān **mocitāḥ** smaḥ ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **pakṣiṇo hy apatyāni yathā atisnehena pakṣa-cchāyayā vardhayanti, tadvat | pakṣe **pakṣa-cchāyā** pakṣa-pātaḥ | **yad** yasmān **mocitā** vayaṁ tvayety arthaḥ ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **pakṣiṇo yathāpatyāni pakṣa-cchāyayā vardhayanti, tathā **yuṣmat-pakṣac-chāyayā** vardhitān **no**'smān yūyaṁ kiṁ **smaratha**? samedhitatvam āha—**vipad** iti ||8||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.9 ||**

**kayā vṛttyā vartitaṁ vaś caradbhiḥ kṣiti-maṇḍalam |**

**tīrthāni kṣetra-mukhyāni sevitānīha bhūtale ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** **vo** yuṣmabhiḥ **kayā** **vṛttyā** **vartitaṁ** deha-vṛttiḥ kṛtā | kāni ca **tīrthādīni** **sevitāni** ? iti ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : vṛttyā** jīvikayā | **vo** yuṣmābhiḥ ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : vo** yuṣmābhiḥ ||9||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.10 ||**

**bhavad-vidhā bhāgavatās tīrtha-bhūtāḥ svayaṁ vibho |**

**tīrthī-kurvanti tīrthāni svāntaḥ-sthena gadābhṛtā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **bhavatāṁ ca tīrthāṭanaṁ na svārthaṁ, kintu tīrthānugrahārtham ity āha—**bhavad-vidhā** iti | malina-jana-saṁparkeṇa malināni tīrthāni santaḥ punaḥ svayaṁ **tīrthī-kurvanti** | **svāntaṁ** manas, tat-sthena, svasyāntaḥ-sthiteneti vā ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tīrtheṣu bhaktimatāṁ bhavatāṁ tīrthāṭanaṁ ca tīrthānām eva maṅgalāya sampadyata ity āha—**bhavad-vidhā** iti ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **bhavatāṁ ca tīrthāṭanaṁ tīrthānām eva bhāgyenety āha—**bhavad-vidhā** iti **tīrthīkurvanti** mahā-tīrthīkurvanti "pāvanaṁ pāvanānām"[^113] itivat ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **bhavatāṁ tīrtha-yātrā tīrtha-bhāgyād ity āha—bhavad iti | malina-jana-prasaṅgā ttīrthāny api malināni bhavanti | **bhavad-vidhās** tu **svāntaḥ-sthena gadābhṛtā** kṛṣṇena **svayaṁ tīrtha-bhūtās** tāni **tīrthī-kurvanti** ujjvalāni pāvitrya-karaṇa-śaktimanti kurvantīty arthaḥ ||10||

**...**

**|| 1.13.11-12 ||**

**api naḥ suhṛdas tāta bāndhavāḥ kṛṣṇa-devatāḥ |**

**dṛṣṭāḥ śrutā vā yadavaḥ sva-puryāṁ sukham āsate ||**

**ity ukto dharma-rājena sarvaṁ tat samavarṇayat |**

**yathānubhūtaṁ kramaśo vinā yadu-kula-kṣayam ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : yadu-kula-kṣayam** eṣyat |


    śāpaṁ śrutvā brāhmaṇānām uddhavaḥ khinna-mānasaḥ |


    udāsīnaṁ tathā kṛṣṇam iva suprītam eva ca || 


    na śiṣyamāṇaṁ sva-kulaṁ svarṣiyāsuṁ ca keśavam |


    jñātvā papraccha bhagavān svarūpaṁ tam upahvare ||


    maitreyo’pi tadaivāgāj jijñāsus tattvam uttamam |


    tayor adāt sa bhagavān jñānaṁ nirmalam añjasā ||


    ṣaḍ-viṁśa-vatsarāt pūrvaṁ svargateḥ puruṣottamaḥ |


    preṣayāmāsa ca harir uddhavaṁ badarīm anu ||


    kalāpagrāmiṇāṁ vaktum etat tattvam aśeṣataḥ |


    viduraṁ tīrtha-yātrāstham antarāle sa uddhavaḥ ||


    dṛṣṭānaśiṣyamāṇaṁ ca kulaṁ jigamiṣuṁ harim |


    kathayitvā badaryeṁ ca kalāpa-grāma-vāsinām ||


    procya tattvam aśeṣeṇa vāsudeva-mukhodgatam |


    ṣaḍviṁśad-varṣa-gamane punar āgatim ātmanaḥ ||


    teṣām  uktvā punaḥ kṛṣṇa-sannidhau vicacāra ha |


    maitreya-vidurāyaitad ūcivān kṛṣṇa-coditaḥ ||


    viduraḥ pāṇḍavānāṁ ca vinā yadu-vināśanam |


    ṣaṭ-triṁśad-varṣataḥ pūrvaṁ jñātvāpy apriyam eva tat ||


    nāvocad viduro dhīmān tasmān nāpiryam āvadet || iti pādme |

tāvac chaśāsa kṣitim eka-cakrām ekātapatrām ajitena pārtha iti copari viduraṁ cāgataṁ punar iti ca | bhārate caika-viṁśad varṣāt pūrvaṁ vidurasya yudhiṣṭhira-bhāva uktaḥ ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** **api** kiṁ **sukham āsate** bhavadbhiḥ ? kvāpi **dṛṣṭāḥ śrutā vā** ? ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : api** kiṁ **sukham āsate**? ||11-12||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.13 ||**

**nanv apriyaṁ durviṣahaṁ nṛṇāṁ svayam upasthitam |**

**nāvedayat sa-karuṇo duḥkhitān draṣṭum akṣamaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **yadu-kula-kṣayāvarṇane kāraṇam āha—**nanv** iti ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : nanv** iti | atrānyo’pi duḥkha-śaṅkayā nākathayad iti jñeyam ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yadu-kula-kṣayāvarṇane kāraṇa-bhūtaṁ nīti-śāstra-vidhim āha—**nanv** iti ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yadukula-kṣayāvarṇane hetuṁ nīti-śāstra-vidhim āha—**nanv** iti ||13||

 **...**

|| 1.13.14 ||

**kañcit kālam athāvātsīt sat-kṛto devavat sukham**[^114]** |**

**bhrātur jyeṣṭhasya śreyas-kṛt sarveṣāṁ sukham āvahan ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : śreyas-kṛt** tattvam upadiśan ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : śreyas-kṛt** hitopadeṣṭā ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī), baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :** **śreyas-kṛt** śreyaḥ kartum ||13||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.15 ||**

**abibhrad aryamā daṇḍaṁ yathāvad agha-kāriṣu |**

**yāvad dadhāra śūdratvaṁ śāpād varṣa-śataṁ yamaḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **yo'**ryamā daṇḍam abibhrat**, sa **varṣa-śataṁ** yāvac **chūdratvaṁ** babhāra | 


    na devānāṁ na devīnāṁ sāmastyena janir bhuvi | 


    aṁśāṁśenaiva jāyante sarve tv ājānajādayaḥ ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nanu śūdro’sau katham upadiśet ? na hy asau śūdraḥ, kintu yamas tad-rūpeṇāsīt | kiṁ tatra kāraṇaṁ ? yame cātrāgate’mutra ko daṇḍa-dharaḥ ? ity apekṣāyām āha—**abibhrad** iti | dhṛtavān ity arthaḥ | māṇḍavyasya **śāpāt** | tathā hi—kvacic corān anu dhāvanto rāja-bhaṭā māṇḍavyasya ṛṣes tapaś carataḥ samīpe tān saṁprāpya, tena saha nibaddhyānīya, rājñe nivedya, tad-ājñayā sarvān śūlam āropayāmāsuḥ | tato rājā tam ṛṣiṁ jñātvā śūlād avatārya prasādayāmāsa | tato munir yamaṁ gatvā kupita uvāca, "kasmād ahaṁ śūlam āropitaḥ ?" iti | tenoktaṁ "tvaṁ bālye śalabhaṁ kuśāgreṇāvidhya krīḍitavān" iti | tac chrutvā māṇḍavyas taṁ śaśāpa | "bālye’jānato me mahāntaṁ daṇḍaṁ yatas tvaṁ kāritavān, ataḥ śūdro bhava" iti ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **nanv asau yama eva viduratvena jātaḥ, tasya cāsya loke’smin śreyaskṛttvam eva śrūyate, na tu yama-loke yama-rūpeṇa daṇḍakṛttvam api | tarhi tatra daṇḍaḥ katham āsīt ? tatrāha—**abibhrad** iti | varṣāṇi katicid adhikāni śataṁ ca **varṣa-śatam** ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **na ca dhṛtarāṣṭrād ayaṁ kaniṣṭhatvān nyūno mantavyaḥ, sākṣād dharma-rājasyaiva māṇḍavya-śāpena śūdratayāvatīrṇatvāt | nanu tāvad amutra ko daṇḍa-dharaḥ ? tatrāha—**abibhrat** ārṣa-prayogaḥ, dhṛtavān ity arthaḥ | tathā hi kvacic corān anudhāvanto rāja-bhaṭā māṇḍavyasya tapaś carataḥ samīpe tān samprāpya tena saha nibaddhyānīya rājñe nivedya tad-ājñayā sarvān eva śūlam āropayāmāsuḥ | tato rājā tam ṛṣiṁ jñātvā śūlād avatārya prasādayāmāsa | tato munir yamaṁ gatvā kupita uvāca | "kasmaḍ ahaṁ śūlam āropitaḥ ?" iti | tenoktaṁ—"tvaṁ bālye kuśāgreṇa śalabham āvidhya krīḍitavān" iti | tat śrutva māṇḍavyas taṁ śaśāpa | "bālye ajānato me mahāntaṁ daṇḍaṁ kāritavān, atas tvaṁ śūdro bhava" iti ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **na vidurasya kaniṣṭhatvāc chūdratvāc ca kathaṁ tad upadeṣṭṛtvam ? tatrāha—**aryamā** pitṛdeva-mukhyo bhagavad-vibhūtiḥ, pitṝṇām aryamā cāsmi [gītā 10.29] ity ukto'gha-kāriṣu pāpiṣu yathāvat sa-nyāyaṁ daṇḍam abibhrat dhṛtavān | yāvan-māṇḍavya-śāpāt **yamaḥ varṣa-śataṁ** vyāpya **śūdratvaṁ dadhāra** | bhārate kathāsti—kadācit taskarān anudhāvanto rāja-puruṣās tapasyato māṇḍavya-rṣer antike tān prāpya tena saha nibaddhyānīya rājñe nivedya tad-ājñayā sarvān śūlam āropayāmāsuḥ | tato rājā tam ṛṣiṁ vijñāya śūlād avatārya prasādaṁ yācñāñcakāra | tataḥ sa ṛṣir yamam eva rājāviṣṭaṁ daṇḍa-dharaṁ vimṛṣya tam āsādya cukopa | "tvaṁ bālye kuśāgreṇa śalabham āvidhya krīḍām akārṣīḥ" iti tad uktaṁ niśamya śaśāpa—"tadā jñāna-hīnasya mama mahāntaṁ daṇḍaṁ kṛtavān atattvaṁ śūdro bhava" iti | tathā ca viduraḥ kaniṣṭho'pi śūdro'pi sākṣād-dharma-rājatvena pratyakṣīkṛta-pareśatvāt tasya tad-upadeṣṭṛtvam iti | ata eva bhāradvāja-saṁhitāyāṁ strī-śūdrādīnāṁ tan niṣidhya sākṣāt-kṛta-para-tattvānāṁ teṣāṁ tad āha—


    na jātu mantra-dātāro na śūdro nāntarodbhavaḥ | 


    nābhiśapto na patitaḥ kāma-kāmo'py akāmitaḥ || 


    striyaḥ śūdrādayaś caiva bodhayeyur hitāhitam | 


    yathārhaṁ mānanīyāś ca nārhanty ācāryatāṁ kvacit | 


    kim apy atrābhijāyante yoginaḥ sarva-yoniṣu | 


    pratyakṣitātmanārthānāṁ naiṣāṁ cintyaṁ kulādikam || iti ||15||

 **...**

|| 1.13.16 ||

**yudhiṣṭhiro labdha-rājyo dṛṣṭvā pautraṁ kulandharam |**

**bhrātṛbhir loka-pālābhair mumude parayā śriyā ||**[^115]

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **idānīṁ rājyasyāpakarṣaṁ nirūpayitum utkarṣaṁ nigamayati—**yudhiṣṭhira** iti | **kulaṁ-dharaṁ** vaṁśa-dharam ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : kulandharaṁ** vaṁśa-dhārakam ||16||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.17 ||**

**evaṁ gṛheṣu saktānāṁ pramattānāṁ tad-īhayā |**

**atyakrāmad avijñātaḥ kālaḥ parama-dustaraḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : tad-īhayā** gṛha-vyāpāreṇa **pramattānām** | **atyakrāmad** āyuḥ-kālo’tikrāntaḥ | yad vā, tān abhyabhavad ity arthaḥ ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **evaṁ śrī-yudhiṣṭhirasya pālana-labdha-sukha-prakāreṇa **gṛheṣu saktānāṁ pramattānāṁ** janānām, na tu pāṇḍavānām | 


    kiṁ te kāmāḥ sura-spārhā mukunda-manaso dvijāḥ |


    adhijahrur mudaṁ rājñaḥ kṣudhitasya yathetare || [bhā.pu. 1.12.6] ity-ādeḥ |

ye’dhyāsanaṁ rāja-kirīṭa-juṣṭaṁ sadyo jahur bhagavat-pārśva-kāmāḥ [bhā.pu. 1.19.20] ity-ādeś ca | ata eva viduro’pi dhṛtarāṣṭraṁ praty eva tathopadideśa, na tu tān pratīti ||17||

**prīti-sandarbhaḥ (7): **śrī-yādava-pāṇḍavānāṁ svārtha ivāpi tat-sambandhas tad-ābhāsa eva | yathoktam—


    śayyāsanāṭanālāpa- krīḍā-snānāśanādiṣu |


    na viduḥ santam ātmānaṁ vṛṣṇayaḥ kṛṣṇa-cetasaḥ || [bhā.pu. 10.90.46] iti |


    kiṁ te kāmāḥ sura-spārhā mukunda-manaso dvijāḥ |


    adhijahrur mudaṁ rājñaḥ kṣudhitasya yathetare || [bhā.pu. 1.12.6] iti |

ataḥ, evaṁ gṛheṣu saktānāṁ pramattānāṁ tad-īhayā [bhā.pu. 1.13.17] ity-ādikaṁ jahal-lakṣaṇayā tad-upalakṣitān dhṛtarāṣṭrādīn apekṣyoktam | ata evānantaraṁ viduras tad abhipretya [bhā.pu. 1.13.18] ity-ādau | tena dhṛtarāṣṭrasyaiva śikṣā, na tu teṣām  api ||17-18||  \


———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : gṛheṣu saktānām** iti yudhiṣṭhirādibhyo’nyeṣām  eva nindeyaṁ tātkālika-janānāṁ jñeyā | teṣāṁ kṣudhitasya yathetare [bhā.pu. 1.12.6] iti dṛṣṭāntena tādṛśa-sampad-ādiṣv api anāsaktiḥ prapañcitā ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : gṛheṣv** iti **atyakrāmad** āyur iti śeṣaḥ | iyaṁ nindā tadānīntanānām anyeṣāṁ, na tu yudhiṣṭhirādīnāṁ, teṣāṁ tu kṣudhitasya yathetare [bhā.pu. 1.12.6] iti mukundād anyatrānasakter abhidhānāt ||17-18||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.18 ||**

**viduras tad**[^116]** abhipretya dhṛtarāṣṭram abhāṣata |**

**rājan nirgamyatāṁ śīghraṁ paśyedaṁ bhayam āgatam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : abhipretya** jñātvā ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

 **...**

**|| 1.13.19 ||**

**pratikriyā na yasyeha kutaścit karhicit prabho |**

**sa eṣa bhagavān kālaḥ sarveṣāṁ naḥ samāgataḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **


    saṁhartā bhagavān viṣṇuḥ kāla ity abhidhīyate |


    athavā guṇa-sarvasvaṁ kāla-śabdo vyanakti hi || iti skānde ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nanu tad-pratīkāraḥ kriyatāṁ ? kiṁ nirgamanena ? tatrāha—**pratikriyā** iti | **sarveṣām** iti yaiḥ pratikartavyaṁ, teṣām  apīty arthaḥ ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : sarveṣām** iti yaiḥ pratikartavyaṁ, teṣām  apīty arthaḥ ||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu gṛha eva sthitvā bhayaṁ pratikartavyaṁ ? tatrāha—pratīti | **sarveṣāṁ** pratikartṛṇām apīty arthaḥ | tathā ca virajya pareśa-bhajanāt tan-nivṛttir iti bhāvaḥ ||19||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.20 ||**

**yena caivābhipanno’yaṁ prāṇaiḥ priyatamair api |**

**janaḥ sadyo viyujyeta ṁ kim utānyair dhanādibhiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kathaṁ dhanādi-viyogaḥ soḍhuṁ śakyo’ta āha—yena ceti | **abhipanno** ’bhigrastaḥ ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : yena** mṛtyu-rūpeṇa kālena **abhipanno** grastaḥ ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : yena** mṛtyu-rūpeṇa kālena **abhipanno** grasto janaḥ ||20||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.21 ||**

**pitṛ-bhrātṛ-suhṛt-putrā hatās te vigataṁ vayam |**

**ātmā ca jarayā grastaḥ para-geham upāsase ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **atrāvasthānam atidainyam iti darśayan vairāgyam utpādayati—**pitṛ-bhrātr** iti saptabhiḥ | **ātmā ca** dehaḥ ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **vairāgyam utpādayati—**pitr** iti saptabhiḥ ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **virāgaṁ janayann āha—**pitr** iti saptabhiḥ ||21||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.22 ||**

**andhaḥ puraiva vadhiro manda-prajñāś ca sāmpratam |**

**viśīrṇa-danto mandāgniḥ sarāgaḥ kapham udvahan ||**

_eṣa ślokaḥ na paṭhyate sarvaiḥ._

 **...**

**|| 1.13.23 ||**

**aho mahīyasī jantor jīvitāśā yathā bhavān |**

**bhīmāpavarjitaṁ**[^117]** piṇḍam ādatte gṛha-pālavat ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **yena putrā hatāḥ, tena **bhīmena** dattaṁ **piṇḍaṁ** gṛha-pāla iva | **gṛha-pālaḥ** śvā ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** **apavarjitaṁ** dattam | **gṛha-pālaḥ** śvā ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : āvarjitaṁ** dattaṁ, **gṛha-pālaḥ** śvā ||23||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.24 ||**

**agnir nisṛṣṭo dattaś ca garo dārāś ca dūṣitāḥ |**

**hṛtaṁ kṣetraṁ dhanaṁ yeṣāṁ tad-dattair asubhiḥ kiyat ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : nisṛṣṭaḥ** prakṣiptaḥ | **garo** viṣam | **dūṣitā** avamatāḥ | **tad-dattair** annādibhir labdhair **asubhiḥ kiyat** prayojanam ? na kiṁcid ity arthaḥ ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : tad-dattair** annādibhir labdhair **asubhiḥ kiyat** ? kiṁ prayojanam ? ity arthaḥ ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : garo** viṣaṁ **tad-dattaiḥ** piṇḍair labdhair **asubhiḥ** prāṇaiḥ **kiyat** kiṁ-phalam ity arthaḥ ||24||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.25 ||**

**tasyāpi tava deho’yaṁ kṛpaṇasya jijīviṣoḥ |**

**paraity anicchato jīrṇo jarayā vāsasī iva ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : tasyāpi tava** evaṁ dainyam anubhavato’pi **paraiti** kṣīyate | ata eva bhaveti ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : paraiti** kṣīyate | **vāsasī** antarīyottarīye iti dṛṣṭāntasya dvi-vacana-dṛṣṭyā dārṣṭāntikasya dehasyāpi sūkṣma-sthūla-bhedena dvitayātmakasya **jīrṇatvam** | āndhya-vādhiryādikaṁ sūkṣma-dehasya jīrṇatvaṁ lakṣaṇaṁ, valī-pālitādikaṁ sthūla-dehasya ca ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : dehaḥ** sthūla-sūkṣma-rūpaḥ, **vāsasī** **iva** iti dṛṣṭāntāt, **paraiti** kṣīyate | vali-palitādikaṁ sthūlasya, āndhya-vādhiryādikaṁ sūkṣmasya ca jīrṇatvaṁ bodhyam ||25||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.26 ||**

**gata-svārtham imaṁ dehaṁ virakto mukta-bandhanaḥ |**

**avijñāta-gatir jahyāt sa vai dhīra udāhṛtaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : “**kiṁ-lakṣaṇo dhīraḥ ?” ity apekṣāyām āha | **gata-svārthaṁ** yaśo-dharmādi-śūnyam | **mukta-bandhanas** tyaktābhimānaḥ | kva gataḥ ? ity **avijñātā gatir** yasya, **sa dhīraḥ,** prāpta-duḥkhasya svayaṁ sahanena mukti-prāpteḥ ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : gata-svārtham imaṁ deham** ity-ādi-dvaye pūrva ātura-sannyāsī | paras tu sad-vivekena bhagavac-charaṇatayā sannyāsīti tāratamyaṁ jñeyam ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : gata-svārtham** akṛta-kṛṣṇa-bhajanatvena śoka-moha-jarādi-vyākulam | **mukta-bandhanaḥ** tyakta-dhana-putrādiḥ | kva gataḥ ? ity **avijñātā gatir** yasya saḥ | **jahyāt** kvāpi tīrthe **dehaṁ**, bhaktyaiva yas tyajet, **sa dhīraḥ** ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : gata-svārtham** akṛta-bhagavad-bhaktitvenāniṣpādita-deha-phalam | **mukta-bandhanas** tyakta-dhanātmajādiḥ | **kva gataḥ** ? iti janair avijñātā gatir yasya saḥ, **jahyāt** kutracit puṇya-kṣetre bhagavantaṁ smaran **dehaṁ** yas tyajet, sa dhīraḥ ||26||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.27 ||**

**yaḥ svakāt parato veha jāta-nirveda ātmavān |**

**hṛdi kṛtvā hariṁ gehāt pravrajet sa narottamaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : narottamas** tu tataḥ prāg eva kṛta-pratīkāraḥ | **svakāt** svata eva | **parataḥ** paropadeśato vā ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : narottamas** tu prāg eva kṛta-pratīkāraḥ | tal-lakṣaṇam āha—**svakāt** svata eva **parataḥ** paropadeśato va **ātmavān** vivekī | dhanaṁ hṛdi kṛtva vaṇik yātītivat **hariṁ hṛdi kṛtvā **hariṁ prāptum iti bhāvaḥ | **sa narottamaḥ** | tatrātura-sannyāsī dhīraḥ, bhakti-vivekī narottama iti bhedaḥ ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : narottamas** tu pūrvam eva kṛta-pratīkāras tal-lakṣaṇam āha—**ya** iti | **parataḥ** paropadeśad **vā** | **ātmavān** viviktātma-niṣṭhaḥ, tvaṁ tu prāyo narottamo nāsīti bhāvaḥ ||27||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.28 ||**

**athodīcīṁ diśaṁ yātu svair ajñāta-gatir bhavān |**

**ito’rvāk prāyaśaḥ kālaḥ puṁsāṁ guṇa-vikarṣaṇaḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : svair ajñāta-gatiḥ** vivikta-gatiḥ ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tvaṁ tu narottamo nābhūḥ, ata idānīṁ dhīro bhavety āha—atheti | **arvāg** arvācīnaḥ | eṣyann ity arthaḥ | **guṇān** dhairya-dayādīn **vikarṣaty** ācchinattīti tathā ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tvaṁ tu narottamo nābhūr evāto dhīro bhavety āha—atha iti | **arvāk** arvācīnaḥ eṣyan **kāla** ity arthaḥ | **guṇaṇ** dhairya-dayādīn **vikarṣati** ācchinattīty arthaḥ ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **idānīṁ narottamas tvaṁ bhavety āha—**bhavān** **svaiḥ** pāṇḍavair **ajñāta-gatiḥ** sann **udīcīṁ diśaṁ yātu** yasmād **ito'rvācīnaḥ** **kālaḥ** kalir eṣyati, **guṇān** dhairya-dayādīn **vikarṣaty** apanayatīty arthaḥ ||28||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.29 ||**

**evaṁ rājā vidureṇānujena**

**prajñācakṣur bodhita ājamīḍhaḥ |**

**chittvā sveṣu sneha-pāśān draḍhimno**

**niścakrāma bhrātṛ-sandarśitādhvā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : ājamīḍho**’jamīḍha-vaṁśajaḥ | **prajñācakṣur** andhaḥ, **evaṁ** **bodhitaḥ** san | **draḍhimnaś** citta-dārḍhyāt | **bhrātrā sandarśito’dhvā** bandha-mokṣayor mārgo yasya saḥ ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : bodhitaḥ** mukty-arthaḥ bhakti-miśra-jñānopadeśenety arthaḥ | **ājamīḍhaḥ** ajamīḍha-vaṁśajaḥ | **draḍhimnaś** citta-dārḍhyād dhetoḥ | **bhrātrā sandarśitaḥ adhvā** bandha-mokṣayor mārgo yasya saḥ ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : prajñā-cakṣu**-randhaḥ, **bodhito** mukti-phalāṁ hari-bhaktiṁ grāhitaḥ | **ājamīḍho**'jamīḍha-vaṁśodbhavaḥ, **draḍhimnaś** citta-dārḍhyād dhetor **niścakrāma**, **bhrātrā** vidureṇa | **sandārśito** bandha-muktyor **adhvā** panthā yasya saḥ ||29||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.30 ||**

**patiṁ prayāntaṁ subalasya putrī**

**pati-vratā cānujagāma sādhvī |**

**himālayaṁ nyasta-daṇḍa-praharṣaṁ**

**manasvinām iva sat samprahāraḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : subalasya putrī** gāndhārī **sādhvī** suśīlā **himālayaṁ** prayāntaṁ **patim anujagāma** | nanu kathaṁ sā sukumārī himādi-duḥkha-bahulaṁ himavantaṁ gatā ? ata āha—**nyasta-daṇḍānāṁ praharṣo** yasmiṁs tam | duḥkham api keṣāṁcit praharṣa-hetur bhavatīty atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ | **manasvināṁ** śūrāṇāṁ yuddhe saṁs tīvraḥ **saṁprahāro** yathā | pāṭhāntare sat-saṁprahāraṁ yuddhaṁ yatheti ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : subalasya putrī** gāndhārī | **sādhvī** suśīlā | nanu sā sukumārī himādriṁ duḥkha-bahulaṁ kathaṁ gatā ? ity ata āha—**nyasta-daṇḍānāṁ praharṣo** yatra taṁ duḥkhakam api keṣāñcid utsāhavatāṁ praharṣa-hetur bhavatīti | atra dṛṣṭāntaḥ—**manasvināṁ** śūrāṇāṁ parama-sukumārāṇām api yuddha-vīrāṇāṁ **sad** utkṛṣṭaḥ **samprahāro** yuddham iva | "sat-samprahāram" iti pāṭhe klībatvam ārṣam | samprahārābhisampāta-kali-saṁsphoṭa-saṁyugāḥ ity amaraḥ ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : subalasya putrī** gāndhārā **himālayaṁ prayātaṁ patim anujagāma** | nanu sā sukumārī himālayaṁ kathaṁ gatā? tatrāha—**nyasta-daṇḍānāṁ praharṣo** yatra tam, tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ—**manasvināṁ** śūrāṇāṁ sukumārāṇām api **sat saṁprahāram** āhavam iva | yathāhave svargānandānurāgas tathā mokṣānandānurāgo himālaye pravartaka iti bhāvaḥ ||30||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.31 ||**

**ajāta-śatruḥ kṛta-maitro hutāgnir**

**viprān natvā tila-go-bhūmi-rukmaiḥ |**

**gṛhaṁ praviṣṭo guru-vandanāya**

**na cāpaśyat pitarau saubalīṁ ca ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : pitarau** kuntī-dhṛtarāṣṭrau  | na cāpy apaśyataḥ | tasya manasi teṣāṁ vipad-bhāvo babhūva | anyathā mahābhārata-virodhāt | skānde ca—


    bhīma-santarjito rājñas tv anujñāṁ prāpya yatnataḥ |


    dhṛtarāṣṭro vane vāsam akarod vatsara-trayam ||


    viduras tad-didṛkṣārtham āgateṣu vanaṁ purā |


    pāṇḍaveṣu tu rājānaṁ praviśyaikatvam āgataḥ ||


    tato dāvāgninā dagdhaṁ dhṛtarāṣṭraṁ ca saubalīm |


    śrutvā kuntī-carcitānte prāpuḥ pāṇḍu-sutas tadā ||


    tāṁs tadā nārado vidvān śamayāmāsa dharmavit |


    uktottamāṁ patiṁ teṣāṁ niṣṭhāṁ tātkālikīṁ tathā || iti ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : krtaṁ maitraṁ** mitra-daivatyaṁ sandhyā-vandanaṁ yena | **natvā** saṁpūjya | **pitarau** vidura-dhṛtarāṣṭrau ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : kṛtaṁ maitraṁ** mitra-daivatyaṁ sandhyā-vandanādikaṁ yena saḥ | **natvā** **tilādibhiḥ** sampūjyeti "praviśa piṇḍīm" itivad ākṣepa-labdham | **nāpaśyat** ca-kārāt na jñātavāṁś ca | **pitarau** dhṛtarāṣṭra-vidurau ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kṛtaṁ maitraṁ mitra-devatākaṁ sandhyopāsanaṁ yena saḥ | natva tilādibhir abhyarcyeti praviśa piṇḍīm iti vadākṣepāt prāptaṁ | pitarau dhṛtarāṣṭra-vidurau ||31||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.32 ||**

**tatra sañjayam āsīnaṁ papracchodvigna-mānasaḥ |**

**gāvalgaṇe kva nas tāto vṛddho hīnaś ca netrayoḥ |**

**ambā ca hata-putrārtā pitṛvyaḥ kva gataḥ suhṛt ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **brahmāṇḍe—


    dhṛtarāṣṭre mṛte sūtaḥ sañjayaḥ pāṇḍu-sūnave |


    gatiṁ śaśaṁsa kuntyāś ca gāndhārī-dhṛtarāṣṭrayoḥ || ity-ādi |

**pitṛvyo**’pi dhṛtarāṣṭra eva | dviruktis tātparyārthā | 


    yatrādhikaṁ tatparatā bahu-vāram api dhruvam |


    tad vadanti mahā-prājño loka-vedānusārataḥ || iti ca brahma-tarke ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **he **gāvalgaṇe** gavalgaṇasya putra sañjaya ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **he **gāvalgane** ! gavalganasya putra sañjaya ! **netrayor hīno** netrābhyāṁ rahitaḥ | **pitṛvyo** viduraḥ ||32||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.33 ||**

**api mayy akṛta-prajñe hata-bandhuḥ sa bhāryayā |**

**āśaṁsamānaḥ śamalaṁ gaṅgāyāṁ duḥkhito’patat ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : akṛta-prajñe** manda-matau | **śamalam** aparādham **āśaṁsamāna** āśaṅkamānaḥ | **bhāryayā** saha ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **apīti | **śamalam** asya mad-vadhātmakam api pāpaṁ bhavatv iti vāñchayety arthaḥ ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ **śamalaṁ** mat-kartṛkam aparādham **āśaṁsamānaṁ** yudhiṣṭhireṇa mama eko’pi putro na rakṣitas tat kiṁ me jīvitena ? iti manasānulapan nirvidyamāna ity arthaḥ | yad vā, asya mad-vadhātmakam api pāpaṁ bhavatv iti vāñchann ity arthaḥ ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : akṛta-prajñe** manda-matau **mayi** **hata-bandhur** dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ **śamalam **aparādham **āśaṁsamānaḥ** | mamaika-putro na rakṣitas tat kiṁ jīviteneti **duḥkhito** **bhāryayā saha** **gaṅgāyāṁ** **nyapatat** | yad vā, asya mad-vadhātmakaṁ pāpaṁ bhavatv iti mayi **śamalam** āśaṁsamāno vāñchan ||33||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.34 ||**

**pitary uparate pāṇḍau sarvān naḥ suhṛdaḥ śiśūn |**

**arakṣatāṁ vyasanataḥ pitṛvyau kva gatāv itaḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : pitṛvyau** gāndhārī-dhṛtarāṣṭrau ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** yāv **arakṣatāṁ,** tau | itaḥ sthānāt ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tad upakārān smarann anutapati—pitarīti | **pitṛvyau** vidura-dhṛtarāṣṭrau ||34||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.35 ||**

**sūta uvāca—**

**kṛpayā sneha-vaiklavyāt sūto viraha-karśitaḥ |**

**ātmeśvaram acakṣāṇo na pratyāhātipīḍitaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : kṛpayā** sneha-vaiklavyāc cātipīḍita **ātmeśvaraṁ** dhṛtarāṣṭram **apaśyan** | **viraha-karśitaś** ca **sūtaḥ** sañjayo **na praty** uttaram **āha** ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : kṛpayā** hā vṛddhayor anāthayoḥ kiṁ bhaviṣyatīti ceto-draveṇa sambandha-hetuko yaḥ **snehaḥ,** tena **vaiklavyāc** ca ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : sūtaḥ** sañjaya **ātmeśvaraṁ** dhṛtarāṣṭam **acakṣāṇo**'paśyam **kṛpayā** vṛddhayor anāthayoḥ kiṁ bhāvīti citta-draveṇa, sva-svāmi-bhāva-hetukena **snehena vaiklavyāc** ca **viraha-karṣito** durbalo'**tipīḍitaḥ** san ||35||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.36 ||**

**vimṛjyāśrūṇi pāṇibhyāṁ viṣṭabhyātmānam ātmanā |**

**ajāta-śatruṁ pratyūce prabhoḥ pādāv anusmaran ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : ātmanā** buddhyā **ātmanaṁ** mano **viṣṭabhya** dhairya-yuktaṁ kṛtvā | **prabhor** dhṛtarāṣṭrasya ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : ātmanā** buddhyā **ātmānaṁ** mano **viṣṭabhya** dhairya-yuktaṁ kṛtvā ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : ātmanā** buddhyā **ātmānaṁ** mano **viṣṭabhya** sthiraṁ kṛtvā | **prabhor** dhṛtarāṣṭrasya ||36||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.37 ||**

**sañjaya uvāca—**

**nāhaṁ veda vyavasitaṁ pitror vaḥ kula-nandana |**

**gāndhāryā vā mahā-bāho muṣito’smi mahātmabhiḥ ||**[^118]

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : muṣito’smi **iti pralāpaḥ ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : gāndhāryāś** ca | **vyavasitaṁ** niścitam | yato **muṣito** vañcito'**smi** iti ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **sañjaya uvāceti | kvacin nāsti | nāhaṁ vedmīty ādau, 


    ahaṁ vyavasitaṁ rājan pitros te kula-nandana | 


    na veda sādhvyā gāndhāryā muṣito’smi mahātmabhiḥ || iti kvacit pāṭhaḥ ||37|| 

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : veda** vedmi | **muṣito** vañcitaḥ | man-nidrā-samaye te gatā iti bhāvaḥ ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : vyavasitaṁ** niścayaṁ, **muṣito** vañcitaḥ, mayi nidrāṇe gatā iti bhāvaḥ ||37||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.38 ||**

**athājagāma bhagavān nāradaḥ saha-tumburuḥ |**

**pratyutthāyābhivādyāha sānujo’bhyarcayan munim ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **evaṁ kiṁcit kālaṁ śocati tasminn atha **nārada ājagāma** | atrāsti kvacit pustake pāṭhāntaraṁ[^119] tad ullaṅghya yathā-sampradāyaṁ vyākhyāyate | śoka-vegād abhyarcayann ivāha rājā, na tv abhyarcayat |


    śokākrāntaḥ kṛpāviṣṭaḥ śraddhayā rahitaḥ pumān | \
guru-deva-dvijātīnāṁ pūjanaṁ na samācaret || iti smṛteḥ ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : athājagāma** ity ādau, 


    etasminn antare viprā nāradaḥ pratyadṛśyata | 


    vīṇāṁ tritantrīṁ dhvanayan bhagavān saha-tumburuḥ | 


    rāja-dattopanītārdhyaṁ pratyutthañābhinanditam | 


    paramāsana āsīnaṁ pauravendraḥ sma bhāṣate ||

iti puṇyāraṇya-citsukhayoḥ sammataḥ pāṭhaḥ ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **śoka-vegād **abhyarcayann** ivāha—na tv abhyarcya ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **śoka-vyākulatvād **abhyarcayann** iveti ||38||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.39 ||**

**yudhiṣṭhira uvāca—**

**nāhaṁ veda gatiṁ pitror bhagavan kva gatāv itaḥ |**

**ambā vā hata-putrārtā kva gatā ca tapasvinī |**

**karṇadhāra ivāpāre bhagavān pāra-darśakaḥ ||**

**athābabhāṣe bhagavān nārado muni-sattamaḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : kva gatau** ? ity adṛṣṭāpekṣayā ||39-40||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : nāhaṁ veda** vedmi | **tapasvinī** duḥkha-yuktā | **apāre** śokārṇave **bhagavāṁs** tam eva pāra-darśakaḥ | ato brūhīti śeṣaḥ ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : apāre** śokārṇave | **bhagavān** sarvajñas tvam | ato brūhīti bhāvaḥ ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : nāhaṁ veda** na vedmi | **tapasvinī** niyamavatī śoka-taptā ca ||39||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.41 ||**

**nārada uvāca—**

**mā kañcana śuco rājan yad īśvara-vaśaṁ jagat |**

**lokāḥ sapālā yasyeme vahanti balim īśituḥ |**

**sa saṁyunakti bhūtāni sa eva viyunakti ca ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **ādāv eva yathā-vṛtta-kathane śokena mūrcchitaḥ pated iti prathamaṁ tāvac chokam upaśamayati | **kañcana mā śuco** mā śoca | na kevalaṁ tān eva | **yad** yasmād **īśvarādhīnaṁ jagat** | tad evāha—**lokā** iti | **saṁyunakti** saṁyojayati | **viyunakti** viyojayati ca ||41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : mā kañcana** ity-ādau hi pāratantrya-mātram uktam | tataś cedaṁ vinā pravṛttau pāratantryam uktveti pāratantrya-viśeṣoktir na ghaṭate | **sa saṁyunakti** ity ardhaṁ ca kvacin nāsti | kintu **vahanti balim īśitur** iti sthāna-dvaye pāṭhenaiva prathama-lekhaka-bhramo’yaṁ kvacit sampradāye’nuvṛtta iti lakṣyate ||41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **ādāv eva yathā-vṛtta-kathane śokena mūrcchitaḥ pated iti prathamaṁ tāvat śokam upaśamayati | **mā śucaḥ** mā śoca | tayor vicchedena sīdāmīti ced apratikāryam etat saṁyoga-viyogayor īśvarādhīnatvād ity āha—**sa** iti ||41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **ādau yathā vṛttārtha-kathane śoka-mūrcchito nṛpatir nipated ataḥ pūrvaṁ śokaṁ nivartayann āha—**mā kañcana** iti | **mā śucaḥ** mā śoca | tatra hetuḥ—**yad** iti ||41||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.42 ||**

**yathā gāvo nasi protās tantryāṁ baddhāś ca dāmabhiḥ ||**

**vāk-tantryāṁ nāmabhir baddhā vahanti balim īśituḥ ||42||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : gavo** balīvardā **nasi** nāsikāyāṁ **protās** tantryāṁ dīrgha-tantyāṁ dāmabhir baddhāḥ svāmino baliṁ vahanti yathā | evaṁ vāk-tantyāṁ kartavyākartavya-vidhāyaka-veda-lakṣaṇāyāṁ nāmabhir brahmacārīty-ādi-varṇāśrāma-lakṣaṇair baddhāḥ parameśvarasya baliṁ tena preritāḥ sarve vahantīty arthaḥ ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **yathā gāva iti padyaṁ kvacin nāsti | yathā krīḍety āder avatārikānusāreṇa tu svāmi-sammatam iti lakṣyate ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **sa eva saṁyunaktīty uktam artha-dvayam ukta-poṣa-nyāyena sa-dṛṣṭāntaṁ krameṇāha—gāvas tantryām ekasyām eva dīrghāyāṁ rajjvāṁ sarva eva baddhāḥ tatra pṛthak dāmabhir nasi protāḥ | nanu prakṛte kā vā tantrī dāmāni vā kānīty apekṣāyām āha—vāk veda eva tantrī tasyāṁ nāmabhir brāhmaṇa-kṣatriya iti brahmacārī gṛhastha ity-ādibhir eva dāmabhir baddhā balim aharahaḥ sandhyām upāsītety ādi-lakṣaṇaṁ śāsanam ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tad-viyogena viṣīdāmi iti cet, tatrāha—**sa** iti sārdhābhyāṁ, saṁyoga-viyogayor īśādhīnatvād viyogas tvayā pratikāryo nety arthaḥ | uktam artha-dvayaṁ dṛṣṭāntena puṣṇann āha—yatheti dvābhyāṁ | gāvo balīvardā yathā ekasyām eva dīrgha rajjvāṁ baddhāḥ pṛthak pṛthak dāmabhirnasi nāsikāyāṁ protā grathitāḥ, 

nanu prakṛte kā tantrī, kāni ca dāmāni? tatrāha—vāk veda-lakṣaṇā tantrī | tasyāṁ brāhmaṇa-kṣatriyādibhir brahmacāri-gṛhasthādibhiś ca dāmabhir baddhā īśitur baliṁ haranti, sva-svarṇāśrama-vihita-karmānuṣṭhāna-lakṣaṇaṁ nivedayantīty arthaḥ ||42||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.43 ||**

**yathā krīḍopaskarāṇāṁ saṁyoga-vigamāv iha |**

**icchayā krīḍituḥ syātāṁ tathaiveśecchayā nṛṇām ||**
