**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **pravṛttau pāratantryam uktvā saṁyoga-viyogayor apy āha—yatheti | krīḍopaskārāṇāṁ krīḍā-sādhanānāṁ (dāru-racita-meṣādīnām) ||43||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **krīḍopaskarāṇāṁ krīḍā-sādhanānām akṣādīnām ||43||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **krīḍopaskarāṇāṁ krīḍā-sādhanānām ||43||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.44 ||**

**yan manyase dhruvaṁ lokam adhruvaṁ vā na cobhayam |**

**sarvathā na hi śocyās te snehād anyatra mohajāt ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **īśvarādhīnatvān na śokaḥ kārya ity uktam | śoka-tattve ca vicāryamāṇo nirviṣayo’yaṁ śoka ity āha | yadyapi lokaṁ janaṁ dhruvaṁ jīva-rūpeṇa | adhruvaṁ deha-rūpeṇa | na ceti | na dhruvaṁ nāpy adhruvam | śuddha-brahmarūpeṇānirvacanīyatvena vā ubhayaṁ cij-jaḍāṁśataḥ | sarvathā caturṣv api pakṣeṣu te pitrādayo na śocyāḥ | snehād anyatra | sneha eva kevalaṁ śoka-hetuḥ sa cājñāna-mūla ity arthaḥ ||44||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **īśvarādhīnatvān na śokaḥ kārya ity uktam, lokatattve tu vicāryamāṇe nirviṣayo’yaṁ śoka ity āha—yad yadi lokaṁ janaṁ dhruvaṁ jīva-rūpeṇa adhruvaṁ deha-rūpeṇa na ubhayaṁ na dhruvaṁ nāpy adhruvaṁ brahma-rūpeṇa vā śabdād ubhayaṁ ca cij-jaḍāṁśa-rūpeṇa | sarvathā caturṣv api pakṣeṣu te pitrādayo na śocyāḥ snehād anyatra vivekādau sati | sneha eva kevalaṁ śoka-hetuḥ sa cājñāna-mūla ity arthaḥ | mohajād ity anena bhagavad-bhakti-sambandhī sneho vyāvṛttaḥ | tad-utthaṁ śokaṁ tu karuṇa-rasa-sthāyi-bhāvaṁ paramopādeyaṁ manyate ||44||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **prāṇi-saṁyoga-viyogayor īśādhīnatvāc-choko na yogya ity uktam | idānīṁ vastu-svarūpe parīkṣyamāṇe na śokāvakāśa ity āha—ya yadi lokaṁ jīva-rūpeṇa dhruvaṁ deha-rūpeṇādhruvaṁ manyase, na cobhayaṁ dhruvādhruva-bhinnam ity arthaḥ | sarvarthā prakāratraye'pi te pitrādayaḥ śocyā na bhavanti | dhruva-pakṣe kūṭasthatvān na śokaḥ adhruva-pakṣe nitya-vinaśvaratvān na saḥ, dhruvādhruva-bhinna-pakṣe tādṛśasyaikasyā-sattvena śokasya nirviṣayatvāt-tathā | tarhi kiṁ-nimitto'yaṁ loke śokas tatrāha —snehād anyatra mohajād iti | deha-gehādāvahaṁmameti viparīta jñānaṁ-mohaḥ, taj-jātāt snehād anyatreti tādṛśaḥ snehaḥ śokasthānam ity arthaḥ | tathā ca bhrānti-janyaḥ snehaḥ śoka-hetur na hari-tad-bhakta-snehas tatheti ||44||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.45 ||**

**tasmāj jahy aṅga vaiklavyam ajñāna-kṛtam ātmanaḥ |**

**kathaṁ tv anāthāḥ kṛpaṇā varteraṁs te ca māṁ vinā**[^120]** ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tasmān māṁ vinā kathaṁ te varterann ity ātmano manaso vaiklavyaṁ vyākaulatāṁ tyaja ||45||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tasmān māṁ vinā kathaṁ te varterann iti manaso vaiklavyaṁ tyaja ||44||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tasmān-māṁ vinānāthās te kathaṁ varterann ity ātmano manase vaiklavyaṁ jahi tyajyerthaḥ ||45||

 **...**

|| 1.13.46 ||

**kāla-karma-guṇādhīno deho’yaṁ pāñca-bhautikaḥ |**

**katham anyāṁs tu gopāyet sarpa-grasto yathā param ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tatra tvad-dehatas teṣāṁ vṛttir etat tāvan nāstīty āha | kālo guṇa-kṣobhakaḥ | karma janma-nimittam | guṇā upādānam | tad-adhīnaḥ pāñcabhautiko jaḍas tad-vibhāge nāśavāṁś ca | sarpa-grasto’jagara-gilito yathānyaṁ na rakṣati tadvat ||46||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **mamāyaṁ pitrādir mayā rakṣya ity abhimāno na kartavya ity āha—kāleti ||46||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nahi kaścid api kam api vṛtti-dānādinā rakṣituṁ prabhavatīty āha—kālaḥ sāmānyato nimittam | karma janma-nimittam | guṇā upādānaṁ tad-adhīnaḥ pāñcabhautika iti tad-vibhāge sadya eva nāśavān ity arthaḥ | ekaḥ sarpa-daṣṭaṁ gopāyituṁ naiva śaknotīty arthaḥ ||46||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **na khalu ko'pi kañcij-jīvikārpaṇādinā rakṣituṁ prabhavatīty āha—kālaḥ sādhāraṇa-nimittaṁ, karma janma-nimittaṁ, guṇastūpādānaṁ tad adhīno'yaṁ pāñca-bhautiko dehaḥ | tad-vibhāge sadya eva vinaṣyet | īdṛśaḥ katham anyān gopāyet? nety arthaḥ | tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ—sarpeti | yathaikaḥ sarpadaṣṭo'nyaṁ sarpa-daṣṭaṁ gopāyituṁ na śaknoti, tadvad ity arthaḥ ||46||

 **...**

|| 1.13.47 ||

**ahastāni sahastānām apadāni catuṣ-padām |**

**phalgūni tatra mahatāṁ jīvo jīvasya jīvanam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **īśvareṇa vṛttiś ca sarvataḥ sulabhaivety āha | ahastāni paśv-ādīni | upadāni tṛṇādīni | tatra teṣv ahastādiṣv api phalgūny alpāni | evaṁ jīvaḥ sarvo’pi jīvasya sarvasya jīvanaṁ jīvikā | etenaiva sarvato mṛtyu-grāsatvaṁ coktam ||47||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **vyāghrādibhir bhakṣite ca tasmin duḥkhaṁ na kartavyam ity āha—ahastānīti _||_47||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **ato jīvikām api īśvara eva sarveṣām eva prathamam eva vyavasthāpitavān ity āha—ahas tāni mṛgādīni | apadāni tṛṇādīni | tatrāpi mahatāṁ matsyādīnāṁ phalgūni matsyādīni | ato jīvasya jīva eva jīvikā sāhajikī | tena tapasvināṁ patra-puṣpa-phalādir īśvara-kalpitaivāniṣiddhā jīvikāsti | kim-arthaṁ tvaṁ viṣīdasīti bhāvaḥ ||47||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **īśvaras tu sarveṣāṁ jīvikāṁ sampāditavān astīty āha—ahastāni mṛgādīni apadāni tṛṇādīni, tatrāpi mahatāṁ matsyādīnāṁ phalgūni matsyādīni, evaṁ jīva eva jīvasya jīvanaṁ pareśena nimitaṁ, tathā ca patra-phalādikaṁ jīvanaṁ | tena nirmitam aniṣiddham astīti viṣādas tava na yogya iti ||47||

 **...**

|| 1.13.48 ||

**tad idaṁ bhagavān rājann eka ātmātmanāṁ sva-dṛk |**

**antaro’nantaro bhāti paśya taṁ māyayorudhā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **moha-nivṛtty-arthaṁ dvaitasyāvastutvam āha | tad idam ahasta-sahastādi-rūpaṁ jagat | sva-dṛg bhagavān eva na tataḥ pṛthak | sa caika eva na tu nānā | nanu sajātīya-vijātīya-bhede pratyakṣe kuta etat tatrāha | ātmanāṁ bhoktṝṇām ātmā svarūpam | ato na sajātīya-bhedaḥ | antaro’nantaraś ca antar bahiś ca bhoktṛ-bhogya-rūpaś ca bhāti | ato na vijātīya-bhedo’pi | nanv ekaḥ kathaṁ tathā pratīyate’ta āha | māyayā bahudhā bhāti taṁ paśyeti ||48||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **etac ca jagat bhagavad-durvitarkya-śakti-maya-kāryatvāt tad-adhīnam evety āha—tad idam iti | māyayā durvitarkya-śaktyā bhagavān evedaṁ bhāti | etad-rūpeṇa pariṇamate | svayaṁ tu svarūpeṇaiva tiṣṭhati, cintāmaṇivat ||48||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu yadīśvara-vaśaṁ jagad ity-ādinā tvayoktaṁ bhagavad-adhīnaṁ sarvaṁ cet kathaṁ kāla-karma-guṇādhīno deha ity ucyate | satyam | kāla-karmādikasya sarvasya jagato bhagavac-chakti-kāryatvāt sarvaṁ bhagavān evety āha—tad idam iti | svarūpa-śaktyā ātmanāṁ jīvānām ātmā antaryāmi-rūpeṇa | sva-dṛk sva-prakāśaḥ | antaro bhoktṛ-rūpeṇa jīvaḥ | anantaro bahir bhogya-rūpeṇa sukha-duḥkhādi | māyayeti | bhagavān eva śakti-traya-rūpeṇa bhāti | atas tam evaikaṁ māyayā śaktyā urudhā deva-tiryag-ādi-deha-rūpeṇa bahudhā ||48||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu ced īśvara-vaśaṁ jagatvayoktaṁ, tarhi kāla-karma-guṇādhīno dehaḥ katham ucyate? tatrāha—eka eva bhagavān idaṁ jagat, nanu vijñānānandaḥ kathañcij-jaḍātmakaṁ jagat? tatrāha—māyayor udheti | svaśaktyā jagad-rūpa ity arthaḥ | triguṇātmikātha jñānaṁ ca tathā cic-chaktir eva ca | māyā-śabdena bhaṇyante śabda-tattvārthavedibhiḥ iti śabda-mahodadheḥ | cicchaktir atra parākhyā kṣetrajñākhyā ca gṛhyate, dvayoś cid-rūpa-viśeṣāt, kālo'pi tac-chaktiḥ svakāla-śaktyā kṣapayan [bhā.pu. 10.1.22] iti vakṣyamāṇāt | tathā ca parākhyayātmanāṁ jīvānām ātmāntaryāmī | antaro'pratyakṣaḥ | triguṇayā kṣetrajñākhyayā kālākhyayā cānantaro jagad-rūpa ity arthaḥ | tad idaṁ tvaṁ viveka-dṛṣṭyā paśyati ||48||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.49 ||**

**so’yam adya mahārāja bhagavān bhūta-bhāvanaḥ |**

**kāla-rūpo’vatīrṇo’syām abhāvāya sura-dviṣām ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kvāsāv astīdṛśo mahā-māyāvī, dvārakāyām ity āha—so’yam iti | asyāṁ bhūmyām | abhavāya nāśāya ||49||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **so’yam adyeti | vartamāna-sāmīpye vartamānavad vā iti nyāyena sura-dviṣām abhavāyaiva kāla-rūpaḥ | svayaṁ tu paramānanda-rūpa evety arthaḥ ||49||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kvāsāv astīdṛśo māyāvī ? dvārakāyām ity āha—so’yam iti | asyāṁ bhūmau sura-dviṣām abhāvāya nāśāya kāla-rūpas tair eva kāla-rūpatvenānubhūyamānaḥ svayaṁ tu paramānanda-rūpa evety arthaḥ ||49||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanv īdṛśo'sau kvāste? tatrāha–so'yam iti | asyāṁ bhuvi suradviṣāmabhavāya vināśāyāvatīrṇaḥ, kālo rūpaṁ śaktir yasya saḥ | taiḥ kāla-rūpatvena pratīyamānaḥ svayaṁ vijñānānanda-vapur dvāravatyām astīti ||49||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.50 ||**

**niṣpāditaṁ deva-kṛtyam avaśeṣaṁ pratīkṣate |**

**tāvad yūyam avekṣadhvaṁ bhaved yāvad iheśvaraḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tarhi śrī-kṛṣṇo’trāstīty atraivāsthāṁ mā kṛthā ity āha | tac ca devānāṁ kāryaṁ tena niṣpāditam, kevalam aśeṣaṁ pratīkṣyate | yadu-kula-kṣayam iti hṛdi-stham | tato nijaṁ dhāma yāsyati tato yūyam api gacchatety arthaḥ | tac ca bhūtam api viduravad eva nāvarṇayat ||50||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **avaśeṣaṁ bhavatām ākarṣaṇa-pūrvam iti hṛt-stham ||50||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kevalam avaśeṣaṁ pratikṣata iti yadu-kulānām antardhāpanam iti hṛdi-stham | tac ca bhūtam api viduravad eva nāvarṇayat | avekṣadhvam ity asya karmāprayogād ahantāspadaṁ ca sarvam eva labhyate | tad-antardhāne śrute sati sarvam evopekṣadhvam iti bhāvaḥ ||50||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **avaśeṣaṁ yaduvaṁśāntardhāpanam iti hṛdgataṁ, tac ca jātam api viduravan-noktavān | tāvad yūyam iti avaśeṣe tena niṣpādite sarvam upekṣadhvam iti bhāvaḥ ||50||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.51 ||**

**dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ saha bhrātrā gāndhāryā ca sva-bhāryayā |**

**dakṣiṇena himavata ṛṣīṇām āśramaṁ gataḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **gamana-kāle saha-bhrātā ||51||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tad eva śokam āsthāṁ ca nivārya jijñāsave tasmai yathā-vṛttaṁ kathayati—dhṛtarāṣṭra iti ṣaḍbhiḥ | himavato dakṣiṇe bhāge ||51||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tad evaṁ śokaṁ nivārya jijñāsave tasmai yathā-vṛttaṁ kathayati—dhṛtarāṣṭra iti ṣaḍbhiḥ | dakṣiṇena dakṣiṇasyāṁ diśi ||51||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tad evaṁ tattvopadeśena śokaṁ nivārya yathāvṛttam āha ṣaḍbhiḥ | dakṣiṇena dakṣiṇasyāṁ diśi ||51||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.52 ||**

**srotobhiḥ saptabhir yā vai svardhunī saptadhā vyadhāt |**

**saptānāṁ prītaye nānā**[^121]** sapta-srotaḥ pracakṣate ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tad api kutrety āha—srotobhir iti | yā vai prasiddhā svardhunī sā ātmānaṁ yatra saptadhā vyadhāt | kim artham | nānā pṛthak saptabhiḥ srotobhiḥ pravāhaiḥ saptānām ṛṣīṇāṁ pratīyate | ataeva tat tīrthaṁ sapta-sroto vadanti ||52||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yā vai prasiddhā svardhunī gaṅgā sā ātmānaṁ saptadhā vyadhāt | kim-artham ? saptānām ṛṣīṇāṁ prītaye | atas tat tīrthaṁ sapta-srota eva nāma marīci-gaṅgā atri-gaṅgety ādi nānā-nāmnā vadanti ||52||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yā vai prasiddhā svardhunī gaṅgā sā yatrātmānaṁ saptadhā vyadhāt, kim arthaṁ? saptānām ṛṣīṇāṁ prītaye, atas tat-tīrthaṁ tat-tan-nāmnā sapta-srotaḥ pracakṣate | marīci-gaṅgātrigaṅgety-ādīni nāmāni ||52||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.53-54 ||**

**snātvānusavanaṁ tasmin hutvā cāgnīn yathā-vidhi |**

**ab-bhakṣa upaśāntātmā sa āste vigataiṣaṇaḥ ||**

**jitāsano jita-śvāsaḥ pratyāhṛta-ṣaḍ-indriyaḥ |**

**hari-bhāvanayā dhvasta-rajaḥ-sattva-tamo-malaḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **asti ity ādy atītārthe sa eṣa etarhy adhyāstaḥ āsanaṁ pārthivocitam ity-ādivat | suptiṅ-pada-graha-liṅga-narāṇāṁ kāla-halac svara-kartṛ-ṣaṅāṁ ca | vyatyayam icchati śāstra-kṛd eṣāṁ so’pi ca sidhyati bāhulakena iti mahā-vyākaraṇe |


    vyāsādayo vartamānam atītān āgate tathā |


    vyatyasyāpi vadanty addhā mohanārthaṁ durātmanām ||


    paurvāparyaṁ yato naiva sadaiva parivartanāt |


    ataś ca vyatyād etad vadanti jñāna-cakṣuṣaḥ || iti brāhme ||53||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tatra tena kṛtam aṣṭāṅga-yogam āha —snātveti caturbhiḥ | tatra snānaṁ homo’b-bhakṣaṇaṁ ceti niyamā uktāḥ | bhakṣa-sthāne apāṁ svīkārād ab-bhakṣaḥ | upaśānta ātmā yasya saḥ | vigatāḥ putrādy-eṣaṇā yasmād iti yamā uktāḥ ||53||

jitāsana ity-ādinā āsana-prāṇāyāma-pratyāhārā uktāḥ | hari-bhāvanayeti dhāraṇoktā | dhvastā rajaḥ-sattva-tamo-rūpā malā yasyeti phalato dhyānam uktam ||54||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tena kṛtam aṣṭāṅga-yogam āha—snātveti caturbhiḥ | tatra snānaṁ homo’b-bhakṣaṇaṁ ca niyamā uktāḥ | upaśāntātmā vigataiṣaṇa iti yamaḥ | jitāsana ity-ādinā āsana-prāṇāyāma-pratyāhārāḥ | hari-bhāvanayeti dhāraṇā-dhyāne ukte ||54||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tenānuṣṭhitam aṣṭāṅgaṁ yogam āhā—snātveti caturbhiḥ | snāna-homāv-bhakṣaṇāni niyamāḥ ||53|| \
 \
jitāsanety-ādināsana-prāṇāyāma-pratyāhārāḥ, hari-bhāvanayeti dhāraṇādhyāne ||54||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.55-56 ||**

**vijñānātmani saṁyojya kṣetrajñe pravilāpya tam |**

**brahmaṇy ātmānam ādhāre ghaṭāmbaram ivāmbare ||**

**dhvasta-māyā-guṇodarko niruddha-karaṇāśayaḥ |**

**nivartitākhilāhāra āste sthāṇur**[^122]** ivācalaḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **


    vijñānātmā viriñco’yaṁ yas tasmiṁ līyate jagat |


    yādāṁsi sāgare yadvat sa-kṣetrajñe janārdane ||


    hṛdisthe ca sa ca vyāpte svātmany ekībhavaty uta |+++

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **samādhim āha—vijñāneti dvābhyām | ātmānaṁ mano’haṅkārāspadaṁ sthūla-dehād viyojya vijñānātmany buddhau saṁyojyaikī-kṛtya taṁ ca vijñānātmānaṁ dṛṣyāṁśād viyojya kṣetra-jñe draṣṭari pravilāpya taṁ ca kṣetra-jñaṁ draṣṭr aṁśād viyojyādhāre āśraya-sañjñe brahmaṇi pravilāpya | ghaṭāmbaraṁ ghaṭopādher viyojya yathā mahākāśe pravilāpyate tadvat ||55||

vyutthānābhāvam āha—dhvasteti | antar guṇa-kṣobhād vā bahir indriya-vikṣepād vā vyutthānaṁ bhavet, tad ubhayaṁ tasya nāsti | yato dhvasto māyā-guṇānām udarka uttara-phalaṁ vāsanā yasya saḥ | niruddhāni karaṇāni cakṣur ādīny āśayo manaś ca yasya saḥ | ataeva nivartito’khila āhāro bhojyam indriyair viṣayāharaṇaṁ vā yena saḥ | sthāṇur iva niścala āste ||56||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **ātmānam ahaṅkārāspadaṁ sūkṣma-dehaṁ sthūla-dehād viyojya kṣetrajñe deha-dvayābhimāny-avastha-jīve pravilāpya taṁ ca kṣetrajñaṁ vijñānātmani śuddha-jīva-svarūpe pravilāpya taṁ ca brahmaṇi saṁyojya | ghaṭāmbaram iti cid-rūpatvenaivābhedāṁśe dṛṣṭānta iti jñeyam ||55||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **vijñāneti | sva-deha-gatāni bhūtāni krameṇa kāraṇeṣu praveśya ātmānam ahaṅkāraṁ vijñānātmani mahat-tattve saṁyojya saṁyuktaṁ bhāvayitvā taṁ ca vijñānātmānaṁ kṣetrajñe jīve pravilāpya saṁyuktaṁ vibhāvyety arthaḥ | taṁ ca kṣetrajñaṁ brahmaṇi saṁyojya ātmānaṁ sva-deha-stham antaryāminam ādhāre āśraya-tattve bhagavaty aṁśini saṁyuktaṁ vibhāvya | nanv antaryāmi-bhagavator aikyam eva prasiddham | satyam aikye’pi aupacāriko bhedo vivakṣita eveti sa-dṛṣṭāntam āha—ghaṭāmbaram ivāmbara iti | upādhistham ākāśaṁ nirupādhāv ākāśe iva | tayoś ca ghātākāśa-mahākāśayoḥ vastutaḥ sarva-vyāpakatvād aikyam evety arthaḥ | vyutthānābhāvam āha dhvasteti | antarguṇa-kṣobhād vā bahir indriya-vikṣepād vā vyutthānaṁ bhavet | tad ubhayaṁ tasya nāsti yato dhvastā māyāyā guṇānām udarka uttara-phalaṁ vāsanā yasya saḥ | ata eva nirudhyety ādi ||55-56||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **vijñāneti—sva-deha-gatādīni pṛthivyādīni krameṇa kāraṇe'haṅkāre saṁyojya taṁ ca vijñānātmani mahattatve saṁyojya taṁ ca kṣetrajñe jīve pravilāpya saṁyojya, taṁ ca brahmaṇyantaryāmiṇi saṁyojya taṁ ca tad ādhāre āśraya-tattve tad aṁśini saṁyojya | nanv antaryāmi-bhagavatoradvaitāt katham atra dvaitam uktam? tatra dṛṣṭāntena dvaitaṁ pariharati—ghaṭe naṣṭe yathā ghaṭāmbaraṁ mahāmbare līyate, tathā pralayādau niyamye līne sati niyāmako vyāpake svāṁśini līyate | anāviṣkṛta-niyamana-śaktikaḥ san tasminn aikyam etīti ||55|| \
 \
avyutthānamāha—dhvasto māyāguṇānāmudarka uttaraphalaṁ vāsanā yasya saḥ | ateva niruddhetyādi | antarguṇa-vikṣobhādvahirindriyavikṣepādvā vyutthānaṁ syattadubhayaṁ tasya nāstītyavyutthāna-siddhiḥ ||56||

 **...**

|| 1.13.57 ||

**tasyāntarāyo maivābhūḥ sannyastākhila-karmaṇaḥ |**

**sa vā adyatanād rājan parataḥ pañcame’hani |**

**kalevaraṁ hāsyati svaṁ tac ca bhasmī-bhaviṣyati ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tathā-bhūtam apy ānetum udyataṁ praty āha—tasyeti | antarāyo vighnaḥ | maivābhūr ity aḍ-āgamaś chāndasaḥ | darśanam api tāvat kuryām ity udyataṁ praty āha | sa vai adyatamād ahnaḥ parata uttaratra | svaṁ svādhīnam | tarhi tad-dāhārthaṁ gamiṣyāmi nety āha tac ceti ||57||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tathābhūtam apy ānetum udyataṁ pratyāha—tasyeti | antarāyo vidhno maivābhūḥ | aḍ-āgamaś chāndasaḥ | tad-darśanam api tāvat kuryām ity udyataṁ pratyāha—sa vā iti | tarhi tad-dāhārthaṁ gamiṣyaṁi nety āha—tac ceti ||57||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu tādṛśam apy ānayāmīti cet-tatrāha-tasyeti | aḍāgamac-chāndasaḥ | nanu sa mayā draṣṭavya iti cet-tatrāha–sa vā iti | nanu tad-dāhārthaṁ yāsyāmi, tatrāha—tac-ceti ||57||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.58 ||**

**dahyamāne’gnibhir dehe patyuḥ patnī sahoṭaje |**

**bahiḥ sthitā patiṁ sādhvī tam agnim anu vekṣyati ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tarhi gāndhāry-ānayanāya gamiṣyāmi nety āha | patyur dehe **sahoṭaje** parṇa-śālā-sahite yogāgninā saha gārhapatyādibhir **dahyamāne** tasya **patnībahiḥ sthitā** satī taṁ patim **anv agniṁ vekṣyati** pravekṣyati ||58||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tarhi gāndhāryānayanāya gamiṣyāmi netyāha—patyur dehe sahoṭaje parṇaśālā-sahite agnibhiḥ yogāgni-gārhapatyādibhir dahyamāne tasya patnī bahiḥ-sthitā patim anu agniṁ vekṣyati pravekṣyati ||58||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu gāndhārīmānetuṁ yāsyāmīti tatrāha—–patyur dehe sahoṭaje parṇaśālā-sahite yogāgninā gārhapatyādibhiś cāgnibhir dahyamāne sati tasya patnī vahiḥsthitā taṁ patimanv agniṁ pravekṣyati ||58||

 **...**

|| 1.13.59 ||

**viduras tu tad āścaryaṁ niśāmya kuru-nandana |**

**harṣa-śoka-yutas tasmād gantā tīrtha-niṣevakaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tarhi vidurānayanārthaṁ gantavyam eva nety āha | viduras tu tan niśāmya dṛṣṭvā bhrātuḥ sugatyā harṣas tan-mṛtyunā śokaś ca tābhyāṁ yuktas tasmāt sthānāt tīrthāni sevituṁ gantā gamiṣyati ||59||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **vidura iti | harṣo’yaṁ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya sad-gati-prāpter harṣa-prāya eva jñeyaḥ | śokas tu mūlato yaḥ, sa eva jñeyaḥ ||59||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tarhi vidurānayanārthaṁ gantavyam eva nety āha—viduras tu tan niśāmya dṛṣṭvā | tan-muktyā harṣaḥ loka-vyavahāreṇa śokaś ca | tasmāt sthānāt tīrthāni niṣevituṁ gantā gamiṣyati | atra bhaktāparādhini dhṛtarāṣṭre vidurasya tādṛśa-kṛpābhāvān muktir evābhūn na tu prema-bhaktir iti jñeyam ||59||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **viduramāneṣyāmīti cet-tatrāha—vidura iti | niśāmya dṛṣṭvā, bhrātur utkṛṣṭa-gati-darśanād-dharṣaḥ, snehāc-chokaś ca tābhyāṁ yuktaṁ, tīrtha-niṣevakaḥ tīrthāni niṣevituṁ tataḥ sthānād-gantā gamiṣyati ||59–60||

iti śrī-vaiṣṇavānandinyāṁ  prathama-skandha-ṭippanyāṁ trayodaśo'dhyāyaḥ ||13||

 **...**

**|| 1.13.60 ||**

**ity uktvāthāruhat svargaṁ nāradaḥ saha-tumburuḥ |**

**yudhiṣṭhiro vacas tasya hṛdi kṛtvājahāc chucaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **śucaḥ śokān ||60||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **ity uktvā samādadhe | atha ruhat śucaḥ śokān ||60||

iti sārārtha-darśinyāṁ harṣiṇyāṁ bhakta-cetasām |

trayodaśo’pi prathame saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām ||*||

**...**

iti śrīmad-bhāgavate mahā-purāṇe brahma-sūtra-bhāṣye pāramahaṁsyaṁ saṁhitāyāṁ vaiyāsikyāṁ daśama-skandhe

śrī-nārada-vākyaṁ nāma

trayodaśo’dhyāyaḥ |

||1.13||

**...**

 

(1.14)


## caturdaśo’dhyāyaḥ


### apaśakuna-darśanena yudhiṣṭhirasya cintā, dvārakāto'rjunasyāgamanaṁ ca |

|| 1.14.1-2 ||

**sūta uvāca—**

**samprasthite dvārakāyāṁ jiṣṇau bandhu-didṛkṣayā |**

**jñātuṁ ca puṇya-ślokasya kṛṣṇasya ca viceṣṭitam ||**

**vyatītāḥ katicin māsās tadā nāyāt tato’rjunaḥ |**

**dadarśa ghora-rūpāṇi nimittāni kurūdvahaḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **māsa-śabdenāhāny ucyante | tathā hi mahābhārate—


    ahaṁ tu māsa-śabdoktaṁ yatra cintyāyutaṁ vrajet |


    evaṁ vatsaratādyaṁ ca viparīte viparyayaḥ || iti nāma-mahodadhau ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :**

caturdaśo tv ariṣṭāni dṛṣṭvā rājā viśaṅkitaḥ | \
aśṛṇod arjunāt kṛṣṇa-tirodhānam atīryate ||

kṛṣṇasya ceti ca-kāreṇābhiprāyaṁ ca jñātum ||1|| katicit sapta | tadā kālātikrame’pi tato dvārakāto **nāyāt** nāgataḥ | **nimittāny** utpātān | **kurūdvaho** yudhiṣṭhiraḥ ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **samprasthita iti | **aśvamedhārthaṁ** śrī-kṛṣṇasya punar āgamanāntaram iti jñeyam ||1|| dadarśeti | vidurāgamanāt pūrvaṁ paraṁ ca vṛttam iti jñeyam ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :**

caturdaśe nṛpo’paśyad ariṣṭāni bahūni yat |

viveda tat-phalaṁ dṛṣṭvaivārjunaṁ khinnam āgatam ||

kṛṣṇasya ceti ca-kāreṇābhiprāyaṁ ca jñātum ||1|| katicit sapta | nimittāni duḥkha-kāraṇāni ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :** 

bahvar iṣṭekṣaṇād-rājā śaṅkito'bhūc-caturdaśe | \
tat-phalaṁ jñātavān dṛṣṭvaivāgataṁ khinnam arjunam || \


jiṣṇau arjune, kṛṣṇasya ceti cāttad abhiprāyaṁ ca ||1|| katicit sapta, nimittāni duḥkha-kāraṇāni ||2||

 **...**

**|| 1.14.3 || **

**kālasya ca gatiṁ raudrāṁ viparyasta-rtu-dharmiṇaḥ |**

**pāpīyasīṁ nṛṇāṁ vārtāṁ krodha-lobhānṛtātmanām ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** raudrāṁ ghorām | tad evāha | viparyastā ṛtu-dharmā yasmiṁs tasya | vārtāṁ jīvikām | krodha-lobhānṛtair yukta ātmā yeṣām  ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** viparyastā ṛtu-dharmā yasmin tasya | vārtāṁ jīvikām | pāpīyasīm atipāpavatīm ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **viparyastā ṛtu-dharmā yasmin | pāpīyasīm atipāpa-yuktāṁ vārtāṁ jīvikām ||3||

 **...**

|| 1.14.4 || 

**jihma-prāyaṁ vyavahṛtaṁ śāṭhya-miśraṁ ca sauhṛdam |**

**pitṛ-mātṛ-suhṛd-bhrātṛ- dam-patīnāṁ ca kalkanam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : jihma-prāyaṁ** kapaṭa-bahulam | **vyavahṛtaṁ** vyavahāram | **śāṭhyaṁ** vañcanaṁ tan-**miśraṁ sauhṛdaṁ** sakhyam | **pitr **ādīnāṁ sva-pratiyogibhiḥ **kalkanaṁ** kalahādi ||4||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** kalkanaṁ kalahādi ||4||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **jihma-prāyaṁ kauṭilya-pracuraṁ, śāṭhyaṁ vañcanaṁ tan-miśraṁ | pitrādīnāṁ putrādibhiḥ kalkanaṁ kalahādi ||4||

 **...**

[^123]|| 1.14.5 || 

**nimittāny atyariṣṭāni kāle tv anugate nṛṇām |**

**lobhādy-adharma-prakṛtiṁ dṛṣṭvovācānujaṁ nṛpaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **atyariṣṭāny atyantam aśubhāni dṛṣṭvā | nṛṇāṁ lobhādy-adharma-prakṛtiṁ ca dṛṣṭvā | anujaṁ bhīmam ||5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **sarvatra hetuḥ anugate kāle sva-samaye anuprāpte sati lobhādy-adharma-rūpāṁ prakṛtiṁ svabhāvam | anujaṁ bhīmam ||5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **sarvatra hetuḥ—anugate kāle svasam aye'supta lobhādy adharma-rūpāṁ prakṛtiṁ svabhāvaṁ dṛṣṭvā, anujaṁ bhīmam ||5||

 **...**

**|| 1.14.6 ||**

**yudhiṣṭhira uvāca—**

**sampreṣito dvārakāyāṁ jiṣṇur bandhu-didṛkṣayāj |**

**ñātuṁ ca puṇya-ślokasya kṛṣṇasya ca viceṣṭitam ||**

_na kenāpi vyākhyātam._

 **...**

**|| 1.14.7 || **

**gatāḥ saptādhunā māsā bhīmasena tavānujaḥ |**

**nāyāti kasya vā hetor nāhaṁ vededam añjasā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **veti vitarke | kasmād dhetor nāyātīty āha na vedmi ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

**...**

**|| 1.14.8 || **

**api devarṣiṇādiṣṭaḥ sa kālo’yam upasthitaḥ |**

**yadātmano’ṅgam ākrīḍaṁ bhagavān utsisṛkṣati ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **aṅga-pṛthivīm |


    yadā tyāgādir ucyeta pṛthivyādy-aṅga-kalpanā |


    tadā jñeyā na hi svāṅgaṁ kadācid viṣṇur utsṛjet || iti brahma-tarke ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **api kim | yadā ātmana ākrīḍaṁ krīḍā-sādhanam aṅgaṁ manuṣya-nāṭyam utsraṣṭum icchati sa kālaḥ prāptaḥ ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **apīti | aṅgaṁ svadhāma-gamanena virād-rūpaṁ tyakṣyatīty arthaḥ _||_8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yad ātmano’ṅgam iti yudhiṣṭhirasya bandhu-śokānurūpaivoktir na tu siddhaṇta-sparśinī | sarasvatī tu tan-mukhe samucitam evāha yad ātmano’ṅgam aṁśa-rūpaṁ nārāyaṇam utsisṛkṣati ūrdhvaṁ vaikuṇṭhaṁ prati sisṛkṣati prasthāpayitum icchati | kīdṛśam aṅgam ā īṣad eva krīḍā yasmiṁs tam ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **api kiṁ yūyaṁ tāvad avekṣadhvam iti devarṣiṇād iṣṭaḥ sa kāla upasthitaḥ, yad-yatrātmanaḥ krīḍā-sthāna-maṅgaṁ bhūmi-rūpaṁ bhagavān utsraṣṭuṁ tyaktum icchati? yasya pṛthivī śarīram [bṛ.ā.u. 3.7.3] iti śravaṇāt ||8-9||

 

 **...**

**|| 1.14.9 || **

**yasmān naḥ sampado rājyaṁ dārāḥ prāṇāḥ kulaṁ prajāḥ |**

**āsan sapatna-vijayo lokāś ca yad-anugrahāt ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **asmākaṁ sarva-puruṣārthatve hetuḥ śrī-kṛṣṇo’tas tad-viyogaṁ vināniṣṭaṁ na syād ity āśayenāha | yasmād śrī-kṛṣṇād dhetoḥ | etac copariṣṭād arjunaḥ spaṣṭī-kariṣyati | lokāś ca yajña-karaṇānurūpā yasyānugrahāt ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **yasmād iti | yasyānugraha-mātrāl lokāś ca vaśīkṛtā āsan ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **śrī-kṛṣṇāviyogaṁ vinaitādṛśam ariṣṭaṁ na syād ity āśayenāha yasmād ity-ādi | lokāḥ yajñādi-prāpyāḥ ||9||

 **...**

**|| 1.14.10 || **

**paśyotpātān nara-vyāghra divyān bhaumān sadaihikān |**

**dāruṇān śaṁsato’dūrād bhayaṁ no buddhi-mohanam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **adūrāt saṁnihitam | no’smākam | āśaṁsata utpātān ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **bhayaṁ śaṁsataḥ kathayata utpātān |_|_10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **bhayaṁ śaṁsataḥ sūcayataḥ ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **no'smākaṁ bhayam adūrāt śaṁsataḥ kathayataḥ ||10||

 **...**

**|| 1.14.11 || **

**ūrv-akṣi-bāhavo mahyaṁ sphuranty aṅga punaḥ punaḥ |**

**vepathuś cāpi hṛdaye ārād dāsyanti vipriyam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **daihikān āha—ūrv iti | ūrv-ādayo vāmāḥ sphuranti | vepathuḥ kampaś ca hṛdaye vartate | ete mahyam ārāt sannihitaṁ vipriyaṁ dāsyanti ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **daihikānutpātān āha ūrv iti | vāmā ity arthaḥ, bahu-vacanam ārṣam ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **vāmā ūrvādayaḥ sphuranti, vepathuḥ kampaś ca hṛdaye bhavati, ete mahyaṁ vipriyam ārād dāsyanti ||11||

 **...**

|| 1.14.12 || 

**śivaiṣodyantam ādityam abhirauty analānanā |**

**mām aṅga sārameyo’yam abhirebhaty abhīruvat ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **bhaumān āha sārdhais tribhiḥ | **śivā** kroṣṭrī **udyantamādityam abhirauty** udyat-sūryābhimukhaṁ krośati | analānanā agniṁ mukhena vamantī | **aṅga** he bhīma | **mām** abhilakṣya sārameyaḥ śvābhirauti plutaṁ bhaṣati | **abhīruvan** niḥśaṅkam ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **bhaumān āha—śivā kroṣṭrī ādityam abhi udyat-sūryābhimukhaṁ krośati | analānanā agniṁ mukhena vamantī | aṅga he mīma! mām abhivīkṣya sārameyaḥ śvā plutaṁ rauti roditi ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **śivā śṛgālī udyantam ādityam abhirauti krośati | analānanā mukhād agnim udvamantī | sārameyaḥ śvā | abhīruvat niḥśaṅkaḥ ||12||

 **...**

|| 1.14.13 || 

**śastāḥ kurvanti māṁ savyaṁ dakṣiṇaṁ paśavo’pare |**

**vāhāṁś ca puruṣa-vyāghra lakṣaye rudato mama ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **śastā gavādayo māṁ svayaṁ vāmaṁ kurvanti | apare gardabhādyāḥ pradakṣiṇaṁ kurvanti | vāhān aśvān ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **śastā iti | mama vāhān ity anvayaḥ ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **śastāḥ gavādayaḥ | savyaṁ vāmam | apare gardabhādyāḥ pradakṣiṇam | vāhān aśvān ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **śastāḥ śubhā gavādyāḥ savyaṁ vāmaṁ kūrvanti | apare'śubhā gardabhāṣyā dakṣiṇaṁ, vāhānaśvān ||13||

 **...**

|| 1.14.14 || 

**mṛtyu-dūtaḥ kapoto’yam ulūkaḥ kampayan manaḥ |**

**pratyulūkaś ca kuhvānair**[^124]** viśvaṁ vai śūnyam icchataḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **agnau padaṁ karoti | yad ulūko vadati | mogham etad yataḥ kapotaḥ padam agne kṛpoti iti śrutiḥ ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **ayaṁ kapoto mṛty-dūto mṛtyu-sūcakaḥ | ulūko ghūkaḥ | pratyūlukas tat-pratipakṣo dhūkaḥ kāko vā | kuhvānaiḥ kutsita-śabdair viśvaṁ śūnyaṁ kartum icchataḥ ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **ulūkas tathā tat-pratipakṣo’nya ulūkaś ca yo yo manaḥ kampayan vartate, tau dvāv anidrau santau ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **pratyulūkaḥ ulūka-pratipakṣo ghūkaḥ kāko vā ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **pratyulūkaḥ pratipakṣo ghūkaś caitau kuhvānaiḥ kutsita-śabdaiḥ jagac-chūnyam icchataḥ ||14||

 **...**

|| 1.14.15 || 

**dhūmrā diśaḥ paridhayaḥ kampate bhūḥ sahādribhiḥ |**

**nirghātaś ca mahāṁs tāta sākaṁ ca stanayitnubhiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **dhūmrā dhūmarā diśaḥ paridhayo’gnim eva lokam āvṛṇvanti | divyān āha sārdhābhyām | nirghāto nirabhra-vajra-pātaḥ | stanayitnavo’tra garjitāni taiḥ saha ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **diśaḥ, sūryādi-paridhayaś ca, dhūmrāḥ ||15|

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **dhūmrā dhūmra-varṇā diśaḥ paridhayaḥ paridhi-tulyāḥ | nirghātaḥ ākasmika-ghora-śabdaḥ | stanayitnavo nirabhra-garjitāni ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **dhūmrā dhūsarā diśaḥ, paridhayaḥ iva lokam āvṛtṇvanti | divyān āha—nirghātaś cākasmiko ghoraḥ śabdaḥ | stanayitnubhir nirabhrar garjitaiḥ saha ||15||

 **...**

|| 1.14.16 || 

**vāyur vāti khara-sparśo rajasā visṛjaṁs tamaḥ |**

**asṛg varṣanti jaladā bībhatsam iva sarvataḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tamo viśeṣeṇa sṛjan | asṛg raktam ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **bībhatsaṁ bībhatsitavyaṁ yathā syāt tathā | iveti vākyālaṅkāraḥ ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tamo’ndham | viśeṣeṇa sṛjan | asṛk raktam ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **asrag rudhiraṁ grahamardaṁ graha-yuddhaṁ ||16||

 **...**

|| 1.14.17 || 

**sūryaṁ hata-prabhaṁ paśya graha-mardaṁ mitho divi |**

**sasaṅkulair bhūta-gaṇair jvalite iva rodasī ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **grahāṇāṁ mardaṁ yuddham | bhūtā rudrānucarās teṣāṁ gaṇaiḥ saṅkulair vyāmiśraiḥ prāṇibhiḥ sahitaiḥ | rodasī dyāvāpṛthivyau jvalite pradīpte iva ca paśyati ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **sa-saṅkulair ity atra sa iti | sa eva tvam ity arthaḥ ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **sa-saṅkulaiḥ prāṇy-antara-sahitaiḥ rodasī dyāvāpṛthivyau ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **sa-saṅkulaiḥ prāṇyantara-sahitaiḥ | bhūta-gaṇai-rudrānucara-samūhaiḥ rodasī dyāvābhūmī | jvalite dīpte iva ||17||

 **...**

|| 1.14.18 || 

**nadyo nadāś ca kṣubhitāḥ sarāṁsi ca manāṁsi ca |**

**na jvalaty agnir ājyena kālo’yaṁ kiṁ vidhāsyati ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **punar bhaumān āha—nadya iti sārdhais tribhiḥ | prāṇināṁ manāṁsi ca ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **punar bhaumān āha nadya iti ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **punar bhaumānāha—nadya iti | manātsi prāṇinām ||18||

 **...**

|| 1.14.19 || 

**na pibanti stanaṁ vatsā na duhyanti ca mātaraḥ |**

**rudanty aśru-mukhā gāvo na hṛṣyanty ṛṣabhā vraje ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **duhyantīti karma-kartary ārṣam | na prasnuvantīty arthaḥ ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **na duhyantīti karma-kartary ārṣam, na prasnuvantīty arthaḥ ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **na duhyantīti karma-kartari prayoga ārṣaḥ, na prasnurantīty arthaḥ ||19||

 **...**

|| 1.14.20 || 

**daivatāni rudantīva svidyanti hy uccalanti ca |**

**ime jana-padā grāmāḥ purodyānākarāśramāḥ |**

**manya etair mahotpātair nūnaṁ bhagavataḥ padaiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **daivatāni pratimāḥ | aghaṁ duḥkham ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **daivatāni pratimāḥ ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **daivatāni pratimāḥ, aghaṁ duḥkham ||20||

 **...**

|| 1.14.21 || 

**bhraṣṭa-śriyo nirānandāḥ kim aghaṁ darśayanti naḥ |**

**ananya-puruṣa-śrībhir**[^125]** hīnā bhūr hata-saubhagā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **etair mahotpātaiḥ kā | na vidyate’nyeṣu puruṣeṣu śrīr vjrāṅkuśādi-śobhā yeṣāṁ tair bhagavataḥ padair hīnā bhūr ity ahaṁ manye ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **etaiḥ kṛtvā na vidyate anyeṣu puruṣeṣu śrīr vajrāṅkuśādi-śobhā yeṣāṁ tair bhagavataḥ padair hīnā bhūr ity ahaṁ manye ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **etair mahotpātair ahaṁ manye nūnaṁ niścaye bhagavataḥ padair hīnā bhūra-bhūd iti | kīdṛśaiḥ na vidyate'nyeṣu puruṣeṣu śrīr dhvaja-vajrāṅkuśādi-śobhā yeṣāṁ taiḥ ||21||

 **...**

|| 1.14.22 || 

**iti cintayatas tasya dṛṣṭāriṣṭena cetasā |**

**rājñaḥ pratyāgamad brahman yadu-puryāḥ kapi-dhvajaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tasya rājña ity evaṁ dṛṣṭāny ariṣṭāni yena tena cetasā cintayantaḥ sataḥ ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

 **...**

|| 1.14.23 || 

**taṁ pādayor nipatitam ayathā-pūrvam āturam |**

**adho-vadanam ab-bindūn sṛjantaṁ nayanābjayoḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **ayathāpūrvaṁ nipatitam | tad evāha—āturam ity-ādi | apāṁ bindūn aśrūṇi netrebhyāṁ visṛjantam ity arthaḥ ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **avvindūn aśrūṇi ||23||

 **...**

|| 1.14.24 || 

**vilokyodvigna-hṛdayo vicchāyam anujaṁ nṛpaḥ |**

**pṛcchati sma suhṛn madhye saṁsmaran nāraderitam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **udviganaṁ kampitaṁ hṛdayaṁ yasya saḥ | vicchāyaṁ vigata-kāntim ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **vicchāyaṁ vigata-kāntim ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **vicchāyaṁ kānti-hīnam ||24||

 **...**

|| 1.14.25 ||

**yudhiṣṭhira uvāca—**

**kaccid ānarta-puryāṁ naḥ sva-janāḥ sukham āsate |**

**madhu-bhoja-daśārhārha- sātvatāndhaka-vṛṣṇayaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **svajanā bāndhavāḥ ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

 **...**

|| 1.14.26 || 

**śūro mātāmahaḥ kaccit svasty āste vātha māriṣaḥ |**

**mātulaḥ sānujaḥ kaccit kuśaly ānakadundubhiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kiṁ vakṣyatīti śaṅkyā vyavahita-krameṇa pṛcchati—śūra ity-ādinā | **māriṣo** manyo **mātāmahaḥśūro** nāma yādavaḥ kuntyāḥ pitā | **ānaka-dundubhir** vasudevaḥ ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** māriṣo mānyaḥ ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kiṁ vakṣyatīty aniṣṭāśaṅkayā vyutkrameṇa pṛcchati—śūra iti | māriyaṣo mānyaḥ, mātula ānakadundubhir vasudevaḥ ||26||

 **...**

|| 1.14.27 || 

**sapta sva-sāras tat-patnyo mātulānyaḥ sahātmajāḥ |**

**āsate sasnuṣāḥ kṣemaṁdevakī-pramukhāḥ svayam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **svasāraḥ parasparam | vasudeva-kṣameṇa tāsām api kṣemaṁ pṛṣṭam eva, tathāpi pṛthak pṛcchati—svayam iti ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **svasāraḥ parasparaṁ bhaginyaḥ ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **svasāro mitho bhaginyaḥ ||27||

 **...**

|| 1.14.28 || 

**kaccid rājāhuko jīvaty asat-putro’sya cānujaḥ |**

**hṛdīkaḥ sasuto’krūro jayanta-gada-sāraṇāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **āhuka ugrasenaḥ | asan putro yasya | ata eva jīva-mātram eva pṛṣṭam | anujaś ca devakaḥ | hṛdīkaḥ sutaḥ kṛtavarmā | jayantādayaḥ kṛṣṇa-bhrātaraḥ ||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **asan kṛṣṇa-dveṣī putro yasya saḥ | tādṛśa-putratvād adyāpi lajjito’sau kadācid dehaṁ vā tyaktavān ity abhiprāyeṇa jīvatīty uktam |||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **āhukaḥ ugrasenaḥ | asan putro yasya ata eva jīvana-mātraṁ pṛṣṭam | anujo devakaḥ | hṛdīka-sutaḥ kṛtavarmā | jayantādayaḥ kṛṣṇa-bhrātaraḥ ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **āhūka ugrasenaḥ | asat katsaḥ putro yasya saḥ, anujo devakaḥ, hṛdīkasya sutaḥ kṛtavarmā,  jayantādayaḥ kṛṣṇasya bhrātaraḥ ||28||

  **...**

|| 1.14.29 || 

**āsate kuśalaṁ kaccid ye ca śatrujid-ādayaḥ |**

**kaccid āste sukhaṁ rāmo bhagavān sātvatāṁ prabhuḥ ||**

na katame_na vyākhyātam._

**...**

|| 1.14.30 || 

**pradyumnaḥ sarva-vṛṣṇīnāṁ sukham āste mahā-rathaḥ |**

**gambhīra-rayo’niruddho vardhate bhagavān uta ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **sarva-vṛṣṇīnāṁ madhye mahārathaḥ | gambhīra-rayo yuddhe mahā-vegaḥ | vardhate modata ity arthaḥ ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **gambhīrayaḥ yuddhe mahāvegaḥ ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **gambhīro rayo yuddha-vego yasya saḥ ||30||

 **...**

|| 1.14.31 || 

**suṣeṇaś cārudeṣṇaś ca sāmbo jāmbavatī-sutaḥ |**

**anye ca kārṣṇi-pravarāḥ saputrā ṛṣabhādayaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kṛṣṇasyāpatyāni kārṣṇayas teṣāṁ pravarāḥ ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **śrī-kṛṣṇasyāpatyāni kārṣṇa yas teṣu pravarāḥ ||31||

 **...**

|| 1.14.32 || 

**tathaivānucarāḥ śaureḥ śrutadevoddhavādayaḥ |**

**sunanda-nanda-śīrṣaṇyā ye cānye sātvatarṣabhāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **sunanda-nandanau śīrṣṇyau mukhyau yeṣāṁ te ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **sunanda-nandau śīrṣaṇyau mukhyo yeṣāṁ te ||32||

**...**

|| 1.14.33 || 

**api svasty āsate sarve rāma-kṛṣṇa-bhujāśrayāḥ |**

**api smaranti kuśalam asmākaṁ baddha-sauhṛdāḥ ||**

na katame_na vyākhyātam._

 **...**

|| 1.14.34 || 

**bhagavān api govindo brahmaṇyo bhakta-vatsalaḥ |**

**kaccit pure sudharmāyāṁ sukham āste suhṛd-vṛtaḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **yathānyeṣāṁ sukhaṁ bhaviṣyati tathā | nitya-sukhatvād dhareḥ |


    atyuttamānāṁ kuśala-praśno loka-sukhecchayā |


    nityadāpta-sukhatvāt tu na teṣāṁ yujyate kvacit || iti nāradīye ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **bhagavati sukham āsta iti praśnasyānaucityam āśaṅkyāha—pura ity-ādi ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **bhagavati kuśala-praśnasyānaucityam āśaṅkyāha—pura iti ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **maṅgala-svarūpe bhagavati maṅgala-praśnasyānaucityād āha—kaccid iti ||34||

 **...**

|| 1.14.35 || 

**maṅgalāya ca lokānāṁ kṣemāya ca bhavāya ca |**

**āste yadu-kulāmbhodhāv ādyo’nanta-sakhaḥ pumān ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **bhagavato’trāvasthāne hi lokānāṁ maṅgalaṁ nānyathety āśayenāha caturbhiḥ | maṅgalāya śubhāya | kṣemāya labdha-pālanāya | bhavāyodbhavāya | ananta-sakho bala-bhadra-sahāyaḥ ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **maṅgalāya premap-radānāya | kṣemāya keṣāñcit mukti-dānāya | bhavāya sampade ca | ananta-sakhaḥ balabhadra-sahāyaḥ ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **maṅgalāya keṣāñcit premānanda-dānāya, kṣemāya keṣāñcin-mokṣa-dānāya, bhavāya keṣāñcit sampat-pradānāya | ananta-sakhaḥ saṅkarṣaṇa-sahāyaḥ ||35||

 **...**

|| 1.14.36 || 

**yad bāhu-daṇḍa-guptāyāṁ sva-puryāṁ yadavo’rcitāḥ |**

**krīḍanti paramānandaṁ mahā-pauruṣikā iva ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **arcitāḥ sarvaiḥ pūjitāḥ | paramānandaṁ yathā bhavati tathā | mahā-puruṣo viṣṇus tadīyā mahāpauruṣikā vaikuṇṭha-nāthānucarā iva ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **yad iti | iveti laukika-dṛṣṭyā | eva agre’pi ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **arcitā devair api | mahā-pauruṣikāḥ vaikuṇṭhanāthānucarā iva mahadbhiḥ pauruṣair vijayina iveti vā ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **mahā-pauruṣikā mahadbhiḥ pauruṣair jayinaḥ | tena dīvyati khanati jayati jitam iti sūtrāḍhḍhak | iveti vākyālaṅkāre ||36||

 **...**

|| 1.14.37 || 

**yat-pāda-śuśrūṣaṇa-mukhya-karmaṇā**

**satyādayo dvy-aṣṭa-sahasra-yoṣitaḥ |**

**nirjitya saṅkhye tri-daśāṁs tad-āśiṣo**

**haranti vajrāyudha-vallabhocitāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **yasya pāda-śuśrūṣaṇam eva mukhyaṁ tapa-ādibhyaḥ śreṣṭhaṁ yat karma tena | satyabhāmādayaḥ saṅkhye yuddhe śrī-kṛṣṇa-balena tri-daśā devān nirjitya | tad-āśiṣo deva-bhogyān pārijātādīn | vajrāyudhasya vallabhā śacī tasyā ucitāḥ ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nirjitya kṛṣṇa-balenaivety arthaḥ | tridaśān devān | tad-āśiṣaḥ pārijātādīn | vajrāyudha-vallabhā śacī ||37 ||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nirjityeti patyur valeneti bodhyaṁ, tridaśān devān, tadāśiṣas tad-bhogyān pārijātādīn vajrāyudha-vallabhā śacī ||37||

 **...**

|| 1.14.38 || 

**yad bāhu-daṇḍābhyudayānujīvino**

**yadu-pravīrā hy akutobhayā muhuḥ |**

**adhikramanty aṅghribhir āhṛtāṁ balāt**

**sabhāṁ sudharmāṁ sura-sattamocitām ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **yad-bāhu-daṇḍa-prabhāvopajīvinaḥ sudharmām aṅghribhir adhikramanti sa govindaḥ sukham āste iti gata-pañcama-ślokenānvayaḥ ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **abhyudayaṁ prabhāvam anujīvituṁ śīlaṁ yeṣāṁ te | āhṛtāṁ svarga-lokād ity arthaḥ ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **abhyudayaṁ prabhāvam ||38||

 **...**

|| 1.14.39 || 

**kaccit te’nāmayaṁ tāta bhraṣṭa-tejā vibhāsi me |**

**alabdha-māno’vajñātaḥ kiṁ vā tāta ciroṣitaḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **pūrvaṁ ciroṣitaḥ ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **idānīṁ tasyaiva kuśalaṁ pṛcchati—**kaccid** iti ṣaḍbhiḥ | **anāmayam** ārogyam | **na labdho māno** yena bandhubhyaḥ sakāśāt | kiṁ vā, taiḥ pratyuta **avajñātas** tiras-kṛtaḥ | yataś **ciroṣito** bahu-kālaṁ tatra sthitaḥ ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **kaccid iti | teṣāṁ mā bhavatv amaṅgalaṁ kiñcid asyaiva bhavatv ity apekṣāyāṁ prakaraṇam idam ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **idānīṁ kiñcid apy avadatas tasyaiva kuśalaṁ pṛcchati—**kaccid** iti ṣaḍbhiḥ | **anāmayam** ārogyam | bandhubyaḥ sakāśād alabdhādaraḥ pratyutāvajñātaḥ **ciroṣitaḥ** bahu-kālaṁ tatra sthitaḥ ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **idānīṁ tūṣṇīm-bhūtasyārjunasyaiva kuśalaṁ pṛcchati—kaccid iti ṣaḍbhiḥ |  \
anāmayam ārogyaṁ bandhubhyo'lavdhamānaḥ pratyuta tairavajñātaḥ, ciroṣitas tatra bahukālaṁ sthitaḥ ||39||

 **...**

|| 1.14.40 || 

**kaccin nābhihato’bhāvaiḥ śabdādibhir amaṅgalaiḥ |**

**na dattam uktam arthibhya āśayā yat pratiśrutam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : abhāvair** iti chedaḥ, prema-śūnyaiḥ | **amaṅgalaiḥ** puruṣaiḥ **śabdādibhirnābhihato** na tāḍito’sti kim | yad **vā**, **arthibhyaḥ** kim api dāsyāmīti **noktaṅkim**? yad vā, **āśayā** saha yathā āśā bhavati, tathā dāsyāmīti **pratiśrutaṁ** yat, tan na **dattaṁ** kim ? ||40||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **nābhihataḥ kim ? api tv abhihata evety arthaḥ ||40||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : abhāvaiḥ** prema-śūnyaiḥ **nābhihataḥ** na tāḍito’si kim ?**arthibhya** āśayā prāpty-**āśayā** vartamānebhyo yad dātuṁ pratiśrutaṁ, tan **nadattaṁ**,**na** ca **uktaṁ** kim api, maunaṁ kṛtam iti bhāvaḥ ||40||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **amaṅgalaiḥ kaṭhoraiḥ śabdādibhir bhāvair arthair nābhi-hatas tāḍito nāsi kim? athavārthibhyaḥ prāptāśayā sthitebhyo yad-dyatuṁ pratiśrutaṁ tan na dattaṁ na coktaṁ kiñciṁ kim? ||40||

 **...**

|| 1.14.41 || 

**kaccit tvaṁ brāhmaṇaṁ bālaṁ gāṁ vṛddhaṁ rogiṇaṁ striyam |**

**śaraṇopasṛtaṁ sattvaṁ nātyākṣīḥ śaraṇa-pradaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **anyad vā, **śaraṇāgataṁ sattvaṁ** prāṇi-mātraṁ na tyaktavān asi kim ? yatas tvaṁ pūrvaṁ **śaraṇa-prada** āśraya-pradaḥ ||41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **śaraṇopasṛtaṁ śaraṇāgataṁ sattvaṁ prāṇinam ||41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **śaraṇopasṛtaṁ śaraṇāgataṁ sattvaṁ prāṇinam ||41||

 **...**

|| 1.14.42 || 

**kaccit tvaṁ nāgamo’gamyāṁ gamyāṁ vāsat-kṛtāṁ striyam |**

**parājito vātha bhavān nottamair nāsamaiḥ pathi ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **agamyām iti chedaḥ | ninditāṁ striyaṁ nāgamaḥ kiṁ na gatavān asi | asat-kṛtāṁ malaina-vastrādinā nāgamaḥ kim | nottmair anutammair samair ity arthaḥ | asamair adhamair vā kiṁ na parājito’sīty arthaḥ ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **agamyām iti chedaḥ | asatkṛtāṁ malina-vastrādikām | asamair balenātulyair nyūnair ity arthaḥ | tatrāpi nottamair jātyāpi na śreṣṭhair nīca-jātibhir ity arthaḥ ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **agamyām iti chedaḥ | asaṁskṛtāṁ malināmbarādikām | asamair balenātulyaiḥ | tatrāpi nottamair adhama-jātibhiḥ ||42||

 **...**

|| 1.14.43 || 

**api svit parya-bhuṅkthās tvaṁ sambhojyān vṛddha-bālakān |**[^126]

**jugupsitaṁ karma kiñcit kṛtavān na yad akṣamam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **saṁbhojanārhān vṛddhān bālakāṁś ca kiṁsvit paryabhuṅkthāḥ tyaktvā bhuktavān asi kim | akṣamaṁ kartum ayogyaṁ yat tan na kṛtavān asi kim ||43||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **parirvarjane, vṛddhādīn varjayitvā bhūktavān asi | akṣamam anucitam ||43||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **vṛddhādīn parivarjayitvābhuṅthā bhuktavānasi kim? akṣamam anucitam ||43||

 **...**

|| 1.14.44 || 

**kaccit preṣṭhatamenātha hṛdayenātma-bandhunā |**

**śūnyo’smi rahito nityaṁ manyase te’nyathā na ruk ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nityaṁ sadā preṣṭhatam eva hṛdaye nāntar aṅgeṇa sva-bandhunā śrī-kṛṣṇena rahitaḥ śūnyo’smīti manyase | anyathā te ruk manaḥ-pīḍā na ghaṭeta ||44||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kiṁ ca, itā āśaṅkās tvayi na sambhavanti | sambhavati cedam iti nāradoktaṁ smarann āha kaccid iti | nityaṁ sadā preṣṭhatamenātmano bandhuna kṛṣṇena rahito’haṁ hṛdayena cetasā śūnyo mūrcchito’smīti manyase ātmānam iti śeṣaḥ | satyaṁ satyam etad eva kāraṇaṁ satyam iti bhāvaḥ | anyathā te ruk manaḥ-pīḍā na ghaṭate ||44||

iti sārārtha-darśinyāṁ harṣiṇyāṁ bhakta-cetasām |

caturdaśaś ca prathame saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām ||*||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **etās tvayā śaṅkā naiva sambhavanti, kintv idaṁ sambhaved iti nāradoktiṁ smarann āha—kaccid iti | nityaṁ sarvadaiva preṣṭhatamenātmano bandhunā kṛṣṇena rahito'haṁ hṛdayena cetasā śūnye'smīty ātmānaṁ manyase kim? anyathā te ruk manaḥpīḍā na sambhavet ||44||

iti śrī-vaiṣṇavānandinyāṁ  prathama-skandha-ṭippanyāṁ caturdaśo'dhyāyaḥ ||14||

**...**

iti śrīmad-bhāgavate mahā-purāṇe brahma-sūtra-bhāṣye pāramahaṁsyaṁ saṁhitāyāṁ vaiyāsikyāṁ daśama-skandhe

yudhiṣṭhira-vitarko nāma

caturdaśo’dhyāyaḥ

||1.14||



**...**

 

(1.15)


## atha pañcadaśo’dhyāyaḥ 


### arjunād yadu-kula-saṁhāraṁ bhagavatas tirodhānaṁ ca śrutvā pāṇḍavānāṁ himālaya-diśi mahā-prayāṇam |

**|| 1.15.1 ||**

**sūta uvāca—**

**evaṁ kṛṣṇa-sakhaḥ kṛṣṇo bhrātrā rājñāvikalpitaḥ |**

**nānā-śaṅkāspadaṁ rūpaṁ kṛṣṇa-viśleṣa-karśitaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** 

kali-praveśam ālakṣya dhuraṁ nyasya parīkṣiti | \
āruroha nṛpaḥ svargam iti pañcadaśe’bravīt ||

**kṛṣṇo**’rjunaḥ **āvikalpita** iti chedaḥ, **nānā-śaṅkāspadaṁ rūpam** ālakṣya **vikalpita** ity arthaḥ | pratibhāṣituṁ nāśaknot [1.15.2] ity uttareṇānvayaḥ | tatra hetavaḥ—**kṛṣṇa-viśleṣeṇa karśitaḥ** kṛśaḥ kṛtaḥ ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :**

śrutvā nṛpaḥ pañcadaśe vilāpaṁ

dhanañjayasyātha kaleḥ praveśam |

ālakṣya rājyeṣv abhiṣicya pautraṁ

virajya bhīmādi-yutaḥ pratasthe ||

**kṛṣṇo’**rjunaḥ** vikalpitaḥ** evam-bhūto vā tvam evam-bhūto vā iti vikalpa-viṣayīkṛtaḥ | tatra hetuḥ—**nānā-śaṅkāspadaṁ rūpaṁ** dadhāna iti śeṣaḥ | **karśitaḥ** kṛśaḥ kṛtaḥ ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :**

vilāpam ākarṇya dhanañjayasya praviṣṭam ālakṣya kaliṁ viraktaḥ | \
pautraṁ sva-rājye viniveśya rājā sahānujaḥ pañcadaśe pratasthe ||

**kṛṣṇo**'rjuno **vikalpitas** tvam īdṛśo vedṛśo veti vikalpa-viṣayatāṁ nītaḥ, yad asau **nānā-śaṅkāspada-rūpaṁ** dhārayann iti śeṣaḥ ||1||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.2 || **

**śokena śuṣyad-vadana- hṛt-sarojo hata-prabhaḥ |**

**vibhuṁ tam evānusmaran nāśaknot pratibhāṣitum ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : śokena** hetunā | **vadanaṁ** ca **hṛc** ca te eva **saroje** | **śuṣyatī** vadana-hṛt saroje yasya saḥ | **hatā prabhā** tejo yasya saḥ ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : śokena** hetunā **śuṣyantī** vadana-hṛd-rūpe **saroje** yasya ||2||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.3 || **

**kṛcchreṇa saṁstabhya śucaḥ pāṇināmṛjya netrayoḥ |**

**parokṣeṇa samunnaddha- praṇayautkaṇṭhya-kātaraḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : śucaḥ** śokāśrūṇi yāny udgacchanti, tāni **netrayor** eva **saṁstabhya** galitāni ca **pāṇinā āmṛjya parokṣeṇa** darśanāgocareṇa śrī-kṛṣṇena hetunā **samunnaddham** adhikaṁ yat **premautkaṇṭhyaṁ,** tena **kātaro** vyākulaḥ san nṛpam ity āha [4] ity uttareṇānvayaḥ ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : śucaḥ** śokāśrūṇi yāny udgacchanti, tāni **netrayor** eva **saṁstabhya** galitāni ca **pāṇinā āmṛjya parokṣeṇa** parokṣī-bhūtena kṛṣṇena hetunety arthaḥ ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : śucaḥ** śokāśrūṇi **netrayoḥ saṁstabhya**, galitāni ca **pāṇinā āmṛjya**, **parokṣeṇa** dṛg-agocareṇa kṛṣṇena hetunā ||3||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.4 || **

**sakhyaṁ maitrīṁ sauhṛdaṁ ca sārathyādiṣu saṁsmaran |**

**nṛpam agrajam ity āha bāṣpa-gadgadayā girā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : sakhyaṁ** hitaiṣitām | **maitrīm** upakāritām | **sauhṛdaṁ** suhṛttvaṁ | **cāt** saṁbandhitāṁ ca | **bāṣpeṇa** kaṇṭhāvarodhād **gadgadayā** ||4||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (prīti-sandarbhaḥ 271) : kṛṣṇo**’rjunaḥ | **avikalpita** iti cchedaḥ | **nānā-śaṅkāspadaṁ rūpam ālakṣya** **vikalpita** ity arthaḥ | **śucaḥ** śokāśrūṇi **āmṛjya** ca | **parokṣeṇa** darśanāgocareṇa śrī-kṛṣṇena hetunā | ata evāniṣṭa-śaṅkāyā abhāvāt nātra karuṇa-rasāvakāśaḥ | tad-abhāvaś caiṣām aiśvarya-jñāna-samudbhāvināṁ bhavaty eva iti | vañcito’ham [bhā.pu. 1.15.5] ity-ādikaṁ vakṣyamāṇaṁ vilāpam ||1-4||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **premṇā paraspara-prāṇatvaṁ paraspara-hitaiṣitvaṁ **sakhyam** | **maitrīṁ** dāsya-miśraṁ sakhyam | **sauhṛdaṁ** vātsalya-miśraṁ sakhyam ||4||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **premṇā mithaḥ-prāṇatvaṁ **sakhyaṁ**, dāsya-miśraṁ tan-**maitrī**, vātsalya-miśraṁ tat **sauhṛdam** ||4||

 **...**

|| 1.15.5 ||

**arjuna uvāca—**

**vañcito’haṁ mahā-rāja hariṇā bandhu-rūpiṇā |**

**yena me’pahṛtaṁ tejo deva-vismāpanaṁ mahat ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : yena** māṁ vañcayatā | **devān vismāpayati** yat ||5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : vañcitas** tyaktaḥ | **yena** māṁ tyaktavatā **mama tejo’pahṛtaṁ**, tena tad-dattam eva teja iti bhāvaḥ ||5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : vañcitaḥ** pratāritaḥ, yan māṁ vihāya yādavān nītvāntardadhe iti | **yena** **deva-vismāpanaṁ me** **mahat tejaḥ apahṛtam** ||5||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.6 || **

**yasya kṣaṇa-viyogena loko hy apriya-darśanaḥ |**

**ukthena rahito hy eṣa mṛtakaḥ procyate yathā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : yasya kṣaṇa-viyogena** ity-ādi **yac**-chabdānāṁ tenāham adya muṣita [13] iti saptama-śloka-sthena tac-chabdena sambandhaḥ | priyasyāpy apriyatve dṛṣṭāntaḥ—**ukthena** prāṇena | **eṣa** pitrādiḥ ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : yasya kṣaṇa-viyogena** ity-ādi | **yac**-chabdānāṁ tenāham adya muṣitaḥ [13] iti saptama-śloka-sthena tac-chabdenānvayaḥ | priyasyāpy apriyatve dṛṣṭāntaḥ **ukthena** prāṇena | **eṣa** pitrādiḥ ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yasyeti—yac-chabdānāṁ tenāham adya muṣitaḥ iti [bhā.pu. 1.15.13] saptama-padya-sthitena tac-chabdena sambandhaḥ | **eṣa** **lokaḥ** | priyasyāpriyatve dṛṣṭāntaḥ—yathā **ukthena** prāṇena **rahitaḥ** pitrādir **mṛtaka** ucyate, tadvat ||6||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.7 || **

**yat-saṁśrayād drupada-geham upāgatānāṁ  \
rājñāṁ svayaṁvara-mukhe smara-durmadānām | \
tejo hṛtaṁ khalu mayābhihataś ca matsyaḥ \
sajjīkṛtena dhanuṣādhigatā ca kṛṣṇā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **śrī-kṛṣṇopakārān anusmarati—**yat-saṁśrayād** iti daśabhiḥ | **yasya saṁśrayād** balāt **smareṇa** kāmena **durmadānām** atimattānāṁ **tejaḥ** prabhāvo **hṛtaṁ** dhanur graheṇaiva | paścāt tad-dhanuḥ **sajjī-kṛtaṁ** ca | tena ca **matsyo** yantropari bhraman viddhaḥ | tatas tān vijitya [**kṛṣṇā cādhigatā**] draupadī prāptā ca ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā : tatrārjunaḥ** |** tatra** draupadī-svayaṁvare | kṛṣṇopakāraṁ smaraty arjunaḥ—**yat saṁśrayād** iti ||7||** **[mu.pha. 13.1]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** **yasya āśrayāt** svayaṁvare **rājñāṁ** tejo hṛtvā [kṛṣṇā cādhigatā] draupadī prāptā ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **upakārān smarati—**yad** iti daśabhiḥ | matsyo yantropari bhraman nihato viddhaḥ, **kṛṣṇā** draupadī **cādhigatā** labdhā ||7||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.8 || **

**yat-sannidhāv aham u khāṇḍavam agnaye’dām**

**indraṁ ca sāmara-gaṇaṁ tarasā vijitya |**

**labdhā sabhā maya-kṛtādbhuta-śilpa-māyā**

**digbhyo’haran nṛpatayo balim adhvare te ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : u** iti vismaye | **khāṇḍavam** indrasya vanam **agnaye’dāṁ** dattavān asmi | khāṇḍava-dāhe rakṣitena **mayena kṛtā** ca **sabhā labdhāadbhuta-śilpa-**rūpā **māyā** yasāṁ sā | **te adhvare **yāge rājasūye ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā : khāṇḍava**-dahane | rājasūye ca kṛṣṇopakāraṁ smarati—**yat-sannidhāv** iti | **u** aho yudhiṣṭhiraḥ **aham** **adāṁ** dattavān | **mayena kṛtā adbhutā śilpa-māyā** yasyāṁ sabhāyām ||8||** **[mu.pha. 13.2]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : u** iti vismaye | **khāṇḍavam** indrasya vanam | khāṇḍava-dāhe rakṣitena **mayena kṛtā sabhā labdhā** | **adbhute śilpa-māye** yasyāṁ sā **adhvare** rājasūye ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : u** vismaye | **khāṇḍavam** indrasya vana-**mahāgnaye**'**dāṁ **dattavān asmi | khāṇḍava-dāhe rakṣitena **mayena kṛtā** **sabhā labdhā**, adbhūte śilpa-māye yasyāṁ sā, adhvare rājasūye ||8||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.9 || **

**yat-tejasā nṛpa-śiro-'ṅghrim ahan makhārtham**

**āryo’nujas tava gajāyuta-sattva-vīryaḥ |**

**tenāhṛtāḥ pramatha-nātha-makhāya bhūpā**

**yan-mocitās tad anayan balim adhvare te ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **anantara-śloko vigītas tathāpi vyākhāyate | **nṛpa-śiraḥ**-**svaṅghir** yasya taṁ jarāsandhaṁ **tavānujo** bhīmo **makhārthamahan** hatavān | tan-nirjayaṁ vinā rājasūya-makhānupapatteḥ | **gajāyutasyeva sattvam** utsāha-śaktir vīryaṁ balaṁ ca yasya saḥ | taṁ hatvā **pramatha-nātho** mahā-bhairavas tasya **makhāya** ye rājānas **tenāhṛtās** te ca yad yasmān **mocitās tat** tasmād te’**dhvare balim ānītavantaḥ** ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : nṛpāṇāṁ** tat-sajātīyānāṁ prākṛtānāṁ **śiras** tu **aṅghrir** yasya taṁ jarāsandham | tav**ānujo** bhīmaḥ | **makhārthaṁ** tan-nirjayaṁ vinā rājasūya-makhānupapatteḥ **gajāyutasyevasattvam** utsāha-śaktiḥ vīryaṁ balaṁ ca yasya saḥ | **pramatha-nātho** bhairavas tasya **makhāya** ye rājānaḥ **tenāhṛtāḥ** yady asmān **mocitāḥ** tasmāt te’**dhvare balim ānītavantaḥ** ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : nṛpāṇāṁ** tat-sajātīyānāṁ **śiraḥsv aṅghrir** yasya, taṁ magadhendraṁ **tavānujo** mad-**āryo** bhīmo'**han** | makhārthaṁ tad-dhananaṁ vinā makhāsiddheḥ | kīdṛśaḥ? **gajāyutasya** iva **sattva-vīrye** utsāha-bale yasya saḥ | **tena** māgadhendreṇa **pramatha-nātha-makhāya** ye **bhūpā āhṛtāḥ**, te **yan-mocitāḥ**, **tat** te'**dhvare** **balim anayan** ||9||

**...**

**|| 1.15.10 || **

**patnyās tavādhimakha-kḷpta-mahābhiṣeka-**

**ślāghiṣṭha-cāru-kavaraṁ kitavaiḥ sabhāyām |**

**spṛṣṭaṁ vikīrya padayoḥ patitāśru-mukhyā**

**yas tat-striyo’kṛta hateśa-vimukta-keśāḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **yat-**padayoḥ patitāśru-pradhānaḥ** | yaiḥ **kavaraṁ** **spṛṣṭaṁ tat-striyaḥ** tat-**padayoḥ patitvād** eva | vimukta-keśyo'nya-kṛtaḥ ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **yaiḥ **kitavair** duḥśāsanādibhis **tava patnyāḥ kavaraṁ vikīrya** unmucya **spṛṣṭam** ākṛṣṭaṁ teṣāṁ **striyo hateśāḥ |** ata eva vaidhavyād **vimukta-keśā** **akṛta** cakāra | kathaṁ-bhūtaṁ kavaram ? **adhi makhaṁ** rājasūyam adhikṛtya **kḷpto** racito yo **mahābhiṣekaḥ,** tena **ślāghyatamaṁ** | **cāru** ramyam, yat-smaraṇāt tadānīm evāsmat-kṛpayā prāptasya śrī-kṛṣṇasya manane **padayoḥ patitāny aśrūṇi** mukhād yasyāḥ **patnyāḥ** | pada-śabda-sāpekṣasyāpi **patita**-śabdasya **aśru**-padena samāso nitya-sāpekṣitatvāt ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā : patnyā** iti | **adhi makhaṁ** rājasūyam adhikṛtya kramo racito yo **mahābhiṣekaḥ**, tena **ślāghiṣṭhaṁ** ślāghyavattaṁ yat **cāru-kavaraṁ** keśa-pāśaḥ **kitavaiḥ** duḥśāsanādibhiḥ **vikīrya** unmucya **spṛṣṭaṁ** **patitāśru-mukhaṁ** yasyāḥ, tayā **patitaṁ padayoḥ** sāpekṣatve’pi samāsaḥ | tadānīm eva smaraṇāt pura-sthitasya kṛṣṇasya padayoḥ | **tat-striyaḥ** teṣāṁ kitavānāṁ striyaḥ | **akṛta** kṛtavān | **hatair īśair** hetu-bhūtair **vimukta-keśāḥ** ||10||** **[mu.pha. 13.3]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **yas tava patnyāḥ sambaddhe teṣāṁ kitavānāṁ striyo hateśa-vimukta-keśā **akṛta** | kīdṛśyāḥ ? **patnyāḥ kavaraṁ vikīrya** paścād vanāntargatasya kṛṣṇasya pādayoḥ patitāśru-mukhyāḥ | kīdṛśaṁ kavaram ? **kitavaiḥspṛṣṭaṁdyūta-sabhāyām **ākṛṣṭam iti yojyam ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yaiḥ **kitavair** duḥśāsanādibhis tava patnyā **adhi-makhaṁ** rājasūye **kṛta-mahābhiṣekeṇa** praśastaṁ kavaraṁ **vikīrya**unmucya **spṛṣṭam** ākṛṣṭam | teṣāṁ **striyo hateśā** ata eva vaidhavyād **vimukta-keśāś** ca **akṛta** | yas tavānuja iti pūrvasyaivānuṣaṅgaḥ | kīdṛśyāḥ ? smaraṇāt prāptasya kṛṣṇasya namane **padayoḥ patitāni aśrūṇi mukhād** yasyāḥ | pada-śabda-sāpekṣasyāpi patita-śabdasya aśru-padena samāso nitya-sāpekṣatvāt | padayoḥ patitā cāsau aśru-mukhī ceti, tasyā iti vā ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yaiḥ **kitavair** duḥśāsanādyais **tava patnyāḥ** **kavaraṁ vikīrya** unmucya **spṛṣṭam** ākṛṣṭaṁ, teṣāṁ **striyo hateśāḥ**, tata eva vaidhavyān **mukta-keśāś cākṛta** cakāra tavānuja [9] iti pūrvasyaivānuṣaṅgaḥ | **kavaraṁ** kīdṛśam ? ity āha—**adhi makhaṁ** rājasūyam adhikṛtya **kḷpto** yo **mahābhiṣekaḥ,** tena **ślāghiṣṭhaṁ cāru ramyaṁ** ca | **patnyāḥ** kīdṛśyāḥ? tadā smaraṇāt prāptasya kṛṣṇasya praṇāme **padayoḥ** **patitāny aśrūṇi mukhād** yasyāḥ | pada-śabda-sāpekṣasyāpi patita-śabdyāśru-padena samāsaḥ, samastasya asamastena nityākāṅkṣaṇe saṅgatir iti vacanāt ||10||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.11 || **

**yo no jugopa vana etya duranta-kṛcchrād**

**durvāsaso’ri-racitād ayutāgra-bhug yaḥ |**

**śākānna-śiṣṭam upayujya yatas tri-lokīṁ**

**tṛptām amaṁsta salile vinimagna-saṅghaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **śiṣyāṇām** ayutasyāgre** tat-paṅktau bhuṅkte yas tasmād **durvāsaso** hetor **ariṇā** duryodhanena **racitaṁ** yad **durantaṁ kṛcchraṁ** śāpa-lakṣaṇaṁ, tasmāt sakāśān **no**’smān **vanam etya jugopa** | kiṁ kṛtvā ? **śākam** eva **annaṁ** tasminn eva pātre’vi**śiṣṭamupayujya** jagdhvā | yata upayogāt **salilevinimagno** munīnāṁ **saṅghastrilokīṁ tṛptām amaṁsta** | 

evaṁ hi bhārate kathā—kadācid durvāsā duryodhanenātithyaṁ kṛtam | tena ca parituṣṭena "varaṁ vṛṇīṣva" ity ukte, durvāsasaḥ śāpāt pāṇḍavā naśyeyur iti manasi vidhāya duryodhanenoktam—"yudhiṣṭhiro’smat-kula-mukhyaḥ | atas tasyāpi bhavataivam eva śiṣyāyuta-sahitenātithinā bhavitavyam, kiṁ tu draupadī yathā kṣudhā na sīdet, tathā tasyāṁ bhuktavatyāṁ tad-gṛhaṁ gantavyam" iti | tataś ca tathaiva durvāsasi prāpte paramādareṇa yudhiṣṭhireṇa "mādhyāhnikaṁ kṛtvā āgamyatām" iti vijñāpito muni-saṅgho’dhamarṣaṇāya jale nimamajja | tatra cintāturayā draupadyā smṛta-mātraḥ śrī-kṛṣṇo’ṅka-sthāṁ rukmiṇīṁ hitvā tat-kṣaṇam eva bhakta-vatsalatayā cāgataḥ | tayā cāvedite vṛttānte bhagavatoktaṁ—"he draupadi ! ahaṁ ca bubhukṣito’smi | prathamaṁ māṁ bhojayati" | tayā cātilajjayoktaṁ—svāmin, mad-bhojana-paryantam akṣayam apy annaṁ sūrya-datta-sthālyāṁ mayā ca sarvān saṁbhojya bhuktam, ato nāsty annam" iti | tathāpy atinirbandhena sthālīm ānāyya tat-kaṇṭha-lagnaṁ kiṁcic chākānnaṁ prāśyoktam "anena viśvātmā bhagavān prīyatām" | "atha bhoktuṁ muni-saṅgham āhvaya" iti bhīmaṁ prahitavān | sa ca tāvatātitṛpto vṛthā-pāka-bhayena palāyita iti ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā : **durvāsasaḥ śāpe kṛṣṇopakāraṁ smarati—**yo no jugopa** iti | **vana**-vāsas tāvat kṛcchraṁ, tatrāpi **durvāsasā** **durantaṁ kṛcchram** | sa ca **ariṇā** duryodhanena **racitaḥ** | vana-vāsa-sthān pāṇḍavān yudhiṣṭhira-draupadī-bhojanānataraṁ "yācasva iti prārthitaḥ yāvad draupadī na bhuṅkte tāvad akṣayam annam" iti hi sūryeṇa varo dattaḥ | **yo** durvāsā **ayutāgra-bhuk **śiṣyāṇām ayutasyāgre bhuṅkte | kiṁ kṛtvā kṛṣṇo jugopa ? **śākānna-śiṣṭam upabhujya** tadānīm eva draupadī-smaraṇād āgatya śāka-rūpasyānnasya yac chiṣṭaṁ pātre lagnaṁ, tat svayaṁ bhuktvā yato bhojanād durvāsāḥ **trilokīṁ** **tṛptām amaṁsta** | na kevalam ātmānaṁ “sa-śiṣyaṁ tu salile snātvā bhoktum āgacchata” iti yudhiṣṭhira-vacanād yatra snātuṁ gataḥ, tatra kīdṛśaḥ vinimagnaḥ śiṣya-sahitaḥ ātmā yasya sa tathā ||11||** **[mu.pha. 13.4]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : durvāsaso** hetor **ariṇā racitaṁ** yad **durantaṁ kṛcchraṁ** śāpa-lakṣaṇam, tasmāt sakāśān **no**’smān **vane etya jugopa** | yaḥ śiṣyāṇām ayutasya agre agra-paṅktau bhuṅkte | **śākam evānnaṁ** tasmin pātre’va**śiṣṭam** **upayujya** jagdhvā, **yata** upayogāt **salile vinimagno** munīnāṁ **saṅghās trilokīṁ tṛptām amaṁsta** | 

evaṁ hi bhārate kathā—kadācid durvāsaso duryodhanenātithyaṁ kṛtam | tena ca parituṣṭena "varaṁ vṛṇīṣva" ity ukte, "durvāsasaḥ śāpāt pāṇḍavā naśyeyuḥ" iti manasi vidhāya duryodhanenoktam—"yudhiṣṭhiro’smat-kula-mukhyaḥ, atas tasyāpi bhavataivam eva śiṣyāyuta-sahitenātithinā bhavitavyam, kiṁ tu draupadī yathā kṣudhayā na sīdet, tathā tasyāṁ bhuktavatyāṁ tad-gṛhaṁ gantavyam" iti | tataś ca tathaiva durvāsasi prāpte paramādareṇa yudhiṣṭhireṇa "mādhyāhnikaṁ kṛtvā āgamyatām" iti vijñāpito muni-saṅgho’gha-marṣaṇāya jale nimamajja | tatra cintāturayā draupadyā smṛta-mātraḥ śrī-kṛṣṇo’ṅka-sthāṁ rukmiṇīṁ hitvā tat-kṣaṇam eva bhakta-vatsala āgataḥ | tayā cāvedite vṛttānte bhagavatoktaṁ—"he draupadi ! ahaṁ ca bubhukṣito’smi | prathamaṁ māṁ bhojaya" iti | tayā cātilajjayoktaṁ—"aho madīyam abhāgyaṁ bhāgyaṁ ca, yatas trailokya-nātho yajña-puruṣo mad-gṛham āgato bhojanaṁ prārthayati" iti manasi vidhāyoktaṁ—"svāmin ! mad-bhojana-paryantam akṣayyam annaṁ sūrya-datta-sthālyāṁ mayā ca sarvān bhojayitvā bhuktam, ato nāsty annam" ity aśru-pātaṁ cakāra | tathāpy atinirbandhena pāka-sthālīm ānayya tat-kaṇṭha-lagna-śākānnaṁ prāśyoktaṁ "bhoktuṁ muni-saṅgham āhvaya" iti | atha bhīmaṁ ca prahitavān | bhīmena gatvoktaṁ—"svāmin ! bhojanārtham āgamyatām | kathaṁ vilambaṁ kriyate ?" sa ca tāvatā atitṛptaḥ vṛthā-pāka-bhayāt palāyita iti ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) **: **yo vanam etya durvāsaso** hetor **ariṇā** duryodhanena **racitāc** chāpa-rūpād **duranta-kṛcchān** **no**'smān **jugopa** rakṣitavān | kīdṛśo durvāsāḥ? **ayutāgra-bhuk** śiṣyāyuta-paṅktau yo bhuṅkte | kiṁ kṛtvā jugopa? ity atrāha—**śākānna-śiṣṭam upayujya **iti | **yataḥ** śiṣṭa-śākānnopayogāt **salile vinimagno** munīnāṁ **saṅghas** **trilokīṁ tṛptām amaṁsta** | 

evam ākhyāyikā bhārate'sti—ātithyena parituṣṭo durvāsā "varaṁ vṛṇīṣva" iti duryodhanam uvāca | tena ca "etat-kopāt pāṇḍavā vinaśyeyuḥ" iti vicārya, "asman-mukhyasya yudhiṣṭhirasyāpi ātithyam ayuta-śiṣyeṇa bhavatā grāhyaṁ, kintu pāñcālī yathā kṣut-pīḍitā na syāt tasyāṁ bhuktavatyāṁ gantavyam" iti vṛtam | tathaiva durvāsasi prāpte'tyādareṇa nṛpeṇa "mādhyāhnikaṁ vidhāyāgamyatām" ity uktaḥ | sa-śiṣya-gaṇaḥ sa munir aghamarṣaṇāya jale nyamajjat | tataś cintāturayā pāñcālyā smṛta-mātro harir āgatya śruta-vṛttānto'pi kṣudhito'smi bhojaya mām ity uktavān | tayā cātilajjitayā bhagavan mad-bhojanāt pūrvaṁ ravidattāyāṁ sthālyāṁ sarvaṁ syād ahantu sarvān bhojayaitvā bhuktavatī, ataḥ kiñcit-tatra nāstītyuktopi atinirbandhādānītāyāṁ tasyāṁ śākaleśaṁ prāptaṁ prāśya viśvātm āhaṁ tṛpto'smīty uttvā tasyāṁ āhūyatāṁ muni-saṅgha ity uktavān | sa ca viśvāntarvartitvāt-tāvatā tṛpto vṛthā pāka-bhayāt palāya gata iti ||11||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.12 || **

**yat-tejasātha bhagavān yudhi śūla-pāṇir**

**vismāpitaḥ sa-girijo’stram adān nijaṁ me |**

**anye’pi cāham amunaiva kalevareṇa**

**prāpto mahendra-bhavane mahad**[^127]**-āsanārdham ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : girijā-sahito vismāpitaḥ** san **nijaṁ** pāśupatam **astram** | **anye’pi** lokapālā nijāny astrāṇy aduḥ | anyad apy āścaryam āha—**amunā** iti | **mahata** indrasya **āsanārdham** ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā : **divyāstra-lābhe kṛṣṇopakāraṁ smarati śloka-dvayena—**yat-tejasā** iti | **anye’pi** loka-pālā nijāny astrāṇy aduḥ | ahaṁ ca **mahendrasya** **āsanārdham** **prāptaḥ** ||12||** **[mu.pha. 13.5]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : yat-tejasā** iti | pūrvaval laukika-līlā-mayatvenaiva ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : girijayā** durgayā **sahitaḥ vismāpitaḥ** san **nijaṁ** pāśupatam **astram** | anye’pi lokapālāḥ nijāstrāṇy aduḥ | **mahata** indrasya **āsanārdham** ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : sa-girijaḥ** sa-durgaḥ **śūlapāṇiḥ** śivo **vismitaḥ** san **nijam astraṁ** pāśupataṁ **me'dāt** | **anye ca** lokapālā nijāny astrāṇy aduḥ, **mahata** indrasya **āsanārdham** ||12||

**...**

**|| 1.15.13 || **

**tatraiva me viharato bhuja-daṇḍa-yugmaṁ**

**gāṇḍīva-lakṣaṇam arāti-vadhāya devāḥ |**

**sendrāḥ śritā yad-anubhāvitam ājamīḍha**

**tenāham adya muṣitaḥ puruṣeṇa bhūmnā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : tatraiva** svarge krīḍito **gāṇḍīvaṁ lakṣaṇaṁ** cihnaṁ yasya tat | **arātayo** nivāta-kavacā daityāḥ, teṣāṁ vadhārtham āśritavantaḥ | yena **anubhāvitaṁ** prabhāva-yuktaṁ kṛtam | he **ājamīḍa** yudhiṣṭhira | **tenamuṣito** vañcito’smi | **bhūmnā** nija-mahimāvasthānena ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā : tatra** iti | **tatraiva** svarge | **arātayo** nivāta-kavaca-nāmāno daityāḥ | **yad-anubhāvitaṁ** yena kṛṣṇena prabhāvavat kṛtam | **bhuja-daṇḍa-yugmaṁ** **śritāḥ** śaraṇaṁ jagmuḥ | he **ājamīḍha** ! yudhiṣṭhira ! **tena** ity-ādi sarva-vākya-śeṣaḥ | **bhūmnā** aparicchinnena vāpy abhivyañjakaṁ vinā na dṛśyata iti **muṣitatvam** | asmad-ādi-dehānāṁ tv anumāpakatvam | na tu kṛṣṇa-tadehavaḥ pratyakṣatvāpādakatvam ||13||** **[mu.pha. 13.6]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : bhūmnā** sarvato mahattamena ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : arātayo** nivāta-kavacādayo daityāḥ, teṣāṁ **vadhāya** | **yena** kṛṣṇena **anubhāvitaṁ** prabhāva-yuktaṁ kṛtam | **bhūmnā** atiśayena **ahaṁ** **muṣitas** tyaktaḥ ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : tatraiva** indra-loke **viharato me** **bhuja-daṇḍa-yugmaṁ** sendrā **devā** **arātīnāṁ** nivātaka-vacādīnāṁ **vadhāya** **āśritāḥ** | kīdṛśaṁ tad-yugmaṁ? **yena** kṛṣṇena **anubhāvitaṁ** yojita-prabhāvam, **tena** **puruṣottamena aham adya muṣito** vañcitaḥ ||13||

**...**

**|| 1.15.14 || **

**yad-bāndhavaḥ kuru-balābdhim ananta-pāram**

**eko rathena tatare’ham atīrya-sattvam |**

**pratyāhṛtaṁ bahu dhanaṁ ca mayā pareṣāṁ**

**tejāspadaṁ maṇimayaṁ ca hṛtaṁ śirobhyaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : yad-bāndhava** ity-ādi-śloka-trayasyāpi tena muṣito’ham [13] iti pūrveṇaiva saṁbandhaḥ | śrī-kṛṣṇa-**bāndhava eka** eva **ahaṁ** kaurava-sainyābdhiṁ **nāsty anto** gāmbhīryeṇa, **pāraṁ** ca deśato yasya taṁ **tatare** tīrṇavān uttara-go-grahe | **atīryāṇi** dustarāṇi **sattvāni** timiṅgilādīni bhīṣmādi-rūpāṇi yasmin | parair nītaṁ go-**dhanaṁ pratyāhṛtam** | **pareṣāṁ** ca śirobhyaḥ sakāśāt **tejāspadaṁ** prabhāvasyāspadam uṣṇīṣa-rūpaṁ **maṇimayaṁ** mukuṭa-ratna-rūpaṁ ca **bahu-dhanaṁ** tān mohanāstreṇa mohayitvā **hṛtam** | yad-bāndhavena **mayā** ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā : **go-grahaṇe kṛṣṇopakāraṁ smarati—**yad-bāndhava** iti | **yad bāndhavaḥ** kṛṣṇa-sahāyaḥ | **ananta**-gāmbhīryasyāvadhiḥ **pāro** vistārasya yasya tam | **tatare** tīrṇavān | **anārya-sattvam** hiṁsra-gajādikam | puru **bahu dhanam** | **parair āhṛtaṁ** go-dhanaṁ **pareṣāṁ** ca **maṇimayaṁ** mukuṭādi **dhanaṁ ca** **hṛtam** | tad dhi **tejās-padaṁ **tad-dharaṇe tejo-haraṇāt ||14||** **[mu.pha. 13.7]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa eva **bāndhavo** yasya so’ham eka eva kuru-sainyābdhiṁ **tatare** tīrṇavān uttara-go-grahe | nāsty anto gāmbhīryeṇa pāraṁ ca deśato yasya tam | **atīryāṇi** dustarāṇi sattvāni bhīṣmādi-timiṅgilādīni yasmiṁs tam | go-**dhanaṁ pratyāhṛtam** | tathā tān mohanāstreṇa mohayitvā śirobhyaḥ sakāśāt tejaspadam uṣṇīṣaṁ ca **hṛtam** ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **uttara-go-grahe ya eva bāndhavo yasya so'ham eka eva rathena kuru-sainyāddhiṁ tatare tīrṇavān gāmbhīryād-vistīrṇatvāc-cāntapāra-śūnyam | atāryāṇi sattvāni bhīṣma-droṇādi-rūpa-timiṅgilādīni yatra tat | virāṭa-rājasya go-dhanaṁ mayā pratyāhṛtaṁ, pareṣāṁ mohanāstreṇa mohitānāṁ śirobhyas tejampadam uṣṇīṣaṁ ca hṛtam ||14||
