yad-bāndhavaḥ kuru-balābdhim ananta-pāram

eko rathena tatare’ham atīrya-sattvam |

pratyāhṛtaṁ bahu dhanaṁ ca mayā pareṣāṁ

tejāspadaṁ maṇimayaṁ ca hṛtaṁ śirobhyaḥ ||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.15 || **

**yo bhīṣma-karṇa-guru-śalya-camūṣv adabhra-**

**rājanya-varya-ratha-maṇḍala-maṇḍitāsu |**

**agre-caro mama vibho ratha-yūthapānām**

**āyur manāṁsi ca dṛśā saha oja ārcchat ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** **adabhrā** analpā ye **rājanya-varyās** teṣāṁ **ratha-maṇḍalair** **maṇḍitāsu** bhīṣmādīnāṁ **camūṣu** sārathi-rūpeṇa mamāgocaraḥ san | he **vibho** ! teṣāṁ **ratha-yūthapānām āyur**-ādīn yo **dṛśā** dṛṣṭyaiva **ārcchat** hṛtavān | **manāṁsi** ity utsāhādi-śaktim | **saha** balam | **ojaḥ** śastrādi-kauśalam ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** kurukṣetra-yuddhe kṛṣṇopakāraṁ smarati—**yo bhīṣma** iti śloka-trayeṇa | **dṛśā** darśanena | **ārcchad** ākṛṣṭavān |  **āyur manāṁsi saha ojaś** ca saha | karmendriyāṇāṁ śaktiḥ manāṁsi trīṇy antaḥ-karaṇāni ||15|| [mu.pha. 13.8]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : agre-caraḥ** sārathi-rūpeṇāgre sthitaḥ san, he **vibho**! svācintya-prabhāveṇa **āyuḥ** prārabdha-karma sva-saundaryeṇa **bhīṣmādīnāṁ** teṣāṁ **manāṁsi** sva-sāmarthya-jñāpanena **saho** manaḥ-pāṭava-lakṣaṇaṁ yuddhotsāhaṁ teja indriya-pāṭava-lakṣaṇaṁ śastrādi-grahaṇa-sāmarthyaṁ **dṛśā** sva-dṛṣṭyaiva **ārcchat** jahāra ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **he vibho mahārāja! adabhrāṇām analpānāṁ rājanya-varyāṇāṁ ratha-maṇḍalair maṇḍitāsu bhīṣmādīnāṁ camūṣu ye mama sārathiḥ sann agresaras teṣāṁ ratha-yuthapānāṁ senāpatīnām āyūr ādīni dṛśaivārcchat jahāra, svācintya-śaktyā āyur ārabdha-karma sva-saundarṣeṇa bhīṣmādīnāṁ manāṁsi, svasāmarthya-jñāpanena saho manaḥ-pāṭava-rūpa-yuddhotsāham, ojaḥ karaṇa-pāṭava-rūpa-śastrādi-grahaṇa-sāmarthyam ||15||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.16 || **

**yad-doḥṣu mā praṇihitaṁ guru-bhīṣma-karṇa-**

**naptṛ-trigarta-śalya-saindhava-bāhlikādyaiḥ |**

**astrāṇy amogha-mahimāni nirūpitāni**

**nopaspṛśur nṛhari-dāsam ivāsurāṇi ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : yasya doḥṣu** bhujeṣu **mā **māṁ **praṇihitaṁ** sthāpitaṁ tair eva **gurv-ādibhir nirūpitāni** prayuktāny **astrāṇina spṛśanti sma** | **gurur** droṇaḥ | **trigartas** trigarta-deśādhipatiḥ suśarmā | **śalaḥ** śalyaḥ | **saindhavaḥ** sindhu-deśādhipatir jayadrathaḥ | **bāhlikaḥ** śantanor bhātrā | **amogho mahimā** yeṣāṁ tathā-bhūtāny api | pāṭhāntare[^128]'pi sa evārthaḥ | pratīkārākaraṇe’py asparśe dṛṣṭāntaḥ—**nṛhari-dāsaṁ** prahlādam iveti ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** kurukṣetra-yuddhe kṛṣṇopakāraṁ smarati—**yo bhīṣma** iti śloka-trayeṇa | **dṛśā** darśanena | **ārcchad** ākṛṣṭavān |  **āyur manāṁsi saha ojaś** ca saha | karmendriyāṇāṁ śaktiḥ manāṁsi trīṇy antaḥ-karaṇāni ||16|| [mu.pha. 13.9]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : yasya doḥṣu** bhūjeṣu **mā** māṁ **praṇihitaṁ** sthāpitaṁ tenaivety arthaḥ, **gurv-ādibhirnirūpitāni** prayuktāni **astrāṇi na spṛśanti sma** | **gurur** droṇaḥ | **naptā** bhūriśravāḥ | **trigartaḥ** trigarta-deśādhipatiḥ suśarmā | **śalaḥ** śalyaḥ | **saindhavaḥ** sindhu-deśādhipatiḥ jayadrathaḥ | **bāhlīkaḥ** śantanorbhrātā, **amogha-mahimaṇi**"mahitāni ca" iti pāṭhaś ca | pratīkārākaraṇe’py asparśe dṛṣṭāntaḥ—**nṛhari-dāsaṁ** prahlādam iveti ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : yasya doḥṣu** bhujeṣu **praṇihitaṁ** tenaiva sthāpitaṁ māṁ gurv-ādibhir **nirūpitāni** prayuktāny **astrāṇi** **nopaspṛśuḥ** | **amogho mahimā** yeṣāṁ, tādṛśāny api | **gurur** droṇaḥ | **trigartaḥ** suśarmā, śalaḥ **śalyaḥ,** **saindhavo** jayadrathaḥ, **vāhlīkaḥ** śantanor bhrātā | tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ—**āsurāṇi śastrāṇi** **nṛharidāsaṁ** prahlādam **iva** ||16||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.17 || **

**sautye vṛtaḥ kumatinātmada īśvaro me**

**yat-pāda-padmam abhavāya bhajanti bhavyāḥ |**

**māṁ śrānta-vāham arayo rathino bhuvi-ṣṭhaṁ**

**na prāharan yad-anubhāva-nirasta-cittāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **svāparādham anusmaran santapyamāna āha | **sautye** sārathye **kumatinā me** mayā sa **vṛtaḥ** | kumatimattvam evāha—**ātma-da** ity-ādinā | **abhavāya** mokṣāya | **bhavyāḥ** śreṣṭhāḥ | **śrāntā vāhā** aśvā yasya taṁ mām | jayadratha-vadhe hi jala-pānaṁ vināśvāḥ śrāntāḥ, tato rathād avatīrya bāṇair bhuvaṁ bhittvā mayā jalaṁ saṁpāditam | tadā **yasyānubhāvenanirasta-cittā arayo māṁ** na prahṛtavantaḥ sa sautye vṛta iti kumatitvam ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** **sautya** iti | **sautye** sārathitve **me** mayā **kumatinā vṛtaḥ** | sa **īśvara** ātmānam īśvaratvaṁ vṛto **dadāti** bhajanti ca **bhavyāḥ** | **abhavāya** **yasya** **pāda-padmam** **yasyānubhāvena nirasta-cintā** unmanīkṛtā **arayo na prāharan** | sa sūtaḥ kṛtaḥ | ātmānaṁ nindati ||17|| [mu.pha. 13.10]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tad-viraheṇa tad-aiśvarya-smṛtyā dāsya-bhāvasyaivodayāt svābhāvikasya sakhya-bhāvasyāpalāpāt tat-kārya-sārathyādikam aparādhatvena niścinvan anutapyamāna āha—**sautye** sārathye **abhavāya** mokṣāya **bhavyā bhajanti** ahantva-bhavyas tam eva bhajanam akārayam | etāvad aparādhavaty api mayi tasya dayāṁ śṛṇvaty āha—**śrāntā vāhā** aśvā yasya taṁ **māṁ** jayadratha-vadhe hi jala-pānaṁ vinā aśvāḥ śrāntāḥ, tato rathād avatīrya bāṇair bhuvaṁ bhittvā jalaṁ sampāditaṁ mayā tadā **yasyānubhāvena nirasta-cittā arayo na prāharan** ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **vicchedodita-dainyena dāsyodayāt sakhya-kārya-sārathyādikam aparādhatvena saṁbhāvyānutapyamānaḥ prāha—**sautye** iti | **kumatinā** mayā **ya īśvaraḥ sautye** sūta-karmaṇi sārathye **vṛtaḥ** | **abhavāya** mokṣāya, ahantva-**bhavyo** yat, tam eva bhajanam akārayam iti bhāvaḥ | evam aparādhiny api mayi tasya kāruṇyaṁ śṛṇv ity āha—**śrāntā vāhā** yasya taṁ **māṁ** **bhuviṣṭhaṁ** jayadratha-vadhe rathād avatīrya śrāntāśva-jala-pānāya bāṇair bhuvaṁ bhittvā sampādita-jalaṁ **rathino'rayo** **na prāharan** | kutaḥ? ity atrāha—**yad** iti ||17||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.18 || **

**narmāṇy udāra-rucira-smita-śobhitāni**

**he pārtha he’rjuna sakhe kuru-nandaneti |**

**sañjalpitāni nara-deva hṛdi-spṛśāni**

**smartur luṭhanti hṛdayaṁ mama mādhavasya ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **he **nara-deva** !**udāraṁ** gambhīraṁ **ruciraṁ** ca yat **smitaṁ,** tena **śobhitāni narmāṇi** parihāsa-vākyāni, tathā kārya-prastāveṣu, he pārtha ! ity-ādīni madhurākṣarāṇi **sañjalpitāni** ca hṛdi-spṛśāni manojñāni mādhavasya yāny etāni tānīdānīṁ smartur **mama** **hṛdayaṁ** **luṭhanti** loṭhayanti kṣobhayanti | ṇij-abhāva ārṣaḥ ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** kṛṣṇena sahavāsaṁ smarati śloka-dvayena—**narmāṇi** iti | **narmāṇi** parihāsa-vacāṁsi | he **pārtha** ity-ādi sambodhana-pūrvakaṁ **sañjalpitāni** udāra-vacāṁsi **mama hṛdayaṁ luṭhanti**  śokena itas tataḥ pātayanti ||18|| [mu.pha. 13.11]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **madhurākṣaratvāt hṛdi-spṛśāni luṭhanti loṭhayanti, ṇij-abhāva ārṣaḥ ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **udāraṁ gambhīraṁ ruciraṁ yat smitaṁ tena śobhitāni | madhurākṣaratvān hṛdispṛśāni luṭhanti ākarṣanti ||18||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.19 || **

**śayyāsanāṭana-vikatthana-bhojanādiṣv**

**aikyād vayasya ṛtavān iti vipralabdhaḥ |**

**sakhyuḥ sakheva pitṛvat tanayasya sarvaṁ**

**sehe mahān mahitayā kumater aghaṁ me ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : vikatthanaṁ** sva-guṇa-ślāghanādi | **śayyādiṣv aikyād** avyatirekād dhetoḥ | kadācid vyabhicāraṁ dṛṣṭvā he **vayasya**, **ṛtavān** satya-yuktas tvam iti vakroktayā vipralabdhas tiras-kṛto’pi | "ṛbhumān" iti pāṭhe ṛbhavo devāḥ sevakāḥ santi yasya saḥ | asau **mahān** api mayā vayasya iti matvā **vipralabdhas** tiras-kṛta ity arthaḥ | "ṛtamān" iti pāṭhe vattvābhāva ārṣaḥ | **me agham** aparādham **asahat** | **mahitayā** mahattvena | eka-padye atimahattvenety arthaḥ | **sakhyur** aghaṁ **sakheva** | **tanayasya** aghaṁ **piteva** ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** **śayyā-** iti | **vikatthanaṁ** kalā-kauśala-darśanam | **aikyād** avinābhāvāt | he **vayasya** ! **ṛtavāṁs** tvaṁ satya-yuktas tvam iti lakṣaṇā mūlātyanta-tiraskṛtā | vivakṣita-vācyena dhvaninā vipralambha upahasitaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ **me agham** aparādhaṁ **sehe** | **mahān** **mahitayā** mahattvātiśayena hi mahattvam |19|| [mu.pha. 13.12]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : aikyāt** paraspara-prāṇaikyād **ṛtavāṁs** tvam eva satyavādīti vakroktyā vipralabdhas tiraskṛto’pi | "ṛbhumān" iti pāṭhe ṛbhavo devāḥ sevakāḥ santi yasya, asāv api tiraskṛtaḥ | tad api **mahitayā** sva-mahattvena ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : śayyā** iti | **vikatthanaṁ** aślāghā, **aikyān** mithaś cittābhedāt tvam eva **ṛtavān** satyavādīti vakroktyā vipralabdho'vajñāto'pi sa mahān tat sarvaṁ **me** mama **agham** aparādhaṁ **mahitayā** sva-mahattvena **sehe** iti prāgvad dāsyodayaḥ ||19||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.20 || **

**so’haṁ nṛpendra rahitaḥ puruṣottamena**

**sakhyā priyeṇa suhṛdā hṛdayena śūnyaḥ |**

**adhvany urukrama-parigraham aṅga rakṣan**

**gopair asadbhir abaleva vinirjito’smi ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tvayā śaṅkitaṁ parājayaṁ cāpi prāpto’ham ity āha | tena **sakhyā** rahito’to **hṛdayena** **śūnyaḥ** | **aṅga** ! he rājan ! **urukramasya parigrahaṁ** ṣoḍaśa-sahasra-strī-lakṣaṇam | **asadbhir** nīcaiḥ abalā yoṣeva ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** kṛṣṇa-viyoga-phalaṁ kathayati—**so’ham** iti dvayena | **sakhyam** upakāreṇa | priyatvaṁ nirupadhi premāspadatvena | **suhṛttvaṁ** pratyupakārānapekṣam | upakartṛtvena **urukrama-parigraham** kṛṣṇa-vallabhā-vargaḥ ||20|| [mu.pha. 13.13]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : so’ham** ity ekādaśa-krama-vyākhyāyāṁ tvaṁ tu mad-dharmam āsthāya [bhā.pu. 11.30.49] ity ādau, rājan parasya [bhā.pu. 11.31.11] ity-ādau māyika-līlāmayatvenaiveti darśayiṣyate _|_ brahma-purāṇasyātraivārthe tātparyam avagamyate | arjunaṁ prati vyāsa-vacanam, yathā—


    tat tvayā na hi kartavyaḥ śoko’lpo’pi hi pāṇḍava |


    tenāpy akhila-nāthena sarvaṁ tad upasaṁhṛtam || iti |

_akhilaḥ_ pūrṇa eva _nāthaḥ_ patiḥ kṛṣṇaḥ, tena _tat_ sarvaṁ tat-priyā-vṛndam _upa_ nikaṭa eva samyak-prakāreṇa _apahṛtam_ | arjuna-sakāśād gṛhītam ity evaṁ vyākhyeyam ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tvayā śaṅkitaṁ parājayaṁ ca prāpto’smīty āha, tena sakhyā rahitaḥ ato hṛdayena manasā śūnyaḥ mūrchita-prāya ity arthaḥ, urukramasya parigrahaṁ ṣoḍaśa-sahasra-strī-lakṣaṇam asadbhir nīcaiḥ vastutas tu na vidyante santo yebhyas tair gāṁ pṛthvī dyāṁ ca pāntīti taiḥ gopa-jātitvāc ca gopaiḥ tāḥ sva-preyasīr aprakaṭa-prakāśe praveśanārthaṁ tat-tad-rūpeṇa bhagavataiva tāsām ākarṣaṇāt | na vayaṁ sādhvi sāmrājyaṁ [bhā.pu. 10.83.41] ity ādau, kāmayāmaha etasya ity anena, 


    vraja-striyo yad vāñchanti pulindyas tṛṇa-vīrudhaḥ | 


    gāvaś cārayato gopāḥ pāda-sparśaṁ mahātmanaḥ || [bhā.pu. 10.83.43] 

iti tāsāṁ vākyena vraja-strī-vāñchita eva bhagavat-svarūpaḥ tāsāṁ manoratho’vagataḥ | anyathā tāsāṁ bhagavad-upabhukta-dehānāṁ sākṣāl-lakṣmī-rūpāṇāṁ nīca-sparśe sadya evāntardhānaṁ syād ity ataḥ prakāśāntareṇa tāsāṁ vraja-strītva-prāptir iti jñeyam | viṣṇu-purāṇa-brahma-purāṇayor apy atraivaṛthe tātparyam avagamyate | yathā tatra tatrārjunaṁ prati vyāsa-vacanam, 


    evaṁ tasya muneḥ śāpād aṣṭāvakrasya keśavam | 


    bhartāraṁ prāpya tā yātā dasyu-hastā varāṅganāḥ | [vi.pu. 5.38.84]

iti purā devyo’ṣṭāvakra-muniṁ stutvā viṣṇur vaḥ patir bhaviṣyatīti tasmād varaṁ prāpya tad-aṅga-vakrima-darśanotthād upahāsād dasyu-hastā bhaviṣyathā ity abhiśāpaṁ ca prāpya punaḥ prasāditāc ca tasmāc chāpāntaṁ ca prāpur ato bhartāraṁ prāpya dasyu-hastaṁ gatā iti muneḥ śāpa-prasādayor amoghatvād dasyu-hasta-gatatvaṁ bhartuḥ prāptiś ca tāsāṁ tantreṇaivābhūt, sva-bhartuḥ kṛṣṇasyaiva dasyu-rūpatvaṭ | atas tatraiva punar vacanāntaraṁ ca yathā, 


    tat tvayā na hi kartavyaḥ śoko’lpo’pi hi pāṇḍava | 


    tenāpy akhila-nāthena sarvaṁ tad upasaṁhṛtam || [vi.pu. 5.38.85] iti | 

akhilaḥ pūrṇa eva nāthaḥ patiḥ kṛṣṇas tena tat sarvaṁ sva-priyā-vṛndam upa nikaṭa eva samyak prakāreṇa hṛtam arjunāt sakāśāt gṛhītam ity eva vyākyeyam ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tvayā śaṅkitam adhamaiḥ parājayaṁ ca prāpto'smīty āha—puruṣottamena tena sakhyā rahitas tato hṛdayena cittena ca śūnyaḥ | adhvani mārge uru-kramasya tasya sakhyuḥ parigrahaṁ ṣoḍaśa-sahasra-patnī-rūpaṁ rakṣann aham asadbhir gopair luṇṭhākaiḥ avaleva strīva vinirjito'smīti sarvaṁ mat-sāmarthyaṁ tad-dattamāsīttena vinā tu tat parikṣīṇam iti bhāvaḥ | atra sphuṭārtho na grāhyaḥ, reme ramābhiḥ [bhā.pu. 10.59.43] ity ukteḥ, lakṣmī-rūpāṇāṁ tāsām asadbhiḥ sparśāsambhavāt, tat-sannikarṣe'ntardhāna-sambhavāc ca | tataś cāyam evārthaḥ— na vayaṁ sādhvi! sāmrājyam [bhā.pu. 10.8341] ity-ādau vrajastriyo yad vāñchanti [bhā.pu. 10.83.43] iti draupadīṁ prati tāsāṁ vākyād-vrajadevī-vāñchite gopaveśe'timanojñe kṛṣṇe'bhilāṣobhūt—iti pratītes tat-sampādanāya gopaiḥ pṛthivyā divaś ca pālakair gopa-veśaiḥ kṛṣṇasya prakāśerasadbhiḥ sattamais tāsām arjunādākarṣaṇaṁ rūpāntarair vraja-devītva-prāpaṇaṁ tad idam arjunasyāpy aviditam iti pratīta-rūpatayā tan-nivedanam iti suṣṭhu | śrī-viṣṇu-purāṇatyāpi asminn evārthe tātparyam—


        evaṁ tasya muneḥ śāpād aṣṭāvakrasya keśavam | 


        bhartāraṁ prāpya tā yātā dasyu-hastā varāṅganāḥ || [vi.pu. 5.38.84] iti,

tatrārjunaṁ prati vyāsa-vākyam | purā devo'ṣṭāvakraṁ stutvā viṣṇur vaḥ patir bhaviṣyatīti tasmād varaṁ tac-charīra-vakratva-vīkṣaṇodgatena hāsena kupitat-tasmād-dasyu-hastā bhaviṣyatheti śāpaṁ ca prāpya punaḥ prasāditāt-tasmāc-chāpāntaṁ prāpuḥ | ato muniśāpa-prasādayor avyarthatvād-dasyu-hastatva-bhartṛ-prāptyos tantreṇaivoktiḥ, bhartur eva dasyutvāt | atas tatraiva taṁ prati tad-vākyaṁ—


        tvayā tu na hi kartavyaḥ śoko'lpo'pi hi pāṇḍava! 


        tenāpy akhila-nāthena sarvaṁ tad upasaṁhṛtam || [vi.pu. 5.38.85] iti |

tena kṛṣṇena sarvaṁ tatsvapatnī-vṛndam upa svasannidhau samyak tvatto hṛtaṁ gṛhītam iti tāś caitā ramāsu praviṣṭā bodhyāḥ ||20||

**...**

**|| 1.15.21 || **

**tad vai dhanus ta iṣavaḥ sa ratho hayās te**

**so’haṁ rathī nṛpatayo yata ānamanti |**

**sarvaṁ kṣaṇena tad abhūd asad īśa-riktaṁ**

**bhasman hutaṁ kuhaka-rāddham ivoptam ūṣyām ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **sa ratho’hayās ta iti tādṛśā ity arthaḥ | ta iṣavaḥ itīva |


    sadṛśe vā pradhāne vā kāraṇe vā tad ity ayam |


    śabdaḥ saṅghaṭate bhede vidyamāne’pi tattvataḥ || iti brahma-tarke |

tad-ratha-hayānāṁ dāhokteḥ ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** **tad** iti | yato **dhanur**-ādeḥ **asad** aprayojakam | **īśena** **riktaṁ** hīnaṁ yathā **ūṣyām** ūṣara-bhūmnyām **uptam** | **kuhakena** kapaṭena **rāddhaṁ** prāptam | tad eva **bhasmani hutam** | etad yathātyantam aprayojakam idam ity arthaḥ ||21|| [mu.pha. 13.14]

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **śrī-kṛṣṇa-viyoga evātra hetur nānya ity āha—tad iti | **yato** yebhyo **nṛpatayaānamantiīśena riktaṁ** śūnyam asat-kāryākṣamaṁ san mantra-vidhānair api **bhasmanihutam** iva | atiprītād api **kuhakān** māyāvinaḥ sakāśād **rāddhaṁ** labdhaṁ yathā asat | samyak karṣaṇādināpy **ūṣara**-bhūmāv **uptaṁ** bījam iva ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**tad vai dhanus ta iṣavaḥ sa ratho hayās te**

**so’haṁ rathī nṛpatayo yata ānamanti |**

**sarvaṁ kṣaṇena tad abhūd asad īśa-riktaṁ**

**bhasman hutaṁ kuhaka-rāddham ivoptam ūṣyām ||**

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **śrī-kṛṣṇa-viyoga evātra hetur nānya ity āha—**tad** iti | **yato** **dhanur**-ādibhyo hetubhyo mām **ānamanti** tat **sarvam īśena riktam asat** kāryākṣamam | **bhasmani hutam** iti niṣphalatve **kuhakān** māyāvinaḥ sakāśāt **rāddhaṁ** prāptam ity avastu-bhūtatve **ūṣyām** ūṣara-bhūmau **uptam** iti naśyad avasthatve dṛṣṭāntaḥ ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kṛṣṇa-viccheda evātra hetur nānyad ity āha—**tad** iti | **yato** **dhanur**-āder hetor māṁ **nṛpatayā ānamanti**, **tat sarvam īśena** kṛṣṇena **riktam** **asat** kāryākṣamam abhūt | tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ—yathā san-mantrādi-vidhānair api **bhasmani hutaṁ** vyartham | **kuhaka-rāddhaṁ** māyāvi-labdham | **uṣyāṁ** samyak karṣaṇādibhir ūṣara-bhūmāv **uptaṁ** ca tadvat ||21||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.22-23 || **

**rājaṁs tvayānupṛṣṭānāṁ suhṛdāṁ naḥ suhṛt-pure |**

**vipra-śāpa-vimūḍhānāṁ nighnatāṁ muṣṭibhir mithaḥ ||**

**vāruṇīṁ madirāṁ pītvā madonmathita-cetasām |**

**ajānatām ivānyonyaṁ catuḥ-pañcāvaśeṣitāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **suhṛt-pure tvayā pṛṣṭānāṁ naḥ suhṛdāṁ madhye catvāraḥ paṁ ca vāvaśeṣitāḥ | tatra hetuḥ—vipra-śāpety ādi | vāruṇīm annamayīm | ajānatām ivānyonyam erakā-muṣṭibhir nighnatām ||22-23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **erakā-muṣṭibhir mitho nighnatāṁ suhṛtāṁ madhye catvāraḥ paṁ ca vā avaśeṣitāḥ ||22-23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **erakāmuṣṭibhir mitho nighnatāṁ suhṛdāṁ madhye catvaraḥ paṁ ca vāvaśeṣitā ity uttareṇānvayaḥ | tatra bījam āha—vipreti ||22||  \
 \
vāruṇīmannamayīn ||23||

 **...**

|| 1.15.24 || 

**prāyeṇaitad bhagavata īśvarasya viceṣṭitam |**

**mitho nighnanti bhūtāni bhāvayanti ca yan mithaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **avaśeṣitā ity anenoktaṁ hetu-kartāram āha tribhiḥ—prayeṇeti | bhāvayanti pālayanti ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **prāyeṇeti duḥkhoktir iyaṁ tādṛśa-līlā-dṛṣṭy-anusāreṇaiva ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kenāvaśeṣitā ity apekṣāyām āha—prayeṇeti | etad yadu-kula-saṁharaṇam | prāya-grahaṇaṁ lokokti-rītyaiva, na tu siddhānta-rītyety āha—mitha iti | yat yato nimitta-bhūtād bhāvayanti pālayanti ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kenāvaśeṣitā ity apekṣāyām āha—prāyeṇeti | etad-yadu-kula-saṁharaṇaṁ, lokarītyaivedaṁ na tu vastuta ity āha—mitha iti | yad-yato nimittād-bhāvayanti pālayanti ||24||

 **...**

|| 1.15.25 || 

**jalaukasāṁ jale yadvan mahānto’danty aṇīyasaḥ |**

**durbalān balino rājan mahānto balino mithaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **jalaukasāṁ matsyādīnāṁ madhye mahāntaḥ sthūlā aṇīyasaḥ sūkṣmād yathādanti bhakṣayanti ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **jalaukasāṁ matsyādīnāṁ madhye mahāntaḥ sthūlā aṇīyasaḥ sūkṣmān yathā bhakṣayanti, balinas tulya-balās tu mithaḥ parasparam eva | ye yān śaknuvantīty arthaḥ ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **jalaukasāṁ matsyādīnāṁ madhye mahāntaḥ sthūlā yathāṇīyasaḥ sūkṣmānadanti tadvat ye mahānto balinaste tu mithaḥ ye yān śaknuvantīty arthaḥ ||25||

 **...**

|| 1.15.26 || 

**evaṁ baliṣṭhair yadubhir mahadbhir itarān vibhuḥ |**

**yadūn yadubhir anyonyaṁ bhū-bhārān sañjahāra ha ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **evaṁ baliṣṭhair madadbhiḥ pāṇḍavair duryodhana-jarāsandhāsīn nihatya yadubhir itarān śālvādīn nihatya yadūn yadubhir anyonyaṁ nihatya bhagavān bhuvo bhāra-bhūtān saṁhṛtavān ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **eṣām adharmikatvena bhāratvaṁ ca, bhū-bhāra-rāja-pṛtanā yadubhir nirasya [bhā.pu. 11.1.3] ity atraikādaśe parihariṣyate ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **bhū-bhārān bhū-bhāra-bhūtān yadūn sañjahāra ity arjunādīn prati bhagavatā tal-līlāyās tathaiva pratyāyitatvāt | tat-kāraṇaṁ tatraiva ekādaśyānte vyaktībhaviṣyati | kiṁ ca, tad api bhū-bhāra-bhūtān yadūn ity arjunoktyā, na tu bhuvo’laṅkāra-bhūtān yadūn, tan-nitya-parikarāṇāṁ yadūnām | ye tu devās tatraiva yadu-vaṁśāvatāreṇa praviśyodbhūtās teṣām  api rajas-tamo-rahitānāṁ bhāratvena vaktum anucitānām api sva-sva-pada-prāpaṇāya tan-miṣeṇaivopasaṁhārārtham | aṣṭādaśākṣauhiṇiko mad-aṁśair āste balaṁ durvisāhaṁ yadūnāṁ [bhā.pu. 3.3.14] ity uktavatā bhagavatā bhāratvāropaḥ kṛtaḥ ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **evaṁ mahadbhir valibhir yadubhir itarān bhūbhārān yadūn vibhuḥ sañjahāra | ye'tra brahma-nirdeśād-devāṁśā yaduṣvavatīrṇās tān prākṛtān eva bhūbhārān sañjahāra, ye tu nitya-pārṣadā yadavaste khalu tad-bhārabhūtā na bhavanty api tu tad alaṅkṛtaya eva, na hi taruṇyā bhūṣaṇa-bhūmā bhāratvāyāpitu saukhyāyaiva, te hi sārddhaṁ tena dvārvatyam evāsannity ekādaśe vyākhyāsyāmaḥ ||26||

 **...**

|| 1.15.27 || 

**deśa-kālārtha-yuktāni hṛt-tāpopaśamāni ca |**

**haranti smarataś cittaṁ govindābhihitāni me ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **ataḥ paraṁ vaktuṁ na śaknomīti sūcayann āha | deśa-kālocitārtha-yuktāni manaḥ-pīḍopaśama-kaṛāṇi ca govindasya vacanāni smarato me mama cittaṁ haranty ākarṣanti ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **ataḥ paraṁ vaktuṁ na śaknomi tvam api kiñcin mā pṛcchety āha deśeti | yasmin deśe yasmin vā kāle yasmin vā arthe yuktāni samucitāni yāni yāni govindasyābhihitāni vacanāni tāni smarato mama hṛdayaṁ haranti lumpanti ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **evaṁ pratītikaṁ tatratyaṁ kadanam abhidhāya kṛṣṇasya caritaṁ smarann āha—govindasyābhihitāni vacāṁsi smarato me cittaṁ haranti | kīdṛṁśīty āha—yasmin deśe kāle'rthe vā yuktānyucitāni ||27||

 **...**

|| 1.15.28 ||

**sūta uvāca—**

**evaṁ cintayato jiṣṇoḥ kṛṣṇa-pāda-saroruham |**

**sauhārdenātigāḍhena śāntāsīd vimalā matiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **evam iti sūtoktiḥ | atidṛḍhena snehena **kṛṣṇa-pāda-saroruhaṁ cintayato**’rjunasya **matiḥ śāntā** viśokā **vimalā** viraktā **cāsīt** ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **evam iti | **śāntā** cetasi cakṣuṣīva bhagavad-āvirbhāvena duḥkha-rahitā | ata eva **vimalā** tad-vṛtti-bhūtā ye kāluṣya-viśeṣās tair api rahitā ||28|| [prīti-sandarbhaḥ 52] 

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : matis** tad-viraha-santaptāpi **śāntā** nirantara-tac-cintana-janita-sphūrti-labdhena tena nirvāpita-dāhatvāt śītalety arthaḥ | ata eva **vimalā** asthairya-lakṣaṇa-mālinyam api tasyā vigatam ity arthaḥ ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **evam iti sūtoktiḥ | jiṣṇor matir harivir aha-santaptā santata-tac-cintāvirbhūtena tena śāntā nirvāpita-tat-tāpātiśītāsīdity arthaḥ | vimalā vigatāsthairya-mālinyā ||28||

 **...**

|| 1.15.29 || 

**vāsudevāṅghry-anudhyāna- paribṛṁhita-raṁhasā |**

**bhaktyā nirmathitāśeṣa- kaṣāya-dhiṣaṇo’rjunaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **mati-vaimalya-phalam āha | **vāsudevāṅghry-anudhyāyena paribṛṁhitaṁ raṁho** vego yasyās tayā **bhaktyā nirmathitā** unmūlitā **aśeṣā kaṣāyāḥ** kāmādayo yasyāḥ sā **dhiṣaṇā** buddhir yasya saḥ | jñānaṁ punar adhyagamad [30] ity uttareṇānvayaḥ ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **vāsudeveti pūrvasyaiva vivaraṇam idaṁ padya-dvayam | tatra **anudhyānaṁ** pūrvoktā cintaiva | **kaṣāyaḥ** pūrvoktaṁ malam eva ||29|| [prīti-sandarbhaḥ 52]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu kāmādayaḥ kaṣāyā api mala-śabdenocyante, satyam | arjunasya bhagavan-nitya-parikaratvena sākṣān narāvatāratvena ca tad-asambhava eva, mahendrāṁśatvena kaṣāyaḥ sambhavati cet, tad api naivety āha—vāsudeveti | janmārabhyaivotpannayā **bhaktyā** prathamata eva **nirmathitā** unmūlitā **aśeṣāḥ kaṣāyāḥ** kāmādayo yasyāḥ sā **dhiṣaṇā** buddhir yasya, tathābhūta evārjunaḥ ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nirmathito'śeṣaḥ kṛtsnaḥ kaṣāyo yasyās tādṛśī dhiṣaṇā dhīr yasya so'rjunaḥ iti tat-praviṣṭa-śakrāṁśaviṣayam etat, svayam arjunas tu yo'haṁ tam arjunaṁ viddhi yo'rjunaḥ so'ham eva ca [mauṣala. 62.1] iti mauṣalīya-bhagavad-vākyena tad-rūpa eveti na tatra tādṛśatvaṁ sambhāvyam ||29||

 **...**

|| 1.15.30 || 

**gītaṁ bhagavatā jñānaṁ yat tat saṅgrāma-mūrdhani |**

**kāla-karma-tamo-ruddhaṁ punar adhyagamat prabhuḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** kālena karmabhis tamasā bhogābhiniveśena ca ruddham āvṛtaṁ sat ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : gītaṁ **mām evaiṣyasi [gītā 18.65] ity antam | **kālo** bhagaval-līlecchā-mayaḥ | **karma** tal-līlā | **tamas** tal-līlāveśena tad-anusandhānam | **adhyagamat** tan-mahā-vicchedasya tasyānte’pi tathā tat-prāptaḥ **punar **mām evaiṣyasi ity etad vākyaṁ yathārthatvenānubhūtavān ||30|| [prīti-sandarbhaḥ 52]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kintu priyasya viccheda-dave priyokti-smṛtyaiva sandhukṣaṇam āturasya iti rītyā tan-mukha-candra-vinirgataṁ sarva-santāpopaśamanaṁ gītāmṛtam eva pātum ārebhe ity āha—gītam iti | **kālādibhir avaruddham** avismṛtam | tatra **tamo**’ndhakāra-samas tad-viraha eva ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kiñ ca, bhāratāhave bhagavatoktam anusmṛtya tad-virahatāpas tasya samaśamyadity āha—gītam iti | 


        manmanā bhava mad-bhakto-mad-yājī-māṁ-namaskuru | 


        mām evaiṣyasi satyaṁ te pratijāne priyo'si me || [gītā 9.34] iti,

yat-tena gītaṁ tat-punar adhyagamat | he arjuna tvaṁ saṁprati mā bhīto'si, mat-tirodhānottaraṁ ca mām eva eṣyasīty arthaḥ | tat kīdṛśaṁ? kālena bahusamvatsarātmakena karmaṇā rājya-vyāpāreṇa tamasā bhogābhiniveśena cāruddhama-vismṛtaṁ tad adhunā karma-tamaḥ-śūnyo'dhikam agamad anvabhūd ity arthaḥ ||30||

 **...**

|| 1.15.31 || 

**viśoko brahma-sampattyā sañchinna-dvaita-saṁśayaḥ |**

**līna-prakṛti-nairguṇyād aliṅgatvād asambhavaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **jñāna-phalam āha—**viśoka** iti | etad eva śoka-hetv-abhāvenopapādayati | śokasya hi hetur dvaita-bhramaḥ, tasya dehaḥ, tasya liṅgaṁ, tasya guṇāḥ, teṣām  avidyā | tatra **brahma-saṁpattyā** vedānta-śravaṇena "brahm āham" iti jñānena **līnā prakṛtir** avidyā yasmiṁs tan-**nairguṇyaṁ** bhavati, na tu suṣupti-pralayayor ivāvidyā-śeṣaḥ | tasmān nairguṇyād guṇa-kārya-liṅga-nāśaḥ | **aliṅgatvāc cāsambhavaḥ** samyag bhogāya bhavati, punaḥ punar iti sambhavaḥ sthūla-dehaḥ, tad-rahitaḥ | tataś ca tat-paricchedābhāvāt **sañchinno dvaita**-lakṣaṇaḥ **saṁśayo** bhramo yasya, sa **viśoko** jāta iti ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tataś ca kṛtārtho’bhavad ity āha—viśoka ity-ādi | **brahma-sampattyā** śrīman-narākāra-para-brahma-sākṣātkāreṇa | **sañchinna **"iyaṁ mama cetasi sphūrtir eva | sākṣātkāras tv anyaḥ" iti **dvaite saṁśayo** yena saḥ | tadā bhagavat-prāptau nānyavaj-janmāntara-prāpti-kāla-sandhir apy antarāyo’bhavad ity āha—līneti | **līnā** palāyitā **prakṛtir** guṇa-kāraṇaṁ yasmād, evaṁ-bhūtaṁ yan **nairguṇyaṁ,** tasmād dhetoḥ, guṇa-tat-kāraṇātītatvād ity arthaḥ | tathaiva **aliṅgatvāt** prākṛta-śarīra-rahitatvāc ca | **asambhavo** janmāntara-rahitaḥ | tasmād anantaraṁ cakṣuṣy āvirbhavatīty eva viśeṣa iti bhāvaḥ | 

ataḥ kaliṁ prati śrī-parīkṣid-vacanaṁ—yas tvaṁ dūraṁ gate kṛṣṇe saha gāṇḍīva-dhanvanā [bhā.pu. 1.17.6] iti, evaṁ ye’dhyāsanaṁ rāja-kirīṭa-juṣṭaṁ sadyo jahur bhagavat-pārśva-kāmāḥ [bhā.pu. 1.19.20] iti śrī-muni-vṛnda-vākyaṁ ca | tasmāt sarveṣāṁ pāṇḍavānāṁ tadīyānāṁ ca saiva gatiḥ vyākhyeyā ||31|| [prīti-sandarbhaḥ 52]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** tatra ca,


    man-manā bhava mad-bhakto mad-yajī māṁ namaskuru | 


    mām evaiṣyasi kaunteya pratijāne priyo’si me || [gītā 18.65]

ity atra padye eṣyasīti bhaviṣyan-nirdeśenedaṁ dyotitam, "he kaunteya ! samprati tvaṁ mām eṣyasy eva | yadā tu tava mad-viyogo mahān bhāvī, tadā māṁ prāptuṁ yatiṣyamāṇasya tava tad-upāyam aham adhunaiva snehena bravīmi" iti sva-prāpty-arthaṁ yad dhyānam uktaṁ, samprati tena muhur abhyastena dhyānenaiva tat-pārśva-gatam evātmaṇam abhimanyamānasyāpi "mama deha evāntarāyo yato’yaṁ madhye madhye bahir vṛttim anubhāvya māṁ śokārṇave kṣipati | tad asmād dehād ātmanaḥ pārthakyam āpādayituṁ sarva-śāstrāstra-vidyāvat pūrvābhyastaṁ yogam eva lakṣaṇaṁ[^129] anuśīlayāmi" iti manasi niścitya cinmaya-śarīro’pi ātmānaṁ śrī-kṛṣṇaṁ nitya-priya-sakhatvena nārāyaṇa-sakhatvena vā nānusandadhānaḥ prema-vaivaśyena prākṛtaṁ naram eva jānaṁs tad-bhāvāpalāpāya kṣaṇa-mātreṇaiva yogārūḍho babhūvety āha—viśoka iti | 

**brahma-sampattyā** prāptayā **viśoko**’bhūd iti tad-abhimaty-anusāreṇaiva sūtoktiḥ, vastutas tu prapañca-gatāṁ sampattiṁ tyaktvā brahma-sampattyā aprakaṭa-prakāśa-gatayā śrī-kṛṣṇa-priya-sakhatva-prāptyā viśokaḥ vigata-śokaḥ **sañchinno dvaite saṁśayaḥ, **"dehena saha mama sambandho’sti nāsti vā" iti sandeho yasya saḥ | vastutas tu dvaite sakhyuḥ śrī-kṛṣṇāt sakāśāt svasya bhinnatve sati saṁśayaḥ pūrvam āvayoḥ paraspara-sakhyād aikyam āsīt, samprati tu dvaitaṁ vṛttam | tad adhunā sa kṛṣṇaḥ kiṁ punar api sakhya-sukha-mayādvaita eva māṁ neṣyati ? 

kiṁ vā, pārthakya-lakṣaṇa-dvaita-duḥkha-sindhau nimajjayiṣyatīti bhāvanā-mayaḥ sandehaḥ sañchinno yasya saḥ | na ca tasya prākṛta-lokasyeva[^130] punaḥ saṁsāra āśaṅkanīya ity āha—**līna** iti spaṣṭam | vastutas tu līnaṁ suśliṣṭaṁ durlakṣyaṁ yat prakṛtitaḥ svabhāvād eva **nairguṇyaṁ** kṛṣṇa-sakhatvena guṇātītatvaṁ, tasmād ev**āliṅgatvaṁ** liṅga-dehābhāvaḥ, tat eva na samyag-bhavaḥ saṁsāro yasya saḥ | 

yad vā, mahendrāṁśa-bhūto’rjunas tu jīvan-mukto’bhūd ity āha—viśoka iti | sañchinno dvaita-saṁśayaḥ prapañcānusandhāna-gata-śoka-mohādir yasya saḥ | tatra hetuḥ—līnā īśvare līnīkṛtā yā prakṛtiḥ, tata eva yan nairguṇyaṁ, tasmāt | ata ev**āliṅgatvāl** liṅga-dehāpagamād **asambhavaḥ** apunar janmety arthaḥ ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tatas tasya kṛṣṇa-sākṣātkāro'bhūd ity āha—brahmaṇaḥ sva-sakhasya sampattyā sākṣātkāreṇa viśokaḥ | tataḥ saṁchinno dvaita-saṁśaye yasya saḥ | śayyāsanāṭana-vikatthana-bhojanādiṣvaikyād iti yan-mayā cittaikyam anubhūtam āsīt-tasmin sāṁpratikena dvaitena tyāga-vibhātena citta-bhedena yaḥ saṁśayas tadaikyaṁ sampādayiṣyati na veti bhāvanāmayaḥ sandehaḥ, sa tasya sañchinnas tathaiva tadaikya-prāpter ity arthaḥ | na cārjunasyānyavat purāpi saṁsāro'stīty āha—līnaṁ suśliṣṭaṁ durlakṣyaṁ yat prakṛtyā svabhāvenaiva nairguṇyaṁ narāvatāratvāt kṛṣṇa-sakhatvāc ca guṇātītatvaṁ tasmād evāliṅgatvāl-liṅga-śarīra-virahād asambhavaḥ saṁsārābhāvaḥ sarvadaivaty arthaḥ ||31||

 **...**

|| 1.15.32 || 

**niśamya bhagavan-mārgaṁ saṁsthāṁ yadu-kulasya ca |**

**svaḥ-pathāya matiṁ cakre nibhṛtātmā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : bhagavato mārgam** ālakṣya **yadu-kulasya saṁsthāṁ** nāśaṁ śrutvā nāradoktaṁ cānusmṛtya **svaḥ-pathāya** svarga-mārgāya | **nibhṛtātmā** niścala-cittaḥ ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : bhagavan-mārgaṁ niśamya** vitarkya | **yadu-kulasya casaṁsthāṁniśamya** śrutvā | śrī-kṛṣṇasya nitya-sāmīpyena samyak sthitiṁ vitarkyeti vāstavo’rthaḥ | **svaḥ** śrī-kṛṣṇa-dhāma, ye’dhyāsanaṁ [bhā.pu. 1.19.20] ity ādau, sadyo jahur bhagavat-pārśva-kāmā ity anena tad-artham eva kṛta-prayatnatvāt, brahmādayo lokapālāḥ svar vāsam abhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ iti śrī-bhagavad-vākyāc ca ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : mārgaṁ** padavīṁ cāturya-paripāṭīm iti yāvat | **saṁsthāṁ** vakṣyamāṇa-siddhāntānusāreṇa aprakaṭa-prakāśa-gatatvena samyak sthitaṁ svāntar daśāyāṁ tad-bahir daśāyāṁ tu nāśaṁ ca | **svaḥ** śrī-kṛṣṇadhāma | ye’dhyāsanaṁ rāja-kirīṭa-juṣṭaṁ sadyo jahur bhagavat-pārśva-kāmāḥ [bhā.pu. 1.19.20] ity uktatvāt | tathā sampadaḥ kratavo lokā ity-ādibhyaś ca | **yudhiṣṭhira** ity upalakṣaṇam | pañcaiva bhrātaraḥ svaḥ-pathāya śrī-kṛṣṇa-dhāma-pathaṁ gantuṁ **matiṁ cakruḥ** | **nibhṛtātmā** anyālakṣita-citta-vyāpāraḥ ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **mārgaṁ padavīṁ, saṁsthām aprakaṭa-prakāśe samyak sthitiṁ niśamya śrutvā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ svapathāya śrī-kṛṣṇa-loka-mārgaṁ gantuṁ matiñcakre, ye'dhyāsanaṁ rāja-kirīṭa-juṣṭaṁ sadyojahur bhagavat-pārśva-kāmāḥ [bhā.pu. 1.19.20] ity ukteḥ | nibhṛtātmānyālakṣita-citta-vyāpāraḥ | yudhiṣṭhira iti bhīmādīnām upalakṣaṇam ||32||

 **...**

|| 1.15.33 || 

**pṛthāpy anuśrutya dhanañjayoditaṁ**

**nāśaṁ yadūnāṁ bhagavad-gatiṁ ca tām |**

**ekānta-bhaktyā bhagavaty adhokṣaje**

**niveśitātmopararāma saṁsṛteḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tāṁ durvijñeyām | vakṣyati hy ekādaśe—


    saudāminyā yathākāśe yāntyā hitvābhra-maṇḍalam | \
gatir na lakṣyate martyais tathā kṛṣṇasya daivataiḥ || [bhā.pu. 11.31.9] iti |

**saṁsṛter upararāma** jīvan-muktā babhūva | dehaṁ jahāv iti vā ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : nāśaṁ** loka-dṛṣṭyāḥ, vastutas tv adarśanam eva | **bhagavaty adhokṣaje niveśitātmā** iti bhagavataḥ pṛthā-dhyānālambanatvaṁ darśayitvā pṛthayānubhūtāṁ sthitim eva darśayati | tatra saudāminyā [bhā.pu. 11.31.9] ity-ādy ekādaśa-skandha-padyātmakaṁ śāstraṁ saudāminyā api nāśaṁ niṣedhayati cet, tarhy atrāpi tad-dṛṣṭyā sutarām eva tan mantavyam | tad uktaṁ tatraiva, 


    devādayo brahma-mukhyā na viśantaṁ sva-dhāmani | 


    avijñāta-gatiṁ kṛṣṇaṁ dadṛśuś cātivismitāḥ || [bhā.pu. 11.31.8] iti | 

**saṁsṛteḥ** prapañcāvatārāt ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tāṁ prasiddhām antardhāna-lakṣaṇām | **saṁsṛteḥ** samyak saraṇāt prapañce ’vatārāt **upararāma** sadya eva vāntardadhāv ity arthaḥ | tac-chravaṇa-kṣaṇa eva tad-viyoga-janitāṁ daśamīm api daśāṁ darśayāmāseti vā ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nāśam adarśanaṁ, tāṁ prasiddhāṁ tirodhāna-rūpāṁ, saṁskṛteḥ prapañca-sañcārād upararāma sadya evāntaradhāt ||33||

 **...**

|| 1.15.34 || 

**yayāharad bhuvo bhāraṁ tāṁ tanuṁ vijahāv ajaḥ |**

**kaṇṭakaṁ kaṇṭakeneva dvayaṁ cāpīśituḥ samam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tad evam uktam api yādavebhyo bhagavato vailakṣaṇyam abuddhvā tat-sāmyaṁ vadato manda-matīn prati vailakṣaṇyaṁ spaṣṭayati dvābhyām | **yayā** yādava-rūpayā **tanvābhuvobhāraṅkaṇṭakena kaṇṭakam ivāharat** | yādava-tanuṁ bhū-bhāra-tanuṁ ceti **dvayam api īśvarasya** saṁhāryatvena **samam** eva ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **yayeti | tanu-rūpa-kalevara-śabdair atra śrī-bhagavato bhū-bhāra-jihīrṣā-lakṣaṇo devādi-pipālayiṣā-lakṣaṇaś ca bhāra evocyate | yathā tṛtīye viṁśatitame tat-tac-chabdair brahmaṇo bhāra evoktaḥ | yadi tatraiva tathā vyākhyeyaṁ, tadā sutarām eva śrī-bhagavatīti | tataś ca tasya bhārasya bhagavati tad-ābhāsa-rūpatvāt kaṇṭaka-dṛṣṭāntaḥ susaṅgata eva | tathā **dvayam eveśituḥ sāmyam** api | tat tu tṛtīya-śrī-paramātma-sandarbhe vivṛtam asti || [kṛṣṇa-sandarbha 106]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yādavādīnām antima-daśā-śravaṇena viṣīdataḥ śaunakādīn āśvāsayan siddhānta-rahasyam āha—yayeti | **yayā** yādavādi-**tanvābhuvaḥ** sva-pāda-bhūtāyā [sva-pāda-mūlāyāḥ] **bhāraṁ kaṇṭakena** sūcy-agreṇa **kaṇṭakam iva aharat**, tām eva tanuṁ vijahau | devadatto vasanaṁ vijahāv itivat sva-saṅgād vicyutīcakārety arthaḥ, na tu yayā nityaṁ krīḍati tām apīti bhāvaḥ | tena aṁśāvataraṇa-samaye ye devā nitya-bhūteṣu praviṣṭāḥ, te eva tebhyo yoga-balena niṣkāsya prabhāsaṁ gamitāḥ, tad-deha-tyāgaṁ lokān māyayaiva darśayatā bhagavatā madhu-pānānantaraṁ deva-rūpīkṛtya svargaṁ prāpayāmāsire ity ekādaśānta-vyākhyānusṛtyā jñeyam | nitya-lilā-parikarā yādavās tu prāpañcika-lokālakṣitāḥ śrī-kṛṣṇena samaṁ dvārakāyām eva yathā-pūrvam eva khelantīti bhāgavatāmṛtokta-siddhāntād avagantavyam | 

**dvayam** iti | bhū-bhāra-bhūtā asurā yādavādi-rūpā devāś ceti dvayam **īśituḥ** parameśvarasya **samam** eva | kintu dṛṣṭānte kaṇṭakatvena sāmye’pi karaṇa-bhūtasya sūcy-agrasya upakārakatvenāntaraṅgatvaṁ karma-bhūtasya kaṇṭakasyāpakārakatvena sāmye’pi bahir aṅgatvam ity api jñāpitam | sūcy-agre kṣudra-śatrau ca lomaharṣe ca kaṇṭakaḥ ity amaraḥ ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yādavānāṁ vināśaṁ śrutvā khinnān śaunakādīn siddhānta-rahasyenāśvāsayann āha—yayeti | yayā brahmādeśāvatīrṇa-devāṁśa-yādavatanvā, jātyaika-vacanaṁ, paratrāpyevam | padbhyāṁ bhūmiḥ [ṛk 8.4.19] iti śruteḥ | svapada-bhūtāyā bhuvo bhāraṁ daitya-rājanya-rūpam aharat, kaṇṭakena sūcyagreṇa kaṇṭakam iva—tāṁ tad-rūpāṁ tanumajo nitya-mūrtir bhagavān jahau svasaṅgād viyuktāñcakāra | sūcyagre kṣudra-śatrau ca lomaharṣe ca kaṇṭakaḥ ity amaraḥ | īśitur jagad-vyāpāriṇaḥ pareśasya bhū-bhāra-daitya-rājanya-vṛndaṁ devāṁśabhūta-yādava-vṛndaṁ ceti dvayaṁ samam upekṣyatayā tulyam ity arthaḥ | na cātrāviśeṣa-pratīter devāṁśa-yādava-rūpāṁ tanuṁ jahāviti na śakyaṁ vaktum iti vācyam | aviśeṣa-svīkāre sarvadā mat-priyā devi | [pa.pu. uttarakhaṇḍe 71] ity ukti-vyākopāt ||34||

 **...**

|| 1.15.35 || 

**yathā matsyādi-rūpāṇi dhatte jahyād yathā naṭaḥ |**

**bhū-bhāraḥ kṣapito yena jahau tac ca kalevaram ||**[^131]

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **śrī-kṛṣṇa-mūrter viśeṣam āha—yatheti | tāny api tathā dhatte jahāti ca | tad āha—**yathā naṭo** nija-rūpeṇa sthito’pi rūpāntarāṇi **dhatte**’ntar dhatte ca, tathā **tad api kalevaraṁ jahau,** antar adhād ity arthaḥ ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : matsyādi-rūpāṇi** matsyādy-avatāreṣu tat-tad-bhārān | atha **naṭa**-dṛṣṭānte’pi naṭaḥ śravya-rūpakābhinetā | vyākhyātaṁ ca taiḥ prathamasyaikādaśe—naṭā nava-rasābhinaya-caturāḥ [1.11.21] iti | tato yathā śravya-rūpakābhinetā naṭaḥ svarūpeṇa sva-veśena ca sthita eva pūrva-vṛttam abhinayena gāyan nāyaka-nāyikādi-bhāvaṁ dhatte jahāti ca, tatheti | 

athavā, nāhaṁ prakāśaḥ sarvasya yoga-māyā-samāvṛtaḥ [gītā. 7.25] iti śrī-gīta-vacanena |


    yogibhir dṛśyate bhaktyā nābhaktyā dṛśyate kvacit |


    draṣṭuṁ na śakyo roṣāc ca matsarāc ca janārdanaḥ || 

iti pādmottara-khaṇḍa-nirṇayena | mallānām aśaniḥ [bhā.pu. 10.43.17] iti śrī-bhāgavata-darśanena | ātma-vināśāya bhagavad-dhasta-cakrāṁśu-mālojjvalam akṣaya-tejaḥ-svarūpaṁ parama-brahma-bhūtam apagata-dveṣādi-doṣo bhagavantam adrākṣīt [vi.pu. 4.15.15] iti śiśupālam uddiśya viṣṇu-purāṇa-gadyena cāsureṣu yad rūpaṁ sphurati, tat tasya svarūpaṁ na bhavati, kintu māyā-kalpitam eva | svarūpe dṛṣṭe dveṣaś cāpayātīti | tataś cāsureṣu sphuratyā yayā tanvā bhuvo bhāra-rūpam asura-vṛndam aharat, tāṁ tanuṁ vijahau | punas tat-pratyāyanaṁ na cakārety arthaḥ | bhakti-dṛśyā tanus tu tasya nitya-siddhaivety āha—aja [gītā. 4.6] iti, devakyāṁ deva-rūpiṇyāṁ [bhā.pu. 10.3.8] ity ādeḥ, kṛṣṇaṁ ca tatra chandobhiḥ stūyamānaṁ [bhā.pu. 10.28.17] ity atra golokādhiṣṭhātṛtva-nirdeśāc ca | 

tataś ca, yathā naṭa aindrajālikaḥ kaścit sva-bhakṣakānāṁ bakādīnāṁ nigrahāya matsyādy-ākārān dhatte, svasmin pratyāyati tan-nigrahe sati yathā ca tāni jahāti, tathā so’yam ajo’pi yena māyitvena lakṣyatāṁ prāpitena rūpeṇa bhū-bhāra-rūpāsura-vargaḥ kṣapita-tad-vargaṁ kṣapitavān ity arthaḥ | tac ca kalevaram ajo jahau antardhāpitavān ity arthaḥ | kintu śrī-gītā-padye yoga-māyā-samāvṛtaḥ [gītā. 7.25] sarpa-kañcukavan-māyā-racita-vapur ābhāsa-samāvṛta ity arthaḥ ||35|| [kṛṣṇa-sandarbha 106] 

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kṛṣṇas tv aindra-jālika-naṭa iva sva-deha-tyāgaṁ mithyā-bhūtam eva pratyāyayāmāsety āha—yatheti | bhagavān dhatte jahyāt na tu dhṛtvā jahyād iti tanu-tyāga-kāle’pi tat-tat-tanu-dhāraṇam asty eva | nanu katham etad boddhavyam ity ata āha—yathā naṭa aindra-jālikaḥ cheda-dāha-mūrcchādibhiḥ sva-dehaṁ tyajati tasya tyāgaṁ sarvān darśayati pratyāyayati ca, atha ca sva-dehaṁ dhatte eva na tu mriyate, tathaiva matsyādi-rūpāṇi matsyādi-śarīrāṇi svīyāni bhagavān dhatte jahyāt dadhāna eva jahāti | tena naṭasya sva-śarīra-dhāraṇaṁ satyam eva tat-tyāgas tu mithyaiva yathā tathaiva bhagavato’pi matsyādi-svīya-śarīra-dhāraṇaṁ satyam eva tat-tat-tyāgo mithyaivety arthaḥ | yathā ca matsyādi-śarīrāṇi dadhāna eva jahāti tathaiva yena bhū-bhāraḥ kṣapitas tac ca kalevaraṁ jahāv iti śrī-kṛṣṇa-kalevara-tyāgo mithayaiveti | narākṛti-para-brahmatvādikam api naṭa-rūpa-nara-dharmam evaṁ bhagavān karoti, na tu tattvena | sva-dehasyābhautikatvena nāśāsambhavāt | yad uktaṁ mahābhārate, na bhūta-saṅgha-saṁsthāno deho’sya paramātmanaḥ iti | bṛhad-vaiṣṇave’pi, 


    yo vetti bhautikaṁ dehaṁ kṛṣṇasya paramātmanaḥ | 


    sa sarvasmād bahiḥ kāryaḥ śrauta-smārta-vidhānataḥ | 


    mukhaṁ tasyāvalokyāpi sa-cailaḥ snānam ācared || iti |[^132]

vaiśampāyana-sahasra-nāmani ca—amṛtāṁśo’mṛta-vapur iti| amṛtaṁ maraṇa-rahitaṁ vapur yasya iti tatra śrī-śaṅkarācārya-vyākhyā ca prasiddhā | atra śleṣeṇa jahyād iti jahātes tyāgārthatvāt tyāgasya ca dānārthatvāt vaikuṇṭhādi-dhāma-sthebhyo bhaktebhyaḥ sva-śarīra-praviṣṭa-caraṁ nārāyaṇādi-rūpaṁ teṣāṁ pālanārthaṁ dadāv ity ekādaśānte vyākhyāsyate ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **uktam arthaṁ dṛṣṭāntāntareṇaha—yathā naṭobhinayābhijñaḥ svarūpeṇa sthita eva matsya-vaka-sārasādi-rūpāṇi yathā yathāvad-dhatte jahyāt, tathā sa bhagavān svarūpeṇa sthita eva yena devāṁśa-yādava-rūpeṇa bhū-bhāraḥ kṣapitas tac ca tad eva kalevaraṁ jahau | deva-rūpaṁ tad-vidhāya svargaṁ prāpiyāmāsa | yāvad adhikāra [ve.sū. 3.3.33] nyāyenādhikārānte teṣāṁ vimokṣa-sambhavād iti bhāvaḥ | anāyāsena dhāraṇe hāne ca dṛṣṭānto'yam | apare tu yathendrajāliko naṭaḥ svarūpeṇa sthita evendra-jāla-vidyayā sva-dehaccheda-dāhādi darśayati, tathā bhagavān svayaṁ sthita eva māyayā deha-tyāgaṁ loka-virāgāya | rājan! parasya tanu bhṛj-jananāpy ayehā māyā-viḍambanam avehi yathā naṭasya [bhā.pu. 11.31.41] ity ekādaśokterity āhuḥ | ye khalu śrī-mūrtes tyāgaṁ vyācakṣate, te tv apariśīlita-śāstradeśikā bodhyāḥ | ātmabhūtāyās tasyās tyāgāsambhavāt | ādāyāntaradhād yas tu sva-vimbaṁ loka-locanam [bhā.pu. 3.2.11] ity uddhavokteś ca ||35||

 **...**

|| 1.15.36 || 

**yadā mukundo bhagavān imāṁ mahīṁ**

**jahau sva-tanvā śravaṇīya-sat-kathaḥ |**

**tadāhar evāpratibuddha-cetasām**

**abhadra-hetuḥ kalir anvavartata ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **yudhiṣṭhirasya svargāroha-prasaṅgāya kali-praveśam āha—yadeti | sva-tanvā jahau | sa-tanor eva vaikuṇṭhārohāt | śravaṇārhā satī kathā yasya | tadā yad ahas tasminn eva | ahar iti lupta-saptamy-antaṁ padam | apratibuddha-cetasām avivekinām iti | vivekināṁ tu na prabhur ity uktam | anvavartateti pūrvam evāṁśena praviṣṭhya tena[^133] rūpeṇānuvṛttir uktā ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **yadeti | tyāgo’tra sva-tanu-karaṇaka iti, na tu sva-tanvā saheti vyākhyeyam | sahety adhyāhāryāpekṣāgauravāt | upapada-vibhakteḥ kāraka-vibhaktir balīyasīti nyāyāc ca ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tanu-tyāgasyāvāstavatvaṁ spaṣṭayann āha—yadā sva-tanvā jahau sva-tanor eva vaikuṇṭhārohād iti śrī-svāmi-caraṇāḥ | tyāgo’tra sva-tanu-karaṇaka eva, na tu sva-tanvā saha mahīṁ jahāv iti kuvyākhyāyā avakāśaḥ upapada-vibhakteḥ kāraka-vibhaktir balīyasī iti nyāyāt | 


    pradarśyātapta-tapasām avitṛpta-dṛśāṁ nṛṇām | 


    ādāyāntaradhādyas tu sva-bimbaṁ loka-locanam || [bhā.pu. 3.2.11] iti |

atrāpi loka-locana-rūpaṁ sva-bimbaṁ nija-mūrtiṁ pradarśya punar ādāyaiva ca antaradhāt na tu tyaktveti sandarbhaś ca, tadā yad-ahaḥ tad abhivyāpyety arthaḥ | apratibuddha-cetasām iti vivekināṁ tu na prabhur ity arthaḥ | cauro hi nidritasyaiva dhanam apaharati pratibuddhāt tu bibhetīty arthaḥ ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **imam evārthaṁ sphuṭann āha—yadeti | svatanvā karaṇena yad emāṁ mahīṁ mukundo jahau, tadā yad ahas tad abhivyāpya kalir anvavartata praviṣṭaḥ | apratibuddha cetasām iti suptānām iva caura ity arthaḥ | na ca svatanveti sahārthā tṛtīyās tu, upapada-vibhakteḥ kāraka-vibhaktir valīyasīti nyāyād uktapramāṇāc ca ||36||

 **...**

|| 1.15.37 || 

**yudhiṣṭhiras tat parisarpaṇaṁ budhaḥ **

**pure ca rāṣṭre ca gṛhe tadātmani**[^134]** |**

**vibhāvya lobhānṛta-jihma-hiṁsanādy- **

**adharma-cakraṁ gamanāya paryadhāt ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **budho yudhiṣṭhiraḥ | tasya kalḥ parisarpaṇaṁ prasaraṇaṁ vilokya | kathaṁ-bhūtam ? lobhādy-adharma-cakraṁ yasmin | jihmaṁ kauṭilyam | paryadhāt tad-ucitaṁ paridhānam akarot ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **yudhiṣṭhira ity atra tasya tyāge kali-parisarpaṇam uddīpana-mātram | vastutas tu bhagavat-pārśva-kāmitvam eva kāraṇaṁ jñeyam ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **paryadhāt tad-ucita-pidhānam akarot ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tasya kaleḥ parisarpaṇaṁ praveśaṁ paryadhāducita-vidhānam akarot ||37||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.38 || **

**sva-rāṭ**[^135]** pautraṁ vinayinam ātmanaḥ susamaṁ guṇaiḥ**[^136]** | \
toya-nīvyāḥ patiṁ bhūmer abhyaṣiñcad gajāhvaye ||38||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **ātmanaḥ svasya guṇaiḥ susamam atisadṛśam | toyaṁ pariveṣākāreṇa sarvataḥ sthitaṁ samudrodakam eva nīvī paridhāna-viśeṣo yasyās tasyā bhūmeḥ patitvenābhiṣiktavān ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **viniyataṁ sa-maryādam | ṭīkāyāṁ susamamati-sadṛśam iti vyākhyānāt soḥ pūjāyāṁ ṣatva-niṣedhaḥ, suḥ pūjāyām iti karma-pravacanīya-vidheḥ ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **viniyamaṁ rājocita-viśiṣṭa-niyama-yuktam ātmanaḥ svasya guṇaiḥ susamam atisadṛśaṁ toyaṁ samudrodakam eva nīvī paridhāna-viśeṣo yasyās tasyā bhūmeḥ patitvenābhiṣiktavān ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **vinayinaṁ rājyocita-viśiṣṭa-nayavantam | ātmanaḥ svasya guṇaiḥ susamam atitulyaṁ | toyanīvyāḥ samudra-mekhalāyāḥ ||38||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.39 || **

**mathurāyāṁ tathā vajraṁ śūrasena-patiṁ tataḥ |**

**prājāpatyāṁ nirūpyeṣṭim agnīn apibad īśvaraḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **vajram aniruddhasya putram | nirūpya kṛtvety arthaḥ | apibad ātmani samāropayām āsa | īśvaraḥ samarthaḥ ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **prājāpatyāṁ ceṣṭiṁ nirūpyety anvayaḥ ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **vajram aniruddha-putram | nirūpya kṛtvā | apibat ātmany āropayāmāsa | īśvaraḥ samarthaḥ ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **vajramāniruddhiṁ nirūpya kṛtvā, agnīn apibat ātmany āropayat īśvaraḥ samarthaḥ ||39-40||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.40 || **

**visṛjya tatra tat sarvaṁ dukūla-valayādikam |**

**nirmamo nirahaṅkāraḥ sañchinnāśeṣa-bandhanaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **sañchinnāny aśeṣāṇi bandhanāny upādhayo yena ||40||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

**...**

	

**|| 1.15.41 || **

**vācaṁ juhāva manasi tat prāṇa itare ca tam |**

**mṛtyāv apānaṁ sotsargaṁ taṁ pañcatve hy ajohavīt ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tad eva darśayati dvābhyām | vācam ity upalakṣaṇam | sarvendriyāṇi manasi pravilāpitavān ity arthaḥ | tac ca manaḥ **prāṇe**, prāṇādhīna-pravṛttitvāt | **taṁ** ca prāṇam **itare** apāne, tenākarṣaṇāt | apāna-vyāpāra utsargas tat-sahitam apānaṁ mṛtyau tad-adhiṣṭātṛ-devatāyām | anenaiva vāg-ādiṣv api tat-tat-karma-sāhityaṁ jñeyam | **taṁ** mṛtyuṁ **pañcatve** pañca-bhūtānām aikye dehe | dehasyaiva mṛtyur nātmana iti bhāvitavān ity arthaḥ | **ajohavīd** iti yaṅ-lug-āntāl luṅi rūpam ||41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **vācam iti | tat manaḥ vyavahārātmakaṁ mano-haṁsaṁ na tu paramārthātmakam api agre’nusandhānāntara-vidhānāt | pañcatve pañca-bhūtānām aikya-rūpo yo dehas tasmin, na tu śrī-kṛṣṇa-pārṣada-rūpe sva-dehe ity arthaḥ ||41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **arjunavad yudhiṣṭhiro’pi bahir anusandhāna-nivṛtty arthaṁ prayatate smety āha—vācam ity upalakṣaṇaṁ sarvendriyāṇi manasi mano’dhīna-vṛttitvāt tac ca manaḥ prāṇe prāṇādhīna-vṛttittvāt tasminn eva juhāva samarpayāmāsa juhoter dānārthatvāt | he manas tubhyam evendriyāṇi dattāni, tavaivaitāni santu, sāmprataṁ mamaitaiḥ prayojanaṁ nāstīti dhārayāmāsa | teṣu svatvābhāvena vastutaḥ sampradānābhāvāt na caturthī | evam agre’pi sarvatra jñeyam | nanv ahaṁ kasya bhavāmīty ata āha—tan-manaḥ prāṇe juhāva | taṁ prāṇam itare apāne tenākarṣaṇāt | apāna-vyāpāra utsargas tat-sahitam apānaṁ mṛtyau tad-adhiṣṭhātṛ-devatāyām | anenaiva vāg-ādiṣv api tat-tat-karma-sāhityaṁ jñeyam | taṁ mṛtyuṁ pañcatve pañca-bhūtānām aikye dehe | mṛtyo tvaṁ dehasyaiva bhava iti bhāvitavān ity arthaḥ ||41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nirmamatvādi-niṣpādakaṁ yudhiṣṭhirasya prayatm āha—vācam ity upalakṣaṇaṁ bāhyendriyāṇi manasi tad adhiṣṭhātari juhāva, juhortedānārthatvād arpayāmāsety arthaḥ | tac ca manas tad adhiṣṭhātari prāṇe, taṁ prāṇam itare'pāne, tena prāṇasyākarṣaṇād apāna-vyāpāra utsargas tat-sahitam apānaṁ mṛtyāvapānādhiṣṭhātṛdeve | itthaṁ ca vāgādiṣv api tad-vṛtti-sāhityaṁ bodhyam | taṁ mṛtyu-pañcatve pṛthivyādi-pañcatve, pṛthivyādi pañcake dehe tasyaiva mṛtyunā sambandhāt ||41||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.42 || **

**tritve hutvā ca pañcatvaṁ tac caikatve ñjuhon muniḥ |**

**sarvam ātmany ajuhavīd brahmaṇy ātmānam avyaye ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tritve guṇa-traye pañcatvaṁ deham | tac ca tritvam ekatve avidyāyām | sarvaṁ sarvāropa-hetum avidyām ātmani jīve | ajohavīd iti vaktavye ajuhavīd ity ārṣam | evaṁ śodhitam ātmānaṁ brahmaṇy avyaye kūṭasthe | na tasyānyatra laya ity arthaḥ ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **ekatve avyakte | tad evam ayogyaṁ tat sarvam avyakte eva bhāvayitvā yogyaṁ yat sarvaṁ tad ātmani bhagavat-pārṣada-rūpe ajuhavīt dhārayāmāsa | taṁ cātmānaṁ narākṛtiṁ para-brahmaṇi samarpayāmāsa ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tataś ca pṛthivyādi-bhūta-pañcakaṁ kva sthāsyatīty atrāha—tritve guṇa-traye tac ca tritvam ekatve vyaṣṭi-rūpe māyāṁśe tat sarvam ātmani jīve ajuhavīd ity ārṣam ajohavīd ity arthaḥ | he jīva ! tavaitan māyāṁśa-kṛtam upādhi-trikam, etasmāt tvaṁ pṛthag-bhūta eva virājasva, naitasyādhīno bhaveti bhāvaḥ | pañcātmānaṁ brahmaṇi | evaṁ parīkṣiti svarājya-bhāvaṁ vajrae ca mathurāṁ samarpya tat-sambandham ātmano dūrīkṛtya bahir niścinta iva indriyādīn api tat-tad-vaśayitari yogye samarpya antar niścinto babhūva | tathā hi brahmaṇaḥ kṛṣṇasyaiva jīvo jīvasyaiva vyaṣṭi-māyā tasyā eva guṇa-trayaṁ guṇatrayasyaiva pañca-bhūtātmako dehaḥ, dehasyaiva mṛtyur mṛtyor evāpānaḥ apānasyaiva prāṇas tasyaiva manaḥ manasa eva indriyāṇi indriyāṇām eva viṣayā rājyādi-bhogāḥ teṣāṁ ca bhoktā samprati parīkṣid eva na tu aham iti vicārayāmāsa | kintu bhagavan-nitya-parikaratvān nitya-vigrahāṇām api tadānīmātmānaṁ prākṛta-śarīraṁ matvaivāyaṁ vicāro’py akiñcit-kara eveti jñeyam ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **taṁ ca pañcatva-śabditaṁ dehaṁ tritve guṇatraye, tac ca tritvam ekatve vyaṣṭi-rūpa prakṛty aṁśe ajuhot, tad etat sarvam ātmanyantaryāmiṇi, tavaitac-chakti-bhūtaṁ mama na kiñcid ity arthaḥ | tam ātmānaṁ brahmaṇi svayaṁ bhagavati pūrṇe kṛṣṇe ajuhavīt, anyatrārpaṇaṁ saṁśleṣaṇam ātma-brahmaṇostvaikyaṁ bodhyam | yathā parīkṣiti svarājyaṁ samarpya bahir evam indriyādīni yogye tat-tad adhiṣṭhātari samarpyāntaś ca niścinto'bhūd ity arthaḥ | eṣā bhāvanā yudhiṣṭhirādiṣu bhagavat-pārṣadeṣu praviṣṭān dharmādi-devāṁ śāneva, na tu tad upajīvyāṁs tān uddiśyeti bodhyam | tat-pārṣadā devāḥ prāpañcika-devānām āśrayaṇīyā iti pādme dṛṣṭatvāt ||42||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.43 || **

**cīra-vāsā nirāhāro baddha-vāṅ mukta-mūrdhajaḥ |**

**darśayann ātmano rūpaṁ jaḍonmatta-piśācavat ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tad evam ātma-pratipattim uktvā bāhya-sthitim āha—cīra-vāsā iti dvābhyām | baddhavāṅ manunī ||43||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tad evaṁ sarvathā niścintasya tasya bāhya-sthitim āha—cīreti | baddha-vāk maunī | anapekṣamāṇaḥ anujādi-pratīkṣām akurvan ||43||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **evam ubhayathā niścitaṁ tasya brāhmīṁ sthitim āha—cīreti sārddhābhyāṁ baddhavāk maunī ||43||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.44 || **

**anavekṣamāṇo**[^137]** niragād aśṛṇvan badhiro yathā |**

**udīcīṁ praviveśāśāṁ gata-pūrvāṁ mahātmabhiḥ ||**

**hṛdi brahma paraṁ dhyāyan nāvarteta yato gataḥ**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **anavekṣamāṇo’nujādi-pratīkṣām akurvan | āśāṁ diśam | gata-pūrvāṁ pūrvaṁ praviṣṭam | mahātmabhir vivekavidbhiḥ | yato yāṁ diśaṁ gataḥ ||44||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **adhunā nyasta-samasta-bhāro’ham avyagraḥ kvāpi vivikte deśe śrī-kṛṣṇa-prāpty-artham, man-manā bhava mad-bhakta iti bhagavad-upadiṣṭam evopāyaṁ kariṣyāmīti niścinvatas tasya ceṣṭām āha—udīcīm iti | paraṁ brahma śrī-kṛṣṇaṁ dhyāyan dhyātum ||44||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **anav ekṣamāṇo bhīmādi-pratīkṣām akurvan paraṁ brahma śrī-kṛṣṇaṁ dhyāyan dhyātuṁ yato yāmudīcīm ||44||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.45 || **

**sarve tam anu nirjagmur bhrātaraḥ kṛta-niścayāḥ |**

**kalinādharma-mitreṇa dṛṣṭvā spṛṣṭāḥ prajā bhuvi ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : adharmo mitraṁ** yasya, tena ||45||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **śrī-kṛṣṇaṁ prāptuṁ vayam api tan-manaskā eva bhavāma iti **kṛto niścayo** yais te ||45||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kṛṣṇa-dhyānam eva kṛṣṇa-prāpakam iti **kṛto niścayo** yais te | **adharmo mitraṁ** yasya tena ||45||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.46 || **

**te sādhu-kṛta-sarvārthā jñātvātyantikam ātmanaḥ |**

**manasā dhārayāmāsur vaikuṇṭha-caraṇāmbujam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : sādhu** samyak **kṛtāḥ** **sarve’rthā** dharmādayo yaiḥ | ata eva **vaikuṇṭhasya caraṇāmbujam** eva **ātyantikaṁ śaraṇaṁ jñātvā** ||46||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : te** iti | **te** pāṇḍavāḥ **sādhu** yathā syāt, tathā **kṛta-sarvārthāḥ **vaśīkṛta-dharmārtha-kāma-mokṣā api **vaikuṇṭhasya** śrī-kṛṣṇasya **caraṇāmbujam** eva **ātyantikaṁ** parama-puruṣārthaṁ **jñātvā,** tad eva **manasā dhārayāmāsuḥ** ||46||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (prīti-sandarbhaḥ 272) : **atha tad-anantaraṁ [1.15.1-5 ślokeṣu varṇitārjunma-viyogād anantaraṁ] tuṣṭy-ātmaka-yogo yathā—**te** iti tribhiḥ | te pāṇḍavāḥ **sādhu** yathā syāt, tathā **kṛta-sarvārthā** vaśīkṛta-dharmārtha-kāma-mokṣā api **vaikuṇṭhasya** śrī-kṛṣṇasya **caraṇāmbujam** eva ātyantikaṁ parama-puruṣārthaṁ jñātvā, tad eva **manasā dhārayāmāsuḥ** ||47|| 

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : sādhu** yathā syāt, tathā **kṛtā** anuṣṭhitāḥ **sarve’rthā **dharmādayo yais tathā-bhūtā api **ātyantikaṁ** tebhyo’py atyantādhikaṁ śrī-kṛṣṇa-**caraṇāmbujam** eva **manasā nirdhārayāmāsuḥ** | sādhu-kṛtā dharmārtha-kāma-mokṣā yaiḥ | ata eva caraṇāmbujam evātyantikam iti śrī-svāmi-caraṇāḥ ||46||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : sādhu** yathā bhavaty evaṁ **kṛtāḥ sarve 'rthā **dharmādayo yais te tādṛśā api tebhyo'py **ātyantikam** adhikatamaṁ **vaikuṇṭhasya** kṛṣṇasya **caraṇāmbujam** eva jñātvā **manasā dhārayāmāsuḥ** ||46||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.47-48 || **

**tad-dhyānodriktayā bhaktyā viśuddha-dhiṣaṇāḥ pare |**

**tasmin nārāyaṇa-pade ekānta-matayo gatim ||**

**avāpur duravāpāṁ te asadbhir viṣayātmabhiḥ |**

**vidhūta-kalmaṣāsthānaṁ virajenātmanaiva hi ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kathaṁ-bhūte pade ? **vidhūta-kalmaṣāṇām āsthānaṁ** nivāsa-sthānaṁ yat, tasmin | **virajenātmanaiva** gatiṁ prāpur na tu ṣoḍaśa-kalena liṅgena | gater vā viśeṣaṇam | virajenātmanaivāvasthāna-rūpāṁ gatiṁ te vidhūta-kalmaṣāḥ prāpur iti ||47-48||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : nārāyaṇaḥ** śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ | punar gatim eva viśinaṣṭi—**vidhūta-kalmaṣaṁ** yathā-sthānaṁ nitya-śrī-kṛṣṇa-prakāśāspadaṁ tadīyā sabhā | **ātmanā** sva-śarīreṇaiva | tatra hetuḥ—**virajena** aprākṛtena | **hi**-śabdo’sambhavanā-nivṛtty-arthah ||47-48|| [prīti-sandarbha 273]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : viśuddhā** jñāna-yogādy-amiśrā **dhiṣaṇā** buddhir yeṣāṁ te | ata eva **ekānta-matayaḥ** | gatiṁ kīdṛśīṁ ? **vidhūta-kalmaṣāṇām āsthānaṁ** nivāsa-sthānam | yad vā, **vidhūta-kalmaṣāṇām āsthānaṁ** sabhā sudharmābhidhānā yatra, tat kṛṣṇa-dhāmaiva **gatim avāpuḥ** | kena prakāreṇa ? ity ata āha—**virajena** nirmalena guṇa-maya-dharmendrādy-aṁśa-rāhityād **aprākṛtena ātmanā** sva-śarīreṇaiva, na tu deha-bhaṅgenety arthaḥ ||47-48||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : viśuddhā** mārjitāḥ sukhaiśvarya-vāñchātopanītā **dhiṣaṇā** yeṣāṁ te, tat-sevā-sukhaika-niṣṭha-dhiya ity arthaḥ | **pare** śreṣṭhe tasmin **nārāyaṇa**-pade vadaryāśrame **gatiṁ prāpuḥ** ||47|| \
 \
kīdṛśīṁ gatim ? ity āha—**vidhūta-kalmaṣāṇāṁ** nitya-pārṣadānām uddhavādīnām **āsthānaṁ** sudharmākhyā sabhā yatra tat kuśasthalī-nāmakaṁ kṛṣṇa-dhāmety arthaḥ | kena prakāreṇa ? ity āha—**virajena** nirmalena guṇamaya-dharma-marud-indrādy-aṁśa-virahad amāyikena **ātmanā** sva-sva-vigraheṇaiva, na tu tad-bhaṅgenety arthaḥ ||48||

 **...**

|**| 1.15.49 || **

**viduro’pi parityajya prabhāse deham ātmanaḥ |**

**kṛṣṇāveśena tac-cittaḥ pitṛbhiḥ sva-kṣayaṁ yayau ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **śrī-**kṛṣṇāveśena** kṛṣṇe cittam āveśya **dehaṁ** parityajya **tac-citta** eva saṁs tadānīṁ netum āgataiḥ saha **sva-kṣayaṁ** svādhikāra-sthānaṁ **yayau** ||49||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : vidurasya** yama-loka-gatiḥ svādhikāra-pālanārthaṁ līlayā kāya-vyūheneti jñeyam | tad ittham eva śrī-bhāgavata-bhāratayor avirodhaḥ syād iti ||49||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : dehaṁ** **parityajya** iti | devatā-rūpa eva, na tu pārṣada-rūpaḥ | ata eva **pitṛbhis** tadānīṁ netum āgataiḥ saha | **sva-kṣayaṁ** svādhikāra-sthānam ||49||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : viduro'pi dehaṁ parityajya **iti dharmarāja-rūpa eva tanu-pārṣada-rūpaḥ, ata eva tadānetum āgataiḥ **pitṛbhiḥ** saha **sva-kṣayaṁ** svādhikāra-sthānaṁ yayau | pārṣadas tu **tac-cittas** tam eva prāpeti ||49||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.50 || **

**draupadī ca tad ājñāya patīnām anapekṣatām |**

**vāsudeve bhagavati hy ekānta-matir āpa tam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** ātmānaṁ praty **anapekṣatāṁ** **tadā jñātvā** **tam āpa** ||50||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **ātmānaṁ praty **anapekṣamāṇānāṁ** **tat** śrī-kṛṣṇa-saṅgamanam **ājñāya** samyak jñātvā | **vāsudeve** śrī-vasudeva-nandane | **hi** prasiddhau | yasminn **ekānta-matiḥ, tam** eva **prāptavatī** | atrānyena pathā gacchato’py etān śrī-dvārakā-nāthaḥ svayaṁ sva-śaktyā sva-samīpam evānītavān iti gamyate, nityaṁ sannihitaḥ [vi.pu. 5.38.10, bhā.pu. 11.31.24] ity-ādy-ukteḥ ||50|| [prīti-sandarbha 272]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : draupadī** iti | subhadrādīnām apy upalakṣaṇam | **tam āpa** iti deha-tyāgānuktyā śarīreṇaiveti ||50||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : draupadī** **ca** iti | **cāt** subhadrāpi **tam āpa** iti vigraha-tyāgān abhidhānāt pūrva-vigrahaiva kṛṣṇam āpety arthaḥ ||50||

 **...**

**|| 1.15.51 || **

**yaḥ śraddhayaitad bhagavat-priyāṇāṁ**

**pāṇḍoḥ sutānām iti samprayāṇam |**

**śṛṇoty alaṁ svastyayanaṁ pavitraṁ**

**labdhvā harau bhaktim upaiti siddhim ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : ity** evaṁ yat **saṁprāyaṇam** | **alam** atiśayena **svasty-ayanaṁ** maṅgalāspadam | alaṁ **pavitraṁ** ca ||51||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : iti** evaṁ **samprayāṇam** eva, na tu prakārāntaram | **siddhiṁ** siddhi-daśām ||51||

iti sārārtha-darśinyāṁ harṣiṇyāṁ bhakta-cetasām |

prathame’yaṁ pañcadaśaḥ saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām ||*||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : iti** gadita-vidhaṁ **saṁprayāṇaṁ**, na tu vidhāntaraṁ, **siddhiṁ** muktim ||51||

**...**

iti śrīmad-bhāgavate mahā-purāṇe brahma-sūtra-bhāṣye pāramahaṁsyaṁ saṁhitāyāṁ vaiyāsikyāṁ daśama-skandhepāṇḍava-svargārohaṇaṁ nāma

pañcadaśo’dhyāyaḥ

||1.15||



**...**

 

(1.16)


## atha ṣoḍaśo’dhyāyaḥ


### parīkṣito rājya-lābhaḥ, dig-vijayaḥ, bhūmi-dharma-saṁvāda-śravaṇaṁ ca |

|| 1.16.1 ||

**sūta uvāca—**

**tataḥ parīkṣid dvija-varya-śikṣayā**

**mahīṁ mahā-bhāgavataḥ śaśāsa ha |**

**yathā hi sūtyām abhijāta-kovidāḥ**

**samādiśan vipra mahad-guṇas tathā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :**

tataś ca ṣoḍaśe bhūmi-dharmayoḥ kali-khinnayoḥ | \
saṁvāde varṇyate prāptiḥ pālakasya parīkṣitaḥ ||

**dvija-varyāṇāṁ śikṣayā** sad-upadeśena | **sūtyāṁ** janmani | **abhijāta-kovidā** jāta-karma-vidaḥ | he **vipra **! **mahatāṁ guṇā** yasmin saḥ ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :**

parīkṣito dig-vijayo dharma-praśnaḥ kṣitiṁ prati |

tasyāḥ kṛṣṇa-viyuktāyāḥ śokoktiḥ ṣoḍaśe’bhavat ||

he vipra! tathaiva mahatāṁ guṇā yasmin saḥ abhūt ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :** 

parīkṣitato digvijayo'tra ṣoḍaśe, praśnaś ca dharmasya vasundharāṁ prati | \
govinda-pādāmbuja-saṅga-vicyuteḥ, śokaś ca tasyā vividho'bhidhīyate ||

dvija-varyāṇāṁ śikṣayopadeśena, sūtyāṁ janmani | abhijāta-kovidā daivajñā yathā samādiśann ūcus tathaiva parīkṣinmahad-guṇo'bhavat | mahatāṁ yudhiṣṭhirādīnāṁ guṇā yasmin saḥ ||1-2||

 **...**

|| 1.16.2 ||

**sa uttarasya tanayām upayema irāvatīm |**

**janamejayādīṁś caturas tasyām utpādayat sutān ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : janamejayādīn** ity akṣarādhikyaṁ chāndasam | **utpādayann** iti pāṭḥe hetau śatṛ-pratyayaḥ | sutān utpādayitum **upayema** iti vākya-yojanā ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **sa uttarasya tanayām iti pūrva-kathā [rājyābhiṣekāt prāk] brahmacarye rājyābhiṣekāyogāt[^138] ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **janamejayādīn iti | pradhāne karmaṇy abhidheye’nyādīn āhur dvi-karmaṇām itivan navākṣaraika-pādo’nuṣṭub-viśeṣo’yam ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : _na vyākhyātam_**.

 **...**

|| 1.16.3 || 

**ājahārāśva-medhāṁs trīn gaṅgāyāṁ bhūri-dakṣiṇān |**

**śāradvataṁ guruṁ kṛtvā devā yatrākṣi-gocarāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : ājahāra** kṛtavān ity arthaḥ | **śāradvataṁ** kṛpam | **yatra** yeṣv aśvamedheṣu devā **dṛṣṭi-gocarā** babhūvuḥ ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** **śāradvataṁ** kṛpam ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :** **ājahāra** kṛtavān | **śāradvataṁ** kṛpam ||3-4||

 **...**

|| 1.16.4 || 

**nijagrāhaujasā vīraḥ kaliṁ dig-vijaye kvacit |**

**nṛpa-liṅga-dharaṁ śūdraṁ ghnantaṁ go-mithunaṁ padā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nijagrāha nigṛhītavān | kalim eva nirdiśati—nṛpeti ||4||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī)**, **baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī)**: _na vyākhyātam._

 **...**

|| 1.16.5 ||

**śaunaka uvāca—**

**kasya hetor nijagrāha kaliṁ digvijaye nṛpaḥ |**

**nṛdeva-cihna-dhṛk śūdraḥ ko’sau**[^139]** gāṁ yaḥ padāhanat ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : ko’sāv** ity ākṣepaḥ, kalim ity uktatvāt ||5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : kasya hetor** iti | ayam arthaḥ—**kaliṁ** kasmād **dhetoḥ** kevalaṁ **nijagrāha,** na tu hatavān | yato’sau **śūdraḥ** atikutsitaḥ | **yo gāṁ padāhanad** ahann iti ||5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : nijagrāha** na tu hatavān | yato’sau **śūdrakaḥ** atikutsito hantum evocitaḥ ||5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kevalaṁ **nijagrāha**, na tu taṁ jaghāna ||5||

 **...**

|| 1.16.6 || 

**tat kathyatāṁ mahā-bhāga yadi kṛṣṇa-kathāśrayam ||**

**athavāsya padāmbhoja- makaranda-lihāṁ satām |**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : atha** iti pakṣāntare | **vā** yadi | yady-arthe ca vikalpārthe vā-śabdaḥ samudīryate iti nāma-mahodadhau ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : asya** viṣṇoḥ **padāmbhojayor makarandaḥ,** taṁ **lihanty** āsvādayanti ye, teṣāṁ **satāṁ** mahatāṁ vā **kathāśrayam** iti samāsān niṣkṛtasyānuṣaṅgaḥ | tarhi **kathyatām** ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : yadi kṛṣṇa-kathāśrayaṁ** bhavati, tarhi tad-anyad api **kathyatām** ity arthaḥ ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : tat** kali-nigrahaṇaṁ **satāṁ kathāśrayam** ity anena samāsa-gatenāpy anvayaḥ ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : tat** kali-nigrahaṇaṁ, **satāṁ kathāśrayam** ity anena samāsagatenānvayaḥ, sāpekṣakatvāt ||6||

 **...**

|| 1.16.7 ||

**kim anyair asad-ālāpair āyuṣo yad asad-vyayaḥ ||**

**kṣudrāyuṣāṁ nṛṇām aṅga martyānām ṛtam icchatām |**

**ihopahūto bhagavān mṛtyuḥ śāmitra-karmaṇi ||7||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **anyathā ced **āyuṣo’sad-vyayaḥ** ity arthaḥ ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **no cet kim anyair asadbhir ālāpaiḥ ? **yad** yair **āyuṣo vṛthā kṣayaḥ** | asmākam ayaṁ satra-prayatne’pi hari-kathāmṛta-pānārtha evety āha—sārdhābhyām | kṣudram alpam āyur yeṣām  | ato martyānāṁ maraṇa-dharmavatām | tathāpi ṛtaṁ satyaṁ mokṣam icchatām ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **ṛtaṁ parama-satyaṁ śrī-bhagavantam icchatāṁ kṣudrāyuṣām anyaiḥ kim ? nanu tādṛśānāṁ śrī-bhagavat-kathā-śravaṇam api sampannaṁ na syād ity āśaṅkyāha—iheti ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tadāśrayaṇaṁ na cet, tarhy **asad-ālāpaiḥ kiṁ**? **yata āyuṣo'sad-vyayo** vṛthaiva kṣayaḥ | **ṛtaṁ** satya-vastu śrī-kṛṣṇam ity arthaḥ | nanu naśvara-dehānāṁ kṛṣṇa-kathā-bhāgya-lābho’pi kathaṁ setsyati ? ity ata āha—iha kṣetre śamitur idaṁ śāmitraṁ karma paśu-hiṁsanaṁ tatra tad-arthaṁ mṛtyur upahūtaḥ ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu naśvara-śarīrāṇāṁ kathaṁ bṛhat-kathā-lābhaḥ? tatrāha—iha kṣetre, śamitur yāgīya-paśu-mārakasyedaṁ śāmitraṁ karma, tasmin nimitte bhagavān kālo'smābhir upahūtaḥ ||7||

 **...**

|| 1.16.8 ||

**na**[^140]** kaścin mriyate tāvad yāvad āsta ihāntakaḥ |**

**etad-arthaṁ hi bhagavān āhūtaḥ paramarṣibhiḥ |**

**aho nṛ-loke pīyeta hari-līlāmṛtaṁ vacaḥ**[^141]** ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **etad-arthaṁ mṛtyur upahūtaḥ | aho nr loke pīyeteti ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **yo mṛtyuḥ sa iha satre śamitur idaṁ śāmitraṁ karma paśu-hiṁsanaṁ tad-artham upahūtaḥ | tataḥ kim ? ata āha—na kaścid iti | tato’pi kim ? ata āha—aho nṛ-loke hari-līlāmṛtaṁ vacaḥ pīyetetu etad-artham | hari-līlaivāṁ yasmiṁs tat ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **yāvad iha hari-kathāyām āste tāvad iha kaścin na mriyeta | tac caiṣāṁ śrotṝṇāṁ maraṇa-nivāraṇa-kāraṇaṁ mṛtyv-āhvānaṁ nirvighna-hari-kathāmṛta-pānārtham evety āha—etad-artham iti ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tataḥ kim ? ata āha—na kaścid iti | tato’pi kim ? ata āha—aho iti ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tataḥ kim? ata āha—na kaścid iti ||8||

 **...**

|| 1.16.9 ||

**mandasya manda-prajñasya vayo mandāyuṣaś ca vai |**

**nidrayā hriyate naktaṁ divā ca vyartha-karmabhiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tad-abhāve vṛthaiva jīvanam ity āha | mandasyālasaya | naktaṁ rātrau yad vaya āyus tan nidrayā hriyate | divā ahni ca yad vayas tad vyartha-karmabhir apahriyate ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **anyathā āyuṣo vaiyarthyam ity āha—mandasyeti ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tato'pi kim? ata āha—aho iti, itarathāyuṣo vaiyarthyam ity āha—mandasyeti ||9||

 **...**

|| 1.16.10 ||

**sūta uvāca—**

**yadā parīkṣit kuru-jāṅgale’vasat**

**kaliṁ praviṣṭaṁ nija-cakravartite |**

**niśamya vārtām anatipriyāṁ tataḥ**

**śarāsanaṁ saṁyuga-śauṇḍir ādade ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tatra tāvat kali-nigraha-prasaṅgam āha—yadeti | yadā jija-cakravartite sva-senayā pālite deśe kaliṁ praviṣṭaṁ śuśrāva[^142], tadā tām anatipriyāṁ vārtāṁ kiṁcit priyāṁ ca yuddha-kautuka-saṁpatteḥ niśamya tataḥ śarāsanaṁ duṣṭa-nigrahārtham ādade | saṁyuge śauṇḍir yuddhe pragalbhaḥ | pāṭhantare[^143] yuddhe śauriḥ kṛṣṇa-tulyaḥ ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yadā nija-cakra-vartite sva-senayā pālite deśe kaliṁ praviṣṭam eva anatipriyāṁ vārtāṁ taj-jighāṁsayā kiñcit priyāṁ ca niśamya śarāsanam ādade tadaiva purāt dig-vijayāya nirgata ity anvayaḥ | atra praviṣṭaḥ kalir evānatipriyā vārtety anuvāda-vidheya-bhāvo vivakṣito jñeyaḥ | śauṇḍiḥ pragalbhaḥ | saṁyuga-śaurir iti pāṭhe saṁyuge śauri-tulyaḥ ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nijacakreṇa svasainyena vartite pālite kuru-jāṅgale praviṣṭaṁ kaliṁ tasyān atipriyāṁ saṁyuga-śauṇḍitvāt kiñcit-priyāṁ vārtāṁ ca niśamya tataḥ śarāsanaṁ dhanur ādade, śauṇḍir nipuṇaḥ ||10||

 **...**

|| 1.16.11 ||

**svalaṅkṛtaṁ śyāma-turaṅga-yojitaṁ**

**rathaṁ mṛgendra-dhvajam āśritaḥ purāt |**

**vṛto rathāśva-dvipapatti-yuktayā**

**sva-senayā dig-vijayāya nirgataḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tataś ca digvijayāya nirgataḥ ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **ata eva dig-vijayāya tat-tad-dik-sthita-duṣṭa-rājādi-vaśīkārāya ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **ratham āsthitaḥ senayāvṛto digvijayāya purān-nirgataḥ ||11||

 **...**

|| 1.16.13 ||

**bhadrāśvaṁ ketumālaṁ ca bhārataṁ cottarān kurūn |**

**kimpuruṣādīni varṣāṇi vijitya jagṛhe balim ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **bhadrāśvādīni pūrva-paścima-dakṣiṇottarataḥ samudra-lagnāni varṣāṇi | meroḥ sarvata ilāvṛtam || tata uttarato ramyakaṁ hiraṇmayaṁ ca | dakṣiṇato harivarṣaṁ kiṁpuruṣaṁ ca ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tataś ca tat-prabhāveṇa nihnuta-sva-prabhāve sati bhāratavarṣa-mātrādhikāriṇi kalau prasaṅgato bhadrāśvādīny api jetuṁ gataḥ | kramastv atra na vivakṣitaḥ ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **bhadrāśvādīni pūrva-paścima-dakṣiṇottarataḥ samudra-lagnāni varṣāṇi, meroḥ samantād ilāvṛtaṁ, tata uttarottarāt ramyakaṁ hiranmayaṁ ca | dakṣiṇato hari-varṣaṁ kim-puruṣaṁ cottara-kurv-ākhyāni ||13||

 **...**

|| 1.16.14 ||[^144]

**tatra tatropaśṛṇvānaḥ sva-pūrveṣāṁ mahātmanām |**

**pragīyamāṇaṁ ca yaśaḥ kṛṣṇa-māhātmya-sūcakam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : pragīyamānaṁ yaśaḥ** | **yaśa**-ādīni śṛṇvaṁs tebhyo dadāv iti tṛtīyenānvayaḥ ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : sva-pūrveṣāṁ** yudhiṣṭhirādīnāṁ svasya ca **kṛṣṇa-māhātmya-sūcakaṁ** **yaśaḥ **śṛnvan ||14||

 **...**

|| 1.16.15 || 

**ātmānaṁ ca paritrātam aśvatthāmno’stra-tejasaḥ |**

**snehaṁ ca vṛṣṇi-pārthānāṁ teṣāṁ bhaktiṁ ca keśave ||**

_na katamena vyākhyātam_.

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tad-yaśasā kathaṁ tan-māhātmyaṁ sūcyate? tatrāha—**ātmānaṁ ceti** ||15||

 **...**

|| 1.16.16 ||

**tebhyaḥ parama-santuṣṭaḥ prīty-ujjṛmbhita-locanaḥ |**

**mahā-dhanāni vāsāṁsi dadau hārān mahā-manāḥ ||**

_na katamena vyākhyātam_.

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : tebhyo** yaśo-gāyakebhyaḥ ||16||

 **...**

|| 1.16.17 ||

**sārathya-pāraṣada-sevana-sakhya-dautya-**

**vīrāsanānugamana-stavana-praṇāmān |**

**snigdheṣu pāṇḍuṣu jagat-praṇatiṁ ca viṣṇor**

**bhaktiṁ karoti nṛ-patiś caraṇāravinde**[^145]** ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : snigdheṣu** **pāṇḍuṣu** **viṣṇoḥ** **sārathyādibhir** viśeṣato **bhaktiṁ karoti** ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** kiṁ ca, **snigdheṣu pāṇḍaveṣu viṣṇor** yāni **sārathyādīni** karmāṇi, tāni śṛṇvan,[^146] tathā viṣṇor **jagat**-kartṛkāṁ **praṇatiṁ** ca śṛṇvan, **nṛpatiḥ** parīkṣid **viṣṇoś caraṇāravinde** **bhaktiṁ karoti** sma | **pāraṣadam** iti repha-ṣārayor viśleṣaś chāndasaḥ | tatra pārṣadaṁ sabhā-patitvam | **sevanaṁ** cittānuvṛttiḥ | **vīrāsanaṁ** rātrau khaḍga-hastasya tiṣṭhato jāgaraṇam ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (prīti-sandarbhaḥ, 129) : maitrī-vaśyatvam **āha—**sārathya**- ity-ādi | **snigdheṣu pāṇḍuṣu viṣṇor** yāni **sārathyādīni** karmāṇi, tāni śṛṇvaṁs tathā **viṣṇor** jagat-kartṛkāṁ **praṇatiṁ** ca śṛṇvan **nṛpatiḥ** parīkṣid **viṣṇoś** **caraṇāravinde** **bhaktiṁ karoti** | **pāraṣadaṁ** pārṣadatvaṁ sabhā-patitvam | **sevanaṁ** cittānuvṛttiḥ | **vīrāsanaṁ** rātrau khaḍga-hastasya tiṣṭhato jāgaraṇam ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kiṁ ca, **snigdheṣu pāṇḍaveṣu viṣṇor** yāni **sārathyādīni** karmāṇi tāni śṛṇvan, tathā viṣṇor **jagat**-kartṛkāṁ **praṇatiṁ** ca śṛṇvan | tatra **pārṣadaṁ** sabhā-patitvam | **sevanaṁ** cittānuvṛttiḥ | **vīrāsanaṁ** rātrau khaḍga-hastasya tiṣṭhato jāgaraṇam ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kiṁ ca, **snigdheṣu pāṇḍuṣu** viṣṇu-kartṛkāṇi **sārathyādīni** | **jagat**-kartṛkāṁ viṣṇoḥ **praṇatiṁ** ca śṛnvan **nṛpatiḥ** parīkṣit **bhaktiṁ karoti**, **pārṣadaṁ** sa-dampatitvaṁ, **sevanam** ājñā-pālanaṁ | **vīrāsanaṁ** khaḍga-hastatayā tiṣṭhato niśi jāgaraḥ ||17||

 **...**

|| 1.16.18 ||

**tasyaivaṁ vartamānasya pūrveṣāṁ vṛttim anvaham |**

**nātidūre kilāścaryaṁ yad āsīt tan nibodha me ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : vṛttim anu vartamānasya** sataḥ | **nātidūre** śīghram eva ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **jitvā ca nivṛtti-samaye kvacin nihnutya bhraman sva-rājyasya **nātidūra** eva sākṣāt kaliṁ dadarśa | tad-dūra-gamane punaḥ kṛta-dhārṣṭyatvād iti jñeyam | tathaivāha—tasyeti ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : anv** iti śeṣaḥ | **anvaham** **anu vartamānasya** ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : anv** **aham anuvartamānasya** ||18||

 **...**

|| 1.16.19 || 

**dharmaḥ padaikena caran vicchāyām upalabhya gām |**

**pṛcchati smāśru-vadanāṁ vivatsām iva mātaram ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : dharmo** vṛṣa-rūpaḥ | vicchāyāṁ hata-prabhām | gāṁ go-rūpāṁ pṛthvīm | vivatsāṁ naṣṭāpatyām ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **kām iva kāṁ tatrāha— vivatsām iva mātaram iti | yathā naṣṭāpatyāṁ sva-mātaraṁ ko’pi pṛcchati tathā tām apṛcchad ity arthaḥ ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **dharma iti | yugārambha-kṣaṇata eva dharma-pṛthvī-kalayas tathā-bhūtī-bhavanto lokair adṛśyā api didṛkṣaṇīyatvād anudhyāyataḥ parīkṣito yogaja-netrābhyāṁ dṛṣṭā jñeyāḥ | dharmo vṛṣa-rūpaḥ vicchāyāṁ hata-prabhām ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **dharmo vṛṣa-rūpaḥ, vicchāyāṁ hata-prabhāṁ, vivatsāṁ hatāpatyām ||19||

 **...**

|| 1.16.20 ||

**dharma uvāca—**

**kaccid bhadre’nāmayam ātmanas te **

**vicchāyāsi mlāyateṣan mukhena |**

**ālakṣaye bhavatīm antar ādhiṁ **

**dūre bandhuṁ śocasi kañcanāmba ||**
