**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : teātmano** dehasya yadyapi bahir **āmayo** na lakṣyate, tathāpy **antar** madhye **ādhiḥ** pīḍā yasyās tāṁ tvām **ālakṣye** | kena ? yato **vicchāyāsi**, ata **īṣan mlāyatā** vaivarṇyaṁ bhajatā **mukhena** liṅgena | tatra kāraṇāni kalpayan pṛcchati—dūre bandhubhir ity-ādi pañcabhiḥ | **dūre** sthitaṁ **bandhum** ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **kaccid iti | atreṣac-chabdo’nāyāse vartate | īṣad-duḥsuṣu kṛcchrākṛcchrārtheṣu khal [pā. 3.3.126] ity atreṣat-kara itivat | tataś ceṣad anāyāsenālakṣaya iti yojyam ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : ātmano** dehasya | **anāmayam** ārogyam | kiṁ ca, **antar** madhye **ādhiḥ** pīḍā yasyās tāṁ tatra kāraṇāni kalpayan pṛcchati dūre bandhum iti ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kaccit praśne, he bhadre! te tav ātmano dehasyānām ayam ārogyam asti? yadyapi bahirnāmayaḥ pratīyate, tathāpi bhavatīm antarādhiṁ hṛd-gata-vyathām ālakṣye | kutaḥ vicchāyā hata-prabhāsi? īṣan-mlāyatā vaivarṇyavatā mukhena liṅgena tathā jñāyase, tatra hetūn vikalpayan pṛcchati—dūre-bandhum iti pañcabhiḥ ||20||

 **...**

|| 1.16.21 ||

**pādair nyūnaṁ śocasi maika-pādam**

**ātmānaṁ vā vṛṣalair bhokṣyamāṇam |**

**āho surādīn hṛta-yajña-bhāgān**

**prajā uta svin maghavaty avarṣati ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tribhiḥ pādair nyūnam ata ekaika-pādam | mā māṁ mal-lakṣaṇaṁ janam ity arthaḥ | vṛṣalair ita ūrdhvaṁ bhokṣyamāṇam | puṁstvam ātma-pada-viśeṣaṇatvāt | hṛtā yajña-bhāgā yeṣāṁ tān | yajñādy-akaraṇāt ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **mā mām | vṛṣalair mlecchair ata ūrdhvam ātmānaṁ bhokṣyamāṇam | puṁstvam ātmapada-viśeṣaṇatvāt ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tribhiḥ pādair nyūnam ekapādaṁ māṁ śocasi, ātmānaṁ svaṁ ceta urddhvaṁ vṛṣalaiḥ śūdrair bhokṣyamāṇaṁ | puṁs tvam ātma-pada-viśeṣaṇatvāt | aho kim vā hata yajña-bhāgān surādīn | utasvid athavā maghavatya-varṣati kliṣṭāḥ prajāḥ śocasi? ||21||

 **...**

|| 1.16.22 || 

**arakṣyamāṇāḥ striya urvi bālān **

**śocasy atho puruṣādair ivārtān |**

**vācaṁ devīṁ brahma-kule kukarmaṇy **

**abrahmaṇye rāja-kule kulāgryān ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **he urvi pṛthvi, bhartṛbhir arakṣayamāṇāḥ striyaḥ pitṛbhir arakṣayaṁāṇān bālān pratyuta tair eva puruṣādair iva nirdayair ārtān kliṣṭān | vācaṁ devīṁ sarasvatīṁ kukarmaṇi durācāre sthitām | kulāgryān brāhmaṇottamān sevakān ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **bhartṛbhir arakṣyamāṇāḥ striyaḥ | pitṛbhir arakṣyamāṇān bālān pratyuta tair eva puruṣādair iva nirdayair ārtān kleśitān | vācaṁ pāṇḍitya-lakṣaṇāṁ sarasvatīṁ kukarmaṇi durācāre | brāhmaṇa-bhakti-hīne’pi rāja-vaṁśe utpannān kulāgryān kulīnatvena khyāpitān ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **patibhir arakṣyamāṇāḥ striyaḥ, pitṛbhir apālyamānān bālān, pratyuta taiḥ puruṣādai rākṣasair iva nirdayair ārtān kleśitān | vācaṁ devīṁ pāṇḍitya-lakṣaṇāṁ sarasvatīṁ kukarmaṇi durācāre brahma-kule sthitām | abrahmaṇye vipra-bhakti-śūnye rāja-kule jātān kulāgryān kulīnatvena khyātān śocasi? ||22||

 **...**

|| 1.16.23 || 

**kiṁ kṣatra-bandhūn kalinopasṛṣṭān **

**rāṣṭrāṇi vā tair avaropitāni |**

**itas tato vāśana-pāna-vāsaḥ- **

**snāna-vyavāyonmukha-jīva-lokam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : upasṛṣṭān** vyāptān | **avaropitāny** udvāsitāni | **vyavāyo** maithunam | **itas tato** niṣedhānādareṇa sarvato’śnādiṣ**ūnmukhaṁ** pravartamānaṁ **jīva-lokaṁ vā** ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** upasṛṣṭān vyāptān | avaropitāni udvāsitāni ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kalinopasṛṣṭān vyāptān kṣatra-bandhūn, tair avaropitānyujjaṭitāni rāṣṭrāṇi vā, itas tato vidhi-niṣedhān ādareṇāśanādiṣūnmukhaṁ jīva-lokaṁ vā śocasi? vyavāyo maithunam ||23||

 **...**

|| 1.16.24 || 

**yadvāmba te bhūri-bharāvatāra- **

**kṛtāvatārasya harer dharitri |**

**antarhitasya smaratī visṛṣṭā **

**karmāṇi nirvāṇa-vilambitāni ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **he amba mātaḥ he dharitri, te tava yo bhūri-bhāras tasyāvatāraṇārthaṁ kṛtāvatārasya karmāṇi smarantī tena visṛṣṭā satī śocasi | nirvāṇaṁ vilambitam āśritaṁ yeṣu tāni | pāṭhāntare nirvāṇaṁ viḍambitam upahasitaṁ yaiḥ | mokṣād apy adhika-sukhānīty arthaḥ ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **nirvāṇa-viḍambitānīty atra nirvāṇaṁ viḍambitaṁ yair iti vigrahaḥ | nirvāṇasya sukhāditvāt pūrva-nipātaḥ | ḍalayor ekatvāt pāṭha-dvayam api samānārtham ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **bhuvo bhāras tasya avatāraṇārthaṁ kṛto’vatāro yena tasya karmāṇi smarantī | yatas tena tvaṁ visṛṣṭā tyaktā | nirvāṇaṁ kaivalyaṁ viḍambitaṁ sva-mādhuryeṇa upahāsāspadīkṛtaṁ yais tāni | ḍa-layor aikyāt pāṭha-dvayam api samānārtham ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **amba he dharitri! antar hitasya hareḥ karmāṇi smarantī tena visṛṣṭā tyaktā satī śocasi | kīdṛśasya? ity āha—te tava bharāvatārāya kṛto'vatāraḥ prākaṭyaṁ yena tasya | karmāṇi kīdṛṁśi? ity āha—nirvāṇaṁ vilambitam āśritaṁ yeṣu tāni | yad vā, ḍa-layor aikyāt nirvāṇaṁ viḍambitaṁ sva-mādhuryeṇopahasitaṁ yais tāni ||24||

 **...**

|| 1.16.25 ||

**idaṁ mamācakṣva tavādhi-mūlaṁ**

**vasundhare yena vikarśitāsi |**

**kālena vā te balināṁ balīyasā**

**surārcitaṁ kiṁ hṛtam amba saubhagam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **he amba, te saubhāgyaṁ kālena vā hṛtam ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **vikarśitāsi viśeṣeṇa kṛśīkṛtāsi ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **vikarśitāsi viśeṣeṇa kṛśīkṛtāsi ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **vikarṣitā viśeṣeṇa kṛṣīkṛtāsi, kim vā te saubhagaṁ kālena hṛtam? ||25||

 **...**

|| 1.16.26 ||

**dharaṇy uvāca—**

**bhavān hi veda tat sarvaṁ yan māṁ dharmānupṛcchasi |**

**caturbhir vartase yena pādair loka-sukhāvahaiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **bhavān jānāty eva tathāpi vakṣyāmīty āha | yena hetu-bhūtena tvaṁ caturbhiḥ pādair vartase | yatra ca satyādayo mahā-guṇā na viyanti (na kṣīyante sma) tena śrī-nivāsena rahitaṁ lokaṁ śocāmīti ṣaṣṭhenānvayaḥ ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu yadyapy ahaṁ jānāmi tad api tvan-mukhāt śrotum icchāmīty ata āha—caturbhir iti | yena hetu-bhūtena tvaṁ caturbhiḥ pādair vartase iti vartamāna-sāmīpye vartamāna-prayogaḥ | tena śrīnivāsena rahitaṁ lokaṁ śocāmīti ṣaṣṭhenānvayaḥ ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :**he dharma! yan-māṁ pṛcchati tat sarvaṁ bhavān veda, tathāpi tvan-mukhāt śrotavyam iti cet-tatrāha—yena rakṣakeṇa tvaṁ caturbhiḥ dayā-satya-tapaḥ-śocaiḥ pādair vartase'vartiṣṭhāḥ vartamāna-sāmīpye vartamānavad vā [pā.] iti sūtraṁ, tena śrīnivāsena rahitaṁ lokaṁ śocāmīti ṣaṣṭhena sambandhaḥ ||26||

 **...**

|| 1.16.27-30 ||

**satyaṁ śaucaṁ dayā kṣāntis tyāgaḥ santoṣa ārjavam |**

**śamo damas tapaḥ sāmyaṁ titikṣoparatiḥ śrutam ||**

**jñānaṁ viraktir aiśvaryaṁ śauryaṁ tejo balaṁ smṛtiḥ |**

**svātantryaṁ kauśalaṁ kāntir dhairyaṁ mārdavam eva ca ||**

**prāgalbhyaṁ praśrayaḥ śīlaṁ saha ojo balaṁ bhagaḥ |**

**gāmbhīryaṁ sthairyam āstikyaṁ kīrtir māno’nahaṅkṛtiḥ ||**

**ete cānye ca bhagavan nityā yatra mahā-guṇāḥ |**

**prārthyā mahattvam icchadbhir na viyanti sma karhicit ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **tyāgo mithyābhimāna-varjanam | mithyābhimāna-viratis tyāga ity abhidhīyate iti nārāyaṇādhyātme | ekāntataḥ śubha-bhāgitvaṁ saubhāgyam | śubhaika-bhāgī subhago durbhagas tad-viparyaya iti gītā-kalpe | 


    śamaḥ priyād buddhy-utsādaḥ kṣamā-krodhādy-anutthitiḥ | 


    mahā-virodha-kartuś ca sahanaṁ tu titikṣaṇam || iti pādme |


    svayaṁ sarvasya kartṛtvāt kutas tasya priyāpriyaḥ || iti ca |


    priyam eva yataḥ sarvaṁ priyaṁ nāsti kutracit | 


    svayam eva yataḥ kartā śāntoto harir īśvaraḥ || iti brahma-tarke |

mānaḥ pareśām | 


    guṇaiḥ svarūpa-bhūtais tu guṇy asau harir īśvaraḥ |


    na viṣṇor na ca muktānāṁ ko’pi bhinned guṇo mataḥ || iti brahma-tarke |

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : satyaṁ** yathārtha-bhāṣaṇam | **śaucaṁ** śuddhatvam | **dayā** para-duḥkhāsahanam | **kṣāntiḥ** krodha-prāptau citta-saṁyamanam | **tyāgo**’rthiṣu mukta-hastatā | **santoṣo**’laṁ-buddhiḥ | **ārjavam** avakratā | **śamo** mano-naiścalyam | **damo** bāhyendriya-naiścalyam | **tapaḥ** svadharmaḥ | **sāmyam** ari-mitrādy-abhāvaḥ | **titikṣā** parāparādha-sahanam | **uparatir** lābha-prāptāv audāsīnyam | śrutaṁ śāstra-vicāraḥ ||27||

**jñānam** ātma-viṣayam | **viraktir** vaitṛṣṇyam | **aiśvaryaṁ** niyantṛtvam | **śauryaṁ** saṅgrāmotsahaḥ | **tejaḥ** prabhāvaḥ | **balaṁ** dakṣatvam | **smṛtiḥ** kartavyākartavyārthānu-sandhānam | **svātantryam** aparādhīnatā | **kauśalaṁ** kriyā-nipuṇatā | **kāntiḥ** saundaryam | **dhairyam** avyākulatā | **mārdavaṁ** cittākāṭhinyam ||28||

**prāgalbhyaṁ** pratibhātiśayaḥ | **praśrayo** vinayaḥ | **śīlaṁ** sukha-bhāvaḥ | **saha-ojo-balāni** manaso jñānedriyāṇāṁ karmendriyāṇāṁ ca pāṭavāni | **bhago** bhogāspadatvam | **gambhīryam** akṣobhyatvam | **sthairyam** acañcalatā | **āstikyaṁ** śraddhā | **kīrtir** yaśaḥ | **mānaḥ** pūjyatvam | **anahaṅkṛtir** garvābhāvaḥ ||29||

ete ekona-catvāriṁśat | anye ca brahmaṇya-śaraṇyatvādayo mahānto guṇā yasmin nityāḥ sahajā na **viyanti** na kṣīyante sma ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tatra satyam ity-ādi | **satyaṁ **yathārtha-bhāṣaṇam | **śaucaṁ **śuddhatvam | **dayā **para-duḥkhāsahanam, anena śaraṇāgata-pālakatvaṁ bhakta-suhṛttvaṁ ca | **kṣāntiḥ **krodhāpattau citta-saṁyamaḥ | **tyāgo **vadānyatā | **santoṣaḥ **svatas tṛptiḥ | **ārjavam a**vakratā | **śamo **mano-naiścalyam anena sudṛḍhatvaṁ ca | **damo **bāhyendriya-naiścalyam | **tapaḥ **kṣatriyatvādi-līlāvatārānurūpaḥ sva-dharmaḥ | **sāmyaṁ **śatru-mitrādi-buddhy-abhāvaḥ | **titikṣā **svasmin parāparādha-sahanam | **uparatir **lābha-prāptāv audāsīnyam | **śrutaṁ **śāstra-vicāraḥ | 

**jñānaṁ **pañca-vidham—buddhimattvaṁ kṛtajñatvaṁ deśa-kāla-pātrajñatvaṁ sarvajñatvam ātmajñatvaṁ ca | **viraktir **asad-viṣaya-vaitṛṣṇyam | **aiśvaryaṁ **niyantṛtvam | **śauryaṁ **saṅgrāmotsāhaḥ | **tejaḥ **prabhāvaḥ | anena pratāpaś ca | sa ca prabhāva-vikhyātiḥ | **balaṁ **dakṣatvam | tac ca duṣkara-kṣipra-kāritvam | **dhṛtir **iti pāṭhe kṣobha-kāraṇe prāpte’vyākulatvam | **smṛtiḥ **kartavyārthānusandhānam | svātantryam aparādhīnatā | 

**kauśalaṁ **trividhaṁ—kriyā-nipuṇatā yugapad-bhūri-samādhāna-kāritā-lakṣaṇā cāturī kalā-vilāsa-vidvattā-lakṣaṇā vaidagdhī ca | **kāntiḥ **kamanīyatā | eṣā caturvidhā—avayavasya hastādy-aṅgādi-lakṣaṇasya varṇa-rasa-gandha-sparśa-śabdānām | tatra rasaś cādhāra-caraṇa-spṛṣṭa-vastu-niṣṭho jñeyaḥ | vayasaś ceti | etayā nārī-gaṇa-manohāritvam api | **dhairyam a**vyākulatā | **mārdavaṁ **premārdra-cittatvam | anena prema-vaśyatvaṁ ca | 

**prāgalbhyaṁ **pratibhātiśayaḥ | anena vāvadūkatvaṁ ca | **praśrayo** vinayaḥ | anena hrīmattvam | yathā-yukta-sarva-māna-dātṛtvam | priyaṁvadatvaṁ ca | **śīlaṁ **su-svabhāvaḥ | anena sādhu-samāśrayatvaṁ ca | **saho **manaḥ-pāṭavam | **ojo **jñānendriya-pāṭavam | **balaṁ **karmendriya-pāṭavam | **bhagas **trividhaḥ—bhogāspadatvaṁ sukhitvaṁ sarva-samṛddhimattvaṁ ca | 

**gāmbhīryaṁ **durvibodhāśayatvam | **sthairyam a**cañcalatā | **āstikyaṁ **śāstra-cakṣuṣṭvam | **kīrtiḥ **sādguṇya-khyātiḥ | anena rakta-lokatvaṁ ca | **mānaḥ **pūjyatvam | **anahaṅkṛtis **tathāpi garva-rahitatvam | ca-kārād brahmaṇyatvam | sarva-siddhi-niṣevitatvam | sac-cid-ānanda-ghana-vigrahatvādayo jñeyāḥ | mahattvam icchadbhiḥ prārthyā iti mahā-guṇā iti ca | varīyastvam api guṇāntaram | 

etena teṣāṁ guṇānām anyatra svalpatvaṁ cañcalatvaṁ ca | tatraiva pūrṇatvam avinaśvaratvaṁ coktam | ata eva śrī-sūta-vākyam—


    nityaṁ nirīkṣamāṇānāṁ yad api dvārakaukasām |


    na vitṛpyanti hi dṛśaḥ śriyo dhāmāṅgam acyutam || [bhā.pu. 1.11.26] iti |

tathā nityā iti **na viyantīti** sadā svarūpa-guṇāntaram | anye ca jīvālabhyā yathā tatrāvirbhāva-mātratve’pi satya-saṅkalpatvam | vaśīkṛtācintyamāyatvam | āvirbhāva-viśeṣatve’py akhaṇḍa-sattva-guṇasya kevala-svayam-avalambanatvam | jagat-pālakatvam | yathā tathā hatāri-svarga-dātṛtvam | ātmārāma-gaṇākarṣitvam | brahma-rudrādi-sevitatvam | paramācintya-śaktitvam | ānantyena nitya-nūtana-saundaryādy-āvirbhāvatvam | puruṣāvatāratve’pi māyā-niyantṛtvam | jagat-sṛṣṭy-ādi-kartṛtvam | guṇāvatārādi-bījatvam | ananta-brahmāṇḍāśraya-roma-vivaratvam | vāsudevatva-nārāyaṇatvādi-lakṣaṇa-bhagavattvāvirbhāve’pi svarūpa-bhūta-paramācintyākhila-mahā-śaktimattvam | svayaṁ bhagaval-lakṣṇa-kṛṣṇatve tu hatāri-mukti-bhakti-dāyakatvam | svasyāpi vismāpaka-rūpādi-mādhuryavattvam | anindriyācetana-paryantāśeṣa-sukha-dātṛ-sva-sānnidhyatvam ity ādayaḥ | tad etad diṅ-mātra-darśanam, yata āha—guṇātmanas te’pi guṇān vimātuṁ hitāvatīrṇasya ka īśire’sya [bhā.pu. 10.14.7] ity-ādi ||27-31|| [prīti-sandarbhaḥ 116-117]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : satyaṁ** yathārtha-bhāṣaṇam | **śaucaṁ** śuddhatvam | **dayā** para-duḥkhāsahanam | anena śaraṇāgata-pālakatvaṁ bhakta-suhṛttvaṁ ca | **kṣāntiḥ** krodhotpattau citta-saṁyamaḥ | **tyāgo** vadānyatā | **santoṣaḥ** svatas tṛptiḥ | **ārjavam** avakratā | **śamo** mano-naiścalyam, anena sudṛḍha-vratatvam api | damo bāhyendriya-naiścalyam | tapaḥ kṣatriyatvādi-līlā-rūpaḥ sva-dharmaḥ | sāmyaṁ śatru-mitrādi-buddhy-abhāvaḥ | **titikṣā** svasmin parāparādhasya sahanam | **uparatir** bhoga-prāptāv audāsīnyam | **śrutaṁ** śāstra-vicāraḥ ||

jñānaṁ sarvajñatvaṁ kṛtajñatvādikaṁ ca | viraktir vaitṛṣṇyam | aiśvaryaṁ niyantṛtvam | śauryaṁ saṅgrāmotsāhaḥ | tejaḥ prabhāvaḥ | balaṁ dakṣatvam | smṛtiḥ kartavyārthānusandhāna-rūpā | svātantryam aparādhīnatā | kauśalaṁ kalā-vilāsādi-vaidagdhī | kāntiḥ kamanīyatā | dhairyam avyākulatvam | mārdavaṁ sukumāratvaṁ premārdratvaṁ ca ||

prāgalbhyaṁ pratibhātiśayaḥ | praśrayo vinayaḥ | sahastejobalāni manaso jñānendriyāṇāṁ karmendriyāṇāṁ ca pāṭavāni | bhago bhogāspadatvam | gāmbhīryam akṣobhyatvam | sthairyam acañcalatā | āstikyaṁ śraddhā | kīrtir yaśaḥ | mānaḥ pūjyatvam | anahaṅkṛtir garvābhāvaḥ |

ime ca anye ca satyasaṅkalpatvabrahmaṇyatvabhaktavātsalyādayo nityāḥ sarva-kālavartino mahāguṇāḥ | māṁ bhajanti guṇāḥ sarve nirguṇaṁ nirapekṣakam iti bhagavad-uktyā guṇātītasyāpi tasya guṇavattvān mahā-guṇāḥ aprākṛtāś cin-mayāḥ svarūpa-bhūtā ity arthaḥ | karhicin mahā-pralaye’pi na viyanti na vigatā bhavanti | tathā hi satyaṁ yathārtha-bhāṣaṇam | tad-ādīnāṁ guṇānāṁ tadaiva nityatvaṁ syāt yadi te mahā-pralayam abhivyāpya nairantaryeṇa tatra śrī-kṛṣṇe tiṣṭhanti | teṣāṁ nityatve sati yān prati bhāṣaṇādikaṁ teṣāṁ tad-vāsa-sthānānām api nityatvam upapannam ato līlānāṁ līlā-parikarāṇāṁ pārṣadānāṁ dhāmnāṁ ca tadīyānāṁ sarveṣāṁ nityatvaṁ siddham ||27-30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **satyaṁ yathārtha-bhāṣaṇaṁ, śaucaṁ śuddhatvaṁ pāvanatvaṁ vā, dravya-tāratamyānādareṇa bhakti-mātra-prasannatva-rūpā bhāva-śuddhir vā | dayā nirnimitta-para-duḥkha-parijihīrṣā, tayā śaraṇyatvaṁ suhṛtvaṁ ca . kṣāntiḥ krodha-prāptau citta-saṁyamaḥ, tyāgo yācakeṣu mukta-hastatā, santoṣaḥ svānanda-pūrṇatā, ārjavaṁ mano-vāk-kāyaika-rūpyaṁ, śamo mano-naiścalyaṁ tena sudṛḍhavratatvañ ca, damo bāhyendriya-naiścalyaṁ, tapaḥ kṣatriyatvādi-līlānuguṇa-svadharmācāraḥ, sāmyaṁ jāti- guṇādi-vaiṣamya-bhājāṁ śaraṇyatāyām avaiśiṣṭyaṁ śatru-mitrādi-buddhi-viraho vā | titikṣā parāparādha-sahatā, uparatir lābhemṣv audāsīnyaṁ, śrutaṁ śāstra-vicāraḥ ||27|| \
 \
jñānaṁ sarva-sākṣātkāra-rūpaṁ sārvajñyaṁ kṛtajñatvaṁ ca | viraktir vitṛṣṇatā, aiśvaryaṁ niyantṛtvaṁ śauryaṁ yuddhotsāhaḥ, tejaḥ parābhibhava-sāmarthyaṁ balaṁ sarva-dhāraṇa-śaktiḥ, smṛtiḥ kartavyānusandhiḥ, svātantryam aparādhīnatvaṁ, kauśalaṁ kriyā-naipuṇyaṁ, kāntir yathocitāṅga-san-niveśa-lakṣaṇaṁ saundaryaṁ, dhairyam abhagna pratijñatvaṁ, mārdavaṁ saukumāryaṁ, bhakta-vicchedāsahatvaṁ vā ||28|| \
 \
prāgalbhyaṁ pratibhātiśayaḥ, praśrayo vinayitvaṁ, śīlaṁ śobhana-svabhāvatvaṁ mahato mantarair apy abhimukhaiḥ saha nīrandhra-praṇayaḥ, saha ojo balāni kramān-manojñānendriya-karmendriya-pāṭavāni, bhago bhogāspadatā, gāmbhīryaṁ bhaktāparādhais tat-pradarśakaiś cākṣobhyatvaṁ, sthairyaṁ sadaikarasyam acāpalyaṁ vā | āstikyaṁ śāstra-tad athānuṣṭhāśraddhā, kīrtiḥ sād-guṇyakhyātiḥ, mānaḥ sarva-pūjyatvam, anahaṅkṛtir agarvatvam ||29|| \
 \
guṇānām eṣāṁ nityatām āha—ime coktāḥ anye cānuktāḥ satya-saṅkalpatva-brahmaṇyatvādayaḥ | yasmin-nityāḥ sārva-kālikāḥ mahā-guṇāḥ pratyekaṁ pūrṇāḥ | mahattvam icchadbhiḥ prārthyāḥ stutyāḥ yān stuvanto mahattāṁ labhante ity arthaḥ | karhicin-mahā-pralaye'pi na viyanti svāśrayād vigatā na bhavanti, svānubandhitvād-raverivauṣṇyādayaḥ ||30||

 **...**

|| 1.16.31 ||

**tenāhaṁ guṇa-pātreṇa śrī-nivāsena sāmpratam |**

**śocāmi rahitaṁ lokaṁ pāpmanā kalinekṣitam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tena guṇa-pātreṇa guṇālayena | pāpmanā pāpa-hetunā ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **guṇa-pātreṇa guṇālayena | īkṣitam ākrāntam ||31||

 **...**

|| 1.16.32 || 

**ātmānaṁ cānuśocāmi bhavantaṁ cāmarottamam |**

**devān pitṝn ṛṣīn sādhūn sarvān varṇāṁs tathāśramān ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **ātmānam ity ādāv api tena rahitam ity-ādi yojyam ||32||

 **...**

|| 1.16.33 || 

**brahmādayo bahu-tithaṁ yad-apāṅga-mokṣa- **

**kāmās tapaḥ samacaran bhagavat-prapannāḥ |**

**sā śrīḥ sva-vāsam aravinda-vanaṁ vihāya **

**yat-pāda-saubhagam alaṁ bhajate’nuraktā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tasya viraho duḥsaha ity āha caturbhiḥ | **brahmādayo** yasyāḥ śriyo’**pāṅga-mokṣaḥ** svasmin dṛṣṭi-pātas tat-**kāmāḥ** santo **bahu-tithaṁ** bahu-kālaṁ **tapaḥsamacaran** samyak caranti sma | **bhagavadbhir** uttamaiḥ **prapannā** āśritāpi **sā śrīr** yasya **pāda**-lāvaṇyam **alamanuraktā** satī sevate ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : bhagavantaṁ prapannā** api tasyā api preyasītvāt yasyāḥ kṛpā-kaṭākṣa-**kāmā brahmādayobahu-tithaṁ** bahūnāṁ kālānāṁ pūraṇaṁ kālaṁ vyāpya **tapaḥsamacaran**, sā **sva-vāsam aravinda-vanaṁ vihāya **iti tat-**pādayoḥ** sarvāravinda-jāti-śobhātikrame tātparyam | sāpi **bhajata** iti ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** bahu-tithaṁ bahu-kālaṁ bhagavantaṁ prapannā api brahmādayaḥ sa-kāma-bhaktatvāt yad apāṅgety ādi ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tad-viraho me duḥsaha ity āha—brahmeti caturbhiḥ | **bahu-tithaṁ** bahu-kālaṁ **prapannā** api **brahmādayaḥ** sakāma-bhaktatvāt, **yad apāṅga** ity-ādi ||33||

 **...**

|| 1.16.34 || 

**tasyāham abja-kuliśāṅkuśa-ketu-ketaiḥ **

**śrīmat-padair bhagavataḥ samalaṅkṛtāṅgī |**

**trīn atyaroca upalabhya tato vibhūtiṁ **

**lokān sa māṁ vyasṛjad utsmayatīṁ tad-ante ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : tasya** bhagavataḥ **śrīmadbhiḥ padaiḥ** | **ketur** dhvajaḥ | **abjādayaḥ ketāś** cihnāni yeṣāṁ taiḥ | yad vā, abjādīnām āśrayaiḥ **samyag alaṅkṛtam aṅgaṁ** yasyāḥ **sāhaṁ,** tato **bhagavato vibhūtiṁ** sampadam **upalabhya** prāpya trīn lokān **atikramya aroce** śobhitavaty asmi | paścāt **tasyā** vibhūter **ante** nāśa-kāle prāpte saty **utsmayantīṁ** garvaṁ kurvāṇāṁ **māṁ sa vyasṛjat** tyaktavān ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tat-sambandhena sva-vibhūty-atiśayo yukta evety āha—tasya iti ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tasya śrī-kṛṣṇasya | ketaṁ cihnaṁ trīn lokān atikramya aroce śobhitavaty asmi | tataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇād vibhūtiṁ sampadam upalabhya prāpya tad-ante vibhūter nāśa-kāle prāpsyamāne utsmayantīṁ mat-tulyo vaikuṇṭho’pi na bhavatīty antar garvavatīm ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yasya śrī-kṛṣṇasya ketur dhvajaḥ ketaiś cihnaiḥ | tataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇād-vibhūtim upalabhya trīn lokān atikramyāroce śobhitāham āsaṁ, tad ante vibhūter nāśe prāpyamāṇe utsmayantī mat-samo vaikuṇṭho'pi na bhaved ity antargarvavatīṁ māṁ vyasṛjad-vihāyāntaradhāt ||34||

 **...**

|| 1.16.35 || 

**yo vai mamātibharam āsura-vaṁśa-rājñām**[^147]

**akṣauhiṇī-śatam apānudad ātma-tantraḥ |**

**tvāṁ duḥstham ūna-padam ātmani pauruṣeṇa**

**sampādayan yaduṣu ramyam abibhrad aṅgam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kiṁ ca, yo vai āsuro vaṁśo yeṣāṁ teṣāṁ rājñām akṣauhiṇī-śata-rūpaṁ mamātibharaṁ bhāram apanītavān | tvāṁ cona-padavatvād duḥsthaṁ santaṁ pauruṣeṇa puruṣa-kāraṇenātmani svasmin saṁpūrṇa-padaṁ susthaṁ saṁpādayan | lakṣaṇa-hetvoḥ kriyāyā iti hetau śatṛ-pratyayaḥ | saṁpādayitum ity arthaḥ | abibhrad dhṛtavān ity arthaḥ ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **pūrve ye āsura-vaṁśā āsan ta eva rājānas teṣām  | chinna-prarūḍhādivat samāsaḥ | pāṭhāntare āsura-veśāḥ āsura-bhāvaṁ praviṣṭā ity arthaḥ | ūna-padaṁ tvām ātmani āśraye sati sampādayan sampannaṁ pūrṇa-padaṁ kurvan ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **pūrve ye āsura-vaṁśā āsan ta eva rājānas teṣām  | chinna-prarūḍhādivat samāsaḥ | pāṭhāntare āsura-veṣāḥ āsura-bhāvaḥ praviṣṭā ity arthaḥ | ūna-padaṁ tvām ātmani āśraye sati sampādayan sampannaṁ pūrṇa-padaṁ kurvan ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yo mamātibharam apānudan-nirāsthat, unapadaṁ tato duḥsthaṁ tvām, ātmani svasmin yat pauruṣaṁ tena sampādayan sampūrṇa-padaṁ susthaṁ ca sampādayaitum ity arthaḥ | yaduṣu ramyaṁ lāvaṇyopetam aṅgaṁ murtim avibhrat prakaṭitavān ||35||

 **...**

|| 1.16.36 ||

**kā vā saheta virahaṁ puruṣottamasya **

**premāvaloka-rucira-smita-valgu-jalpaiḥ |**

**sthairyaṁ samānam aharan madhu-māninīnāṁ**

**romotsavo mama yad-aṅghri-viṭaṅkitāyāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tasya virahaṁ kā vā saheta | premāvalokaś ca rucira-smitaṁ ca valgu-jalpaś ca tair madhu-māninīnāṁ satyabhāmādīnāṁ samānaṁ sarva-sahitaṁ sthairyaṁ stabdhatvaṁ yo’harat | yasyāṅghriṇā rajasy utthitena viṭaṅkitāyā alaṅkṛtāyāḥ sasyādi-miṣeṇa romotsavo bhavati ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tasya virahaṁ kā vā saheta | premāvalokaś ca ruciraṁ smitaṁ ca valgu-jalpaś ca tair madhu-māninīnāṁ madhuvan mādako mānaḥ pātivratyādi-garvo yāsām asti tāsāṁ satyabhaṁādīnāṁ samānaṁ garva-sahitaṁ sthairyaṁ śuddhatvaṁ yaḥ aharat | yasyāṅghriṇā rajasyutthitena viṭaṅkitāyāḥ alaṅkṛtāyāḥ śaṣpādimiṣeṇa romotsavaḥ bhavati ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **madhu-māninīnāṁ satyabhāmādīnāṁ sthairyam acāñcalyaṁ māna-sahitam | viṭaṅkitāyā alaṅkṛtāyā iti tena tasya sarvāsv api preyasīṣu madhye ahaṁ sadaiva svādhīna-bhartṛkā viraha-rahitaivāsam iti bhāvaḥ ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **puruṣottamasya virahaṁ kā vā saheta, yā madhumāninīnāṁ satyabhāmādīnāṁ sthairyam acāpalyaṁ mānasa-hitaṁ premāvalokādyair aharat | rāsotsave mamāpi yas tad aharat, mama kīdṛśyāḥ? ity āha—yad aṅghribhyāṁ viṭaṅkitāyāḥ vibhūṣitāyāḥ | tat-preyasīṣu madhye tac-caraṇa-sparśa-saubhāgyāyāhaṁ sadaivāsaṁ, tad-viraham adhunā kathaṁ soḍhuṁ prabhavānīti bhāvaḥ ||36||

 **...**

|| 1.16.37 ||

**tayor evaṁ kathayatoḥ pṛthivī-dharmayos tadā |**

**parīkṣin nāma rājarṣiḥ prāptaḥ prācīṁ sarasvatīm ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kathayatoḥ satoḥ prācīṁ pūrva-vāhinīṁ sarasvatīṁ kurukṣetre ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **prācīṁ pūrva-vāhinīm ||

iti sārārtha-darśinyāṁ harṣiṇyāṁ bhakta-cetasām |

prathame ṣoḍaśo’dhyāyaḥ saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām ||*||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tayor bhūmi-dharmayoḥ | prācīṁ pūrva-vāhinīm ||37|| \
 \
iti śrī-vaiṣṇavānandinyāṁ  prathama-skandha-ṭippanyāṁ ṣoḍaśo'dhyāyaḥ ||16||

 **...**

iti śrīmad-bhāgavate mahā-purāṇe brahma-sūtra-bhāṣye pāramahaṁsyaṁ saṁhitāyāṁ vaiyāsikyāṁ prathama-skandhe

parīkṣite dharma-pṛthvī-saṁvādo nāma

ṣoḍaśo’dhyāyaḥ |

|| 1.16 ||



**...** 

(1.17)


## atha saptadaśo'dhyāyaḥ


### parīkṣid-dharma-saṁvādaḥ, kali-nigrahaṇaṁ ca |

|| 1.17.1 ||

**sūta uvāca—**

**tatra go-mithunaṁ rājā hanyamānam anāthavat |**

**daṇḍa-hastaṁ ca vṛṣalaṁ dadṛśe nṛpa-lāñchanam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :**

tataḥ saptadaśe rājñaḥ kaler nigraha ucyate | \
tasyaivaṁ vīryabhājo’pi vairāgyaṁ vaktum adbhutam ||

hanyamānaṁ tāḍyamānam ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tatraivākasmād vṛṣale samāgate rājāpi samāgata ity āha—tatreti ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :**

parīkṣid-dharmayoḥ proktam ukti-pratyukti-kautukam |

nigrahānugrahau rājñā kaleḥ saptadaśe tataḥ ||

hanyamānaṁ tāḍyamānam | nṛpa-lāñchanam iti satya-tretā-dvāparādi-yuga-maryādānāṁ bhaṅge svātantrya-sūcakam ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :**

praśnottarāṇi citrāṇi parīkṣid-dharmayor dvayoḥ | \
kalau daṇḍadaye rājñety eṣā saptadaśe kathā || \


hanyamānaṁ tāḍyamānaṁ, nṛpasya lāñchanaṁ cihnaṁ mukuṭādi yasya tam iti satyādi-yuga-maryādā-vibhañjena svātantryaṁ vyajyate ||1||

 **...**

|| 1.17.2 || 

**vṛṣaṁ mṛṇāla-dhavalaṁ mehantam iva bibhyatam |**

**vepamānaṁ padaikena sīdantaṁ śūdra-tāḍitam ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **bibhyatam iva mehantam ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **mṛṇālaṁ padma-kandas tatvad dhavalam | bhayān mehantaṁ mūtrayantam | ivety anena pādāvaśeṣo dharmo bhayān mūtrayann iva pratikṣaṇaṁ kṣīyamāṇāṁśas tasyāpy anirvāhāt kampamāna iveti darśitam ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **mehantaṁ mūtrayantam iveti pādāvaśiṣṭo’pi dharmaḥ pratikṣaṇaṁ kṣarann ivety utprekṣāyāṁ naśyad-avastha ity arthaḥ | vepamānam iti so’pi nānā-vighnair aniṣpanna iva kalinā kriyate iti sūcyate ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **mehantaṁ mūtrayantam iti padāvaśiṣṭasyāpi dharmasya pratikṣaṇaṁ kṣaradavasthotprekṣyate | vepamānam iti tādṛśasyāpi pratyuhaiḥ kali-kṛtair aniṣpattir yajyate | dharma-duhāṁ havir dogdhrīṁ, satyādi-prasava-virahād-vivatsāṁ, dharmakṣayād aśru-vadanāṁ yajña-virahāt kṣāmāṁ kṛśāṁ, yuvasaṁ yajña-bhāgam ||2-3||

 **...**

|| 1.17.3 || 

**gāṁ ca dharma-dughāṁ dīnāṁ bhṛśaṁ śūdra-padāhatām |**

**vivatsām āśru-vadanāṁ kṣāmāṁ yavasam icchatīm ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **dharma-dughāṁ havir dogdhrīm | kṣāmāṁ kṛśām | yavasaṁ tṛṇam | atra sasyādi-prasava-kṣayād vivatseva | yajñādy-abhāvāt kṛśā | ata eva yajña-bhāgam icchantī pṛthvīti sūcitam ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **dharma-dughāṁ havir dogdhrīṁ śasyādi-prasava-kṣayād vivatsāṁ dharma-kṣayeṇāśru-vadanāṁ yajñābhāvāt kṣāmāṁ kṛśām | yavasaṁ yajña-bhāgam ||3||

 **...**

|| 1.17.4 || 

**papraccha ratham ārūḍhaḥ kārtasvara-paricchadam |**

**megha-gambhīrayā vācā samāropita-kārmukaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :kārtasvaraṁ **suvarṇaṁ tan-mayaḥ **paricchadaḥ** parikaro yasya, svarṇa-nibaddham ity arthaḥ | sajjī-kṛta-**kārmukaḥ** ||4||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : kārtasvaraṁ** suvarṇam | **sajjīkṛta-kārmuka** iti kaleḥ palāyanāśaṅkayā ||4||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kārta-svaraṁ suvarṇaṁ paricchadaḥ parikaro yasya taṁ ratham ārūḍhaḥ | samāropiteti kaleḥ palāyanāśaṅkayā ||4||

 **...**

|| 1.17.5 || 

**kas tvaṁ mac-charaṇe loke balād dhaṁsy abalān balī |**

**nara-devo’si veṣeṇa naṭavat karmaṇādvijaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **haṁsi ghātayasi | rājāham iti cet tatrāha | naṭa iva veṣa-mātreṇa nara-devo’si | karmaṇā tv advijaḥ śūdraḥ ||5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **advijo dvija-virodhī ||5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kas tvaṁ re mad-agre haṁsi? nara-devo’ham iti cen mayi nara-deve vidyamāne tvaṁ kutastyo nara-devaḥ? naṭavad-veṣeṇeti cen nahi nahi karmaṇā tvam advijaḥ śūdraḥ | naṭo hy anukāryasyaiva karma abhinayatīti bhāvaḥ ||5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **kas tvaṁ re me purastād avalān haṁsi? nara-devo'ham iti cenmayi nara-deve sati tvaṁ kutantyo'si? naṭavad-veśeneti cen na karmaṇā durbala-vādhanena tvama-dvijaḥ śūdro'si | naṭaḥ khalv anukāryasyaiva karmābhinayed iti bhāvaḥ ||5||

 **...**

|| 1.17.6 || 

**yas tvaṁ kṛṣṇe gate dūraṁ saha-gāṇḍīva-dhanvanā |**

**śocyo’sy aśocyān rahasi praharan vadham arhasi ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **aśocyān niraparādhān rahasi yas tvaṁ praharan praharasi sa śocyaḥ sāparādho’sy ato vadham arhasi ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu yathā tvaṁ deśasya rājā, tathaivāham api samprati kālasya rājeti mayi tava vikramo na bhaviṣyatīty ata āha—yas tvam iti | | gāṇḍīva-dhanvanā arjunena saha kṛṣṇe dūraṁ gate satīti etāvad-dinaṁ tvaṁ kvāsīr iti bhāvaḥ | nanv āsam eva kintu tābhyāṁ bhayena na prābhūvam | adhunā tu kasmād bibhemi iti satyam | śocyo’si adhunā tvaṁ martum evecchasīti bhāvaḥ ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu yathā tvaṁ deśasya, tathāhaṁ saṁprati-kālasya rājeti na te mayi prabhāvo bhāvīti cet-tatrāha—yas tvaṁ gāṇḍīva-dhanvanā saha kṛṣṇe dūraṁ gate satītyetāvat kālaṁ kvāsīr iti bhāvaḥ | 

nanu sthito'py ahaṁ tābhyāṁ bhayānn ātmānaṁ prākāśayaṁ, tad-vihīne loke svatantro'ham adhunā kasmād-vibhemi? tatrāha—śocyo'sīti | tvam idānīṁ martum icchasīti bhāvaḥ ||6||

 **...**

|| 1.17.7 || 

**tvaṁ vā mṛṇāla-dhavalaḥ pādair nyūnaḥ padā caran |**

**vṛṣa-rūpeṇa kiṁ kaścid devo naḥ parikhedayan ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **vṛṣaṁ praty āha | tvāṁ vā kaḥ | svayam eva saṁbhāvayati | kiṁ kaścid devo vṛṣa-rūpeṇāsmān parikhedayan vartase ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **bhavatu, kṣaṇaṁ tava prathamam aparādhaṁ vimṛśāmīti manasi kṛtvā vṛṣaṁ pratyāha—tvaṁ veti | no’smān khedayituṁ kiṁ kaścid devo’si | naitādṛśaḥ kṛśo[^148] duḥkhī mayā svapne’pi dṛṣṭa iti bhāvaḥ ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **bhavatvasyāparādhaṁ kṣaṇaṁ vicārayāmīti hṛdi nidhāya vṛṣaṁ pṛcchati—tvaṁ veti | mṛṇāla-dhavalaḥ padmakanda-śubhras tvaṁ ko vā? svayaṁ sambhāvayann āha—pādais tribhir nyūnaḥ padaikena caran naḥ khedayituṁ kiṁ kaścid-devo'sīti na tvādṛśo duḥkhito vṛṣo mayā kvāpi dṛṣṭa iti bhāvaḥ ||7||

 **...**

|| 1.17.8 || 

**na jātu kauravendrāṇāṁ dor daṇḍa-parirambhite |**

**bhū-tale’nupatanty asmin vinā te prāṇināṁ śucaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : dordaṇḍaiḥparirambhite** parirambhitavat surakṣite te **śuco**’śrūṇi **vinā** anyeṣām  aśrūṇi **nānupatantīti** kheda-hetutvaṁ darśitam ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tvayy eva rājani sati vayam evaṁ duḥkhinaḥ sāmprataṁ samabhūmeti cet tatra sānutāpaṁ sāṭopaṁ cāha—na jātv iti | parirambhite parirambhitavat surakṣite tava śucaḥ aśrūṇi vinā anyeṣām  aśrūṇi na patanti ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu tvay eva rājñi sati vayam eva duḥkhinaḥ saṁprati jātā iti cet-tatra sānutāpāṭopam āha—neti | parirambhite parirabdhava-stuvat sugopite bhūtale te tava śuco'śruṇi vinānyeṣāṁ prāṇināṁ śuco nānupanti ||8||

 **...**

|| 1.17.9 || 

**mā saurabheyātra śuco vyetu te vṛṣalād bhayam |**

**mā rodīr amba bhadraṁ te khalānāṁ mayi śāstari ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **evam ukte punar api śocantaṁ praty āha | bho surabheḥ putra, mā śucaḥ śokaṁ mā kuru | vyetu apayātu | gāṁ praty āha | he amba mātaḥ, śāstari mayi jīvati sati te bhadram evāto mā rodīḥ ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanv alīkam idam iti svam iva rūdantīṁ gāṁ darśayantaṁ vṛṣaṁ sāśvāsam āha—bhoḥ surabheḥ putra! mā śucaḥ, mā śocaḥ | bhayaṁ vyetv iti adhunaivemaṁ hanmīti bhāvaḥ | gāṁ pratyāha—meti | mayi jīvati sati ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu mṛṣaivaitat, mat-sadṛśīṁ dhenuṁ ca paśyeti vadantaṁ vṛṣam āśvāsayann āha—he saurabheya surabhi-putra! tvaṁ mā śucaḥ śokaṁ mā kṛthāḥ, vṛṣalāt te bhayaṁ vyetu | dhenuṁ praty āha—he amba! tvaṁ mā rodīḥ, mayi khalānāṁ śāstari sati te bhadram | adhunaivemaṁ hanmīti bhāvaḥ ||9||

 **...**

|| 1.17.10-11 || 

**yasya rāṣṭre prajāḥ sarvās trasyante sādhvy asādhubhiḥ |**

**tasya mattasya naśyanti kīrtir āyur bhago gatiḥ ||**

**eṣa rājñāṁ paro dharmo hy ārtānām ārti-nigrahaḥ |**

**ata enaṁ vadhiṣyāmi bhūta-druham asattamam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **mad-dhitārtham evainaṁ haniṣyāmi na tavopakārāety āha—yasyeti dvābhyām | he sādhvi, sarvā yāḥ kāścid apīty arthaḥ | asādhubhis trasyante pīḍayanta ity arthaḥ | bhago bhāgyam | gatiḥ para-lokaḥ ||10||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanv asmat-sambandhenainaṁ ghātayann etad-vadha-bhāgināv āvāṁ mā kurv ity ata āha—yasyeti | ataḥ sva-hitārtham evainaṁ hanmi | na cātra yuṣmad-anurodha iti bhāvaḥ ||10-11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanv asmat-sukhāyainaṁ nighnann etad-vadha-doṣa-bhājāvāvāṁ karoṣīty ata āha—yasyeti | he sādhvi dheno! bhago bhāgyaṁ gatiḥ paralokaḥ, tathā ca svahitāyainaṁ hanmi, nātra yuṣmad-doṣa iti ||10|| \
 \
enaṁ yuṣmat-pīḍakaṁ śūdram ||11||

 **...**

|| 1.17.12 || 

**ko’vṛścat tava pādāṁs trīn saurabheya catuṣ-pada |**

**mā bhūvaṁs tvādṛśā rāṣṭre rājñāṁ kṛṣṇānuvartinām ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **punar api śocantaṁ vṛṣaṁ praty āha | **kaḥ avṛścac** ciccheda | **tvādṛśās** tvad-vidhā duḥkhitāḥ ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **avṛścaccic-cheda tvādṛśāḥ duḥkhitāś catuṣpado mā bhūvanna bhavantu ||12||

 **...**

|| 1.17.13 || 

**ākhyāhi vṛṣa bhadraṁ vaḥ sādhūnām akṛtāgasām |**

**ātma-vairūpya-kartāraṁ pārthānāṁ kīrti-dūṣaṇam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **vo bhadram astu | ātmanas tava pāda-cchedena vairūpyaṁ kṛtavantaṁ kīrtiṁ dūsayatīti tathā tam ākhyāyi ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kintu tava mukhāt kiñcit śrutvaivainaṁ vadhiṣyāmi ity ata āha—ākhyāhīti | nanu mama kim api vivakṣitaṁ nāstīti tatrāha—he vṛṣa! vo yuṣmākaṁ sādhūnāṁ niraparādhānāṁ bhadraṁ sukhe’pi duḥkhe’pi sadā bhadram eva | kintv asmākaṁ pārthānāṁ kīrtiṁ dūṣayati yas tam ākhyāhi | tam eva kam? ātmanas tava pāda-cchedena vairūpyaṁ kṛtavantam ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **ātmanas tava vairūpya-kartāraṁ tvat-pādac-chedakaṁ pārthānāṁ kīrtiṁ dūyaṣatīti tam | nanu tad ākhyāne sati tasmāt-tava bhayaṁ vā syāt-tataḥ kiṁ teneti cet-tatrāha—nirāgasi jane yo'gham aparādhaṁ yuñjanbhaved asya sarvato mat-sakāśād-bhayam ||13-14||

 **...**

|| 1.17.14 || 

**jane’nāgasy aghaṁ yuñjan sarvato’sya ca mad-bhayam |**

**sādhūnāṁ bhadram eva syād asādhu-damane kṛte ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nanu tadākhyāne kṛte kathaṁ bhadraṁ syād ity ata āha | yasmād anāgasi jane yo’ghaṁ duḥkhaṁ yuñjan kurvan bhavaty asyaivaṁ-bhūtasya mattaḥ sakāśāt sarvatrāpi bhayaṁ bhavati, tataḥ sādhūnāṁ bhadraṁ bhaved eveti ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **na ca kathite sati tvatta evāsya bhayaṁ kintv akathane’pi sarvata evety āha—nirāgasi jane yo’ghaṁ yuñjan bhavet asya sarvata eva hetubhyo mat-sakāśād bhayam ||14||

 **...**

|| 1.17.15 || 

**anāgaḥsv iha bhūteṣu ya āgas-kṛn niraṅkuśaḥ |**

**āhartāsmi bhujaṁ sākṣād amartyasyāpi sāṅgadam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **etasya daṇḍe’ham asamartha iti māśāṅkīr ity āha—anāgaḥsv iti | āgaskṛd aparādha-kartā | tasya **amartyasya** devasyāpi **bhujam āhartāsmy** āhariṣyāmi | **sāṅgadam** ity anena mūlata utpāṭyāhariṣyāmīti darśitam ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu yadi tvatto’pi mahā-prabhāvī balavāṁś ca syāt, tadā kiṁ bhavet ? ata āha—anāgaḥsv iti | **sākṣād amartyasyāpi** devasyāpi | **sāṅgadam** iti mūlata eva chittvā āhariṣyāmīti devāsura-narādiṣu mat-tulyo baliṣṭhaḥ prabhāvī vā ko’pi nāstīti bhāvaḥ ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu tvatto'py atibalī cet syāt-tadā kiṁ bhāvi? tatrāha–anāgaḥsthiti | sākṣād amarttasyeti—sa sura-manuṣyeṣu matsamo'tibalī na ko'pyastīti | sāṅgadam iti mūlataś chittvāhartāśmīti bhāvaḥ ||15||

 **...**

|| 1.17.16 || 

**rājño hi paramo dharmaḥ sva-dharma-sthānupālanam |**

**śāsato’nyān yathā-śāstram anāpady utpathān iha ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nanv ekasya nigraheṇānyasyānugrahe tava kiṁ prayojanam ? tatrāha—rājño hīti | **anyān** adharmiṣṭhān | **śāsato** daṇḍayataḥ ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu ekasya nigrahe anyasyānugrahe tava kiṁ prayojanaṁ ? tatrāha—rājño hīti | **anyān** adharmiṣṭhān **śāsataḥ** daṇḍayataḥ ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanv ekasya daṇḍe parasyānugrahe tava ko'rthaḥ? tatrāha—rājño hīti | anyānanāpadyutpathān veda-mārgollaṅghino'dharmiṣṭhān yathā-śāstraṁ śāsato | daṇḍayataḥ ||16||

 **...**

|| 1.17.17 ||

**dharma uvāca—**

**etad vaḥ pāṇḍaveyānāṁ yuktam ārtābhayaṁ vacaḥ |**

**yeṣāṁ guṇa-gaṇaiḥ kṛṣṇo dautyādau bhagavān kṛtaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **artānām abhayaṁ yasmāt tad vaco vo yuṣmākaṁ yuktam ucitam eva ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yeṣāṁ guṇa-gaṇair iti premātmakair ity arthaḥ | kṛṣṇasya premaika-vaśyatvāt tasyārjunasya pautratvaṁ tat-tulya eva tavāpi guṇair adhīna eva kṛṣṇo vartata iti tvad-aśakyaṁ kim api nāstīti bhāvaḥ ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **guṇa-gaṇaiḥ premamayair ity arthaḥ, premavaśyatvāt kṛṣṇasya, tathā ca teṣāṁ pautrasya tad-vat kṛṣṇa-niṣṭhasya tavāpi na kiñcid aśakyam iti bhāvaḥ ||17||

 **...**

|| 1.17.18 || 

**na vayaṁ kleśa-bījāni yataḥ syuḥ puruṣarṣabha |**

**puruṣaṁ taṁ vijānīmo vākya-bheda-vimohitāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **vayaṁ tu yataḥ puruṣāt prāṇināṁ kleśa-hetavo bhaveyus taṁ puruṣaṁ na vijānīmaḥ | yato vādināṁ vākya-bhedair vimohitāḥ ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tatra sākṣād-dhiṁsā-kartṛ-gataḥ praśno’yam iti jñātvāpi sūcakatā na yukteti tasyāpi gauṇatvaṁ matvā tat-prayojaka-kartṛ-gatatvena siddhāntayann apy anirdhāritam ivāha—na vayam iti tribhiḥ | vayam īśvara-vādino ye ca vakya-bheda-vimohitās te sarve’pi taṁ puruṣam īśvaraṁ na vijānīmaḥ sarvāgocaratvāt ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kiṁ ca, yataḥ puruṣāt kleśa-bījāni syus taṁ puruṣaṁ vayaṁ na jānīmaḥ | nanu katham evam apalapasi tvat-kleśa-dāyī puruṣo’yaṁ mayā dṛśyata eva | satyam asau mama kleśadaḥ, kintu mama kleśasya bījaṁ kiñcid avaśyaṁ bhaviṣyati | yato’yaṁ mamaiva kleśado nānyasya | ataḥ kleśa-bījaṁ yato bhavati taṁ puruṣaṁ na jānīma ity arthaḥ | nanu śāstrajñā yūyaṁ kathaṁ na jānītha? satyam | bahu-śāstra-jñānam eva tad-anirdhāre kāraṇam ity āha—vādināṁ vākya-bhedair vimohitā iti ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **ko'vṛścad iti rājñā yat pṛṣṭaṁ tatrāha—yataḥ puruṣāt kleśa-vījāni duḥkha-kāraṇani syustaṁ vayaṁ na jānīmaḥ | āsmāc-chūdrād asmākaṁ kleśa eva, tad-vījāni yasmāt sa tvanyaḥ, taṁ na vidma ity arthaḥ | nanu prājña śūyaṁ, kathaṁ taṁ na jānītha? tatrāha—vākyeti ||18||

 **...**

|| 1.17.19 || 

**kecid vikalpa-vasanā āhur ātmānam ātmanaḥ |**

**daivam anye’pare karma svabhāvam apare prabhum ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **vākya-bhedān evāha | vikalpaṁ bhedaṁ vasate ācchādayanti ye yoginas te ātmānam evātmanaḥ prabhuṁ sukha-duḥkha-pradam āhuḥ | tad uktam, ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripur ātmana [gītā 6.5] iti | yad vā, vikalpaiḥ kutarkaiḥ prāvṛtā nāstikāḥ | evaṁ hi te vadanti | na tāvad devatādīnāṁ prabhutvaṁ karmādhīnatvāt | na ca karmaṇaḥ svādhīnatvād acetanatvāc ca | ataḥ svayam eva prabhur na cānyaḥ kaścid iti | anye daivajñā daivaṁ grahādi-rūpāṁ devatām | pare tu mīmāṁsakāḥ karma | apare laukāyatikāḥ svabhāvam ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **vākya-bheda-vimohitān gaṇayati kecid ity ekena | ete sarve vaidikā eva grāhyāḥ | veda-vākyasyaiva prāmāṇyāt | pare karmeti | apare sāṅkhyāḥ ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **vākya-bhedān evāha | kecid vikalpaṁ bhedaṁ vasate ācchādayanti ye yoginas te ātmānam evātmanaḥ prabhuṁ sukha-duḥkha-pradam āhuḥ | yad uktam—ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripur ātmana [gītā 6.5] iti | 

yad vā, kecid vikalpaṁ jīveśvarādi-bhedaṁ vasate ācchādayantīti tathā-bhūtā bhavantīty anvayaḥ | tatrārthe advaita-vādinas te hi sukha-duḥkha-bījam ātmānam evāhuḥ | evaṁ te vadanti—na tāvad devatādīnāṁ prabhutvaṁ karmādhīnatvāt | na ca karmaṇaḥ svādhīnatvāt | ataḥ svayam eva prabhur na cānyaḥ kaścid iti | anye daivajñā daivaṁ grahādi-rūpāṁ devatām | pare tu mīmāṁsakāḥ karma | apare laukāyatikāḥ svabhāvam ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **vākya-bhedānāha—kecid iti | vikalpa-vasanā jīveśa-bhedāc-chādakāḥ kacin-nirīśvarāḥ kāpilā ātmānam evātmanaḥ kleśādi-hetum āhuḥ—prakṛtāvāsajyātā kleśavān bhavati tad-vivekāt-tasyāṁ virajya tu kleśābhāvavān iti tat-siddhāntāṁ | anye daivajñā daivaṁ tad-dhetum āhuḥ—krūrā grahāḥ kleśadāḥ, pūjitāḥ śubhās tu kleśa-harā iti tat-siddhāntāt | pare karmaṭhāḥ karmaiva tad-dhetum āhuḥ—aśubhāt karmaṇaḥ kleśaḥ, śubhāt tu sukha-śabditaḥ svargaḥ iti tat-siddhāntāt | apare bauddhās tu svabhāvam eva prabhum āhuḥ—na khalu kāraṇāt kāryotpattir iti niyamaḥ, kṛte'pi kleśanāśake sādhane tad akṣayād-vināpi tat-sādhanaṁ tat-kṣayāc-cāsakṛt-sambhoge'pi sati santānādayāt svedajādīnām akasmāj-janmāc ca | tasmāt svabhāvād eva kleśa-tad abhāvau iti tat siddhāntāt ||19||

 **...**

|| 1.17.20 || 

**apratarkyād anirdeśyād iti keṣv api niścayaḥ |**

**atrānurūpaṁ rājarṣe vimṛśa sva-manīṣayā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :keṣv api** seśvareṣu madhye | keṣv apīti durlabhatvaṁ darśitam | **niścaya** iti siddhāntatvam | **apratarkyān** mano’gocarād **anirdeśyād** vacanāgocarāt parameśvarāt sarvaṁ bhavatīti **vimṛśa** vicārya sva-buddhyā ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **sveṣām īśvara-vāditvaṁ niścayena darśayati—apratarkyād iti ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : keṣv** api vaiṣṇaveṣu **anirdeśyān** nirdeṣṭum anarhāt parameśvarād eva sukha-duḥkhādīni bhavanti iti niścayaḥ | yad uktaṁ śrutibhiḥ—tvad-avagamī na vetti bhavad-uttha-śubhāśubhayor guṇa-viguṇānvayān iti | tathā, 


    sukhaṁ duḥkhaṁ bhavo’bhāvo bhayaṁ cābhayam eva ca | 


    ahiṁsā samatā tuṣṭis tapo dānaṁ yaśo’yaśaḥ | 


    bhavanti bhāvā bhūtānāṁ matta eva pṛthag-vidhāḥ || [gītā 10.4-5] iti bhagavad-gītābhīś ca | 

nanu tarhi kathaṁ nirdeṣṭum anarhatvaṁ ? satyam, kāla-karma-svabhāva-graha-bhūta-nṛpa-sarpa-rogādibhya eva loke kleśasya darśanāt teṣām  eva nirdeśyatvāt | vastutas tu teṣām  asvātantryāc ca bhagavata eva sarvaṁ bhavatīti siddhāntāt bhagavataḥ sakāśāt duḥkhaṁ bhavatīty upāsakānāṁ vaktum anaucityāc ca | 

nanv evam api tasya vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇye durvāre eva, ity ata āha—apratarkyād iti | asmat-tarkāgocaratvāt tasya tad api na vaiṣamya-nairghṛṇye iti bhāvaḥ | yad uktaṁ bhīṣmeṇa, 


    na hy asya karhicid rājan pumān veda vidhitsitam | 


    yad vijijñāsayā yuktā muhyanti kavayo’pi hi || [bhā.pu. 1.9.16] iti | 

tad api bhaktābhāsasya mama dainya-vardhanena sva-viṣayaka-smaraṇa-vardhanārthaṁ vā bhaktottamasya tava kali-nigrahādi-kīrti-khyāpanārthaṁ veti hitāyaiva kleśa-dānam ūhyata iti | 

nanv eṣāṁ matānāṁ madhye kasyopādeyatvaṁ ? tatrāha—atrānurūpaṁ samucitaṁ siddhāntaṁ tvam eva sva-manīṣayā vicāraya | yatas tvaṁ rājarṣir bhavasi | ity ukta-bhaṅgyā niścaya-śabdāt sarvānte kathanāc ca vaiṣṇava-matasya siddhāntatvam | ataḥ keṣv apīty anena matasyāsya durlabhatvaṁ ca sūcitam | tatra vimṛśety ayaṁ rājño vimarśaḥ | na tāvat kleśānāṁ mithyātvaṁ prakaṭam anubhūyamānatvāt | na cātmanas tat-kāraṇatvaṁ jīvātmanaḥ pāratantryāt | na ca grahāṇāṁ teṣāṁ kāla-cakrādhīnatvāt | na ca karmaṇaḥ jāḍyāt | kiṁ ca, sākṣād-dharmasyāsya kiṁ prārabdham aprārabdhaṁ vā pāpam asti pāpavattve dharmatvasyaivānupapatteḥ | na ca svabhāvasya tasyaṇaikāntikatvāt | tasmād bhagavata eva kāraṇatvaṁ susthiram | tad-vidhitsitaṁ tu sarvair durjñeyam eveti bhīṣmoktir eva pramāṇam ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **keṣv api vaidikeṣv īśvara-niṣṭheṣv asya jīvasya eṣa u evāsādhu karmakārayati tam [kau.u. 3.8] ity-ādiṣu jīva-karmānusāritayā śruyamāṇād api apratarkyād avicintya-śakter durbodha-vidhitsitāt anirdeśyāt sākalyena nirdeṣṭum aśakyāt īśvarād eva kleśa-tat-kṣayāv iti niścayaḥ | he rājarṣe! tvam eṣu pakṣeṣv anurūpa-mavādhitaṁ pakṣaṁ svamanīṣayā vimṛśasveti ||20||

 **...**

|| 1.17.21 ||

**sūta uvāca—**

**evaṁ dharme pravadati sa samrāḍ dvija-sattamāḥ |**

**samāhitena manasā vikhedaḥ paryacaṣṭa tam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : vikhedo** gata-mohaḥ | **paryacaṣṭa** pratyabhāṣata jñātavān iti vā ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : samāhitena** labdha-samādhānena **manasāparyacaṣṭa** pratyabhāṣata ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **dharme evaṁ pravadati sati sa samrāṭ parīkṣit samāhitena tad ukta-pakṣa pañcakārthābhiniveśitena manasā taṁ dharmaṁ paryacaṣṭa jñātavān, tato vikhedaś chinna-saṁśayo'bhūt | etad uktaṁ bhavati-prakṛti-saṁsarga-virāgayoḥ puruṣa-kartṛkayor na kleśa-tat-kṣaya-hetutvaṁ | tat-saṁsargāt prāgiva tad-virāgād uttaratrāpi punas tat-saṁsarga-prasaṅgāt, ubhayor vibhutvena sadaiva sānnidhyāt, na ca grahāṇāṁ teṣāṁ kāla-cakrādhīnatvenāsvātantryāt, na ca karmaṇaḥ, tasya kṣaṇa-vināśitvāt, na ca svabhāvasya, tasya jāḍyāt, tasmād īśvarasyaiva tad-dhetutvaṁ, tasya cāpratarkyatvāt tad-vidhitsitaṁ durbodhaṁ, na cāsya karhicid-rājan pumān veda vidhitsitam iti bhīṣmokteḥ | kim asya dharmasya sva-viṣayāṁ smṛtiṁ vardhayituṁ tat-kleśa-racanaṁ, kim vā tad-bhṛtyasya me kali-nigrahādi-yaśo-vistārārtham iti? na ca dharmasya pāpam asti kleśakaṁ, tathātve dharmatvānupapatter iti ||21||

 **...**

|| 1.17.22 || 

**rājovāca—**

**dharmaṁ bravīṣi dharma-jña dharmo’si vṛṣa-rūpa-dhṛk |**

**yad adharma-kṛtaḥ sthānaṁ sūcakasyāpi tad bhavet ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **anirdhāritam iva bruvan ghātakaṁ jānann api na sūcayed ity evaṁ-rūpaṁ dharmaṁ bravīṣy ato dharmo’si | sūcane ko doṣa ity āha—yad iti | sthānaṁ narakādi ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **ayaṁ māṁ niraparādham api tāḍayatīti mayi rājani vaktum arhann api pṛṣṭo’pi yan na bravīṣi, yato’dharma-kartur yat sthānaṁ sūcakasyāpi tat kiṁ punar abhidhāyakasya ? atas tvaṁ sākṣād-dharma eva mayānumitaḥ ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **svajñātaṁ sphuṭayati—dharmam iti | ghātakaṁ jānann api na bruyād ity eva dharmaṁ bravīṣyate dharmo'si mayā jñātaḥ | kuto na bravīmi? tatrāha—yad iti | adharma-kartur yat sthānaṁ narakaṁ tat-sūcakasyāpi bhavet kiṁ punar vācakasyeti bhāvaḥ | athaveti sarvaṁ tvayā kathitam evety arthaḥ | devasya hareḥ māyāyāḥ gatir bhūtānāṁ manaso vacasaś cāgocara'sti | apratarkyānirdeśyā ca sety arthaḥ | māyayā sva-śaktyā sa devaḥ pālana-saṁhāra-rūpe sukha-duḥkhe prāṇibhyaḥ kathaṁ dadātīti boddhuṁ vaktuṁ ca kaḥ samartha iti bhāvaḥ ||22-23||

 **...**

|| 1.17.23 || 

**athavā deva-māyāyā nūnaṁ gatir agocarā |**

**cetaso vacasaś cāpi bhūtānām iti niścayaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **yad vā, ajñānād apy akathanaṁ bhavatīty āha—athaveti | devasya māyāyā gatir vadhya-ghātaka-lakṣaṇā vṛttir bhūtānāṁ cetaso vacasaś cāgocarā sujñeyā na bhvatīti niścaya ity arthaḥ ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **nanu yatra kutracid dharme viśeṣatas tu sarva-dharma-rakṣāyāṁ pramāṇīkṛtasya yathārtha-vacanam eva yuktam | tathā ca vayam īśvara-vādino’pi taṁ na vijānīmā iti katham uktavantas tatrāha—athaveti | tasmād adhunā deva-māyā-kṛte kaleḥ prabhāve tavāpy ayaṁ saṁśayo yukta iti bhāvaḥ | deva-padaṁ tv atra tathāpi dyotamānatvāt tasya māyā-doṣāspṛṣṭatva-nigamanārthaṁ kṛtam ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **athaveti | tvayā sarvam uktam evety arthaḥ | deva-māyety ādinā apratarkyād iti tad-uktam anumoditam | devasya bhagavato māyāyāḥ sarva-jagat-pālana-saṁhāra-kāriṇyā gatiḥ bhūtānāṁ cetaso’gocarā iti apratarkyety arthaḥ | vacaso’gocarā iti anirdeśyety arthaḥ | māyāyās tac-chaktitvāt sa devaḥ pālana-saṁhāra-lakṣaṇe sukha-duḥkhe bhūtebhyaḥ kathaṁ dadātīti jñātuṁ vaktuṁ ca kaḥ śaknotīty arthaḥ ||23||

 **...**

|| 1.17.24 || 

**tapaḥ śaucaṁ dayā satyam iti pādāḥ kṛte kṛtāḥ |**

**adharmāṁśais trayo bhagnāḥ smaya-saṅga-madais tava ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **dharmo’sāv iti jñātvā tasya pādānuvādena vyavasthām āha—tapa iti dvābhyām | adharma-pādais tava trayaḥ pādās tribhir aṁśair bhagnāḥ | smayo vismayaḥ ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **māyā ca dharmādharma-lakṣaṇaṁ krama-vaśāt samuditī-bhavantaṁ jīvānāṁ karma-viśeṣām anusṛtya tat-tad-yuge tat tat pravartayatīti tasyāś ca na vaiṣamyam ity āha—tapa iti dvābhyām | smayo garvaḥ | garva-dvārā tapo-nāśakatveneti vakṣyamāṇa-ṭīkā-saṅgateḥ | saṅgaḥ strībhiḥ | madas tu pānādijaḥ | abhyarthita ity atra vakṣyamāṇa-tat-tat-saṅgater eva | adharmāṁśaiḥ smayādy-aṁśa-rūpaiḥ | traya iti trayas trayo’ṁśāḥ bhagnāḥ | tataś caturtha-caturthāṁśair eka eva pādo’vaśiṣyate | tatra ca satyasyaivāṁśo’vaśiṣyata ity arthaḥ ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **ahaṁ tu tvayā akathitam api tava bhadrābhadraṁ sarvaṁ jānāmy eva tat śṛṇv ity āha—tapa iti dvābhyām | adharmasya aṁśaḥ pādaiḥ smayādibhiḥ | smayo garvaḥ | saṅgaḥ strībhiḥ | mado madhu-pānajaḥ | upalakṣaṇam etad-dhiṁsāder api | tataḥ satyādināśakatvaṁ jñeyam ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tvayānuktam api tava bhadrābhadram ahaṁ jānāmy eva, tattvaṁ śṛṇvity āha—tapa iti dvābhyām | adharmasyāṁśaiḥ pādaiḥ smayādibhis tribhis tava eyaḥ pādās tapaḥ-śocadayārūpā bhagnāḥ | teṣu smayo garvaḥ, saṅgaḥ strībhiḥ, mado madhu-pānajanyaḥ ||24||

 **...**

|| 1.17.25 || 

**idānīṁ dharma pādas te satyaṁ nirvartayed yataḥ |**

**taṁ jighṛkṣaty adharmo’yam anṛtenaidhitaḥ kaliḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **idānīṁ kalau | he dharma, te pādaś caturtho’ṁśas tatrāpi satyam evāsti | yataḥ satyād bhavān ātmānaṁ nirvartayet kathaṁcid dhārayet | yad vā, puruṣas tvāṁ sādhayet | tam api pādam anṛtena saṁvardhitaḥ kaliḥ kali-rūpo’yam adharmo grahītum icchati, tatreyaṁ sthitiḥ—kṛta-yuge prathamaṁ saṁpūrṇaś catuṣ-pād dharmaḥ | tretāyāṁ caturṇām api pādānāṁ madhye smayena tapaḥ, saṅgena śaucam, madena dayā, anṛtena satyam ity evaṁ caturthāṁśo hīyate | dvāpare tv ardham | kalau caturtho’ṁśo’vaśiṣyate so’py ante vinaṅkṣyatīti ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **idānīṁ kalau | he dharma ! te pādaś caturṇām eva eva tapa-ādi-pādānāṁ smayādibhir bhāga-traya-dhvaṁsād avaśiṣṭaś caturthair aṁśair ekaḥ | sa ca prādhānyena vyapadeśo bhavati iti nyāyena satyaṁ tapa-ādiṣu satyasyaiva prādhānyāt | yataḥ satyād bhavān ātmānaṁ nirvartayet kathañcid dhārayet | yad vā, puruṣas tvāṁ sādhayet | tad api pādam anṛtena saṁvardhitaḥ kaliḥ kali-rūpo’yam adharmo grahītum icchati | tatreyaṁ dvādaśa-skandha-dṛṣṭyā sthitiḥ—kṛta-yuge prathamaṁ saṁpūrṇaś catuṣ-pād dharmaḥ | tretāyāṁ caturṇām api pādānāṁ madhye smayena tapaḥ, saṅgena śaucam, madena dayā, anṛtena satyam ity evaṁ caturtho’ṁśo hīyate | dvāpare tv ardham | kalau caturtho’ṁśo’vaśiṣyate so’py ante naṅkṣyatīti ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **idānīṁ kalau, he dharma! te pādaś caturthāṁśaḥ satyam evāsti, yataḥ satyād-bhavān ātmānaṁ nirvartayet kathañcid dhārayet | yad vā, puruṣatvāṁ sādhayet tam api pādamayam adharmaḥ kalir anṛtenaidhitaḥ jighṛkṣati hartum icchati | dvādaśa-skandhānusāreṇeyam atra vyavasthā—kṛte catuṣpād-dharmaḥ pūrṇaḥ, tretāyāṁ tapaḥ-śauca-dayā-satyānāṁ caturṇāṁ pādānāṁ kramāt smayasaṅgamadānṛtaiś caturthoṁśo hriyate, dvāpare tv arddhaṁ | kalau teṣāṁ caturthoṁśovaśiṣyate, sa ca prādhānyena vyapadeśā bhavanti iti nyāyāt satya-śabdenocyate | tapa-ādiṣu satyasyaiva pradhānatvād iti ||25||

 **...**

|| 1.17.26 || 

**iyaṁ ca bhūmir bhagavatā nyāsitoru-bharā satī |**

**śrīmadbhis tat-pada-nyāsaiḥ sarvataḥ kṛta-kautukā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nyāsito’nyonya-dvāreṇāvatārita urur bharo bhāro yasyāḥ | kṛtaṁ kautukaṁ maṅgalaṁ yasyāḥ sā ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nyāsitaḥ avatāritaḥ svenānya-dvārā ca urur bharo bhāro yasyāḥ sā ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **bhagavatā śrī-kṛṣṇena nyāsitor ubharāvatāritā-surarūpa-mahābhārā satī śrīmadbhis tat-pādanyāsaiḥ kṛta-kautukā racita-maṅgalāsīt ||26||

 **...**

|| 1.17.27 || 

**śocaty aśru-kalā sādhvī durbhagevojjhitā satī |**

**abrahmaṇyā nṛpa-vyājāḥ śūdrā bhokṣyanti mām iti ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **aśrūṇi kalayati muñcatīty aśru-kalā | tena ujjhitā tyaktā satī śūdrā bhokṣayanti mām iti śocati ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **aśrūṇi kalayati dadhātīti ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **adhunā tenojjhitā durbhagevāśrukalā rudantī śūdrā māṁ tekṣyantīti śocati ||27||

 **...**

|| 1.17.28 || 

**iti dharmaṁ mahīṁ caiva sāntvayitvā mahā-rathaḥ |**

**niśātam ādade khaḍgaṁ kalaye’dharma-hetave ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **niśātaṁ niśitam | adharmasya hetur yaḥ kalis taṁ hantum ity arthaḥ ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **itīti | nanu jīvānām adharma eva tat-tad-doṣa-hetur ity uktam | kathaṁ kaliṁ hanyāt tatra adharmasya hetave sahāyāpekṣety arthaḥ | vakṣyate ca—tvam adharma-bandhur [bhā.pu. 1.17.31] iti |

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kalaye kaliṁ hantuṁ khaṅgam ādade ityatra rājño’yam abhiprāyaḥ, mat-pāṇistha-khaḍga-darśanenāyam api nṛpa-cihna-dhārī mayā sārdhaṁ dvandvaśo yoddhum āyātu, tataś cainaṁ śīghram eva haniṣyāmīti ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **adharma-hetave kalaye taṁ hantum ity arthaḥ ||28||

 **...**

|| 1.17.29 || 

**taṁ jighāṁsum abhipretya vihāya nṛpa-lāñchanam |**

**tat-pāda-mūlaṁ śirasā samagād bhaya-vihvalaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **abhipretya jñātvā ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **vihāya nṛpa-lāñchanam iti | tadā kalināpy evaṁ vicāritam | anena saha yoddhuṁ na me śaktir na kṣatriyasya śaraṇāpattir ucitā | ato nṛpa-cihnaṁ vihāyaiva pādayor asya patāmīti ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **abhipretya jñātvā, nṛpa-lāñchanaṁ rāja-cihnaṁ mukuṭādi ||29||

 **...**

|| 1.17.30 || 

**patitaṁ pādayor vīraḥ kṛpayā dīna-vatsalaḥ |**

**śaraṇyo nāvadhīc chlokya āha cedaṁ hasann iva ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **śaraṇya āśrayārhaḥ | ślokyaḥ satkīrty-arhaḥ ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nāvadhīt ślokya iti | rājñāpi vicāritam, śaraṇāgato’yaṁ hantum anarhaḥ, tad api duṣṭam evaṁ yadi hanmi tarhi śaraṇāgata-vadhāj jātam adharmam ālambya mayy evāsau pravekṣyati na mariṣyatīti hasann iveti kopān apagamāt īśvareṇa tādṛśa eva vidhir nirmito yaj-jighāṁsor api mama hastāt tvam adya rakṣito’bhūr iti mano’nulāpāc ca ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **ślokyaḥ kīrtyarho nāvadhīt | evaṁ hi rājñā vimṛṣṭaṁ—śaraṇāgatatvād ayam avadhyas tathāpi duṣṭatvāc-ced enaṁ vadhiṣyāmi, tadā tad-gata-vadha-jātam adharmam āśrityāyaṁ mayy eva pravekṣyati, na mariṣyatīti sann iveti krodhān apagamāt | prabhor iyam icchā yaj-jighāṁsor me hastāt-tvam adya rakṣita iti manasi vimarśāc ceti ||30||

 **...**

|| 1.17.31 ||

**rājovāca—**

**na te guḍākeśa-yaśo-dharāṇāṁ **

**baddhāñjaler vai bhayam asti kiñcit |**

**na vartitavyaṁ bhavatā kathañcana **

**kṣetre madīye tvam adharma-bandhuḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **guḍakeśo’rjunas tasya yaśo-dharā ye vayaṁ teṣāṁ tān prati baddho’ñjalir yena tasya te | kintu kathaṁcana kenāpy aṁśena na vartitavyam | yasmāt tvam adharmasya bandhuḥ ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **guḍākeśasya yad yaśas tasya rakṣaṇa-vyagrāṇām ity arthaḥ ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **sva-kāryaṁ vicāryāha—guḍākeśo’rjunas tad-yaśodharāṇām asmākam agrato baddhāñjales tava | kintu kathañcana kenāpy aṁśena na vartitavyaṁ na stheyam ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **sva-prayojanaṁ vicāryāha—na te iti | madīye kṣetre deśe kathañcana kenāpy aṁśena na vartitavyaṁ na stheyaṁ yatas tvam adharma-bandhuḥ ||31||

 **...**

|| 1.17.32 || 

**tvāṁ vartamānaṁ nara-deva-deheṣv **

**anupravṛtto’yam adharma-pūgaḥ |**

**lobho’nṛtaṁ cauryam anāryam aṁho **

**jyeṣṭhā ca māyā kalahaś ca dambhaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tad evāha | rāja-deheṣu vartamānaṁ tvām anu sarvataḥ pravṛttaḥ | anāryaṁ daurjanyam | aṁhaḥ svadharma-tyāgaḥ | jyeṣṭhā alakṣmīḥ | māyā kapaṭam ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tvat-pravṛttau doṣān śṛṇv ity āha—tvām iti | narāṇāṁ devānāṁ ca deheṣv iti | devā api tvad-ākrānta-dehā lobhādy-adharmiṣṭhā bhavanti kiṁ punar narā iti bhāvaḥ | vartamānaṁ tvām anu sarvataḥ pravṛttaḥ | anāryaṁ daurjanyam | aṁhaḥ sva-dharma-tyāgaḥ | jyeṣṭhā alakṣmīḥ | māyā kapaṭam | dambho’haṅkāraḥ ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nara-devānāṁ rājñāṁ deheṣu vartamānaṁ tvām anulakṣīkṛtya anāryaṁ daurjanyṁ | aṁhaḥ sva-dharma-tyāga-rūpaṁ pāpaṁ, jyeṣṭhā-lakṣmīḥ, māyā kapaṭam ||32||

 **...**

|| 1.17.33 || 

**na vartitavyaṁ tad adharma-bandho **

**dharmeṇa satyena ca vartitavye |**

**brahmāvarte yatra yajanti yajñair **

**yajñeśvaraṁ yajña-vitāna-vijñāḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **brahma-yajñā vitāna-yajñāś ca ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tat tasmād dharmeṇa satyena ca vartitavye vartitum arhe brahmāvarte deśe | yajñasya vitānaṁ vistāras tatra vijñā nipuṇāḥ ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **brahmāvarta ity upalakṣaṇaṁ yajñiya-deśānām ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **dharmeṇety anenaiva siddhe satyena ceti pṛthag-uktiḥ satyasya dharma-mūlatva-vyañjikā | skandha-śākhādikaṁ vinā kevalena mūlenāpi na prāyaḥ prayojana-siddhir ity ato dharmeṇeti coktam | vartitavye vartituṁ yogye ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **dharmeṇa satyena ca vartituṁ yogye brahmāvarte tvayā na vartitavyaṁ, yajñeśvaraṁ kṛṣṇam ||33||

 **...**

|| 1.17.34 || 

**yasmin harir bhagavān ijyamāna \
ijyātma**[^149]**-mūrtir yajatāṁ śaṁ tanoti | \
kāmān amoghān sthira-jaṅgamānām \
antar bahir vāyur ivaiṣa ātmā ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **iṣṭātma-mūrtiḥ icchā-tanuḥ ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **ijyā yāgas tad-rūpā mūrtir yasya | śaṁ kṣemaṁ kāmāṁś ca | nanv indrādayo devā ijyanye natu haris tatrāha—sthireti | eṣa sthāvarādīnām ātmeti | tathāpi jīvavan na paricchinna ity āha—antar bahir iti | yathā vayuḥ prāṇa-rūpeṇāntastho’pi bahir apy asti tadvat sarvāntaryāmīśvaro’pīti ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanv indrādayo devatā apījyante na kevalaṁ bhagavān eva tatrāha—ijyānām indrādīnām ātma-mūrtir antaryāmi-rūpaḥ | te ātma-mūrtayo yasyeti vā | sthira-jaṅgamānām asmat-prajānāṁ kāmān aihikān śaṁ pāratrikaṁ sukhaṁ ca tanoti vāyur ivāntar bahiś ca sākṣād anubhūyamānaḥ sann ity arthaḥ | tvayi vartamāne tu tathā naiva syād iti bhāvaḥ ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanv indrādaye pīḍyante na kevalaṁ haris tatrāha—ijyānāṁ teṣām  ātmā pravartikā mūrtir yasya saḥ | sthira-jaṅgamānām asmat-prajānām amoghān kāmān bhogān tanoti vāyur ivāntar bahiś ca pratīyamānaḥ, tvayatra vartamāne tathā na bhaved iti bhāvaḥ ||34||

 **...**

|| 1.17.35 ||

**sūta uvāca—**

**parīkṣitaivam ādiṣṭaḥ sa kalir jāta-vepathuḥ |**

**tam udyatāsim āhedaṁ daṇḍa-pāṇim ivodyatam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **uyatāsim uddhṛta-khaḍgam | daṇḍa-pāṇiṁ yamam | udyatam udyuktam ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **udyatāsim uccīkṛta-khaḍgam | jāta-vepathur iti sva-rakṣaṇārthaṁ bahutaraṁ buddhi-balaṁ prakāśitam | tad api mama vadha evopasthita iti bhāvaḥ | rājño hy ayam abhiprāyaḥ, yadīmāṁ mad-ājñāṁ na pālayati tadā mad-abhīṣṭam asya vadham adhunaiva kariṣyāmi, yadi ca pālayati tadāsyāvadhe’pi mama kāpi kṣatir nāstīti | daṇḍa-pāṇiṁ yamam ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **udyatāsiṁ niḥsārita-khaḍgaṁ, daṇḍa-pāṇiṁ yamam iva ||35||

 **...**

|| 1.17.36 ||

**kalir uvāca—**

**yatra kva vātha vatsyāmi sārva-bhauma tavājñayā |**

**lakṣaye tatra tatrāpi tvām ātteṣu-śarāsanam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **atra na vastavyam iti yā tavājñā tayā yatra kvāpi vatsyāmi kintu tatra tatrāpy ātto gṛhīta iṣūḥ śarāsanaṁ ca yena taṁ tvām eva lakṣaye ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **he sārvabhauma! sarvasyā api bhūme rājan! lakṣaye sākṣād evam eva tvāṁ paśyāmi | tena sarveṣāṁ sthāvara-jaṅgamānāṁ yuṣmat-prajātvāt sarvasyā api bhūmes tavādhikārāt mama vastuṁ sthāna-bhāvāt samprati tvad-agre vartamānaṁ tvat-pādayoḥ patitaṁ māṁ sva-hastenaiva jahīti bhāvaḥ ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yatreti—he sārvabhauma sarva-bhūmer īśvara, brahmāvartaṁ, vihāra ced anyatra kutrāpi vatsyāmi, tatrāpi tvām evāt-teṣuśarāsanaṁ paśyāmīti nikhila-pṛthvīśvarasya tava prajñā māṁ khedayiṣyantīti bhāvaḥ ||36||

 **...**

|| 1.17.37 || 

**tan me dharma-bhṛtāṁ śreṣṭha sthānaṁ nirdeṣṭum arhasi |**

**yatraiva niyato vatsya ātiṣṭhaṁs te’nuśāsanam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tat tasmāt | niyato niścalaḥ | vatsye vatsyāmi ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **śaraṇāgataṁ tvām ahaṁ na hanmīti cet tadā he dharma-pālakānāṁ śreṣṭha! ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tarhi yad-vidheyaṁ tad-bhaṇeti cet-tatrāha—tad iti | niyato niścalaḥ san ||37||

 **...**

|| 1.17.38 ||

**sūta uvāca—**

**abhyarthitas tadā tasmai sthānāni kalaye dadau |**

**dyūtaṁ pānaṁ striyaḥ sūnā yatrādharmaś catur vidhaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : pānaṁ** madyādeḥ | **sūnā** prāṇi-vadhaḥ | **dyūte**’nṛtam | pāne madaḥ | pūrvaṁ mado dayā-nāśakatvenokte’tra tu darva-dvārā tapo-nāśakatvena | strīṣu saṅgaḥ | hiṁsāyāṁ krauryaṁ dayā-nāśakam iti jñeyam | yadyapi sarvaṁ sarvatra saṁbhavati, tathāpi prādhānyenānṛtadīnāṁ dyūtādiṣu yathā-saṅkhyaṁ jñeyam | dvādaśa-skandhe tu satyaṁ dayā tapo dānam iti pādā vibhor nṛpa [bhā.pu. 12.3.18] ity atra dāna-śabdena śaucam evoktam | manaḥ-śuddhi-rūpatvād bhūtābhaya-dānasya |


    tretāyāṁ dharma-pādānāṁ turyāṁśo hīyate śanaiḥ | \
adharma-pādair anṛta-hiṁsāsantoṣa-vigrahaiḥ || [bhā.pu. 12.3.20]

ity atra cāsantoṣa-śabdena tasya hetur garvo lakṣyate | vihraga-śabdena ca tad-dhetuḥ strī-saṅha ity avirodhaḥ ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **dyūtaṁ spaṣṭam | pānaṁ madyādeḥ striyo'vivāhitāḥ śūnāḥ prāṇi-vadhaḥ | yatra caturvidho'dharmā iti | dyūte'nṛtaṁ satya-nāśakaṁ pāne mado dayā-nāśakaḥ strīṣu saṅgaḥ śauca-nāśakaḥ prāṇi-hiṁsāyāṁ tu samudita eva caturvidho'dharmaḥ | na hi prāṇi-hantṛṣu tapaḥ śucitvaṁ dayā vā | satya-vacanaṁ tu teṣu nāsty eveti ||38 ||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **pānaṁ madyādeḥ, striyaḥ puṁścalyaḥ sūnā avihita-hiṁsā, yatra sūnāyāṁ caturvidho 'dharmaḥ | hi prāṇi-hiṁsakeṣu tapaḥ-śauca-dayā-satyāni santi ||38||

 **...**

|| 1.17.39 || 

**punaś ca yācamānāya jāta-rūpam adāt prabhuḥ |**

**tato’nṛtaṁ madaṁ kāmaṁ rajo vairaṁ ca pañcamam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **caturvidhasyāpy ekatraivāvasthānaṁ dehīti punar yācamānāya jāta-rūpaṁ suvarṇaṁ dattavān | tataḥ suvarṇa-dānād anṛtam, madam, kāmam iti strīṣu saṅgam, raja iti rajo-mūlāṁ hiṁsām, etāni catvāri pañcamaṁ vairaṁ cādād iti ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **bho rājann etad vṛttāntaṁ śrutvā dyūtādikaṁ ko’pi nānuśīlayiṣyati | kiṁ ca, prathamaṁ manasi mat-praveśas tata eva lokāḥ prāyo dyūtādikaṁ bhajante iti | tatra bhavatā dīyamānam api sthāna-catuṣṭayam adattam evābhūt | tasmād evaṁ kim api sthānam ahaṁ prāpnuyāṁ yal-lokair dustyajaṁ syād iti yācamānāya kalaye jāta-rūpaṁ svarṇopalakṣitaṁ rajatādikaṁ dravya-mātram eva tad-vāsa-sthānatvena adāt | tata eva hetor dhanavatsu anṛtaṁ mithyā madaḥ pānādi-janitā mattatā kāmaḥ strī-saṅgaḥ, rajo garva iti caturvidho’dharmaḥ tathā pañcamaṁ vairaṁ ca syāt | mada-kāmayoḥ klībatvam ārṣam ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanv etad-vṛttāntaṁ niśamya sarve dyūtādi tyajeyur atas tvayā dattam apy adattam iti punar yācamānāya kalaye jāta-rūpaṁ svarṇopalakṣitaṁ dhanaṁ tad-vāsārtham adāt | svayaśo rakṣatā mayā śaraṇyatvāt saṁpratyayaṁ na hato datta-sthānaś ca kṛtaḥ | yadi mad ājñānusārī na tiṣṭhet tadaitad-vadhaḥ suśaka eveti rājño bhāvaḥ | tata eva hetor dhaniṣv anṛtādayaḥ | anṛtaṁ mithyā, mada āsava-pānajā mattatā, kāmaḥ strī-saṅgaḥ | rajo garva iti caturvidho 'dharmaḥ, vairaṁ ca pañcamaṁ syāt | mad akāmayoḥ klīvatvam ārṣam ||39||

 **...**

|| 1.17.40 || 

**amūni paṁ ca sthānāni hy adharma-prabhavaḥ kaliḥ |**

**auttareyeṇa dattāni nyavasat tan-nideśa-kṛt ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **auttareyeṇa parīkṣitā | amūny amīṣu sthāneṣu nyavasad ity arthaḥ | tasya rājño nideśa-kṛd ājñā-kṛt ||40||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tataś ca tat-kṣaṇād eva tatra tatra gataḥ kalis tāny adhiṣṭhitavān ity āha—amūnīti | kālādhva-bhāva-deśānām ity-ādi kārikā-balena karmatvam ||40||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **amūni amīṣv ity arthaḥ | yad vā, kāla-bhāvādhva-deśānām iti kārikābalāt karmatvam ||40||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **amūnyamīṣu ||40||

 **...**

|| 1.17.41 || 

**athaitāni na seveta bubhūṣuḥ puruṣaḥ kvacit |**

**viśeṣato dharma-śīlo rājā loka-patir guruḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **vihitātirekeṇa na seveteti ||41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **atha iti hetoḥ bubhūṣur udbhavitum icchuḥ | strī-suvarṇayor asevanaṁ nāma tayor anāsaktiḥ ||41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **striyaṁ parakīyām eva na seveta | bubhūṣuḥ sva-kṣemam icchuḥ | suvarṇasyāsevanaṁ nāma tatrānāsaktir ity eke ||41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **bubhūṣaḥ sva-kalyāṇecchuḥ, lokānāṁ patiḥ pālakaḥ gurur upadeṣṭā ca rājā viśeṣato na seveta | suvarṇa-svastriyor asevanam anāsaktiḥ, parastrīṇāṁ svarūpatas tyāgaḥ ||41||

 **...**

|| 1.17.42 || 

**vṛṣasya naṣṭāṁs trīn pādān tapaḥ śaucaṁ dayām iti |**

**pratisandadha āśvāsya mahīṁ ca samavardhayat ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **evaṁ kaliṁ nigṛhya vṛṣasya pādān pratisandadhe | tapa-ādīni pravartitavān ity arthaḥ ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **evaṁ kaliṁ nigṛhya vṛṣasya pādān pratisandadhe tapa-ādīni pravartitavān ity arthaḥ ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **evaṁ kaliṁ nigṛhya vṛṣasya pādān pratisandadhe | tapa-ādīni pravartitavān ity arthaḥ ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **evaṁ kaliṁ nigṛhya vṛṣasya dharmasya trīn pādān rājā prati-sandadhe, tān pravartayāmāsa ||42||

 **...**

|| 1.17.43-44 || 

**sa eṣa etarhy adhyāsta āsanaṁ pārthivocitam |**

**pitāmahenopanyastaṁ rājñāraṇyaṁ vivikṣatā ||**

**āste’dhunā sa rājarṣiḥ kauravendra-śriyollasan |**

**gajāhvaye mahā-bhāgaś cakravartī bṛhac-chravāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **yuṣmadīya-satra-pravṛttir api tat-prabhāvād evety āha tribhiḥ | etarhīdānīṁ yudhiṣṭhireṇāraṇyaṁ praveṣṭum ucchatā upanyastaṁ samarpitam āsanam adhyāste | adhunā āste pālayata iti vartamāna-sāmīpye vartamānavan nirdeśaḥ smety adhyāhāro vā ||43-44||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **yuṣmadīya-satra-pravṛttir api tat-prabhāvād evety āha—sa eṣa iti tribhiḥ | adhyāste āste’dhunā pālayata ity eṣu vartamāna-sāmīpye vartamāna-nirdeśaḥ ||43||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yuṣmadīya-satra-pravṛttir api tat-prabhāvād evety āha—sa eṣa iti tribhiḥ | adhyāste āste adhunā pālayata ity eṣu vartamāna-sāmīpye vartamāna-nirdeśaḥ ||43-44||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tat-prabhāvād eva bhavatāṁ satra-pravṛttir ity āha—sa iti | pitāmahena yudhiṣṭhireṇopanyas taṁ dattamāsanam adhyāste ||43|| \
 \
adhyāste āste 'dhunā palayata ity eṣu vartamāna-samīpye vartamāna-niderśaḥ ||44||

 **...**

|| 1.17.45 || 

**ittham-bhūtānubhāvo’yam abhimanyu-suto nṛpaḥ |**

**yasya pālayataḥ kṣauṇīṁ yūyaṁ satrāya dīkṣitāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **satrāya satraṁ kartuṁ dīkṣitā dīkṣāṁ kṛtavantaḥ ||45||


    iti śrīmad-bhāgavate mahā-purāṇe prathama-skandhe \
bhāvārthākhya-dīpikāyāṁ ṭīkāyāṁ saptadaśo’dhyāyaḥ ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **yasya pālayata ity atra satraṁ śrī-baladeva-dṛṣṭād anyaj jñeyam ||45||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **satrāya satraṁ kartum | satram idaṁ baladeva-dṛṣṭād anyad eva jñeyam ||

iti sārārtha-darśinyāṁ harṣiṇyāṁ bhakta-cetasām |

prathame’yaṁ saptadaśaḥ saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām ||*||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **satrāya satraṁ kartuṁ, satram idaṁ saṅkarṣaṇa-dṛṣṭād anyad bodhyam | parīkṣit-sadṛśaḥ ko'pi nābhūn na ca bhaviṣyati | ye dadarśodare kṛṣṇaṁ nija-grāha ca yaḥ kalim ||45||

 **...**

iti śrīmad-bhāgavate mahā-purāṇe brahma-sūtra-bhāṣye pāramahaṁsyaṁ saṁhitāyāṁ vaiyāsikyāṁ prathama-skandhe

parīkṣite kali-nigraho nāma

saptadaśo’dhyāyaḥ |

||17||



**...**

 

(1.18)


## aṣṭādaśo’dhyāyaḥ 


### parīkṣite muni-kumāra-śāpaḥ |

|| 1.18.1 ||

**sūta uvāca—**

**yo vai drauṇy-astra-vipluṣṭo na mātur udare mṛtaḥ |**

**anugrahād bhagavataḥ kṛṣṇasyādbhuta-karmaṇaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :**

rājñas tv aṣṭadaśe tasya brahma-śāpo nirūpyate |

sa cānugraha evāsya jāto vairāgyam āvahan ||

parīkṣito niryāṇam ity āścaryaṁ vaktuṁ tat-saṁbhāvanāya janmāścaryam anusmarayati—yo vā iti | **vipluṣṭo** nirdagdhaḥ san ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :**

aṣṭadaśe muneḥ kaṇṭhe sarpaṁ baddhvā gṛhāgataḥ |

anutapyan nṛpas tasya putrāc chāpam athāśṛṇot ||

parīkṣitaḥ kali-nigraha-śravaṇenātivismitān munīn prati tasya janmāvadhi bhagavat-prāpti-paryantaṁ sarvam eva caritram atyadbhutaṁ saṅkṣepeṇa gaṇayann āha—**yo vā** iti | **vipluṣṭo** nirdagdhaḥ ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :**

aṣṭādaśe pipāsārtaḥ kaṇṭhe baddhoragaṁ muneḥ | \
gṛhāgato nṛpaḥ śaptas tat-putreṇeti varṇyate || \


parīkṣitā kaler nigrahaṁ śrutvātivismitān śaunakādīn prati kṛṣṇa-kṛpā-bhājanasya janmādi-niryāṇāntaṁ caritam atyāścaryaṁ saṅkṣepeṇāha—**yo vā** ity-ādibhiḥ ||1-2||

 **...**

**|| 1.18.2 ||**

**brahma-kopotthitād yas tu takṣakāt prāṇa-viplavāt |**

**na sammumohoru-bhayād bhagavaty arpitāśayaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** brahma-kopād utthitāt takṣakād yaḥ prāṇa-viplavaḥ prāṇa-nāśaḥ, tasmād yad uru bhayaṁ, tasmān na saṁmumoha | tatra hetuḥ—yas tu bhagavaty eva arpitāśaya iti ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī), baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

 **...**

|| 1.18.3 ||

**utsṛjya sarvataḥ saṅgaṁ vijñātājita-saṁsthitiḥ**[^150]** |**

**vaiyāsaker jahau śiṣyo gaṅgāyāṁ svaṁ kalevaram ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **vijñānam ātma-yogaṁ syāt, jñānaṁ sādhāraṇaṁ smṛtam iti bhāgavata-tantre ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kintu utsṛjyeti | **vaiyāsakeḥ** śukasya **śiṣyaḥ** san | **vijñātā ajitasya** hareḥ **saṁsthitis** tattvaṁ yena saḥ ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : vaiyāsakeḥ** śukasya **śiṣyaḥ** san **vijñātā ajitasya** hareḥ **saṁsthitis** tattvaṁ yena saḥ | vijñāto’nubhava-gocarīkṛto’jitaḥ saṁsthitau maraṇa-kāle yena sa iti vā ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :** yo vaiyāsakeḥ śukasya śiṣyaḥ san sarvataḥ saṅgam utsṛjya gaṅgāyāṁ sva-kalevaraṁ jahau | vijñāto'nubhūto’jitaḥ kṛṣṇo yasyāṁ, tādṛśī saṁsthitir antyāvasthā yasya saḥ ||3||

 **...**

**|| 1.18.4 ||**

**nottamaśloka-vārtānāṁ juṣatāṁ tat-kathāmṛtam |**

**syāt sambhramo’nta-kāle’pi smaratāṁ tat-padāmbujam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** na caitac citram ity āha | **uttama-ślokasya** eva **vārtā** yeṣu, ata eva nityaṁ **tat-kathā**-rūpam **amṛtaṁ juṣatāṁ** **sambhramo** moho na syāt ||4||

———————————————————————————————————————
