**kaivalya-dīpikā :** **nottama** iti | **uttamaḥ śloko vārtā**-vṛttir yeṣāṁ, te tathā | ata eva tat-kṛtam **amṛtaṁ** sevanenaivājarāmaratvam | ata eva **anta-kāle’pi no sambhramaḥ** na vyākulatvaṁ dehasyānātmatvāt kutsita-dehāntara-lābha iti cet tan **na smaratāṁ tat-padāmbujam** | tad uktaṁ gītāsu yaṁ yaṁ vāpi [gītā  8.7] iti ||4|| [mu.pha. 19.14]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **naitac citram ity āha—nottameti | **uttama-ślokasya vārtaiva** vārtā jīvana-hetur yeṣāṁ, teṣām  ||4||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **na caitad āścaryam ity āha—**uttama-ślokasya** kṛṣṇasya **vārtaiva** vārtā jīvana-hetur yeṣām  ||4||

 **...**

|| 1.18.5 ||

**tāvat kalir na prabhavet praviṣṭo’pīha sarvataḥ |**

**yāvad īśo mahān urvyām ābhimanyava eka-rāṭ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tasmin rajñi sutarāṁ tan na citram ity āśayenāha—tāvad iti | **abhimanyoḥ putra eka-rāṭ** cakravartī **īśaḥ** patir yāvat ||5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : tāvat kalir na prabhaved** iti dattānām api teṣāṁ sthānānāṁ tat-prabhāveṇānudbhavāt _||_5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **rājñā nigṛhītasya kales tataḥ paraṁ kīdṛśī sthitir abhūt ? ity apekṣāyām āha—tāvad iti ||5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **parīkṣitā nigṛhītasya kaleḥ kīdṛśī sthitir abhūt ? tatrāha—tāvad iti ||5||

 **...**

|| 1.18.6 ||

**yasminn ahani yarhy eva bhagavān utsasarja gām |**

**tadaivehānuvṛtto’sāv adharma-prabhavaḥ kaliḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nanu tadā kaler apraveśa evāstu, iha praviṣṭo’pi na prābhavad iti kutaḥ ? tatrāha—yasminn ahani | **yarhi** **yasminn** eva kṣaṇe | **gāṁ** pṛthvīm | **anuvṛttaḥ** praviṣṭaḥ | **adharmasya prabhavo** yasmin ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **praveśa-kālam āha—yasminn iti ||6||[^151]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kaleḥ praveśa-kālam āha—yasminn iti | gāṁ pṛthvīm ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **praveśa-samayaṁ kaler āha—yasminn iti, gāṁ bhūmim ||6||

 **...**

|| 1.18.7 ||

**nānudveṣṭi kaliṁ samrāṭ sāraṅga iva sāra-bhuk |**

**kuśalāny āśu siddhyanti netarāṇi kṛtāni yat ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nanv adharma-hetuṁ kaliṁ sarvathā kiṁ na hatavāṁs tatrāha—nānudveṣṭīti | **sāraṅgo** bhramara iva sāra-grāhī | sāram āha—**yat** yasmin **kuśalāni** puṇyāny **āśu** saṅkalpa-mātreṇa phalanti, **itarāṇi** pāpāny āśu **na sidhyanti** | yas tāni kṛtāny eva sidhyanti, na tu saṅkalpita-mātrāṇīti ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **sāram evāha—kuśalānīti | loko vikarma-nirataḥ kuśale pramattaḥ [bhā.pu. 3.9.17, 10.70.26] ity ādy anusāreṇa sarva-maṅgala-mayāni bhagavat-kīrtanādīni | āśu saṅkalpa-mātreṇa kalāv api sidhyanty eva | kaliṁ sabhājayanty āryāḥ [bhā.pu. 11.5.36] ity ādeḥ, kalau tad dhari-kīrtanāt [bhā.pu. 12.3.52] ity ādeḥ, śrute’nupaṭhito dhyātaḥ [bhā.pu. 11.2.12] ity ādeḥ, sadyo hṛdy avarudhyate’tra kṛtibhiḥ śuśrūṣubhis tat-kṣaṇāt [bhā.pu. 1.1.2] ity ādeḥ, yasyāṁ vai śrūyamānāyāṁ [bhā.pu. 1.7.7] ity ādeś ca | itarāṇi karmāṇi tu kṛtāny api na sidhyanti | 


    ataḥ kalau tapo-yoga-vidyā-yajñādikāḥ kriyāḥ |


    sāṅgā bhavanti na kṛtāḥ kuśalair vāpi dehibhiḥ || iti brahma-vaivartāt |

tato mahā-phalānāṁ tat-kīrtanādīnāṁ siddhiś cen mā sidhyantu nāma tuccha-phalāny anyānīti tad-abhiprāyaḥ ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nigṛhīte kalau rājñaḥ kīdṛśo bhāva āsīd ity apekṣāyām āha—sāraṅgo bhramara iva sāragrāhī | sāram āha—yat yasmin kuśalāni puṇyāni āśu saṅkalpa-mātreṇa phalanti itarāṇi pāpāni āśu na siddhyanti | kṛtāny eva siddhyanti na tv akṛtānīti | tena kuṣalāny akṛtāny api sidhyantīti labhyate | akṛtatvaṁ khalv iha saṅkalpitatvaṁ vyākhyātam ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu svanigṛhīte kalau parīkṣitaḥ kathaṁ vṛttir abhūt-tatrāha—nānv iti | yataḥ sāraṅgo bhṛṅga iva sāragrāhī | sāram āha—yady atra kalau kuśalāni kīrtanādi-pradhānāni bhagavad arcana-rūpāṇi karmāṇi, loko vikarma-nirataḥ kuśale pramattaḥ, karmaṇyayaṁ tvad udite bhavad arcane sve [bhā.pu. 3.9.17] iti vakṣyamāṇāt, tāny āśu sidhyanti phalanti, itarāṇi tu tapo-yogādīni kṛtānyapi na sidhyanti | bhāvāntaraṁ ca rājñas tatrāsīdity āha—bāleṣu vivekaśūnyeṣu śūreṇa kalinā kim aniṣṭaṁ? na kim api | yato dhīreṣu vivekiṣu bhīruṇā yaḥ kaliḥ pramatteṣv apramattaḥ bāleṣv eva hi vṛkaḥ śūraḥ ||7-9||

 **...**

|| 1.18.8 ||

**kiṁ nu bāleṣu śūreṇa kalinā dhīra-bhīruṇā |**

**apramattaḥ pramatteṣu yo vṛko nṛṣu vartate ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **nanu doṣādhikyād dveṣa eva yuktaḥ, na, dhīreṣu tasyākiñcit-karatvād ity āha—kiṁ nv iti | kiṁ nu tena bhavet | bāleṣv adhīreṣu | apramatto’vahitaḥ san yo vṛka iva vartate ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **bāleṣu tad-abudheṣu | dhīrās tatra budhāḥ | tad-abudhatvād eva pramatteṣu ||8||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **anyo’pi rājño’bhiprāya āsīd ity āha—bāleṣv avivekeṣu śūreṇa kalinā kiṁ na kim apy aniṣṭam | yato dhīreṣu vivekiṣu bhakta-janeṣu ca bhīruṇā | bālakeṣveva vṛkaḥ śūraḥ ||8||

 **...**

|| 1.18.9 ||

**upavarṇitam etad vaḥ puṇyaṁ pārīkṣitaṁ mayā |**

**vāsudeva-kathopetam ākhyānaṁ yad apṛcchata ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** pārikṣītam ākhyānam | apṛcchata pṛṣṭavanto yūyam ||9||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

 **...**

|| 1.18.10 ||

**yā yāḥ kathā bhagavataḥ kathanīyoru-karmaṇaḥ |**

**guṇa-karmāśrayāḥ pumbhiḥ saṁsevyās tā bubhūṣubhiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kiṁ bahunā narair etāvad eva kartavyam iti sarva-śāstrārtha-sāraṁ kathayati—yā yā iti | kathanīyāny urūṇi karmāṇi yasya tasya guṇa-karma-viṣayāḥ | bubhūṣibhiḥ sad-bhāvam icchadbhiḥ ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **yā yās tāḥ sarvā api | kim uta śrī-vasudeva-nandana-sambandhinya ity arthaḥ | guṇa-karmāśrayās tat-tad-guṇa-sūcaka-karmāśrayāḥ ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **bubhūṣubhiḥ sva-sattām icchadbhiḥ | anyathā jīvan-mṛtatvaṁ syād iti bhāvaḥ ||10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **bubhūṣubhiḥ sattām icchubhiḥ, itarathā jīvanmṛtatāpattiḥ ||10||

 **...**

|| 1.18.11 ||

**ṛṣaya ūcuḥ—**

**sūta jīva samāḥ saumya śāśvatīr viśadaṁ yaśaḥ |**

**yas tvaṁ śaṁsasi kṛṣṇasya martyānām amṛtaṁ hi naḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **punar vistareṇa kathanārthaṁ sūtoktiṁ tat-saṅgaṁ cābhinandanti—sūteti tribhiḥ | śāśvatīḥ samā anantān vatsarān jīva | atyanta-saṁyoge dvitīyā | viśuddhaḥ yaśaḥ kīrtayasi | tac cāsmākaṁ martyānām amṛtaṁ maraṇa-nivartakam ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **jīva martya-loke vartasvety arthaḥ ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **śāśvatīḥ samāḥ asaṅkhyeyān samvatsarān jīva, kālādhvanor atyanta-saṁyoge dvitīyā, viśadam avidyā-nivartakaṁ, martyānām apy amṛtaṁ mṛtyu-nivartakam ||11||

 **...**

|| 1.18.12 ||

**karmaṇy asminn anāśvāse dhūma-dhūmrātmanāṁ bhavān |**

**āpāyayati govinda-pāda-padmāsavaṁ madhu ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kiṁ ca, **asmin karmaṇi** satre’**nāśvāse**’viśvanasīye, vaiguṇya-bāhulyena phala-niścayābhāvāt | **dhūmena dhūmro** vivarṇa **ātmā** śarīraṁ yeṣāṁ tān asmān | karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī | **āsavaṁ** makarandam | **madhu** madhuram ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : anāśvāsa** aviśvasanīye, vaiguṇya-bāhulyena kṛṣivat phala-niścayābhāvāt | anena bhakter viśvasanīyatvaṁ dhvanitam | **dhūmenadhūmrau** virañjitau **ātmānau** śarīra-citte yeṣām , karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī, tān asmān ity arthaḥ | **pāda**-**padmasya** yaśo-rūpam **āsavaṁ** makarandaṁ **madhu** madhuram | atra satravat karmāntaram, yaśaḥ-śravaṇavad bhakty-antaraṁ ceti jñeyam | 

tad evaṁ bhaktiṁ vinā karmādibhir asmākaṁ duḥkham evāsīd iti vyatirekatvam atra gamyate | tad uktaṁ—yaśaḥ-śriyām eva pariśramaḥ paraḥ [bhā.pu. 12.12.40] ity-ādi | ato vai kavayo nityaṁ [bhā.pu. 1.2.22] ity-ādi ca | brahma-vaivarte ca śivaṁ prati śrī-viṣṇu-vākyam—


    yadi māṁ prāptum icchanti prāpnuvanty eva nānyathā |


    kalau kaluṣa-cittānāṁ vṛthāyuḥ-prabhṛtīni ca |


    bhavanti varṇāśramiṇāṁ na tu mac-charaṇārthinām || iti ||12|| [bhakti.sa. 99]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **karmaṇy asmin satre **anāśvāse** aviśvasanīye, vaiguṇya-bāhulyena phala-niścayābhāvāt | tena bhakter viśvasanīyatvam uktam | **dhūmena dhūmrā** vivarṇā **ātmanaś**cakṣur ādy-avayavā dehā yeṣāṁ teṣām  | karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī | bhakteḥ sākṣāt-phaladatvam āha—**āpyāyatīti** | **āsavaṁ** makaranda-rūpam, **madhu** mādakam iti, tad-itara-sarva-sukha-duḥkhānubhavāt pratikṣaṇaṁ tadīya-svādutvānubhavāc ca ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **asmin satre karmaṇi anāśvāse vaiguṇya-bhūmnā phalāniścayād aviśvasanīye, dhūmena homād utthitena dhūmrā dhūsarā ātmānaś cakṣurādy avayavā dehā yeṣāṁ teṣāṁ, karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhī, atra bhaktir viśvasanīyatvaṁ darśitaṁ, tasyāḥ sākṣāt-phaladatvam āha—āpāyayatīti | āsavaṁ makaranda-rūpaṁ madhu mādakam iti tad anya-sarvān anubhavāt pratikṣaṇa-tat-svādānubhavāc ca ||12||

 **...**

|| 1.18.13 ||

**tulayāma lavenāpi na svargaṁ nāpunar bhavam |**

**bhagavat-saṅgi-saṅgasya martyānāṁ kim utāśiṣaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : bhagavat-saṅgino** viṣṇu-bhaktāḥ, teṣāṁ **saṅgasya** yo **lavo**’tyalpaḥ kālaḥ, tenāpi **svargaṁ na tulayāma** samaṁ na paśyāma | na ca [**apunarbhavaṁ**] apavargam | saṁbhāvanāyāṁ loṭ | **martyānāṁ** tucchā **āśiṣo** rājyādyā na tulayāmeti **kim u** vaktavyam ? ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tulayāmeti taiḥ | tatra sambhāvanāyāṁ loḍ iti | tulayituṁ sambhāvanām api na kurmaḥ | **kim uta** tulanāṁ kurma ity arthaḥ ||13||[^152]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tasmāt tādṛśa-sādhu-saṅga-mahā-nidher māhātmyam asmad-anubhava-gocarī-kṛtaṁ kiyad brumaḥ? ity āhuḥ | **bhagavat-saṅgino** bhaktāḥ, teṣāṁ **saṅgasya** yo **lavo**’tyalpaḥ kālaḥ, tena **svargaṁ** karma-phalam,**apunarbhavaṁ** mokṣaṁ ca jñāna-phalaṁ **na tulayāma**, **martyānāṁ** tucchā **āśiṣo** rājyādyāḥ **kim uta** vaktavyaṁ na tulayāmeti | yataḥ sādhu-saṅgena parama-durlabhāyā bhakter aṅkuro hy udbhavatīti bhāvaḥ | 

tatra bhakteḥ sādhanasyāpi sādhu-saṅgasya lavenāpi karma-jñānādeḥ phalaṁ sampūrṇam api na tulayāma, kimuta bahu-kāla-vyāpinā sādhu-saṅgena, kimutatarāṁ tat-phala-bhūtayā bhaktyā, kimutatamāṁ bhakti-phalena premneti ca kaimutyātiśayo dyotito bhavati | tathātra sambhāvanārtha-kaloṭātolane sambhāvanām eva na kurmaḥ | na hi meruṇā sarṣapaṁ kaścit tulayatīti dyotyate | bahu-vacanena bahūnāṁ sammatyā naiṣo’rthaḥ kenacid apramāṇīkartuṁ śakyata iti vyajyāte | bhagavat-saṅgi-saṅgasya ity anena –


    na tathāsya bhavet kleśo bandhaś cānya-prasaṅgataḥ | 


    yoṣit-saṅgād yathā puṁsas tathā tat-saṅgi-saṅgataḥ ||

iti yoṣit-saṅgād api yoṣit-saṅgināṁ saṅgo yathātinindya uktaḥ, tathaiva bhagavat-saṅgād api bhagavat-saṅgināṁ saṅgo’tivandyo’tipraśasyo’tyabhilaṣaṇīya iti bodhyate ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **sat-prasaṅgasya mahāntaṁ mahimānam āha—tulayāmeti | sambhāvanāyāṁ loṭ | bhagavat-saṅgināṁ vaiṣṇavānāṁ yaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇa-kathāmṛtavarṣī saṅgas tasya lavena kiñcit kālenāpi svargaṁ karma-phalam apavargaṁ ca jñāna-phalaṁ sukhaiśvarya-pradhānaṁ mokṣaṁ na tulayāma, tulane sambhāvanām api na kurma ity arthaḥ | na hi karpūra-marīcailābhāvitena sitā-pānakena kṣārodakaṁ takraṁ vā kecit-tulayeyuḥ | evaṁ sati martyānām āśiṣas tucchā rājyādikāḥ kim uteti | iha bhakti-hetoḥ sat-saṅgasya lavo'pi cet-tasminn asambhāvyas tarhi bahu-kāla-tat-saṅgo dūre, tat-phala-bhūtā bhaktis tv atidūre sthāpyate iti lava-śabdāt bahu-sammatatvān-nātra sandeha-gandho'pīti bahu-vacanāt | bhagavat-saṅgād api sat-saṅgasyātibalīyas tvam agni-saṅgād api tat-prataptāyaḥ piṇḍa-saṅgavad iti ca saṅgi-saṅga-śabdāt sūcyate ||13||

 **...**

|| 1.18.14 ||

**ko nāma tṛpyed rasavit kathāyāṁ**

**mahattamaikānta-parāyaṇasya |**

**nāntaṁ guṇānām aguṇasya jagmur**

**yogeśvarā ye bhava-pādma-mukhyāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **evaṁ sat-saṅgam abhinandya śravaṇautsukyam āviṣ-kurvanti—ko nāmeti | rasavid rasajñaḥ | mahattamānām ekāntena param ayanam āśrayo yas tasya kathāyām | aguṇasya prākṛta-guṇa-rahitasya | kalyāṇa-guṇānām antaṁ ye yogeśvarās te’pi na jagmur etāvanta iti na parigaṇayāṁ cakruḥ | bhavaḥ śivaḥ pādmo brahmā ca mukhyau yeṣāṁ te ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** evaṁ bhakty-aṅgāny uktvā teṣu sarvaśaḥ stotavyeṣu prādhānyāt trivargam eva stauti | vargasyeti | mahimeti śeṣaḥ | teṣv api śravaṇa-māhātmyam āha—atheti | **ko nāma** iti | **mahattamā ekāntena** niyamena **parāyaṇaṁ** parama āśrayo yasya sa tathā | mahattamaiḥ kathyamānaḥ pratyakṣa iva bhavatīti bhāvaḥ | **antaṁ** niścayam idaṁ rūpam īdṛśaṁ rūpam itthaṁ camatkārotīty-ādi | **aguṇasya** guṇa-sukhādhika-svarūpa-sukha-lubdhatvād agṛhīta-guṇasya svarūpa-sukham eva guṇeṣv abhivyaktam anyān sukhayati | abhivyakti-tāratamyāt sukha-tāratamyam | **bhavo** rudraḥ | **pādmo** brahmā | **mukhya**-śabdāt sanakādayaḥ yogasya samādheḥ | īśvarāvaśīkṛtaḥ samādhayaḥ | samādhi-balāt kalita-sakala-padārthā api viṣṇu-guṇān na kalayantīty arthaḥ ||14|| [mu.pha. 8.1]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **yogasya bhakti-yogasya | īśvarā dātum adātuṁ ca samarthāḥ _||_14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu satyam eva praśasyate sādhu-saṅgo yatas taṁ vinā kṛṣṇa-kathāsvādo na labhyate, sa yuṣmābhir labdha eveti | kiṁ punas tasyaiva paunaḥpunyena ? ity ata āha—ko nāmeti | rasavid rasajñaś cet tadā ko nāma mahattamānām ekāntena param ayanam āśrayo yas tasya kathāyāṁ tṛpyed iti mahā-mādhuryam uktam | mahaiśvaryaṁ cāha—nāntam iti | yataḥ aguṇasya prākṛta-guṇa-rahitasya guṇānāṁ cin-mayānām antaṁ ye yogeśvarās te’pi na jagmuḥ ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu sat-prasaṅgāt kṛṣṇa-kathā-rasāsvādo labhyate, sa ca bhavadbhir labdha eveti cet-tatrāha—ko nāmeti | ko rasavit kṛṣṇasya kathāyāṁ tṛpyet? na tṛpyed ity arthaḥ | kīdṛśasya? mahattamānāṁ śrī-nāradādīnām ekāntena parāyaṇasya paramāśrayasya taiḥ samyak niścayena paratvenāśritasy ety arthaḥ | sarveśvarasya nitya-mūrter atimanojñasyeti bhāvaḥ | na ca sakṛt-sat-prasaṅgena kṛtsnas tadāsvādo labhyeta, tāsām ānantyāt-tac-cānanta-guṇa-hetukatvād iti bhāvenāha—aguṇasya māyā-gandha-śūnyasya tasya guṇānāṁ sārvaiśvarya-sārvajñya-sauhārda-bhakta-bandhutvādīnāṁ svarūpānubandhitām antaṁ pārat yogeśvarā api na janmuḥ, tathā ca sarvadaiva sat-saṅgaḥ prārthya iti ||14||

**...**

|| 1.18.15 ||

**tan no bhavān vai bhagavat-pradhāno**

**mahattamaikānta-parāyaṇasya |**

**harer udāraṁ caritaṁ viśuddhaṁ**

**śuśrūṣatāṁ no vitanotu vidvan ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **no’smākaṁ madhye bhagavān pradhānaṁ sevyo yasya sa bhavān naḥ śuśrūṣatāṁ hareś caritaṁ vistārayatu ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** **tan na** iti | **bhagavat-pradhāna** iti bahuvrīhiḥ | **mahattama-** iti tatpuruṣaḥ | **viśuddhaṁ** kartr-antarāsaṅkīrṇam ||15|| [mu.pha. 8.2]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **no’smākaṁ madhye bhagavān pradhānaṁ sevyo yasya saḥ bhavān | no’smākaṁ śuśrūṣatāṁ sambandhena | viśuddhaṁ māyātītam ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tat-tasmād bhavān no'smākaṁ madhye bhagavat-pradhāno harisvāmikas tad ekāntī | he udāra dātaḥ! udāro dātṛ-mahatoḥ ity amaraḥ | harer ācaritaṁ śuśruṣatāṁ naḥ sambandhe vitanotu vistārayatu, yad vā udāraṁ mahat, sphuṭam anyat ||15||

 **...**

**|| 1.18.16 ||**

**sa vai mahā-bhāgavataḥ parīkṣid**

**yenāpavargākhyam adabhra-buddhiḥ |**

**jñānena vaiyāsaki-śabditena**

**bheje khagendra-dhvaja-pāda-mūlam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tac ca śuka-parīkṣit-saṁvādena kathayety āhuḥ—sa vā iti dvābhyām | vaiyāsakinā śrī-śukena śabditena kathitena yena jñānena jñāna-sādhanenāpavarga ity ākhyā yasya tat khagendra-dhvajasya hareḥ pāda-mūlaṁ bheje ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu jñānād eva mokṣa iti jñānāya tat-phalāya mokṣāya ca kathaṁ na spṛhayatheti ced asmākaṁ bhaktānāṁ bhagavac-caritāsvādanaṁ jñānaṁ tat-phalaṁ bhagavat-pada-prāptir eva mokṣa iti parīkṣid-dṛṣṭyaivāhuḥ | tac-caritaṁ bhavān vitanotu yena sa vai parīkṣit khagendra-dhvajasya bhagavataḥ pāda-mūlaṁ prāpa | 

nanu dvādaśa-skandhe parīkṣid-apavargaṁ prāpeti prasiddhiḥ satyam | apavarga ity ākhyā yasya tad-bhaktair bhagavat-pāda-mūlam evāpavarga ucyate | vakṣyate ca pañcama-skandhe, yathāvarṇa-vidhānam apavargaś ca bhavati yo’sau bhagavati bhakti-yogaḥ [bhā.pu. 5.19.19-20] iti | yena katham-bhūtena vaiyāsaki-śabditena | yathaiva tat-pāda-mūlam apavarga-śabdenocyate tathaiva tac-caritam api jñāna-śabdena vaiyāsakinocyate | ato jñānena parīkṣid-apavargaṁ prāpeti prasiddhir nānṛtety arthaḥ | etena sa pretya gatavān yathā [bhā.pu. 1.12.2] iti praśnasyottaram uktam ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **bhakta-kathā khalu bhagavat-kathā-saṁpṛktā śikhariṇīvātisvādvī tāpa-harā ca tavedataḥ tāṁ brūhīty āha—sa vai iti | yena harer udāra-caritena parīkṣit khagendra-dhvajasya kṛṣṇasya pāda-mūlaṁ bheje, tad-bhavān vitanotu | kīdṛśena? jñāyate'nubhūyate harir aneneti jñānaṁ tena, vaiyāsakinā śabditenopadiṣṭena | pāda-mūlaṁ viśinaṣṭi—apavargākhyam iti māyāpavarjanāt-tan-nāmakam ity arthaḥ | etena sa pretya gatavān yathā [bhā.pu. 1.12.2] ity etad-viśadī-bhūtam ||16||

 **...**

|| 1.18.17 ||

**tan naḥ paraṁ puṇyam asaṁvṛtārtham**

**ākhyānam atyadbhuta-yoga-niṣṭham |**

**ākhyāhy anantācaritopapannaṁ**

**pārīkṣitaṁ bhāgavatābhirāmam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tad saṁvṛtārthaṁ yathā tathā ākhyāhi | tad eva nirdiśanti | parīkṣite kathitaṁ pārīkṣitam ākhyānaṁ śrī-bhāgavataṁ purāṇam | paraṁ puṇyaṁ sattva-śodhakam | atyudbhute yoge niṣṭhā yasya | anatasyācaritair upapannaṁ yuktam | ata eva bhāgavatānām abhirāmaṁ priyam | etair viśeṣeṇaḥ karma-jñāna-bhakti-yoga-prakāśatvaṁ darśitam ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tan naḥ param ity atrāvantara-tātparyeṇa dharma-jñāna-prakāśakatve’pi mukhya-tātparyeṇa bhakter eva prakāśakatvam āha—bhāgavatābhirāmam iti | ata etat prāg uktam—sa vai mahā-bhāgavataḥ [bhā.pu. 1.18.16] ity-ādi | yad vā, paraṁ puṇyaṁ parama-śodhakam | yato’tyadbhuta-yogo bhakti-yogas tan-niṣṭham ity-ādi ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **asaṁvṛtārthaṁ yathā syāt tathākhyāhi | atyadbhūte yoge bhaktau niṣṭhā yasya | ākhyānaṁ śrī-bhāgavatam | yato bhāgavatānāṁ bhaktānām abhirāmaṁ priyaṁ pārīkṣitaṁ parikṣite kathitam ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tat parīkṣitam ākhyānam ākhyāhi, asaṁvṛtārthaṁ yathā syāt-tathā, atyadbhutasya bhakti-yogasya niṣṭhā sthitir yatra tat | ato bhāgavatānām abhirāmaṁ manoharam | mahadbhiḥ sat-kṛtaṁ śrī-bhāgavata-vyākhyānāya dattāsanaṁ svaṁ ślāghate—aho iti āścarye | heti harṣe, sūtajātitvād-vilomajātāḥ pratilomajā api vayaṁ jñāna-vṛddhānāṁ bhavatām anuvṛttyā sevayā janma-bhṛtaḥ saphala-janmāno jātā āsmaḥ | yato mahattamānāṁ bhavādṛśānām abhidhāna-yogo laukiko'pi sambhāṣaṇa-sambandhaḥ dauṣkulyamādhiṁ duṣkulatva-janyāṁ manaḥ-pīḍāṁ vidhunoti vināśayati ||17–18||

 **...**

|| 1.18.18 ||

**sūta uvāca—**

**aho vayaṁ janma-bhṛto’dya hāsma**

**vṛddhānuvṛttyāpi viloma-jātāḥ |**

**dauṣkulyam ādhiṁ vidhunoti śīghraṁ**

**mahattamānām abhidhāna-yogaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **śrī-bhāgavata-vyākhyāne labdha-prasaṅgaṁ mahatām ādara-pātram ātmānaṁ ślāghate dvābhyām | aho ity āścaryam | ha iti harṣe | vayam iti bahu-vacanaṁ ślāghāyām | pratiloma-jā apy adya janma-bhṛtaḥ sa-phala-janmāna āsma jātāḥ | vṛddhānām anuvṛttyā ādareṇa | jñāna-vṛddhaḥ śukas tasya sevayeti vā | yato duṣkulatvaṁ tan-nimittam ādhiṁ ca manaḥ-pīḍāṁ mahattamānām abhidhāna-yogo yogo laukiko’pi saṁbhāṣaṇa-lakṣaṇaḥ saṁbandho vidhunoty apanayati ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tādṛśa-brahmarṣīn prati svayaṁ tādṛśa-mahā-purāṇam upadeṣṭuṁ saṅkucaṁs tatra tan-mahimānam evāvalambate—aho iti yugmakena _|_ viloma-jātā api vayam adayaiva janma-bhṛta uttama-janmāntaraṁ labdhavanta āsma, dvijatvavat | katham ? vṛddhānāṁ mahattamānāṁ bhavatām anuvṛttyaitan mahā-purāṇa-kathana-pravartanātmakenāṅgīkāreṇa | yad vā, kena kadā ? vṛddhānāṁ śrī-śukadevādīnāṁ bhavatāṁ yānuvṛttir anugatis tayā hetunā | adyāsminn etādṛśa-bhavad-aṅgīkāra-samaye | vilomajatvānuvṛttau tatrāyogyatvād iti bhāvaḥ | tatra kaimutyaṁ mahattamānām abhidhāna-yogo nāma śravaṇam api dauṣkulyaṁ tad-ādhiṁ ca vidhunotīti ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **śrī-bhāgavatākhyāne ṛṣibhir datta-yogyatā-kamātmānam abhinandati | vilomajā nindyā api adya janma-bhṛtaḥ saphala-janmānaḥ | āsma jātāḥ | ha spaṣṭam | vṛddhānāṁ jñāna-vṛddhasya śukasya vā anuvṛttyā | yato duṣkulatvaṁ tan-nimittam ādhiṁ ca manaḥ-pīḍāṁ mahattamānām abhidhāna-yogaḥ laukiko’pi sambhāṣaṇa-lakṣaṇa-sambandhaḥ vidhunoti ||18||

 **...**

|| 1.18.19 ||

**kutaḥ punar gṛṇato nāma tasya**

**mahattamaikānta-parāyaṇasya |**

**yo’nanta-śaktir bhagavān ananto**

**mahad-guṇatvād yam anantam āhuḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **anantoddeśataḥ kālataś ca ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kutaḥ punaḥ kiṁ punar vaktavyaṁ tasyānanatasya nāma gṛṇataḥ puṁso mahattamaikānta-yogo dauṣkulyaṁ vidhunotīti | yad vā, nāma gṛṇataḥ punaḥ kuto dauṣkulyam iti | yad vā, gṛṇataḥ puṁsas tasya nāma dauṣkulyaṁ vidhunotīti kiṁ vaktavyam iti kaimutya-nyāyam evāha | anantāḥ śaktayo yasya | svato’py anantaḥ | kiṁ ca, mahatsu guṇā yasya sa mahad-guṇaḥ tasya bhāvas tasmāt | yaṁ guṇato’py anantam āhuḥ ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tad evaṁ sati tasya mahattamābhidhāna-yogavataḥ punar mahattamānām ekānta-parāyaṇasya gāḍha-tatparasya sato’ta eva gṛṇataḥ, teṣāṁ mahattamānāṁ nāma kīrtayataḥ puṁsaḥ kīrtitaṁ nāma kartṛ dauṣkulyādikaṁ vidhunotīti kutaḥ punar vaktavyam ? sutarām eva tat syād iti bhāvaḥ | tatra hetuḥ—atiśayo yo bhagavān ananta-svarūpas tathānanta-śaktiś ca syāt | tam api yaṁ mahatsu abhivyaktā guṇā yasya tādrśatvād eva hetor anantam āhuḥ—tat tayā yad asti sarve teṣu yadi tad-guṇā nābhivyaktā abhaviṣyan, tadā tad-ajñānāt tam api tathā nāvadiṣyann ity arthaḥ | pūrveṇa yac-chabdena tac-chabdo labhyate | pareṇa tu prasiddhaḥ sūcyate | tasmāt tādṛśa-guṇānāṁ bhavad-vidhānām eva prabhāvo’yaṁ—yad vayam apy atra yogyā jātā iti bhāvaḥ | yeṣāṁ saṁsmaraṇāt puṁsāṁ [bhā.pu. 1.19.33] ity-ādivat | atra prastutasya vṛddhānuvṛtti-mahimna upakrāntatvena upasaṁhāre’nyamahima-paratve vākya-bhedaḥ syād iti nānyathā vyākhyātam | nija-yogyatāntara-sūcane dhārṣṭyaṁ syād iti ca ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **kutaḥ punaḥ vaktavyaṁ gṛṇataḥ kīrtayataḥ puṁsaḥ nāma kartṛ-dauṣkulyaṁ vidhunoti | nanu dauṣkulyārambhakaṁ pāpaṁ prārabdham eva, tasya nāśaṁ vinā kathaṁ dauṣkulya-dhūnanam ? prārabdhasya tu bhogenaiva nāśa iti prasiddheḥ | nāmataḥ kathaṁ khaṇḍayatu ? ity ata āha—yo bhagavān ananta-śaktir iti | śaktīnām ānantyād bhakta-prārabdha-nāśiny api kācit śaktir asty eveti bhāvaḥ | tathā ca mahatsu sva-bhakteṣu guṇā yasya sa mahad-guṇas tasya bhāvas tattvam | tasmād yam anantam āhur iti | tena tad-bhakteṣu tadīya-guṇa-saṅkramāt tasminn iva tad-bhakte’pi prārabdhaṁ na tiṣṭhati ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanu dauṣkulyārambhatvake prārabdhe sthite tat-kāryaṁ tat kathaṁ vidhūtaṁ syād iti cet—satāṁ prārabdha-haratva-śaktir bhagavad-dattāstīti bhāvenāha—kuta iti | tasya kṛṣṇasya nāma kartṛ gṛṇato mahattama-sadasi taṁ kīrtayataḥ puṁso dauṣkulyaṁ vidhunotīti punaḥ kutaḥ kiṁ vācyam ity arthaḥ | kṛṣṇa-prabhāvam āha—ya iti | bhagavān ṣaḍaiśvarya-pūrṇaḥ, ananto vibhuḥ | mahatsu guṇā yasya tattvādyam anantam āhuḥ, tathā ca bhakta-prārabdha-hartṛ-sva-śaktestena mahattam eṣv arpitatvāt tat-prasaṅgād asmākaṁ dauṣkulyārambhaka-tan-nāśaḥ sāṁprata iti bhāvaḥ ||19||

 **...**

|| 1.18.20 ||

**etāvatālaṁ nanu sūcitena**

**guṇair asāmyānatiśāyanasya |**

**hitvetarān prārthayato vibhūtir**

**yasyāṅghri-reṇuṁ juṣate’nabhīpsoḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **etat prapañcayati tribhiḥ—etāvateti | tasya yad asāmyam anatiśāyanaṁ ca guṇais sāmyaṁ tad-ādhikyaṁ cānyasya nāstīty asyārthasya jñānam etāvatā sūcitenaivālaṁ paryāptaṁ kas tad vistaro vaktuṁ śaknoti | tad evāha | itarān brahmādīn prārthayamānān hitvā vibhūtir lakṣmīr anabhīpsor api yasyāṅghri-reṇuṁ sevata iti ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **atha tasyānanta-guṇatvaṁ darśayati—etāvateti | asāmyaś cāsāv anatiśāyanaś ceti | guṇair asāmyādhikyasya tasyaitāvatā vistṛtena māhātmya-sūcanenālam, na prayojanam astīty arthaḥ | tad eva yojayati—hitveti | vibhūtir bahiraṅga-sampatti-rūpā | yasya svarūpa-śakty-ādibhiḥ sampannasya ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nanu ke te guṇās tatra tān vaktuṁ kaḥ samarthaḥ? kintu etāvatā sūcitenālaṁ yad-guṇair asāmyaṁ na atiśāyanaṁ yasya tasyeti | yasya sama eva nāsti adhikaḥ kuto bhaviṣyatīty arthaḥ | evam-bhūtasya yasyānabhīpsor api aṅghri-reṇuṁ vibhūtir lakṣmīḥ sarva-guṇa-pūrṇam anviṣyantī juṣate sevate itarān brahmādīn prārthayamānān api tyaktvā ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **harer ananta-śaktitvāt tan-nirūpaṇaṁ na ko'pi śaknuyāt kartuṁ kintvetāvatā sūcanenālaṁ paryāptaṁ, yasyān abhīpsor api guṇair ākṛṣṭā vibhūtir lakṣmīr itarān | prārthayato'pi brahmādīn hitvāṅghri-reṇuṁ juṣate sevate | kīdṛśasyety āha—sāmyeti | sāmyātiśaya-śūnyasyety arthaḥ | yasya samaḥ ko'pi nāsty adhikas tu kuta ity arthaḥ ||20||

 **...**

|| 1.18.21 ||

**athāpi yat-pāda-nakhāvasṛṣṭaṁ**

**jagad viriñcopahṛtārhaṇāmbhaḥ |**

**seśaṁ punāty anyatamo mukundāt**

**ko nāma loke bhagavat-padārthaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **athety arthāntare | yasya pāda-nakhhād avasṛṣṭaṁ niḥsṛtam api viriñcenopahṛtaṁ samarpitam arhaṇāmbho’rghodakam īśa-sahitaṁ jagat punāti | viriñcopahṛtaṁ seśam iti ca tayor apy upāsakatvam uktam | tasmān mukunda-vyatiriktaḥ ko nāma bhagavat-padasyārthaḥ | sa eva sarveśvara ity arthaḥ ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tasya cānanta-guṇasya mahatsv abhivyaktatvaṁ darśayati—atheti | seśaṁ punātīty atreśasyāpi pavitrīkaraṇam akhaṇḍatama-guṇādhiṣṭhānatve’pi tad-āveśa-khaṇḍanaṁ jñeyam ||21|| [paramātma-sandarbha 17]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **atha ity arthāntare | yat-pāda-nakhāvasṛṣṭaṁ niḥsṛtam api viriñcenopahṛtaṁ samarpitam arhaṇāmbhaḥ arghyodakam īśo mahādevas tat-sahitaṁ sarvaṁ jagat punāti tasmān mukunda-vyatiriktaḥ ko nāma bhagavat-padasyārthaḥ sarveśvaraḥ sa evety arthaḥ | evaṁ ca jagati sarvotkṛṣṭā lakṣmī-brahma-śivā eva tat-padaṁ sevamānās tasya mahotkarṣa sūcayantīti vākyārthaḥ ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tasya sarveśvaratvād eva sarvān vihāya lakṣmīs tam eva sevata ity āha— athāpīti | viriñcenopahṛtam arpitam arhaṇānto'rghodakaṁ kartṛ yasya pāda-nakhād avasṛṣṭaṁ nirgataṁ sat seśaṁ sarudraṁ jagat punāti, tasmān-mukundādanyatamo loke bhagavat-padasyārthaḥ ko nāma? tathā ca lakṣmī-brahma-rudrāṇāṁ sarvotkṛṣṭānāṁ tat-pada-sevakatvāt sa eva sarveśvara iti ||21||

 **...**

**|| 1.18.22 ||**

**yatrānuraktāḥ sahasaiva dhīrā**

**vyapohya dehādiṣu saṅgam ūḍham |**

**vrajanti tat pāramahaṁsyam antyaṁ**

**yasminn ahiṁsopaśamaḥ sva-dharmaḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **paramahaṁsāśramaṁ prāpyaṁ satyaṁ brahma ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** **dhīrāḥ** santaḥ | **ūḍhaṁ** dhṛtam | **antyaṁ** paramākāṣṭāpannam | tad āha—**yasminn ahiṁsā upaśamaś** ca **svābhāviko dharmaḥ** ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** **ko nāma** iti | purā kathānāṁ madhye | naretaraṁ pāśum ||22|| [mu.pha. 8.3]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (prīti-sandarbhaḥ, 75)**: atha [prīteḥ] prathamodayāvasthām āha—**yatra** iti | **antyaṁ** **pāramahaṁsyaṁ** bhāgavata-paramahaṁsatvam | tasyānuṣaṅgiko guṇaḥ **yasminn** iti ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tasmāt tam eva bhajed ity abhipretyāha_—_yatreti | **antyaṁ pāramahaṁsyaṁ** bhāgavata-paramahaṁsatvam—


    muktānām api siddhānāṁ nārāyaṇa-parāyaṇaḥ |


    sudurlabhaḥ praśāntātmā koṭiṣv api mahāmune || [bhā.pu. 6.14.5] ity ukteḥ |

**yasmin** yad-artham **ahiṁsayā** mātsaryādi-rāhityena **upaśamo** bhagavan-niṣṭhā vidhīyata ity arthaḥ ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tathā dṛśyamānā manīṣiṇo’py atrārthe pramāṇam ity āha—yatreti | **ūḍhaṁ** dhṛtam | **antyaṁ** parama-kāṣṭhāpannam | **yasmin** vrajane ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **ata eva dhīrās taṁ bhajantīty āha—yatreti | **ūḍham** anādi-kāla-prāptaṁ dehādiṣu saṅgaṁ sahasā jñāna-balena vyapohya tyaktvā antyaṁ caturthaṁ, **yasmin** pāramahaṁsye '**hiṁsādiḥ** **svābhāviko dharmaḥ** ||22||

 **...**

**|| 1.18.23 ||**

**ahaṁ hi pṛṣṭo’ryamaṇo bhavadbhir**

**ācakṣa ātmāvagamo’tra yāvān |**

**nabhaḥ patanty ātma-samaṁ patattriṇas**

**tathā samaṁ viṣṇu-gatiṁ vipaścitaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **evaṁ svabhāgyam abhinandya pārīkṣitopakhyānaṁ vaktum āha—ahaṁ hīti | he aryamaṇaḥ he sūryās trayī-mūrtayaḥ, atra yāvān ātmāvagamo mama jñānaṁ tāvad ācakṣe pravakṣyāmi | tathāhi | yathā pakṣiṇo nabha ātma-samaṁ sva-śakty-anrūpam evotpatanti na kṛtsnam, tathā vipaścito’pi viṣṇor gatiṁ līlāṁ samaṁ svam atyanurūpam eva vadantīty arthaḥ ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **nanv ananta-guṇasya tasya kathaṁ guṇa-gaṇane pravṛtto’si ? tatrāha—ahaṁ hīti ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **evaṁ sva-bhāgyam abhinandya pārīkṣitopākhyānaṁ vaktum āha—aryamaṇaḥ! he sūryās tat-tulyās trayī-mūrtayaḥ atra yāvān ātmāvagamaḥ mama jñānaṁ tāvad ācakṣe pravakṣyāmi | yathā pakṣiṇaḥ ātma-samaṁ sva-śakty-anurūpam eva nabha utpatanti na tu kṛtsnaṁ tathā vipaścito’pi viṣṇor gatiṁ līlāṁ samaṁ sva-maty-anurūpam eva ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **evaṁ svabhāgyaṁ saṁślāghya bhagavad aiśvaryaṁ coktvātha śaunaka-praśnasyottarañcāha—ahaṁ hīti | he aryamaṇaḥ sūrya-tulyāḥ śaunakādayaḥ! bhavadbhir yat pṛṣṭaṁ tad aham ācakṣe—tatra yāvān-mamātmāvagamas tāvad vakṣyāmi, yathā patatriṇa ātma-samaṁ sva-śakty anurūpam eva nabha utpatanti, na tu kṛtsnaṁ, tathā vipaścitaḥ samaṁ sva-buddhy anurūpam eva viṣṇugatiṁ vadantīti ||23-24||

 **...**

|| 1.18.24 ||

**ekadā dhanur udyamya vicaran mṛgayāṁ vane |**

**mṛgān anugataḥ śrāntaḥ kṣudhitas tṛṣito bhṛśam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **saṁprati kathām upakṣipati—ekadeti ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **atha śrī-bhagavān eva sa-pārśvaṁ netuṁ brahma-śāpa-dvārā taṁ viraktaṁ sampāditavān | tatra ca śrīmad-bhāgavataṁ prakāśitavān iti vaktuṁ tac-caritāntaram āha—ekadety ādinā ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : _na vyākhyātam._**

 **...**

|| 1.18.25 ||

**jalāśayam acakṣāṇaḥ praviveśa tam āśramam |**

**dadarśa munim āsīnaṁ śāntaṁ mīlita-locanam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **acakṣāṇo’paśyan taṁ prasiddham āśramam | tasmiṁś ca muniṁ śamīkam ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **acakṣaṇo’paśyan ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **acakṣāṇo 'paśyan, muniṁ śamīkam ||25||

 **...**

|| 1.18.26 ||

**pratiruddhendriya-prāṇa- mano-buddhim upāratam |**

**sthāna-trayāt paraṁ prāptaṁ brahma-bhūtam avikriyam ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **brahma-bhūtaṁ brahmaṇi bhūtam | svato-manaḥ sthitir viṣṇau brahma-bhāva udāhṛtaḥ iti brahmāṇḍe ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **pratiruddhāḥ pratyāhatā indriyādayo yena tam | ata evoparatam | sthāna-trayāc jāgrādi-lakṣaṇāt paraṁ turīyaṁ padaṁ prāptam | ata eva brama-bhūtatvād avikriyam ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **muniṁ śamīkam | sthāna-trayāt jāgrat-svapna-suṣuptitaḥ paraṁ turīyaṁ samādhiṁ prāptam ata eva brahma-bhūtam ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **jāgradādi-sthāna-trayāt paraṁ turīyaṁ bhūtaṁ satyaṁ brahma prāptam anubhavantam ity arthaḥ | rurormṛga-viśeṁsyedaṁ rauravaṁ tenājinena ca channaṁ muniṁ viśuṣyattāluḥ parīkṣit udakam ayācata ||26-27||

 **...**

|| 1.18.27 ||

**viprakīrṇa-jaṭācchannaṁ rauraveṇājinena ca |**

**viśuṣyat-tālur udakaṁ tathā-bhūtam ayācata ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **viprakīrṇābhir jaṭābhir ācchannam | rurur mṛga-viśeṣas tasya carmaṇā cācchannam | viśeṣeṇa śuṣyāt-tālu yasya saḥ | tathā-bhūtaṁ munim udakam ayācata ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **rurur mṛga-viśeṣas tasya carmaṇā ca ācchannam ||27||

 **...**

|| 1.18.28 ||

**alabdha-tṛṇa-bhūmy-ādir asamprāptārghya-sūnṛtaḥ |**

**avajñātam ivātmānaṁ manyamānaś cukopa ha ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : na labdhaṁ tṛṇaṁ** tṛṇāsanaṁ **bhūmy-ādy**-upaveśa-sthānaṁ ca yena saḥ | **na saṁprāpto’rghaḥ sūnṛtaṁ** priya-vacanaṁ ca yena saḥ ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **alabdhety-ādi | atra tasyedṛśa-bhāvo bhagavad-anugraha-mayaḥ śrī-bhagavad-icchayaiveti jñeyam, tasyaiva me’ghasya [bhā.pu. 1.19.14] ity-ādi-vakṣyamāṇāt ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **alabdheti | “mamātithyam anena kim api na kṛtam” iti **cukopa** ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : na labdhaṁ** **tṛṇam** āsanāpa-bhūmir darśitaḥ sthalaṁ ca yena saḥ | **na prāpto'rghaḥ sūnṛtaṁ** priya-vākyaṁ ca yena saḥ | “mamātithyaṁ kim apy anena na kṛtam” ity **ātmānam** **avajñātaṁ manyamānaś** **cukopa** ||28||

 **...**

|| 1.18.29 ||

**abhūta-pūrvaḥ sahasā kṣut-tṛḍbhyām arditātmanaḥ |**

**brāhmaṇaṁ praty abhūd brahman**[^153]** matsaro manyur eva ca ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) :**aprītir mad-vaśo nāyam iti matsara īrita iti nāma-mahodadhau ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **matsaras tad-utkarṣāsahanam ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tasya brāhmaṇaṁ prati matsaraḥ parotkarṣāsahanaṁ, manuḥ krodhaś cābhūt yo brāhmaṇe kadāpi pūrvaṁ na bhūtaḥ | ayaṁ bhāvaḥ—na caitad-vikarma parīkṣitaḥ kadāpi sambhavati, kintu śrī-bhāgavata-pracāraṇāya tena śuka-mahima-khyātaye priyasya tasya svāntikānayanāya ca bhagavataiva tathā racitam | tasyaiva me'ghasya [bhā.pu. 1.19.14] ity-ādi-tadvākyād iti ||29||

 **...**

|| 1.18.30 ||

**sa tu brahma-ṛṣer aṁse gatāsum uragaṁ ruṣā |**

**vinirgacchan dhanuṣ-koṭyā nidhāya puram āgataḥ**[^154]** ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **gatāsu mṛtam | dhanuṣ-koṭyā cāpāgreṇa ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **dhanuṣkoṭyā dhanur agreṇa nidhāyeti | bho brahman! tvayāham atithir yathā sādhu-saṁmānitas tathā tvām apy anayā sukumāra-mālayā sammānayāmīti bhāvaḥ ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **gatāsuṁ mṛtam ||30||

 **...**

|| 1.18.31 ||

**eṣa kiṁ nibhṛtāśeṣa- karaṇo mīlitekṣaṇaḥ |**

**mṛṣā-samādhir āhosvit kiṁ nu syāt kṣatra-bandhubhiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **sarpa-nidhāne rājño’bhiprāyam āha | eṣa kiṁ pratyāhṛta-sarvendriyaḥ san mīlitekṣaṇaḥ sthito yad vā, kṣatra-bandhubhir āgatair gatair vā kiṁ nu syād ity avajñayā mṛṣā-samādhiḥ sann iti jijñāsayety arthaḥ ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nirgamana-samaye rājā parāmṛśati eṣa iti | nibhṛtāśeṣa-karaṇaḥ pratyāhṛta-sarvendriyaḥ | ataḥ satya-samādhikaḥ āho svin mṛṣā samādhis tatra hetuḥ kiṁ nv iti | atra rājño vikarmedam abhāgyotthaṁ na jñeyaṁ kintu taṁ śīghraṁ sva-pārśvaṁ netuṁ brahma-śāpa-dvārā viraktaṁ vidhāya śukadevena saṅgataṁ kṛtvā tatra śrī-bhāgavata-rūpeṇa svayam āvirbhūya jagad uddhartuṁ ca kalau janiṣyamāṇān api kāṁścana bhaktān sva-kṛtāṁ rāsādi-līlām āsvadayituṁ ca bhagavata eveyam iccheti manīṣiṇa āhuḥ | tasyaiva me’ghasyety ādi vakṣyamāṇāt | mac-chuddha-bhaktasya daivād vikarmāpi śubhodarkam eveti jñāpayituṁ—


    yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānir bhavati bhārata | 


    abhyutthānam adharmasya tadātmānaṁ sṛjāmy aham || [gītā 4.6] 

iti śrī-bhāgavata-rūpeṇa svāvirbhāve kāraṇābhāsaṁ cotthāpayituṁ bhagavataiva tasya tathā bhāva udbhāvitaḥ | na ca tasya svapne’pi sa svabhāvaḥ abhūta-pūrvam ity ukteḥ | na ca daivād abhāgya-viśeṣottho’yaṁ tātkāliko bhāvas tat-phalasya śuka-samāgama-mahābhāgyasya anupapatteḥ | pipāsātiśaya eva hetur iti vācyam, tat-kṣaṇānantaram eva jalam apītavata evānutāpa-śata-vidīryamāṇasya gṛhāgatasya sadya eva prāyopaveśāt | ity evaṁ ca janmani maraṇe ca brahma-tejaso madhya-vayasi kālasya ca nirjayāt tasya rājño bhagavat-kṛpā-mahā-balavattvaṁ sādhāraṇam eva draṣṭavyam ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **mṛta-sarpa-nikṣepe rājño bhāvam āha—eṣa kim iti | nibhṛtāśeṣakaraṇaḥ pratyāhṛta-nikhilendriyaḥ san-nimīlitekṣaṇa āhosvit kṣatrabandhuṁ māṁ vīkṣya mṛṣā-samādhiḥ sann iti vijijñāsayā tan-nikṣepa ity arthaḥ ||31||

 **...**

|| 1.18.32 ||

**tasya putro’titejasvī viharan bālako’rbhakaiḥ |**

**rājñāghaṁ prāpitaṁ tātaṁ śrutvā tatredam abravīt ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tasya putraḥ śṛṅgī-nāmā | atitejasvī tapo-bala-saṁpannaḥ | aghaṁ duḥkham | tatra arbhaka-madhye ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tasya putraḥ śṛṅgī ||32||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tasya putraḥ śṛṅgī nāma, aghamavajñāṁ prāpitam ||32||

 **...**

|| 1.18.33 ||

**aho adharmaḥ pālānāṁ pīvnāṁ bali-bhujām iva |**

**svāminy aghaṁ yad dāsānāṁ dvāra-pānāṁ śunām iva ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **palānāṁ rājñām | pīvnāṁ puṣṭānām | adharmam eva nirḍiśati | svāmini dāsānāṁ yad aghaṁ pāpācaraṇaṁ bali-bhujāṁ kākānām iva śunām iva ceti ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **pālānāṁ rājñām | pīvnāṁ puṣṭānām | bali-bhujāṁ kākānām ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **pālānāṁ rājñāṁ pīvnāṁ puṣṭānāṁ bali-bhujāṁ kākānām ||33||

 **...**

|| 1.18.34 ||

**brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatra-bandhur hi dvāra-pālo**[^155]** nirūpitaḥ |**

**sa kathaṁ tad-gṛhe dvāḥ-sthaḥ sabhāṇḍaṁ bhoktum arhati ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **dāsatvaṁ darśayati—brāhmaṇair iti | sa-bhāṇḍaṁ bhāṇḍe eva sthitam ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **gṛha-pālaḥ śvā gṛhaṁ praviśya sa-bḥāṇḍaṁ bhāṇḍa-sahitaṁ ghṛtādi vastu | tena rājñāṁ munīnām āśrama-madhye sahasā praveśe tatra jalādi-prārthane ca kā yogyateti bhāvaḥ ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **dāsatvam evāha—brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatra-bandhur dvāra-pālaḥ śvā nirūpitaḥ, sa kathaṁ tad-gṛhe praviśya sa-bhāṇḍaṁ ghṛtādi vastu bhoktum arhati? ||34||

 **...**

|| 1.18.35 ||

**kṛṣṇe gate bhagavati śāstary utpatha-gāminām |**

**tad bhinna-setūn adyāhaṁ śāsmi paśyata me balam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tat-tad-anantaram | ahaṁ śāsmi daṇḍayāmi ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yadyapy utpatha-śāstā kṛṣṇo'dhunā pratyakṣo nāsti, tathāpi tadīyatvād aham eva daṇḍayāmīty āha—kṛṣṇe iti ||35||

 **...**

|| 1.18.36 ||

**ity uktvā roṣa-tāmrākṣo vayasyān ṛṣi-bālakān**[^156]** |**

**kauśiky-āpa upaspṛśya vāg-vajraṁ visasarja ha ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **kauśikī kuśa-pāṇiḥ ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **iti **vayasyān uktvā roṣeṇa tāmre akṣiṇī** yasya saḥ | **kauśikī** nadī tasyā **apaḥ** | sandhir ārṣaḥ | vāg-vajraṁ śāpam ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **vayasyān uktvā | **kauśikyāpa** iti sandhir ārṣaḥ ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **vayasyān ity uktvā kośikyā apa upaspaśyācamya | sandhir ārṣaḥ ||36||

 **...**

|| 1.18.37 ||

**iti laṅghita-maryādaṁ takṣakaḥ saptame’hani |**

**daṅkṣyati sma kulāṅgāraṁ codito me tata-druham ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **ity evaṁ sarpa-nikṣepeṇa | daṅkṣyati bhakṣayiṣyati | pāṭhāntare[^157] bhasmī-kariṣyati |smeti pāda-pūraṇe | kulasyāṅgāra-tulyam | me mayā | tateti hrasvatvam ārṣam ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **iti yato mat-pitur dehe mṛta-sarpo nikṣiptas tasmāj jīvann eva sarpa-śreṣṭhas takṣakas taṁ daṅkṣyati bhakṣayiṣyati | dhakṣyatīti pāṭhe bhasmī-kariṣyati | me mayā preritaḥ | tata-druhaṁ tāta-druham ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **iti yo mat-pitur gale mṛtorago nikṣiptaḥ, sa eva jīvan takṣako bhūtvā | taṁ kulāṅgāraṁ rājānaṁ dhakṣyati bhasmīkariṣyati, smeti pādapūrtau ||37||

 **...**

|| 1.18.38 ||

**tato’bhyetyāśramaṁ bālo gale sarpa-kalevaram |**

**pitaraṁ vīkṣya duḥkhārto mukta-kaṇṭho ruroda ha ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā), jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **gale ity aluk samāsaḥ ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **gale-sarpety aluk samāsaḥ ||38–39||

 **...**

|| 1.18.39 ||

**sa vā āṅgiraso brahman śrutvā suta-vilāpanam |**

**unmīlya śanakair netre dṛṣṭvā cāṁse mṛtoragam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **gale sarpa-kalevaraṁ yasety ulk-samāsaḥ | mukta-kaṇṭhaḥ uccair ity arthaḥ ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

 **...**

|| 1.18.40 ||

**visṛjya putraṁ papraccha**[^158]** vatsa kasmād dhi rodiṣi | \
kena vā te’pratikṛtam**[^159]** ity uktaḥ sa nyavedayat ||40||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **taṁ sarpaṁ visṛjya | kenopakāraḥ kṛtaḥ ||40||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **visṛjya sarpaṁ svāṁsādapanīya ||40||

 **...**

|| 1.18.41 ||

**niśamya śaptam atad-arhaṁ narendraṁ **

**sa brāhmaṇo nātmajam abhyanandat |**

**aho batāṁho mahad adya te kṛtaṁ **

**alpīyasi droha urur damo dhṛtaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **anabhinanadana-vākyam aho ity-ādi | bata kaṣṭham | te tvayā mahat pāpaṁ kṛtam | drohe aparādhe | damo daṇḍaḥ ||41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **atad-arhaṁ śāpāyogyam | anabhinandana-vākyam āha—aho iti | damo daṇḍaḥ ||41||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **atad arhaṁ śāpāyogyam | anabhinandana-prakāram āha—ahovatety atikhede | are ajña! tvayā mahad aṁhaḥ pāpaṁ kṛtaṁ yad alpīyasyaty alpe drohe'parādhe ururmahān daṇḍo dhṛto'rpitaḥ ||41||

 **...**

|| 1.18.42 ||

**na vai nṛbhir nara-devaṁ parākhyaṁ **

**sammātum arhasy avipakva-buddhe |**

**yat-tejasā durviṣaheṇa guptā **

**vindanti bhadrāṇy akutobhayāḥ prajāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **paro viṣṇur ity ākhyā khyātir yasya taṁ nara-devam | nṛbhiḥ saṁmātuṁ samaṁ draṣṭum ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **paro viṣṇur ity ākhyā khyātir yasya taṁ nṛbhiḥ saṁmātuṁ samaṁ draṣṭum ||42||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **he apakvabuddhe! paro viṣṇur ity ākhyā yasya taṁ viṣṇvoviṣṭa-nara-devaṁ saṁ-mātum anya-narais tulyaṁ draṣṭum arhasi, tathā sa na draṣṭavya ity arthaḥ | kuta ity atrāha—yat-tejaseti ||42||

 **...**

|| 1.18.43 ||

**alakṣyamāṇe nara-deva-nāmni **

**rathāṅga-pāṇāv ayam aṅga lokaḥ |**

**tadā hi caura-pracuro vinaṅkṣyaty **

**arakṣyamāṇo’vivarūthavat kṣaṇāt ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** alakṣyamāno’dṛśyamāne | avivarūthavan meṣa-saṅghavat ||43||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **alakṣyeti _| _tadā hi tadaivety arthaḥ ||43||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** alakṣyamāṇe adṛśyamāne | avivarūthavat meṣā-saṅghavat ||43||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **alakṣyamāṇe'dṛśyamāne sati | avi-varūthavat meṣa-samūhavat ||43||

 **...**

|| 1.18.44 ||

**tad adya naḥ pāpam upaity ananvayaṁ **

**yan naṣṭa-nāthasya vasor vilumpakāt |**

**parasparaṁ ghnanti śapanti vṛñjate **

**paśūn striyo’rthān puru-dasyavo janāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : naṣṭonātho** yasya lokasya tasya **vasor** vasuno dhanasya **vilumpakād** apahartuś corāder hetor yat **pāpaṁ** bhaviṣyati tad asmān nimittatvād asmān upaiṣyati | **ananvayaṁ** saṁbandha-śūnyam eva | tad eva pāpaṁ darśayati—parasparam iti | **śapanti** paruṣaṁ vadanti | paśv-ādīn **vṛñjate**’paharanti | **puru-dasyavaś** cora-bahulāḥ ||44||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : naṣṭo nātho** yasya tasya lokasya **vasor** vasuno dhanasya **vilumpakād** apahartuś caurād dhetor yat **pāpaṁ** bhaviṣyati tad asman-nimittatvād asmān upaiṣyati | **ananvayaṁ **sambandha-śūnyam eva | tad eva pāpaṁ darśayati—parasparam iti | viśeṣam āha—**vṛñjate** apaharanti ||44||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **naṣṭau nātho yasya tasya lokasya vasor vasuno dhanasya vilumpakād apahartuś caurād-dhetor yat pāpaṁ syāt-tatto'sman upaiti, asmad-dhetukatvād aṣmān āgataṁ viddhīty arthaḥ | ananvayaṁ sākṣāt-sambandha-śūnyaṁ pāpam āha—purudasyavaḥ pracura-caurā janāḥ parasparaṁ ghnantīty-ādi śapanti niṣṭhuraṁ bhāṣambhe, bṛñjate'paharanti ||44||

 **...**

|| 1.18.45 ||

**tadārya-dharmaḥ pravilīyate nṛṇāṁ **

**varṇāśramācāra-yutas trayīmayaḥ |**

**tato’rtha-kāmābhiniveśitātmanāṁ **

**śunāṁ kapīnām iva varṇa-saṅkaraḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **ārya-dharmaḥ sadācāraḥ | śunāṁ kapīnām ivārtha-kāmayor evābhiniveśita-cittānām ||45||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **ārya-dharmaḥ sadācāraḥ ||45||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **āryadharmaḥ sadācāraḥ ||45||

**...**

|| 1.18.46 ||

**dharma-pālo nara-patiḥ sa tu samrāḍ bṛhac-chravāḥ |**

**sākṣān mahā-bhāgavato rājarṣir haya-medhayāṭ |**

**kṣut-tṛṭ-śrama-yuto dīno naivāsmac-chāpam arhati ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **evaṁ rāja-mātrasya śāpānarhatvam uktvā prastutaṁ viśeṣam āha—dharma-pāla iti sārdhena | **haya-medha-yāḍ** aśvamedha-yājī | nanv evaṁ-bhūtaś cet tat kuto’pakṛtavāṁs tatrāha—kṣut-tṛḍ iti | svāgata-praśnābhāvenāvajñātaḥ pratyuta śāpaṁ katham arhatīty arthaḥ ||46||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **dharma-pāla iti | vyavahārato’pi mahān ity āha—hayamedhayāḍ iti ||46||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **evaṁ rāja-mātrasya śāpānarhatvam uktvā prastute’tiviśeṣam āha—dharma-pāla iti ||46||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **evaṁ nṛpa-mātrasya pāpān arhatām abhidhāya prastute'tiviśeṣam āha—dharmeti sārdhakena ||46||

 **...**

|| 1.18.47 ||

**apāpeṣu sva-bhṛtyeṣu bālenāpakva-buddhinā |**

**pāpaṁ kṛtaṁ tad bhagavān sarvātmā kṣantum arhati ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **asya mahā-pāpasyānyat prāyaścittam adṛṣṭvā pāpam āvedayan bhagavantaṁ prārthayate—apāpeṣv iti ||47||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **sarvātmeti | atra mahato’pi tad-ātmakatvāt tad-dvārā kṣamāpaṇaṁ yuktam evety arthaḥ ||47||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **etad-bhaktāpacāra-lakṣaṇaṁ mahat pāpaṁ durbodha-vidhitsitaḥ kṛṣṇaś cet kṣameta, tadāsmākaṁ nistāro, nānyathety āha—apāpeṣv iti | bhṛtyeṣu sevakeṣu sarvātmāsmākaṁ ca hṛdvartī ||47||

 **...**

|| 1.18.48 ||

**tiraskṛtā vipralabdhāḥ śaptāḥ kṣiptā hatā api |**

**nāsya tat pratikurvanti tad-bhaktāḥ prabhavo’pi hi ||**

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **rājā cet pratiśāpaṁ dadyāt tarhi niṣkṛtir bhaved api tat tu na saṁbhavati tasya mahā-bhāgavatatvād ity āha | tiras-kṛtā ninditāḥ | vipralabdhāḥ vañcitāḥ | kṣiptā avajñātāḥ | hatās tāḍitāḥ | asya tiras-kārādi-kartuḥ | na tat pratīkāraṁ kurvanti | tad-bhaktā viṣṇu-bhaktāḥ | prabhavaḥ samarthā api ||48||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **rājā cet pratiśāpaṁ dadyāt tarhi niṣkṛtir bhaved api tat tu na sambhavati tasya mahā-bhāgavatatvād ity āha—tiraskṛtā ninditāḥ | vipralabdhā vañcitāḥ | kṣiptā avajñātāḥ | hatās tāḍitāḥ | prabhavaḥ samarthā api | asya tiraskārādi-kartur na tat-pratīkāraṁ kurvanti ||48||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **parīkṣic-ced asmabhyaṁ śapet-tadā tan-niṣkṛtiḥ syāc ca tasya bhaktatvān na sambhavatīty āha—tiraskṛta ninditāḥ vipra-labdhā vañcitāḥ kṣiptā avajñātāḥ hatās tāḍitāś cāpi tad-bhaktā asya tiraskārādi-kartur na pratikurvanti ||48||

 **...**

|| 1.18.49 ||

**iti putra-kṛtāghena so’nutapto mahā-muniḥ |**

**svayaṁ viprakṛto rājñā naivāghaṁ tad acintayat ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **viprakṛto’pakṛtaḥ | agham aparādham ||49||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yad viprakṛtas tiraskṛtas tat tiraskaraṇe agham aparādhaṁ na abhāvayat ||49||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **viprakṛto'pakṛtaḥ nācintayat nāmanyata ||49||

 **...**

|| 1.18.50 ||

**prāyaśaḥ sādhavo loke parair dvandveṣu yojitāḥ |**

**na vyathanti na hṛṣyanti yata ātmāguṇāśrayaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **yuktaṁ caitad ity āha—prāyaśa iti | dvandveṣu sukha-duḥkhādiṣu | aguṇāśrayaḥ sukha-duḥkhādy-āśrayo na bhavati ||50||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yuktaṁ caitad ity āha—prāyaśa iti | dvandveṣu sukha-duḥkhādiṣu | aguṇāśrayaḥ prākṛta-sukha-duḥkhādy-āśrayo na bhavati ||50||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yuktañcaitad ity āha—prāyaśa iti | dvandveṣu sukha-duḥkhādiṣu yata ātmā jīvo'guṇāśrayas tattvato dvandvāśrayo na bhavatīti ||50||

 \
iti śrī-vaiṣṇavānandinyāṁ  prathama-skandha-ṭippanyāmaṣṭādaśo'dhyāyaḥ ||18||

**...**

iti śrīmad-bhāgavate mahā-purāṇe prathama-skandhe

vipra-śāpopalambhanaṁ nāma

aṣṭādaśo’dhyāyaḥ

||18||

**...**

 (1.19)


## athonaviṁśatitamo’dhyāyaḥ


### parīkṣito gaṅgā-taṭe prāyopaveśanam, ṛṣi-samāgamaḥ, śukāgamanam, rājñaḥ praśnaś ca |

|| 1.19.1 ||

**sūta uvāca—**

**mahī-patis tv atha tat-karma garhyaṁ**

**vicintayann ātma-kṛtaṁ sudurmanāḥ|**

**aho mayā nīcam anārya-vat kṛtaṁ**

**nirāgasi brahmaṇi gūḍha-tejasi ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :**

prāyopaviṣṭe gaṅgāyāṁ rājñi yogi-janāvṛte | \
śukasyāgamanaṁ tatra proktam ekonaviṁśake ||

sva-kṛtaṁ tat-karma muni-skandhe sarpa-prakṣepaṇaṁ garhyaṁ nindyaṁ cintayan sudurmanā jātaḥ | cintām evāha sādhārbhyām—aho iti | nīcaṁ pāpam | amīvam iti pāṭhe sa evārthaḥ | brahmaṇi brāhmaṇe | gūḍaṁ guptaṁ tejo yasya tasmin || ||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :**

rājānutapya nirvidya kṛte prāyopaveśane |

ūnaviṁśe munīndrāṇāṁ sadasi śrī-śukāgamaḥ ||

atha sva-gṛhāgamana-kāle eva sudurrmanā abhūt | cintām āha sārdhaṁ dvābhyām | nīcaṁ nindyaṁ karma | amīvam iti pāṭhe pāpam | brahmaṇi brāhmaṇe ||1||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) :**

nṛpe'nutapya nirvidya prāya-bhṛtyūnaviṁśake | \
ājagmur munayas tatra tataḥ śrī-bādarāyaṇiḥ || \


atha gṛhāgama-kāle eva rājñaś cintām āha—mahīti sārdha-dvayena | tat-karma tad aṁse sarpa-nikṣepa-rūpaṁ garhyaṁ nindyaṁ, sudurmanā babhūveti śeṣaḥ ||1||

**...**

|| 1.19.2 ||

**dhruvaṁ tato me kṛta-deva-helanād**

**duratyayaṁ vyasanaṁ nāti-dīrghāt |**

**tad astu kāmaṁ hy agha-niṣkṛtāya me**

**yathā na kuryāṁ punar evam addhā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kṛtaṁ yad deva-helanam īśvarāvajñā-pāpam ity arthaḥ | tasmān me vyasanaṁ bhaviṣyati tat tu nātidīrghāt kālād acirād evāstu tatrāpy addhā sākṣān mamaiva na putrādi-dvāreṇeti prārthanā | kāmam asaṅkocataḥ | evaṁ prārthanāyāḥ prayojanam | aghasya niṣkṛtāya prāyaścittāya | yathā punar evaṁ na kuryām iti ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**sanātana gosvāmī (dig-darṣinī) :** **nātidīrghād** acirād **evāstu** tatrāpi **addhā** sākṣāt na putrādi-dvāreṇety asyārthaḥ ||2|| (bṛ.bhā. 2.1.30)

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **addhā sākṣāt devās tu, na tu putrādi-dvāreṇa ||2||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yad-brāhmaṇāvajñāna-rūpaṁ karma kṛtaṁ tad eva devasya harer helanaṁ tato hetor duratyayaṁ duṣpariharaṁ vyasanaṁ duḥkhaṁ nātidīrghād adhunaiva me bhaviṣyati | tad apy addhā sākṣād eva, na tu putrādi-dvārā, tad-vyasanaṁ me'gha-niṣkṛtāya kāmaṁ yatheṣṭam astu, yathā punar evam agham ahaṁ na kuryām ||2||

 **...**

|| 1.19.3 ||

**adyaiva rājyaṁ balam ṛddha-kośaṁ**

**prakopita-brahma-kulānalo me|**

**dahatv abhadrasya punar na me’bhūt**

**pāpīyasī dhīr dvija-deva-gobhyaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **evaṁ sākṣāt svasyaiva vyasanaṁ saṁprārthya tataḥ prāg eva kiṁcit prārthayate | adyaiva me rājyādi dahatu prakopitaṁ brahma-kulam evānalaḥ | punar dvijādīn pīḍayituṁ dhīr me mā bhūn na bhaved ity arthaḥ ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **adyaiveti | dahatu me mattaḥ sakāśād dagdhavad apayātv ity arthaḥ | rājyādāv apareṣāṁ dvijādīnāṁ sad-bhāvena tathābhipretum ayuktatvāt ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **dvija-devatā duḥkhayituṁ dhīr na me abhūt na bhavet ||3||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **vyasanaṁ sañcintya tataḥ pūrvaṁ tan-niṣkṛti prārthayate—prakopito brahma-kula-rūpo'nalo'dyaiva me rājyādīn dahatu | abhadrasya me punaḥ pāpīyasī dhīr na bhavet dvijādīn avajñātum ||3||

 **...**

|| 1.19.4 ||

**sa cintayann ittham athāśṛṇod yathā**

**muneḥ sutokto nirṛtis takṣakākhyaḥ|**

**sa sādhu mene na cireṇa takṣakā-**

**nalaṁ prasaktasya virakti-kāraṇam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **itthaṁ cintayan sa rājā muneḥ sutenoktaḥ saptame’hani nirṛtir mṛtyur yathā bhaviṣyati tathāśṛṇot | śamīka-preṣita-śiṣyāc chrutvā ca sa takṣakasya viṣāgniṁ sādhu mene | yato viṣayeṣu prasaktasya virakti-kāraṇam ||4||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **muneḥ sutenoktaḥ saptame’hani takṣakākhyo nirṛtir mṛtyur yathā bhaviṣyati tathā aśṛṇot—śamīka-preṣitāc chiṣyāt gaura-mukhāt | yathā—bho rājan ! ajñānena bālakena dattam abhiśāpaṁ śrutvā muhur anutaptas taṁ ca santarjyāsmad-guruḥ pratīkāram apaśyan | khidyan tvayi kāruṇya-pūrṇo māṁ prāhiṇot | rājā jñātvā para-lokārthaṁ kim api yatatām ity etad artham | ity uktvā gate tasmin rājā svāparādhaṁ kṣamayan tatra jigamiṣur api muner janiṣyamāṇaṁ lajjā-saṅkocādikaṁ svasya ca śāpāntān iccāṁ vicārya na jagāma | yataḥ sa takṣakasya viyāgniṁ sādhu mene | kīdṛśam ? viṣaye prayuktasya mama viṣakti-kāraṇam ||4||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **sa rājā itthaṁ cintayan muneḥ sutenoktaḥ saptame 'hani takṣakākhyo nirṛtir mṛtyur yathā bhaviṣyati, tathāśṛṇot | he rājan! matsuto bālastubhyam aśapat, sa mayā tiraskṛtaḥ, kintu tac-chāpasya durnivāratvāt-tvayā paralokopāyo vicāraṇīya iti śamīkena preṣitāc-chiṣyāt śrutavānity arthaḥ | sva-doṣa-kṣamaṇāya muner antikaṁ jigamiṣur api tasya saṅkocaṁ śāpa-mokṣaṇañcān icchan na jagāma, kintu na cireṇa śīghratayaiva tad-viṣāgniṁ sādhu mene, yato rājye prasaktasya svasya virakti-kāraṇam iti | yo māṁ kṛpālur brahmāstrānalād garbhe'rakṣat taṁ vismṛtya rājye saktaṁ māṁ dhig astu | tasmāt sarvaṁ vihāya tam eva sambhāvayiṣyānīti niradhārayad ity arthaḥ ||4||

 **...**

|| 1.19.5 ||

**atho vihāyemam amuṁ ca lokaṁ**

**vimarśitau heyatayā purastāt|**

**kṛṣṇāṅghri-sevām adhimanyamāna**

**upāviśat prāyam amartya-nadyām ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **atho anantaram ubhau lokau purastād rājya-madhya eva heyatayā vicāritau vihāya śrī-kṛṣṇāṅghri-sevām evādhimanyamānaḥ sarva-puruṣārthādikāṁ jānan prāyam anaśanaṁ tasminn ity arthaḥ | tat-saṅkalpenopaviśad iti yāvat | yad vā prāyaṁ prakṛṣṭam ayanaṁ śaraṇaṁ yathā bhavati tathā ||5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **imam āmuṁ ca lokaṁ vihāya | kutaḥ ? purastāt śāpāt pūrvam eva heyatayā ubhau vimarśitau vicāritau | ataḥ adhi sarva-puruṣārthādhikāṁ manyamānaḥ prāyam anaśanaṁ pratyupaviśat saṅkalpenopāviveśa ||5||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tadev āha—atho tad antaram eva imam amuṁ cobhau lokau purastāt śāpāt prāg eva heyatayā vimarśitau vihāya prāyam anaśanaṁ pratyupāviśat saṅkalpenopa viveśa | amartyanadyāṁ śrī-gaṅgāyāṁ | kīdṛśaḥ? kṛṣṇasyāṅghri-sevām evābhimanyamānaḥ sarva-pumartha-śiromaṇitvena jānan ||5||

 **...**

|| 1.19.6 ||

**yā vai lasac-chrī-tulasī-vimiśra-**

**kṛṣṇāṅghri-reṇv-abhyadhikāmbu-netrī|**

**punāti lokān ubhayatra seśān**

**kas tāṁ na seveta mariṣyamāṇaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **amartya-nadyām iti viśeṣaṇasya phalam āha | yā gaṅgā lasantī śrīr yasyās tulasyās tayā vimiśrā ye kṛṣṇāṅghri-reṇavas tair abhyadhikaṁ sarvotkṛṣṭaṁ yad ambu tasya netrī tad vāhinī | ubhayatra antar bahiś ca seśān loka-pālaiḥ sahitān lokān punāti | mariṣyamāṇa āsanna-maraṇaḥ | maraṇasyāniyata-kālatvād sarve’pi tathā | atas tāṁ ko na seveta ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **prāyopaveśaś cāyaṁ tasyām amartya-nadyām eva yuktaḥ | yatas tasyāṁ tad-abhīṣṭasya śrī-kṛṣṇasya sambandhaḥ sarveṣāṁ pāvanatvaṁ ca sphuṭaṁ dṛśyata ity āstāṁ tasya brāhmaṇāparādha-kalūṣa-bhītasya śrī-kṛṣṇasyāṅghri-sevām eva ca sarvādhika-puruṣārthatayā lipsor vārtā sarvasyāpi jīvasya tatrāpy āsanna-maraṇasya saivāśrayituṁ yogyety āha—yā vai iti | yā vai tādṛśatvena svayaṁ prasiddhāḥ | punar lasat-śriyas tadānīṁ pracuratayā vṛndāvana-jātā yās tulasyas tābhir vimiśrāḥ pūrvaṁ nimiśrī-bhūtā aikyaṁ prāptā yā vṛndāvana-sthitāḥ svayaṁ-bhagavataḥ śrī-kṛṣṇasyāṅghri-reṇavas tair abhyadhikaṁ yamunā-rūpam ambu | tasyāpi netrī voḍhrīty arthaḥ | abhyadhikatvaṁ coktam ādi-vārāhe—


    gaṅgā-śata-guṇā pūṇyā māthure mama maṇḍale |


    yamunā viśrutā devī nātra kāryā vicaraṇā || iti |

jala-pravāha-rūpā gaṅgā hy atra voḍhrī | bāhyaṁ ca tādṛg ambu | tato bhinām evopapadyata iti | netrīti sadaiva tan-nayanaṁ labhyata iti ca tathā vyākhyātam | kṛṣṇa-śabdaś ca rūḍhyā śrī-gopāla evādhikaṁ prasiddha iti tu tathā vyākhyātam eva | abhede hi tādṛg ambu-rūpety evāvakṣyad iti ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **amartya-nadyāṁ gaṅgāyām eva kutaḥ ? tatrāha—abhyadhikaṁ sarvotkṛṣṭaṁ yad ambu, tasya netrī tad-vāhinī | ubhayatra ūrdhvādho'ntar bahiś ca ||6||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nanv amartya-nadyām eva kutaḥ? tatrāha—yeti | tenābhy adhikaṁ nikhila-śreṣṭhaṁ yad ambu tan-netrī tadvāhinī | ubhayatra urddhvādho'ntarbahiś ca seśān sapālān lokān punāti, tāṁ mariṣyamāṇaḥ kona seveta apitu sarvaḥ svakalyāṇāya tām eva sevetety arthaḥ ||6||

 **...**

|| 1.19.7 ||

**iti vyavacchidya sa pāṇḍaveyaḥ**

**prāyopaveśaṁ prati viṣṇu-padyām|**

**dadhau mukundāṅghrim ananya-bhāvo**

**muni-vrato mukta-samasta-saṅgaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **ity evaṁ viṣṇu-padyāṁ gaṅgāyāṁ prāyopaveśaṁ prati vyavacchidya niścitya | pāṇḍaveya iti tat-kulaucityaṁ darśayati | nāsty anyasmin bhāvo yasya saḥ | kutaḥ ? muni-vrata upaśāntaḥ | tat kutaḥ ? muktaḥ samasta-saṅgo yena saḥ ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **kīdṛśaḥ san dadhyau ? tatrāha—mukteti ananyeti ca ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **vyavacchidya niścitya prāyopaveśaṁ prati lakṣīkṛtyety arthaḥ | na anyasmin karma-jñāna-devatāntare bhāvo yasya saḥ ||7||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **vyavacchidya vinirdhārghya prāyopaveśaṁ prati lakṣīkṛty ety arthaḥ | ananya-bhāvaḥ kṛṣṇaikaniṣṭhaḥ ||7||

 **...**

|| 1.19.8-10 ||

**tatropajagmur bhuvanaṁ punānā**

**mahānubhāvā munayaḥ sa-śiṣyāḥ |**

**prāyeṇa tīrthābhigamāpadeśaiḥ**

**svayaṁ hi tīrthāni punanti santaḥ ||**

**atrir vasiṣṭhaś cyavanaḥ śaradvān**

**ariṣṭanemir bhṛgur aṅgirāś ca |**

**parāśaro gādhi-suto’tha rāma**

**utathya indrapramadedhmavāhau ||**

**medhātithir devala ārṣṭiṣeṇo**

**bhāradvājo gautamaḥ pippalādaḥ |**

**maitreya aurvaḥ kavaṣaḥ kumbhayonir**

**dvaipāyano bhagavān nāradaś ca ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tatra tadā tad-darśanārthaṁ munaya upāgatā na tu tīrtha-snānārtham | kṛtārtha-tvāt | nanu tādṛśānām api tīrtha-yātrā dṛśyate tatrāha—prāyeṇeti | tīrtha-yātrā-vyājaiḥ ||8-10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tatreti sākṣāc chrī-bhagavat-pāda-sambandhīni gaṅgādīni vineti jñeyam | teṣū teṣām  api paramādarāt | kiṁ vā, utprekṣā-mātram idam, na tu teṣām  apy abhiprāyaḥ | tām evāha—prāyeṇeti ||8-10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tatra tadā tad-darśanārthaṁ munaya āgatāḥ, na tu tīrtha-snānārthaṁ kṛtārthatvāt | nanu, tādṛśānām api tīrtha-yātrā dṛśyate ? tatrāha—prāyeṇeti | tīrtha-yātrā-vyājaiḥ | tena tīrthebhyo’pi parīkṣito darśanaṁ te hy adhikaṁ gūḍhaṁ niranaiṣur iti bhāvaḥ | akasmād udbhūta-gati-svānandaṇyathānupapattyā sarvajñatayā bhāvi vṛttāntaṁ jñātvā śrī-bhāgavatāmṛta-pānārtham iti bhāvaḥ ||8-10||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tatra tadā tad-darśanāya munaya upa-jagmur na tu tīrtha-snānāya kṛtārthatvāt | nanu tādṛśānām api tīrthayātrā dṛṣṭā? tatrāha—prāyeṇeti | tīrthayātrāyā apadeśair vyājair iti | tena parīkṣito mahā-bhāgavatasya darśanaṁ tīrthebhyo'py adhikaṁ tair antar niścitam iti bhāvaḥ | akasmād adbhutena mahānandena bhāvi-śrī-bhāgavata-pārāyaṇam anumāya teṣām  āgamanam abhūd iti bodhyam ||8||

gādhi-suto viśvāmitraḥ, rāmo jāmadagnyaḥ, indra-pramadaś cen-mavāhaś ca tau ||9-10||

 **...**

|| 1.19.11 ||

**anye ca devarṣi-brahmarṣi-varyā**

**rājarṣi-varyā aruṇādayaś ca|**

**nānārṣeya-pravarān sametān**

**abhyarcya rājā śirasā vavande ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **aruṇādayaḥ kāṇḍarṣitva-viśeṣeṇa pṛthak nirdiṣṭāḥ | nānā yāny ārṣeyāṇi ṛṣīṇāṁ gotrāṇi teṣu pravarān śreṣṭhān | śirasā bhuvaṁ spṛṣṭvā vavande || ||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **aruṇodayaḥ kāṇḍarṣitva-viśeṣeṇa pṛthaṇ-nirdiṣṭāḥ ||11||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **nānā-bhūtānyārṣeyāṇi ṛṣi-gotrāṇi teṣu pravarān ||11||

 **...**

|| 1.19.12 ||

**sukhopaviṣṭeṣv atha teṣu bhūyaḥ**

**kṛta-praṇāmaḥ sva-cikīrṣitaṁ yat | **

**vijñāpayām āsa vivikta-cetā**

**upasthito’gre’bhigṛhīta-pāṇiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **vijñāpanārthaṁ punaḥ kṛta-praṇāmaḥ | viviktaṁ śuddhaṁ ceto yasya | abhigṛhītau saṁyojitau pāṇī yena saḥ | sva-cikīrṣitaṁ prāyopaveśenādi yuktam ayuktaṁ veti vijñāpayām āsa ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **vijñāpayāmāseti vakṣyamāṇam ity eva jñeyam ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **abhigṛhīta-pāṇiḥ kṛtāñjaliḥ ||12||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **vijñāpanārthaṁ bhūyaḥ kṛta-praṇāmaḥ | vivikta-cetāḥ śuddha-hṛt | abhigṛhītau yojitau pāṇī yena saḥ ||12||

 **...**

|| 1.19.13 ||

**rājovāca—**

**aho vayaṁ dhanyatamā nṛpāṇāṁ**

**mahattamānugrahaṇīya-śīlāḥ |**

**rājñāṁ kulaṁ brāhmaṇa-pāda-śaucād**

**dūrād visṛṣṭaṁ bata garhya-karma ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **anumodanenānugraham ālakṣyātmānaṁ ślāghate—aho iti | nṛpāṇāṁ madhye mahattamair anugrahaṇīyaṁ śīlaṁ vṛttaṁ yeṣāṁ te | etac ca rājñām atidurlabham ity āha | brāhmaṇānāṁ pāda-śaucāt pāda-kṣālanodakāt, dūrād ucchiṣṭa-viṇ-mūtra-pādāmbhāṁsi samutsṛjed iti smṛteḥ, dūre hi tais tad visṛjyate | tato’pi dūrād eva visṛṣṭaṁ kṣiptam | tatrāpi sthātum ayogyam ity arthaḥ | garhyaṁ karma yasyenty ātmānam uddiśyoktam ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **aho āścaryam | kim āścaryam ? tatrāha—nṛpāṇāṁ madhye vayaṁ pāṇḍavāḥ | mahattamānāṁ bhavatām anugrahaṁ śīlayanti ye svāyambhuvādayas tādṛśāḥ santo dhanyatamā jātā iti śeṣaḥ | svatas tu nṛpāṇāṁ kulam īdṛśam ity āha—rājñām iti | yato garhyaṁ karma hiṁsādi-lakṣaṇaṁ yasya tādṛśam iti ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **svasmin munīnāṁ svābhāvikam anugraham ālakṣyāha—aho iti | mahattamānām anugrahaṇīyam anugrahārhaṁ śīlaṁ yeṣāṁ te | etac ca rājñām atidurlabham ity āha—rājñām iti | dūrād ucchiṣṭa-viṇ-mūtra-pādāmbhāṁsi samutsṛjet iti smṛteḥ | āśramād dūra-stha-pāda-śauca-sthalād api ārād dūre rājñāṁ kulaṁ visṛṣṭam | tair brāhmaṇais tatrāpi sthātum annaujñānād ity arthaḥ | yato garhya-karma sarvato’py apavitram ||13||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **svasmin munīnām anugraham ālakṣyāha—aho iti | rājñāṁ madhye vayaṁ dhanyatamāḥ, yato mahat-tamānām anugrahaṇīyaṁ śīlaṁ yeṣāṁ te | mahad anugraho rājñāṁ durlabha ity āha—yato rājñāṁ kulaṁ brāhmaṇānāṁ pāda-śocāc caraṇa-prakṣālana-jalād ārād dūre tair visṛṣṭaṁ tyaktam | dūrād ucchiṣṭa-viṇ-mūtra-pādāmbhāṁsi samutsṛjet iti smaraṇāt | tatrāpi sthātum ayogyam ity arthaḥ | yato garhya karma sarvato'py aśuci ity arthaḥ | rājñas tathoktiḥ dainyād eva, anyathā rāja-kulena sa-brāhmaṇānāṁ vyavahārokteyo vyākupyeyuḥ ||13||

 **...**

|| 1.19.14 ||

**tasyaiva me’ghasya parāvareśo**

**vyāsakta-cittasya gṛheṣv abhīkṣṇam |**

**nirveda-mūlo dvija-śāpa-rūpo**

**yatra prasakto bhayam**[^160]** āśu dhatte ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **āstāṁ tāvad anugrahaḥ, brahma-śāpo’pi bhagavat-prasādād eva jāta ity āha—**tasya** garhya-karmaṇa eva | ato’**ghasya** pāpātmano **gṛheṣv āsakta-cittasya** **me** sva-prāptaye **parāvarāṇām īśa** eva **dvija-śāpatayā** babhūva | yatra yasmin śāpe sati gṛheṣu **prasakto bhayaṁ dhatte** nirviṇṇo bhavati | yato **nirveda-mūlo** nirvedo vairāgyaṁ mūlaṁ prāpti-kāraṇaṁ yasmin | svasya vairāgya-prāpyatvāt tasya ca bhaya-mūlatvāt, tad-arthaṁ dvija-śāpaṁ kāritavān ity arthaḥ ||14||

**digdarśinī** (bṛ.bhā. 2.1.29): tasyāyam arthaḥ—**tasya** gṛhya-karmaṇa eva ato'**ghasya** pāpātmanaḥ gṛheṣv **āsakta-cittasya** sva-prāptaye **parāvarāṇām īśaḥ** śrī-kṛṣṇa eva **dvija-śāpatayā** babhūva | **yatra** yasmin śāpesati **guheṣu prasakto** jano **bhayaṁ dhatte** nirviṇṇo bhavati | yato **nirveda-mūlaḥ** nirvedo vairāgyaṁ mūlaṁ prāpti-kāraṇaṁ yasmin, saḥ | svasya vairāgya-prāptatvāt tasya ca **bhaya**-mūlatvāt tad-arthaṁ **dvija-śāpaṁ** kāritavān iti ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **tatrāpīdam āścaryam ity āha—tasyaiveti | bhagavad-anugraha-śīlānāṁ vaṁśe gaṇanīyasyāpi **me** mama **abhīkṣṇaṁ gṛheṣu vyāsakta-cittasya**, tatrāpy aghasya tādṛśa-brāhmaṇāparādha-kartuḥ | **parāvareśas** tu nūnaṁ bhagavad-anugṛhīta-vaṁśajo’yam ity āmṛśya svayaṁ **dvija-śāpa-rūpas** tad-apadeśaḥ san **nirvedo**’nyatrānāsaṅga eva **mūlam** avaṣṭambhako yasya svasminn āsaṅgasya tad-rūpo’bhavat | tarhi kiṁ syāt ? tatrāha—**yatra parāvareśe prasaktaḥ** **śīghram** eva **abhayaṁ** tac-caraṇāravinda-prāptyā bhayābhāvaṁ **dhatte**—martyo mṛtyu-vyāla-bhītaḥ palāyan [bhā.pu. 10.3.21] ity-ādeḥ | ato’kasmād bhavatām apy āgamanaṁ tat-preraṇayaiva jātam iti bhāvaḥ | vakṣyate ca śrī-śukadevam upalakṣya—api me bhagavān prītaḥ [bhā.pu. 1.19.35-36] ity-ādi dvābhyām ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tasyaiva garhya-karmaṇo mama, tatrāpi aghasya, brāhmaṇa-gale sarpa-niḥkṣepeṇa avamānanāt | evaṁ patita-pāvanatva-khyāpanārthaṁ parāvareśo bhagavān eva dvija-śāpa-rūpaḥ san mat-pārśvam āgataḥ | nirveda-mūlaḥ nirvedasya mūlaṁ kāraṇam ity arthaḥ | puṁstvam ārṣam | bhavad-vidha-mahat-samāgamād anumīyate | yatra bhagavān āyāti tatraiva tad-tad-bhaktāḥ svata evāyāntīty arthaḥ | yatra parāvareśe prasakta āsakto jana āśu śīghram evābhayaṁ bhayābhāvaṁ dhatte ||14||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tasyaiva garhya-karmaṇas tatrāpi brāhmaṇa-kaṇṭha-nikṣipta-mṛtoragatvāt aghasya pāpātmano me dvija -śāpa-rūpaḥ san parāvareśaḥ kṛṣṇa eva patita-pāvanatva-khyāpanāyāntikam āgato yuṣmākaṁ tad-bhaktānām āgamanād anumitaḥ | yatra parāvareśe prasakto jana āśu śīghram abhayaṁ dhatte ||14||

 **...**

|| 1.19.15 ||

**taṁ mopayātaṁ pratiyantu viprā**

**gaṅgā ca devī dhṛta-cittam īśe |**

**dvijopasṛṣṭaḥ kuhakas takṣako vā**

**daśatv alaṁ gāyata viṣṇu-gāthāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tān prārthayate—tam iti dvābhyām | **taṁ mā** mām **upayātaṁ** śaraṇāgataṁ **pratiyantu** jānantu | **devī** devatā-rūpā **gaṅgā** ca pratyetu | **vā**-śabdaḥ pratikriyānādare | **gāthāḥ** kathāḥ ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **pratiyantu aṅgīkurvantu | tata eva hetor īśedhṛta-cittaṁ santaṁ māṅgaṅgā-devī cāṅgīkarotu ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tān prārthayate dvābhyām | **taṁ mā** mām | **upayātaṁ** śaraṇāgataṁ **pratiyantu** jānantu | **devī** devatā-rūpā **gaṅgā** ca pratyetu | **vā**-śabdaḥ pratikriye’nādare | **gāthāḥ** kathāḥ ||15||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **munīn prārthayate dvābhyāṁ—he viprāḥ! taṁ mām upayātaṁ śaraṇāgataṁ bhavantaḥ pratiyantu, gaṅgā-devī ca pratyetu, kuhakaḥ kapaṭa-rūpaḥ ||15||

**...**

**|| 1.19.16 ||**

**punaś ca bhūyād bhagavaty anante**

**ratiḥ prasaṅgaś ca tad-āśrayeṣu |**

**mahatsu yāṁ yām upayāmi sṛṣṭiṁ**

**maitry astu sarvatra namo dvijebhyaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **sa **āśrayo** yeṣāṁ teṣu **pra**kṛṣṭaḥ **saṅgo bhūyāt** | tasyāṁ tasyāṁ sṛṣṭau janmani ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**kaivalya-dīpikā :** **punaś ceti** | evaṁ jīvanmuktaṁ lakṣayitvā tan-māhātmyaṁ bruvāṇaḥ, tat-saṅginaḥ puruṣān stauti—**punaś ca** iti | **punar** janmāntare **tad-āśrayeṣu** bhagavad-āśrayeṣu | **pra**kṛṣṭa-**saṅgo** **yāṁ yāṁ sṛṣṭim upayāmi,** tatra tatra  mahat-saṅgo **bhūyāt** | taj-janma-viśeṣaṁ prārthayan **namo dvijebhyaḥ** iti puraḥ-sthitān ṛṣīn rājānam api ||16|| [mu.pha. 19.41]

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : sṛṣṭiṁ** janma | anyatra **sarvatra** tu **maitrī** aviṣamā-dṛṣṭir **astu** | brāhmaṇeṣu tv ādara-viśeṣo’stv ity āha—nama iti ||16|| (prīti-sandarbha 44)

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : punaś ca** punar api | **yāṁ yāṁ sṛṣṭiṁ** janma prāpnomi, tasyāṁ **bhagavati ratiḥ** | tad-bhakteṣu **pra**kṛṣṭaḥ **saṅgaḥ** | sarva-jīveṣu **maitrī** iti mad-vāñchita-trayaṁ bhūyāt iti prārthya praṇamann āha—nama iti | yad vā, brāhmaṇān ādara-jātānutāpa āha—**brāhmaṇebhyo namo bhūyād** iti vāñchita-catuṣṭayaṁ ca ||16||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **punaś ca punar api yāṁ yāṁ sṛṣṭiṁ janmopayāmi, tasyāṁ tasyām anante bhagavati vatir me bhūyāt-tad āśrayeṣu mahatsu prasaṅgaś ca, sarvatra maitrī ceti trayaṁ prārthya namaskaroti nama iti ||16||

 **...**

|| 1.19.17 ||

**iti sma rājādhyavasāya-yuktaḥ**

**prācīna-mūleṣu kuśeṣu dhīraḥ |**

**udaṅ-mukho dakṣiṇa-kūla āste**

**samudra-patnyāḥ sva-suta-nyasta-bhāraḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **gaṅgāyām udaka eva kiñcid dakṣiṇa-bhāge prasāde tathā hi mahābhārate ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **adhyavasāyo niścayaḥ | **prācīnāni** prāg-agrāṇi **mūlāni** yeṣāṁ, teṣu prāg-agreṣu **kuśeṣvāste** sma | **sva-sute** jamanejaye **nyasto bhāro** rājyaṁ yena saḥ ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : mūlam** antaḥ | antaś cāgre’pi _| _tasmāl lakṣaṇayā _prāg-agreṣv_ ity evaṁ vyākhyātam ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** samudra-patnyā gaṅgāyāḥ ||17||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **ity evam adhyavasāyena yukto rājā samudra-patnyāḥ śrī-gaṅgāyāḥ, svasute janamejaye nyasto rājya-bhāro yena saḥ āste sma ||17||

 **...**

|| 1.19.18 ||

**evaṁ ca tasmin nara-deva-deve**

**prāyopaviṣṭe divi deva-saṅghāḥ |**

**praśasya bhūmau vyakiran prasūnair**

**mudā muhur dundubhayaś ca neduḥ ||**

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** mudā vyakiran | deva-saṅghair vāditā dundubhayo neduḥ ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **prasūnaiḥ prasūnānīty arthaḥ ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : vyakiran** vṛṣṭim akurvan | **neduḥ** svayam eva ||18||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **praśasya prāyopaveśaṁ saṁstūya, vyakiran vṛṣṭim akurvan neduḥ svayam eva ||18||

 **...**

|| 1.19.19 ||

**maharṣayo vai samupāgatā ye**

**praśasya sādhv ity anumodamānāḥ |**

**ūcuḥ prajānugraha-śīla-sārā**

**yad uttama-śloka-guṇābhirūpam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** prajānugrahe śīlaṁ svabhāvaḥ sāro balaṁ ca yeṣām  | uttama-śloka-guṇair abhirūpaṁ sundaram iva ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _sundaram iva _**iti ṭīkāyām iva-śabdo vākyālaṅkāraḥ ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : yad** yataḥ | **prajānugraheśīlaṁ sāro** balaṁ ca yeṣāṁ te | tasmāt **uttamaḥ-ślokasya** śrī-kṛṣṇasyeva **guṇair abhirūpaṁ** sundaraṁ rājānam ūcuḥ | yad vā, **yad** uttamaḥ-śloka-guṇānurūpaṁ bhavet, tad eva ūcuḥ ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **maharṣayaś ca deva-kṛtaṁ rājñaḥ pūjanaṁ sādhv iti praśasyānumodamānaḥ | santaḥ uttamaḥ-ślokasya guṇānurūpaṁ yat syāt-tad evocuḥ | kīdṛśāḥ? prajānugrahe śīlaṁ sāro balaṁ ca yeṣāṁ te ||19||

 **...**

|| 1.19.20 ||

**na vā idaṁ rājarṣi-varya citraṁ**

**bhavatsu kṛṣṇaṁ samanuvrateṣu |**

**ye’dhyāsanaṁ rāja-kirīṭa-juṣṭaṁ**
