**sadyo jahur bhagavat-pārśva-kāmāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : bhavatsu** pāṇḍor vaṁśyeṣu | **yejahur** iti yudhiṣṭhirādy-abhiprāyeṇa ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : bhagavat-pārśva-kāmā** ity atra tat-sāmīpya-kāmanāpi vyākhyeyā | tat-prīti-viśeṣātiśayavatāṁ hi teṣāṁ tat-kṛtārti-bhareṇaiva tat-sphūrtāv apy atṛptau satyāṁ tat-sāmīpya-prāpteś ca tat-prāpti-vighātaka-saṁsāra-bandhana-troṭanasya ca prārthanaṁ dṛśyate, pitṛ-mātṛ-prīty-eka-sukhināṁ vidūra-bandhānāṁ bālakānām iva | evam evoktaṁ śrī-prahlādena—trasto’smy ahaṁ kṛpaṇa-vatsala [bhā.pu. 7.9.16] ity ādau, te’ṅghri-mūlaṁ prīto’pavarga-śaraṇaṁ hvayase kadā nu iti ||20||

**kṛṣṇa-sandarbhaḥ** (47): **bhavatsu** pāṇḍor vaṁśyeṣu **ye jahur** iti śrī-yudhiṣṭhirādy-abhiprāyeṇa | ata eva tatra sthitānāṁ sarva-śrotṝṇām api śrī-kṛṣṇa eva tātparyam āyāti ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **ye yudhiṣṭhirādyāḥ ||20||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **bhavatsu bhārateṣu tatrāpi kṛṣṇaṁ samanuvrateṣu pāṇḍaveṣu yudhiṣṭhirādiṣu ||20||

 **...**

|| 1.19.21 ||

**sarve vayaṁ tāvad ihāsmahe’tha**

**kalevaraṁ yāvad asau vihāya |**

**lokaṁ paraṁ virajaskaṁ viśokaṁ**

**yāsyaty ayaṁ bhāgavata-pradhānaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **parasparaṁ saṁmantryante—sarva iti | **paraṁ** śreṣṭhaṁ lokam | tatra hetuḥ—**virajaskaṁ** nirmāyaṁ **viśokaṁ** ca yāsyatīti | kulas tatrāha—ayam iti ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **loka-śabdena cātra nānyal lakṣyate, bhagavat-pārśva-kāmā [bhā.pu. 1.19.20] iti teṣām  evokti-svārasyāt | **bhāgavata-pradhāna** iti ca | tasmād ante ced brahma-kaivalyaṁ manyate, tathāpi krama-bhagavat-prāpti-rītyā tad-anantaraṁ bhagavat-prāptis tv avaśyaṁ manyetaiva | yathājāmilasya darśitam ||21|| [prīti-sandarbha 53]

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **rājño’dhyavasāyaṁ śrutvā sveṣām apy adhyavasāyaṁ rājānaṁ śrāvayantaḥ parasparaṁ mantrayante—sarve iti ||21||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **munayo rājño'dhyavasāyaṁ paśyantaḥ sveṣāṁ ca tat-poṣakaṁ taṁ śrāvayanto mitho mantrayante—sarve vayam iti ||21||

 **...**

|| 1.19.22 ||

**āśrutya tad ṛṣi-gaṇa-vacaḥ parīkṣit**

**samaṁ madhu-cyud guru cāvyalīkam |**

**ābhāṣatainān abhinandya yuktān**

**śuśrūṣamāṇaś caritāni viṣṇoḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **āśrutyākarṇya | samaṁ pakṣa-pāta-śūnyam | madhu-cyud amṛta-srāvi | guru gambhīrārtham | avyalīkaṁ satyam ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **madhucyut manohara-śabdam | guru mahatārthena prayuktam ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **samaṁ pakṣapāta-śūnyaṁ vayam āsmahe iti | madhu-cyud amṛta-srāvi—bhāgavata-pradhāna iti | guru gambhīrārtham | virajaskaṁ lokam iti | avyalīkaṁ satyaṁ lokaṁ yāsyatīti ṛṣi-gaṇa-vacaś catuṣṭayam āśrutya | virajaskaṁ lokaṁ bhagaval-lokam eveti pūrva-ślokoktābhyāṁ bhavatsv iti bhagavat-pārśva-kāmā iti padābhyāṁ vyākhyeyam ||22||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **samaṁ vayam iha tāvad āsmahe ity evaṁ pakṣapāta-rahitaṁ | madhucyut bhāgavata-pradhāna ity amṛta-srāvi | guru-virajaskaṁ lokam iti gambhīrārthakam | avyalīkaṁ yāsyatyayam iti satyam ity evaṁ catuṣṭayam ṛṣi-gaṇa-vacaḥ āśrutya parīkṣid etān-ṛṣīnābhāṣata ||22||

 **...**

|| 1.19.23 ||

**samāgatāḥ sarvata eva sarve**

**vedā yathā mūrti-dharās tri-pṛṣṭhe |**

**nehātha nāmutra ca kaścanārtha**

**ṛte parānugraham ātma-śīlam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **trayāṇāṁ lokānāṁ pṛṣṭhe upari satya-loke vedā yathā mūrti-dharā bhavanti, tat-tulyāḥ | jñānātiśayam uktvā kṛpālutām āha—neheti | bhavatāṁ prayojanaṁ parānugrahaṁ vinā nāsti | tarhi sa evārthaḥ syāt ? na, ātma-śīlaṁ sva-svabhāvam ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **arthaḥ prārthanīyaṁ vastu | parānugrahaś ca na vicāra-pūrvaka ity āha—ātma-śīlam iti ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **trayāṇāṁ lokānām upari pṛṣṭhe satya-loke | jñānātiśayatām uktvā kṛpālutātiśayatām āha—neheti | parānugrahaṁ vinā | tarhi sa evārthaḥ syāt ? na, ātma-śīlaṁ sva-svabhāvam ||23||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **eyāṇāṁ lokānāṁ pṛṣṭhe upari satya-loke yathā vedā mūrti-dharās tathā tat-tulyā bhavantaḥ | jñānātiśayam uktvā dayālutām āha—neheti | tarhi parānugraha evārthaḥ syāt-tatrāha—ātma-śīlaṁ svabhāvaḥ ||23||

 **...**

|| 1.19.24 ||

**tataś ca vaḥ pṛcchyam imaṁ vipṛcche**

**viśrabhya viprā iti-kṛtyatāyām |**

**sarvātmanā mriyamāṇaiś ca kṛtyaṁ**

**śuddhaṁ ca tatrāmṛśatābhiyuktāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** pṛcchyaṁ praṣṭavyam | viśrabhya viśvāsaṁ kṛtvā | evaṁ kartavyam ity asya bhāva iti-kṛtyatā tasmin viṣaye | sarvātmanā sarvāvasthāsu yat kṛtyaṁ, viśeṣataś ca mriyamāṇais tac ca śuddhaṁ pāpa-saṁparka-rahitam āmṛśata vicārayata ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **viśrabhyeti, kṛṣṇāṅghri-sevām evaita upadekṣyantīty abhiprāyāt | śuddham iti kaniṣṭha-madhyama-sādhana-miśratā-rahitaṁ sarvottamam ity arthaḥ | tac ca kṛṣṇāṅghri-sevā-rūpam eveti gūḍho’bhiprāyaḥ ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **imaṁ vo yuṣmākam apy anugrahaṁ vipṛcche—kim-ākāraḥ sa cikīrṣitavya iti pṛcchāmi | pṛcchyaṁ praṣṭum arham, tatraivādhyavasāyārtham iti bhāvaḥ | viśrabhya tatraiva me viśvāso bhāvīti jānīteti bhāvaḥ | itikṛtyā evaṁ kartavyās tapo-yoga-jñānādayas teṣāṁ bhāva iti-kṛtyatā | tasyāṁ satyāṁ mriyamāṇair janais tapo-yogādīnām evaṁ-kartavyatve sati sarvātmanā mama yatra śuddhaṁ kṛtyam, atra āmṛṣata vicārayata—sarvaika-vākyatayā niścitya kartum ājñāpayateti bhāvaḥ ||24||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **imaṁ vo'nugrahaṁ vipṛcche, kīdṛśaḥ sa mayi cikīrṣitavya iti vipṛcchāmi | pṛcchyaṁ tatraivādhyavasāyārthaṁ praṣṭuṁ yogyam ity arthaḥ | viśrabhya tatraiva me viśvāso bhāvīti bodhyam ity arthaḥ | iti kṛtyā evaṁ karma-tapo-yogādayaḥ kāryās teṣāṁ bhāva iti-kṛtyatā tasyāṁ viṣaye sarvātmanā sarvāsvavasthāsu yat kṛtyaṁ viśeṣato mriyamāṇaiś ca yat, tac ca śuddhaṁ hiṁsā-śūnyam āmṛśata vicārayata | sarvaikamatyā niścityānuṣṭhātum ājñāpayeteti bhāvaḥ ||24||

 **...**

|| 1.19.25 ||

**tatrābhavad bhagavān vyāsa-putro**

**yadṛcchayā gām aṭamāno’napekṣaḥ |**

**alakṣya-liṅgo nija-lābha-tuṣṭo**

**vṛtaś ca bālair avadhūta-veṣaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) :** ** **tatra teṣu yāga-yoga-tapo-dānādibhir vivadamāneṣu satsu yadṛcchayā gāṁ paryaṭan vyāsa-putras tatrābhavat prāptaḥ | na lakṣyam āśramādi-liṅgaṁ yasya | avadhūto’vajñayā janais tyakto yas tasyeva veṣo yasya saḥ ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tatra yāga-yoga-tapo-dānādi-vyavasthāsv aikamatyābhāvena sarveṣu muniṣu tadaiva sva-sva-manasā śrī-śukāgamanam īhamāneṣu netraiś ca tad-vartma-nirīkṣamāṇeṣu satsu, vyāsa-putras tatrābhavat prāptaḥ ||25||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tatra kim asyopadeśyam ity alabdhaikamatye sarva-sārajñaḥ śukaś ced āgacchet tad enam upadiśet, asmākaṁ ca tac-chravaṇena parānandaḥ syād iti tad āgatim apekṣamāṇe muni-samāje vyāsa-putro'bhavat | janmārabhya śrī-kṛṣṇaika-niṣṭho'dhunā tyaktarājyo gṛhīta-prāyaḥ parīkṣit-tat-kathāśravaṇātiyogyo'sti taṁ mad adhītaṁ śrī-kṛṣṇa-caritāmṛtavāṣa mahā-purāṇaṁ śrāvayiṣyāmīti niścitya svayam āgamad ity arthaḥ | anapekṣo niṣpṛhaḥ | matāntarāṇi ca munyantarāṇāṁ tucchatvād anicchat yato nijasya sva-prabhoḥ kṛṣṇasya lābhena sadaiva sākṣāt-kāreṇa tuṣṭaḥ | na lakṣyat liṅgam āśrama-cihnaṁ yasya saḥ, avadhūto janair avajñāto veṣo yasya saḥ ||25||

**...**

|| 1.19.26 ||

**taṁ dvyaṣṭa-varṣaṁ sukumāra-pāda-**

**karoru-bāhv-aṁsa-kapola-gātram |**

**cārv-āyatākṣonnasa-tulya-karṇa-**

**subhrv-ānanaṁ kambu-sujāta-kaṇṭham ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tam ity-ādīnāṁ pratyutthitā iti tṛtīya-ślokenānvayaḥ | dvi-guṇāny aṣṭau varṣāṇi yasya | sukumārau komalau pādau karāv ūrū bāhū aṁsau kapolau gātraṁ ca yasya | cāruṇī āyate ākṣiṇī yasmin | unnatā nāsā yasmin | lamba-hrasvādi-vaiṣamyaṁ vinā tulyau karṇau yasmin | śobhane ca bhruvau yasmin evaṁ-bhūtam ānanaṁ yasya | kambuvad-rekhā-trayāṅkitaḥ suṣṭhu jātaḥ kaṇṭho yasya ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **ṣoḍaśa-varṣa-vayasam | cāruṇī āyate akṣiṇī yasmin, unnatā nāsā yasmin | lamba-hrasvādi-vaiṣamyaṁ vinā tulyau karṇau yasmin, śobhane bhruvau yasmin, tathā-bhūtam ānanaṁ yasya tam | kambuḥ śaṅkhaḥ tadvad rekhā-trayāṅkitaḥ sujātaḥ kaṇṭho yasya tam ||26||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **taṁ prati munaya utthitā iti tṛtīyena sambandhaḥ | dviguṇitānyaṣṭau varṣāṇi yasya ṣoḍaśa-varṣavayasam ity arthaḥ | sukumārau komalau pādau karāv ūrūbāhū aṁsau kapolau gātraṁ ca yasya taṁ | cārūṇi āyate dīrghe akṣiṇī yasmin | unnatā nāsā yasmin, hrasvādi-vaiṣamyaṁ vinā tulyau karṇau yasmin | śobhane bhruvau yasmin | tādṛśa-mānanaṁ yasya taṁ | kambuvad rekhātrayāñcitaḥ sujātaḥ komalaḥ kaṇṭho yasya tam ||26||

 **...**

|| 1.19.27 ||

**nigūḍha-jatruṁ pṛthu-tuṅga-vakṣasam**

**āvarta-nābhiṁ vali-valgūdaraṁ ca |**

**dig-ambaraṁ vaktra-vikīrṇa-keśaṁ**

**pralamba-bāhuṁ svamarottamābham ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **kaṇṭhasyādho-bhāgayoḥ sthite te asthinī **jatruṇī** | māṁsena nigūḍhe jatruṇī yasya | **pṛthu** vistīrṇaṁ **tuṅgam** unnataṁ ca **vakṣo** yasya | **āvartavan nābhir** yasya | **valibhis** tiryaṅ-nimna-rekhābhir **valgu** ramyam **udaraṁ** yasya | **diśa evāmbaraṁ** yasya | **vakrā vikīrṇāḥ keśā** yasya | **pralambau bāhū** yasya | **svamareṣu** śreṣṭha-deveṣu **uttamo **haris tadvad **ābhā** yasya tam ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **nigūḍhe māṁsale jatruṇī kaṇṭhasyādho-bhāgayoḥ sthite asthinī yasya tam | svamareṣu deva-śreṣṭheṣv apy uttamaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇaḥ, tat-tulya-kāntim ||27||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **māṁsalatvān-nigūḍhe jakruṇī kaṇṭhasyādhobhāgayoḥ sthite asthinī yasya taṁ | pṛthu vistīrṇaṁ tuṅgaṁ ca vakṣo yasya tam | āvarta iva nābhir yasya taṁ, valibhi-stri-sṛbhir valgu manojñam udaraṁ yasya taṁ | svamareṣu deva-śreṣṭheṣu brahmādiṣūttamaḥ śrī-kṛṣṇas tad ābhaṁ, hṛd-vibhāta-kṛṣṇatvāt samucchalitayā tat-kāntyā labdhatat-sārūpyam ity arthaḥ ||27||

 **...**

|| 1.19.28 ||

**śyāmaṁ sadāpīvya-vayo-'ṅga-lakṣmyā**

**strīṇāṁ mano-jñaṁ rucira-smitena |**

**pratyutthitās te munayaḥ svāsanebhyas**

**tal-lakṣaṇa-jñā api gūḍha-varcasam ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **kaiśora-yauvanābhyantaḥkāla āpīvyam ucyata ity abhidhānam ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **sadā apīvyam atyuttamaṁ yad vayo yauvanaṁ tena yāṅga-lakṣmīr deha-kāntis tayā rucira-smitena ca | gūḍha-varcasam api pratyutthitās taṁ dṛṣṭvā pratyudgamaṁ kṛtavānta ity arthaḥ ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **yataḥ sadā sthiram eva yad apīvyam atyuttamaṁ vayo nava-yauvanaṁ tena yā aṅgasya lakṣmīḥ śobhā tayā rucireṇa svābhāvikena smitena strīṇāṁ manojñaṁ manoharaṁ gūḍha-varcasam api taṁ dṛṣṭvā ||28||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tad āha—śyāmam iti | sadā sthiram eva yat apīcyaṁ kamanīyaṁ vayo nava-yauvanaṁ tena yāṅgānāṁ lakṣmīs tayā rucireṇa svabhāva-siddhena smitena ca strīṇāṁ yuvatīnāṁ manojñaṁ citta-haraṁ taṁ gūḍhavarcasam api vīkṣya ||28||

 **...**

|| 1.19.29 ||

**sa viṣṇu-rāto’tithaya āgatāya**

**tasmai saparyāṁ śirasājahāra |**

**tato nivṛttā hy abudhāḥ striyo’rbhakā**

**mahāsane sopaviveśa pūjitaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **śirasaiva saprayām ājahārātma-nivedanaṁ kṛtavān | tena sahāgatāḥ stry-ādayo nivṛttāḥ | sa copaviveśa | sandhir ārṣaḥ ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **viṣṇurātaḥ parīkṣit śirasā saparyām ājahāra nati-pūrvikāṁ pūjāṁ cakāra, tataḥ stry-ādayo nivṛttā babhūvuḥ | sa ca śuko mahāsane viṣṇurātena pūjāṅgatvenārpite upaviveśa | sandhir ārṣaḥ ||29||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **sa viṣṇurātaḥ parīkṣit-tasmai brahmarātāyātithaye śukāya śirasā saparyāṁ pūjām ājahāra | sākṣāt-kandarpo'yam iti striyo, vikṣipto'yam ity arbhakāś cābudhāḥ amum anuvṛttā nivṛttāḥ | munibhyo bhayenāpalāyanta | sa ca pūjitaḥ muni-kartṛkā muni-karmikā ca praṇati-pariṣvaṅga-kṣema-praśnāḥ pūjā jātā yasya saḥ | tena ca sarve munayas taṁ praṇemuḥ, tena cāśliṣṭāḥ pṛṣṭakṣemāś ca babhūvuḥ | śrī-nārada-parāśara-bādarāyaṇādayas tu sāśraṁ sagad-gadam āśliṣya śiro jighrantaḥ kṣemaṁ papracchur ity arthaḥ | sa ca tān vavande iti bodhyam | īdṛśaḥ san mahati deśika-yogye āsane tadājñayā sarvābhyarthanayā copaviveśa | so'ci lope cet pāda-pūraṇam [pā. 6.1.134] iti sūtrāt sandhiḥ ||29||

 **...**

|| 1.19.30 ||

**sa saṁvṛtas tatra mahān mahīyasāṁ**

**brahmarṣi-rājarṣi-devarṣi-saṅghaiḥ |**

**vyarocatālaṁ bhagavān yathendur**

**graharkṣa-tārā-nikaraiḥ parītaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **sa bhagavān brahmarṣy-ādi-saṅghaiḥ saṁvṛtaḥ sannalaṁ vyarocat | grahāḥ śukrādayaḥ | ṛkṣāṇy aśviny-ādīni | anyās tārāḥ ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tatra tasmin mahāsane upaviṣṭaḥ mahīyasām api mahānsa bhagavān śukaḥ brahmarṣy-ādibhiḥ sa-vṛtaḥ yathā grahādibhiḥ parīte indus tadvad alaṁ vyarocata | grahāḥ śukrādyāḥ nakṣatrāṇy aśviny-ādīni, tārās tad-anyāḥ | brahmarṣayo vaśiṣṭhādayaḥ rājarṣaya ārṣṭiṣeṇādayaḥ | devarṣayo nāradādayaḥ ||30||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tatropaviṣṭasya śobhām āha—sa iti | grahāḥ śukrādayaḥ, ṛkṣāṇi aśvinyādīni, tārāḥ tad anyāḥ | atra nāradādibhyo'pi tasyotkarṣo nanda-sutaikāntitvād bodhyaḥ ||30||

 **...**

|| 1.19.31 ||

**praśāntam āsīnam akuṇṭha-medhasaṁ**

**muniṁ nṛpo bhāgavato'bhyupetya |**

**praṇamya mūrdhnāvahitaḥ kṛtāñjalir**

**natvā girā sūnṛtayānvapṛcchat ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **na kuṇṭhā sarvāryeṣu medhā yasya tam | praṇamya praśnārthaṁ punar natvā ||3 ||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **praśnārthaṁ punar natvā sūnṛtayā madhurayā girā’kuṇṭha-medhasaṁ na kuṇṭhā sarvārtheṣu medhā yasya tam anvapṛcchat ||31||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **na kuṇṭhā nikhileṣv artheṣu medhā yasya tam | praśnārthaṁ punarnatvā ||31||

 **...**

|| 1.19.32-33 ||

**parīkṣid uvāca—**

**aho adya vayaṁ brahman sat-sevyāḥ kṣatra-bandhavaḥ |**

**kṛpayātithi-rūpeṇa bhavadbhis tīrthakāḥ kṛtāḥ ||**

**yeṣāṁ saṁsmaraṇāt puṁsāṁ sadyaḥ śuddhyanti vai gṛhāḥ |**

**kiṁ punar darśana-sparśa- pāda-śaucāsanādibhiḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **sūnṛtāṁ girim āha—aho iti pañcabhiḥ | satāṁ sevyā jātāḥ | yataḥ atithi-rūpeṇa hetunā tīrthakā yogyāḥ kṛtāḥ ||32||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **satāṁ sadācārāṇāṁ sevyā ādara-yogyāḥ ||32-33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tad evāha—aho ity aṣṭabhiḥ | he brahman! kṣatra-bandhavo vayaṁ satāṁ sevyā ādaraṇīyā jātāḥ, yato’tithi-rūpeṇa bhavadbhis tīrthakāḥ kṛṭaḥ pavitrīkṛtāḥ ||32|| yeṣāṁ smaraṇāt yat-kartṛkāt yat-karmakād vā | gṛhā api kiṁ punaḥ kalatra-putra-dehāḥ ||33||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tāṁ giram āha—aho iti pañcabhiḥ | kṣatra-bandhavo'pi vayam adya sat-sevyāḥ, santaḥ sevyāḥ yeṣāṁ te sat-sevādhikāriṇo jātā ity arthaḥ | tīrthakā iti tīrthāni kṛtāni, svārthikāḥ prakṛtito liṅga-vacanānyativartante iti bhāṣyokteḥ puṁstvam | yatra bhavatām āgamas tan-nindyam api sthānaṁ jana-pāvanaṁ bhavatīty arthaḥ ||32|| \
 \
yeṣām  iti yat-karmakād-yat-kartṛkād vā smaraṇād ity arthaḥ, gṛhā api kiṁ punaḥ dārāpatya-śarīrāṇīty arthaḥ ||33||

 **...**

|| 1.19.34 ||

**sānnidhyāt te mahā-yogin pātakāni mahānty api |**

**sadyo naśyanti vai puṁsāṁ viṣṇor iva suretarāḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **viṣṇoḥ sānnidhyād asurādaya[^161] iva ||34||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ), viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) :** _na vyākhyātam._

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **suretaro daityādayaḥ ||34||

 **...**

|| 1.19.35 ||

**api me bhagavān prītaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pāṇḍu-suta-priyaḥ |**

**paitṛ-ṣvaseya-prīty-arthaṁ tad-gotrasyātta-bāndhavaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **pāṇḍu-sutānāṁ priyo’tas teṣāṁ paitṛṣvastreyānāṁ prīty-arthaṁ tad-gotrasya me āttaṁ svīkṛtaṁ bāndhavaṁ bandhu-kṛtyaṁ yena saḥ ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (kṛṣṇa-sandarbhaḥ, 48) : **teṣāṁ paitṛ-ṣvaseyāṇāṁ pāṇḍu-sutānāṁ gotrasya me āttaṁ svīkṛtaṁ bāndhavaṁ bandhu-kṛtyaṁ yena ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **paitṛ-ṣvasreyādīnāṁ yudhiṣṭhirādīnāṁ tad-gotrasyāpi me āttaṁ svīkṛtaṁ bāndhavaṁ bandhu-kṛtyaṁ yena saḥ | tasmāt tenaiva tvaṁ man-nistārārthaṁ preṣito’sīty anumīyate iti bhāvaḥ ||35||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **paitṛsv asrayāṇāṁ yudhiṣṭhirādīnāṁ prītaye tad-gotrasyāpi mamāttam aṅgīkṛtaṁ bāndhavaṁ bandhu-kṛtyaṁ yena saḥ, tathā ca tena tvaṁ madundhārāya iha preṣito'sīti bhāvaḥ ||35||

 **...**

|| 1.19.36 ||

**anyathā te’vyakta-gater darśanaṁ naḥ kathaṁ nṛṇām |**

**nitarāṁ mriyamāṇānāṁ saṁsiddhasya vanīyasaḥ ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **anyathā śrī-kṛṣṇa-prasādaṁ vinā | avyaktā gatir yasya | mriyamāṇānāṁ nitarāṁ kathaṁ syāt ? vanayitā yācayitā vanayitṛtamo **vanīyāṁs** tasya, atyudāratayā māṁ yācethā iti pravartakasyevety arthaḥ ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (kṛṣṇa-sandarbhaḥ, 48) : **te tava śrī-kṛṣṇasyaika-rasikasya vanīyasaḥ atyudāratayā māṁ yācethā iti pravartakasyety arthaḥ ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : **vanīyasa iti tu cchandasīti hi tṛn tṛjantādiṣṭheya-sūnau bhavataḥ, turiṣṭhemayaḥsu [pā. 6.4.154] iti ca tu-śabdasya lopaḥ syāt | tato nimittābhāve naimittikasyāpy abhāvāt ṭer lopāś ca sidhyanti ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **vanayitā yācayitā vanayitṛtamo vanīyān | turiṣṭhemayaḥsu [pā. 6.4.154] iti tu-śabdasya lopaḥ | tato nimittāpāye naimittikasyāpy apāyāt ṭer lopāc ca vanīyān iti siddhyati | tasya atyudāratayā māṁ yācasveti pravartakasyety arthaḥ ||36||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **anyathā kṛṣṇaś cen-na preṣayet-tarhi te darśanaṁ naḥ kathaṁ? vanīyaso'tyudāratayā māṁ yācasva iti pravartayataḥ ity arthaḥ | vanu yācane dhātuḥ, tasmād-dhetum aṇṇyantāt tṛci vanayitā, tataḥ kriyāvācakād api tuś chandasi [pā. 5.3.59] iti sūtrādīyasuni tur iṣṭemeyaḥsu [pā. 6.4.154] iti sūtrāt-tṛ-śabdasya lopaḥ, tato nimittābhāve naimittikasyāpy abhāvaḥ iti nyāyādiṭo nivṛttiḥ, ṭerlopāṇ-ṇicaś ca, tato vanīyānn iti pada-siddhiḥ ||36||

 **...**

|| 1.19.37 ||

**ataḥ pṛcchāmi saṁsiddhiṁ yogināṁ paramaṁ gurum |**

**puruṣasyeha yat kāryaṁ mriyamāṇasya sarvathā ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **samyak siddhir yasmāt tam | kāryaṁ kartuṁ yogyam, kartavyaṁ tv āvaśyakam iti bhedaḥ | ata eva sarvathā mriyamāṇasya puruṣasya yasmin kṛte saṁsiddhir mokṣa-lakṣaṇā siddhir bhavati tat tvāṁ yogināṁ guruṁ pṛcchāmi ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **saṁsiddhiṁ samyak siddhiḥ kā tāṁ pṛcchāmi | iha saṁsiddhau yat sarvathā kartavyaṁ sādhanaṁ tat pṛcchāmi ||37||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **saṁsiddhiṁ samyak puruṣārtham | iha saṁ-siddhau yat sādhanaṁ sarvathā kartavyaṁ tat pṛcchāmi ||37||

 **...**

|| 1.19.38 ||

**yac chrotavyam atho japyaṁ yat kartavyaṁ nṛbhiḥ prabho |**

**smartavyaṁ bhajanīyaṁ vā brūhi yad vā viparyayam ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **yac chrotavyaṁ yaj jāpyaṁ yat kartavyaṁ yat smartavyaṁ yad ārādhyaṁ tad brūhi || viparyayam aśrotavyādi ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tad eva viśiṣyāha—yac chrotavyam iti | kartavyam iti śrotavyādiṣu caturṣv evānveti | yat śrotavyaṁ śravaṇārhaṁ kartavyaṁ yaj japyaṁ japārhaṁ kartavyaṁ yat smartavyaṁ smaraṇārhaṁ kartavyaṁ yat bhajanīyaṁ bhajanārhaṁ kartavyam ity evam | viparyayam aśrotavyādi ||38||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **yad iti—kartavyam iti śrotavyādiṣu caturṣvanveti, yat śravaṇa-yogyaṁ kartavyam ity evaṁ-vidhayā | viparyayam aśrotavyādi ||38||

 **...**

|| 1.19.39 ||

**nūnaṁ bhagavato brahman gṛheṣu gṛha-medhinām |**

**na lakṣyate hy avasthānam api go-dohanaṁ kvacit ||**

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **tava darśanasya punar durlabhatvād idānīm eva kathanīyam ity āśayenāha—nūnam iti | go-dohana-mātra-kālam api asmākaṁ bhāgya-vaśāt tvad-darśanaṁ jātam iti bhāvaḥ ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **tvad-darśanasya punar durlabhatvād idānīm eva kathanīyam ity āśayenāha—nūnam iti | go-dohana-mātra-kālam api ||39||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **tvad-vīkṣāyāḥ punar daurlabhyād adhunaiva kṛpayā brūhīti bhāvenāha—nūnam iti | godohanam api kālam ||39||

 **...**

|| 1.19.40 ||

**sūta uvāca—**

**evam ābhāṣitaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ sa rājñā ślakṣṇayā girā |**

**pratyabhāṣata dharma-jño bhagavān bādarāyaṇiḥ ||**

**madhvācāryaḥ (bhāgavata-tātparyam) : **svakṛto guṇas tasyaiva yataḥ ||40||

———————————————————————————————————————

**śrīdhara-svāmī (bhāvārtha-dīpikā) : **evam aho ity-ādikayā ślakṣaṇayā madhurayā girā ābhāṣito’bhimukhīkṛtaḥ pṛṣṭhaś ca ||40||

āryaṁ dharmajam āhatārim avanau kṛtvā parīkṣin-nṛpaṁ  \
brahmāstrādibhirakṣitaṁ kali-jayākhyātaṁ ca kṛtvā bhuvi | \
ante yaḥ śuka-rūpataḥ sva-parama-jñānopadeśena taṁ  \
śāpād āvad amuṁ namāmi paramānandākṛtiṁ mādhavam ||

iti śrīmad-bhāgavata-bhāvārtha-dīpikāyāṁ śrīdhara-svāmi-viracitāyāṁ \
prathama-skandha-ṭīkāyām ekonaviṁśo’dhyāyaḥ ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**jīva-gosvāmī (krama-sandarbhaḥ) : _na vyākhyātam._**

iti kali-yuga-pāvana-svabhajana-vibhajana-prayojanāvatāra-

śrī-śrī-bhagavat-kṛṣṇa-caitanya-deva-caraṇānucara-

viśva-vaiṣṇava-rāja-sabhā-sabhājana-bhājana-

śrī-rūpa-sanātanānuśāsana-bhāratī-garbhe

saptama-sandarbhātmaka-śrī-bhāgavata-sandarbhe

prathama-skandhasya śrī-krama-sandarbhaḥ samāptaḥ ||

prathama-skandha-mūla-saṅkhyā = 955

ṭīkā = 1727

sandarbha-saṅkhyā = 1700

———————————————————————————————————————

**viśvanātha-cakravartī (sārārtha-darśiṇī) : **ślakṣṇayā madhurayā girā ||40||

iti sārārtha-darśinyāṁ harṣiṇyāṁ bhakta-cetasām |

ekonaviṁśaḥ prathame saṅgataḥ saṅgataḥ satām ||*||

śrīdharaḥ-svāmināṁ śrīmat-prabhūṇāṁ śrī-mukhād guroḥ |

vyākhyāsu sāra-grahaṇād iyaṁ sārārtha-darśinī ||19||

———————————————————————————————————————

**baladeva-vidyabhūṣaṇaḥ (vaiṣṇavānandinī) : **ślakṣnayā madhurayā girā aho adya vayam [bhā. pu. 1.19.32] ity-ādi | kayābhāṣito'bhimukhīkṛtaḥ pṛṣṭaś ca bādarāyaṇiḥ bhagavān pratyabhāṣata ||40||

jayati prathama-skandhaḥ, sumerur iva sundaro varo loke | \
yo dayate śaśvad-gaṅgām iva bhakta-bandhutāṁ viṣṇoḥ || \
vidyā-bhūṣaṇa-bhaṇitāṁ, prathama-skandhasya ṭippanīm etām | \
santaḥ karuṇāvanto, mādhava-hṛdayā nirīkṣantām ||2|| \
 \
iti vaiṣṇavānandinyāṁ prathama-skandha-ṭippanyāmunaviṁśaḥ ||19||

**...**

iti śrīmad-bhāgavate mahā-purāṇe brahma-sūtra-bhāṣye

pāramahaṁsyaṁ saṁhitāyāṁ vaiyāsikyāṁ prathama-skandhe

**śukāgamanaṁ **nāma ekonaviṁśo’dhyāyaḥ |

||19||
